aniina gulna leyah :‹ Ma nagdaro namchu bala akhuuna al‑sakhayyar achaan al‑haakim gaal leena ma yigaabilna kan ma jibna akhuuna al‑sakhayyar. ›
Wa abdak abuuna gaal leena :‹ Intu taʼarfu adiil kadar marti Raahiil jaabat leyi awlaad itneen bas.
Al‑waahid waddar.Akuun haywaan waahid akalah achaan battaan ma chiftah.
Wa battaan tidooru tichiilu al‑aakhar da kula ?Kan cheyy waahid yisawwiih,intu tisabbubu leyi moot be cheebi da,min al‑hizin. ›
 Hassaʼ da,chiif,ya l‑sayyid al‑haakim.Kikkeef nagdar nigabbil bakaan abuuyi bala l‑wileed ?Achaan hu ma yagdar yiʼiich bala l‑wileed da.
Kan ma chaafah gabbal maʼaana,yugumm yumuut wa aniina bas masʼuuliin min mootah be cheebah min al‑hizin.
Wa ana abdak bas chilt masʼuuliiyit al‑wileed giddaam abuuyi wa gult leyah :‹ Kan ma gabbaltah leek,ana nabga khaati giddaamak fi muddit hayaati. ›
 Min fadlak ya l‑sayyid al‑haakim,ana nachhadak khalliini nabga abdak fi baddal al‑wileed wa hu yamchi maʼa akhwaanah.
Ana ma nagdar nigabbil bakaan abuuyi bala l‑wileed da.Ma nagdar nichiif abuuyi fi hiznah. 
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Yuusuf ma gidir sabbat nafsah giddaam al‑naas al‑gaaʼidiin maʼaayah.Wa gaal leehum : Amurgu ! Wa kulla l‑naas marago.Naadum waahid kula ma faddal,illa hu wa akhwaanah.Wa bayyan leehum nafsah.
Wa Yuusuf gamma yabki baki chadiid lahaddi l‑Masriyiin wa l‑naas fi gasir al‑malik Firʼoon kula simʼooh.
Wa Yuusuf gaal le akhwaanah : Ana bas Yuusuf !Sahiih abuuyi lissaaʼ gaaʼid hayy walla ? Laakin akhwaanah min al‑khoof giddaamah ma gidro raddo leyah.
Wa Yuusuf gaal leehum : Taʼaalu leyi gariib. Wa humman garrabo leyah wa gaal leehum : Ana Yuusuf,akhuuku.Intu biʼtuuni misil abid wa jaabooni hini fi Masir.
Intu biʼtuuni wa jaabooni hini.Wa fi chaan da,ma takhaafo wa la tibarjulu.Achaan al‑Rabb bas rassalaani hini gubbaalku le yinajji hayaatku.
Daahu al‑juuʼ sawwa santeen fi l‑balad wa faddal battaan khamsa sana.Al‑naas ma bagdaro biteerubu wa la bahartu.
Wa l‑Rabb rassalaani hini gubbaalku achaan intu tifaddulu fi l‑ard wa yinajji hayaatku naja kaamile.
Ma intu ya jibtuuni hini laakin al‑Rabb bas jaabaani.Wa hu sawwaani al‑waziir al‑kabiir siid al‑amaan hana l‑malik Firʼoon wa masʼuul hana beetah wa haakim fi kulla balad Masir.
 Hassaʼ da,amchu ajala le abuuyi wa guulu leyah :‹ Daahu wileedak Yuusuf buguul ke :“Al‑Rabb sawwaani haakim fi kulla balad Masir.Taʼaal leyi bala taʼkhiir.
Wa tagood jambi fi turaab Goochan,inta wa iyaalak wa iyaal iyaalak wa bagarak wa khanamak wa kulla maalak.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,nantiik maʼaach leek wa le aayiltak wa le bahaaymak le ma tatʼabo.Achaan faddal khamsa sana hana juuʼ.”› 
Wa Yuusuf gaal leehum battaan : Intu kulluku wa Banyaamiin zaatah gaaʼidiin tichiifuuni ana bas gaaʼid nikallim leeku.
Wa amchu ooru abuuyi be l‑daraja al‑indi fi Masir wa be kulla cheyy al‑gaaʼidiin tichiifuuh.Wa amchu jiibuuh ajala ke hini. 
Wa Yuusuf gamma hadan akhuuh Banyaamiin wa bada yabki wa Banyaamiin kula hadanah wa baka.
Yuusuf gaaʼid yabki wa yihibb akhwaanah al‑aakhariin kula wa fi l‑bakaan da,humman gidro hajjo leyah.
Wa fi gasir al‑malik Firʼoon,simʼo kadar akhwaan Yuusuf jo fi Masir wa Firʼoon maʼa masaaʼiilah kulluhum firho be l‑khabar da.
Wa l‑malik gaal le Yuusuf : Guul le akhwaanak khalli yichiddu hamiirhum wa yigabbulu fi balad Kanʼaan.
Yamchu yijiibu abuuhum wa aayilaathum wa nukhuttuhum fi afdal bakaan fi Masir,bakaan al‑yalgo foogah sarha samha le maalhum.
Wa guul le akhwaanak khalli yichiilu min hini arabaat achaan yijiibu fooghum awiinhum wa iyaalhum wa abuuhum kula.
Wa khalli ma yandamo le ayyi cheyy al‑yikhallu hinaak achaan yaju yaskunu fi afdal bakaan fi Masir. 
Wa khalaas,awlaad Yaakhuub sawwo al‑cheyy al‑gaalooh leehum.Yuusuf antaahum al‑arabaat be izin al‑malik Firʼoon wa antaahum zaad kula.
Wa antaahum hadiiye hana khulgaan wa le Banyaamiin antaah khamsa khulgaan wa 300 hajar fudda.
Wa daahu al‑khumaam al‑rassalah le abuuh,achara hamiir chaayliin achya samhiin hana Masir wa achara hamiir anaati chaayliin gameh wa khubza wa zaad le abuuh fi l‑derib.
Wa talab min akhwaanah achaan ma yihaaruju fi l‑derib wa khallaahum macho.
Wa khalaas humman gammo marago min Masir wa baʼadeen wassalo fi balad Kanʼaan bakaan abuuhum Yaakhuub.
Wa gammo gaalo leyah : Yuusuf gaaʼid hayy wa hu bas haakim fi Masir. Wa Yaakhuub galbah angataʼ min al‑farha wa be da kula,hu ma saddag kalaamhum.
Wa laakin humman hajjo leyah be kulla cheyy al‑Yuusuf gaalah leehum.Wa wassafooh al‑arabaat al‑Yuusuf rassalaahum le yisaafir beehum.Khalaas Yaakhuub galbah ragad.
Wa baʼad chiyya ke,Yaakhuub gaal : Wileedi Yuusuf gaaʼid hayy !Ana battaan nagdar nuguul chunu ?Namchi nichiifah gubbaal ana ma numuut ! 
Wa Yaakhuub gamma maachi maʼa aayiltah wa chaal kulla khumaamah.Wa wakit wisil fi hillit Biir Sabʼa,gaddam dahiiye le Allah Rabb abuuh Ishaakh.
Wa be l‑leel al‑Rabb hajja le Israaʼiil,al‑maʼruuf be Yaakhuub,fi ruʼya wa gaal : Yaakhuub,Yaakhuub ! Wa Yaakhuub gaal : Naʼam. 
Wa l‑Rabb gaal : Ana Allah Rabb abuuk.Ma takhaaf min al‑machi fi Masir achaan hinaak ana nisawwiik abu hana umma kabiire.
Ana bas niwaddiik fi Masir wa nigabbilak kula.Wa fi mootak Yuusuf bas yisidd uyuunak. 
Wa khalaas,Yaakhuub gamma min hillit Biir Sabʼa.Wa iyaalah rakkabooh hu wa iyaalhum wa awiinhum fi l‑arabaat al‑Firʼoon malik Masir rassalaahum leehum,le yisaafuru beehum.
Wa waddo maʼaahum bahaayimhum wa khumaamhum al‑ligoohum fi balad Kanʼaan.Wa Yaakhuub macha fi Masir maʼa kulla zurriiytah.
Hu wassal fi Masir maʼa awlaadah wa awlaad iyaalah wa banaatah wa banaat iyaalah wa kulla zurriiytah.
Daahu asaame hana iyaal Israaʼiil al‑maʼruuf be Yaakhuub,al‑macho fi Masir.Raʼuubiin hu bikir hana Yaakhuub.
Wa awlaad Raʼuubiin humman Hanuuk wa Fallu wa Hasruun wa Karmi.
Wa awlaad Chimʼuun humman Yamuwiil wa Yaamiin wa Uhad wa Yaakiin wa Suuhar wa Chaawuul.Wa Chaawuul da,wileed Yaakhuub al‑wildatah martah al‑Kanʼaaniiye.
Wa awlaad Laawi humman Girchuun wa Gahaat wa Maraari.
Wa awlaad Yahuuza humman Iir wa Unaan wa Chiila wa Faaris wa Zaarah.Laakin Iir wa Unaan maato fi balad Kanʼaan.Wa awlaad Faaris humman Hasruun wa Haamul.
Wa awlaad Yassaakar humman Tuulaʼ wa Fuwwa wa Yuub wa Chimruun.
Wa awlaad Zabuluun humman Saarad wa Iluun wa Yahaliil.
Wa humman dool zurriiyit Yaakhuub al‑jaabathum leyah martah Leeya fi Faddaan Araam,maʼa akhuthum Diina.Wa adad awlaadah wa banaatah kulluhum ke 33 nafis.
Wa awlaad Gaad humman Sifyuun wa Haggi wa Chuuni wa Asbuun wa Iiri wa Aruudi wa Ariili.
Wa awlaad Achiir humman Yimna wa Yichwa wa Yichwi wa Bariiʼa maʼa akhuthum Saarah.Wa awlaad Bariiʼa humman Haabar wa Malkiyiil.
Wa humman dool zurriiyit Yaakhuub al‑jaabathum leyah Zilfa.Wa adadhum 16 maʼa iyaalhum.Wa Zilfa hi al‑khaddaama al‑Laabaan antaaha le bittah Leeya marit Yaakhuub.
Wa awlaad Raahiil marit Yaakhuub humman Yuusuf wa Banyaamiin.
Wa fi Masir,Asnaat marit Yuusuf jaabat leyah awlaad itneen,humman Manassa wa Afraayim.Wa Asnaat hi bineeyit Fuuti Faaraʼ wa hu da raajil al‑diin fi hillit Uun.
Wa awlaad Banyaamiin humman Baalaʼ wa Baakar wa Achbiil wa Giira wa Naʼamaan wa Iihi wa Ruuch wa Muffiim wa Huffiim wa Arad.
Wa humman dool zurriiyit Yaakhuub al‑jaabathum leyah martah Raahiil.Wa adadhum 14 maʼa iyaalhum.
Wa wileed Daan,hu Huchiim.
Wa awlaad Naftaali humman Yahsiil wa Guuni wa Yisar wa Chilliim.
Wa dool zurriiyit Yaakhuub al‑jaabathum leyah Bilha.Wa adadhum 7 maʼa iyaalhum.Wa Bilha hi khaddaama al‑Laabaan antaaha le bittah Raahiil.
Wa iyaal Yaakhuub maʼa iyaalhum al‑macho maʼaayah fi Masir,adadhum 66 bala awiinhum.
Wa be l‑awlaad al‑itneen hana Yuusuf al‑wildoohum fi Masir,adad hana aayilat Yaakhuub al‑macho fi Masir bigi 70.
Wa Yaakhuub rassal Yahuuza giddaamah le yikhabbir Yuusuf achaan yilaagiih fi turaab Goochan.
Wa wakit Yaakhuub wa aayiltah wassalo fi Goochan,Yuusuf jahhaz arabatah rikib foogha wa macha le yilaagi abuuh.Wa min Yuusuf chaaf abuuh,jara hadanah wa baka foogah tawwal.
Wa Yaakhuub gaal leyah : Hassaʼ da,min chiftak inta lissaaʼak gaaʼid hayy da,kan ana mutt kula khalaas ! 
Wa Yuusuf gaal le akhwaanah wa le naas beet abuuh : Namchi nikhabbir al‑malik Firʼoon wa nuguul leyah :‹ Akhwaani wa kulla aayilat abuuyi al‑gaaʼidiin fi balad Kanʼaan jo leyi.
Wa humman siyaad bagar wa khanam.Wa jaabo bagarhum wa khanamhum wa kulla khumaamhum. ›
Wa kan yoom waahid Firʼoon naadaaku wa saʼalaaku gaal leeku :‹ Intu khidmitku chunu ? ›
Waajib tuguulu leyah :‹ Aniina abiidak siyaad al‑bahaayim min aniina dugaag lahaddi hassaʼ,misil juduudna.› Be misil da,Firʼoon yikhalliiku taskunu fi turaab Goochan achaan al‑Masriyiin yakraho siyaad al‑khanam. 
Wa khalaas,Yuusuf macha khabbar al‑malik Firʼoon wa gaal : Akhwaani wa abuuyi jo khalaas min balad Kanʼaan maʼa bagarhum wa khanamhum wa kulla khumaamhum.Wa hassaʼ gaaʼidiin fi turaab Goochan. 
Wa Yuusuf chaal khamsa min akhwaanah wa gaddamaahum le l‑malik.
Wa l‑malik saʼalaahum wa gaal : Awwal khidmitku chunu ? Wa humman raddo leyah wa gaalo : Ya sayyidna,aniina siyaad al‑khanam,misil juduudna. 
Wa gaalo battaan : Al‑juuʼ bigi chadiid fi balad Kanʼaan.Ma fi marʼa le khanamna wa aniina jiina hini misil awraata.Achaan da,ya sayyidna,antiina bakaan al‑nagoodu foogah fi turaab Goochan. 
Wa l‑malik gaal le Yuusuf : Abuuk wa akhwaanak jo lihgook hini.
Kulla balad Masir fi iideenak.Khutt abuuk wa akhwaanak fi l‑bakaan al‑sameh al‑fi l‑balad di.Khalliihum yaskunu fi turaab Goochan.Wa kan chift ambeenhum naas waahidiin gaadriin,antiihum masʼuuliiye hana bahaaymi. 
Wa Yuusuf gaddam abuuh Yaakhuub le l‑malik wa Yaakhuub gaal leyah : Allah yibaarikak. 
Wa l‑malik saʼal Yaakhuub wa gaal : Indak kam sana ? 
Wa Yaakhuub radda leyah : Indi 130 sana.Wa ayyaami faato ajala wa icht fi taʼab hana hayaat al‑ruhhal.Wa siniini ma lihgo adad siniin juduudi al‑humman kula aacho misil ruhhal. 
Wa battaan Yaakhuub gaal le Firʼoon : Allah yibaarikak. Wa marag.
Wa Yuusuf anta le abuuh wa le akhwaanah al‑bakaan al‑sameh bilheen fi balad Masir,fi nuss hana turaab Raʼamsiis al‑binaaduuh Goochan,misil al‑malik Firʼoon amarah beyah.
Wa Yuusuf anta maʼaach le abuuh wa le akhwaanah wa le kulla aayilat abuuh ale hasab adadhum.
Wa l‑juuʼ bigi chadiid bilheen wa ma fi maʼaach fi kulla l‑buldaan.Wa naas al‑fi balad Masir wa fi balad Kanʼaan taʼbaaniin min al‑juuʼ.
Wa Yuusuf lamma kulla l‑gurus hana naas Masir wa Kanʼaan al‑charo beyah gameh.Wa khatta al‑gurus da fi gasir al‑malik Firʼoon.
Wa wakit kulla l‑gurus hana balad naas Masir wa balad Kanʼaan kammal,kulla l‑Masriyiin jo wa gaalo le Yuusuf : Antiina maʼaach !Aniina ma indina gurus !Walla tidoor numuutu be l‑juuʼ giddaamak ? 
Wa Yuusuf gaal leehum : Kan ma induku gurus da,antuuni bahaayimku wa nantiiku maʼaach. 
Wa khalaas,humman jaabo bahaayimhum le Yuusuf wa Yuusuf antaahum maʼaach fi badal kheelhum wa bagarhum wa hamiirhum wa khanamhum.Wa fi kulla l‑sana di hu gaaʼid yantiihum maʼaach fi badal bahaayimhum.
Wa khalaas,al‑sana di faatat wa fi l‑sana al‑taaniye al‑Masriyiin gabbalo jo wa gaalo le Yuusuf : Ya l‑sayyid al‑haakim,aniina ma nagdaro nilabbudu minnak cheyy,ma indina gurus.Wa bahaayimna kulla bigo hineeyak inta.Wa khalaas,ma indina cheyy illa faddalna aniina wa turaabna bas.
Tidoor numuutu be l‑juuʼ giddaamak wa nikhallu turaabna walla ?Achriina aniina wa turaabna,be maʼaach.Wa aniina wa kulla turaabna nabgo hana l‑malik.Wa antiina teeraab le nahartu achaan ma numuutu wa turaabna ma yabga sahara. 
Wa Yuusuf chara kulla turaab Masir le l‑malik achaan al‑juuʼ bigi chadiid wa ayyi Masri baaʼ zerʼah.Wa be misil da bas,al‑balad kullaha bigat hana l‑malik Firʼoon.
Wa Yuusuf nagalaahum le kulla l‑chaʼab fi l‑mudun hana Masir.
Illa rujaal al‑diin bas ma baaʼo turaabhum achaan humman gaaʼidiin yiʼiichu be huguughum al‑gaaʼid yantiihum leehum al‑malik.Achaan da,Yuusuf ma chara turaabhum.
Wa Yuusuf gaal le l‑chaʼab : Hassaʼ da,ana chareetku intu wa turaabku fi hisaab hana l‑malik.Daahu nantiiku teeraab le tahartu al‑ziraaʼa.
Laakin fi wakt al‑gatiʼ,antu al‑khumus min al‑intaaj le l‑malik.Wa l‑baagi kamaan,hanaaku intu achaan titeerubu ziraaʼitku wa tiʼiichu maʼa iyaalku wa kulla naas beetku. 
Wa kulla l‑chaʼab gaalo le Yuusuf : Ya l‑sayyid al‑haakim,inta najjeetna wa wassaft leena ridaak.Be da,aniina khassadna nabgo abiid le l‑malik Firʼoon. 
Wa be misil da,Yuusuf marag gaanuun jadiid al‑gaaʼid lahaddi al‑yoom fi Masir.Wa l‑gaanuun buguul fi kulla turaab Masir,khumus al‑intaaj le l‑malik.Illa turaab hana rujaal al‑diin bas ma yabga hana l‑malik.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil sakano fi Masir fi turaab Goochan.Wa charo bakaan wa wildo wa bigo katiiriin.
Wa Yaakhuub aach 17 sana fi Masir.Wa umrah 147 sana.
Wa wakit Yaakhuub irif kadar gariib yumuut khalaas,naada wileedah Yuusuf wa gaal leyah : Kan inta radyaan be kalaami,wassif leyi kheerak wa amaanak.Ma tadfinni fi Masir.Khutt iidak fi wirki wa ahlif leyi.
Kan ana mutt wa lihigt abbahaati,amrug janaazti min Masir wa amchi adfinha fi khubuur juduudi. Wa Yuusuf radda leyah : Tamaam,ya abuuyi,nisawwi misil inta gultah leyi. 
Wa Yaakhuub gaal leyah : Ahlif leyi ! Wa khalaas,Yuusuf halaf.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Yaakhuub antaka fi sariirah.
Wa baʼad da,jo khabbaro Yuusuf wa gaalo leyah abuuh mardaan bilheen.Wa khalaas,hu gamma macha leyah maʼa iyaalah al‑itneen Manassa wa Afraayim.
Wakit khabbaro Yaakhuub wa gaalo wileedah Yuusuf ja yuzuurah da,hu asar galbah wa gamma gaʼad be heelah.
Wa gaal le Yuusuf : Zamaan,Allah al‑Gaadir baan leyi fi hillit Luuz fi balad Kanʼaan wa baarakaani.
Wa gaal leyi :‹ Daahu ana nisawwiik talda iyaal wa tabgo katiiriin achaan inta tabga jidd hana aayila kabiire.Wa baʼadak,nanti balad Kanʼaan le zurriiytak misil warasa ila l‑abad. ›
Wa min al‑yoom,iyaalak Afraayim wa Manassa,al‑wildoohum leek fi Masir gubbaal ana ma naji leek,humman yabgo iyaali.Wa yabgo misil iyaali Raʼuubiin wa Chimʼuun.
Wa laakin iyaal al‑wildoohum leek baʼadhum,yabgo iyaalak inta.Wa humman yalgo warasathum min turaab akhwaanhum Afraayim wa Manassa.
 Wa wakit ana mugabbil min Faddaan Araam,ammak Raahiil maatat fi iideeni fi derib balad Kanʼaan gariib le hillit Afraata.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,ana dafantaha fi derib hillit Afraata al‑binaaduuha al‑yoom Beet Laham. 
Wa fi l‑bakaan da bas,Yaakhuub chaaf iyaal Yuusuf wa gaal : Dool yaatumman ? 
Wa Yuusuf gaal leyah : Dool iyaali,al‑Rabb antaahum leyi fi Masir. Wa Yaakhuub gaal : Jiibhum leyi gariib achaan nibaarikhum. 
Wa Yaakhuub choofah diʼif min al‑kubur ma yagdar yichiif adiil.Wa Yuusuf jaab iyaalah gariib le abuuh wa Yaakhuub gamma hadanaahum wa habbaahum wa gaal le Yuusuf :
 Awwal ana hasabt battaan ke ma nichiif wijhak.Wa khalaas be izin al‑Rabb,ana chiftak wa chift iyaalak kula ! 
Wa khalaas,Yuusuf rafaʼ iyaalah min rijileen abuuh wa sajad giddaamah.
Wa gamma chaal iyaalah al‑itneen.Le Afraayim karabah be iidah al‑zeene wa le Manassa karabah be iidah al‑isra.Wa Afraayim gaaʼid le Yaakhuub be iidah al‑isra wa Manassa gaaʼid leyah be iidah al‑zeene.Wa Yuusuf jaabaahum gariib le jidduhum.
Wa Yaakhuub khaalaf iideenah wa khatta iidah al‑zeene fi raas Afraayim al‑sakhayyar wa khatta iidah al‑isra fi raas Manassa al‑kabiir.Wa hu sawwa al‑cheyy da be raayah.
Wa baarak Yuusuf wa gaal : Ya Rabb,Ilaah abbahaati Ibraahiim wa Ishaakhal‑taabaʼo derbak !Ya Rabb,inta raaʼiiyi fi kulla muddit hayaatilahaddi l‑yoom !
Ya Allah al‑najjeetnimin kulla cheyy fasil !Natlub minnak tibaarik al‑iyaal doolachaan beehum humman,usmi yagood daaymanmisil usum abbahaati Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh.Wa khalli iyaalhum yiziiduwa yabgo katiiriin fi kulla l‑ard. 
Wa laakin Yuusuf ma bigi leyah halu wakit chaaf abuuh khatta iidah al‑zeene fi raas Afraayim.Wa hu gamma karab iid abuuh le yihawwilha min raas Afraayim wa yukhuttaha fi raas Manassa.
Wa Yuusuf gaal le abuuh : Ya abuuyi,ma misil da !Achaan Manassa bas al‑bikir !Khutt iidak al‑zeene fi raasah ! 
Wa abuuh aba wa gaal : Ana naʼarfah,ya wileedi,ana naʼarfah.Hu kula yabga kabiir wa iyaalah kula yabgo gabiila kabiire.Wa laakin Afraayim akhuuh al‑sakhayyar yabga kabiir minnah wa zurriiytah tabga umma kabiire min ummat Manassa. 
Wa fi l‑yoom da,Yaakhuub baarakaahum wa gaal : Bani Israaʼiil yibaaruku be usumku wa yuguulu ambeenaathum :‹ Allah yibaarikak misil Afraayim wa Manassa !›  Wa be misil da,Yaakhuub gaddam Afraayim fi Manassa.
Wa gaal le Yuusuf : Gariib ana numuut laakin al‑Rabb yukuun maʼaaku wa yigabbilku fi balad abbahaatku.
Wa ana nantiik turaab ziyaada min hana akhwaanak.Nantiik turaab Chakiim al‑ana chiltah min al‑Amuuriyiin be seefi wa nubbaali. 
Wa baʼad da,Yaakhuub gaal le iyaalah : Limmu taʼaalu,ana nibaarikku wa nikhabbirku be l‑cheyy al‑baʼadeen yukuun leeku.
 Taʼaalu wa asmaʼo,ya iyaal Yaakhuub.Asmaʼooni ana abuuku Israaʼiil.
 Ya Raʼuubiin,inta wileedi al‑bikir,inta bas al‑awwal wilidtakwakit indi gudra.Inta futt akhwaanak be l‑charafwa be l‑gudra hana l‑bukuuriiye.
Laakin inta ma talga al‑kubuuriiyeachaan inta gammeetmisil almi faayir.Chahwatak khalabatakwa dakhalt fi martiwa tallaft charafi.
 Chimʼuun wa Laawi humman akhwaanwa astafago le yisawwu al‑unuf.
Laakin ana ma nichtarik maʼaahumwa galbi ma yarda be fiʼilhum da.Achaan fi zaʼalhum,humman katalo rujaalwa fi khabiinithum,awwago tiiraan.
Ana nalʼan zaʼalhum al‑cheenwa khabiinithum al‑fasle.Ana nichattit iyaalhumfi lubb gabiilat Yaakhuubwa yagoodu mufarragiinfi turaab Israaʼiil.
 Ya Yahuuza,akhwaanak yachkuruukwa udwaanak yidanguru leekwa akhwaanak yasjudu leek.
Ya Yahuuza,inta misil farkh al‑duudal‑gamma min rimmitahInta misil duud al‑ragad aw duudaay,yaatu yagdar yigawwimah ?
Asaat al‑muluktagood fi aayilat Yahuuzawa asaat al‑hukum kulama tamrug min iideehumlahaddi yaji al‑naadumal‑waajib leyah al‑muluk.Wa kulla l‑chuʼuub yikarrumuuh.
Fi chadarat al‑inabyarbut humaarahaywa,fi chadarat al‑inab al‑samhayarbut dahachah.Fi l‑khamar yikhassil khalagahfi asiir al‑inab yikhassil lubaasah.
Wa uyuunah humur min al‑khamarwa sunuunah buyud ziyaada min al‑laban.
 Zabuluun yaskun fi khachum al‑baharbakaan al‑maraakib al‑kubaar yagiifu foogah.Wa huduud turaabahyiwassulu lahaddi hillit Seeda.
 Yassaakar misil humaar al‑chadiidal‑raagid fi l‑zariibe.
Hu chaaf al‑bakaan al‑raagid foogah da samehwa l‑balad di haluuwe.Wa dangar le yichiil al‑tagalawa khassad le yakhdim misil abid.
 Daan kula yahkim chaʼabahmisil Bani Israaʼiil al‑aakhariinyahkumu gabaayilhum.
Daan misil al‑daabifi l‑deribwa hu misil amchideegaatfi khachum al‑tariig.Hu yiʼaddi rijil al‑juwaadwa yarmi al‑raakib.
 Ya Allah,narja fazaʼak !
 Gaad,al‑haraamiyiin hajamoohlaakin hu khalabaahum wa taradaahum.
 Turaab Achiir yigawwim maʼaach katiiral‑yabga akil sameh le l‑muluuk.
 Naftaali misil khazaalaay al‑hurraal‑tijiib iyaal samhiin.
 Yuusuf misil chadaraal‑gaaʼide jamb al‑almial‑talda iyaal katiiriinwa furuuʼha yatlaʼo foogmin al‑durdur.
Siyaad al‑nubbaal jakhkhoohwa haarajooh wa haarabooh.
Laakin hu karab nubbaalah adiilwa iideenah saabtiin.Talga al‑barakabe gudrat Allah al‑Jabbaar,Ilaah Yaakhuub,aywa,be usum Allah al‑Raaʼi al‑yahmi Israaʼiil.
Aywa,be gudrat Allah al‑Gaadir Ilaah abuuk,inta talga al‑baraka wa l‑musaaʼada.Talga al‑barakahana l‑matara al‑tanzil min al‑samawa l‑almi al‑yatlaʼ min al‑ard.Talga al‑barakahana waaluudit al‑awiinwa l‑bahaayim.
Wa l‑baraka al‑talgaahamin abuuk di,hi faayte al‑barakahana l‑hujaar al‑gudaam.Wa l‑achya al‑haluwiin ziyaadamin maal hana l‑jibaal al‑zamaan.Ya Yuusuf,khalli barakat abuuk tanzil fi raasak,inta al‑bigiit sultaan fi akhwaanak.
 Banyaamiin khatiirmisil marfaʼiin al‑yaktul.Be fajur,yahjim udwaanahwa be achiiye,yigassim al‑khaniime maʼa akhwaanah. 
Wa dool al‑gabaayil al‑atnaachar hana Israaʼiil.Wa da kalaam al‑abuuhum gaalah wakit baarakaahum.Wa le ayyi waahid minhum baarakah baraka khaassa.
Wa Yaakhuub kallam le iyaalah wa gaal : Ana gariib numuut.Wa kan ana mutt,adfunuuni fi khabur juduudi.Wa l‑khabur da,hu al‑karkuur al‑fi zereʼ hana Afruun al‑Hitti.
Wa l‑karkuur da fi zereʼ fi Makfiila sabaah le hillit Mamra,fi balad Kanʼaan.Wa Ibraahiim chara al‑zereʼ da min Afruun al‑Hitti achaan yabga bakaan hana khabur hanaayah halaalah.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da bas,dafano Ibraahiim wa martah Saara wa wileedhum Ishaakh wa martah Rifga.Wa fi l‑bakaan da bas,ana dafant marti Leeya.
Wa l‑zereʼ wa l‑karkuur dool,Ibraahiim charaahum min al‑Hittiyiin. 
Wa wakit Yaakhuub kammal wasiiytah le iyaalah da,gabbal ragad wa khalaas maat wa lihig abbahaatah.
Wa Yuusuf gamma hadan abuuh,baka foogah wa habbaah.
Wa anta amur le khaddaamiinah al‑dakaatiir achaan yijahhuzu al‑janaaza.Wa khalaas al‑dakaatiir jahhazo janaazit abuuh.
Wa misil fi aadithum,al‑dakaatiir sawwo 40 yoom le yamsaho al‑janaaza be riihe achaan ma tiʼaffin.Wa fi moot Yaakhuub,al‑Masriyiin gaʼado haznaaniin muddit 70 yoom.
Wa wakit al‑hizin le Yaakhuub faat khalaas,Yuusuf gaal le l‑naas al‑fi gasir al‑malik Firʼoon : Kan radyaaniin beyi,amchu le Firʼoon wa guulu leyah :
‹ Abuuyi gubbaal ma yumuut hallafaani achaan namchi nadfinah fi balad Kanʼaan fi l‑khabur al‑hu jahhazah.Achaan da,khalli yantiini izin le namchi nadfinah hinaak wa nigabbil.› 
Wa Firʼoon gaal leyah : Amchi adfin abuuk misil hu hallafaak beyah. 
Wa Yuusuf macha yadfin abuuh wa macho maʼaayah kulla l‑jamaaʼa hana l‑malik wa kulla l‑masʼuuliin hana gasir al‑malik wa kulla l‑chuyuukh hana Masir.
Wa kulla aayilat Yuusuf wa akhwaanah wa aayilat abuuh al‑aakhariin kula macho maʼaayah.Wa fi turaab Goochan,faddal illa l‑iyaal al‑dugaag wa l‑khanam wa l‑bagar.
Wa macho maʼa Yuusuf arabaat wa siyaad al‑kheel wa naas katiiriin.
Wa wakit wassalo fi madagg Ataad khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun,al‑hizin bigi chadiid wa Yuusuf sawwa sabʼa yoom hana hizin fi chaan abuuh.
Wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin,sukkaan hana l‑balad di,chaafo al‑hizin al‑bigi fi madagg Ataad wa gaalo : Daahu hizin kabiir bigi fi lubb al‑Masriyiin ! Fi chaan da,sammo al‑bakaan al‑khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun,Abil Misraayim (maʼanaatah hizin fi lubb al‑Masriyiin).
Wa be misil da bas,iyaal Yaakhuub sawwo al‑cheyy al‑abuuhum amaraahum beyah.
Wa waddo janaazit abuuhum fi balad Kanʼaan.Wa dafanooh fi l‑karkuur hana l‑zereʼ al‑fi Makfiila.Wa l‑zereʼ da,Ibraahiim charaah min Afruun al‑Hitti achaan al‑bakaan da yabga bakaan hana khabur hanaayah halaalah.Wa l‑bakaan da sabaah le hillit Mamra.
Wa baʼad dafin hana abuuh,Yuusuf gabbal fi Masir,hu wa akhwaanah wa l‑naas al‑macho maʼaayah fi dafin hana abuuh.
Wa akhwaan Yuusuf gaalo ambeenaathum : Hassaʼ da,abuuna maat.Akuun Yuusuf yilkaffa foogna al‑fasaala al‑aniina sawweenaaha leyah ! 
Wa rassalo naadum le Yuusuf wa gaalo : Abuuk gubbaal ma yumuut da,gaal leena :
‹ Ooruuh le Yuusuf min fadlah khalli yisaamih akhwaanah min al‑jariime wa l‑zanib al‑sawwoohum leyah achaan sawwo leyah fasaala.Wa hassaʼ,min fadlah,khalli yisaamih al‑jariime al‑sawwooha leyah abiid Allah Rabb abuuh.› Wakit simiʼ al‑kalaam al‑mursaal gaalah leyah da,khalaas Yuusuf gamma baka.
Wa akhwaanah jo sajado giddaamah wa gaalo leyah : Aniina abiidak. 
Wa laakin Yuusuf gaal leehum : Ma takhaafo.Ana wa la Allah tasjudu leyi !
Intu dawwartu tisawwu leyi cheyy fasil.Laakin al‑Rabb baddalah be kheer achaan yitimm al‑cheyy al‑intu chiftuuh al‑yoom,le yinajji haya hana naas katiiriin.
Be da,ma takhaafo min cheyy !Ana nakrubku wa nakrub aayilaatku. Khalaas,Yuusuf raggad galibhum be l‑kalaam da.
Be misil da,Yuusuf gaʼad fi Masir maʼa ahal abuuh.Wa aach 110 sana.
Wa hidir iyaal Afraayim wa iyaal iyaalah.Wa Yuusuf rabba iyaal Makiir.Wa Makiir da,hu wileed Manassa.
Wa yoom waahid,Yuusuf gaal le akhwaanah : Ana gariib numuut laakin akiid al‑Rabb yifakkir foogku wa yamrugku min Masir wa yiwaddiiku fi l‑balad al‑hu halaf wa gaal yantiiha le Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub. 
Wa Yuusuf hallafaahum wa gaal leehum : Akiid al‑Rabb yifakkir leeku wa wakit tamurgu min Masir,waddu udaami maʼaaku. 
Wa khalaas,Yuusuf maat fi Masir fi umur hana 110 sana.Wa masaho janaaztah be riihe achaan ma tiʼaffin wa dassooha fi sanduug hana hajar.
Daahu asaame awlaad Yaakhuub al‑maʼruuf be Israaʼiil al‑macho maʼa abuuhum fi Masir.Wa ayyi waahid minhum macha maʼa aayiltah.
Wa humman Raʼuubiin wa Chimʼuun wa Laawi wa Yahuuza
wa Yassaakar wa Zabuluun wa Banyaamiin
wa Daan wa Naftaali wa Gaad wa Achiir.
Wa zurriiyit Yaakhuub,kulluhum adadhum 70.Wa fi l‑wakit daak,wileedah Yuusuf kamaan gaaʼid fi Masir khalaas.
Wa baʼadeen,Yuusuf maat.Wa kulla akhwaanah wa naas zamanhum maato.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil wildo wa zaado wa bigo katiiriin wa chudaad marra waahid wa malo al‑balad.
Wa baʼadeen,malik jadiid rikib fi Masir wa hu ma irif cheyy fi Yuusuf.
Al‑malik da gamma gaal le naasah : Chiifu,Bani Israaʼiil dool hassaʼ bigo katiiriin wa chudaad minnina.
Hassaʼ da,khalli nalgo halal le nadharo adadhum ma yiziid.Kan ma ke da,yoom waahid kan al‑harib gammat,humman yindammo le udwaanna wa yihaarubuuna wa yamurgu min baladna wa yikhalluuna. 
Wa khalaas,al‑Masriyiin gammo khatto kubaaraat al‑mukallafiin be khidmit al‑ubuudiiye achaan yitaʼʼubu Bani Israaʼiil be l‑khidme al‑gaasiye.Be misil da bas,Bani Israaʼiil bano mudun Fituum wa Raʼamsiis achaan yabgo makhaazin le Firʼoon malik Masir.
Wa l‑Masriyiin gaaʼidiin yitaʼʼubuuhum bilheen.Wa laakin be da kula,Bani Israaʼiil bigo katiiriin wa chatto fi l‑ard.Achaan da,al‑Masriyiin khaafo bilheen min Bani Israaʼiil
wa khalaas gammo yiʼabbuduuhum be gu.
Wa marraro leehum al‑haya be l‑khidme al‑gaasiye misil ajjiniin al‑tiine wa salliliin al‑diringeel wa hiraatit al‑ziraaʼa.Wa l‑Masriyiin gaaʼidiin yajburuuhum fi l‑khidme di be gu.
Fiyah awiin wallaadaat itneen hana l‑Ibraaniyiin.Al‑waahide usumha Chifra wa l‑aakhara usumha Fuuʼa.Wa malik Masir naadaahin
wa gaal leehin : Asmaʼan zeen.Kan tiwallidan awiin al‑Ibraaniyiin,fakkiran fi marigiin al‑sakhiir.Kan wileed,aktulanah.Wa kan bineeye kamaan,khallanha tiʼiich. 
Wa laakin al‑awiin al‑wallaadaat deel khaayfaat min Allah.Wa ma tabbagan kalaam al‑malik wa laakin khallan al‑awlaad.
Wa khalaas,al‑malik naadaahin battaan wa gaal : Maala khalleetan al‑awlaad ma kataltanhum ?Maala sawweetan misil da ? 
Wa hinna gaalan leyah : Ya l‑malik,awiin al‑Ibraaniyiin ma misil awiin al‑Masriyiin.Hinna indihin gudra wa yaldan gubbaal al‑wallaada ma taji. 
Wa be misil da bas,Bani Israaʼiil bigo katiiriin wa chudaad.Wa l‑Rabb anta rahma le l‑awiin al‑wallaadaat deel
achaan hinna khaayfaat min Allah wa hu antaahin zurriiye.
Wa khalaas,al‑malik gamma anta amur le chaʼabah wa gaal leehum : Azgulu fi l‑bahar ayyi wileed Ibraani al‑dahaabah wildooh.Illa l‑banaat bas khalluuhin. 
Fi l‑wakit da,fiyah raajil waahid min gabiilat Laawi akhad mara min gabiiltah.
Wa baʼadeen,hi bigat khalbaane wa wildat leyah wileed.Wa chaafat al‑sakhiir da jamiil wa labbadatah muddit talaata chahar.
Baʼadeen chaafat ke,al‑sakhiir da ma billabbad leeha.Khalaas,chaalat guffa hint tibin wa talasatha be zift wa gutraan.Wa dassat al‑sakhiir fi l‑guffa wa machat khattatah fi lubb al‑birdi fi khachum bahar al‑Niil.
Wa akhut al‑sakhiir wagafat baʼiid chiyya achaan tichiif al‑cheyy al‑yabga leyah.
Baʼad chiyya ke,bineeyit al‑malik jaat tilbarrad fi bahar al‑Niil wa khaddaamaatha gaaʼidaat yuruukhan fi khachum al‑bahar.Wa khalaas,hi chaafat al‑guffa fi lubb al‑birdi.Min chaafatha,gammat rassalat khaddaamitha le tamchi tijiibha leeha.
Wa wakit jaabatha,hi fatahat al‑guffa wa ligat foogha sakhiir.Wa l‑wileed da gaaʼid yabki wa hi hannat foogah wa gaalat : Al‑sakhiir da hana l‑Ibraaniyiin. 
Khalaas,akhut al‑sakhiir jaat wa saʼalatha le bineeyit al‑malik wa gaalat : Tidoori namchi nifattich leeki mara raddaaʼa min awiin al‑Ibraaniyiin le tiraddiʼ leeki al‑sakhiir da walla ? 
Wa hi gaalat leeha : Aywa,amchi. Khalaas,hi gammat machat naadat amm al‑sakhiir da wa hi jaat.
Wa bineeyit al‑malik gaalat le l‑mara di : Chiili al‑sakhiir da.Raddiʼiih leyi wa nikaffiiki maahiiyitki. Khalaas,ammah chaalatah wa gaaʼide tiraddiʼah.
Wakit al‑sakhiir kibir,ammah waddatah le bineeyit al‑malik wa hu bigi leeha misil wileedha.Wa hi gaalat : Nisammiih Muusa achaan ana chiltah min lubb al‑almi. 
Wa baʼad Muusa tamma raajil khalaas,yoom waahid gamma macha le ahalah al‑Ibraaniyiin wa chaaf khidmithum hana l‑ubuudiiye.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Muusa chaaf Masri waahid gaaʼid yudugg Ibraani waahid min ahalah.
Wa wakit Muusa chaaf jaay wa jaay wa ma fi naadum jambah,khalaas gamma katal al‑Masri wa dafanah fi l‑ramla.
Wa ambaakir kula,Muusa marag wa chaaf Ibraaniyiin itneen gaaʼidiin yiddaawaso ambeenaathum.Wa gaal le l‑khaati : Maala tudugg akhuuk misil da ? 
Wa l‑raajil da gaal leyah : Yaatu khattaak foogna haakim wa gaadi le tihill machaakilna ?Walla tidoor taktulni misil katalt al‑Masri da ? Wa wakit simiʼ al‑kalaam da,Muusa khaaf wa gaal fi nafsah : Akiid al‑naas simʼo be l‑cheyy al‑ana sawweetah da. 
Wa l‑malik Firʼoon zaatah simiʼ be l‑cheyy da wa yidoor yaktul Muusa.Wa laakin Muusa jara min al‑malik wa macha fi balad Midyaan.Wakit wisil fi balad Midyaan,gaʼad jamb biir waahide.
Wa fiyah raajil diin waahid usmah Raʼuwiil fi balad Midyaan indah sabʼa banaat.Wa hinna jin le yisillan almi min al‑biir wa yamlan al‑hiitaan le yazgan khanam abuuhin.
Wa laakin ruʼyaan waahidiin jo tarado al‑banaat deel wa Muusa gamma daafaʼ leehin.Wa baʼad da,zaga khanamhin.
Wakit al‑banaat gabbalan fi beet abuuhin Raʼuwiil,hu saʼalaahin : Maala al‑yoom gabbaltan ajala ke ? 
Wa hinna gaalan leyah : Masri waahid daafaʼ leena min al‑ruʼyaan wa salla almi min al‑biir wa zaga leena khanamna. 
Wa hu gaal leehin : Ween al‑raajil da ?Maala jiitan khalleetannah ?Amchan naadannah le yaji yaakul maʼaana. Wa hinna machan naadannah.
Wa Muusa khassad yagood fi beet al‑raajil da.Wa l‑raajil da jawwaz bineeytah Siffuura le Muusa.
Wa baʼadeen,hi jaabat leyah wileed wa hu sammaah Girchuum (maʼanaatah ajnabi) wa gaal : Ana bigiit ajnabi fi balad al‑khurba. 
Wa baʼad mudda tawiile,malik Masir maat.Wa Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin yaguntu min al‑taʼab hana l‑ubuudiiye wa gaaʼidiin yasrakho lahaddi siraakhhum lihig al‑Rabb.
Wa l‑Rabb zaatah simiʼ ganiithum wa fakkar le l‑muʼaahada al‑sawwaaha maʼa juduudhum Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub.
Wa l‑Rabb chaaf Bani Israaʼiil wa irif haalithum.
Wa Muusa gaaʼid yasrah be khanam hana nasiibah Yasruunwa hu bas raajil al‑diin hana balad Midyaan.Wa yoom waahid,Muusa saag al‑khanam khaadi le l‑sahara wa wisil fi jabal Allah al‑usmah Huuriib.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,malak Allah baan leyah fi naar fi lubb chideere.Wa Muusa chaaf wa daahu,naar gammat foog al‑chideere di laakin hi ma gaaʼide tahrag.
Wa Muusa gaal : Khalli namchi nichiif al‑cheyy al‑ajiib da.Maala al‑chideere di ma hirgat ? 
Wakit Allah chaaf Muusa gaaʼid yihawwig le yichiif al‑cheyy da,khalaas hu naada Muusa min lubb al‑chideere wa gaal leyah : Ya Muusa,ya Muusa ! Wa Muusa gaal : Naʼam. 
Wa hu gaal leyah : Ma taji gariib.Sill niʼleek min rijileenak achaan al‑bakaan al‑inta waagif foogah da ard mukhaddasa.
Ana Rabb abuuk wa Rabb juduudak Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub. Wa khalaas,Muusa sadda wijhah achaan hu khaayif ma yagdar yichiif al‑Rabb.
Wa Allah gaal battaan : Ana chift tamaam al‑taʼab hana chaʼabi al‑gaaʼidiin fi Masir.Wa simiʼt siraakhhum giddaam al‑naas al‑gaaʼidiin yitaʼʼubuuhum.Wa hasseet be azaabhum.
Achaan da,ana jiit le ninajjiihum min iid al‑Masriyiin wa niwaddiihum fi balad aakhara wa hi samhe wa wasiiʼe.Wa l‑balad di malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal.Wa hassaʼ,al‑naas al‑saakniin foogha humman al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin.
Wa daahu siraakh Bani Israaʼiil wisilaani.Wa chift al‑Masriyiin gaaʼidiin yazulmuuhum.
Achaan da,ya Muusa !Nirassilak hassaʼ le Firʼoon malik Masir.Amchi wa amrug chaʼabi Bani Israaʼiil min Masir ! 
Wa Muusa gaal le l‑Rabb : Ana ke yaatu lahaddi namchi le l‑malik Firʼoon wa namrug Bani Israaʼiil min Masir ? 
Wa l‑Rabb gaal : Ana nukuun maʼaak wa di hi al‑alaama al‑tiwassif leek kadar ana bas rassaltak.Wa wakit inta tamrug Bani Israaʼiil min Masir,intu kulluku taju taʼabuduuni fi l‑jabal da. 
Wa Muusa radda le l‑Rabb wa gaal : Tamaam,ana namchi le Bani Israaʼiil wa nuguul leehum :‹ Allah Rabb juduudku rassalaani leeku.› Wa laakin humman yasʼalooni min usmak.Wa kan saʼalooni min usmak da,nuguul leehum usmak yaatu ? 
Wa l‑Rabb gaal leyah : Ana bas Hu,maʼanaatah Ana Allah al‑Daayim.Misil da bas turudd le Bani Israaʼiil.Tuguul :‹ Allah al‑Daayim bas rassalaani leeku.› 
Wa l‑Rabb gaal leyah battaan : Guul misil da le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Allah Rabb juduudku Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub rassalaani leeku.› Da bas usmi al‑daayim al‑yinaaduuni beyah min zurriiye le zurriiye.
 Hassaʼ da,ya Muusa,amchi le kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum :‹ Allah Rabb juduudku Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub baan leyi wa gaal hu chaafaaku wa chaaf al‑cheyy al‑gaaʼidiin yisawwuuh leeku fi Masir.
Wa gaal yamrugku min Masir al‑bakaan al‑gaaʼidiin tatʼabo foogah.Wa yiwaddiiku fi balad al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin fi l‑balad al‑malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal. ›
 Wa chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil yasmaʼo kalaamak wa tamchi maʼaahum fi bakaan malik Masir.Wa tuguulu leyah :‹ Allah Rabb al‑Ibraaniyiin baan leena.Wa hassaʼ da,khalliina namchu masaafit talaata yoom fi l‑sahara le nigaddumu dahaaya le Allah Ilaahna. ›
Wa laakin ana naʼarif kadar al‑malik ma yikhalliiku tamchu illa kan ana assartah chadiid.
Wa khalaas,nimidd iidi wa nadrub balad Masir be kulla l‑ajaayib al‑ninazzilhum foogha.Wa baʼad da,al‑malik yikhalliiku tamurgu.
Wa nisawwiiku intu chaʼabi talgo rida al‑Masriyiin wa ma tamchu iideeku yaabsiin.
Fi l‑yoom da,ayyi mara min Bani Israaʼiil tasʼal mara Masriiye al‑saakne maʼaaha aw jaaritha tantiiha khumaam hana fudda wa dahab wa khulgaan al‑tilabbusuuhum le iyaalku.Wa be da,tanhabo al‑Masriyiin marra waahid. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa gaal le Allah : Nisawwi chunu kan Bani Israaʼiil ma yisadduguuni wa la yasmaʼo kalaami wa yuguulu :‹ Allah ma baan leek !› 
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Indak chunu fi iidak ? Wa Muusa gaal : Indi asa. 
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Azgulha fi l‑turaab. Wa Muusa zagalha fi l‑turaab wa l‑asa bigat daabi wa hu jara minnah.
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Midd iidak wa akurbah min danabah. Khalaas,Muusa gamma karabah wa l‑daabi gabbal bigi asa.
Wa Allah gaal : Da bas al‑cheyy al‑tisawwiih le Bani Israaʼiil yisaddugu kadar Allah Rabb juduudhum Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub baan leek. 
Wa battaan Allah gaal leyah : Diss iidak fi sadrak be daakhal le khalagak. Wa Muusa khatta iidah fi sadrah be daakhal le khalagah.Wa wakit marag iidah min khalagah,iidah bigat barsa wa indaha gichir.
Wa battaan gaal leyah : Gabbil iidak fi sadrak. Hu gabbal iidah fi sadrah wa battaan maragha wa gabbalat fi haalha misil awwal.
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Kan Bani Israaʼiil ma simʼo kalaamak wa la saddago be l‑ajab al‑awwal da,yisaddugu be l‑ajab al‑taani.
Wa kan ma saddago be l‑ajaayib al‑itneen dool wa la simʼo kalaamak,chiil almi min bahar al‑Niil wa subbah fi l‑ard.Wa khalaas,al‑almi da yichaglib damm. 
Wa laakin Muusa gaal le Allah : Ya Rabb,ana ma naadum al‑yagdar yihajji adiil wa la min awwal wa la min inta naadeetni ana abdak.Ana khachmi tagiil wa ma nagdar nihajji ajala. 
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Yaatu anta khachum le l‑insaan ?Wa yaatu yisawwi naadum abkam walla tarchaan ?Wa yaatu yanti choof le naadum walla yisawwiih amyaan ?Da ma ana Allah walla ?
Khalaas amchi.Ana nukuun maʼaak wakit tihajji wa niʼooriik al‑kalaam al‑tuguulah. 
Wa Muusa gaal : Nachhadak,ya Rabb.Rassil naadum aakhar ! 
Khalaas fi l‑bakaan da,Allah khidib min kalaam Muusa wa gaal : Akhuuk Haaruun al‑Laawi ma gaaʼid walla ?Ana naʼarif kadar hu yagdar yihajji adiil.Wa hassaʼ,hu jaayi fi l‑derib le yilaagiik.Wa wakit yichiifak,yafrah bilheen.
Wa inta tihajji leyah be l‑cheyy al‑waajib yuguulah.Wa ana zaati nukuun maʼaak inta wa maʼa Haaruun.Wa niʼooriiku be l‑cheyy al‑waajib tisawwuuh.
Wa hu bas yihajji le l‑chaʼab fi badalak wa yabga leek khachum al‑kalaam.Wa kalaamak inta yabga leyah misil kalaam ilaahah.
Wa kan le l‑asa di,chiilha fi iidak wa beeha hi bas tisawwi al‑ajaayib.
Wa khalaas,Muusa gamma macha le Yasruun nasiibah wa gaal leyah : Antiini izin namchi nichiif ahali fi Masir le naʼarif kan humman gaaʼidiin hayyiin. Wa Yasruun gaal le Muusa : Amchi be l‑salaam. 
Wa wakit Muusa gaaʼid fi balad Midyaan,Allah gaal leyah : Gabbil amchi fi Masir achaan kulla l‑naas al‑dawwaro yaktuluuk maato. 
Wa Muusa chaal martah wa awlaadah wa rakkabaahum fi humaarah wa gamma maachi le balad Masir.Wa chaal fi iidah asaat Allah.
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Daahu inta maachi le Masir.Wa kan wassalt,wassif le Firʼoon malik Masir kulla l‑ajaayib al‑ana anteetak gudra le tisawwiihum.Wa ana nigawwi raasah wa hu ma yikhalli Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu.
Wa baʼad da,inta tuguul le l‑malik :‹ Daahu Allah gaal :“Bani Israaʼiil humman misil wileedi al‑bikir.
Wa ana amartak tikhalli wileedi yamrug min baladak achaan yaʼabudni.Wa kan inta abeet ma tikhalliih yamrug,khalaas ana naktul wileedak al‑bikir.”› 
Fi l‑derib fi l‑bakaan al‑Muusa raagid foogah,Allah garrab leyah le yaktulah.
Wa tawwaali,martah Siffuura chaalat hajar tariin wa tahharat wileedha.Wa limsat rijileen Muusa be l‑farwa al‑gataʼatah min wileedha wa gaalat : Inta bigiit leyi zooj hana damm. 
Wa be da,Allah ma katal Muusa.Wa fi chaan al‑tahuura di,khalaas Siffuura gaalat : Inta bigiit leyi zooj hana damm. 
Wa awwal,Allah gaal le Haaruun : Amchi khaadi le l‑sahara achaan tilaagi Muusa. Wa Haaruun macha laaga akhuuh Muusa fi jabal Allah wa sallamah wa habbaah.
Wa Muusa khabbar Haaruun be l‑kalaam al‑kallafah beyah Allah le yuguulah wa be kulla l‑ajaayib al‑amarah beehum Allah le yisawwiihum.
Wa wakit Muusa wa Haaruun wislo fi Masir,lammo kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Haaruun kallamaahum be kulla kalaam Allah al‑gaalah le Muusa wa sawwo al‑ajaayib giddaam al‑chaʼab.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil saddago.Wa wakit irfo kadar Allah chaaf taʼabhum wa dawwar yinajjiihum,khalaas kulluhum dangaro wa sajado.
Wa baʼad da,Muusa wa Haaruun macho le Firʼoon malik Masir wa gaalo leyah : Daahu Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil gaal :‹ Khalli chaʼabi yamurgu le yiʼayyudu be usmi fi l‑sahara.› 
Wa l‑malik gaal : Allah hu yaatu al‑ana nasmaʼ kalaamah wa nikhalli Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu ?Ana ma naʼarif Allah.Wa ma nikhalliihum yamurgu. 
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun gaalo leyah : Rabb al‑Ibraaniyiin baan leena.Min iznak,khalliina namchu masaafit talaata yoom fi l‑sahara le nigaddumu dahaaya le Allah Ilaahna.Kan ma sawweenaah,hu yiʼaakhibna be waba aw be harib. 
Wa malik Masir gaal leehum : Ya Muusa wa Haaruun,maala tadharo al‑chaʼab min khidmithum ?Yalla !Amchu le khidmitku hint al‑taʼab. 
Wa gaal battaan : Hassaʼ,Bani Israaʼiil bigo katiiriin fi l‑balad wa kikkeef intu tidooru tadharoohum min khidmithum ? 
Wa fi nafs al‑yoom,Firʼoon malik Masir amaraahum le l‑muraakhibiin al‑Masriyiin wa le l‑mukallafiin min Bani Israaʼiil be l‑khidme di.Wa gaal leehum :
 Battaan ma tantu le l‑chaʼab da gechch le yisallulu beyah diringeel misil awwal.Khalluuhum humman bas yamchu yifattuchu gechch.
Wa guulu leehum yisallulu nafs al‑adad hana l‑diringeel misil awwal,ma yangusuuh.Humman aatiliin wa achaan da bas,gaaʼidiin yachku wa yuguulu :‹ Khalli namchu nigaddumu dahaaya le Rabbina. ›
Khalli niziidu leehum khidme tagiile achaan ma yukhuttu baalhum fi l‑kalaam al‑kidib da. 
Wa khalaas,al‑muraakhibiin wa l‑mukallafiin be l‑khidme di macho gaalo le Bani Israaʼiil : Al‑malik gaal ke :‹ Battaan ma nantuuku gechch.
Intu zaatku bas amchu fattuchu gechch fi ayyi bakaan al‑talgooh.Wa laakin al‑adad al‑gataʼnaah leeku da ma yangus.› 
Khalaas,al‑chaʼab chatto fi kulla balad Masir le yukhummu al‑tibin fi badal al‑gechch.
Wa l‑muraakhibiin gaaʼidiin yaʼasuruuhum wa yuguulu : Sawwu daayman al‑adad al‑gataʼnaah leeku misil awwal wakit aniina gaaʼidiin nijiibu leeku gechch. 
Khalaas,muraakhibiin Firʼoon farachoohum le l‑mukallafiin min Bani Israaʼiil al‑humman bas kallafoohum.Wa gaalo leehum : Maala fi l‑ayyaam dool ma sallaltu nafs al‑adad hana l‑diringeel al‑awwal amarnaaku beyah ? 
Wa be da,al‑mukallafiin min Bani Israaʼiil macho chako le l‑malik wa gaalo : Ya sayyidna,maala titaʼʼib abiidak misil da ?
Ma yantuuna gechch wa laakin yuguulu leena nisallulu diringeel.Wa daahu gaaʼidiin yafurchuuna aniina abiidak.Wa laakin naasak bas khaatiyiin. 
Wa l‑malik gaal : Intu naas aatiliin !Aywa,intu aatiliin !Achaan da bas tuguulu :‹ Khalliina namchu nigaddumu dahaaya le Allah. ›
Hassaʼ da,yalla !Amchu akhdumu !Ma nantuuku gechch wa tisallulu nafs al‑adad hana l‑diringeel. 
Wa l‑mukallafiin min Bani Israaʼiil chaafo al‑haala bigat leehum gaasiye achaan gaalo leehum yisallulu nafs al‑adad hana l‑diringeel al‑awwal gataʼooh leehum.
Wa wakit humman maargiin min bakaan al‑malik,ligo Muusa wa Haaruun gaaʼidiin yarjoohum.
Wa l‑mukallafiin min Bani Israaʼiil gaalo leehum : Khalli Allah yichiif al‑cheyy al‑intu sawweetuuh da wa yiʼaakhibku !Fi chaanku intu bas al‑malik maʼa khaddaamiinah kirhoona misil al‑kafan.Wa da,misil intu anteetuuhum seef le yikattuluuna. 
Wa baʼad da,Muusa wajjah le Allah wa gaal leyah : Ya Rabb,maala sawweet al‑fasaala le l‑chaʼab da ?Wa maala rassaltini ?
Min yoom ana macheet le l‑malik wa hajjeet leyah be usmak,al‑malik gaaʼid yitaʼʼib chaʼabak wa inta abadan ma najjeethum ! 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Hassaʼ da,inta tichiif al‑cheyy al‑nisawwiih le l‑malik !Be iidi al‑chadiide,najburah wa yikhalli Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu.Wa be gudurti al‑chadiide,najburah wa yatrudhum min daarah. 
Wa baʼad da,al‑Rabb gaal battaan le Muusa : Ana bas Allah.
Ana bayyant nafsi le Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub wa gult leehum usmi Allah al‑Gaadir.Laakin ma ooreethum kadar ana usmi Allah al‑Hayy.
Wa ana sawweet maʼaahum muʼaahadati wa gult nantiihum balad Kanʼaan al‑humman gaaʼidiin foogha ajaanib.
Wa hassaʼ,ana simiʼt ganiit Bani Israaʼiil al‑gaaʼidiin yiʼabbuduuhum al‑Masriyiin wa ana fakkart fi muʼaahadati al‑sawweetha maʼaahum.
Fi chaan da,guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Ana Allah.Namrugku min al‑ubuudiiye wa ninajjiiku min al‑khidme al‑gaasiye hana l‑Masriyiin.Wa nafdaaku be duraaʼ gawi wa be ikhaab ajiib.
Wa tabgo chaʼabi wa ana nabga Ilaahku.Wa fi l‑wakit da,taʼarfu kadar ana bas Allah Ilaahku al‑maragtuku min al‑ubuudiiye hana l‑Masriyiin
wa waddeetku fi l‑balad al‑halaft nantiiha le Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub wa nantiiha leeku intu warasa.Ana bas Allah.› 
Wa Muusa kallam al‑kalaam da le Bani Israaʼiil.Laakin humman ma simʼo kalaamah achaan ayyaso min chiddit al‑khidme al‑gaasiye.
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Amchi le Firʼoon malik Masir wa guul leyah :‹ Khalli Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min baladak !› 
Wa Muusa gaal le Allah : Bani Israaʼiil abo ma yasmaʼo kalaami.Kikkeef al‑malik yagdar yasmaʼ kalaami,ana al‑khachmi tagiil ? 
Wa khalaas,Allah hajja le Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal leehum yamchu le Bani Israaʼiil wa Firʼoon malik Masir wa yaamuruuhum achaan Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min Masir.
Daahu asaame hana kubaaraat gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil.Raʼuubiin hu bikir Yaakhuub.Wa awlaad Raʼuubiin humman Hanuuk wa Fallu wa Hasruun wa Karmi.Wa humman dool bigo khuchuum buyuut Raʼuubiin.
Wa awlaad Chimʼuun humman Yamuwiil wa Yaamiin wa Uhad wa Yaakiin wa Suuhar wa Chaawuul,hu al‑ammah min balad Kanʼaan.Wa humman dool bigo khuchuum buyuut Chimʼuun.
Wa daahu zurriiyit Laawi.Laawi indah talaata awlaad.Wa humman Girchuun wa Gahaat wa Maraari.Wa Laawi aach 137 sana.
Wa awlaad Girchuun humman Libni wa Chimʼi maʼa aayilaathum.
Wa awlaad Gahaat humman Amraam wa Yishaar wa Habruun wa Uzziyiil.Wa Gahaat aach 133 sana.
Wa awlaad Maraari humman Mahli wa Muuchi.Wa humman dool kulluhum bigo khuchuum buyuut Laawi hasab zurriiyithum.
Wa Amraam akhad Yuukaabad immitah wa jaabat leyah awlaad itneen wa humman Haaruun wa Muusa.Wa Amraam aach 137 sana.
Wa awlaad Yishaar humman Khuurah wa Nafag wa Zikri.
Wa awlaad Uzziyiil humman Michayiil wa Alisaafan wa Sitri.
Wa Haaruun akhad Alichabaʼ hi akhut Nahchuun wa bineeyit Aminadaab.Wa hi jaabat leyah Nadaab wa Abiihu wa Aliʼaazar wa Itamaar.
Wa awlaad Khuurah humman Assiir wa Alikhaana wa Abiyaasaf.Wa humman dool bigo khuchuum buyuut al‑Khuurahiyiin.
Wa Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun akhad waahide min banaat Fuutiyiil wa hi wildat leyah Fiinhaas.Wa dool kubaaraat al‑aayilaat hana khuchuum buyuut Laawi.
Wa Haaruun wa Muusa humman bas al‑naaseen al‑Allah gaal leehum : Amurgu Bani Israaʼiil min Masir hasab majmuuʼaathum. 
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun humman bas al‑macho wa hajjo le Firʼoon malik Masir le yikhalli Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min Masir.
Wakit Allah hajja le Muusa fi Masir,
hu gaal leyah : Ana bas Allah.Amchi guul le Firʼoon malik Masir kulla l‑kalaam al‑nuguulah leek. 
Wa Muusa gaal leyah : Ana khachmi tagiil.Kikkeef al‑malik yagdar yasmaʼ kalaami ? 
Khalaas,Allah gaal le Muusa : Asmaʼ adiil.Ana nisawwi kalaamak misil kalaam ilaah giddaam al‑malik wa Haaruun akhuuk yabga leek misil rasuulak.
Inta tihajji le Haaruun be kulla cheyy al‑ana amartak beyah.Wa Haaruun kamaan yihajji le l‑malik le yikhalli Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min baladah.
Wa ana nigawwi raas al‑malik wa nikattir alaamaati wa ajaaybi fi balad Masir.
Wa laakin al‑malik yaaba ma yasmaʼku.Wa be iidi ana,ninazzil khadabi fi Masir.Wa be ikhaabi al‑ajiib,namrug chaʼabi Bani Israaʼiil min Masir hasab majmuuʼaathum.
Wa wakit ana nimidd iidi wa nadrub Masir wa namrug Bani Israaʼiil minha,khalaas al‑Masriyiin yaʼarfu kadar ana bas Allah. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa wa Haaruun sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amaraahum beyah.
Muusa umrah 80 sana wa Haaruun umrah 83 sana wakit macho hajjo le malik Masir.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa wa Haaruun :
 Akuun al‑malik yuguul leeku :‹ Sawwu giddaami cheyy waahid ajiib.› Khalaas,inta tuguul le Haaruun :‹ Chiil asaatak wa azgulha giddaam al‑malik.› Wa l‑asa tabga daabi. 
Wa khalaas Muusa wa Haaruun macho le l‑malik wa sawwo misil Allah amaraahum beyah.Haaruun zagal asaatah giddaam al‑malik maʼa khaddaamiinah wa l‑asa bigat daabi.
Wa l‑malik naada al‑ulama wa l‑sahhaariin hana Masir.Humman kula be sihirhum sawwo nafs al‑cheyy
wa ayyi waahid minhum zagal asaatah wa isayhum bigo dabiib.Wa laakin asaat Haaruun zaratat isayhum.
Wa be da kula,al‑malik raasah bigi gawi wa aba ma simiʼ kalaam Muusa wa Haaruun misil Allah gaalah.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Al‑malik hu raasah gawi ma yidoor yikhalli Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu.
Gumm amchi leyah be fajur wa talgaah maarig maachi ale bahar al‑Niil.Wa inta amchi gaabilah fi khachum al‑bahar.Wa chiil fi iidak al‑asa al‑awwal bigat daabi.
Wa guul le l‑malik :‹ Allah Rabb al‑Ibraaniyiin rassalaani wa hu yuguul leek :“Khalli chaʼabi yamurgu min baladak le yaʼabuduuni fi l‑sahara.Laakin daahu ya hassaʼ kula,inta abeet.”
Khalaas,daahu Allah gaal :“Be misil da,inta taʼarif kadar ana bas Allah.”Wa da,wakit ana Muusa nadrub almi bahar al‑Niil be l‑asa al‑fi iidi wa l‑almi yabga damm.
Wa huut al‑bahar yumuutu wa l‑bahar yabga afin wa l‑Masriyiin ma yagdaro yacharbo al‑almi da.› 
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Guul le Haaruun yichiil asaatah wa yimiddaha ale kulla l‑almi hana Masir,almi al‑fi l‑buhuur wa l‑rujuul wa l‑ruhuud wa fi kulla bakaan al‑indah almi.Wa kulla l‑almi da yabga damm.Wa l‑damm yukuun fi kulla balad Masir lahaddi l‑almi al‑gaaʼid fi mawaaʼiin hana hatab wa hajar. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa wa Haaruun sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amaraahum beyah.Wa Haaruun rafaʼ al‑asa wa darab almi bahar al‑Niil giddaam al‑malik wa khaddaamiinah.Wa kulla almi al‑bahar bigi damm.
Wa huut al‑bahar maato wa l‑bahar bigi afin.Wa l‑Masriyiin ma gidro chirbo al‑almi da.Wa almi fi kulla balad Masir bigi damm.
Wa laakin al‑sahhaariin hana Masir sawwo nafs al‑cheyy be sihirhum.Wa raas al‑malik bigi gawi wa aba ma simiʼ kalaam Muusa wa Haaruun misil Allah gaalah.
Wa l‑malik gabbal macha beetah wa ma hamma be l‑cheyy da.
Wa kulla l‑Masriyiin nakato nugaar jamb al‑bahar le yalgo almi yacharbooh achaan almi al‑bahar ma bincharib.
Wa tamma sabʼa yoom min Allah darab al‑bahar be l‑waba da.
Khalaas,Allah gaal le Muusa : Amchi le l‑malik wa guul leyah :‹ Daahu Allah gaal :“Khalli chaʼabi yamurgu min baladak wa yamchu yaʼabuduuni.
Wa kan inta abeet ma tikhalliihum yamurgu,namla kulla baladak be difdeʼ.
Wa l‑bahar yinmali be difdeʼ wa l‑difdeʼ yamurgu min al‑bahar wa yadkhulu fi gasrak wa fi khurfitak al‑tunuum foogah wa fi sariirak wa fi buyuut khaddaamiinak wa chaʼabak wa fi furnak wa fi l‑maaʼuun al‑yiʼajjunu foogah.
Wa l‑difdeʼ yarkabo foogak wa fi kulla khaddaamiinak wa fi chaʼabak.”› 
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Guul le Haaruun yimidd iidah al‑indaha al‑asa ale l‑buhuur wa l‑rujuul wa l‑ruhuud wa marrig al‑difdeʼ fi kulla balad Masir. 
Khalaas,Haaruun madda iidah fi kulla bakaan al‑indah almi fi Masir wa tawwaali al‑difdeʼ marago wa malo balad Masir.
Wa l‑sahhaariin al‑Masriyiin humman kula sawwo sihirhum wa marrago difdeʼ fi l‑balad.
Wa baʼad da,al‑malik naada Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal leehum : Asʼalo Allah yikhallisna ana wa chaʼabi min al‑difdeʼ.Wa nikhalli Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu le yigaddumu dahaaya le Allah. 
Wa Muusa gaal leyah : Ooriini al‑wakit al‑inta tidoorah bas wa nasʼal Allah fi chaanak inta wa fi chaan khaddaamiinak wa chaʼabak le yidammir al‑difdeʼ al‑gaaʼidiin fi baladak wa fi buyuutak.Wa illa yifaddulu al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑bahar bas. 
Wa l‑malik gaal leyah : Khalli yukuun ambaakir bas. Wa Muusa gaal : Tamaam,yukuun misil inta tidoorah wa be da,taʼarif kadar ma fi cheyy al‑yigaadir Allah Ilaahna.
Al‑difdeʼ yikissu minnak wa min khaddaamiinak wa min chaʼabak wa yamurgu min buyuutak.Illa yifaddulu al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑bahar bas. 
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun marago min bakaan al‑malik wa Muusa saʼal Allah le yikhallis al‑malik min al‑difdeʼ al‑nazzalaahum foogah.
Wa Allah khibil suʼaal Muusa wa kulla l‑difdeʼ maato fi l‑buyuut wa fi l‑fadaayaat wa fi l‑ziraaʼa.
Khalaas,laayamoohum katiiriin marra waahid wa l‑balad bigat afne.
Wa laakin wakit al‑malik chaaf kadar hu anhalla khalaas,battaan gamma sawwa raas gawi wa aba ma simiʼ kalaam Muusa wa Haaruun misil Allah gaalah.
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Guul le Haaruun yimidd al‑asa wa yadrub al‑turaab wa l‑ajaaj yugumm wa yabga ambaaʼuuda fi kulla balad Masir. 
Wa sawwo misil da.Haaruun madda iidah al‑indaha al‑asa wa darab al‑turaab.Wa l‑ajaaj gamma wa bigi ambaaʼuuda wa gammat taakul fi l‑naas wa fi l‑bahaayim.Wa kulla l‑ajaaj hana l‑turaab bigi ambaaʼuuda fi kulla balad Masir.
Wa l‑sahhaariin sawwo sihirhum le yigawwumu ambaaʼuuda wa ma gidro.Wa laakin ambaaʼuuda gaaʼide taakul fi l‑naas wa fi l‑bahaayim.
Wa l‑sahhaariin gaalo le l‑malik : Da cheyy min gudrat al‑Rabb. Wa laakin al‑malik sawwa raas gawi wa aba ma simiʼ kalaam Muusa wa Haaruun misil Allah gaalah.
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Ambaakir gumm be fajur badri wa amchi gaabil al‑malik fi wakit hu maachi fi khachum al‑bahar.Wa guul leyah :‹ Daahu Allah gaal :“Khalli chaʼabi yamurgu min baladak le yaʼabuduuni.
Wa kan ma tikhalliihum yamurgu,nirassil leek dubbaan amboojani le khaddaamiinak wa le chaʼabak wa fi buyuutak.Wa kulla buyuut al‑Masriyiin wa l‑ard al‑humman gaaʼidiin foogha yinmalu be dubbaan.
Wa laakin fi l‑yoom da,ana nifannid been daarak inta wa turaab Goochan al‑bakaan al‑chaʼabi saakniin foogah.Wa hinaak al‑dubbaan ma yaju.Wa be da,inta taʼarif kadar ana Allah gaaʼid fi lubb balad Masir.
Wa ana nafda chaʼabi wa ninajjiihum min al‑waba al‑yalhag chaʼabak inta.Wa l‑cheyy al‑ajiib da yabga ambaakir.”› 
Wa Allah sawwa al‑cheyy da misil hu gaalah.Wa dubbaan amboojani malo gasir al‑malik wa buyuut khaddaamiinah wa kulla balad Masir addammarat.
Wa be da,al‑malik naada Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal leehum : Amchu gaddumu dahaaya le ilaahku laakin gaddumuuhum hini fi Masir. 
Wa Muusa gaal : La,aniina ma nagdaro nisawwu misil da.Achaan al‑dahaaya al‑aniina nigaddumuuhum le Allah Ilaahna dool haraam le l‑Masriyiin.Wa kan nigaddumu al‑haraam fi giddaamhum,humman ma yugummu yarjumuuna walla ?
Waajib namchu masaafit talaata yoom fi l‑sahara hatta nigaddumu le Allah Ilaahna dahaaya misil hu amaraana beyah. 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik gaal : Tamaam !Ana nikhalliiku tamurgu le tigaddumu dahaaya le Allah ilaahku fi l‑sahara.Laakin ma tamchu baʼiid wa battaan asʼalo Allah fi chaani. 
Wa Muusa radda wa gaal : Ana namrug min beetak wa nasʼal Allah kadar ambaakir al‑dubbaan yikissu minnak wa min khaddaamiinak wa min chaʼabak.Wa laakin,ya l‑malik,ma tukhuchchina battaan wa la tadhar Bani Israaʼiil ma yamurgu le yamchu yigaddumu dahaaya le Allah. 
Wa Muusa marag min bakaan al‑malik wa saʼal Allah.
Wa Allah khibil suʼaalah wa rafaʼ al‑waba hana l‑dubbaan min al‑malik wa min khaddaamiinah wa min chaʼabah.Wa dubbaanaay waahide kulla ma faddalat.
Wa laakin al‑malik battaan sawwa raas gawi wa aba ma khalla Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min baladah.
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Amchi le l‑malik wa guul leyah :‹ Daahu Allah Rabb al‑Ibraaniyiin gaal :“Khalli chaʼabi yamurgu wa yamchu le yaʼabuduuni.
Wa kan inta abeet ma tikhalliihum yamurgu,
ana Allah ninazzil waba chadiid fi bahaaymak al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑khala wa humman al‑kheel wa l‑hamiir wa l‑jumaal wa l‑bagar wa l‑khanam.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,ana Allah nifannid ambeen bahaayim Bani Israaʼiil wa bahaayim al‑Masriyiin.Wa bahiime waahide kula min bahaayim Bani Israaʼiil ma tumuut.”› 
Wa Allah gataʼ al‑wakit wa gaal : Ambaakir,ana nisawwi al‑cheyy da fi balad Masir. 
Wa ambaakir,Allah naffaz al‑cheyy da.Wa kulla bahaayim al‑Masriyiin maato wa laakin min bahaayim Bani Israaʼiil,bahiime waahide kula ma maatat.
Wa l‑malik rassal naas achaan yiʼakkudu min al‑cheyy al‑bigi da.Wa be misil da,hu irif kadar min bahaayim Bani Israaʼiil,bahiime waahide kula ma maatat.Laakin al‑malik sawwa raas gawi wa aba ma khalla Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min baladah.
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa wa Haaruun : Chiilu rumaad min al‑furun fi iideeku wa khalli Muusa yichattitah fi l‑hawa giddaam al‑malik.
Wa l‑rumaad da yabga ajaaj wa yikhatti kulla balad Masir.Wa yisabbib hubuun al‑yabgo awaawiir amtchulmo fi l‑naas wa l‑bahaayim fi kulla balad Masir. 
Wa khalaas,humman chaalo rumaad min al‑furun wa macho giddaam al‑malik.Wa Muusa chattatah fi l‑hawa.Wa l‑rumaad sabbab hubuun al‑bigo awaawiir amtchulmo fi l‑naas wa l‑bahaayim.
Wa sahhaariin balad Masir ma gidro gaabalo Muusa achaan humman zaathum malaaniin be l‑hubuun misil kulla l‑Masriyiin.
Wa Allah gawwa raas al‑malik wa l‑malik aba ma simiʼ kalaam Muusa wa Haaruun misil Allah gaalah le Muusa.
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Gumm be fajur badri wa amchi gaabil al‑malik wa guul leyah :‹ Daahu Allah Rabb al‑Ibraaniyiin gaal :“Khalli chaʼabi yamurgu wa yamchu le yaʼabuduuni.
Wa fi l‑marra di,kan inta abeet ana ninazzil kulla nafar hana waba foogak inta wa fi khaddaamiinak wa fi chaʼabak.Wa be da,inta taʼarif kadar ma fi ilaah misli ana fi kulla l‑ard.
Wa awwal ana nagdar nimidd iidi wa nadurbak be l‑waba,inta wa chaʼabak wa nuguchchuku min al‑ard.
Wa laakin ana khalleetak achaan niwassifak gudurti wa yihajju be usmi fi kulla l‑ard.
Wa daayman,inta gaaʼid tadhar chaʼabi wa ma tikhalliihum yamurgu min baladak.
Fi chaan da ambaakir fi nafs al‑wakit,ana ninazzil barad chadiid.Wa barad misil da,yoom waahid ma nazal fi Masir min yoom assasooha lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa hassaʼ da,gabbil bahaaymak wa kulla maalak al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑khala.Kan naas walla bahaayim kula gaʼado fi l‑khala wa ma dakhalo fi l‑buyuut,al‑barad yanzil fooghum wa yaktulhum.”› 
Wa waahidiin min khaddaamiin al‑malik khaafo min kalaam Allah.Wa gabbalo abiidhum wa bahaayimhum wa dassoohum fi buyuuthum.
Wa waahidiin kamaan ma hammo be kalaam Allah da wa khallo abiidhum wa bahaayimhum fi l‑khala.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Arfaʼ iidak ale l‑sama.Khalli al‑barad yanzil fi kulla balad Masir fi l‑naas wa fi l‑bahaayim wa fi kulla nabaataat al‑ziraaʼa al‑fi l‑balad. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa rafaʼ asaatah ale l‑sama wa Allah rassal dagdaag wa barad wa raʼad nazal fi l‑ard.Wa Allah nazzal al‑barad da fi kulla balad Masir.
Wa barad wa raʼad chadiid marra waahid misil da,yoom waahid ma nazalo fi Masir min yoom assasooha lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa fi kulla balad Masir,al‑barad darab kulla cheyy al‑gaaʼid barra fi l‑khala min al‑naas wa l‑bahaayim.Wa battaan dammar kulla nabaataat al‑ziraaʼa wa kassar kulla chadar al‑khaaba.
Wa illa turaab Goochan bakaan Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin foogah bas,al‑barad ma nazal foogah.
Wa baʼad da,al‑malik naada Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal leehum : Hassaʼ da,ana bas muznib.Ana wa chaʼabi kullina ke aasiyiin wa Allah hu bas indah al‑hagg.
Asʼalo leyi Allah achaan al‑dagdaag wa l‑barad yagiifu.Wa ana nikhalliiku tamurgu wa battaan ma nadharku. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa gaal leyah : Kan ana maragt min al‑hille,narfaʼ iideeni le Allah nasʼalah wa l‑dagdaag wa l‑barad yagiifu.Wa be da,inta taʼarif kadar al‑ard hint Allah.
Wa laakin ana naʼarif kadar inta wa khaddaamiinak lissaaʼku ma khaayfiin min Allah Ilaahna. 
Wa fi l‑wakit da,al‑kattaan wa l‑gameh al‑abyad addammaro achaan al‑kattaan nawwar wa l‑gameh al‑abyad sawwa iyaal.
Wa laakin al‑gameh al‑ahmar wa gameh al‑kadaade ma addammaro achaan al‑wakit al‑baldo foogah lissaaʼ ma ja.
Wa wakit Muusa marag min bakaan al‑malik,marag barra min al‑hille wa rafaʼ iideenah le Allah.Wa khalaas,al‑dagdaag wa l‑barad wa l‑matara wagafo.
Wakit al‑malik chaaf al‑matara wa l‑barad wa l‑dagdaag wagafo,hu maʼa khaddaamiinah sawwo battaan nafs al‑zanib misil awwal wa gawwo ruuseehum ziyaada.
Wa l‑malik sawwa raas gawi wa aba ma khalla Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min baladah,misil Allah gaalah be waasitat Muusa.
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Amchi le l‑malik achaan ana bas gawweet ruuseehum hu wa khaddaamiinah le nisawwi ajaaybi fi usuthum.
Wa be da,inta tagdar tihajji le iyaalak wa le iyaal iyaalak be l‑taʼab al‑ana jibtah fi l‑Masriyiin wa ajaaybi al‑sawweethum fi baladhum.Wa be misil da,taʼarfu kadar ana bas Allah. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa wa Haaruun macho le l‑malik wa gaalo leyah : Daahu Allah Rabb al‑Ibraaniyiin gaal :‹ Lahaddi mata inta taaba ma tidangir giddaami ?Khalli chaʼabi yamurgu wa yamchu le yaʼabuduuni !
Wa kan abeet ma tikhalli chaʼabi yamurgu,khalaas ambaakir ana nirassil jaraad fi baladak.
Wa l‑jaraad yikhatti kulla l‑ard lahaddi al‑ard ma tinchaaf battaan.Wa yaakul kulla l‑khadaar al‑ma dammarah al‑barad.Wa ma yikhalli leeku ayyi warchaal fi chadar al‑kadaade.
Wa l‑jaraad yamla gusuurak wa buyuut khaddaamiinak wa buyuut kulla l‑Masriyiin.Wa cheyy misil da ma kaan min zaman juduudak lahaddi l‑yoom.›  Wa Muusa marag min bakaan al‑malik.
Wa khaddaamiin al‑malik gaalo leyah : Lahaddi mata charak al‑naadum da yakrubna ?Khalli al‑rujaal yamurgu wa yamchu le yaʼabudu Allah ilaahhum !Inta ma gaaʼid tichiif kadar balad Masir addammarat ? 
Wa khalaas,humman gabbaloohum le Muusa wa Haaruun wa jaaboohum giddaam al‑malik.Wa hu gaal leehum : Amchu aʼabudu Allah ilaahku.Wa laakin yaatumman al‑yamchu ? 
Wa Muusa radda leyah wa gaal : Aniina namchu be subyaanna wa chiyyaabna wa awlaadna wa banaatna wa bagarna wa khanamna achaan niʼayyudu iid le Allah. 
Wa l‑malik achchammat leehum wa gaal : Yo zeen,Allah yukuun maʼaaku !Abadan ana ma nikhalliiku yamurgu maʼa awiinku wa iyaalku achaan al‑charr gaaʼid yinchaaf fi uyuunku.
Wa l‑cheyy al‑dawwartuuh da ma mumkin.Al‑rujaal wiheedhum bas yamchu le yaʼabudu Allah.Da bas al‑cheyy al‑intu talabtuuh minni. Wa khalaas,taradoohum min giddaam al‑malik.
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Arfaʼ iidak foog balad Masir achaan al‑jaraad yikhatti kulla l‑balad wa yaakul kulla l‑gechch al‑fi l‑ard wa kulla cheyy al‑khallaah al‑barad. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa madda asaatah foog al‑balad wa Allah jaab riih min al‑sabaah wa l‑riih saagat tuul al‑nahaar wa tuul al‑leel.Wa ambaakir be fajur,al‑riih jaabat al‑jaraad.
Wa l‑jaraad mala kulla balad Masir wa ansabba fi ayyi bakaan be katara.Wa cheyy misil da abadan ma kaan fi turaab Masir wa battaan ma yukuun.
Wa l‑jaraad khatta kulla l‑ard wa l‑ard bigat dalma min al‑jaraad.Wa akal kulla l‑gechch al‑fi l‑ard wa kulla iyaal al‑chadar wa kulla cheyy al‑khallaah al‑barad.Wa ma faddal cheyy min al‑khadaar wa la min al‑chadar wa la min gechch al‑kadaade fi kulla balad Masir.
Wa tawwaali ke,al‑malik naada Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal : Ana aznab fiiku wa fi Allah ilaahku.
Hassaʼ da,saamuhuuni.Ana muznib.Wa battaan asʼalo leyi Allah ilaahku le yarfaʼ minnina al‑waba da. 
Wa Muusa marag min bakaan al‑malik wa saʼal Allah.
Wa khalaas,Allah nazzal riih chadiide min al‑kharib wa l‑riih di chaalat al‑jaraad wa daffagatah fi l‑bahar al‑Ahmar.Wa jaraadaay waahide kula ma faddalat fi ard Masir.
Wa laakin Allah gawwa raas al‑malik wa l‑malik ma khalla Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min baladah.
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Arfaʼ iidak ale l‑sama wa dalaam azrag kurum yikhatti balad Masir.Kan naadum yichiifah,yuguul al‑dalaam da misil yilammisah. 
Wa Muusa rafaʼ iidah ale l‑sama wa khalaas,dalaam azrag kurum khatta balad Masir muddit talaata yoom.
Wa fi l‑talaata yoom dool,al‑Masriyiin ma gidro yichchaawafo ambeenaathum wa naadum waahid kula ma gidir yamrug min beetah.Wa laakin fiyah deyy fi l‑bakaan al‑saakniin foogah Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa l‑malik naada Muusa wa gaal leyah : Hassaʼ da,amchu !Intu wa awiinku wa iyaalku amchu aʼabudu Allah.Wa khanamku wa bagarku kamaan yifaddulu hini. 
Wa laakin Muusa gaal : Kan ke da,inta bas tantiina al‑bahaayim al‑nigaddumuuhum dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya aakhariin le Allah Ilaahna walla ?Da ma yabga.
Kulla bahaayimna yamchu maʼaana wa bahiime waahide kula ma tifaddil achaan minhum bas nigaddumu dahaaya le naʼabudu Allah Ilaahna.Wa aniina zaatna ke ma naʼarfu al‑bahaayim al‑weenu al‑nigaddumuuhum le Allah illa kan wisilna hinaak. 
Wa laakin Allah gawwa raas al‑malik wa l‑malik aba ma khallaahum yamurgu min baladah.
Wa hu gaal le Muusa : Yalla !Amrug min beeti !Wa abadan ma taji tagiif giddaami.Battaan kan jiit wagaft giddaami,tumuut ! 
Wa Muusa gaal : Sameh,misil inta gultah.Battaan ana ma naji nagiif giddaamak. 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Ana ninazzil al‑waba al‑akhiir fi l‑malik wa fi l‑Masriyiin.Wa baʼad da,hu yikhalliiku tamurgu min hini.Ma bas hu yikhalliiku tamurgu laakin yatrudku marra waahid min baladah !
Wa hassaʼ,guul le Bani Israaʼiil waajib ayyi raajil yatlub min jaarah wa ayyi mara tatlub min jaaritha achya hana fudda wa dahab. 
Wa Allah sawwa Bani Israaʼiil ligo rida al‑Masriyiin.Wa Muusa kula naadum muhimm fi Masir wa fi uyuun khaddaamiin al‑malik.Wa kulla l‑naas gaaʼidiin yikarrumuuh.
Wa Muusa gaal le l‑malik : Daahu Allah gaal :‹ Fi ust al‑leel ana nuchugg balad Masir.
Wa ayyi wald bikir al‑fi Masir yumuut min wald al‑bikir hana Firʼoon al‑gaaʼid fi kursi al‑muluk lahaddi wald al‑bikir hana l‑khaadim al‑tarhak al‑gameh.Wa kulla awlaad al‑bikir hana l‑bahaayim kula yumuutu.
Wa fi Masir yabga baki chadiid al‑ma bigi yoom waahid wa battaan ma yabga.
Laakin fi bakaan Bani Israaʼiil,kalib waahid kula ma yanbah foog naadum walla foog bahiime.Wa be da,taʼarfu kadar ana Allah nifannid been Bani Israaʼiil wa l‑Masriyiin.› 
Wa Muusa gaal battaan : Kulla khaddaamiinak yaju yasjudu giddaami wa yachhadooni wa yuguulu :‹ Amchi inta wa kulla chaʼabak !› Wa illa baʼad da bas,ana namchi. Wa Muusa marag min bakaan al‑malik zaʼlaan bilheen.
Wa awwal,Allah gaal le Muusa : Al‑malik ma yasmaʼku !Wa fi chaan da,niziid ajaaybi fi Masir. 
Khalaas,Muusa wa Haaruun sawwo al‑ajaayib al‑katiiriin dool giddaam al‑malik laakin Allah gawwa raasah wa l‑malik aba ma khalla Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu min Masir.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa wa Haaruun fi Masir :
 Min hassaʼ,al‑chahar da yabga leeku chahar bidaayit al‑sana wa awwal chahar fi chuhuur al‑sana.
Amchu guulu le kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil kadar fi yoom 10 hana l‑chahar da,ayyi naadum yichiil hamal waahid le aayiltah walla le beetah.
Wa kan naas al‑beet chiyya ma yagdaro yaakulu kulla l‑hamal da,khalli yilimmu maʼa jiiraanhum al‑gariibiin wa yigassumuuh ale adadhum.Wa ayyi naadum yaʼazil hamal al‑yitimm le naasah.
Wa waajib taʼazulu hamal aw sakhal wald sana al‑ma indah ayyi eeb.
 Wa tikhalluuh yagood lahaddi yoom 14 hana l‑chahar.Wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yadbaho humlaanhum be makhrib.
Wa khalli yichiilu min al‑damm da wa yamsahooh fi l‑iidaan al‑itneen hana l‑baab wa uudah al‑foogaani hana l‑beet al‑yaakulu foogah al‑hamal.
Wa yutuchchu al‑laham da wa be l‑leel,yaakuluuh be khubza bala tawwaara wa be khadaar murr.
Wa ma taakulu al‑laham da neyy walla murakkab laakin tuchchuuh kaamil fi naar be raasah wa rijileenah wa butuunah.
Wa kadar le fajur da,ma tikhallu minnah cheyy.Wa kan cheyy faddal kamaan,harruguuh.
 Wa daahu kikkeef taakulu al‑akil da.Aakuluuh sulubku marbuut wa be niʼleeku fi rijleeku wa akurbu isayku fi iideeku wa aakuluuh ajala.Wa da iid al‑Fishale Allah.
Wa fi l‑leele di,ana nuchugg balad Masir wa naktul ayyi wald bikir hana l‑naas wa hana l‑bahaayim.Wa be misil da,niʼaakhib ilaahaat balad Masir achaan ana Allah.
Wa l‑damm da yabga leeku alaama al‑tahmiiku fi l‑buyuut al‑intu saakniin fooghum.Wa kan ana chift al‑damm da,nibaari buyuutku wa l‑waba hana l‑moot ma yalhagku wakit niʼaakhib al‑Masriyiin.
 Wa l‑yoom da,yabga leeku yoom al‑tizzakkaro foogah.Wa tiʼayyudu daayman al‑iid da le Allah wa da yabga leeku chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye. 
Wa battaan Allah gaal : Fi muddit sabʼa yoom,aakulu khubza bala tawwaara.Min al‑yoom al‑awwal,ma tikhallu fi buyuutku al‑tawwaara.Wa min al‑yoom al‑awwal lahaddi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,kan naadum akal khubza al‑indaha tawwaara,waajib yafsuluuh min Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑awwal wa l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,tilimmu malamma khaassa le taʼabuduuni.Wa fi l‑ayyaam dool,ma takhdumu illa tisawwu akil le nufuusku bas.
Wa tiʼayyudu iid al‑Khubza bala Tawwaara achaan fi l‑yoom da bas,ana maragtuku min Masir hasab majmuuʼaatku.Wa l‑iid da yabga leeku chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye.
Wa min yoom 14 hana l‑chahar al‑awwal lahaddi yoom 21,taakulu khubza bala tawwaara be makhrib.
Fi muddit al‑sabʼa yoom dool,tawwaara ma tagood fi buyuutku.Wa ayyi naadum al‑akal khubza al‑indaha tawwaara da,waajib yafsuluuh min mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil,kan ajnabi walla kan min Bani Israaʼiil kula.
Ma taakulu abadan khubza al‑indaha tawwaara fi l‑ayyaam dool.Wa fi ayyi bakaan al‑saakniin foogah,taakulu illa khubza bala tawwaara. 
Wa baʼad da,Muusa naada kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal leehum : Ayyi waahid yichiil hamal le aayiltah wa yadbahah le iid al‑Fisha.
Wa chiilu rubta hana warchaal zuufa wa dissuuha fi damm al‑hamal al‑sabbeetuuh fi maaʼuun.Wa amsaho beyah al‑iidaan al‑itneen hana l‑baab wa uudah al‑foogaani.Wa naadum waahid kula minku ma yamrug min beetah lahaddi l‑fajur.
Wakit Allah yuchugg balad Masir le yadrub al‑Masriyiin,kan hu yichiif al‑damm al‑masahtuuh fi l‑iidaan al‑itneen hana l‑baab wa uudah al‑foogaani,hu yibaari buyuutku wa yadhar waba al‑moot ma yadkhul fi buyuutku wa yadrubku.
 Wa l‑cheyy da yabga leeku wa le zurriiyitku chart daayim.
Wa wakit tadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑Allah gaal yantiiku da,titabbugu al‑gaanuun da.
Akuun iyaalku yasʼalooku wa yuguulu :‹ Al‑iid da maʼanaatah chunu ? ›
Intu guulu leehum :‹ Nadbaho dahiiyat iid al‑Fisha le Allah achaan Allah baara buyuutna aniina Bani Israaʼiil fi Masir.Wakit hu darab al‑Masriyiin,hu baara buyuutna wa najjaana.› Wa fi l‑bakaan da,kulla chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil dangaro wa sajado.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil macho wa sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amar beyah Muusa wa Haaruun.
Wa khalaas fi ust al‑leel,Allah katal kulla awlaad al‑bikir al‑fi Masir min wald al‑bikir hana Firʼoon al‑gaaʼid fi kursi al‑muluk lahaddi awlaad al‑bikir hana l‑masaajiin wa awlaad al‑bikir hana l‑bahaayim.
Wa fi l‑leele di,al‑malik wa kulla khaddaamiinah wa kulla l‑Masriyiin gammo min al‑noom wa bako baki chadiid achaan beet al‑ma indah moot ke ma fiih.
Wa l‑malik naada Muusa wa Haaruun fi ust al‑leel wa gaal leehum : Yalla gummu !Amurgu min baladi,intu wa chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil.Amchu aʼabudu Allah misil intu talabtuuh minni.
Wa chiilu khanamku wa bagarku misil gultuuh.Amchu wa asʼalo Ilaahku yibaarikni ana kula ! 
Wa l‑Masriyiin yahsubu humman kulluhum yumuutu.Khalaas,gammo yaʼasuru Bani Israaʼiil achaan yamurgu ajala min baladhum.
Wa chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil chaalo ajiin al‑khubza al‑lissaaʼ ma indah tawwaara wa khattooh fi taasaat wa rabatooh fi khulgaanhum wa khattooh fi kataafeehum.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil saʼalo al‑Masriyiin achya hana fudda wa dahab wa khulgaan misil Muusa gaalah.
Wa Allah sawwa Bani Israaʼiil ligo rida al‑Masriyiin.Wa antoohum kulla cheyy al‑saʼaloohum wa be misil da,Bani Israaʼiil kasabo maal al‑Masriyiin.
Wa baʼad da,Bani Israaʼiil gammo min madiinat Raʼamsiis wa macho ale Sukkuut.Wa adadhum 600 000 rujaal maachiin be rijleehum wa da bala adad al‑awiinhum wa l‑iyaalhum.
Wa chaalo bagar wa khanam katiiriin marra waahid.Wa macho maʼaahum naas katiiriin min gabaayil aakhariin.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil sallalo khubza bala tawwaara be l‑ajiin al‑chaalooh min Masir al‑lissaaʼ ma indah tawwaara.Wa da achaan al‑Masriyiin taradoohum min Masir wa ma ligo wakit achaan yijahhuzu le nufuushum zaad.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil aacho muddit 430 sana fi Masir.
Wa baʼad 430 sana fi l‑yoom al‑muhaddad,kulla chaʼab Allah marago min balad Masir hasab majmuuʼaathum.
Wa fi l‑leele di,Allah raakhab tuul al‑leel fi chaan chaʼabah le yamrughum min Masir.Wa fi chaan da,waajib Bani Israaʼiil yisaahuru le Allah fi l‑leele di min zurriiye le zurriiye.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa wa Haaruun : Daahu gawaaniin hana iid al‑Fisha.Ayyi naadum al‑ma min Bani Israaʼiil ma yaakul maʼaaku akil al‑iid.
Wa l‑abid al‑chareetuuh ma yaakul maʼaaku illa kan tahhartuuh.
Wa ayyi deef walla ajnabi al‑yakhdim leeku be gurus ma yaakul maʼaaku.
Wa l‑hamal da aakuluuh daakhal fi lubb al‑beet wa ma tamurgu lahamah barra min al‑beet.Wa ma taksuru waahid min udaamah.
Wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yiʼayyid al‑iid da.
Wa kan naadum ajnabi gaaʼid maʼaaku wa yidoor yiʼayyid al‑iid le Allah,waajib titahhuruuh.Wa hu yitahhir kulla l‑dukuur al‑gaaʼidiin fi beetah.Wa misil da,yagdar yiʼayyid al‑iid misil waahid min Bani Israaʼiil.Laakin ayyi raajil al‑ma mutahhar ma yaakul akil al‑iid da.
Wa da nafs al‑gaanuun le naadum al‑min Bani Israaʼiil wa le l‑ajnabi al‑saakin maʼaaku. 
Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amar beyah Muusa wa Haaruun.
Wa fi l‑yoom da bas,Allah marag Bani Israaʼiil min Masir hasab majmuuʼaathum.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Khassis leyi kulla wald bikir al‑wildooh fi lubb Bani Israaʼiil wa fi l‑bahaayim.Dool yabgo hineeyi ana. 
Wa Muusa gaal le l‑naas : Kulli sana,zakkuru fi l‑yoom al‑maragtu beyah min Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye.Achaan Allah maragaaku min Masir be gudurtah.Ma taakulu khubza al‑indaha tawwaara fi l‑yoom da !
Da al‑yoom al‑intu maragtu beyah min Masir fi chahar al‑Ganaadiil.
Allah halaf le juduudku wa gaal yantiiku balad al‑malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal.Wa di balad al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin.Wa wakit Allah waddaaku hinaak,fi kulli sana waajib tiʼayyudu fi nafs al‑chahar.
Wa fi muddit sabʼa yoom,aakulu khubza bala tawwaara bas.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,ayyudu le Allah.
Fi muddit sabʼa yoom,intu taakulu khubza bala tawwaara.Wa ma tikhallu khubza al‑indaha tawwaara wa la tawwaara tagood fi kulla baladku.
 Wa ayyi sana fi l‑iid da,intu tifassuru le iyaalku maʼana al‑iid da wa tuguulu leehum :‹ Niʼayyudu al‑iid da achaan nizzakkaro al‑cheyy al‑Allah sawwa leena wakit maragaana min Masir. ›
Wa l‑iid da yabga leeku zikra misil alaama al‑yarbutuuha al‑naas fi iideehum aw fi jabhaathum achaan ma yanso al‑cheyy al‑muhimm leehum.Al‑iid da yizakkirku kadar waajib tiballukhu wasaaya Allah,hu al‑maragaaku min Masir be iidah al‑chadiide.
Wa waajib titabbugu al‑gaanuun da fi l‑yoom al‑magtuuʼ leyah fi kulli sana. 
Wa Muusa gaal battaan : Allah yiwaddiiku fi balad al‑Kanʼaaniyiin misil hu halaf leeku wa le juduudku wa gaal yantiiha leeku.
Fi l‑wakit da,khassusu leyah kulla awlaad al‑bikir.Kulla awlaad al‑bikir al‑dukuur min al‑naas wa min al‑bahaayim yabgo khaassiin le Allah.
Wa ayyi wald bikir hana l‑hamiir,chiilu fi badalah kharuuf.Wa kan ma baddaltuuh kamaan,aksuru ragabatah.Wa laakin ayyi wald bikir min iyaalku intu al‑insaan,afdooh.
 Wa akuun iyaalku yasʼalooku wa yuguulu leeku :‹ Maala tisawwu al‑cheyy da ?› Khalaas,ruddu leehum wa guulu :‹ Allah maragaana be gudurtah min Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye.
Wa l‑malik sawwa raas gawi wa aba ma khallaana namurgu min balad Masir.Wa be da,Allah katal kulla awlaad al‑bikir min al‑naas wa min al‑bahaayim fi balad Masir.Wa fi chaan da,nadbaho le Allah kulla awlaad al‑bikir al‑dukuur min bahaayimna.Wa laakin awlaad al‑bikir hineena kamaan,nafdoohum. ›
Wa da yabga leeku zikra misil alaama al‑yarbutuuha al‑naas fi iideehum aw fi jabhaathum achaan ma yanso al‑cheyy al‑muhimm leehum.Wa misil da,ma tanso kadar Allah maragaaku min Masir be gudurtah. 
Wakit Firʼoon malik Masir khalla Bani Israaʼiil marago,al‑Rabb ma waddaahum be l‑derib al‑yuchugg balad al‑Filistiyiin hatta kan al‑derib da gariib kula.Achaan hu irif kan humman yiwaajuhu harib,yandamo le marigiinhum wa battaan yigabbulu fi Masir.
Wa l‑Rabb waddaahum ale l‑sahara be derib aakhar al‑yiʼaddi be l‑bahar al‑Ahmar.Wa Bani Israaʼiil marago min Masir jaahiziin le l‑harib.
Wa Muusa chaal maʼaayah udaam Yuusufachaan zamaan wakit Yuusuf hayy,hallafaahum le Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal leehum : Akiid al‑Rabb yifakkir leeku.Wa wakit tamurgu min hini,waddu udaami maʼaaku. 
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gammo macho min Sukkuut wa nazalo fi Itaam fi khachum al‑sahara.
Wa Allah maachi giddaamhum be l‑nahaar fi amuud hana sahaab le yuguudhum fi l‑derib wa be l‑leel fi amuud hana naar le yidawwi leehum.Achaan be da,yagdaro yuruukhu leel wa nahaar.
Wa amuud al‑sahaab al‑yuguudhum be l‑nahaar wa amuud al‑naar al‑yuguudhum be l‑leel ma kasso minhum abadan.
Wakit humman fi Itaam,Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil khalli yigabbulu chiyya wa yagoodu giddaam Khachum al‑Hiruut.Wa da ambeen Migduul wa l‑bahar,mugaabil Baʼal Safuun.Wa fi l‑bakaan da bas,intu tanzulu jamb al‑bahar.
Wa khalaas,Firʼoon malik Masir yifakkir wa yuguul :‹ Daahu Bani Israaʼiil waddaro fi l‑kadaade wa l‑sahara sajanathum. ›
Wa battaan ana nigawwi raas Firʼoon wa hu yamchi waraaku le yakrubku.Wa be da,ana niwassif gudurti al‑majiide beyah hu wa askarah.Wa misil da,kulla l‑Masriyiin yaʼarfu kadar ana bas Allah. Wa Bani Israaʼiil macho nazalo fi l‑bakaan da misil Allah amaraahum.
Wakit Firʼoon malik Masir simiʼ kadar Bani Israaʼiil arrado minnah,tawwaali lamma khaddaamiinah wa khayyaro fikirhum wa gaalo : Chunu al‑aniina sawweena da ?Khalleena Bani Israaʼiil marago min baladna.Waddarna al‑iid al‑takhdim leena ! 
Wa l‑malik chaal arabaatah hana l‑harib wa kulla askarah.
Chaal 600 arabaat harib min al‑nooʼ al‑adiil wa l‑arabaat al‑aakhariin hana l‑Masriyiin kamaan taabaʼoohum be wara.Wa fi ayyi waahide fiyah zaabit.
Wa Allah gawwa raas malik Masir achaan yamchi wara Bani Israaʼiil al‑marago wa maachiin farhaaniin be hurriiyithum.
Al‑Masriyiin macho wara Bani Israaʼiil be kulla kheel al‑malik wa arabaatah wa siyaadhum wa kulla deechah.Wa lihgoohum le Bani Israaʼiil fi l‑bakaan al‑humman nazalo foogah jamb al‑bahar fi Khachum al‑Hiruut mugaabil Baʼal Safuun.
Wakit malik Masir gaaʼid yigarrib leehum,Bani Israaʼiil chaafo min baʼiid al‑Masriyiin jaayiin waraahum.Wa min chiddit al‑khoof,aato wa gaalo : Ya Allah,najjiina ! 
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,laamooh le Muusa wa gaalo : Fi Masir ma fi khubuur walla ?Maala jibtina numuutu fi l‑sahara di ?Le chunu maragtina min Masir ?
Wa fi chaan da bas,wakit aniina fi Masir kallamnaak wa gulna leek :‹ Khalliina saakit !Nagoodu abiid le l‑Masriyiin bas.Da akheer leena min numuutu fi l‑sahara !› 
Wa laakin Muusa radda leehum wa gaal : Ma takhaafo !Agoodu bakaan waahid wa chiifu kikkeef al‑yoom Allah yinajjiiku !Al‑Masriyiin al‑intu gaaʼidiin tichiifuuhum al‑yoom,abadan ma tichiifuuhum !
Daahu Allah yihaarib aduuku.Wa laakin intu kamaan,agoodu saakit bas. 
Khalaas,Allah gaal le Muusa : Maala tikoorik leyi battaan ?Guul le Bani Israaʼiil khalli yichiilu deribhum wa yamchu !
Kan leek inta,arfaʼ asaatak foog wa midd iidak ale l‑bahar wa yinchagga bakaanteen.Wa fi ust al‑bahar,al‑turaab yabga yaabis wa Bani Israaʼiil yagtaʼo al‑bahar raaykhiin be rijleehum fi l‑turaab al‑yaabis da.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,ana nigawwi raas al‑Masriyiin achaan yadkhulu waraaku fi l‑bahar.Wa khalaas,ana niwassif gudurti al‑majiide be Firʼoon malik Masir wa deechah wa arabaatah hana l‑harib wa siyaad kheelah.
Wa wakit niwassifhum gudurti al‑majiide be malik Masir wa arabaatah wa siyaad kheelah,khalaas al‑Masriyiin yaʼarfu kadar ana bas Allah. 
Wa malak Allah al‑awwal maachi giddaam fariig Bani Israaʼiil gabbal wa gaʼad waraahum.Wa amuud al‑sahaab al‑awwal maachi giddaamhum kula gabbal wa gaʼad waraahum.
Wa amuud al‑sahaab wagaf been muʼaskar al‑Masriyiin wa fariig Bani Israaʼiil wa nussah al‑ale Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼid yidawwi wa nussah al‑ale l‑Masriyiin gaaʼid adlam.Wa tuul al‑leele di,ma fi waahid al‑garrab le l‑aakhar.
Wa baʼad da,Muusa madda iidah ale l‑bahar wa fi l‑bakaan da,Allah nafakh riih chadiide jaaye min sabaah.Wa fi tuul al‑leel,al‑riih gaaʼide tusuug wa gassamat al‑almi bakaanteen lahaddi al‑turaab al‑yaabis baan.
Wa khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil addo ust al‑bahar fi l‑turaab al‑yaabis wa l‑almi gaʼad jaay wa jaay leehum misil durdur be nussuhum al‑israay wa l‑zeenaay.
Al‑Masriyiin wa kheel al‑malik wa arabaatah hana l‑harib wa siyaadhum dakhalo wara Bani Israaʼiil ambeenaat al‑daraadir al‑itneen hana l‑almi.
Wa be fajur badri min al‑amuud hana l‑naar wa sahaab,Allah chaaf deech al‑Masriyiin wa barjalaahum.
Wa hu tallaf rijle arabaathum wa ma yagdaro yamchu illa be taʼab.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,al‑Masriyiin gaalo : Yalla !Najru min Bani Israaʼiil achaan Allah gaaʼid yihaarib leehum diddina ! 
Wakit Bani Israaʼiil gataʼo al‑bahar khalaas,Allah gaal le Muusa : Midd iidak ale l‑bahar wa khalli al‑almi yilimm fi l‑Masriyiin wa fi arabaat al‑harib wa fi siyaad al‑kheel. 
Wa wakit al‑harraay talaʼat,Muusa madda iidah ale l‑bahar wa l‑almi ansadda fi bakaanah misil awwal.Wa wakit al‑Masriyiin muʼarridiin ale khachum al‑bahar,Allah lazzaahum fi ust al‑almi.
Wa l‑almi gabbal fi bakaanah wa akal al‑arabaat wa siyaad al‑kheel wa kulla deech Firʼoon malik Masir al‑dakhalo wara Bani Israaʼiil fi l‑bahar.Wa naadum waahid kula minhum ma faddal !
Wa kan le Bani Israaʼiil kamaan,al‑bahar anchagga wa bigi misil durdur jaay wa jaay leehum wa humman gataʼo al‑bahar fi l‑turaab al‑yaabis.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,Allah najja Bani Israaʼiil min al‑Masriyiin wa humman chaafo janaazaat al‑Masriyiin muchattatiin fi khachum al‑bahar.
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil chaafo al‑iid al‑chadiide al‑Allah darab beeha al‑Masriyiin,khalaas humman khaafo wa aamano be Allah wa be abdah Muusa kula.
Wa khalaas,Muusa wa Bani Israaʼiil khanno le Allah al‑khine al‑buguul :Ana nikhanni le Allahachaan hu wassaf gudurtah al‑majiide.Wa hu rama fi l‑baharal‑juwaad wa siidah.
Allah hu gudurtiwa fiyah hu,ana nikhanni.Hu bas al‑najjaaniwa hu Rabbi al‑ana nimajjidah.Hu al‑Rabb al‑abuuyi abadah.Ana niʼazzimah !
Rabbina siid al‑haribwa hu bas usmah Allah.
Arabaat Firʼoon malik Masir wa kulla deechah,fi l‑bahar Allah dassaahum.Wa askarah al‑adiiliin,al‑bahar al‑Ahmar akalaahum.
Wa wagaʼo misil al‑hajar lahaddi aakhir al‑baharwa almi al‑khariig khattaahum.
Ya Allah,iidak al‑zeenewassafat gudurtak.Ya Allah,iidak al‑zeenedammarat udwaanak.
Be majdak al‑aziimrameet udwaanak.Wa misil al‑naar taakul al‑gechch,harragtuhum be naar khadabak.
Wa min inta nafakht al‑riih,al‑almi lamma bakaan waahid.Wa l‑challaal wagaf misil al‑durdurwa almi al‑khariig jamad fi ust al‑bahar.
Wa l‑adu fachar be nafsah wa gaal : Namchi waraahum,nalhaghum nidammirhum.Wa nichiil al‑khaniimewa minha nachbiʼ nafsi.Nisill seefiwa be iidi narhakhum. 
Wa laakin inta nafakht fi l‑baharwa l‑almi khatta al‑Masriyiin.Wa tamaso misil durdumt al‑hadiidfi almi al‑khariig.
Ya Allah,yaatu mislak intafi ilaahaat al‑gabaayil ?Yaatu mislak,ya Jaliil,ya Khudduus ?Inta al‑waajib leek al‑chukurwa inta al‑Gaadir tisawwi ajaayib.
Wakit maddeet iidak al‑zeene,al‑ard zaratathum.
Be rahmatak inta gudt chaʼabakal‑min al‑moot fadeethum.Wa be gudurtak waddeethumale bakaanak al‑mukhaddas.
Wa l‑gabaayil al‑simʼo beehum rajafowa min al‑khoof,al‑Filistiyiin anbahato.
Wa chuyuukh Adoom barjalowa muluuk Muwaab rajafowa kulla sukkaan Kanʼaan ayyaso.
Wa fooghum kulluhumal‑ruʼub wa l‑barjaal wagaʼo.Wa be gudrat iidak al‑chadiide,bigo misil al‑hajar wa sakatohatta chaʼabak gidro addo.Ya Allah,hatta gidro addochaʼabak al‑inta fadeethum !
Inta tiwaddiihum fi bakaanakwa tisakkinhum fi jabal warasatak.Ya Allah,da l‑bakaan al‑azaltahle yabga beetak.Ya Rabb,da beetak al‑mukhaddasal‑sabbatatah iidak.
Allah yamluk daayman wa ila l‑abad !
