Wakit kheel Firʼoon malik Masir wa arabaatah wa siyaadhum dakhalo fi l‑bahar,Allah galab fooghum al‑almi.Wa laakin Bani Israaʼiil gataʼo al‑bahar fi l‑turaab al‑yaabis.
Wa khalaas,Mariyam al‑nabiiye akhut Haaruun chaalat nuggaara sakhayre wa kulla l‑awiin taabaʼanha wa gamman yalʼaban wa yuduggan nagaagiirhin.
Wa Mariyam khannat wa gaalat : Khannu le Allahachaan hu wassaf gudurtah al‑majiide.Wa hu rama fi l‑baharal‑juwaad wa siidah ! 
Wa baʼad da,Muusa chaal Bani Israaʼiil min al‑bahar al‑Ahmar wa waddaahum le saharat Chuur.Wa fi muddit talaata yoom,humman saayriin fi l‑sahara wa ma ligo almi yacharbooh.
Wa wakit wassalo fi Murra,ligo almi wa laakin al‑almi da murr,ma gidro yacharbooh.Wa fi chaan da bas,al‑bakaan da sammooh Murra.
Fi l‑bakaan da,laamooh le Muusa wa gaalo : Nacharbo chunu ? 
Wa Muusa saʼal Allah wa Allah wassaf leyah chadara waahide.Wa Muusa gataʼ minha firiʼ wa zagalah fi l‑almi da wa l‑almi bigi halu.Wa fi l‑bakaan da bas,Allah anta le Bani Israaʼiil gawaaniin wa churuut.Wa jarrabaahum
wa gaal : Kan tasmaʼo kalaami ana Allah Ilaahku wa tisawwu al‑adiil giddaami wa titaabuʼu wasiiyaati wa titabbugu kulla l‑churuut,ana ma ninazzil foogku waba misil al‑nazzaltah fi l‑Masriyiin.Achaan ana Allah al‑yachfiiku. 
Wa baʼad da,humman jo fi Iliim wa ligo foogha 12 een hana almi wa 70 nakhal.Wa nazalo jamb al‑almi da.
Wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil rahalo min Iliim fi yoom 15 hana l‑chahar al‑taani min marigiinhum min Masir.Wa macho ale saharat Siin al‑gaaʼide ambeen Iliim wa jabal Siinaaʼ.
Wa fi l‑sahara di,kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil laamo Muusa wa Haaruun
wa gaalo leehum : Akheer leena kan Allah katalaana fi balad Masir wakit aniina chabʼaaniin jamb al‑buraam hana l‑laham.Wa laakin intu maragtuuna fi l‑sahara di le numuutu kullina min al‑juuʼ ! 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Hassaʼ ana ninazzil leeku akil min al‑sama.Wa l‑chaʼab yamchu yilaggutu akil al‑yitimmuhum hana kulla yoom.Wa be da,nijarribku le naʼarif kan intu titaabuʼu wasiiyaati walla la.
Fi l‑yoom al‑saadis,laggutu wa jahhuzu al‑akil wa hu yabga marrateen ziyaada min al‑ayyaam al‑aakhariin. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa wa Haaruun gaalo le kulla Bani Israaʼiil : Al‑yoom achiiye,taʼarfu kadar Allah hu bas maragaaku min balad Masir.
Wa ambaakir fajur,tichiifu majd Allah yibiin leeku achaan hu simiʼ luwaamitku.Kan leena aniina,aniina ke chunu al‑intu tuluumuuna ? 
Wa Muusa gaal battaan : Allah hu bas al‑yantiiku be achiiye laham taakuluuh.Wa be fajur,tachbaʼo be akil min al‑sama achaan hu simiʼ luwaamitku.Wa kan tuluumuuna aniina da,intu lumtu Allah. 
Wa baʼad da,Muusa gaal le Haaruun : Guul le kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Taʼaalu giddaam Allah achaan hu simiʼ luwaamitku.› 
Wa wakit Haaruun bada yikallim leehum be l‑kalaam da,humman kulluhum anlafato ale l‑sahara wa chaafo majd Allah baan leehum fi l‑sahaab.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Ana simiʼt luwaamit Bani Israaʼiil.Guul leehum :‹ Al‑yoom achiiye,taakulu laham wa ambaakir fajur,tachbaʼo be l‑akil al‑yanzil min al‑sama.Wa be da,taʼarfu kadar ana bas Allah Ilaahku.› 
Wa khalaas be achiiye,al‑teer al‑usmah salwa ja sadda al‑bakaan al‑humman naazliin foogah.Wa be fajur,al‑karany nazal wa khatta hawaale al‑fariig.
Wakit al‑karany chirib,khalla cheyy khafiif misil al‑talaj laasig fi l‑ard.
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil chaafooh,assaaʼalo ambeenaathum wa gaalo : Da chunu ? Achaan humman abadan ma yaʼarfuuh.Laakin Muusa gaal leehum : Da bas al‑akil al‑antaaku Allah le taakuluuh.
Wa Allah amaraaku le tilaggutu minnah kulla yoom wa ayyi naadum yilaggit hasab al‑yitimm leyah.Wa tichiilu kooro le ayyi naadum min al‑aayila. 
Wa Bani Israaʼiil sawwo misil ooroohum.Waahidiin laggato katiir wa waahidiin laggato chiyya.
Laakin wakit macho gaawasooh,al‑laggato katiir ma faddal leehum wa l‑laggato chiyya kula ma gassar leehum.Wa be da,ayyi waahid laggat hasab al‑yitimm leyah.
Wa khalaas,Muusa gaal leehum : Khalli naadum ma yudumm al‑akil da lahaddi fajur. 
Wa laakin waahidiin minhum ma simʼo kalaam Muusa wa dammo min al‑akil da lahaddi fajur.Wa l‑akil al‑dammooh da affan wa dawwad.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Muusa ziʼil fooghum.
Wa kulli fajur,humman yilaggutu al‑akil da wa ayyi naadum yilaggit hasab al‑yitimm leyah.Wakit al‑harraay tidaahi,al‑akil da yumuuʼ.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saadis,yilaggutu akil ziyaada yaʼni koorteen le ayyi naadum.Wa chuyuukh al‑mujtamaʼ jo kallamo Muusa be l‑cheyy da.
Wa hu gaal leehum : Allah yuguul ke :‹ Ambaakir da yoom al‑sabt wa da yoom Allah wa hu mukhaddas wa tinjammo foogah.Wa l‑cheyy al‑tidooru tidissuuh fi l‑furun,dissuuh al‑yoom.Wa l‑tidooru tirakkubuuh fi l‑naar kula,rakkubuuh al‑yoom.Wa l‑faddal min al‑akil da,dummuuh lahaddi fajur.› 
Khalaas,dammo al‑akil da lahaddi fajur misil Muusa amaraahum.Wa l‑akil da wa la affan wa la dawwad.
Wa Muusa gaal : Aakuluuh fi l‑yoom da achaan hu yoom al‑sabt le Allah.Wa fi yoom al‑sabt,ma talgo akil al‑tilaggutuuh.
Fi muddit sitte yoom,laggutu al‑akil al‑yanzil min al‑sama.Wa l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ da yabga yoom al‑sabt.Fi l‑yoom da,al‑akil ma yanzil. 
Wa wakit al‑yoom al‑saabiʼ ja,waahidiin min al‑chaʼab macho le yilaggutu al‑akil al‑yanzil min al‑sama wa laakin ma ligooh.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Le mata taabo ma titabbugu gawaaniini wa wasiiyaati ?
Ma taʼarfu kadar ana Allah azalt leeku yoom al‑sabt le tinjammo ?Wa fi chaan da,fi l‑yoom al‑saadis anteetku akil hana yoomeen.Wa khalli ayyi naadum yagood fi beetah ma yamrug fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ. 
Wa be sabab da,kulla l‑chaʼab anjammo fi buyuuthum fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil sammo al‑akil al‑yanzil min al‑sama da manna.Hi misil iyaal al‑kussubarra wa loonha abyad wa taʼamha misil kaʼak be asal.
Wa Muusa gaal : Daahu amur Allah.Chiilu kooro malaan manna wa ahfadooh le zurriiyitku achaan humman yichiifu al‑akil al‑ana anteetah leeku fi l‑sahara wakit maragtuku min balad Masir. 
Wa Muusa gaal le Haaruun : Chiil jarr wa subb foogah kooro hana manna wa khuttah giddaam Allah.Wa yukuun mahfuud adiil wa yagood min zurriiye le zurriiye. 
Wa Haaruun chaalah wa baʼadeen khattaah fi sanduug maʼa liihaan al‑muʼaahada achaan yukuun mahfuud adiil misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin yaakulu al‑manna di le muddit 40 sana lahaddi wassalo fi huduud balad Kanʼaan al‑indaha sukkaan.
Al‑wazin hana l‑yoom daak usmah omar wa hu yisaawi uchur al‑eefa.
Kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil rahalo min saharat Siin misil Allah amaraahum beyah wa zahafo chiyya chiyya lahaddi nazalo fi Rafidiim bakaan al‑ma indah almi yacharbooh.
Fi l‑bakaan da,humman gammo yaharju le Muusa wa gaalo : Antiina almi nacharbooh ! Wa Muusa radda leehum wa gaal : Maala taharjuuni ?Wa maala tijarrubu Allah ? 
Wa l‑chaʼab al‑atach sawwaahum be ziyaada wa gammo yuluumu Muusa wa gaalo : Maala maragtina min Masir le taktulna aniina wa iyaalna wa bahaayimna be l‑atach ? 
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Muusa chaka le Allah wa gaal : Chunu nisawwi le l‑chaʼab dool ?Faddal chiyya bas yarjumuuni. 
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Amchi giddaam al‑chaʼab wa chiil maʼaak waahidiin min chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil.Wa chiil fi iidak asaatak al‑darabt beeha bahar al‑Niil wa amchi
talgaani giddaamak fi l‑hajar al‑gaaʼid fi jabal Huuriib.Adrub al‑hajar da wa yamrug minnah almi le l‑chaʼab yacharbo. Wa Muusa sawwa al‑cheyy da giddaam chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa samma al‑bakaan da Massa wa Mariiba (maʼanaatah al‑tajriba wa l‑huraaj) achaan Bani Israaʼiil harajooh le Muusa wa jarrabo Allah wa gaalo : Allah gaaʼid maʼaana walla la ? 
Askar al‑Amaalikh jo wa haarabo Bani Israaʼiil fi Rafidiim.
Wa Muusa gaal le raajil waahid min Bani Israaʼiil al‑usmah Yachuuʼ : Yalla !Chiil rujaal wa amrug haarib leena al‑Amaalikh !Wa ambaakir,ana nagiif fi raas al‑hajar wa asaat Allah fi iidi. 
Wa Yachuuʼ macha le yihaarib al‑Amaalikh misil Muusa gaalah leyah.Wa laakin Muusa wa Haaruun wa Huur talaʼo foog fi raas al‑hajar.
Wa wakit Muusa yarfaʼ iidah foog,Bani Israaʼiil yakhalbu.Wa laakin wakit Muusa yidalli iidah,al‑Amaalikh yakhalbu.
Wa wakit iideen Muusa bigo tugaal min al‑aya,Haaruun wa Huur chaalo hajar wa khattooh tihtah wa hu gaʼad foogah.Wa ayyi waahid minhum lazam iid waahide hana Muusa.Wa khalaas,iideenah bigo saabtiin lahaddi l‑harraay wagaʼat.
Wa be darb al‑seef,Yachuuʼ annasar nasur kaamil fi askar al‑Amaalikh.
Wa khalaas,Allah gaal le Muusa : Aktib kulla l‑cheyy da fi kitaab achaan ma yinnasi.Wa khalli Yachuuʼ kula yasmaʼah achaan ana nuguchch kulla l‑Amaalikh min al‑ard wa battaan naadum ma yihajji beehum. 
Wa Muusa bana madbah wa sammaah Allah hu Raayti al‑Marfuuʼa.
Wa gaal : Al‑Amaalikh rafaʼo iideehum didd Allah.Wa hu yihaaribhum min zurriiye le zurriiye. 
Yasruun raajil al‑diin hana balad Midyaan wa hu nasiib Muusa.Wa simiʼ be kulla cheyy al‑Rabb sawwaah le Muusa wa le chaʼabah Bani Israaʼiil wa kikkeef Allah maragaahum min balad Masir.
Awwal Muusa wadda martah Siffuura le nasiibah Yasruun wa hu khibilaaha.
Wa wadda maʼaaha iyaalha al‑itneen.Al‑bikir Muusa sammaah Girchuum (maʼanaatah ajnabi) achaan Muusa ajnabi fi l‑balad.
Wa l‑aakhar sammaah Aliʼaazar (maʼanaatah Allah yafzaʼ) achaan Allah Rabb abuuh fazaʼah wa najjaah min seef Firʼoon malik Masir.
Wa Yasruun nasiib Muusa chaal al‑iyaal wa ammuhum wa maachi yiwaddiihum le Muusa fi l‑sahara gariib le jabal Allah al‑bakaan al‑Muusa nazal foogah.
Wa Yasruun rassal khabar le nasiibah Muusa wa gaal : Daahuuni ana jaayi leek wa jaayib maʼaayi martak Siffuura wa iyaalha. 
Wakit Yasruun wassal,Muusa marag laagaah wa barak giddaamah wa habbaah.Wa assaaʼalo khabar aafiyithum wa baʼad da,dakhalo al‑kheema.
Wa Muusa hajja le nasiibah be kulla cheyy al‑Allah sawwa didd Firʼoon malik Masir wa l‑Masriyiin fi chaan Bani Israaʼiil.Wa hajja leyah be kulla l‑taʼab al‑ligooh fi l‑derib wa kikkeef Allah najjaahum.
Wa Yasruun firih be kulla l‑kheer al‑Allah sawwaah le Bani Israaʼiil wakit najjaahum min al‑Masriyiin.
Wa hu gaal : Baarak Allah al‑najjaaku min ubuudiiyit Firʼoon wa l‑Masriyiin.
Wa hassaʼ ana irift kadar Allah akbar min kulla l‑ilaahaat achaan hu wassaf gudurtah le l‑naas al‑zalamo Bani Israaʼiil. 
Khalaas,Yasruun nasiib Muusa gaddam dahiiye muharraga wa dahaaya aakhariin le l‑Rabb.Wa Haaruun wa kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil jo le yaakulu maʼa nasiib Muusa giddaam al‑Rabb.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taani,Muusa gaaʼid yichaariʼ al‑chaʼab wa humman waagfiin giddaamah min al‑fajur lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wakit nasiibah Yasruun chaaf kulla cheyy al‑Muusa gaaʼid yisawwiih le l‑chaʼab,gaal leyah : Chunu al‑gaaʼid tisawwiih le l‑chaʼab da ?Maala inta wiheedak bas tagood tichaariʼhum ?Wa maala humman kulluhum waagfiin giddaamak min al‑fajur lahaddi l‑achiiye ? 
Wa Muusa radda le nasiibah wa gaal : Achaan al‑chaʼab yaju leyi le nasʼal leehum al‑Rabb.
Wa kan induhum muchkila kula,humman yaju leyi le nisawwi leehum chariiʼa been al‑waahid wa l‑aakhar.Wa niʼarrifhum be gawaaniin al‑Rabb wa wasiiyaatah. 
Wa nasiib Muusa gaal leyah : Al‑cheyy al‑inta gaaʼid tisawwiih da ma adiil !
Inta gaaʼid titaʼʼib nafsak wa titaʼʼib al‑chaʼab kula maʼaak achaan al‑cheyy da faat gudurtak.Wa inta wiheedak ma tagdar tisawwiih.
Wa hassaʼ da,asmaʼ kalaami wa wasiiyti wa khalli al‑Rabb yukuun maʼaak !Gaddim suʼaal al‑chaʼab le l‑Rabb achaan inta mumassil al‑chaʼab giddaam Allah.
Wa allimhum al‑gawaaniin wa l‑wasaaya wa arrifhum al‑derib al‑waajib yichiiluuh wa l‑cheyy al‑waajib yisawwuuh.
Wa baʼad da,aʼazil min kulla l‑chaʼab rujaal gaadriin wa khaayfiin min al‑Rabb wa amiiniin wa ma yakhbalo al‑rachwa.Wa khuttuhum masʼuuliin fi l‑chaʼab.Waahidiin minhum yisawwu chariiʼa le alif naadum wa le miya wa le khamsiin wa la achara.
Wa khalliihum yichaaruʼu al‑chaʼab fi kulla wakit.Humman yichaaruʼuuhum fi machaakilhum al‑dugaag wa laakin machaakilhum al‑kubaar kamaan yiwadduuhum leek inta.Wa da yikhaffif leek inta achaan humman kula yichiilu al‑tagala maʼaak.
Wa kan tisawwi al‑cheyy al‑amarak beyah al‑Rabb,misil da tagdar tilhammal masʼuuliiytak.Wa kulla l‑chaʼab yigabbulu buyuuthum be l‑salaam. 
Wa Muusa simiʼ kalaam nasiibah wa sawwa kulla cheyy al‑hu gaalah leyah.
Wa azal rujaal gaadriin min kulla Bani Israaʼiil wa khattaahum masʼuuliin fi l‑chaʼab.Wa waahidiin minhum yisawwu chariiʼa le alif naadum wa le miya wa le khamsiin wa la achara.
Wa gaaʼidiin yichaaruʼu al‑chaʼab fi kulla wakit.Machaakilhum al‑kubaar yigaddumuuhum le Muusa wa l‑dugaag kamaan,humman bas yihilluuhum.
Wa khalaas,Muusa adda nasiibah Yasruun wa hu gabbal baladah.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Muusa talaʼ fi l‑jabal le yigaabil al‑Rabb.Wa hu naadaah min raas al‑jabal wa gaal leyah : Guul al‑kalaam da le zurriiyit Yaakhuub.Khabbir Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum :
‹ Intu zaatku chiftu al‑cheyy al‑ana sawweetah fi Masir wa kikkeef ana chiltuku misil fi janaahe al‑suguura wa jibtuku aleyi ana Allah.
Fi chaan da,kan intu tasmaʼo kalaami wa tikarrumu muʼaahadati,intu tabgo chaʼabi halaali min kulla l‑chuʼuub hatta kan al‑ard kullaha ke hinti kula.
Wa intu tabgo leyi mamlakat rujaal al‑diin wa umma mukhassasa.› Da l‑kalaam al‑waajib tuguulah le Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa Muusa gabbal al‑fariig wa tawwaali naadaahum le chuyuukh al‑chaʼab wa kallamaahum be kulla l‑kalaam al‑Allah amarah beyah.
Fi l‑bakaan da,kulla l‑chaʼab raayhum bigi waahid wa gaalo : Kulla l‑kalaam al‑gaalah Allah,aniina nitabbuguuh ! Wa Muusa chaal radduhum le yiwaddiih le Allah.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Daahu ana nigaabilak fi sahaabaay mudallime achaan kulla l‑chaʼab yasmaʼooni wakit ana nikallim maʼaak.Wa be misil da,humman yiʼaamunu beek daayman. Wa fi l‑wakit da,Muusa hajja kalaam al‑chaʼab le Allah.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Gabbil le l‑chaʼab wa khassishum al‑yoom wa ambaakir.Wa khalli yikhassulu khulgaanhum.
Wa yukuunu jaahiziin le l‑yoom al‑taalit achaan fi l‑yoom da,ana Allah nanzil fi jabal Siinaaʼ giddaam kulla l‑chaʼab.
Khutt huduud been al‑chaʼab wa l‑jabal wa guul leehum :‹ Angarʼu ma tatlaʼo fi l‑jabal wa la tilammusuuh.Ayyi naadum al‑yilammis al‑jabal da,yaktuluuh.
Wa l‑naadum da,naadum aakhar battaan ma yilammisah illa yarjumuuh walla yizarruguuh be nuchchaab.Kan bahiime walla naadum kula,ma yikhalluuh hayy.Wa laakin wakit simʼo daribiin al‑buug,waahidiin minhum yagdaro yarkabo fi l‑jabal.› 
Wa Muusa nazal min al‑jabal wa khassas al‑chaʼab wa humman khassalo khulgaanhum.
Wa hu gaal leehum : Jahhuzu nufuusku le l‑yoom al‑taalit.Ma tarugdu maʼa awiinku fi l‑mudda di. 
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taalit be fajur,al‑chaʼab chaafo barraaga wa simʼo hiss hana raʼad wa chaafo sahaabaay kabiire fi l‑jabal wa simʼo daribiin chadiid hana buug.Fi l‑bakaan da,kulla l‑chaʼab al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑fariig rajafo.
Wa Muusa marag al‑chaʼab barra min al‑fariig le yigaabulu al‑Rabb.Wa humman wagafo fi gaʼar al‑jabal.
Wa kulla jabal Siinaaʼ mukhatta be dukhkhaan achaan Allah nazal foogah be naar.Al‑dukhkhaan yatlaʼ min al‑jabal misil dukhkhaan al‑furun wa kulla l‑jabal rajaf be chidde.
Wa daribiin al‑buug gaaʼid yiziid.Wakit Muusa gaaʼid yikallim maʼa l‑Rabb,hu yurudd leyah be hiss misil hiss al‑raʼad.
Wa Allah nazal fi raas jabal Siinaaʼ wa naada Muusa le yarkab fi raas al‑jabal.Wa Muusa rikib.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Anzil wa hazzir al‑chaʼab achaan ma yufuutu al‑huduud le yaju yichiifuuni.Kan humman faato al‑huduud,katiir minhum yumuutu.
Wa hatta kan rujaal al‑diin dawwaro yigarrubu leyi kula,khalli yikhassusu nufuushum achaan ana Allah ma nadrubhum. 
Wa Muusa gaal le Allah : Al‑chaʼab ma yagdaro yatlaʼo fi jabal Siinaaʼ achaan inta zaatak bas hazzartina wa gult nukhuttu huduud ambeenna aniina wa l‑jabal wa najʼalooh mukhaddas. 
Wa Allah radda leyah wa gaal : Anzil wa battaan atlaʼ leyi inta wa Haaruun.Wa laakin rujaal al‑diin wa l‑chaʼab,khalli ma yufuutu al‑huduud wa yigarrubu leyi wa be da,ana ma nadrubhum. 
Wa Muusa nazal le l‑chaʼab wa khabbaraahum.
Wa l‑Rabb kallam kulla l‑kalaam da wa gaal :
 Ana Allah Ilaahak bas maragtak min Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye.
 Ma taʼabud ilaahaat aakhariin illa ana.
 Ma tasnaʼ sanam fi ayyi hajim min al‑achya al‑gaaʼidiin foog fi l‑sama aw tihit fi l‑ard aw fi lubb al‑almi al‑fi l‑ard.
Wa ma tasjud giddaam al‑asnaam dool wa la taʼabudhum achaan ana bas Allah Ilaahak.Ana Allah khayyuur yaʼni ma nidoor taʼabud ilaah aakhar.Wa ana niʼaakhib al‑iyaal wa iyaal al‑iyaal be zunuub abbahaathum lahaddi l‑zurriiye al‑taalta wa l‑raabʼe kan humman yakrahooni.
Wa laakin ana nisawwi al‑kheer le aalaaf al‑zurriiyaat al‑yihibbuuni wa yitabbugu wasiiyaati.
 Ma tahlif be usmi ana Allah Ilaahak be kidib achaan al‑yahlif be usmi be kidib,ana Allah ma najʼalah bari.
 Azzakkar yoom al‑sabt wa ajʼalah yoom mukhaddas.
Inta takhdim le muddit sitte yoom wa tikammil kulla khidimtak.
Wa laakin al‑yoom al‑saabiʼ hu sabt leyi ana Allah Ilaahak.Fi l‑yoom da,ma takhdim ayyi cheyy wa la inta wa la awlaadak wa la banaatak wa la abiidak wa la khadiimak wa la bahaaymak wa la l‑ajaanib al‑gaaʼidiin maʼaak fi hillitak.
Achaan fi sitte yoom,Allah khalag al‑samaawaat wa l‑ard wa l‑buhuur wa kulla cheyy al‑fiihum.Wa laakin hu ma khadam fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ.Achaan da,hu baarak al‑yoom al‑saabiʼ wa jaʼalah mukhaddas leyah.
 Karrim ammak wa abuuk achaan umrak yabga tawiil fi l‑ard al‑nantiiha leek ana Allah Ilaahak.
 Ma taktul dimme.
 Ma tazna.
 Ma tasrig.
 Ma tachhad be kidib fi ayyi waahid min jiiraanak.
 Ma titmanna beet jaarak wa la martah wa la abdah wa la khaadmah wa la toorah wa la humaarah wa la ayyi cheyy hanaayah. 
Wakit kulla l‑chaʼab simʼo hiss al‑raʼad wa chaafo al‑barraaga wa simʼo hiss al‑buug wa chaafo al‑jabal gaaʼid yidakhkhin,humman rajafo min al‑khoof wa wagafo baʼiid.
Wa gaalo le Muusa : Hassaʼ da,inta bas kallim leena wa aniina nasmaʼook.Achaan kan al‑Rabb yikallim leena da,aniina numuutu ! 
Wa Muusa gaal le l‑chaʼab : Ma takhaafo !Al‑Rabb ja le yijarribku wa le takhaafo minnah wa ma tisawwu zanib. 
Wa l‑chaʼab wagafo baʼiid wa laakin Muusa garrab wa dakhal fi l‑dalaam al‑bakaan al‑gaaʼid foogah al‑Rabb.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Intu be nufuusku chiftu kadar ana kallamt leeku min al‑sama.
Ma tisawwu leeku ilaah aakhar maʼaayi wa la min fudda wa la min dahab.Abadan ma tisawwuuh.
Abnu leyi madbah min turaab le tigaddumu leyi foogah dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya salaama min khanamku wa bagarku.Wa ana naji nibaarikku fi kulla bakaan al‑tinaadu foogah usmi.
Kan tabnu leyi madbah hana hajar,ma tabnuuh be l‑hajar al‑magtuuʼ achaan al‑hadiid al‑tagtaʼooh beyah ma yikhalliih yabga mukhaddas.
Ma tatlaʼo fi l‑madbah be ataba achaan kan talaʼtu,ooritku tigaabil al‑madbah.› 
 Wa dool al‑churuut al‑tantiihum le Bani Israaʼiil.
Kan chareetu abid Ibraani,khalli yakhdim leeku sitte sana wa fi l‑sana al‑saabʼe,yukuun hurr wa da bala ma yikaffi leeku cheyy.
Wa kan jibtuuh wiheedah,tikhalluuh yamchi wiheedah.Wa kan jibtuuh be mara,tikhalluuh yamchi maʼaaha sawa.
Wa kan jibtuuh wa intu bas anteetuuh mara wa wildat leyah awlaad aw banaat,al‑iyaal wa ammuhum yifaddulu leeku wa abuuhum kamaan yamchi wiheedah.
Wa laakin kan al‑abid gaal :‹ Ana niriid siidi wa marti wa iyaali wa ma nidoor nabga hurr ›,
fi l‑bakaan da siidah yichiil al‑abid wa yiwaddiih giddaam al‑Rabb wa yigarribah le l‑baab aw le uud al‑baab wa yigidd adaanah be mukhras.Wa yagood yakhdim leyah ila l‑abad.
 Wa kan raajil baaʼ bineeytah misil khaadim hi ma yatulguuha hurra misil al‑raajil al‑abid.
Wa kan al‑bineeye di ma ajabat siidha al‑charaaha le tabga leyah mara,hu ma yibiiʼha le l‑ajaanib achaan da misil hu khaanha.Khalli ahalha yafdooha.
Wa kan charaaha le yijawwizha le wileedah,da khalli yiʼaamilha misil bineeytah.
Wa kan siidha akhad mara aakhara,khalli ma yangus akilha wa la lubaasha wa la leelitha.
Wa kan waahid min al‑achya al‑talaata dool nagas,hi tamchi hurra min duun tikaffi cheyy.
 Wa kan naadum darab insaan wa katalah,waajib hu kula yaktuluuh.
Wa laakin kan katalah bala raayah wa l‑cheyy da l‑Rabb bas jaʼalah leyah,khalli yamchi fi l‑bakaan al‑ana Allah nihaddidah le yaljaʼ foogah.
Wa kan naadum yugumm be niiytah didd jaarah wa yaktulah be najaada,hu da yichiiluuh wa yaktuluuh hatta kan lajaʼ fi madbahi kula.
 Wa kan naadum darab ammah aw abuuh,waajib yaktuluuh.
 Wa kan naadum khataf insaan wa baaʼah aw ligooh makruub fi beetah,al‑khaatif da waajib yaktuluuh.
 Wa kan naadum ayyar ammah aw abuuh,waajib yaktuluuh.
Wa kan naadum darab abdah aw khaadmah be asa wa katalah,waajib yiʼaakhubuuh.
Laakin kan gaʼad yoom aw yoomeen hatta maat,al‑siid ma yiʼaakhubuuh achaan al‑abid aw al‑khaadim da hu charaah be gursah.
 Wa kan naaseen addaawaso wa wagaʼo foog mara khalbaane wa hi ramat sakhiirha laakin hi aafe,fi l‑bakaan da al‑naadum al‑wagaʼ foogha yikaffi al‑diiye al‑raajilha yatulbah minnah be muwaafagat al‑gaadi.
Wa laakin kan al‑mara di maatat aw hassat,sawwi hasab al‑gaanuun al‑buguul al‑nafis be l‑nafis
wa l‑een be l‑een wa l‑sinn be l‑sinn wa l‑iid be l‑iid wa l‑rijil be l‑rijil
wa l‑haraag be l‑haraag wa l‑jiraah be l‑jiraah wa l‑darbe be l‑darbe.
 Wa kan naadum salla een abdah aw khaadmah,waajib yikhalliih yamchi hurr achaan hu salla eenah.
Wa kan kasar sinn abdah aw khaadmah,waajib yikhalliih yamchi hurr achaan hu kasar sinnah.
 Wa kan toor taʼan raajil aw mara wa katalah,al‑toor da waajib yarjumuuh.Wa lahamah kula ma yaakuluuh.Wa siid al‑toor da yukuun bari.
Wa laakin kan al‑toor da awwal kula maʼruuf yatʼan al‑naas wa l‑naas hazzaro siidah wa siidah ma hafadah wa hu taʼan raajil aw mara wa katalah,fi l‑bakaan da al‑toor yarjumuuh wa siidah kula waajib yaktuluuh.
Wa kan talabo minnah diiye le yafda beeha nafsah,waajib yanti al‑diiye al‑talabooha minnah.
Wa nafs al‑hukum da yahkumu beyah le l‑toor al‑taʼan bineeye aw wileed.
Wa kan al‑toor taʼan abid aw khaadim,siidah yikaffi le siid al‑abid aw al‑khaadim 30 hajar fudda wa l‑toor da,yarjumuuh.
 Wa kan naadum fakka biir aw nakat biir wa khallaaha faathe wa wagaʼ foogha toor aw humaar,
siid al‑biir da yikaffi taman al‑toor aw al‑humaar le siidah.Wa siid al‑biir kamaan yichiil al‑bahiime al‑mayte.
 Kan toor taʼan toor hana naadum aakhar wa katalah,siyaad al‑tiiraan al‑itneen dool yibiiʼu al‑toor al‑hayy wa yilgaasamo tamanah wa l‑toor al‑mayyit kula yilgaasamooh.
Wa laakin kan al‑toor da awwal maʼruuf yatʼan wa siidah ma hafadah adiil,fi l‑bakaan da siid al‑toor al‑taʼan yikaffi al‑toor.Wa hu yichiil al‑toor al‑mayyit. 
 Wa kan naadum sarag toor aw kharuuf wa dabahah aw baaʼah,hu yikaffi al‑toor khamsa tiiraan wa l‑kharuuf arbaʼa khurfaan.
Wa kan be leel sarraag ja yasrig wa naadum darabah wa katalah,da ma yinhasib jariimit katil.
Illa kan al‑sirge wa l‑katil kaano baʼad taluuʼ al‑harraay,da yinhasib jariimit katil.Wa ayyi sarraag kan karabooh,yikaffi hukum le l‑naadum al‑hu sarag minnah.Wa kan ma indah cheyy yikaffi beyah,yibiiʼuuh.
 Wa kan ligo fi bakaan al‑sarraag bahiime hayye al‑hu sirigaaha,misil toor aw humaar aw khanamaay,hu yikaffiiha marrateen.
 Wa kan naadum sarrah bahaaymah fi zereʼ aw jineenit inab hana jaarah wa khalla bahaaymah akaloohum,hu waajib yikaffi siidhum min ahsan intaaj hana zerʼah aw jineentah.
 Wa kan naadum harrag hariige wa l‑naar di lihgat al‑zariibe wa akalat kiimaan al‑gameh aw ganaadiil al‑lissaaʼ ma gataʼoohum min al‑zereʼ,al‑naadum da yikaffi kulla l‑khasaara di le siid al‑zereʼ.
 Wa kan naadum khatta amaana hint fudda aw achya aakhariin bakaan jaarah wa l‑amaana di sirgooha,al‑sarraag da kan ligooh yikaffiiha marrateen.
Wa kan al‑sarraag ma ligooh,al‑naadum al‑dammo fi bakaanah al‑amaana yiwadduuh giddaam al‑Rabb le yichiifu kan hu bas akal al‑amaana di.
Wa kan naaseen alkhaalato fi cheyy misil toor aw humaar aw khanamaay aw khalag aw ayyi cheyy aakhar al‑humman alkhaalato foogah,al‑naaseen dool waajib yamchu giddaam al‑Rabb.Wa l‑naadum al‑ramatah al‑chariiʼa da yikaffi marrateen le l‑aakhar.
 Wa kan naadum wadda toor aw khanamaay aw humaar aw bahiime aakhara misil amaana le jaarah wa l‑bahiime di maatat aw anʼadarat aw sirgooha wa naadum ma chaafha,
khalaas al‑naadum al‑khatto fi bakaanah al‑bahiime yahlif be usum Allah kadar hu ma sabbab al‑khasaara al‑bigat fi l‑bahiime di.Fi l‑haala di,hu ma yikaffi cheyy le siid al‑bahiime.Wa siid al‑bahiime waajib yikhassid be l‑haliife di.
Wa kan al‑bahiime di sirgooha be sabab hu ma fakkar leeha,fi l‑haala di hu yikaffi siidha.
Wa kan al‑bahiime akalaaha haywaan,hu waajib yijiib danabha aw adaanha.Fi l‑haala di,hu ma yikaffi cheyy.
 Wa kan naadum attal bahiime min jaarah wa baʼadeen al‑bahiime di anʼadarat aw maatat wa siidha ma fiih,al‑naadum al‑attalaaha da yikaffiiha.
Wa laakin kan siidha haadir,al‑naadum al‑attalaaha ma yikaffi cheyy.Wa kan al‑bahiime di muʼajjara,al‑ujra tikhatti al‑khasaara di.
 Wa kan raajil garrab le bineeye udriiye al‑lissaaʼ ma karabo raasha wa hu lamma maʼaaha wa tallafha,hu waajib yikaffi jeebha wa yaakhudha.
Wa kan abu al‑bitt aba kula,al‑raajil waajib yikaffi jeeb al‑banaat al‑udriiyaat.
 Ma tikhallu al‑saahira tiʼiich.
 Wa ayyi naadum al‑yargud maʼa bahiime,waajib yaktuluuh.
 Wa kan naadum khalla Allah wa gaddam dahiiye le ilaah aakhar,waajib yidammuruuh.
 Ma tazulmu al‑khariib wa la tidaayuguuh achaan awwal intu kula khariibiin fi Masir.
Ma tazulmu al‑araamil aw al‑ataama.
Wa kan intu zalamtuuhum,ana nasmaʼ siraakhhum wakit humman yasrakho leyi.
Wa nakhdab leeku chadiid wa naktulku be l‑seef.Wa awiinku kula yabgo araamil wa iyaalku kula yabgo ataama.
 Kan naadum waahid min chaʼabi miskiin wa gaaʼid maʼaak wa dayyantah maal,ma tarbah foogah yaʼni ma tidayyinah be riba.
Wa kan chilt khalag hana naadum fi deen,waajib tigabbilah leyah gubbaal al‑harraay ma tagaʼ.
Achaan da bas al‑khalag al‑waahid al‑hu yilkhatta beyah.Wa kan ma gabbaltah leyah,hu yunuum be chunu ?Wa kan sarakh leyi,ana nasmaʼah achaan ana hanuun.
 Ma tiʼayyirni ana al‑Rabb wa ma talʼan kabiir chaʼabak.
 Ma tiʼakhkhir leyi gaddimiin awwal asiir al‑inab wa dihin al‑zaytuun.Wa gaddim leyi wileedak al‑bikir kula.
Wa battaan kula,gaddim leyi wald al‑bikir min bagarak wa khanamak.Khalli ayyi wald bikir yagood sabʼa yoom maʼa ammah wa fi l‑yoom al‑taamin,gaddimah leyi.
 Waajib intu tabgo naas mukhassasiin leyi.Wa be da,ma taakulu fadle hana bahiime al‑katalaaha haywaan.Laakin antuuha le l‑kulaab.
 Ma tangul al‑guwaale been al‑naas.Ma tachhad be kidib achaan tansur al‑khaati.
Ma tiʼaawin al‑katiiriin kan humman yidooru yisawwu cheyy fasil.Wa fi l‑chariiʼa,ma titallif chahaadtak le tistafig maʼa l‑katiiriin.
Wa ma tiʼaawin al‑miskiin kula fi l‑chariiʼa achaan hu miskiin bas.
 Wa kan ligiit toor hana aduuk aw humaarah muwaddir,waddiih leyah.
Wa kan chift humaar hana naadum al‑yakrahak waagiʼ tihit himlah,ma tikhalliih wa tamchi.Wa laakin arfaʼah maʼaayah.
 Ma tazlum al‑miskiin wa tidangis al‑chariiʼa.
Ma tatham insaan be kidib.Wa ma tahkim be l‑moot le l‑insaan al‑bari aw al‑saalih.Al‑naadum al‑fasil al‑sawwa misil da,ana Allah ma najʼalah saalih.
Ma takhbal rachwa achaan hi taʼami uyuun al‑masaaʼiil wa tiʼawwij kalaam al‑saalihiin.
 Ma tazlum al‑khariib.Intu taʼarfu iichit al‑khariib achaan intu kula awwal ichtu khariibiin fi Masir.
 Fi sitte sana,ahrit zerʼak wa agtaʼ intaajah.
Wa fi l‑sana al‑saabʼe,khalli yubuur wa yugumm bandar.Wa min al‑bandar da,yaakulu masaakiin chaʼabak.Wa l‑faddal kamaan,yaakuluuh haywaanaat al‑kadaade.Wa tisawwi nafs al‑cheyy fi zerʼak hana l‑inab wa l‑zaytuun.
 Akhdim muddit sitte yoom.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ kamaan,anjamma achaan toorak wa humaarak kula yinjammo wa l‑khariib al‑gaaʼid maʼaak wa abdak kula yinjammo.
 Sawwu kulla cheyy al‑gultah leeku.Wa ma tihajju be usum ilaah aakhar wa la yinsamiʼ fi khuchuumku.
 Ayyudu leyi talaata marraat fi l‑sana.
Ayyudu iid al‑Khubza bala Tawwaara.Fi sabʼa yoom,taakulu khubza bala tawwaara misil ana amartuku.Wa da fi wakit al‑muhaddad fi chahar al‑Ganaadiil al‑chahar al‑intu maragtu beyah min balad Masir.Ma taju giddaami iideeku yaabsiin.
 Wa baʼad da,ayyudu iid al‑Gatiʼ wa gaddumu leyi awwal intaaj al‑gataʼtuuh min ziraaʼitku al‑teerabtuuhum.Wa baʼad da,ayyudu iid al‑Lammiin fi kumaalit al‑sana wakit intu tilimmu foogah intaaj ziraaʼitku.
Wa talaata marraat fi l‑sana,ayyi dakar minku yaji giddaami ana Allah al‑Rabb le yaʼabudni.
 Ma tigaddumu leyi damm al‑dahiiye maʼa ayyi cheyy al‑indah tawwaara.Wa ma tikhallu chaham dahiiyat al‑iid yargud lahaddi fajur.
Wa gaddumu awwal intaaj ziraaʼitku le beet Allah Ilaahku. Wa ma tirakkubu laham al‑sakhal fi laban ammah.
 Chiifu,ana nirassil malak yamchi giddaamku fi l‑derib wa yahfadku.Wa yiwaddiiku fi l‑bakaan al‑ana jahhaztah leeku.
Fakkuru foogah wa taabuʼu kalaamah wa ma taʼasooh achaan hu ma yisaamih isyaanku achaan hu yimassilni.
Wa laakin kan titiiʼuuh wa tisawwu kulla cheyy hasab kalaami,ana nabga adu le udwaanku wa nidaayig al‑yidaayuguuku.
Wa malaki yamchi giddaamku wa yiwaddiiku fi balad al‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin wa nidammirhum.
Ma tasjudu le ilaahaathum wa la taʼabuduuhum wa la tisawwu al‑cheyy al‑humman gaaʼidiin yisawwuuh.Laakin armu wa dammuru al‑hujaar al‑khazzoohum le l‑ibaada.
Aʼabuduuni ana Allah Ilaahku wa nibaarik akilku wa charaabku wa namrug al‑marad min usutku.
Wa fi baladku,ma fi ayyi mara al‑tabga aagre wa la tarmi sakhiirha.Wa nantiiku umur tawiil.
 Wa nirassil al‑khoof le kulli umma al‑tagiif giddaamku achaan tibarjil wa tajri minku.
Wa nirassil al‑nahale giddaamku le tatrudhum le l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin.
Laakin ana ma natrudhum marra waahid fi sana waahide achaan al‑balad ma tabga kharaab wa haywaanaat al‑kadaade yabgo katiiriin wa yugummu didduku.
Ana natrudhum chiyya chiyya lahaddi intu tabgo katiiriin wa tawrusu al‑balad.
Wa nisawwi huduudku min al‑bahar al‑Ahmar lahaddi l‑bahar al‑Abyad wa min al‑sahara lahaddi bahar al‑Furaat.Nidiss fi iideeku sukkaan al‑balad wa taturduuhum giddaamku.
Ma tisawwu alaakha maʼaahum wa la maʼa ilaahaathum.
Ma tikhalluuhum yaskunu fi baladku maʼaaku achaan yilizzuuku tisawwu zanib giddaami.Achaan kan intu abadtu ilaahaathum,da yabga leeku charak. 
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Atlaʼo leyi fi l‑jabal,inta wa Haaruun wa awlaadah Nadaab wa Abiihu wa 70 chuyuukh min Bani Israaʼiil.Wa asjudu min baʼiid.
Wa khalli inta Muusa wiheedak bas taji leyi ana Allah.Wa kan le l‑aakhariin kamaan,ma yaju gariib.Wa khalli al‑chaʼab ma yatlaʼo maʼaak. 
Khalaas,Muusa gabbal kallam al‑chaʼab be kulla kalaam Allah wa gawaaniinah.Wa kulla l‑chaʼab raddo leyah be hiss waahid wa gaalo : Aniina nisawwu kulla cheyy hasab kalaam Allah. 
Muusa katab kulla kalaam Allah.Wa ambaakir fajur,Muusa bakkar wa bana madbah fi gaʼar al‑jabal.Wa battaan khazza 12 hajar ale hasab adad gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Muusa rassal subyaan min Bani Israaʼiil wa humman gaddamo le Allah dahiiye muharraga wa dabaho tiiraan dahaaya salaama.
Wa Muusa sabba nuss al‑damm fi mawaaʼiin.Wa nussah al‑aakhar kamaan,rachcha beyah al‑madbah.
Wa chaal kitaab al‑muʼaahada al‑hu katabah wa garaah le l‑chaʼab.Wa humman gaalo : Aniina nisawwu kulla cheyy hasab kalaam Allah wa nitiiʼuuh. 
Wa Muusa chaal al‑faddal min al‑damm wa rachcha beyah al‑chaʼab wa gaal : Daahu damm al‑muʼaahada al‑Allah sawwaaha maʼaaku hasab kulla kalaamah al‑gaalah leeku. 
Muusa wa Haaruun wa awlaadah Nadaab wa Abiihu wa 70 chuyuukh min Bani Israaʼiil talaʼo al‑jabal.
Wa chaafo Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil.Wa tihtah cheyy misil ard min al‑yaakhuut al‑akhdar wa da chaffaaf misil al‑sama.
Wa laakin al‑Rabb ma madda iidah le yahlik kubaaraat Bani Israaʼiil.Humman chaafo al‑Rabb wa baʼad da,akalo wa chirbo giddaamah.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Atlaʼ leyi fi raas al‑jabal wa agood fi l‑bakaan da.Wa nantiik liihaan itneen hana hajar al‑ana katabt fooghum al‑wasaaya wa l‑gawaaniin le l‑naas yilʼallamoohum. 
Wa Muusa chaal maʼaayah musaaʼidah Yachuuʼ wa talaʼo fi jabal Allah.
Wa gabul ma yatlaʼo,Muusa gaal le chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil : Arjoona hini lahaddi nigabbulu leeku.Daahu Haaruun wa Huur gaaʼidiin maʼaaku.Kan induku muchkila,amchu leehum. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa talaʼ al‑jabal wa l‑sahaabaay saddat al‑jabal marra waahid.
Wa majd Allah gaʼad fi jabal Siinaaʼ.Fi muddit sitte yoom,al‑sahaabaay saddat al‑jabal.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,Allah naada Muusa min ust al‑sahaabaay.
Wa fi uyuun Bani Israaʼiil,majd Allah anchaaf misil al‑naar al‑gaaʼide taakul fi raas al‑jabal.
Wa Muusa dakhal fi ust al‑sahaabaay wa talaʼ battaan foog fi l‑jabal.Wa gaʼad fi raas al‑jabal 40 nahaar wa 40 leele.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Ayyi naadum minku al‑galbah kariim khalli yijiib leyi hadiiye.
Wa dool al‑hadaaya al‑intu takhbaloohum min Bani Israaʼiil.Humman dahab wa fudda wa nahaas
wa gumaach zahri wa garadi wa ahmarwa gumaach kattaan wa suuf inze
wa firaaw kubaach madbuukhiin wa mulawwaniin be loon ahmarwa farwa hint ijil al‑baharwa hatab hana chadar al‑sunt
wa dihin le l‑faanuuswa itir le dihin al‑masahaanwa itir le l‑bakhuur al‑muʼattar
wa hajar al‑usmah agiigwa hujaar aakhariin khaaliyiin le yijammulu beehum al‑farmala wa l‑sideeriiye hana kabiir rujaal al‑diin.
 ‹ Abnu leyi bakaan mukhaddas le nagood fi usutku.
Wa asnaʼo al‑kheema di wa muʼiddaatha sawa sawa min al‑nizaam al‑ana niwassifah leek.
 ‹ Asnaʼ sanduug min khachab al‑sunt tuulah duraaʼeen wa nuss wa urdah duraaʼ wa nuss wa tuulah foog kula duraaʼ wa nuss.
Wa amsahah be dahab saafi min daakhal lahaddi barra.Wa darris khachmah kula be dahab.
Wa asnaʼ arbaʼa khawaatim hana dahab wa lassighum fi l‑koonyaat al‑arbaʼa hana l‑sanduug.Wa da itneen fi l‑nuss al‑waahid wa itneen fi l‑nuss al‑aakhar.
Wa addil iidaan itneen min hatab al‑sunt wa amsahhum be dahab.
Wa dakhkhilhum fi l‑khawaatim al‑arbaʼa al‑mulassagiin fi l‑sanduug achaan yichiiluuh beehum.
Wa l‑iidaan dool khalliihum yagoodu fi l‑khawaatim,ma yisilluuhum minhum abadan.
Wa khutt fi lubb al‑sanduug al‑liihaan al‑fooghum kalimaat al‑muʼaahada al‑ana nantiihum leek.
 ‹ Wa asnaʼ sidaade le l‑sanduug min dahab saafi.Tuul al‑sidaade di yukuun duraaʼeen wa nuss wa urdaha duraaʼ wa nuss.
Asnaʼ min al‑dahab makhluugiin samaawiyiin itneen wa khuttuhum ayyi waahid fi taraf al‑sidaade mulgaabiliin.
Khutt ayyi waahid fi taraf al‑sidaade yaʼni al‑waahid be hini wa l‑aakhar be hinaak mulassagiin fi l‑sidaade.
Wa l‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin dool mumattitiin janaaheehum giddaam wa mukhattiyiin beehum al‑sidaade.Ayyi waahid mugaabil al‑aakhar wa mudangiriin ale l‑sidaade.
 ‹ Wa khutt al‑sidaade fi khachum al‑sanduug.Wa fi daakhal al‑sanduug,khutt al‑liihaan al‑fooghum kalimaat al‑muʼaahada al‑ana nantiihum leek.
Wa hinaak foog le sidaadit al‑sanduug ambeen al‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin al‑itneen,ana nigaabilak.Wa nikallim leek be kulla l‑awaamir al‑nantiihum le Bani Israaʼiil.
 ‹ Asnaʼ tarabeeza be khachab al‑sunt.Tuulha duraaʼeen wa urdaha duraaʼ wa tuulha foog duraaʼ wa nuss.
Wa amsahha be dahab saafi.Wa darris khachumha be dahab.
Wa hawwig khachum al‑tarabeeza be hatab urdah yukuun arbaʼa usbaʼ wa darrisah be dahab.
Wa asnaʼ arbaʼa khawaatim min dahab wa lassighum fi l‑koonyaat al‑arbaʼa hana l‑tarabeeza.Kulla khaatim yagood muwaafig le rijil waahide min al‑tarabeeza.
Wa l‑khawaatim yabgo gariibiin le khachum al‑tarabeeza.Wa be da,yagdaro yidissu fooghum iidaan itneen wa yichiilu beehum al‑tarabeeza.
Wa l‑iidaan dool sawwiihum be hatab al‑sunt wa amsahhum be dahab le yichiilu beehum al‑tarabeeza.
Wa l‑tarabeeza di sawwi leeha sufar wa kharaariif wa abaariig wa kiisaan min dahab saafi al‑yistaʼmaloohum wakit yigaddumu hadaaya charaab.
Wa khutt fi l‑tarabeeza al‑khubza al‑yigaddumuuha leyi.Wa hi tukuun giddaami daayman.
 ‹ Wa asnaʼ leyi faanuus min dahab saafi.Al‑faanuus da wa gaʼarah wa saagah wa kiyeesaatah wa dakaarmah wa zuhuurah kulla ke sunʼa waahide bas.
Wa yilfarraʼ min saag al‑faanuus da sitte furuuʼ,talaata furuuʼ min nuss waahid wa talaata min nuss aakhar.
Wa fi ayyi firiʼ,sawwi talaata kiyeesaat yichaabuhu zahrat al‑looz be dukrumitha wa waragha.Wa da fi kulla firiʼ min al‑furuuʼ al‑sitte.
Wa fi saag al‑faanuus kula,sawwi arbaʼa kiyeesaat yichaabuhu zahrat al‑looz be dukrumitha wa waragha.
Wa tihit ayyi machbak hana furuuʼ itneen,sawwi dukrume.
Wa kulla l‑dakaarim wa l‑furuuʼ yukuunu madguugiin sunʼa waahide bas min dahab saafi.
Wa sawwi sabʼa tiyeesaat le l‑naar wa khuttuhum fi l‑faanuus da achaan wakit yiwalluʼuuhum,niiraanhum yidawwu kulla l‑bakaan al‑giddaamhum.
Sawwi kalaaliib wa taffaayaat min dahab saafi.
Wa l‑dahab al‑saafi al‑tasnaʼ beyah al‑faanuus wa kulla muʼiddaatah,waznah yabga 34 kiilo.
Wa khalaas,chiif wa asnaʼ kulla cheyy hasab al‑nizaam al‑ana wassaftah leek fi l‑jabal da.
 ‹ Wa sawwi al‑kheema be achara gitʼe min gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar.Wa khayyit fi l‑gitaʼ dool suwar makhluugiin samaawiyiin be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.
Wa tuul al‑gitaʼ dool yukuun sawa sawa.Ayyi waahide tukuun indaha 28 duraaʼ wa urdaha 4 duraaʼ.
Wa l‑gitaʼ dool,khamsa yilimmuuhum sawa fi majmuuʼa waahide wa l‑khamsa al‑aakhariin kula yilimmuuhum sawa.
Wa kachkich taraf al‑khamsa be gumaach zahri wa taraf al‑khamsa al‑aakhariin kula kachkichah be nafs al‑gumaach.
Sawwi 50 manaakhir fi l‑majmuuʼa al‑awwal wa 50 manaakhir fi l‑majmuuʼa al‑taaniye.Wa l‑manaakhir dool yukuunu mulgaabiliin.
Wa sawwi 50 fangar hana dahab wa achbik beyah al‑manaakhir kulli waahide maʼa l‑aakhara.Wa be da,al‑majmuuʼteen yabgo kheema waahide.
 ‹ Wa sawwi al‑khita al‑awwal min 11 gitʼe matruuriin be suuf inze.Wa khuttah be foog le l‑kheema.
Wa tuul al‑gitaʼ dool yukuunu sawa sawa.Wa tuul al‑waahide 30 duraaʼ wa urdaha 4 duraaʼ.
Wa l‑gitaʼ dool,khamsa yilimmuuhum sawa wa l‑sitte al‑aakhariin kula yilimmuuhum sawa.Wa l‑gitʼe al‑saadse di tatbugha foog khachum al‑kheema.
Wa sawwi 50 manaakhir fi nuss kulli waahide min al‑majmuuʼteen.
Wa sawwi 50 fangar min nahaas wa achbik beyah al‑manaakhir kulli waahide maʼa l‑aakhara.Wa be da,al‑majmuuʼteen yabgo khita waahid.
Wa l‑khita da,nussah al‑faayit fi l‑tuul,dalliih be wara le l‑kheema.
Wa nussah al‑faayit fi l‑urd,dalliih fi nuss al‑kheema be duraaʼ.Wa be l‑nuss al‑aakhar hana l‑kheema kula,dalliih be duraaʼ.Wa be da,al‑khita yikhatti al‑kheema marra waahid.
 ‹ Wa sawwi al‑khita al‑taani be firaaw kubaach madbuukhiin wa mulawwaniin be loon ahmar.Wa l‑khita al‑taalit da,sawwiih be firaaw ijil al‑bahar.
 ‹ Khuzz khachab al‑sunt wa russah le tabni beyah kheemat al‑ibaada.
Ayyi waahid min al‑khachab da tuulah yukuun 10 duraaʼ wa urdah yukuun duraaʼ wa nuss.
Le ayyi khachaba sawwi rijle itneen al‑yagdaro yisabbutuuha maʼa l‑aakhariin.Kulla l‑khachab da sawwiih misil da.
Wa addil 20 khachab fi l‑nuss al‑junuubi hana l‑kheema.
Wa sawwi 40 asaas hana fudda min tihit le l‑ichriin khachab.Le kulli khachaba waahide,sawwi asaas itneen tihit rijileenha al‑itneen.
Wa 20 khachab yukuunu fi l‑nuss al‑munchaakhi hana l‑kheema.
Wa dool kula,sawwi leehum 40 asaas hana fudda min tihit.Le kulli khachaba waahide sawwi asaas itneen tihit rijileenha al‑itneen.
Wa 6 khachab yukuunu fi l‑nuss al‑warraani hana l‑kheema al‑mugaabil al‑kharib.
Wa sawwi khachab itneen le l‑koonyaat al‑wara.
Wa l‑khachab al‑itneen dool mulassagiin min tihit lahaddi foog.Wa be foog,yisabbutuuhum be khaatim.Wa da yabga fi l‑koonyaat al‑itneen al‑gaaʼidiin be wara.
Wa be da,yukuun 8 khachab wa induhum 16 asaas hana fudda.Wa tihit kulli khachaba,fi asaas itneen.
 ‹ Wa sawwi 5 maraadiis min khachab al‑sunt le l‑nuss al‑junuubi.
Wa sawwi 5 aakhariin le l‑nuss al‑munchaakhi hana l‑kheema.Wa battaan sawwi 5 le nussaha al‑warraani al‑mugaabil al‑kharib.
Wa l‑murdaas al‑ustaani al‑tawiil al‑gaaʼid fi gismit al‑khachab yamchi min tarafha le tarafha.
Wa amsah kulla l‑khachab da be dahab wa asnaʼ khawaatim hana dahab al‑tidiss fooghum al‑maraadiis.Wa amsah al‑maraadiis kula be dahab.
 ‹ Wa sawwi al‑kheema di hasab al‑nizaam al‑ana wassaftah leek fi l‑jabal da.
 ‹ Wa sawwi sitaar min gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar.Wa khayyit foogah suwar makhluugiin samaawiyiin be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.
Wa tiʼalligah fi manaakhir hana dahab al‑gaaʼidiin fi arbaʼa amuud min hatab al‑sunt al‑mamsuuhiin be dahab.Wa l‑amad dool musabbatiin fi arbaʼa asaas hana fudda.
Wa allig al‑sitaar da be fangar wa khutt al‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada khaadi le l‑sitaar.Wa be da,al‑sitaar yafsul been al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wa l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.
 ‹ Wa sidd al‑sanduug da be sidaadtah wa khuttah fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.
Wa barra min al‑sitaar fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas,khutt al‑tarabeeza fi l‑nuss al‑munchaakhi hana l‑kheema wa khutt al‑faanuus mugaabilha fi l‑nuss al‑junuubi.
 ‹ Wa sawwi sitaar le baab al‑kheema min gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar.Wa da be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.
Wa le l‑sitaar sawwi leyah khamsa amuud hana hatab al‑sunt al‑mamsuuhiin be dahab.Wa sawwi leehum manaakhir hana dahab wa le l‑amad dool sawwi leehum khamsa asaas min nahaas.
 ‹ Wa sawwi madbah murabbaʼ min khachab al‑sunt.Tuulah 5 duraaʼ wa urdah 5 duraaʼ wa tuulah foog kula 3 duraaʼ.
Wa sawwi arbaʼa guruun fi koonyaatah al‑arbaʼa.Wa l‑madbah wa l‑guruun yukuunu sunʼa waahide bas.Wa amsahah be nahaas.
Wa asnaʼ kulla muʼiddaatah min nahaas.Humman al‑mawaaʼiin al‑yarfaʼo beehum al‑rumaad al‑mudahhan wa l‑feelaat wa l‑kiisaan al‑yuruchchu beehum al‑damm wa l‑hadiidaay al‑yisillu beeha al‑laham wa khammaamaat al‑naar.
 ‹ Wa asnaʼ le l‑madbah tachaacha min nahaas indaha arbaʼa khawaatim kula min nahaas fi chawaaribha al‑arbaʼa.
Wa khutt al‑tachaacha di fi lubb al‑madbah wa be da,tukuun fi gismit al‑madbah.
Wa sawwi le l‑madbah iidaan itneen min hatab al‑sunt wa amsahhum be nahaas.
Wa l‑iidaan dool dissuhum fi l‑khawaatim al‑gaaʼidiin fi jawaanib al‑madbah le yichiiluuh beehum.
Wa l‑madbah yukuun mujawwaf yaʼni indah lubb.Wa asnaʼah be khachab misil ana wassaftah leek fi l‑jabal da.
 ‹ Wa sawwi fadaay le l‑kheema.Wa be l‑nuss al‑junuubi,tuulha yukuun 100 duraaʼ wa indaha sataayir min gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil.
Wa indaha 20 amuud wa 20 asaas min nahaas.Wa l‑manaakhir wa l‑rubaat al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑amad dool min fudda.
Wa l‑nuss al‑munchaakhi kula tuulah 100 duraaʼ wa indah sataayir wa 20 amuud wa 20 asaas min nahaas.Wa l‑manaakhir wa l‑rubaat al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑amad dool min fudda.
Laakin al‑nuss al‑kharbaani min al‑fadaay tuulah 50 duraaʼ wa indah sataayir wa 10 amuud wa 10 asaas.
Wa l‑nuss al‑sabhaani ale l‑bakaan al‑harraay tatlaʼ,hu kula tuulah 50 duraaʼ.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑nuss al‑zeenaay hana l‑baab,fiyah sataayir tuulhum 15 duraaʼ wa indah 3 amuud wa 3 asaas.
Wa fi l‑nuss al‑israay hana l‑baab,fiyah sataayir tuulhum 15 duraaʼ wa indah 3 amuud wa 3 asaas.
Wa be da,al‑baab al‑yadkhulu beyah al‑fadaay indah sitaar tuulah 20 duraaʼ min gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar.Wa da be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.Wa indah 4 amuud wa 4 asaas.
Kulla l‑amad al‑muhawwigiin al‑fadaay yukuunu fooghum rubaat wa manaakhir min fudda.Wa induhum asaas min nahaas.
Wa tuul al‑fadaay yabga 100 duraaʼ wa urdaha 50 duraaʼ wa tuulha foog 5 duraaʼ.Wa sataayirha min gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil wa asaasha min nahaas.
Wa kulla l‑muʼiddaat al‑yistaʼmaloohum fi l‑kheema wa kulla l‑wutaad hana l‑kheema wa l‑wutaad hana l‑fadaay yabgo min nahaas.
 ‹ Wa aamur Bani Israaʼiil yijiibu leek dihin hana zaytuun maʼsuur wa musaffa le l‑faanuus achaan deyyah yukuun muwalliʼ daayman.
Haaruun wa iyaalah yahfadooh muwalliʼ giddaam Allah fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ giddaam al‑sitaar al‑yidaarig al‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada.Wa deyy al‑faanuus yukuun muwalliʼ min makhrib lahaddi fajur.Wa da yabga chart daayim le Bani Israaʼiil min zurriiye le zurriiye.
 ‹ Chiil min Bani Israaʼiil akhuuk Haaruun wa awlaadah Nadaab wa Abiihu wa Aliʼaazar wa Itamaar le yabgo leyi rujaal diin.
Wa addil le akhuuk Haaruun khulgaan khaassiin al‑yantuuh charaf wa ihtiraam.
Wa guul le kulla l‑khayyaatiin al‑ana anteethum khibra fi l‑khidme di khalli yisawwu khulgaan le Haaruun.Wa hu yalbashum wakit yikhassusuuh le yabga leyi raajil diin.
Al‑khulgaan al‑yisawwuuhum humman al‑sideeriiye wa l‑farmala wa l‑jallaabiiye wa l‑jawwaaniiye wa l‑kadmuul wa l‑hizaam.Yisawwu khulgaan khaassiin le Haaruun akhuuk wa le iyaalah le yabgo leyi rujaal diin.
Wa l‑khulgaan dool yisawwuuhum be gumaach hana kattaan al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar wa mujammaliin be dahab.
 ‹ Al‑farmala yisawwuuha be gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar wa mujammala be dahab.Wa da be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.
Wa tukuun indaha hubaal al‑yisabbutuuha beehum fi l‑kataafe.
Wa l‑hizaam al‑yarbutuuh kula yukuun min nafs al‑sunʼa min dahab wa gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar.
 ‹ Chiil hujaar itneen min agiig wa anguch fooghum asaame awlaad Israaʼiil al‑atnaachar.
Hasab nizaam miilaadhum,aktib asaame al‑sitte fi l‑hajar al‑waahid wa asaame al‑sitte fi l‑hajar al‑taani.
Wa sayyaakhi maʼruuf fi nagich al‑khawaatim yanguch asaame awlaad Israaʼiil fi l‑hajareen dool.Wa tisabbithum fi halagateen min dahab.
Wa tukhuttuhum fi kataafe al‑farmala le yabgo zikra le Bani Israaʼiil.Wa Haaruun yichiil al‑asaame dool fi kataafeeh misil zikra giddaam Allah.
Wa sawwi al‑halagateen min dahab
wa silsilateen hana dahab saafi maftuuliin misil al‑habil.Wa allighum fi l‑halagateen.
 ‹ Sawwi sideeriiyit al‑kharaar misil al‑farmala min gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar wa mujammala be dahab.Wa da be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.
Wa tukuun murabbaʼa tuulha chibir wa urdaha kula chibir.Wa matbuuga marrateen misil jeeb.
Wa tijammilha be arbaʼa roog min al‑hujaar al‑khaaliyiin.Al‑roog al‑awwal indah agiig ahmar wa yaakhuut asfar wa zumurrud akhdar.
Wa l‑roog al‑taani indah marajaan ahmar wa yaakhuut akhdar wa maass.
Wa l‑roog al‑taalit indah fayruuz wa yaakhuut ahmar wa zaytuun.
Wa l‑roog al‑raabiʼ indah zabarjad wa agiig wa kharaz. ‹ Wa kulla l‑hujaar dool yukuunu murassasiin fi l‑riigaan hana l‑dahab.
Wa l‑hujaar al‑khaaliyiin dool fi adad gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil al‑atnaachar.Ayyi usum gabiila manguuch fi hajar waahid misil nagich al‑khawaatim.
 ‹ Wa sawwi le l‑sideeriiye silsilateen min dahab saafi maftuuliin misil al‑habil.
Wa sawwi battaan khawaatim itneen min dahab wa sabbithum fi koonyaat al‑sideeriiye be foog.
Wa dakhkhil fi l‑khawaatim dool al‑silsilateen hana l‑dahab.
Wa khachum al‑aakhar hana l‑silsilateen,dakhkhilah fi l‑halagateen al‑gaaʼidiin fi kataafe al‑farmala be giddaam.
Wa battaan sawwi khawaatim itneen min dahab fi koonyaat al‑sideeriiye be tihit.Wa khuttuhum be daakhal ambeen al‑sideeriiye wa l‑farmala.
Wa battaan sawwi khawaatim itneen min dahab wa khuttuuhum fi kataafe al‑farmala be tihit min giddaam gariib le hizaam al‑farmala.
Wa arbut al‑khawaatim al‑itneen hana l‑sideeriiye be l‑khawaatim al‑itneen hana l‑farmala be habil zahri.Wa be da,al‑sideeriiye tabga foog min al‑hizaam wa gaaʼide saabte foog al‑farmala ma tilharrak.
Wa be da,wakit Haaruun yadkhul fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas,yichiil asaame gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil fi sadrah fi sideeriiyit al‑kharaar achaan yabgo zikra daayme giddaam Allah.
Wa khutt al‑Uriim wa l‑Tummiim fi sideeriiyit al‑kharaar achaan yukuunu fi sadur Haaruun wakit yadkhul giddaam Allah.Wa be da,Haaruun yichiilhum daayman fi sadrah giddaam Allah le yaʼarif kharaaraat Allah le Bani Israaʼiil.
 ‹ Wa khayyit jallaabiiye le l‑farmala kullaha min gumaach zahri.
Wa l‑jallaabiiye indaha gabbe makfuufa wa mudarrasa achaan al‑gabbe ma tincharit.Wa yikhayyutuuha be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.
Wa khayyit fi daayir al‑jallaabiiye rummaanaat masnuuʼiin min gumaach zahri wa garadi wa ahmar wa arbut jursaan min dahab ambeen al‑rummaanaat.
Wa be da,yukuun rummaana wa jaras,rummaana wa jaras fi kulla daayir al‑jallaabiiye.
Wa Haaruun yalbas al‑jallaabiiye di wakit yakhdim giddaam Allah.Wa harakat al‑jursaan tinsamiʼ wakit hu yadkhul fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas giddaam Allah wa wakit yamrug.Wa be da,hu ma yumuut.
 ‹ Wa sawwi hafiide min dahab saafi wa anguch foogha al‑kalaam al‑buguul Khaass le Allah.
Wa arbutha be habil zahri fi raas al‑kadmuul be giddaam.
Wa tagood fi jabhit Haaruun.Wa be da,hu yukuun al‑masʼuul min al‑khata al‑yisawwuuh Bani Israaʼiil wakit yigaddumu hadaayaahum al‑mukhaddasiin.Al‑hafiide di tagood daayman fi jabhit Haaruun achaan Allah yarda beehum.
 ‹ Wa khayyit jawwaaniiye min gumaach hana kattaan.Wa kadmuul kula min kattaan.Wa sawwi hizaam be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.
 ‹ Wa khayyit jawwaaniiye wa hizaam wa kadmuul le ayyi wileed min awlaad Haaruun le tantiihum charaf wa ihtiraam.
Wa baʼad tilabbis akhuuk Haaruun wa awlaadah al‑khulgaan dool,amsahhumwa darrijhum wa khassishum le yabgo leyi rujaal diin.
Wa khayyit leehum saraawiil min gumaach hana kattaan le yasturu beehum oorithum.Al‑saraawiil dool yikhattu al‑sulub wa l‑dawaarij.
Haaruun wa awlaadah yalbasoohum wakit yadkhulu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wa wakit yigarrubu le l‑madbah le yakhdumu.Wa be da,ma yaznubu wa yumuutu.Wa da chart daayim le Haaruun wa zurriiytah al‑taji min baʼadah.
 ‹ Daahu kikkeef tisawwi le tikhassis Haaruun wa awlaadah le yabgo leyi rujaal diin.Chiil toor wa kubchaan itneen al‑ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa chiil dagiig hana gameh wa sawwi beyah khubza bala tawwaara wa kaʼak bala tawwaara al‑tisawwiih be dihin wa kisaar mamsuuh be dihin.
Wa kulla l‑khumaam da,subbah fi soosal wa gaddimah be l‑soosal da maʼa l‑toor wa l‑kubchaan al‑itneen.
Wa naadi Haaruun wa awlaadah yaju fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa barridhum.
Wa chiil al‑khulgaan wa labbis Haaruun al‑jawwaaniiye wa l‑jallaabiiye wa l‑farmala wa l‑sideeriiye.Wa arbut al‑farmala be l‑hizaam.
Wa khutt al‑kadmuul fi raasah wa sabbit foogah al‑hafiide al‑mukhassasa.
Wa chiil dihin al‑masahaan wa subbah fi raasah wa amsahah.
Wa baʼad da,jiib awlaadah wa labbishum jawwaaniiyaat.
Wa ayyi waahid,arbut sulbah be hizaam wa khutt leyah kadmuul.Wa misil da,darrij leyi Haaruun wa awlaadah.Wa khidmit rujaal al‑diin tukuun leehum misil chart daayim.
 ‹ Wa battaan jiib al‑toor giddaam kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa khalli Haaruun wa awlaadah yukhuttu iideehum fi raas al‑toor da.
Wa adbah al‑toor giddaam Allah fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa chiil min damm al‑toor be usbaʼak wa khuttah fi guruun al‑madbah.Wa l‑baagi min al‑damm kamaan subbah fi gaʼar al‑madbah.
Wa chiil kulla l‑chaham al‑mukhatti al‑butuun wa nuss al‑kibde wa l‑kalaawe be chahamhum wa harrighum fi l‑madbah.
Wa laakin laham al‑toor wa farwitah wa baʼarah,harrighum barra min al‑fariig achaan di dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.
 ‹ Wa chiil waahid min al‑kubchaan al‑itneen wa khalli Haaruun wa awlaadah yukhuttu iideehum fi raasah.
Adbah al‑kabich wa chiil dammah wa ruchchah fi kulla nawaayit al‑madbah.
Wa gattiʼ laham al‑kabich da dugaag dugaag wa khassil butuunah wa dalaafeeh wa khuttuhum maʼa l‑raas wa l‑gitaʼ al‑aakhariin.
Wa harrig kulla l‑kabich da fi l‑madbah achaan di dahiiye muharraga le Allah al‑hu yarda be riihitha achaan hi hadiiye le Allah.
 ‹ Wa chiil al‑kabich al‑taani wa khalli Haaruun wa awlaadah yukhuttu iideehum fi raasah.
Adbah al‑kabich wa chiil min dammah wa khuttah fi halamat al‑adaan al‑zeene hana Haaruun wa awlaadah.Wa khuttah fi asaabiʼhum al‑kubaar hana iideehum wa rijleehum al‑zeenaayaat.Wa ruchch baagi al‑damm fi nawaayit al‑madbah.
Wa chiil min al‑damm al‑sabbeetah fi l‑madbah wa dihin al‑masahaan wa ruchchah fi Haaruun wa lubaasah wa fi awlaadah wa lubaashum.Wa be da,Haaruun wa awlaadah wa khulgaanhum yabgo mukhassasiin le Allah.
 ‹ Wa chiil min al‑kabich da chaham al‑danab wa l‑chaham al‑mukhatti al‑butuun wa nuss al‑kibde wa l‑kalaawe be chahamhum wa l‑gaayme al‑zeene.Wa da kabich hana darrijiin.
Wa chiil min al‑soosal al‑gaaʼid giddaam Allah khubza waahide wa kaʼakaay al‑sawwooha be dihin wa kisaaraay.
Wa khuttuhum fi iideen Haaruun wa awlaadah le yigaddumuuhum hadaaya marfuuʼiin le Allah.
Wa battaan chiil al‑hadaaya dool min iideehum wa harrighum fi l‑madbah maʼa l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga le Allah al‑hu yarda be riihitha achaan hi hadiiye le Allah.
Wa chiil zoor al‑kabich hana darrijiin Haaruun wa gaddimah hadiiye marfuuʼa le Allah.Wa da yabga hanaak inta.
 ‹ Wa min kabich al‑darrijiin hana Haaruun wa awlaadah,khassis al‑zoor wa l‑gaayme al‑gaddamtuhum hadiiye marfuuʼa.Dool yukuunu le Haaruun wa awlaadah.
Al‑laham da yabga hagg daayim le Haaruun wa awlaadah min kulla dahaaya al‑salaama al‑yadbahoohum Bani Israaʼiil wa yigaddumuuhum hadiiye le Allah.
 ‹ Wa ahfado al‑khulgaan al‑khaassiin hana Haaruun achaan ayyi waahid min awlaadah al‑yaji baʼadah yalbashum wakit yamsahooh wa yidarrujuuh.
Wa l‑wileed al‑yabga kabiir rujaal al‑diin baʼad Haaruun yalbashum sabʼa ayyaam gabul ma yadkhul fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa yakhdim fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.
 ‹ Wa laakin al‑laham al‑yifaddil min kabich al‑darrijiin,tichiilah wa tirakkibah fi bakaan mukhaddas.
Haaruun wa awlaadah yaakulu laham al‑kabich da wa l‑khubza al‑gaaʼide fi l‑soosal fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Humman yaakulu hadaaya al‑kaffaara dool wakit yidarrujuuhum wa yikhassusuuhum.Naadum aakhar ke ma yaakul minhum achaan al‑hadaaya dool mukhaddasiin.
Wa kan yifaddil cheyy min laham kabich al‑darrijiin aw min al‑khubza lahaddi ambaakir,ma yaakuluuh achaan da mukhaddas.Khalli yiharruguuh fi l‑naar.
 ‹ Sawwi le Haaruun wa awlaadah misil ana amartak beyah.Wa muddit darrijiinhum tukuun sabʼa yoom.
Wa gaddim kulla yoom toor dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.Wa khassis al‑madbah kula be dahiiyat al‑kaffaara wa amsahah le yukuun mukhaddas.
Fi muddit sabʼa yoom,tadbah dahiiyat al‑kaffaara fi l‑madbah wa tikhassisah.Wa be da,yukuun mukhaddas marra waahid.Wa kulla cheyy al‑yilammis al‑madbah yukuun mukhaddas.
 ‹ Daayman wa kulla yoom,gaddim fi l‑madbah khurfaan itneen awlaad sana.
Al‑kharuuf al‑waahid,gaddimah be fajur wa l‑aakhar be achiiye.
Wa maʼa l‑kharuuf al‑awwal,gaddim kooro hana dagiig mukhalbat be liitir hana dihin zaytuun maʼsuur.Wa gaddim maʼaayah liitir hana khamar al‑inab hadiiyat charaab.
Wa l‑kharuuf al‑taani,gaddimah be achiiye.Wa gaddim maʼaayah hadiiye hana dagiig wa hadiiyat charaab misil inta sawweetah be fajur.Wa hi hadiiye muharraga le Allah al‑hu yarda be riihitha.
Min zurriiye le zurriiye,gaddumu daayman al‑dahaaya al‑muharragiin dool fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ giddaam Allah.Wa da l‑bakaan al‑ana nigaabilak foogah le nikallimak.
Wa hinaak nigaabil Bani Israaʼiil wa be gudrat majdi,al‑bakaan da yabga mukhaddas.
Wa be da,nikhaddis kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa l‑madbah.Wa nikhassis Haaruun wa awlaadah le yabgo leyi rujaal diin.
Wa naskun maʼa Bani Israaʼiil wa nabga Ilaahhum.
Wa be da,yaʼarfu kadar ana bas Allah Ilaahhum al‑maragtuhum min balad Masir le naskun maʼaahum.Ana Allah Ilaahhum.
 ‹ Wa sawwi mukhbar min khachab al‑sunt le tiharrig foogah al‑bakhuur.
Wa l‑mukhbar da yukuun murabbaʼ tuulah duraaʼ wa urdah kula duraaʼ.Wa tuulah foog kamaan duraaʼeen.Wa l‑mukhbar da yukuun hu wa guruunah sunʼa waahide bas.
Wa amsah daharah wa kulla jawaanibah wa guruunah be dahab saafi.Wa darris khachmah kula be dahab.
Wa sawwi leyah khawaatim itneen tihit min al‑diraasa be l‑jaanib al‑waahid wa be l‑jaanib al‑aakhar kula.Wa be da,yagdaro yidakhkhulu le l‑mukhbar iidaan itneen le yichiiluuh beehum.
Wa sawwi al‑iidaan al‑itneen dool be hatab al‑sunt wa amsahhum be dahab.
Wa khutt al‑mukhbar da barra min al‑sitaar al‑gaaʼid giddaam al‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada.Al‑sanduug wa sidaadtah gaaʼidiin wara l‑sitaar.Wa da l‑bakaan al‑ana nigaabilak foogah.
 ‹ Haaruun yiharrig al‑bakhuur al‑muʼattar da kulli fajur wakit yaji yinaddif al‑faanuus.
Wa battaan yiharrigah achiiye wakit yaji yigabbid al‑faanuus.Al‑bakhuur yiharruguuh daayman fajur wa achiiye giddaam Allah min zurriiye le zurriiye.
Ma tiharrig fi l‑mukhbar da bakhuur al‑Allah ma azan beyah wa la dahiiye muharraga wa la hadiiye hana dagiig.Wa ma tusubbu foogah hadiiyat charaab.
Wa marra fi l‑sana,Haaruun waajib yichiil min damm hana l‑bahiime al‑dabahooha le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa yamsahah fi guruun al‑mukhbar da.Wa be da,hu yikhassis al‑mukhbar marra waahide fi l‑sana,min zurriiye le zurriiye.Wa l‑mukhbar da yabga mukhaddas marra waahid le Allah.› 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Wakit tahsib Bani Israaʼiil le talga adadhum,khalli kulla raajil yafda nafsah wa yigaddim fidya le Allah achaan ma yagaʼ fooghum waba wakit inta gaaʼid tahsibhum.
Ayyi waahid kan hasabooh khalaas,yanti nuss hajar hana fudda hadiiye le Allah.Wa hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas,ayyi hajar fudda yawzin 12 giraam.
Wa ayyi waahid al‑umrah tamma 20 sana wa ziyaada kan hasabooh khalaas,waajib yanti hadiiye le Allah.
Al‑khani ma yanti aktar min nuss hajar wa l‑fagri kula ma yanti angas achaan di hadiiye le Allah al‑tabga kaffaara le nufuushum.
Chiil al‑fudda hana l‑kaffaara di min Bani Israaʼiil wa astaʼmalha le khidmit kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Wa tabga kaffaara le Bani Israaʼiil wa zikra giddaam Allah. 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Asnaʼ hoot min nahaas le l‑wadu.Wa sawwi leyah gaʼar min nahaas wa khuttah been kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa l‑madbah.Wa subb foogah almi.
Wa Haaruun wa awlaadah yilwaddo be l‑almi da.
Gubbaal ma yadkhulu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ,yilwaddo achaan ma yumuutu.Wa gubbaal ma yaju gariib le l‑madbah le yigaddumu le Allah hadiiye muharraga,
yilwaddo achaan ma yumuutu.Wa da yabga chart daayim le Haaruun wa awlaadah min zurriiye le zurriiye. 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Chiil min ahsan al‑riihe.Chiil min al‑khumra 6 kiilo wa min al‑sandal 3 kiilo wa min al‑itir 3 kiilo
wa min al‑girfa 3 kiilo.Wa da kula hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.Wa chiil battaan 4 liitir min dihin al‑zaytuun.
Wa da kulla khalbitah sawa wa sawwi beyah dihin muʼattar khaass le l‑masahaan.Wa l‑yisawwi al‑dihin da,naadum maʼruuf fi khalbitiin al‑itir.Wa da yabga dihin khaass le l‑masahaan.
Wa be l‑dihin al‑khaass da,amsah kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa l‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada
wa l‑tarabeeza wa kulla muʼiddaatha wa l‑faanuus wa muʼiddaatah wa mukhbar al‑bakhuur.
Wa battaan amsah al‑madbah hana l‑dahaaya al‑muharragiin wa muʼiddaatah wa l‑hoot wa gaʼarah kula.
Wa khassishum le yukuunu mukhaddasiin marra waahid.Wa l‑cheyy al‑yilammishum kula yabga mukhaddas.
Wa baʼad da,amsah Haaruun wa awlaadah wa khassishum achaan yabgo leyi rujaal diin.
Wa guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Dihin al‑masahaan da yabga leyi khaass min zurriiye le zurriiye.
Ma tamsaho beyah ayyi naadum wa la tikhalbutu dihin aakhar mislah.Hu khaass wa waajib intu kula taʼarfu kadar hu khaass.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑yikhalbit dihin mislah aw yamsahah le naadum ma min rujaal al‑diin,al‑naadum da waajib yafsuluuh min ahalah.› 
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Chiil fi wazin mutasaawi al‑aryaah dool wa humman al‑samukh wa l‑dufur wa l‑lubaan wa l‑samukh al‑muʼattar.
Wa khalbit minhum bakhuur muʼattar.Wa l‑yisawwi al‑bakhuur da,naadum maʼruuf fi khalbitiin al‑itir.Wa yukuun sameh wa saafi wa khaass.
Wa chiil minnah wa arhakah maarin wa khuttah giddaam al‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa da l‑bakaan al‑ana nigaabilak foogah.Wa da khalli yabga leeku mukhaddas marra waahid.
Wa ma tisawwu le nufuusku bakhuur misil al‑bakhuur da wa laakin ajʼalooh khaass le Allah.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑yisawwi bakhuur mislah le yuchummah,waajib yafsuluuh min ahalah. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa battaan wa gaal :
 Asmaʼ.Ana azalt Basaliil wileed Uuri wileed Huur min gabiilat Yahuuza.
Ana nazzalt Ruuhi foogah wa anteetah khibra wa fihim wa maʼrafa le yasnaʼ kulli cheyy.
Wa da,yaʼarif yasnaʼ achya be dahab wa fudda wa nahaas
wa yagtaʼ al‑hujaar al‑khaaliyiin wa yanguchhum wa yanjur al‑khachab wa yasnaʼ kulla cheyy.
Wa be da,ana kallaft Uhuliyaab wileed Akhisamaak min gabiilat Daan le yisaaʼidah.Wa battaan,ana anteet khibra le kulla l‑sinaaʼiyiin le yisawwu kulla l‑achya al‑ana amartak beehum.Wa humman
kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼwa l‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahadawa sidaadtah al‑yisidduuh beehawa kulla muʼiddaat al‑kheema
wa l‑tarabeeza wa kulla muʼiddaathawa l‑faanuus hana l‑dahab al‑saafi wa kulla muʼiddaatahwa mukhbar al‑bakhuur
wa l‑madbah hana l‑dahaaya al‑muharragiin wa kulla muʼiddaatahwa l‑hoot wa gaʼarah
wa l‑khulgaan al‑khaaliyiin al‑khaassiin le Haaruun raajil al‑diinwa khulgaan iyaalah wakit yakhdumu misil rujaal diin
wa dihin al‑masahaanwa l‑bakhuur al‑muʼattar al‑yiharruguuh fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas. Wa humman yisawwu kulla l‑achya dool misil ana amartak beyah. 
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Ahfado yoomi hana l‑sabt achaan ana jaʼaltah alaama beeni wa beenku min zurriiye le zurriiye.Wa be da,taʼarfu kadar ana Allah bas nikhassisku.
Wa ahfado yoom al‑sabt achaan hu yoom mukhaddas leeku.Kan naadum ma yihtarim yoom al‑sabt,waajib yaktuluuh.Wa kan naadum yisawwi ayyi khidme fi l‑yoom da,waajib yafsuluuh min ahalah.
Fi sitte yoom,sawwu khidmitku wa laakin al‑yoom al‑saabiʼ da,hu sabt.Hu yoom hana raaha,mukhaddas le Allah.Wa kan naadum sawwa ayyi amal fi yoom al‑sabt da,waajib yaktuluuh.
Khalli Bani Israaʼiil yahfado yoom al‑sabt wa yiʼayyuduuh min zurriiye le zurriiye misil muʼaahada daayme.
Wa hu yabga alaama daayme beeni wa been Bani Israaʼiil achaan ana Allah khalagt al‑samaawaat wa l‑ard fi sitte yoom.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ kamaan,ana ma khalagt cheyy.Wa be da,ana jaʼaltah yoom hana raaha.› 
Wa wakit Allah kammal kalaamah maʼa Muusa fi jabal Siinaaʼ,antaah liihaan al‑muʼaahada.Wa humman liihaan itneen hana hajar al‑Allah zaatah katab fooghum kalaamah.
Wa wakit al‑chaʼab chaafo Muusa ma nazal leehum ajala min al‑jabal,humman jo le Haaruun wa gaalo leyah : Gumm sawwi leena sanam naʼabuduuh.Wa yuguudna fi machiina achaan al‑naadum al‑yuguulu leyah Muusa da,hu bas al‑maragaana min balad Masir wa laakin hassaʼ da,ma naʼarfu chunu al‑bigi leyah. 
Wa Haaruun radda leehum wa gaal : Sillu al‑khuruus hana l‑dahab al‑fi udne awiinku wa awlaadku wa banaatku wa jiibuuhum leyi. 
Wa kulla l‑chaʼab sallo al‑khuruus hana l‑dahab al‑fi udneehum wa antoohum le Haaruun.
Wa hu chaal minhum al‑dahab da wa gataʼah wa sabbaah fi gaalib wa sanaʼ beyah sanam hana ijil.Wa humman gaalo : Ya Bani Israaʼiil,al‑sanam da bas ilaahku al‑maragaaku min balad Masir ! 
Wa wakit Haaruun chaaf al‑cheyy da,bana madbah giddaam al‑ijil.Wa hajja le l‑naas wa gaal : Ambaakir iid le ilaahna ! 
Wa ambaakir be fajur,humman gaddamo dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya salaama.Wa baʼad da,akalo wa chirbo wa gammo yalʼabo.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Gumm anzil achaan chaʼabak al‑inta maragtuhum min balad Masir tallafo khalaas.
Wa ajala ke bas talago al‑derib al‑ana amartuhum beyah wa sanaʼo leehum sanam hana ijil wa sajado giddaamah.Wa gaddamo leyah dahaaya wa gaalo :‹ Ya Bani Israaʼiil,al‑sanam da bas ilaahku al‑maragaaku min balad Masir !› 
Wa Allah gaal battaan le Muusa : Ana chift chaʼabak da,humman raashum gawi.
Wa hassaʼ da,khalli khadabi yanzil fooghum wa nidammirhum marra waahid.Wa laakin minnak inta kamaan,namrug umma kabiire. 
Wa Muusa chahad Allah Ilaahah fi chaan chaʼabah wa gaal : Ya Allah,maala khadabak yanzil fi chaʼabak al‑inta maragtuhum min balad Masir be gudra kabiire wa iid chadiide ?
Wa maala tikhalli al‑Masriyiin yichchammato foogna wa yuguulu :‹ Achaan Allah ma yidoorhum bas hu maragaahum min hini wa waddaahum le yaktulhum fi lubb al‑jibaal.Wa be da,hu yuguchchuhum marra waahid min al‑ard.› Ya Rabb,ma takhdab le chaʼabak wa khalli khadabak al‑awwal kharrart tinazzilah fooghum.
Wa fakkir fi abiidak Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub al‑inta zaatak halaft leehum wa gult :‹ Nisawwi zurriiyitku katiire misil nujuum al‑sama.Wa nantiihum kulla l‑balad al‑ana waaʼadtuhum beeha.Wa hi tabga warasathum le l‑abad.› 
Wa khalaas,Allah khalla khadabah al‑awwal kharrar yinazzilah fi chaʼabah.
Wa baʼad da,Muusa nazal min al‑jabal wa fi iidah al‑liihaan al‑itneen hana l‑muʼaahada.Wa l‑liihaan dool maktuubiin jaay wa jaay.
Wa l‑Rabb bas sawwaahum wa katab fooghum.
Wa wakit gaaʼidiin yanzulu,Yachuuʼsimiʼ harakat al‑chaʼab wa gaal le Muusa : Ana gaaʼid nasmaʼ haraka hint harib fi l‑fariig. 
Wa Muusa radda leyah wa gaal : Al‑haraka di wa la hint nasurwa la hint haziime.Al‑haraka al‑ana gaaʼid nasmaʼha di,hint khine. 
Wa wakit Muusa ja gariib le l‑fariig wa chaaf al‑ijil wa l‑naas gaaʼidiin yalʼabo,hu ziʼil zaʼal chadiid.Wa l‑liihaan al‑fi iidah zagalaahum fi gaʼar al‑jabal wa kassaraahum.
Wa hu chaal al‑ijil al‑humman sanaʼooh wa harragah fi l‑naar wa rihikah lahaddi bigi dagiig wa sabbaah fi almi wa zagaah le Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Muusa gaal le Haaruun : Al‑chaʼab dool sawwo leek chunu lahaddi tijiibhum le zanib kabiir misil da ? 
Wa Haaruun radda leyah wa gaal : Ma tazʼal,ya siidi !Inta zaatak taʼarfah al‑chaʼab dool yiriidu illa l‑fasaala.
Wa humman gaalo leyi :‹ Sawwi leena sanam naʼabuduuh.Wa yuguudna fi machiina achaan al‑naadum al‑yuguulu leyah Muusa da,hu bas al‑maragaana min balad Masir wa laakin hassaʼ ma naʼarfu chunu al‑bigi leyah. ›
Wa ana gult leehum :‹ Al‑naadum al‑indah dahab khalli yisillah wa yantiih leyi.› Wa ana zagaltah fi l‑naar wa tawwaali ke,marag al‑ijil da ! 
Wa khalaas,Muusa irif kadar al‑chaʼab gaaʼidiin yisawwu ayyi cheyy bala huduud.Wa Haaruun kula ma gidir leehum.Wa be da,udwaanhum gaaʼidiin yichchammato leehum.
Wa Muusa wagaf fi madkhal al‑fariig wa gaal : Ayyi naadum minku al‑yitaabiʼ Allah,khalli yaji leyi. Wa khalaas,kulla rujaal al‑Laawiyiin jo leyah wa wagafo maʼaayah.
Wa hu gaal leehum : Daahu Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil gaal :‹ Khalli ayyi waahid minku yichiil seefah wa yuchugg kulla l‑fariig wa yaktul akhuuh wa rafiigah wa jaarah.› 
Wa khalaas,al‑Laawiyiin tabbago kalaam Muusa.Wa fi l‑yoom da,katalo hawaale 3 000 raajil.
Wa Muusa gaal le l‑Laawiyiin : Min al‑yoom,khassastu nufuusku le Allah achaan intu gammeetu ayyi waahid didd wileedah wa didd akhuuh.Wa be da,Allah antaaku baraka. 
Wa ambaakir be fajur,Muusa gaal le l‑chaʼab : Intu sawweetu zanib kabiir.Hassaʼ da,ana narkab al‑jabal wa nisawwi leeku kaffaara.Akuun Allah yakhfir leeku zanibku. 
Wa Muusa gabbal le Allah wa chahadah wa gaal : Ya Rabb,chaʼabak dool sawwo zanib kabiir.Sawwo leehum ilaah min dahab le yaʼabuduuh.
Ya Rabb,akhfir leehum zanibhum !Aw guchch usmi min kitaabak al‑inta katabtah. 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Illa l‑naadum al‑aznab giddaami,ana nuguchch usmah min kitaabi.
Wa hassaʼ da,amchi guud al‑chaʼab wa waddiihum fi l‑bakaan al‑ana gultah leek.Wa malaki yuguudku fi machiiku.Wa laakin yoom nugumm,niʼaakhib al‑chaʼab da be sabab zanibhum. 
Wa khalaas,Allah nazzal waba fi l‑chaʼab achaan abado al‑ijil al‑Haaruun sanaʼah leehum.
Wa baʼad da,battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Amchi min hini inta wa l‑chaʼab al‑inta maragtuhum min balad Masir.Wa gummu amchu le l‑balad al‑ana halaft le Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub wa gult nantiiha le zurriiyithum.
Wa ana nirassil giddaamak malak wa natrud al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin.
Wa baʼad da,intu tamchu le l‑balad al‑malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal.Wa laakin ana ma namchi maʼaaku achaan ma naktulku fi l‑derib be sabab intu chaʼab raasku gawi. 
Wa wakit al‑chaʼab simʼo al‑kalaam da,bigi leehum gaasi wa gammo yabku wa naadum minhum libis ziintah kula ma fiih.
Wa da achaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Intu chaʼab raasku gawi.Kan ana macheet maʼaaku le wakit chiyya kula,naktulku.Hassaʼ da,sillu minku ziinitku.Wa ana nichiif kikkeef nisawwi leeku.› 
Wa khalaas min al‑yoom da fi jabal Huuriib,Bani Israaʼiil sallo ziinithum wa ma libsooha battaan.
Wa ayyi wakit kan al‑chaʼab nazalo fi bakaan,Muusa yichiil al‑kheema wa yabniiha barra baʼiid min al‑fariig.Wa Muusa sammaaha kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Wa ayyi naadum kan dawwar yasʼal Allah,yamchi leeha barra min al‑fariig.
Wa fi ayyi wakit kan Muusa marag maachi le l‑kheema di,kulla l‑chaʼab yagiifu ayyi waahid fi khachum baab kheemtah wa yichiif Muusa lahaddi yadkhul fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa wakit Muusa yadkhul fi l‑kheema di,amuud al‑sahaab yanzil wa yagiif fi khachum baab al‑kheema.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Allah yikallim maʼa Muusa.
Wa wakit kulla l‑chaʼab yichiifu amuud al‑sahaab waagif fi baab al‑kheema,kulluhum yasjudu ayyi waahid fi khachum baab kheemtah.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Allah yikallim maʼa Muusa khachum be khachum misil naadum yikallim maʼa rafiigah.Wa kan Muusa gabbal le l‑fariig kula,musaaʼidah al‑sabi al‑usmah Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun yagood daayman fi l‑kheema.
Wa Muusa gaal le Allah : Inta dawwart minni ana nuguud al‑chaʼab da.Wa laakin ma arraftini yaatu al‑tirassilah maʼaayi.Wa battaan inta gult leyi :‹ Ana bas azaltak wa ridiit leek. ›
Wa kan sahiih ke inta ridiit leyi,arrifni derbak achaan naʼarfak wa inta tarda leyi daayman.Wa fakkir fi l‑umma di achaan hi chaʼabak. 
Wa Allah gaal : Ana zaati namchi giddaamak wa be da,inta ma tihimm. 
Wa Muusa gaal : Kan inta be nafsak ma tamchi maʼaana,ma tamrugna min hini.
Wa kan inta ma tamchi maʼaana,kikkeef naadum yagdar yaʼarif kadar inta ridiit leyi wa le chaʼabak ?Wa kikkeef yagdaro yifannuduuna ana wa chaʼabak min kulla chuʼuub al‑ard al‑aakhariin ? 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Al‑cheyy al‑inta talabtah da,ana nisawwiih achaan ana ridiit leek wa ana bas azaltak. 
Wa Muusa gaal : Khalliini nichiif azamatak. 
Wa Allah gaal : Niwassifak kulla kheeri wa niʼaalin leek usmi hu Allah.Wa ana nihinn ayyi naadum al‑nidoor nihinnah wa narham ayyi naadum al‑nidoor narhamah.
Wa laakin ma tagdar tichiif wijhi achaan kan insaan chaaf wijhi,battaan ma yiʼiich. 
Wa Allah gaal battaan : Daahu fi bakaan gariib leyi fi l‑hajar.Agiif foogah.
Wa wakit azamati tufuut giddaamak,nukhuttak fi faragat al‑hajar wa nikhattiik be iidi.Wa baʼad azamati tufuut khalaas,
ana narfaʼ iidi wa tichiif azamati be wara.Achaan wijhi,naadum ma yagdar yichiifah. 
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Sawwi liihaan itneen hana hajar misil al‑liihaan al‑awwal.Wa ana naktib fooghum al‑wasaaya al‑awwal katabtuhum fi l‑liihaan al‑itneen al‑inta kassartuhum.
Wa jahhiz nafsak.Ambaakir fajur,atlaʼ fi jabal Siinaaʼ wa taʼaal leyi fi raas al‑jabal.
Khalli naadum ma yatlaʼ maʼaak wa la yinchaaf fi ayyi bakaan fi l‑jabal.Wa l‑khanam wa l‑bagar kula ma yasraho ale l‑jabal da. 
Wa Muusa sawwa liihaan itneen hana hajar misil al‑liihaan al‑awwal.Wa ambaakir fajur,rikib fi jabal Siinaaʼ.Wa chaal al‑liihaan dool fi iidah misil Allah amarah beyah.
Wa khalaas,Allah nazal fi amuud al‑sahaab fi l‑bakaan al‑Muusa waagif foogah.Wa aalan usmah hu Allah.
Wa faat giddaam Muusa wa aalan wa gaal : Ana Allah !Ana Allah al‑Rahmaan al‑Rahiim wa l‑Sabuur wa l‑Muhibb wa l‑Amiin.
Niwassif kheeri al‑daayim le aalaaf al‑zurriiyaat wa nakhfir al‑khata wa l‑isyaan wa l‑zunuub.Wa laakin al‑muznib ma najʼalah bari.Niʼaakhib al‑iyaal wa iyaal al‑iyaal be zunuub abbahaathum lahaddi l‑zurriiye al‑taalta wa l‑raabʼe. 
Wa tawwaali,Muusa dangar fi l‑ard wa sajad le Allah
wa gaal : Ya Rabb,kan inta ridiit leyi,amchi maʼaana.Ya Rabb,hatta kan aniina chaʼabak raasna gawi kula,akhfir leena khataayaana wa zunuubna.Wa ajʼalna chaʼabak al‑halaalak. 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Daahu ana nisawwi maʼaaku muʼaahada.Nisawwi ajaayib giddaam kulla chaʼabak al‑abadan ma bigo fi umam al‑ard.Wa l‑chaʼab al‑inta gaaʼid fi usuthum yichiifu kulla l‑fiʼil al‑ajiib al‑bikhawwif al‑ana Allah nisawwiih beek inta.
Khalli yitabbugu daayman kalaami al‑nuguulah leek al‑yoom.Wa be da,ana natrud min giddaamku al‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin.
 Angarʼu ma tisawwu alaakha maʼa sukkaan al‑balad al‑intu maachiin leeha achaan humman ma yabgo leeku charak.
Wa laakin haddumu madaabihhum wa armu hujaarhum al‑khazzoohum wa kassuru iidaanhum al‑khazzoohum le ibaadat Achiira.
Ma taʼabudu ilaah aakhar balaayi ana Allah achaan ana khayyuur yaʼni ma nidoor yaʼabudu ilaah aakhar.
 Angarʼu ma tisawwu alaakha maʼa sukkaan al‑balad di achaan wakit yichcharmato maʼa ilaahaathum wa yaʼabuduuhum wa yigaddumu leehum dahaaya,yaʼazumuuku le taakulu maʼaahum dahaayaahum.
Wa akuun taakhudu banaathum le awlaadku.Wa kan banaathum yichcharmato maʼa asnaamhum wa yaʼabuduuhum,awlaadku kula yisawwu nafs al‑cheyy.
 Ma tasnaʼo leeku asnaam hana hadiid.
 Ayyudu iid al‑Khubza bala Tawwaara.Fi sabʼa yoom,aakulu khubza bala tawwaara misil ana amartuku beyah.Wa da fi l‑wakit al‑muhaddad fi chahar al‑Ganaadiil.Wa da bas al‑chahar al‑intu maragtu beyah min balad Masir.
 Kulla awlaad al‑bikir yabgo hineeyi ana Allah hatta awlaad al‑bikir min al‑bahaayim kan min al‑bagar walla min al‑khanam kula.
Wa ayyi wald bikir hana hamiir,chiilu fi badalah kharuuf.Wa kan ma baddaltuuh kamaan,aksuru ragabatah.Wa laakin ayyi wald bikir min iyaalku intu al‑insaan,afdooh. Ma taju giddaami iideeku yaabsiin.
 Akhdumu le muddit sitte yoom wa l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ kamaan,anjammo.Hatta fi l‑hiraate aw fi l‑gatiʼ kula,fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ da,waajib tinjammo.
 Ayyudu iid al‑Gatiʼ wa gaddumu leyi awwal intaaj al‑gameh al‑intu gataʼtuuh min al‑zereʼ.Wa baʼad da,ayyudu iid al‑Lammiin wa da yabga fi aakhir khidmit al‑ziraaʼa.
Talaata marraat fi l‑sana,ayyi dakar minku yaji giddaami le yaʼabudni ana Allah al‑Rabb Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa ana natrud al‑umam min giddaamku wa niwassiʼ baladku.Wa naadum waahid kula ma yatmaʼ fi arduku wakit taju giddaami ana Allah Ilaahku talaata marraat fi l‑sana.
 Ma tigaddumu leyi damm al‑dahiiye maʼa ayyi cheyy al‑indah tawwaara.Wa ma tikhallu chaham dahiiyat iid al‑Fisha yargud lahaddi fajur.
Wa gaddumu awwal intaaj ziraaʼitku le beet Allah Ilaahku. Wa ma tirakkubu laham al‑sakhal fi laban ammah. 
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Aktib al‑kalaam da wa da yabga asaas al‑muʼaahada al‑sawweetha maʼaak inta wa Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa Muusa gaʼad maʼa Allah 40 nahaar wa 40 leele.Wa la akal khubza wa la chirib almi.Wa katab fi l‑liihaan kalaam al‑muʼaahada wa hu al‑wasaaya al‑achara.
Wa khalaas wakit Muusa nazal min jabal Siinaaʼ wa liihaan al‑muʼaahada fi iideenah,hu ma irif kadar wijhah gaaʼid yiraari be sabab hu kallam maʼa Allah.
Wa wakit Haaruun wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil chaafo wijih Muusa gaaʼid yiraari,khaafo ma garrabo leyah.
Wa laakin hu naadaahum wa fi l‑bakaan da,Haaruun wa kulla chuyuukh al‑mujtamaʼ jo leyah.Wa hu kallam maʼaahum.
Wa baʼad da,kulla Bani Israaʼiil jo leyah gariib.Wa hu wassaahum be kulla l‑wasaaya al‑Allah gaalaahum leyah fi jabal Siinaaʼ.
Wakit Muusa kammal kalaamah maʼaahum,khatta minhum wijhah be mindiil.
Wa ayyi wakit kan Muusa yidoor yagiif giddaam Allah le yikallim maʼaayah,yarfaʼ al‑mindiil min wijhah lahaddi yamrug min hadarat Allah.Wa hu yikallim le Bani Israaʼiil be l‑wasaaya al‑Allah amarah beehum.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Bani Israaʼiil yichiifu wijhah al‑gaaʼid yiraari.Wa baʼad da,hu yukhutt al‑mindiil fi wijhah lahaddi yaji yikallim maʼa Allah battaan.
Wa Muusa lamma kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal leehum : Dool humman al‑churuut al‑Allah amaraaku le takhdumu beehum.
Fi sitte yoom sawwu khidmitku.Wa laakin fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,da sabt hana raaha wa hu mukhassas le Allah.Wa kan naadum sawwa ayyi amal fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ da,waajib yaktuluuh.
Wa fi yoom al‑sabt,naar kula ma tiʼooguduuha fi buyuutku. 
Wa Muusa gaal le kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil : Da bas al‑cheyy al‑Allah amaraaku beyah.
Gaddumu hadiiye le Allah.Wa ayyi naadum minku al‑galbah kariim khalli yijiib hadiiye le Allah. Al‑hadaaya dool hummandahab wa fudda wa nahaas
wa gumaach zahri wa garadi wa ahmarwa gumaach kattaan wa suuf inze
wa firaaw kubaach madbuukhiin wa mulawwaniin be loon ahmarwa farwa hint ijil al‑baharwa hatab hana chadar al‑sunt
wa dihin le l‑faanuuswa itir le dihin al‑masahaanwa itir le l‑bakhuur al‑muʼattar
wa hajar al‑usmah agiigwa hujaar aakhariin khaaliyiin le yijammulu beehum al‑farmala wa l‑sideeriiye hana kabiir rujaal al‑diin.
 Wa khalli kulla l‑sinaaʼiyiin minku yaju le yasnaʼo al‑cheyy al‑amar beyah Allah.
Wa dool al‑achya al‑yasnaʼoohum.Al‑achya al‑yabnu beehum al‑kheema min daakhal wa min barrawa khita al‑kheema wa fangarhawa khachabha wa maraadiisha wa amadha wa asaasha
wa l‑sanduug wa iidaanah wa sidaadtah wa l‑sitaar al‑yidaarig al‑sanduug
wa l‑tarabeeza wa iidaanha wa kulla muʼiddaathawa l‑khubza al‑yigaddumuuha le Allah
wa l‑faanuus wa muʼiddaatah wa niiraanah wa dihnah
wa mukhbar al‑bakhuur wa iidaanahwa dihin al‑masahaan wa l‑bakhuur al‑muʼattarwa l‑sitaar le baab al‑kheema
wa l‑madbah hana l‑dahaaya al‑muharragiin wa tachaachtah min nahaas wa iidaanah wa kulla muʼiddaatahwa hoot le l‑wadu wa gaʼarah
wa l‑sataayir al‑muhawwigiin beehum al‑fadaay wa amadhum wa asaashumwa sitaar hana baab al‑fadaay
wa wutaad al‑kheemawa wutaad sataayir al‑fadaay wa hubaalhum
wa khulgaan le l‑khidme fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.Wa dool khulgaan al‑khaassiin le Haaruun raajil al‑diin wa khulgaan le awlaadah wakit yakhdumu misil rujaal diin. 
Wa baʼad Muusa kammal kalaamah khalaas,kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil gammo macho minnah
wa kulla insaan indah niiye wa galbah kariim jaab hadiiye le Allah achaan yisawwu beeha kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa kulla muʼiddaatha wa khulgaan khaassiin.
Wa kulla l‑naas jo awiin wa rujaal anto hadiiye be juud wa karam.Wa ayyi naadum indah galib kariim anta khuruus aw chinif aw khaatim aw hafiide aw ayyi cheyy aakhar hana dahab.Ayyi naadum minhum gaddam dahab hadiiye marfuuʼa le Allah.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑indah gumaach zahri aw garadi aw ahmar aw gumaach hana kattaan aw suuf inze aw firaaw kubaach madbuukhiin wa mulawwaniin be loon ahmar aw farwa hana ijil al‑bahar kula jaabah hadiiye.
Wa naas waahidiin jaabo hadiiye hana fudda aw nahaas wa antooha le Allah.Wa ayyi naadum al‑indah khachab al‑sunt al‑yanfaʼ le ayyi khidme jaabah hadiiye.
Wa ayyi mara al‑indaha khibra fi khiyaatit al‑gumaach khayyatat be iidha wa jaabatah hadiiye.Wa l‑gumaach da hana kattaan wa loonah zahri aw garadi aw ahmar.
Wa ayyi mara al‑indaha niiye wa indaha khibra tarrat suuf inze.
Wa chuyuukh al‑chaʼab jaabo hujaar agiig wa hujaar aakhariin khaaliyiin le yurussuuhum fi l‑farmala hana raajil al‑diin wa fi l‑sideeriiye.
Wa anto battaan aryaah wa dihin le l‑faanuus wa dihin le l‑masahaan wa itir le l‑bakhuur al‑muʼattar.
Wa kulla insaan min Bani Israaʼiil al‑indah niiye,kan raajil walla mara kula,jaab cheyy le l‑khidme al‑amaraahum beeha Allah be waasitat Muusa.
Wa Muusa gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Asmaʼo.Daahu Allah azal Basaliil wileed Uuri wileed Huur min gabiilat Yahuuza.
Wa hu nazzal Ruuhah foogah wa antaah khibra wa fihim wa maʼrafa le yasnaʼ kulla cheyy
wa da,le yasnaʼ achya be dahab wa fudda wa nahaas
wa le yagtaʼ al‑hujaar al‑khaaliyiin wa yanguchhum wa yanjur al‑khachab wa yasnaʼ kulla cheyy.
Wa be da,Allah anta ilim le Basaliil wa Uhuliyaab wileed Akhisamaak min gabiilat Daan le yiʼallumu naas aakhariin.
Wa hu antaahum khibra achaan yanguchu wa yarsumu wa yikhayyutu gumaach kattaan al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar wa yitirru gabag wa yikhayyutu wa yasnaʼo kulli cheyy. 
Wa misil Allah amaraahum beyah,Basaliil wa Uhuliyaab wa sinaaʼiyiin aakhariin al‑Allah antaahum khibra wa fihim le yisawwu khidimtah gammo be buna kheemat al‑ibaada.
Wa Muusa naada Basaliil wa Uhuliyaab wa l‑sinaaʼiyiin al‑aakhariin al‑Allah antaahum khibra wa ayyi naadum al‑indah niiye achaan yaju leyah wa yugummu be l‑khidme.
Wa humman ligo min Muusa kulla l‑hadaaya al‑Bani Israaʼiil jaaboohum le buna al‑kheema.Wa kulla yoom al‑naas gaaʼidiin yijiibu be niiyithum hadaaya aakhariin.
Wa khalaas kulla l‑sinaaʼiyiin al‑gammo be buna al‑kheema ayyi waahid waggaf khidimtah wa ja.
Wa gaalo le Muusa : Bani Israaʼiil jaabo hadaaya aktar min al‑yakfi le l‑amal al‑Allah amar beyah. 
Wa Muusa kallam fi l‑fariig wa gaal : Khalli kulla l‑naas yiwaggufu al‑hadaaya al‑yijiibuuhum le kheemat al‑ibaada. Wa khalaas kulla l‑naas ma jaabo hadaaya battaan.
Achaan al‑hadaaya al‑jaaboohum yakfu le buna al‑kheema wa yifaddulu kula.
Wa kulla l‑sinaaʼiyiin gammo le buna al‑kheema.Wa sawwooha be achara gitʼe min gumaach hana kattaan mukhayyat adiil al‑loonah zahri wa garadi wa ahmar.Wa khayyato fi l‑gitaʼ dool suwar makhluugiin samaawiyiin be khiyaatit khayyaati maʼruuf.
Wa tuul al‑gitaʼ dool sawa sawa.Ayyi waahide tuulha 28 duraaʼ wa urdaha 4 duraaʼ.
Wa l‑gitaʼ dool,khamsa lammoohum sawa fi majmuuʼa waahide wa l‑khamsa al‑aakhariin kula lammoohum sawa.
Wa kachkacho taraf al‑khamsa be gumaach zahri wa taraf al‑khamsa al‑aakhariin kula kachkachoohum be nafs al‑gumaach.
Sawwo 50 manaakhir fi l‑majmuuʼa al‑awwal wa 50 manaakhir fi l‑majmuuʼa al‑taaniye.Wa khalaas al‑manaakhir dool bigo mulgaabiliin.
Wa sawwo 50 fangar hana dahab wa chabako beyah al‑manaakhir kulli waahide maʼa l‑aakhara.Wa be da,al‑majmuuʼteen bigo kheema waahide.
Wa sawwo al‑khita al‑awwal le l‑kheema min 11 gitʼe matruuriin be suuf inze.Wa khattooh be foog le l‑kheema.
