Wa kan al‑raajil al‑mubajjil yabzukh fi naadum taahir,al‑naadum da waajib yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad.Wa be da kula,yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa ayyi sarj al‑yarkab foogah al‑naadum al‑mubajjil yukuun nijis.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑yalmas ayyi cheyy al‑gaaʼid tihit al‑naadum al‑mubajjil yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.Wa l‑naadum al‑yichiil al‑achya dool,waajib yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad.Wa be da kula,yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa kan al‑naadum al‑mubajjil yalmas ayyi naadum gubbaal ma yikhassil iideenah be almi,waajib al‑naadum da yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad.Wa be da kula,yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa l‑maaʼuun hana l‑tiine al‑lammasah al‑naadum al‑mubajjil,waajib yikassuruuh.Wa ayyi maaʼuun hana hatab,waajib yikhassuluuh be almi.
 Wa wakit al‑naadum al‑mubajjil yittahhar min bajalah,waajib yahsib sabʼa yoom le tihaartah wa yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad be almi nadiif.Wa baʼad da,yabga taahir.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taamin,hu yichiil itneen gimri aw itneen hamaam wa yamchi fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ giddaam Allah wa yantiih le raajil al‑diin.
Wa raajil al‑diin yigaddim al‑waahide dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa l‑aakhara dahiiye muharraga.Wa hu yisawwi leyah kaffaara giddaam Allah fi chaan bajalah.
 Wa kan naadum marag minnah mani,waajib yilbarrad.Wa be da kula,yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa ayyi khalag aw ayyi farwa al‑yalmasha mani,yikhassuluuha be almi wa be da kula,tukuun nijse lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa kan raajil ragad maʼa mara,humman al‑itneen waajib yilbarrado.Wa be da kula,yukuunu nijsiin lahaddi l‑achiiye.
 Wa kan mara indaha heed wa l‑damm gaaʼid yisiil minha,hi tagood sabʼa yoom fi heedha.Wa ayyi naadum al‑yalmasha yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa fi wakit heedha,ayyi sariir al‑targud foogah yukuun nijis wa ayyi cheyy al‑tagood foogah yukuun nijis.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑yalmas sariirha,waajib yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad.Wa be da kula,yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑yalmas al‑cheyy al‑hi gaʼadat foogah,waajib yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad.Wa be da kula,yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa kan fi cheyy fi sariirha aw fi cheyy al‑hi gaʼadat foogah,al‑naadum al‑yalmasah yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa kan raajil yargud maʼa mara wa fi nafs al‑wakit heedha ja leeha wa l‑damm limis al‑raajil,hu yukuun nijis lahaddi sabʼa yoom.Wa ayyi sariir al‑yargud foogah yukuun nijis.
 Wa kan mara indaha dimmiiye aw heedha yiʼakhkhir foogha ziyaada min al‑wakit al‑waajib leeha,hi tukuun nijse fi kulla l‑mudda di.Wa di misil najaasitha fi kulla ayyaam heedha al‑tabiiʼi.
Wa wakit hi indaha dimmiiye,ayyi sariir al‑targud foogah wa ayyi cheyy al‑tagood foogah yukuun nijis misil fi ayyaam heedha al‑tabiiʼi.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑yalmashum yukuun nijis wa waajib yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad.Wa be da kula,yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.
 Wa kan dimmiiyitha wagafat,waajib tahsib sabʼa yoom wa baʼad da,tabga taahire.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taamin,hi tichiil gimri itneen aw hamaam itneen wa tiwaddiih le raajil al‑diin fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa raajil al‑diin yigaddim al‑waahide dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa l‑aakhara dahiiye muharraga.Wa hu yisawwi leeha kaffaara giddaam Allah fi chaan dimmiiyitha al‑najjasatha. 
Ya Muusa wa Haaruun !Adharo Bani Israaʼiil ma yigarrubu le l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wakit humman nijsiin.Wa da,achaan ma yinajjusu kheemti al‑mukhaddasa al‑fi usuthum wa yumuutu be sabab najaasithum.
Wa dool al‑gawaaniin al‑bukhussu al‑naadum al‑indah bajal aw al‑yinnajjas be sabab mani al‑yamrug minnah.
Wa bukhussu al‑mara al‑indaha heed aw al‑raajil wa l‑mara al‑induhum bajal aw al‑raajil al‑yargud maʼa mara nijse.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa baʼad moot awlaad Haaruun al‑itneen al‑maato wakit jo giddaam Allah.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa :Guul le akhuuk Haaruun ma yadkhul fi ayyi wakit fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.Wa da,khaadi le l‑sitaar giddaam sidaadit al‑sanduug.Achaan ma yumuut wakit nibiin fi sahaabaay min foog le sidaadit al‑sanduug.
Wa daahu al‑waajib le Haaruun wakit yadkhul fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.Hu yichiil toor dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa kabich le l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga.
Wa hu yalbas khalag khaass wa surwaal gisayyir wa yarbut sulbah be hizaam wa yukujj kadmuul,kulluhum min gumaach hana kattaan.Wa da kulla l‑lubaas al‑khaass.Wa hu yilbarrad wa yalbasah.
Wa hu yalga min mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil itneen tuyuus dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa waahid kabich le l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga.
Wa khalaas,Haaruun yigaddim al‑toor le l‑dahiiye le kaffaarat zanbah wa yisawwi kaffaara leyah hu wa le aayiltah.
Wa hu yichiil al‑tuyuus al‑itneen wa yukhuttuhum giddaam Allah fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa Haaruun yisawwi amʼiyeedaat le yaʼarif al‑tees al‑weenu yabga le Allah wa l‑weenu yabga matruud le l‑jinn Azaazeel.
Wa Haaruun yichiil al‑tees al‑bigi le Allah wa yigaddimah dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.
Wa l‑tees al‑yabga matruud le l‑jinn Azaazeel yukhuttuuh hayy giddaam Allah.Wa yabga kaffaara wakit yaturduuh fi l‑khala.
Wa Haaruun yigaddim al‑toor le dahiiyat kaffaarat al‑zanib wa yisawwi kaffaara leyah hu wa le aayiltah.Wa baʼad da,yadbah al‑toor hana dahiiyat kaffaarat zanbah.
Wa hu yichiil mukhbar malaan jamur min al‑madbah al‑giddaam Allah wa malyit iid itneen hana bakhuur muʼattar marhuuk.Wa yiwaddiihum kulla ke khaadi le l‑sitaar.
Wa hu yusubb al‑bakhuur da fi l‑naar giddaam Allah achaan al‑dukhkhaan hana l‑bakhuur da yikhatti sidaadit sanduug al‑muʼaahada.Wa be misil da,hu ma yumuut.
Wa hu yichiil min damm al‑toor be usbaʼah al‑zeenaay wa yuruchch beyah sidaadit al‑sanduug be nuss al‑sabaah wa giddaam al‑sanduug.Wa be usbaʼah,hu yuruchch al‑damm sabʼa marraat fi l‑sidaade min giddaam.
Wa yadbah al‑tees dahiiye le kaffaarat zanib al‑chaʼab wa yiwaddi al‑damm khaadi le l‑sitaar.Wa be l‑damm da,hu yisawwi nafs al‑cheyy al‑sawwaah be damm al‑toor,hu yuruchch al‑sidaade wa giddaam al‑sanduug.
Wa be misil da,hu yisawwi fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid kaffaara le najaasit Bani Israaʼiil wa isyaanhum wa kulla zunuubhum.Wa yisawwi nafs al‑cheyy le kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ al‑gaaʼide maʼaahum fi usut najaasithum.
Wa naadum waahid kula ma yukuun fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wakit Haaruun yadkhul fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid le yisawwi kaffaara wa lahaddi yamrug.Wa hu yisawwi kaffaara leyah hu wa le aayiltah wa le kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa yamrug ale l‑madbah al‑gaaʼid giddaam Allah wa yisawwi foogah al‑kaffaara.Wa yichiil min damm al‑toor wa damm al‑tees wa yukhuttah fi guruun al‑madbah min kulli jiihe.
Wa hu yichiil be usbaʼah min al‑damm wa yuruchch al‑madbah sabʼa marraat.Wa yitahhirah wa yikhassisah min najaasit Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa wakit yikammil khalaas min al‑kaffaara hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid wa kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa l‑madbah,hu yigaddim al‑tees al‑hayy.
Wa Haaruun yukhutt iideenah fi raas al‑tees al‑hayy wa yiʼtarif be kulla l‑khata wa kulla l‑isyaan wa kulla l‑zunuub hana Bani Israaʼiil wa yukhuttuhum fi raas al‑tees da.Wa raajil waahid jaahiz yiwaddiih fi l‑khala.
Wa l‑tees yichiil kulla khataayaahum fi raasah wa yiwaddiihum fi l‑sahara.Wa be misil da bas,yaturdu al‑tees fi l‑khala.
Wa baʼad da,Haaruun yadkhul fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa yisill khulgaanah hana l‑kattaan al‑libishum wakit dakhal fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.Wa yukhuttuhum fi l‑bakaan da.
Wa hu yilbarrad fi bakaan mukhaddas wa yalbas khulgaanah.Wa khalaas,yamrug wa yigaddim dahiiytah al‑muharraga wa l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga hana l‑chaʼab wa hu yisawwi kaffaara leyah hu wa le l‑chaʼab.
Wa hu yiharrig al‑chaham hana l‑dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib fi l‑madbah.
Wa l‑raajil al‑wadda al‑tees al‑matruud le l‑jinn Azaazeel yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad wa baʼad da,yadkhul fi l‑fariig.
Wa yichiilu toor al‑dahiiye hana kaffaarat al‑zanib wa tees al‑dahiiye hana kaffaarat al‑zanib,al‑waddo dammuhum fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid le l‑kaffaara.Wa yichiilu al‑faddal min al‑dahaaya dool wa yiwadduuh barra min al‑fariig wa yiharrugu firaawhum wa lahamhum wa baʼarhum.
Wa l‑naadum al‑yiharrighum,waajib yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad.Wa baʼad da,yadkhul fi l‑fariig.
Wa daahu al‑yabga leeku chart daayim.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑aachir hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ,suumu wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme wa la intu wa la l‑ajnabi al‑saakin maʼaaku.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,yisawwu leeku kaffaara le yitahhuruuku min kulla zunuubku wa tabgo taahiriin giddaam Allah.
Wa l‑yoom da yabga leeku yoom hana sabt,yoom hana jumma wa siyaam.Wa da yabga leeku chart daayim.
Wa l‑kaffaara di yisawwiiha raajil al‑diin al‑masahooh wa darrajooh le yichiil bakaan abuuh raajil al‑diin.Wa yalbas khulgaan al‑kattaan al‑khaassiin.
Wa hu yisawwi kaffaara le l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid wa le kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa le l‑madbah.Wa yisawwi kaffaara le rujaal al‑diin wa le kulla mujtamaʼ al‑chaʼab.
Wa da yabga leeku chart daayim fi ayyi sana wakit tisawwu kaffaara le kulla zunuub Bani Israaʼiil.Wa sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Haaruun wa awlaadah wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Daahu kalaam Allah al‑amaraaku beyah.
Kan ayyi naadum min Bani Israaʼiil yadbah toor aw kabich aw anzaay fi daakhal al‑fariig aw barra minnah,
waajib yijiib al‑bahiime di fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Wa yigaddimha dahiiye giddaam kheemat Allah.Laakin kan ma sawwa misil da,al‑naadum da yatulbu minnah damm achaan hu daffag damm.Wa waajib yafsuluuh min chaʼabah.
Wa be da,Bani Israaʼiil battaan ma yadbaho dahaayaahum fi l‑kadaade wa laakin yijiibuuhum le raajil al‑diin fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ giddaam Allah.Wa yigaddumuuhum le Allah dahaaya salaama.
Wa raajil al‑diin yuruchch al‑damm fi madbah Allah fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Wa yiharrig al‑chaham wa Allah yarda be riihtah.
Wa ma waajib yadbaho dahaayaahum le ilaahaathum al‑yimassuluuhum be tuyuus wa yichcharmato waraahum.Wa da yabga leehum chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye. 
Wa guul leehum battaan : Akuun naadum min Bani Israaʼiil aw min al‑ajaanib al‑jo gaʼado maʼaahum yigaddim dahiiye muharraga aw ayyi dahiiye.
Waajib yijiibha fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ le yigaddimha le Allah.Laakin kan ma jaabha,al‑naadum da waajib yafsuluuh min chaʼabah.
 Wa kan naadum min Bani Israaʼiil aw min al‑ajaanib al‑saakniin maʼaahum yaakul ayyi damm,ana ninlafit didd al‑naadum al‑yaakul al‑damm da.Wa nafsulah min chaʼabah.
Achaan hayaat al‑makhluug gaaʼide fi l‑damm.Wa ana anteetku al‑damm da le tisawwu beyah kaffaara le hayaatku fi l‑madbah.Achaan al‑damm yabga kaffaara le l‑haya.
Wa be sabab da,ana gult le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Ma waajib ayyi naadum minku yaakul damm.Wa l‑ajnabi al‑saakin maʼaaku kula ma yaakulah. ›
 Wa kan naadum min Bani Israaʼiil aw min al‑ajaanib al‑saakniin maʼaahum macha al‑ganiis wa katal haywaan aw teer al‑binʼakil,waajib yadbahah wa yadfin dammah be turaab.
Achaan hayaat ayyi makhluug gaaʼide fi dammah wakit hu hayy.Wa ana gult le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Ma taakulu damm hana ayyi makhluug hayy achaan al‑ruuh hana ayyi makhluug hayy gaaʼide fi dammah.Wa ayyi naadum al‑yaakul damm,waajib yafsuluuh min al‑chaʼab. ›
 Wa kan ayyi muwaatin min Bani Israaʼiil aw ajnabi akal rimme aw jiife hana haywaan,waajib yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad.Wa be da kula,yukuun nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye.Wa baʼad da,yabga taahir.
Wa kan ma khassal khulgaanah wa ma albarrad,hu yilhammal natiijat khataayah. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
Ma tisawwu amal hana naas balad Masir al‑bakaan al‑intu sakantu foogah.Wa ma tisawwu amal hana naas balad Kanʼaan al‑bakaan al‑niwaddiiku leyah.Al‑naas dool,ma titaabuʼu gawaaniinhum.
Wa intu tabbugu gawaaniini wa ahfado churuuti wa taabuʼuuhum.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
Wa ahfado churuuti wa gawaaniini.Wa l‑naadum al‑yitabbighum yahya be sababhum.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Ma waajib ayyi naadum minku yigarrib le waahide min ahalah le yargud maʼaaha.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Ma targud maʼa ammak wa tiʼayyib abuuk.Wa di ammak,ma waajib targud maʼaaha.
 Ma targud maʼa marit abuuk wa tiʼayyib abuuk zaatah.
 Ma targud maʼa akhtak kan bitt ammak walla bitt abuuk kula.Wa kan rabbooha fi l‑beet walla barra minnah kula,ma waajib targud maʼaaha.
 Ma targud maʼa bitt waladak wa la maʼa bitt bittak achaan da yiʼayyibak inta zaatak.
 Ma targud maʼa bitt marit abuuk hi rabiibat abuuk.Hi akhtak ma targud maʼaaha.
 Ma targud maʼa akhut abuuk.Hi immitak,akhut abuuk.
 Ma targud maʼa akhut ammak.Hi khaaltak,akhut ammak.
 Ma targud maʼa marit immak wa tiʼayyibah.Hi immitak.
 Ma targud maʼa marit waladak.Hi marit waladak,ma waajib targud maʼaaha.
 Ma targud maʼa marit akhuuk wa tiʼayyibah hu zaatah.
 Ma targud maʼa l‑amm wa bittaha.Wa ma taakhud bitt waladha wa la bitt bittaha wa tiʼayyib jidditha.Achaan humman gariibiin wa da fiʼil cheen.
 Ma taakhud akhut martak wa la tisawwiiha darritha wa la targud maʼaaha wakit martak hayye.
 Ma tigarrib le mara indaha heed.Ma targud maʼaaha,hi ma taahire.
 Ma targud maʼa marit akhuuk wa tinnajjas maʼaaha.
 Ma tanti waahid min iyaalak le yigaddumuuh fi l‑naar le sanam Muulak wa be misil da,ma tihtarim usum Allah Ilaahak.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Ma targud maʼa raajil misil targud maʼa mara.Da fiʼil muharram.
 Ma targud maʼa ayyi bahiime wa tinajjis nafsak maʼaaha.Wa l‑mara kula ma waajib tigarrib le haywaan wa targud maʼaayah.Wa da cheyy makruuh marra waahid.
 Ma tinajjusu nufuusku be ayyi waahid min al‑afʼaal dool achaan be l‑afʼaal dool annajjaso al‑umam al‑ana natrudhum giddaamku.
Al‑balad annajjasat wa ana aakhabtaha be khataaha wa hi taradat sukkaanha.
 Wa kan leeku intu,ahfado churuuti wa gawaaniini wa ma tisawwu waahid min kulla l‑muharramaat dool,wa la l‑muwaatin al‑min Bani Israaʼiil wa la l‑ajnabi al‑saakin maʼaaku.
Wa kulla l‑muharramaat dool al‑naas al‑sakano al‑balad gabulku sawwoohum wa l‑balad annajjasat beehum.
Wa be da,intu ma tinajjusu al‑balad achaan hi ma tatrudku misil hi taradat al‑umam al‑gabulku.
Wa ayyi waahid al‑yisawwi waahide min al‑muharramaat dool,waajib yafsuluuh min chaʼabah.
 Wa khalaas,ahfado wasiiyaati achaan ma titabbugu al‑aadaat al‑muharramiin al‑tabbagoohum al‑naas al‑gabulku wa ma tinnajjaso beehum.Ana bas Allah Ilaahku. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Abgo khaassiin achaan ana Allah Ilaahku khudduus.
 Wa ayyi waahid minku khalli yihtarim ammah wa abuuh wa ahfado yoomi hana l‑sabt.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
 Ma tiwajjuhu ale l‑ilaahaat wa tasnaʼo leeku asnaam hana hadiid.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
 Wa kan tigaddumu le Allah dahiiyat salaama,waajib tigaddumuuha be tariiga al‑hu yarda beeha.
Al‑dahiiye di taakuluuha fi l‑yoom al‑gaddamtuuha foogah aw ambaakir.Wa l‑yifaddil minha lahaddi l‑yoom al‑taalit,yiharruguuh fi l‑naar.
Wa kan yaakuluuh fi l‑yoom al‑taalit da,yabga misil fatiis wa Allah ma yakhbalah.
Wa l‑yaakulah yilhammal natiijat khataayah achaan hu ma ahtaram al‑mukhassas le Allah.Wa l‑naadum da,waajib yafsuluuh min chaʼabah.
 Wa wakit tagtaʼo ziraaʼitku fi kulla arduku,faddulu chiyya min taraf ziraaʼitku ma tagtaʼooh wa l‑kichcheeb kula ma tilaggutuuh.
Wa fi jineenaatku hana l‑inab,ma waajib tagtaʼo al‑faddal min al‑inab fi l‑anaagiid wa la tikachchubu al‑daffag fi l‑ard.Dool waajib tikhalluuhum le l‑miskiin wa l‑ajnabi.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
 Ma tasurgu.Wa ma takdubu le akhuuku wa la tukhuchchuuh.
Wa ma tahalfu be usmi be kidib achaan be l‑haliife di,intu ma tihtarumu usmi ana Ilaahku.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Ma tazulmu jiiraanku wa la tasurgu.Wa ma takurbu ujrat al‑khaddaam lahaddi ambaakir.
Ma tiʼayyuru al‑tarchaan wa ma tukhuttu cheyy giddaam al‑amyaan le yitartiʼah.Wa be da,tiwassufu khoofku minni ana Ilaahku.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Wa fi l‑chariiʼa,ma timayyulu wa la tansuru al‑gaadir wa la l‑daʼiif wa laakin ahkumu ambeen akhwaanku be l‑adil.
Ma tangulu al‑kalaam ambeenaat chaʼabku.Be kidib,ma tathamo jiiraanku be jariime al‑tidaffig dammah.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Ma takraho akhwaanku min daakhal guluubku wa laakin luumu rufgaanku achaan ma tichaaruku maʼaahum fi zunuubhum.
Ma tichiilu taar wa ma takurbu fi guluubku le iyaal chaʼabku.Hibb akhuuk misil tihibb nafsak !Wa ana bas Allah.
 Ahfado gawaaniini.Ma tilimmu bahaayim itneen al‑nafarhum chig chig le tiwalluduuhum.Wa ma tazraʼo fi zereʼ waahid nabaataat itneen al‑nafarhum chig chig.Wa ma talbaso khalag masnuuʼ min nooʼ tineen chig chig.
 Wa kan raajil ragad maʼa mara wa l‑mara di khaadim wa makhtuuba le naadum aakhar wa laakin ma fadooha wa la atagooha,fi l‑bakaan da yikaffi al‑khasaara.Wa laakin ma yaktuluuhum achaan al‑khaadim di ma atagooha.
Wa l‑raajil al‑sawwa al‑cheyy da yijiib le Allah fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ kabich dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑khata.
Wa be l‑kabich da,raajil al‑diin yisawwi leyah kaffaara wa yigaddim dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑khata le Allah fi chaan al‑zanib al‑hu sawwaah.Wa khalaas yalga al‑khufraan.
 Wa wakit tadkhulu fi l‑balad wa timaggunu ayyi chadara al‑talda iyaal,ajʼalo iyaalha muharramiin leeku le muddit talaata sana,ma taakuluuhum.
Wa fi l‑sana al‑raabʼe,kulla iyaal al‑chadara di tikhassusuuhum le Allah fi iid al‑chukur.
Wa fi l‑sana al‑khaamse,taakulu iyaal al‑chadar.Wa be da,intaajku yiziid leeku.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
 Ma taakulu ayyi cheyy maʼa l‑damm.Wa ma tichawwufu wa la tihajju be ilim al‑kheeb.
Ma tagtaʼo chaʼarku mudawwar wa ma tagtaʼo chawaarib duguunku.
Ma tijarruhu jisimku be sabab naadum maat wa tisawwu rasim al‑ma yingachcha fi jisimku.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Ma tiwadduru charaf banaatku be l‑charmata wa da achaan al‑balad ma tichcharmat wa tinmali be l‑fasaala.
Ahfado yoomi hana l‑sabt wa ahtarumu beeti al‑mukhaddas.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Ma tiwajjuhu ale l‑naas al‑yikallumu maʼa l‑maytiin wa la l‑jannaaniyiin,ma tifattuchuuhum wa tinnajjaso beehum.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
 Gumm le siyaad al‑suuf al‑abyad wa ahtarim al‑chiyyaab.Wa be da,tiwassif khoofak minni ana Ilaahak.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Wa kan naadum ajnabi ja sakan maʼaaku fi baladku,ma tazulmuuh.
Wa alʼaamalo maʼa l‑ajnabi al‑saakin maʼaaku misil maʼa l‑muwaatin min Bani Israaʼiil wa hibbuuh misil tihibbu nufuusku achaan intu kula bigiitu ajaanib fi balad Masir.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
 Ma timayyulu fi l‑chariiʼa wa ma tukhuchchu fi l‑magaas wa la l‑wazin wa la l‑mikyaal.
Khuttu miizaan aadil wa wazin aadil wa kooro aadil wa liitir aadil.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku al‑maragtuku min balad Masir.
 Wa ahfado kulla churuuti wa kulla gawaaniini wa tabbuguuhum.Wa ana bas Allah. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Guul le Bani Israaʼiil : Ayyi waahid min Bani Israaʼiil aw al‑ajnabi al‑saakin fi Israaʼiil kan yigaddim waahid min iyaalah le sanam Muulak,waajib yumuut.Wa chaʼab al‑balad yarjumuuh.
Wa ana Allah niwajjih ale l‑naadum da wa nafsulah min chaʼabah achaan hu gaddam waahid min iyaalah le Muulak wa be da,najjas beeti al‑mukhaddas wa ma ahtaram usmi al‑mukhaddas.
Wa kan chaʼab al‑balad saddo uyuunhum wakit al‑raajil da gaddam waahid min iyaalah le Muulak wa ma katalooh,
khalaas ana bas niwajjih ale l‑naadum da wa nugumm diddah hu wa ahalah wa nafsulhum min usut chaʼabhum,hu wa kulla l‑naas al‑taabʼiin leyah wa yichcharmato maʼa Muulak.
 Wa kan naadum yiwajjih ale l‑naas al‑yikallumu maʼa l‑maytiin wa l‑jannaaniyiin le yichcharmat maʼaahum,al‑naadum da ana nugumm diddah wa nafsulah min chaʼabah.
Khassusu nufuusku wa tabgo khaassiin achaan ana Allah Ilaahku.
 Wa ahfado gawaaniini wa tabbuguuhum achaan ana Allah bas nikhassisku.
Wa l‑yalʼan abuuh aw ammah yilʼaakhab be l‑moot.Hu laʼan abuuh wa ammah,hu masʼuul min mootah.
 Wa kan raajil zana marit akhuuh aw marit naadum aakhar,al‑raajil wa l‑mara al‑sawwo al‑zina dool waajib yumuutu.
 Wa kan raajil yargud maʼa marit abuuh wa yiʼayyib abuuh,al‑raajil da wa l‑mara waajib yumuutu.Wa humman masʼuuliin min moothum.
 Wa kan naadum yargud maʼa marit wileedah,humman al‑itneen waajib yumuutu achaan sawwo cheyy makruuh marra waahid.Wa humman masʼuuliin min moothum.
 Wa kan raajil yargud maʼa raajil misil yargud maʼa mara,humman al‑itneen sawwo muharram wa waajib yumuutu.Wa humman masʼuuliin min moothum.
 Wa kan raajil akhad al‑bitt wa ammaha,da fiʼil cheen.Wa waajib al‑bitt wa ammaha wa l‑raajil,yiharruguuhum be naar achaan al‑fiʼil al‑cheen da ma yukuun fi usutku.
 Wa kan naadum yargud maʼa bahiime,waajib yumuut wa l‑bahiime kula waajib yaktuluuha.
Wa kan mara garrabat le haywaan le targud maʼaayah,waajib taktulu al‑mara wa l‑haywaan.Humman al‑itneen yumuutu wa humman masʼuuliin min moothum.
 Wa kan raajil yaakhud akhtah bitt ammah aw bitt abuuh wa kan yargud maʼaaha wa hi targud maʼaayah,da eeb.Wa waajib yafsuluuhum min chaʼabhum giddaam kulla l‑chaʼab.Wa be sabab hu ragad maʼa akhtah,yilhammal natiijat khataayah.
 Wa kan naadum yargud maʼa mara indaha heed wa yichiif al‑bakaan al‑yamrug minnah al‑damm al‑hi kula kachafatah,khalaas humman al‑itneen waajib yafsuluuhum min chaʼabhum.
 Ma targud maʼa akhut ammak wa la akhut abuuk achaan be da inta ragadt maʼa gariibtak.Wa l‑yisawwu misil da yilhammalo natiijat khataahum.
 Wa kan naadum yargud maʼa immitah,hu yiʼayyib immah.Wa humman al‑itneen yilhammalo natiijat zanibhum wa yumuutu bala iyaal.
 Wa kan naadum akhad marit akhuuh,da najaasa wa hu yiʼayyib akhuuh.Wa humman ma yalgo iyaal.
 Wa ahfado kulla churuuti wa kulla gawaaniini wa tabbuguuhum wa be da,al‑balad al‑niwaddiiku leeha wa nisakkinku foogha ma tatrudku.
Ma titaabuʼu aadaat al‑umam al‑natrudhum giddaamku achaan humman sawwo kulla l‑aʼmaal dool wa ana abeethum.
 Wa ana gult leeku :‹ Intu bas tawrusu arduhumwa ana nantiiha leeku misil warasa.Wa di l‑balad al‑malaanebe l‑laban wa l‑asal. › Wa ana Allah Ilaahku al‑azaltuku min kulla l‑chuʼuub.
Wa farrugu ambeen al‑bahaayim al‑taahiriin wa l‑nijsiin wa been al‑tuyuur al‑nijsiin wa l‑taahiriin achaan ma tinajjusu nufuusku be l‑haywaanaat wa l‑tuyuur wa kulla l‑zawaahif hana l‑ard al‑ana khatteethum taraf wa gult leeku humman dool nijsiin.
 Abgo khaassiin leyi achaan ana Allah khudduus.Wa ana azaltuku min al‑chuʼuub achaan tabgo hineeyi.
Wa kan raajil aw mara yikallim maʼa l‑maytiin aw yihajji maʼa l‑jinn,waajib yumuut.Al‑naas yarjumuuh wa hu masʼuul min mootah. 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa :Hajji le rujaal al‑diin min zurriiyit Haaruun wa guul leehum kadar ma waajib le raajil diin yinnajjas be sabab janaaza hana waahid min chaʼabah,
illa kan al‑mayyit da min ahalah al‑gariib leyah misil ammah walla abuuh walla wileedah walla bittah walla akhuuh.
Wa akhtah al‑lissaaʼha bineeye udriiye al‑ma akhadat raajil wa gaaʼide maʼaayah,di kula hu yagdar yinnajjas be sababha.
Wa raajil al‑diin hu kabiir fi chaʼabah,ma waajib yinnajjas lahaddi yabga ma mukhassas battaan.
Wa ma waajib le rujaal al‑diin yagtaʼo chaʼarhum mudawwar wa la yagtaʼo chawaarib duguunhum wa la yijarruhu jisimhum be sabab al‑hizin.
Wa waajib yabgo mukhassasiin le Allah Ilaahhum wa yihtarumu usmah.Achaan humman bas al‑gaaʼidiin yigaddumu al‑dahiiye al‑muharraga le Allah Ilaahhum misil akil.Wa humman yabgo khaassiin.
Wa ma yaakhudu mara charmuuta aw aaybe aw mutallaga achaan raajil al‑diin hu khaass le Ilaahah.
Wa intu waajib tihtarumu raajil al‑diin achaan hu bas al‑gaaʼid yigaddim hadaaya hana khubza misil akil le Ilaahku.Wa hu khaass leeku achaan ana Allah al‑Khudduus bas nikhassisku.
Wa kan bitt raajil diin tiwaddir charafha be sabab al‑zina,hi tiwaddir charaf abuuha kula wa waajib yiharruguuha be naar.
Wa kan le raajil al‑diin al‑kabiir min akhwaanah al‑sabbo fi raasah dihin al‑masahaan wa darrajooh wa labbasooh khulgaan khaassiin,khalli ma yakchif raasah wa ma yicharrit khulgaanah
wa ma yigarrib le ayyi janaaza hatta kan hint abuuh walla ammah le yinnajjas.
Wa ma yamrug min al‑beet al‑mukhaddas wa ma yisawwi gillit al‑ihtiraam fi l‑beet al‑mukhaddas hana Ilaahah.Achaan hu mukhassas be dihin al‑masahaan.Ana bas Allah.
Wa waajib yaakhud bitt udriiye.
Wa ma yaakhud mara armala wa la mara mutallaga wa la mara charmuuta.Laakin yaakhud bineeye udriiye min chaʼabah.
Wa be misil da,yijiib zurriiye mukhassasa fi lubb chaʼabah.Achaan ana Allah bas nikhassisah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Guul le Haaruun kadar min zurriiye le zurriiye kan fi naadum min zurriiytah mukhalgan,ma yagdar yigarrib wa yigaddim khubza le Ilaahah.
Wa ma waajib le ayyi raajil diin mukhalgan yigarrib le yisawwi al‑khidme kan hu amyaan aw aʼraj aw munkharah ooja aw adaanah magtuuʼa
aw rijlah aw iidah maksuura
aw musardab aw rigeeyig aw indah bayaadaay fi eenah aw jarab aw guub aw khasi.
Wa ayyi raajil diin al‑min zurriiyit Haaruun mukhalgan ma waajib yagdar yigarrib wa yigaddim dahiiye muharraga le Allah achaan hu mukhalgan.Wa be da,hu ma yagdar yigarrib wa yigaddim khubza le Ilaahah.
Hu yagdar yaakul min al‑akil al‑gaddamooh hadiiye le Ilaahah wa min al‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin marra waahid wa l‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin.
Wa laakin waajib ma yigarrib le l‑sitaar wa la le l‑madbah achaan hu mukhalgan.Wa ma yisawwi gillit ihtiraam fi beeti al‑mukhaddas wa kulla cheyy al‑fi lubbah.Achaan ana Allah bas khaddastuhum.
Wa Muusa hajja be kulla l‑kalaam da le Haaruun wa awlaadah wa le kulla Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Haaruun wa awlaadah mata yamnaʼo nufuushum min al‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin al‑yikhassusuuhum leyi Bani Israaʼiil achaan yihtarumu usmi al‑mukhaddas.Wa ana bas Allah.
Wa guul leehum : Min zurriiye le zurriiye kan ayyi raajil nijis min kulla zurriiyit rujaal al‑diin limis al‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin al‑khassasoohum Bani Israaʼiil le Allah,al‑naadum da waajib yafsuluuh wa ma yaji giddaami.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Wa ayyi raajil min zurriiyit Haaruun kan indah marad al‑jisim aw bajal,ma yaakul min al‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin lahaddi yittahhar.Wa kan limis naadum al‑bigi nijis be sabab limis jiife aw yamrug minnah mani
aw limis ayyi haywaan zaahif al‑yinajjis aw naadum al‑yinajjis aw ayyi najaasa,
khalaas al‑limishum yabga nijis lahaddi l‑achiiye wa hu ma yaakul min al‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin wa laakin yikhassil jismah be almi.
Wa baʼad waguuʼ al‑harraay hu yabga taahir wa baʼad da,hu yaakul min al‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin achaan da akil hana kulla rujaal al‑diin.
Wa hu ma yaakul rimme wa la jiife wa la yinnajjas beehum.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Wa be da,yahfado wasiiyaati wa ma yisawwu zanib hana gillit ihtiraam al‑yijiib leehum al‑moot.Wa ana Allah bas nikhassishum.
 Wa ayyi raajil ma min gabiilat Laawi,ma waajib yaakul cheyy mukhaddas.Wa l‑deef wa l‑khaddaam hana raajil al‑diin kula,ma waajib yaakulu min ayyi cheyy al‑mukhaddas.
Wa laakin al‑abid al‑charaah raajil al‑diin be gursah yagdar yaakul wa l‑wildooh fi beetah kula.Humman yagdaro yaakulu min aklah.
Wa bitt raajil al‑diin al‑mutazawwije maʼa raajil ma min gabiilat Laawi ma tagdar taakul min al‑hadaaya al‑mukhaddasiin.
Wa laakin kan bitt raajil al‑diin armala aw mutallaga wa kan ma indaha iyaal wa gabbalat beet abuuha misil awwal hi sabiiye,hi tagdar taakul min akil abuuha.Wa ayyi raajil ma min gabiilat Laawi ma yaakulah.
Wa kan naadum akal min al‑cheyy al‑mukhaddas gabul ma yaʼarfah,hu yanti tamanah le raajil al‑diin wa yiziid foogah khumsah.
 Wa rujaal al‑diin yihtarumu al‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin hana Bani Israaʼiil al‑yarfaʼoohum le Allah.
Wa laakin kan akalo al‑achya al‑mukhaddasiin dool,yilhammalo masʼuuliiyit khataahum achaan ana Allah bas nikhassishum. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Haaruun wa awlaadah wa le kulla Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Akuun naadum min Bani Israaʼiil aw min al‑ajaanib al‑gaaʼidiin fi balad Israaʼiil yigaddim dahiiye muharraga le Allah misil le l‑nazir aw le kulla hadaaya al‑yigaddimhum be niiytah.
Wa kan yidoor Allah yarda beeha,waajib yichiil waahid dakar al‑ma indah ayyi eeb min lubb al‑bagar aw al‑khanam aw al‑inze.
Ma tigaddumu ayyi bahiime mukhalgana achaan Allah ma yarda beeha.
 Wa kan naadum yigaddim dahiiyat salaama le Allah le yihaggig nazrah aw le kulla l‑hadaaya al‑yigaddimhum be niiytah,khalli yichiil min bagarah aw khanamah bahiime al‑ma indaha ayyi eeb wa ma mukhalgana le Allah yarda beeha.
Wa ma tigaddumu bahiime amyaane wa la maksuura wa la maʼduura wa la indaha tawaaliil wa la jarab wa la guub.Al‑bahiime al‑misil di,ma tigaddumuuha fi l‑madbah dahiiye muharraga le Allah.
Wa tagdaro tigaddumu toor aw kharuuf aw tees maʼduur al‑rijlah tawiile aw gisayre dahiiye be niiytak.Wa laakin kan tigaddumuuh le l‑nazir,Allah ma yarda beyah.
Wa ma tigaddumu dahiiye le Allah bahiime al‑galagaatha mukarchamiin aw mukassariin aw mamruugiin aw magtuuʼiin.Wa cheyy misil da,ma tisawwuuh fi baladku.
Wa ma takhbalo al‑bahaayim al‑misil dool min al‑ajnabi le tigaddumuuhum misil akil le Ilaahku achaan al‑bahaayim dool yukuunu khasiyiin aw mukhalganiin.Wa be da,Allah ma yarda beehum. 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Wa baʼad al‑waaluuda,al‑ijil aw al‑hamal aw al‑sakhal yagood tihit ammah sabʼa yoom.Wa min al‑yoom al‑taamin wa giddaam,hu yabga makhbuul le l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga le Allah.
Wa laakin ma tadbaho fi nafs al‑yoom al‑bagara aw al‑khanamaay aw al‑anzaay wa taabaʼha.
Wa kan tadbaho dahiiyat chukur le Allah,adbahooha be tariiga al‑yarda beeha.
Wa taakuluuha fi nafs al‑yoom,ma tikhallu minha cheyy le ambaakir.Wa ana bas Allah.
Ahfado wasiiyaati wa tabbuguuhum.Wa ana bas Allah.
Wa ahtarumu usmi al‑mukhaddas wa aʼarfu ana khudduus fi usut Bani Israaʼiil.Wa ana Allah bas nikhassisku.
Wa ana bas al‑maragtuku min balad Masir le nabga Ilaahku.Wa ana bas Allah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Al‑aʼyaad hineeyi ana Allah,humman al‑aʼyaad al‑tilimmu fooghum fi malammaat khaassiin.Wa dool al‑malammaat al‑muhaddadiin le l‑ibaada.
 Fi sitte yoom sawwu khidmitku wa l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,da al‑sabt wa hu yoom hana jumma wa limmu foogah malamma khaassa wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme.Wa l‑sabt da,hu yoom le Allah fi ayyi bakaan al‑taskunu foogah.
 Wa daahu ayyaam aʼyaadi ana Allah wa l‑malammaat al‑khaassiin al‑tilimmu fooghum fi wakit muhaddad.
 Wa fi yoom 14 hana l‑chahar al‑awwal fi l‑makhrib,yukuun iid al‑Fisha le Allah.
Wa fi yoom 15 hana nafs al‑chahar,yukuun iid al‑Khubza bala Tawwaara le Allah.Wa fi muddit sabʼa yoom,taakulu khubza bala tawwaara.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑awwal,tilimmu malamma khaassa wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.
Wa fi ayyi yoom min al‑ayyaam al‑sabʼa tigaddumu dahiiye muharraga le Allah.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,tilimmu malamma khaassa wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Wakit tadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑nantiiha leeku wa tagtaʼo khallitha,jiibu le raajil al‑diin ganaadiil hana awwal gatiʼku.
Wa raajil al‑diin yarfaʼ al‑ganaadiil giddaam Allah achaan hu yarda beeku.Wa hu yigaddimhum fi l‑yoom al‑baʼad yoom al‑sabt.
Wa fi nafs al‑yoom al‑tarfaʼo foogah al‑ganaadiil giddaam Allah,gaddumu kharuuf wald sana al‑ma indah ayyi eeb dahiiye muharraga le Allah.
Wa gaddumu maʼaayah hadiiye koorteen hana dagiig mukhalbat be dihin wa di hadiiye muharraga al‑riihitha Allah yarda beeha.Wa gaddumu maʼaayah liitir hana khamar hadiiyat charaab.
Wa ma taakulu khubza wa la ganaadiil fariiki wa la gameh jadiid gabul al‑yoom al‑muhaddad al‑tigaddumu foogah al‑hadaaya le Ilaahku.Wa da yabga leeku chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye fi ayyi bakaan al‑taskunu foogah.
 Wa ahsubu sabʼa usbuuʼ min baʼad yoom al‑sabt wa da min yoom jibtu al‑ganaadiil hana l‑hadiiye al‑marfuuʼa wa tammumu al‑sabʼa asaabiiʼ.
Wa lahaddi l‑yoom al‑baʼad al‑sabt al‑saabiʼ,ahsubu 50 yoom.Wa fi l‑yoom da,gaddumu le Allah hadiiye hana dagiig min awwal gatiʼku.
Wa min ayyi bakaan al‑taskunu foogah,jiibu hadiiye marfuuʼa hana itneen khubza,ayyi waahide yisawwuuha be koorteen hana dagiig be tawwaara.Wa di tukuun awwal khubza le Allah.
Wa ziyaada fi l‑khubza di,gaddumu dahiiye muharraga le Allah sabʼa kharuuf awlaad sana al‑ma induhum ayyi eeb wa toor waahid wa kubchaan itneen maʼa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab wa di hadiiye muharraga al‑Allah yarda be riihitha.
Wa gaddumu tees dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa itneen kharuuf awlaad sana le dahiiyat al‑salaama.
 Wa raajil al‑diin yarfaʼ al‑khurfaan al‑itneen maʼa l‑khubza hana awwal intaaj wa yigaddimhum hadiiye marfuuʼa le Allah.Wa humman dool yukuunu khaassiin le Allah wa yabgo hagg le raajil al‑diin.
Wa fi l‑yoom da bas,tilimmu malamma khaassa wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.Wa da yabga chart daayim le zurriiyitku fi ayyi bakaan al‑taskunu foogah.
 Wa wakit tagtaʼo ziraaʼitku ma tagtaʼo al‑zereʼ lahaddi tarafah wa ma tilaggit al‑ganaadiil al‑yidaffugu wakt al‑gatiʼ khalliihum le l‑masaakiin wa l‑ajaanib.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Al‑yoom al‑awwal hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ da yukuun leeku yoom hana jumma wa da yoom al‑tilimmu leyi foogah malamma khaassa wa tadurbu burunji wa tizzakkarooni.
Wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye wa gaddumu le Allah dahiiye muharraga. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Wa l‑yoom al‑aachir hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ da yabga leeku yoom al‑Kaffaara wa malamma khaassa.Wa fi l‑yoom da,suumu wa gaddumu le Allah dahiiye muharraga.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,ma tisawwu ayyi khidme achaan da yoom al‑Kaffaara.Wa fi l‑yoom da,yisawwu leeku kaffaara giddaam Allah Ilaahku.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑ma yusuum fi l‑yoom da,waajib yafsuluuh min chaʼabah.
Wa ayyi naadum al‑yisawwi khidme fi l‑yoom da,ana nidammirah min chaʼabah.
Ma tisawwu ayyi khidme.Wa da yabga leeku chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye fi ayyi bakaan al‑taskunu foogah.
Wa da yukuun leeku yoom al‑sabt wa da yoom hana jumma al‑tusuumu foogah min yoom tisʼa fi l‑chahar be makhrib lahaddi ambaakir makhrib wa ayyudu al‑sabt min makhrib le makhrib.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Yoom 15 hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ,da yoom hana iid al‑Lagaadiib le Allah al‑yagood le muddit sabʼa yoom.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑awwal,tilimmu malamma khaassa wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.
Wa fi l‑ayyaam al‑sabʼa dool,kulli yoom tigaddumu dahiiye muharraga.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taamin kamaan,tilimmu malamma khaassa wa tigaddumu le Allah dahaaya muharragiin.Wa fi kumaalit iidku,ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.
 Wa dool al‑aʼyaad al‑waajib tiʼayyuduuhum le Allah wa l‑malammaat al‑khaassa al‑tilimmu fooghum le tigaddumu dahiiye muharraga wa hadiiye muharraga wa hadiiye hana dagiig wa dahaaya aakhariin wa hadiiyat charaab hasab al‑muwaafig le ayyi yoom.
Wa da ziyaada fi dahaaya al‑sabt hana Allah wa l‑hadaaya wa kulla l‑nazir wa kulla cheyy al‑tigaddumuuh be niiyitku wa tantuuh le Allah.
 Wa laakin fi yoom 15 hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ baʼad tagtaʼo khallit ziraaʼitku ayyudu le Allah le muddit sabʼa yoom.Wa l‑yoom al‑awwal yukuun yoom hana jumma kaamil wa l‑yoom al‑taamin kula yukuun yoom hana jumma kaamil.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑awwal,chiilu iyaal al‑chadar al‑sameh wa furuuʼ al‑nakhal wa furuuʼ al‑chadar al‑akhdar wa gana al‑wudyaan wa afraho giddaam Allah Ilaahku le muddit sabʼa yoom.
Wa kulli sana,ayyudu al‑iid da le Allah le muddit sabʼa yoom.Wa da yabga leeku chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye wa ayyudu al‑iid da fi l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ.
Wa le muddit sabʼa yoom,askunu tihit al‑lagaadiib wa kulla muwaatiniin Bani Israaʼiil waajib yaskunu tihit al‑lagaadiib.
Wa achaan taʼarfu min zurriiye le zurriiye kadar ana sakkant Bani Israaʼiil tihit al‑lagaadiib wa da baʼad maragtuhum min balad Masir.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku. 
Wa khalaas be misil da bas,Muusa kallam le Bani Israaʼiil be aʼyaad Allah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Aamur Bani Israaʼiil yijiibu leek dihin hana zaytuun maʼsuur wa musaffa le l‑faanuus achaan deyyah yukuun muwalliʼ daayman.
Wa giddaam al‑sitaar al‑yidaarig al‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ,Haaruun yukhutt al‑faanuus giddaam Allah muwalliʼ daayman min makhrib lahaddi fajur.Wa da yabga chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye.
Wa hu yigabbid niiraan al‑faanuus hana l‑dahab al‑saafi achaan yukuun muwalliʼ daayman giddaam Allah.
Wa chiil dagiig wa sawwi beyah 12 khubza wa l‑dagiig hana ayyi khubza yukuun koorteen.
Wa khuttuhum roogeen fi l‑tarabeeza hana l‑dahab al‑saafi giddaam Allah wa ayyi roog indah 6 khubza.
Wa ayyi roog tukhutt foogah lubaan saafi wa tiharrigah fi badal al‑khubza misil zikra le Allah.Wa di hadiiye muharraga.
Wa fi kulli yoom sabt,yukhuttu al‑khubza di giddaam Allah.Wa Bani Israaʼiil yisawwuuh misil da daayman achaan hi muʼaahada daayme.
Wa l‑khubza di tabga hint Haaruun wa awlaadah wa yaakuluuha fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas achaan al‑cheyy al‑mukhaddas marra waahid al‑chaalooh min al‑hadaaya al‑muharragiin giddaam Allah yukuun leehum humman.Wa da yukuun hagg daayim.
Yoom waahid,fiyah naadum ammah Israaʼiiliiye wa abuuh Masri ja fi usut Bani Israaʼiil wa fi ust al‑fariig gamma yidaawis maʼa naadum waahid Israaʼiili.
Wa l‑naadum al‑ammah Israaʼiiliiye da gamma hagar usum Allah wa laʼanah.Wa l‑naadum da waddooh le Muusa wa usum ammah Chaluumit bineeyit Dibri min gabiilat Daan.
Wa l‑naadum da sajanooh lahaddi Allah yuguul kalaam fi chaanah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Amrug al‑naadum al‑laʼanni min al‑fariig wa kulla l‑naas al‑simʼooh yukhuttu iideehum fi raasah wa kulla l‑mujtamaʼ yarjumuuh.
Wa hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Ayyi naadum al‑yalʼan Ilaahah yilhammal zanbah.
Wa l‑yahgir usum Allah,waajib yumuut.Kulla l‑mujtamaʼ yarjumuuh kan hu ajnabi aw muwaatin min Bani Israaʼiil kula achaan hu hagar usum Allah.
 Al‑naadum al‑yaktul naadum kan yabga yaatu kula,waajib yumuut.
Wa kan naadum katal bahiime,yikaffiiha be bahiime aakhara.
Wa kan naadum jarah naadum muwaatin,yisawwu foogah misil hu sawwaah.
Al‑kasir be l‑kasir wa l‑een be l‑een wa l‑sinn be l‑sinn wa yisawwu foogah misil hu sawwa fi l‑naadum al‑aakhar.
 Al‑naadum al‑katal bahiime yikaffiiha.Wa l‑katal naadum waajib yumuut.
Induku nafs al‑huguug le l‑ajnabi wa l‑muwaatin achaan ana bas Allah Ilaahku. 
Wa da bas kalaam Muusa le Bani Israaʼiil.Khalaas,humman marago al‑naadum al‑laʼan da min al‑fariig wa rajamooh.Wa Bani Israaʼiil sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa fi jabal Siinaaʼ wa gaal :
Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Wakit tadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑nantiiha leeku,khallu al‑ard tinjamma wa da sabt le Allah.
Wa fi muddit sitte sana,teerubu ziraaʼitku wa akhdumu jineenaat inabku wa agtaʼo intaajku.
Wa laakin fi l‑sana al‑saabʼe,khallu al‑ard tinjamma wa di sana hint sabt le Allah.Wa fi l‑sana di,ma titeerubu ziraaʼitku wa ma takhdumu jineenaat inabku.
Wa ma tisawwu nafiir le tagtaʼo intaaj al‑bandar wa ma tilaggutu al‑inab hana l‑jineene al‑intu ma addaltuuha.Wa di tukuun sana hana sabt le l‑ard.
Wa be da kula fi sabt al‑ard di,talgo akil,inta wa abdak wa khaadmak wa l‑muʼajjar wa l‑deef wa kulla l‑gaaʼidiin maʼaak.
Wa kan le bahaaymak wa haywaanaat al‑kadaade hana baladak,humman yiʼiichu be kulla cheyy al‑tigawwimah al‑ard.
 Wa ahsubu 7 usbuuʼ fi l‑siniin wa da 7 siniin 7 marraat wa kulla ke yabga 49 sana.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑aachir hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ,adurbu al‑buug le l‑munaada wa fi yoom al‑Kaffaara adurbu al‑buug fi kulla baladku.
Wa khassusu al‑sana al‑khamsiin wa aalano al‑hurriiye fi l‑balad le kulla sukkaanha.Wa di tabga leeku sanit al‑Hurriiye wa ayyi waahid minku yigabbil le ard warasatah wa ayyi waahid minku yigabbil le ahalah.
Wa l‑sana al‑khamsiin tabga leeku sanit al‑Hurriiye.Wa fi l‑sana di,ma tisawwu nafiir le titeerubu ziraaʼitku wa la tagtaʼo al‑yugumm bandar fi l‑ziraaʼa wa la tilaggutu al‑inab hana l‑jineene al‑intu ma addaltuuha.
Wa di tabga leeku sanit al‑Hurriiye wa l‑sana di mukhassasa.Wa taakulu al‑yugumm fi l‑ziraaʼa.
Wa fi sanit al‑Hurriiye,ayyi waahid minku yigabbil le ard warasatah.
 Wa kan tibiiʼ cheyy le akhuuk aw tachri minnah cheyy,khalli ayyi waahid minku ma yazlum akhuuh.
Achri min akhuuk hasab adad al‑siniin baʼad sanit al‑Hurriiye wa hu yibiiʼ leek hasab adad al‑siniin al‑yilimmu fooghum al‑intaaj.
Wa kan al‑siniin zaado,al‑taman yiziid wa kan al‑siniin nagaso,al‑taman yangus achaan hu gaaʼid yibiiʼ leek hasab adad al‑intaaj.
Wa khalli ayyi waahid minku ma yazlum akhuuh.Wa be da,tiwassif khoofak minni ana Ilaahak.Achaan ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
 Tabbugu churuuti wa ahfado gawaaniini wa tabbuguuhum le taskunu fi l‑balad be amaan.
Wa l‑balad tanti intaajha wa intu taakulu wa tachbaʼo wa taskunu be amaan,
Wa kan gultu :‹ Naakulu chunu fi l‑sana al‑saabʼe achaan aniina ma gaaʼidiin nazraʼo wa la gaaʼidiin nilimmu intaajna ? ›
Khalaas ana ninazzil rahmati foogku fi l‑sana al‑saadse wa hi tantiiku intaaj al‑waajib leeku le talaata sana.
Wa fi l‑sana al‑taamne,intu tazraʼo wa laakin taakulu min intaaj al‑sana al‑faatat lahaddi l‑sana al‑taasʼe intaajha yitimm wa intu taakulu intaaj hana l‑sana al‑faatat.
 Wa ard al‑balad di ma tinbaaʼ marra waahid achaan al‑balad hinti ana wa intu gaaʼidiin fi bakaani misil ajaanib wa diifaan.
Wa fi kulla l‑balad al‑tabga ard warasatku,sawwu gawaaniin al‑yakhbalo gabbiliin al‑ard.
Wa kan akhuuk indah deen wa baaʼ ard warasatah,khalli al‑gariib al‑indah foogah hagg yigabbil al‑ard le akhuuh al‑baaʼha.
Wa kan naadum ma indah gariib al‑indah foogah hagg al‑yigabbil al‑ard di,mumkin hu zaatah yifattich tariiga le yigabbil ardah.
Hu yahsib al‑siniin al‑faato min sanit al‑beeʼ wa yigabbil al‑faraga le l‑muchtari.Wa baʼad da,yigabbil fi ard warasatah.
Wa laakin kan hu ma ligi tariiga yigabbil al‑maal le l‑muchtari,al‑ard al‑baaʼooha di tagood fi iid al‑muchtari lahaddi sanit al‑Hurriiye.Wa fi sanit al‑Hurriiye,siid al‑ard yigabbil fi ard warasatah.
 Wa kan naadum baaʼ beet al‑gaaʼid fi madiina gawiiye,hagg al‑gabbiliin da yagood lahaddi kumaalit sanit al‑beeʼ.Wa hagg al‑gabbiliin da ma yagood ziyaada min sana.
Wa laakin kan al‑beet da ma gabbalooh lahaddi mudda hana sana kaamile,al‑beet al‑gaaʼid fi l‑madiina al‑gawiiye da yagood le l‑muchtari wa le zurriiytah.Wa fi sanit al‑Hurriiye kula,ma yamrug min iideenah.
Wa l‑buyuut al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑mudun al‑ma gawiyiin,yajʼaloohum misil ziraaʼa hana l‑balad wa yagdaro yigabbuluuhum aw yamurgu minhum fi sanit al‑Hurriiye.
 Wa l‑Laawiyiin induhum daayman hagg al‑gabbiliin fi mudun al‑Laawiyiin wa fi buyuut hana mudun warasathum.
Wa kan waahid min al‑Laawiyiin baaʼ beetah,fi sanit al‑Hurriiye beetah yigabbil leyah achaan al‑buyuut dool warasathum fi mudun al‑Laawiyiin fi usut Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa kan le l‑ziraaʼa al‑fi hawaale mudunhum,ma mumkin tinbaaʼ achaan di ard warasathum al‑daayme leehum.
 Wa kan akhuuk fagri wa ma indah cheyy,saaʼidah achaan yagdar yiʼiich jambak hatta kan hu ajnabi aw deef kula.
Ma tichiil faayde wa la riba min akhuuk.Wa be da,tiwassif khoofak minni ana Ilaahak wa tikhalli akhuuk yiʼiich jambak.
Wa kan dayyant akhuuk gurus,ma tidayyinah be riba.Wa kan anteetah maʼaach,ma tichiilah minnah be faayde.
Wa ana Allah Ilaahku bas al‑maragtuku min balad Masir le nantuuku balad Kanʼaan achaan nabga Ilaahku.
 Wa kan akhuuk indah deen wa baaʼ nafsah leek,ma tikhaddimah misil abid.
Wa aamilah misil muʼajjar aw deef wa hu yabga leek khaddaam lahaddi sanit al‑Hurriiye.
Wa khalaas fi l‑sana di,hu yamrug minnak be iyaalah wa yamchi le gabiiltah fi ard warasa hana juduudah.
Achaan al‑naas al‑ana maragtuhum min balad Masir,humman abiidi.Ma waajib yibiiʼuuhum misil abiid.
Wa ma waajib tamluk foogah be unuf.Wa be da,tiwassif khoofak minni ana Ilaahak.
 Wa kan tidooru abiid wa khadiim al‑yakhdumu leeku,intu achruuhum min al‑umam al‑muhawwigiinku.
Wa battaan tagdaro tachru abiid min iyaal al‑diifaan al‑jo fi baladku aw min iyaal al‑ajaanib al‑wildoohum fi baladku.Humman dool yabgo abiidku halaalku.
Wa tikhalluuhum warasa le zurriiyitku min baʼadku achaan humman yabgo hagguhum halaalhum wa yiʼabbuduuhum ila l‑abad.Wa laakin kan le akhwaanku Bani Israaʼiil kamaan,ma fi ayyi waahid minhum yamluk fi l‑aakhar be l‑unuf.
 Akuun ajnabi aw deef gaaʼid maʼaak wa indah gurus.Wa kan waahid min akhwaanak dayyan minnah wa yidoor yibiiʼ nafsah leyah aw le waahid min zurriiyit al‑ajnabi da,
khalaas akhuuk da indah hagg le yafdooh hatta baʼad al‑beeʼ kula.Wa waahid min akhwaanah yagdar yafdaah.
Aw immah aw wileed immah aw waahid min gariibiinah min gabiiltah kula yagdar yafdaah.Aw hu zaatah yagdar yifattich tariiga al‑beeha yafda nafsah.
Wa fi l‑haala di,hu yistafig maʼa l‑naadum al‑charaah wa yahsib adad al‑siniin ambeen al‑sana al‑baaʼ foogah nafsah wa sanit al‑Hurriiye.Wa be da,taman al‑beeʼ yukuun hasab adad al‑siniin wa hasab taman al‑ujra al‑yoomiiye.
Wa kan al‑siniin al‑faddalo katiiriin,hu yikaffi al‑katiir min al‑taman al‑baaʼ beyah nafsah le yafdaaha wa yabga hurr.
Wa kan al‑siniin al‑faddalo chiyya le yalhago sanit al‑Hurriiye,hu yihaasibhum wa yigabbil al‑taman hana l‑fadayaanah hasab al‑siniin.
Wa min sana le sana hu yagood misil muʼajjar le siidah al‑charaah.Wa laakin al‑naadum al‑charaah da ma yistaʼmalah be unuf.
Wa kan fi kulla l‑haalaat dool ma fadooh,hu yagood lahaddi sanit al‑Hurriiye.Wa khalaas hu wa iyaalah yalgo al‑hurriiye.
 Achaan Bani Israaʼiil humman abiidi.Humman abiidi al‑ana maragtuhum min balad Masir.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku. 
 Ma tasnaʼo leeku ilaahaat wa la tukhuttu asnaam wa la tukhuzzu hujaar le l‑ibaada wa la tamaasiil hana hujaar.Ma tukhuttuhum fi baladku wa tasjudu giddaamhum.Achaan ana bas Allah Ilaahku.
Ahfado yoomi hana l‑sabt wa ahtarumu beeti al‑mukhaddas.Wa ana bas Allah.
 Wa kan taabaʼtu churuuti wa hafadtu wasiiyaati wa tabbagtuuhum,
ana ninazzil leeku al‑matar fi waktah wa l‑ard tanti intaajha wa chadar al‑kadaade kula yanti fawaakihha.
Wa fi bakaanku,wakt al‑daggiin yamchi lahaddi l‑gatiʼ wa l‑gatiʼ lahaddi l‑teeraab.Wa taakulu min maʼaachku lahaddi tachbaʼo wa taskunu fi baladku be amaan.
 Wa nijiib al‑salaam fi l‑balad wa tunuumu wa ma fi cheyy yibarjil noomku.Wa niwaddir min al‑balad al‑haywaanaat al‑fasliin wa l‑seef ma yuchugg baladku.
Wa intu titaarudu udwaanku wa humman yumuutu be l‑seef giddaamku.
Wa minku intu,5 yaturdu 100 naas wa 100 yaturdu 10 000 naas.Wa udwaanku yumuutu be l‑seef giddaamku.
 Wa ana niwajjih aleeku wa nisawwiiku taldo wa tiziidu wa nisabbit maʼaaku muʼaahadaati.
Wa taakulu min intaajku al‑gadiim wakit tawiil lahaddi tamurgu intaajku al‑gadiim le tudummu al‑jadiid.
Wa ana nukhutt maskani fi usutku wa ma nakrahku.
Wa nuruukh fi usutku wa nabga Ilaahku wa intu tabgo chaʼabi.
Wa ana Allah Ilaahku al‑maragtuku min balad al‑Masriyiin le ma tabgo abiidhum wa ana bas al‑kassart al‑daami al‑fi rigaabku wa khalleetku maachiin raasku marfuuʼ.
 Wa kan intu ma tasmaʼooni wa ma titabbugu wasiiyaati
wa kan taabo churuuti wa takraho gawaaniini wa ma tihtarumu wasiiyaati wa tagtaʼo muʼaahadati,
khalaas daahu al‑nisawwi leeku.Nigawwim didduku al‑sull wa l‑wirde le nikhawwifku.Wa humman dool yidaʼʼufu choofku wa yaakulu hayaatku.Wa kan harattu kula,udwaanku bas yaakulu intaajku.
Wa ana nugumm didduku wa udwaanku yinnasru foogku wa l‑yakrahooku yahkumu foogku wa tajru kan ma yitaaruduuku kula.
 Wa kan be da kula ma simiʼtuuni,ana niʼaakhibku sabʼa marraat be sabab zunuubku.
Wa ana nikassir istikbaar gudritku wa nisawwi samaaku gawi misil hadiid wa arduku misil nahaas.
Wa intu tiʼayyu nufuusku bala faayde.Al‑ard ma tigawwim cheyy wa chadar al‑balad kula ma yalda iyaal.
 Wa kan be da kula tugummu diddi wa ma tasmaʼooni,ana nadrubku sabʼa marraat ziyaada be sabab zunuubku.
Wa nigawwim didduku haywaanaat al‑kadaade al‑yaakulu iyaalku wa yikammulu bahaayimku wa yisawwuuku chiyya wa duruubku yabgo faadiyiin.
 Wa kan be da kula ma tardo be ikhaabi wa tugummu diddi,
ana kula nugumm didduku wa ana kula nadrubku sabʼa marraat be sabab zunuubku.
Wa ana nijiib leeku al‑harib be sabab intu nagadtu muʼaahadati wa intu tilimmu fi mudunku.Wa ana nirassil leeku waba wa nisallimku le udwaanku.
Wa ana niwaggif minku al‑maʼaach wa achara awiin yisawwan leeku akil fi furun waahid.Hinna yijiibannah leeku chiyya.Intu taakulu wa ma tachbaʼo.
 Wa kan be da kula ma simiʼtuuni wa gammeetu diddi,
ana kula nugumm didduku be khadab chadiid wa ana zaati niʼaakhibku sabʼa marraat be sabab zunuubku.
Wa taakulu laham awlaadku wa banaatku.
Wa ana nidammir bakaanaatku al‑aaliyiin wa nikassir makhaabirku hana l‑bakhuur.Wa nuruss janaazaatku maʼa janaazaat asnaamku wa nakrahku.
Wa nisawwi mudunku kharaab wa bakaanaat al‑mukhaddasiin faadiyiin wa ma nuchumm al‑riihe al‑tiharruguuha le ridaayi.
Wa ana zaati nijiib al‑hizin fi l‑balad wa udwaanku al‑yaskunuuha yinbahtu.
Wa kan leeku intu,nijiib leeku al‑harib wa nichattitku fi lubb al‑umam.Wa baladku tabga kharaab wa mudunku yilhaddamo.
 Wa kulla l‑wakit al‑intu gaaʼidiin foogah fi balad udwaanku,baladku al‑kharbaane tinjamma.Wa da yibaddil ayyaam al‑sabt al‑intu ma ahtaramtuuhum.
Wa fi muddit kulla ayyaam kharaabha,hi tinjamma wa tilkaffa ayyaam al‑sabt al‑hi ma anjammat fooghum wakit intu saakniin foogha.
 Wa kan le l‑yifaddulu minku fi balad udwaanku,ana nagtaʼ achamhum.Wa haraka hana warchaalaay al‑chaayleeha al‑riih kula tatrudhum wa humman yiʼarrudu misil al‑muʼarrid min al‑harib wa yagaʼo kan ma yitaaruduuhum kula.
Wa humman yittartaʼo al‑waahid fi l‑aakhar misil fi l‑harib,kan ma yitaaruduuhum kula.Wa intu ma tagdaro tigabbulu udwaanku
wa tumuutu fi lubb al‑umam wa balad udwaanku tazrutku.
Wa l‑yifaddulu minku yumuutu be sabab khataahum fi buldaan udwaanku.Wa battaan be sabab khata abbahaathum al‑zaad fi khataahum,humman yumuutu.
 Wa laakin yiʼtarufu be khataahum wa khata abbahaathum wa yuguulu humman sawwo khiyaana lahaddi gammo diddi.
Wa ana kula nugumm didduhum wa niwaddiihum fi balad udwaanhum.Wa be da,guluubhum al‑ma taahiriin yiʼayyubuuhum wa ikhaabhum yilhaggag.
Wa ana nisawwi hasab muʼaahadati maʼa Yaakhuub wa hasab muʼaahadati maʼa Ishaakh wa hasab muʼaahadati maʼa Ibraahiim wa nifakkir fi l‑balad.
Wa be da wakit al‑balad tabga kharbaane wa faadiye minhum,hi tinjamma misil fi yoom al‑sabt.Wa khalaas,yiʼtarufu be ikhaabhum achaan humman abo gawaaniini wa kirho churuuti.
 Wa fi chaan da wakit yukuunu fi balad udwaanhum,ana ma naabaahum wa la nakrahhum lahaddi nikammilhum wa nagtaʼ muʼaahadati maʼaahum achaan ana Allah Ilaahhum.
Wa fi chaanhum,ana nitimm al‑muʼaahada al‑awwal sawweetha maʼa juduudhum al‑maragtuhum min balad Masir giddaam kulla l‑umam achaan nabga Ilaahhum.Wa ana bas Allah. 
Wa dool al‑wasaaya wa l‑gawaaniin wa l‑churuut al‑khataahum Allah beenah hu wa been Bani Israaʼiil fi jabal Siinaaʼ be waasitat Muusa.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum : Kan naadum yisawwi nazir wa yuguul yikhassis insaan le Allah,waajib yigaddim le Allah al‑taman al‑haddadooh le l‑insaan da.
Wa daahu al‑taman. Le l‑raajil al‑umrah min 20 lahaddi 60 sana,al‑taman al‑haddadooh leyah hu 50 hajar fudda wa da hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.
 Wa le l‑mara kamaan tamanha 30 hajar fudda.
 Wa le l‑naadum al‑umrah min 5 lahaddi 20 sana,kan wileed tamanah 20 hajar fudda wa kan bineeye tamanha 10 hajar fudda.
 Wa le l‑naadum al‑umrah min chahar lahaddi 5 sana,kan wileed tamanah 5 hajar fudda wa kan bineeye tamanha 3 hajar fudda.
 Wa le l‑naadum al‑umrah min 60 sana wa foog,kan raajil tamanah 15 hajar fudda wa kan mara tamanha 10 hajar fudda.
 Wa kan al‑raajil al‑sawwa al‑nazir da fagri ma yagdar yikaffi al‑taman,yiwaddi al‑naadum al‑mukhassas bakaan raajil al‑diin.Wa raajil al‑diin yagtaʼ leyah al‑taman hasab gudurtah.
 Wa kan bahiime chaalooha min al‑bahaayim al‑yagdaro yigaddumuuhum le Allah,ajʼalo ayyi bahiime al‑yigaddumuuha le Allah mukhassasa.
Ma yikhayyuruuha wa la yibadduluuha wa la yichiilu al‑adiile fi badal al‑ma adiile wa la l‑ma adiile fi badal al‑adiile.Wa kan yibaddulu bahiime be bahiime aakhara,al‑bahaayim al‑itneen dool yabgo mukhassasiin.
 Wa kan al‑bahiime di nijse al‑ma yagdaro yigaddumuuha le Allah,waajib yijiibuuha le raajil al‑diin.
Wa raajil al‑diin yichiifha kan adiile wa la ma adiile wa humman yitabbugu hasab kalaam raajil al‑diin.
Wa kan yidooru yafdooha kamaan,yiziidu foogha khumusha.
 Wa kan naadum khassas beetah le Allah,raajil al‑diin yichiifah kan adiil wa la ma adiil.Wa siid al‑beet yarda be l‑taman al‑gataʼah leyah raajil al‑diin.
Wa kan al‑raajil al‑khassas beetah dawwar yafdaah hu yiziid foogah khumus tamanah wa khalaas yabga hanaayah.
 Wa kan naadum khassas bakaan le Allah min ard warasatah,tamanah yabga hasab al‑cheyy al‑titeerubuuh wa da 50 hajar fudda le chuwaaleen wa nuss hana gameh abyad.
Wa kan naadum yikhassis ardah min sanit al‑Hurriiye,hu yarda be l‑taman da.
Wa kan naadum yikhassis ardah baʼad sanit al‑Hurriiye,raajil al‑diin yahsib al‑taman hasab al‑siniin al‑faddalo le sanit al‑Hurriiye al‑jaayi wa yangusah min al‑taman al‑magtuuʼ.
Wa kan al‑naadum al‑khassas ardah yidoor yafdaaha,hu yiziid foogha khumus tamanha wa hi tabga hintah.
Wa kan hu ma fadaaha bas baaʼha le naadum aakhar,khalaas hagg al‑fadayaan yabga ma fiih.
Wa l‑ard di wakit yikhalliiha fi sanit al‑Hurriiye,hi tabga khaass le Allah misil muharrama wa tabga ard warasa hint rujaal al‑diin.
 Wa kan naadum chara ard wa khassasha le Allah wa l‑ard di ma min ard warasatah,
khalaas raajil al‑diin yahsib tamanha lahaddi sanit al‑Hurriiye wa hu yikaffi tamanha fi nafs al‑yoom wa da cheyy mukhassas le Allah.
Wa fi sanit al‑Hurriiye,al‑ard di tigabbil le siidha al‑awwal charooha minnah wa hi tabga ard warasatah.
 Wa ayyi taman yabga hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wa hajar fudda yawzin 12 giraam.
 Wa abadan naadum ma yagdar yikhassis wileed al‑bikir min bahaaymah achaan wileed al‑bikir da hu min wildooh bas hana Allah.Kan min al‑khanam wa la min al‑bagar kula,hu min wildooh bas hana Allah.
Wa kan le l‑bahiime al‑nijse,yagdaro yafdooha wa yiziidu fi tamanha khumusha.Wa kan ma fadooha kamaan,yibiiʼuuha hasab al‑taman al‑magtuuʼ leeha.
 Wa kulla cheyy al‑yikhassisah al‑insaan le Allah min kulla cheyy haggah halaalah misil al‑naadum wa l‑bahiime wa l‑zereʼ min ard warasatah,dool ma yibiiʼuuhum wa la yafdoohum.Wa kulla cheyy al‑tantuuh le Allah yabga mukhassas marra waahid.
Wa ayyi naadum kan khassasooh le l‑damaar,ma yafdooh laakin yumuut.
 Wa ayyi uchur al‑tichiiluuh min intaaj al‑ard wa min al‑fawaakih yabga hana Allah wa da cheyy mukhassas le Allah.
Wa kan naadum yidoor yafda cheyy min al‑uchur al‑hu yantiih,waajib yikaffi tamanah wa yiziid foogah khumsah.
Wa kulla l‑uchur hana l‑bagar wa l‑khanam wa da ayyi bahiime al‑aachre al‑tufuut tihit al‑dugul,hi tabga mukhassasa le Allah.
Wa ma yimayyuzu al‑bahiime kan adiile walla ma adiile wa la yibadduluuha be bahiime aakhara.Wa kan baddalooha,humman al‑itneen yabgo mukhassasiin le Allah wa ma yagdaro yafdoohum. 
Wa dool al‑wasaaya al‑antaahum Allah be waasitat Muusa le Bani Israaʼiil fi jabal Siinaaʼ.
Fi saharat Siinaaʼ,Allah hajja le Muusa fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa da fi l‑yoom al‑awwal hana l‑chahar al‑taani fi l‑sana al‑taaniye baʼad marigiin Bani Israaʼiil min balad Masir.Wa Allah gaal :
 Ahsubu kulla l‑naas min mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.Wa sajjulu asaame kulla l‑rujaal al‑min Bani Israaʼiil
al‑umurhum min 20 sana wa foog al‑yagdaro le khidmit al‑askariiye.Inta wa Haaruun ahsubuuhum hasab majmuuʼaathum.
Wa chiilu maʼaaku min ayyi gabiila raajil waahid kabiir aayiltah.
Wa daahu asaame al‑rujaal al‑yukuunu maʼaaku.Min gabiilat RaʼuubiinAlisuur wileed Chadayuur.
Wa min gabiilat ChimʼuunChalumiyiil wileed Surichadaay.
Wa min gabiilat YahuuzaNahchuun wileed Aminadaab.
Wa min gabiilat YassaakarNataniil wileed Suuʼar.
Wa min gabiilat ZabuluunAliyaab wileed Hiiluun.
Wa min zurriiyit Yuusuf kamaan min gabiilat AfraayimAlichamaʼ wileed Amihuudwa min gabiilat ManassaGamaliyiil wileed Fadahsuur.
Wa min gabiilat BanyaamiinAbidaan wileed Gidʼuuni.
Wa min gabiilat DaanAkhiʼaazar wileed Amichadaay.
Wa min gabiilat AchiirFagʼiyiil wileed Ukran.
Wa min gabiilat GaadAliyaasaf wileed Daʼuwiil.
Wa min gabiilat NaftaaliAkhiiraʼ wileed Inaan. 
Wa humman dool mumassiliin mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil.Wa ayyi waahid cheekh fi gabiiltah wa humman bas kubaaraat hana khuchuum buyuut Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun chaalo maʼaahum kulla l‑kubaaraat al‑azaloohum dool.
Wa fi nafs al‑yoom da yaʼni al‑yoom al‑awwal hana l‑chahar al‑taani,humman lammo kulla l‑mujtamaʼ wa sajjalo asaame kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 20 sana wa foog hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.
Wa khalaas Muusa hasabaahum fi saharat Siinaaʼ misil Allah amarah beyah.
Wa da adad al‑naas al‑hasaboohum Muusa wa Haaruun wa l‑chuyuukh al‑atnaachar al‑yimassulu aayilaat Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil al‑umurhum min 20 sana wa foog al‑yagdaro le khidmit al‑askariiye hasaboohum hasab aayilaathum
wa adadhum bigi 603 550 raajil.
Wa laakin rujaal gabiilat Laawi ma hasaboohum maʼa l‑aakhariin.
Achaan Allah gaal le Muusa :
 Gabiilat Laawi ma tahsibha wa la tisajjilha maʼa Bani Israaʼiil.
Kallifhum be kheemat al‑ibaada al‑foogha al‑sanduug al‑indah liihaan al‑muʼaahada wa kulla muʼiddaatha wa kulla cheyy al‑foogha.Humman yichiilu al‑kheema di wa kulla muʼiddaatha wa yakhdumu foogha wa yanzulu hawaaleeha.
Wa wakit tisiiru,al‑Laawiyiin bas yifartuguuha.Wa wakit tanzulu kula,humman bas yabnuuha.Laakin ayyi naadum aakhar kan yigarrib le l‑kheema di,waajib yumuut.
Khalli Bani Israaʼiil yanzulu ayyi waahid fi muʼaskarah wa ayyi waahid tihit raaytah fi majmuuʼtah al‑askariiye.
Wa laakin al‑Laawiyiin khalli yanzulu hawaale kheemat al‑ibaada al‑foogha al‑sanduug al‑indah liihaan al‑muʼaahada wa yahfadooha.Wa be da,khadabi ma yanzil fi kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal :
 Ayyi naadum min Bani Israaʼiil yanzil maʼa majmuuʼat aayiltah tihit raayitha al‑askariiye.Wa yukhuttu muʼaskarhum hawaale kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa muwajjihiin aleeha.
 Wa min jiihat al‑sabaah,yabnu muʼaskar Yahuuza tihit raayaathum hasab majmuuʼaathum al‑askariiye.Wa cheekhhum Nahchuun wileed Aminadaab.
Wa adad askarah 74 600 raajil.
Wa jambah tanzil gabiilat Yassaakar wa cheekhha Nataniil wileed Suuʼar.
Wa adad askarah 54 400 raajil.
Wa battaan tanzil maʼaayah gabiilat Zabuluun wa cheekhha Aliyaab wileed Hiiluun.
Wa adad askarah 57 400 raajil.
Wa l‑majmuuʼaat al‑askariiye al‑yikawwunu muʼaskar Yahuuza adadhum kulluhum ke 186 400 raajil.Wa humman yamchu awwal naas.
 Wa min jiihat al‑wati,yukhuttu muʼaskar Raʼuubiin tihit raayaathum hasab majmuuʼaathum al‑askariiye.Wa cheekhhum Alisuur wileed Chadayuur.
Wa adad askarah 46 500 raajil.
Wa jambah tanzil gabiilat Chimʼuun wa cheekhha Chalumiyiil wileed Surichadaay.
Wa adad askarah 59 300 raajil.
Wa battaan tanzil maʼaayah gabiilat Gaad wa cheekhha Aliyaasaf wileed Daʼuwiil.
Wa adad askarah 45 650 raajil.
Wa l‑majmuuʼaat al‑askariiye al‑yikawwunu muʼaskar Raʼuubiin adadhum kulluhum ke 151 450 raajil.Wa humman yamchu taani naas.
 Wa baʼad da,tamchi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ maʼa muʼaskar al‑Laawiyiin fi ust al‑muʼaskaraat.Wa ayyi muʼaskar yisiir tihit raaytah hasab al‑nizaam al‑nazal foogah.
 Wa min jiihat al‑kharib,yukhuttu muʼaskar Afraayim tihit raayaathum hasab majmuuʼaathum al‑askariiye.Wa cheekhhum Alichamaʼ wileed Amihuud.
Wa adad askarah 40 500 raajil.
Wa jambah tanzil gabiilat Manassa wa cheekhha Gamaliyiil wileed Fadahsuur.
Wa adad askarah 32 200 raajil.
Wa battaan tanzil maʼaayah gabiilat Banyaamiin wa cheekhha Abidaan wileed Gidʼuuni.
Wa adad askarah 35 400 raajil.
Wa l‑majmuuʼaat al‑askariiye al‑yikawwunu muʼaskar Afraayim adadhum kulluhum ke 108 100 raajil.Wa humman yamchu taalit naas.
 Wa min jiihat al‑munchaakh,yukhuttu muʼaskar Daan tihit raayaathum hasab majmuuʼaathum al‑askariiye.Wa cheekhhum Akhiʼaazar wileed Amichadaay.
Wa adad askarah 62 700 raajil.
Wa jambah tanzil gabiilat Achiir wa cheekhha Fagʼiyiil wileed Ukran.
Wa adad askarah 41 500 raajil.
Wa battaan tanzil maʼaayah gabiilat Naftaali wa cheekhha Akhiiraʼ wileed Inaan.
Wa adad askarah 53 400 raajil.
Wa l‑majmuuʼaat al‑askariiye al‑yikawwunu muʼaskar Daan adadhum kulluhum ke 157 600 raajil.Wa humman yamchu wara tihit raayithum. 
Wa khalaas Bani Israaʼiil hasaboohum hasab aayilaathum wa majmuuʼaathum al‑askariiye wa adadhum bigi 603 550 raajil.
Wa laakin al‑Laawiyiin ma hasaboohum maʼa askar Bani Israaʼiil.Wa da,misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa khalaas Bani Israaʼiil sawwo kula cheyy misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.Wa yanzulu tihit raayaathum wa yisiiru hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.
Di hi zurriiyit Haaruun akhu Muusa fi l‑wakit al‑hajja foogah Allah le Muusa fi jabal Siinaaʼ.
Haaruun indah arbaʼa awlaad.Al‑bikir usmah Nadaab wa waraayah Abiihu wa Aliʼaazar wa Itamaar.
Wa dool awlaad Haaruun al‑masahoohum wa darrajoohum rujaal diin.
Laakin Nadaab wa Abiihu maato fi saharat Siinaaʼgiddaam Allah.Wa maato achaan humman gaddamo le Allah fi lubb kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ bakhuur fi naar al‑hu ma azan beeha.Wa humman maato wa ma khallo iyaal.Wa akhwaanhum Aliʼaazar wa Itamaar kamaan gaaʼidiin yakhdumu khidmit rujaal al‑diin tihit muraakhabat abuuhum Haaruun.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Gaddim naas gabiilat Laawi wa khuttuhum tihit muraakhabat Haaruun raajil al‑diin achaan yakhdumu leyah.
Wa yugummu be khidmit al‑kheema di wa yaharsu Haaruun wa yahfado kulla l‑mujtamaʼ giddaam kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa humman yahfado kulla muʼiddaat kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa yahfado Bani Israaʼiil kula wa yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ibaada.
Wa anti al‑Laawiyiin le Haaruun wa awlaadah achaan yisaaʼuduuhum.Wa humman yabgo misil atiiye al‑jaabooha kulla Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa kallif Haaruun wa awlaadah le yahfado khidmit rujaal al‑diin di leehum humman bas.Wa ayyi naadum aakhar kan yisawwi nafsah raajil diin,waajib yumuut. 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Daahu ana chilt al‑Laawiyiin min kulla Bani Israaʼiil fi badal kulla awlaad al‑bikir min ammahaathum achaan al‑Laawiyiin yabgo hineeyi ana.
Wa kulla awlaad al‑bikir hineeyi.Achaan min yoom ana katalt kulla awlaad al‑bikir hana l‑Masriyiin fi balad Masir,ana khassast kulla awlaad al‑bikir fi Israaʼiil min al‑naas wa min al‑bahaayim le yabgo hineeyi ana Allah. 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa fi saharat Siinaaʼ wa gaal :
 Ahsib al‑dukuur min zurriiyit Laawi hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum min wileed chahar wa foog wa alga adadhum. 
Wa Muusa hasabaahum hasab kalaam Allah al‑hu amarah beyah.
Wa daahu iyaal Laawi.Hu jaab Girchuun wa Gahaat wa Maraari.
Wa Girchuun jaab khuchuum buyuut Libni wa Chimʼi.
Wa Gahaat jaab khuchuum buyuut Amraam wa Yishaar wa Habruun wa Uzziyiil.
Wa Maraari jaab khuchuum buyuut Mahli wa Muuchi.Wa dool kulluhum ke khuchuum al‑buyuut wa l‑aayilaat al‑marago min Laawi.
Wa min Girchuun wileed Laawi marago khuchuum buyuut Libni wa Chimʼi.Wa humman bas al‑yikawwunu gabiilat Girchuun.
Wa hasabo adad al‑dukuur min wileed chahar wa foog wa adadhum bigi 7 500.
Wa khuchuum buyuut hana gabiilat Girchuun yanzulu wara l‑kheema min jiihat al‑kharib.
Wa cheekh gabiilat Girchuun usmah Aliyaasaf wileed Laayiil.
Wa fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ,zurriiyit Girchuun tahfad kheemat al‑ibaada wa khitaaha wa sitaar hana madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ
wa l‑sataayir al‑muhawwigiin beehum al‑fadaay wa sitaar baab al‑fadaay al‑muhawwige kheemat al‑ibaada wa l‑madbah wa kulla l‑hubaal.Wa gabiilat Girchuun masʼuula min kulla l‑khumaam dool.
Wa min Gahaat wileed Laawi marago khuchuum buyuut Amraam wa Yishaar wa Habruun wa Uzziyiil.Wa humman bas al‑yikawwunu gabiilat Gahaat.
Wa hasabo adad al‑dukuur min wileed chahar wa foog wa adadhum bigi 8 300.Wa humman yahfado muʼiddaat al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.
Wa khuchuum buyuut hana gabiilat Gahaat yanzulu min jiihat al‑wati le kheemat al‑ibaada.
Wa cheekh gabiilat Gahaat usmah Alisaafan wileed Uzziyiil.
Wa humman masʼuuliin min sanduug muʼaahadat Allah wa l‑tarabeeza wa l‑faanuus wa l‑madaabih wa l‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhassasiin wa l‑sitaar al‑yidaarig sanduug muʼaahadat Allah.Wa gabiilat Gahaat masʼuula min kulla l‑khumaam dool.
Wa kubaaraat al‑Laawiyiin kabiirhum Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun raajil al‑diin.Wa hu masʼuul min al‑naas al‑yahfado al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.
Wa min Maraari wileed Laawi marago khuchuum buyuut Mahli wa Muuchi.Wa humman bas al‑yikawwunu gabiilat Maraari.
Wa hasabo adad al‑dukuur min wileed chahar wa foog wa adadhum bigi 6 200.
Wa cheekh gabiilat Maraari usmah Suriyiil wileed Abihaayil.Wa humman yanzulu min jiihat al‑munchaakh le kheemat al‑ibaada.
Wa humman masʼuuliin min khachab al‑kheema wa maraadiis wa amadha wa asaasha wa kulla muʼiddaatha.Wa gabiilat Maraari masʼuula min kulla l‑khumaam dool.
Wa battaan induhum masʼuuliiye fi l‑muʼiddaat al‑muhawwigiin beehum al‑fadaay misil al‑amad wa l‑asaas wa l‑wutaad wa l‑hubaal.
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun wa awlaadah yanzulu giddaam kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ min jiihaat al‑sabaah.Wa humman yahfado Bani Israaʼiil giddaam al‑beet al‑mukhaddas.Wa ayyi naadum aakhar kan yigarrib le l‑beet da waajib yumuut.
Wa hasab kalaam Allah,Muusa wa Haaruun hasabo kulla l‑Laawiyiin al‑dukuur min wileed chahar wa foog hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Wa adadhum bigi 22 000.
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Ahsib kulla awlaad al‑bikir al‑dukuur min Bani Israaʼiil al‑umurhum min chahar wa foog wa sajjil asaameehum.
Wa ajʼal al‑Laawiyiin leyi ana Allah fi badal kulla awlaad al‑bikir min Bani Israaʼiil.Wa ajʼal bahaayim al‑Laawiyiin fi badal kulla awlaad al‑bikir hana bahaayim Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa Muusa hasab kulla awlaad al‑bikir min Bani Israaʼiil misil Allah amarah beyah.
Wa sajjal asaame kulla awlaad al‑bikir al‑dukuur al‑umurhum min chahar wa foog.Wa adadhum bigi 22 273.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Ajʼal al‑Laawiyiin fi badal kulla awlaad al‑bikir min Bani Israaʼiil wa bahaayim al‑Laawiyiin fi badal bahaayimhum.Wa l‑Laawiyiin yabgo hineeyi ana Allah.
Wa laakin awlaad al‑bikir min Bani Israaʼiil adadhum bigi 273 ziyaada min adad al‑Laawiyiin.Wa l‑naas al‑ziyaada dool waajib tafdoohum.
Wa le fadayaanhum,tichiil 5 hajar fudda le ayyi waahid.Wa hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas,ayyi hajar fudda yawzin 12 giraam.
Wa l‑fudda al‑yafdo beeha al‑naas al‑ziyaada di,antiiha le Haaruun wa awlaadah. 
Wa Muusa lamma fuddit al‑fadayaan hana l‑naas al‑adadhum ziyaada min adad al‑Laawiyiin.
Wa Muusa chaal min awlaad al‑bikir hana Bani Israaʼiil 1 365 hajar fudda hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.
Wa Muusa anta fuddit al‑fadayaan di le Haaruun wa awlaadah misil Allah amarah beyah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal :
 Min zurriiyit Laawi,ahsib zurriiyit Gahaat hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.
Wa sajjil kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 30 le 50 sana le yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
 Daahu khidmit zurriiyit Gahaat fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Humman masʼuuliin fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.
Wa wakit yidooru yisiiru,Haaruun wa awlaadah yifartugu al‑sitaar al‑yidaarig al‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada wa yikhattuuh beyah.
Wa yiliffuuh be farwit ijil al‑bahar.Wa baʼad da,kulla ke yiliffuuh be gumaach zahri wa yidissu leyah iseeyah al‑yichiiluuh beehum.
 Wa l‑tarabeeza hana l‑khubza al‑mukhaddasa,yafurchu foogha gumaach zahri.Wa be foog le l‑tarabeeza di,yukhuttu al‑sufar wa l‑kharaariif wa l‑kiisaan wa l‑abaariig al‑yigaddumuuh fooghum hadiiyat al‑charaab.Wa l‑khubza al‑daayme kula tukuun gaaʼide foog al‑tarabeeza di.
Wa yikhattu al‑tarabeeza wa kulla l‑khumaam al‑foogha be gumaach ahmar.Wa baʼad da,yiliffuuha be farwit ijil al‑bahar wa yidissu leeha iseeyha al‑yichiiluuha beehum.
 Wa yichiilu khita min gumaach zahri wa yikhattu beyah al‑faanuus wa tiyeesaat le l‑naar al‑murassas foogah wa kalaaliibah wa taffaayaatah wa kulla mawaaʼiin al‑dihin al‑yistaʼmaloohum fi khidmit al‑faanuus.
Wa l‑faanuus wa kulla muʼiddaatah yiliffuuh be farwit ijil al‑bahar wa baʼad da,yukhuttuuh fi l‑cheyy al‑yanguluuh beyah.
 Wa yikhattu mukhbar al‑bakhuur hana l‑dahab be gumaach zahri wa yiliffuuh be farwit ijil al‑bahar wa baʼad da,yidissu leyah iseeyah al‑yichiiluuh beehum.
Wa yichiilu kulla muʼiddaat al‑ibaada al‑yakhdumu beehum fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wa yikhattuuhum be gumaach zahri wa yiliffuuhum be farwit ijil al‑bahar wa baʼad da,yukhuttuuhum fi l‑cheyy al‑yanguluuhum beyah.
 Wa yukhummu al‑rumaad min al‑madbah wa yafurchu foogah gumaach garadi.
Wa yichiilu kulla l‑muʼiddaat al‑yakhdumu beehum wa yukhuttuuhum foogah misil khammaamaat al‑naar wa l‑hadaayid al‑yisillu beehum al‑laham wa l‑feelaat wa l‑kiisaan.Wa l‑madbah wa kulla muʼiddaatah yiliffuuh be farwit ijil al‑bahar wa baʼad da,yidissu leyah iseeyah al‑yichiiluuh beehum.
 Wa wakit Haaruun wa awlaadah yikammulu min damdimiin al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wa kulla l‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhassasiin.Wa wakit yugummu min al‑muʼaskar zurriiyit Gahaat yaju yichiilu al‑khumaam dool.Laakin ma yilammusu minhum cheyy achaan da yijiib leehum al‑moot.Wa da bas al‑kallafo beyah zurriiyit Gahaat min kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun raajil al‑diin mukallaf be dihin al‑faanuus wa l‑bakhuur al‑muʼattar wa l‑hadiiye al‑daayme wa dihin al‑masahaan.Wa hu indah masʼuuliiye fi kulla kheemat al‑ibaada wa fi kulla cheyy al‑gaaʼid fi lubbaha wa fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wa kulla muʼiddaatah. 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal :
 Ma tikhallu khuchuum buyuut Gahaat yingatʼu min ust al‑Laawiyiin.
Wa khalli Haaruun wa awlaadah yadkhulu wa yikallufu ayyi waahid min zurriiyit Gahaat be khidimtah wa be himlah al‑yangulah.Wa be da,humman ma yumuutu wakit yangulu al‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhaddasiin marra waahid.
Wa ma waajib yadkhulu yichiifu al‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhaddasiin hatta le mudda gisayre kula achaan da yijiib leehum al‑moot. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Ahsib zurriiyit Girchuun hasab aayilaathum wa khuchuum buyuuthum.
Wa sajjil kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 30 le 50 sana le yugummu wa yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
 Daahu khidmit khuchuum buyuut Girchuun.Humman yakhdumu wa yangulu.
Yangulu sataayir kheemat al‑ibaada wa kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa l‑khita al‑be foog leeha wa l‑khita al‑min farwit ijil al‑bahar wa sitaar hana madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa battaan yangulu sataayir al‑fadaay al‑muhawwige kheemat al‑ibaada wa l‑madbah wa l‑sitaar hana khachum baab al‑fadaay wa l‑hubaal wa kulla l‑muʼiddaat al‑waajib leehum le yisawwu khidmithum.
 Wa be amur min Haaruun wa awlaadah,zurriiyit Girchuun yisawwu kulla khidmithum hana l‑nagiliin.Wa humman bas al‑yikallufu zurriiyit Girchuun be l‑khumaam al‑yahfadooh wa l‑yanguluuh.
Wa di khidmit khuchuum buyuut Girchuun humman yakhdumu wa yahfado kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ tihit muraakhabat Itamaar wileed Haaruun raajil al‑diin. 
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa : Ahsib zurriiyit Maraari hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.
Wa sajjil kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 30 le 50 sana le yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Daahu kulla khidmithum fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa l‑muʼiddaat al‑yahfadoohum wa yanguluuhum.Humman yangulu khachab al‑kheema wa maraadiisha wa amadha wa asaasha
wa l‑amad al‑muhawwigiin beehum al‑fadaay wa l‑asaas wa l‑wutaad wa l‑hubaal wa kulla l‑muʼiddaat al‑waajib leehum le yisawwu khidmithum.Ayyi waahid yinaaduuh be usmah wa yikallufuuh be l‑muʼiddaat al‑yahfadhum wa l‑yangulhum.
Wa di khidmit khuchuum buyuut Maraari fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ tihit muraakhabat Itamaar wileed Haaruun raajil al‑diin. 
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun wa chuyuukh al‑mujtamaʼ hasabo zurriiyit Gahaat hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.
Wa sajjalo kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 30 le 50 sana al‑yagdaro yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa fi khuchuum al‑buyuut dool adad al‑rujaal bigi 2 750 raajil.
Wa da adad al‑rujaal min khuchuum buyuut Gahaat al‑gaaʼidiin yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Wa khalaas Muusa wa Haaruun hasaboohum hasab kalaam Allah le Muusa.
Wa hasabo zurriiyit Girchuun hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.
Wa sajjalo kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 30 le 50 sana al‑yagdaro yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa fi khuchuum al‑buyuut wa l‑aayilaat dool adad al‑rujaal bigi 2 630 raajil.
Wa da adad al‑rujaal min khuchuum buyuut Girchuun al‑gaaʼidiin yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Wa khalaas Muusa wa Haaruun hasaboohum hasab kalaam Allah.
Wa hasabo zurriiyit Maraari hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.
Wa sajjalo kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 30 le 50 sana al‑yagdaro yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa fi khuchuum al‑buyuut dool adad al‑rujaal bigi 3 200.
Wa da adad al‑rujaal min khuchuum buyuut Maraari.Wa khalaas Muusa wa Haaruun hasaboohum hasab kalaam Allah le Muusa.
Wa khalaas Muusa wa Haaruun wa chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil hasabo kulla l‑Laawiyiin hasab khuchuum buyuuthum wa aayilaathum.
Wa sajjalo kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 30 le 50 sana al‑yagdaro yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa yanguluuha.
Wa l‑rujaal dool adadhum be l‑jumla bigi 8 580.
Wa hasab amur Allah,Muusa hasabaahum wa anta le ayyi raajil khidimtah wa himlah al‑yangulah wa masʼuuliiytah misil Allah amarah beyah.
Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Aamur Bani Israaʼiil yaturdu min al‑fariig ayyi naadum al‑indah marad al‑jismi aw bajal aw nijis be sabab hu limis janaaza.
Kan awiin walla rujaal kula yaturduuhum barra min al‑fariig achaan ma yinajjusu al‑fariig al‑ana gaaʼid foogah fi usuthum. 
Wa Bani Israaʼiil tabbago kulla l‑kalaam al‑Allah gaalah le Muusa wa tarado al‑naas al‑ma taahiriin barra min al‑fariig.
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil ayyi raajil walla mara kan sawwa zanib min kulla l‑zunuub al‑yisawwiihum Bani Adam,hu isi Allah.Wa be da,hu yabga khaati.
Khalli yiʼtarif be zanbah al‑hu sawwaah wa yigabbil al‑cheyy al‑hu saragah wa yiziid foogah al‑khumus hana tamanah wa yantiih le l‑naadum al‑hu khiti foogah.
Wa kan al‑naadum da maat wa ma indah wariis le yigabbulu leyah al‑cheyy al‑sirgooh,khalaas al‑cheyy da yantuuh le Allah yaʼni yantuuh le raajil al‑diin.Wa da bala kabich al‑kaffaara al‑waajib hu yijiibah le yikaffir beyah zanbah.
 Wa kulla l‑hadaaya al‑mukhaddasiin al‑yijiibuuhum Bani Israaʼiil le raajil al‑diin,hu indah fooghum hagg.
Wa ayyi naadum kan yijiib hadiiye mukhaddasa le raajil al‑diin,al‑hadiiye di tabga hint raajil al‑diin. 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum,masalan,mara khaalafat raajilha wa khaanatah
wa ragadat maʼa raajil aakhar wa najjasat nafisha be achiir.Wa raajilha ma indah khabar wa naadum aakhar chahad foogha walla karabaaha kula ma fiih.
Kan raajil al‑mara di nandal wa chakka foogha,kan hi najjasat nafisha walla ma najjasat nafisha kula,
khalli raajilha yiwaddiiha giddaam raajil al‑diin.Wa yiwaddi maʼaayah hadiiye kooro hana dagiig gameh abyad.Wa l‑hadiiye di,ma yusubb foogha dihin walla yusubb foogha riihe achaan di hadiiye hint khiira wa hadiiye hint zikra al‑yizzakkaro beeha al‑khata.
Wa raajil al‑diin yichiil al‑mara di wa yiwaggifha giddaam Allah.
Wa yichiil al‑almi al‑mukhaddas le Allah wa yusubbah fi maaʼuun hana tiine wa yukhumm turaab min lubb kheemat al‑ibaada wa yikhalbitah maʼa l‑almi da.
Wa baʼad waggafaaha giddaam Allah,hu yakchif raasha wa yantiiha fi iideenha hadiiyat al‑zikra yaʼni hadiiyat al‑khiira.Wa raajil al‑diin kamaan yichiil fi iidah al‑almi al‑murr al‑yijiib al‑laʼana al‑hu jahhazah.
 Wa khalaas,raajil al‑diin yihallif al‑mara wa yuguul :‹ Kan inti bariiye ma ragadti maʼa raajil aakhar wa ma khaalafti raajilki wa ma najjasti nafiski,al‑almi al‑murr al‑yijiib al‑laʼana da,ma yisawwi leeki cheyy !
Wa laakin kan khaalafti raajilki wa khuntiih wa najjasti nafiski wa dasseeti raajil aakhar wara raajilki kamaan,al‑haliife talhagki ! ›
 Wa khalaas,raajil al‑diin yihallifha be haliifit al‑laʼana wa yuguul :‹ Allah yajʼalki malʼuuna wa hallaafa fi usut ahalki.Wa yajʼalki aagre wa yanfukh batunki.
Wa khalli al‑almi al‑yijiib al‑laʼana da yadkhul fi batunki wa yanfukhha wa be da,tabge aagre.› Wa hi tuguul :‹ Aamiin !Aamiin ! ›
 Wa raajil al‑diin yaktib kalimaat al‑laʼana di wa yakhsilhum fi l‑almi al‑murr.
Wa yanti al‑almi al‑murr al‑yijiib al‑laʼana le l‑mara achaan yijiib foogha al‑laʼana wa maraarit al‑dunya.
Wa raajil al‑diin yichiil min al‑mara hadiiyat al‑khiira wa yarfaʼha giddaam Allah wa yigaddimha fi l‑madbah.
Wa yamla iidah min dagiig al‑hadiiye wa da yimassil kulla l‑hadiiye di.Wa hu yiharrigah fi l‑madbah.Wa be da,Allah yazkurah.Wa baʼad da,yazgi al‑mara al‑almi da.
Wa baʼad hu zagaaha al‑almi khalaas,daahu al‑cheyy al‑yukuun leeha kan hi najjasat nafisha wa khaanat raajilha.Al‑almi al‑yijiib al‑laʼana yidakhkhil foogha al‑murr wa yanfukh batunha wa be da,hi tabga aagre.Wa tabga mara malʼuuna fi usut ahalha.
Wa laakin kan hi ma najjasat nafisha wa hi mara taahire khalaas hi bariiye wa talda wa tijiib iyaal.
 Wa da gaanuun al‑khiira al‑bukhuss al‑mara al‑tikhaalif raajilha wa tukhuunah wa tinajjis nafisha.
Aw al‑gaanuun da bukhuss al‑raajil al‑yinandil wa yuchukk fi martah.Wa be da,hu yagdar yiwaggifha giddaam Allah wa raajil al‑diin yitabbig foogha al‑gaanuun da.
Wa khalaas al‑raajil yukuun bari min al‑khata wa l‑mara kamaan tilhammal khataaha da. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum al‑kalaam da.Ayyi raajil aw mara kan yiʼaahid Allah be nazir achaan yikhassis nafsah leyah,
al‑naadum da ma yachrab khamar hana inab wa la ayyi charaab al‑bisakkir.Wa ma yachrab charaab haamud hana inab wa la charaab haamud hana ayyi charaab al‑bisakkir wa la yachrab asiir hana inab wa la yaakul inab layyin wa la yaabis.
Wa fi kulla ayyaam nazrah,al‑naadum da abadan ma yaakul akil maarig min iyaal chadarat al‑inab hatta min gichirhum wa la iyaalhum al‑daakhal kula.
 Wa fi kulla ayyaam nazrah,al‑naadum da ma yizayyin raasah.Wa wakit yikhassis nafsah le Allah,waajib yikhalli suuf raasah yiziid lahaddi yitimm ayyaam nazrah.
Wa fi kulla ayyaam nazrah le Allah,al‑naadum da abadan ma yamchi fi bakaan naadum mayyit.
Hatta kan al‑mayyit da abuuh aw ammah aw akhuuh aw akhtah kula,hu ma yinajjis beyah nafsah.Achaan al‑chaʼar al‑gaaʼid fi raasah da yiwassif nazrah maʼa l‑Rabb.
Wa fi kulla ayyaam nazrah,hu yabga khaass le Allah.
 Wa kan fajʼatan naadum maat jambah,hu yinnajjas wa nazrah kula.Wa yittahhar fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ wa fi l‑yoom da bas,yizayyin raasah.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taamin,yijiib gimri itneen aw furuukh hamaam itneen le raajil al‑diin fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa raajil al‑diin yigaddim al‑waahid dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa l‑aakhar dahiiye muharraga.Wa da yabga kaffaara le l‑zanib al‑hu sawwaah be sabab al‑mayyit wa fi nafs al‑yoom hu battaan yikhassis raasah.
Wa yikhassis nafsah min jadiid le Allah lahaddi yitimm nazrah.Wa yijiib kharuuf wald sana wa yigaddimah dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑khata.Wa l‑ayyaam al‑faato ma yahsibhum achaan nazrah al‑awwal da annajjas khalaas.
 Wa daahu gaanuun al‑nazir.Wakit al‑naadum da yitimm nazrah,yiwadduuh fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa yiwaddi maʼaayah hadiiye le Allah.Wa l‑hadiiye di,mukawwana min kharuuf wald sana al‑ma indah ayyi eeb le yigaddimah dahiiye muharraga wa khanamaay bitt sana al‑ma indaha ayyi eeb le yigaddimha hadiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa kabich al‑ma indah ayyi eeb le yigaddimah dahiiyat salaama
wa guffa al‑indaha kaʼak al‑sawwooh be dagiig bala tawwaara mukhalbat be dihin wa kisaar mamsuuh be dihin wa hadaaya aakhariin al‑waahid hana dagiig wa l‑aakhar hana charaab.
Wa raajil al‑diin yiwaddi kulla l‑hadaaya dool giddaam Allah wa yigaddimhum dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa dahiiye muharraga.
Wa l‑kabich hu yigaddimah le Allah dahiiyat al‑salaama maʼa l‑guffa al‑indaha kaʼak bala tawwaara.Wa battaan raajil al‑diin yigaddim hadiiye hana dagiig wa hadiiye hana charaab.
 Wa l‑naadum al‑sawwa al‑nazir yizayyin raasah fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa yichiil chaʼar raasah wa yazgulah fi l‑naar wakit hi gaaʼide tinajjid dahiiyat al‑salaama.
Wa raajil al‑diin yichiil al‑gaayme al‑giddaamiiye hana l‑kabich wakit tanjad wa yichiil min al‑guffa kaʼakaay bala tawwaara wa yichiil kisaaraay wa yukhuttuhum fi iideen al‑naadum al‑sawwa al‑nazir baʼad zayyan raasah.
Wa raajil al‑diin yarfaʼ al‑hadaaya dool giddaam Allah.Wa da yabga hagg mukhaddas le raajil al‑diin yiziidah fi l‑hadiiye al‑marfuuʼa hana l‑zoor wa l‑gaayme al‑warraaniiye al‑waajib leyah.Wa baʼad da,al‑naadum al‑sawwa al‑nazir yagdar yachrab khamar misil awwal.
 Wa khalaas da gaanuun al‑naadum al‑yiʼaahid Allah be nazir.Hu yigaddim al‑hadiiye le Allah misil hu gaalah fi nazrah wa kan yiziid aleeha cheyy aakhar kula ma muchkila.Laakin hu yisawwiih hasab muʼaahadatah al‑hu sawwaaha wa hasab gaanuun al‑nazir. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Hajji le Haaruun wa awlaadah wa guul leehum kan yibaaruku Bani Israaʼiil,khalli yuguulu misil da :
‹ Allah yibaarikkuwa yahfadku.
Allah yiwajjih aleeku nuur wijhahwa yarhamku.
Allah yarda beekuwa yantiiku al‑salaam. ›
Wa l‑kalimaat dool yisabbutu usmi fi Bani Israaʼiil wa ana nibaarikhum.
