Wa wakit Muusa kammal min bani kheemat al‑ibaada,masahaaha wa khassasaaha hi wa kulla muʼiddaatha.Wa l‑madbah wa kulla muʼiddaatah kula masahah wa khassasah.
Wa khalaas,chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil gaddamo hadaaya.Wa humman bas al‑chuyuukh hana l‑aayilaat wa l‑gabaayil al‑gammo be l‑hasaaba.
Wa humman lammo hadaayaahum sawa wa gaddamoohum le Allah.Wa jaabo sitte kaarro mukhattayiin wa 12 toor yaʼni kulli chuyuukh itneen jaabo kaarro waahid wa ayyi waahid jaab toor.Wa humman jaaboohum giddaam kheemat al‑ibaada.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Akhbal al‑hadaaya al‑jaaboohum leek wa astaʼmalhum le nagiliin kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Antiihum le iyaal Laawi.Ayyi waahid antiih hasab al‑cheyy al‑waajib leyah fi khidimtah. 
Muusa chaal minhum al‑kaarrooyaat wa l‑tiiraan wa antaahum le iyaal Laawi.
Hu anta itneen kaarro wa arbaʼa tiiraan le zurriiyit Girchuun hasab al‑cheyy al‑waajib leehum fi khidmithum.
Wa l‑arbaʼa kaarro wa l‑tamaane tiiraan al‑faddalo,antaahum le zurriiyit Maraari hasab al‑cheyy al‑waajib leehum fi khidmithum tihit muraakhabat Itamaar wileed Haaruun raajil al‑diin.
Wa laakin ma anta cheyy le zurriiyit Gahaat achaan humman khidmithum yangulu al‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhaddasiin fi kataafeehum.
Wa yoom masaho al‑madbah le yaftahooh,al‑chuyuukh gaddamo hadaaya.Wa humman jaabo hadaayaahum giddaam al‑madbah.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Khalli ayyi cheekh yaji fi yoom waahid yigaddim hadiiytah le fatihiin al‑madbah.Wa misil da,al‑waahid yaji baʼad al‑aakhar. 
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑awwal,Nahchuun wileed Aminadaab cheekh gabiilat Yahuuza ja gaddam hadiiytah.
Wa fi l‑hadiiye di,fi sufra hana fudda wazinha 50 hajar wa kaas hana fudda al‑yawzin 30 hajar wa da hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.Wa l‑mawaaʼiin al‑itneen dool maloohum dagiig mukhalbat be dihin wa gaddamoohum hadiiye.
Wa fi battaan taasa sakhayre hana dahab al‑tawzin 14 jineeh wa siisi malaane bakhuur.
Wa fi toor wa kabich wa kharuuf wald sana le l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga
wa tees dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.
Wa le dahiiyat al‑salaama kamaan fi tiiraan itneen wa khamsa kabich wa khamsa tees wa khamsa kharuuf ayyi waahid wald sana.Wa di l‑hadiiye al‑gaddamaaha Nahchuun wileed Aminadaab.

Wa fi yoom 12,Akhiiraʼ wileed Inaan cheekh gabiilat Naftaali ja gaddam hadiiytah.
Wa fi l‑hadiiye di fi sufra hana fudda wazinha 50 hajar wa kaas hana fudda al‑yawzin 30 hajar wa da hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.Wa l‑mawaaʼiin al‑itneen dool maloohum dagiig mukhalbat be dihin wa gaddamoohum hadiiye.

wa tees dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.

Wa dool al‑hadaaya al‑jaaboohum chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil wakit masaho al‑madbah wa fatahooh.Humman jaabo 12 sufra hana fudda wa 12 kaas hana fudda wa 12 taasa sakhayre hana dahab.
Wa ayyi sufra hana fudda wazinha 50 hajar wa ayyi kaas hana fudda waznah 30 hajar wa kulla mawaaʼiin al‑fudda dool wazinhum 985 hajar wa da hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.
Wa l‑atnaachar taasa sakhayre hana dahab malaane bakhuur ayyi waahide tawzin 14 jineeh wa siisi.Wa l‑taasaat al‑sukhaar hana l‑dahab dool kulluhum ke yawzunu 174 jineeh wa da hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.
Wa be l‑jumla jaabo le l‑dahaaya al‑muharragiin 12 toor wa 12 kabich wa 12 kharuuf ayyi waahid wald sana wa jaabo maʼaahum hadiiye hana dagiig.Wa jaabo 12 tees dahaaya le kaffaarat al‑zanib.
Wa be l‑jumla jaabo le dahaaya al‑salaama 24 toor wa 60 kabich wa 60 tees wa 60 kharuuf ayyi waahid wald sana.Wa dool al‑hadaaya al‑gaddamoohum le fatihiin al‑madbah baʼad masahooh.
Wa wakit Muusa yadkhul fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ le yikallim maʼa Allah,hu yasmaʼ hissah yaji leyah min foog le sidaadit sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada ambeen al‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin al‑itneen al‑masnuuʼiin fi dahar al‑sidaade.Wa yikallim maʼaayah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le Haaruun wakit yirakkib al‑sabʼa tiyeesaat le l‑naar,khalli yiwajjih al‑niiraan le yidawwu al‑bakaan al‑gaaʼid giddaam al‑faanuus. 
Wa Haaruun sawwa misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.Rakkab kulla tiyeesaat al‑naar wa wajjah niiraanhum achaan gaaʼidiin yidawwu al‑bakaan al‑gaaʼid giddaam al‑faanuus.
Wa l‑faanuus da madguug be dahab min gaʼarah lahaddi raasah al‑gaaʼidiin foogah al‑zuhuur hana l‑dahab.Wa daggooh hasab wasif al‑wassafah Allah le Muusa.
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Chiil al‑Laawiyiin min Bani Israaʼiil wa sawwiihum taahiriin.
Wa daahu al‑cheyy al‑tisawwiih le yabgo taahiriin.Ruchchuhum be almi al‑tathiir wa khalli yizayyunu kulla jilidhum wa yikhassulu khulgaanhum wa be da,khalaas yabgo taahiriin.
Wa yichiilu toor wa maʼaayah hadiiye hana dagiig mukhalbat be dihin wa inta tichiil toor aakhar dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.
Wa jiib al‑Laawiyiin giddaam kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa limm kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa gaddim al‑Laawiyiin giddaam Allah.Wa khalli Bani Israaʼiil yukhuttu iideehum foog al‑Laawiyiin.
Wa Haaruun yigaddim al‑Laawiyiin misil hadiiye marfuuʼa al‑yigaddumuuha Bani Israaʼiil le Allah.Wa be da,al‑Laawiyiin yagdaro yakhdumu le Allah.
Wa l‑Laawiyiin yukhuttu iideehum fi ruuse al‑tiiraan dool wa inta gaddimhum le Allah.Al‑toor al‑waahid dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa l‑waahid dahiiye muharraga wa da yabga kaffaara le zunuub al‑Laawiyiin.
Wa jiib al‑Laawiyiin giddaam Haaruun wa awlaadah wa gaddimhum misil hadiiye marfuuʼa le Allah.
Wa be da,aʼazil al‑Laawiyiin min Bani Israaʼiil wa humman yabgo hineeyi ana Allah.
 Wa baʼad titahhir al‑Laawiyiin wa tigaddimhum leyi misil hadiiye marfuuʼa,khalli yamchu yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Achaan min kulla Bani Israaʼiil,humman bas hineeyi halaali.Wa ana chiltuhum fi badal kulla awlaad al‑bikir min Bani Israaʼiil le yabgo hineeyi ana Allah.
Achaan kulla awlaad al‑bikir hineeyi.Min yoom ana katalt kulla awlaad al‑bikir fi balad Masir,kulla awlaad al‑bikir fi Israaʼiil kan min al‑naas walla min al‑bahaayim kula,ana khassastuhum le yabgo hineeyi ana.
Wa laakin hassaʼ ana chilt al‑Laawiyiin fi badal kulla awlaad al‑bikir min Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa ana chilt al‑Laawiyiin wa anteethum le Haaruun wa awlaadah achaan yakhdumu le Bani Israaʼiil fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa yisawwu leehum al‑kaffaara.Wa be da,al‑waba ma yanzil fi Bani Israaʼiil wakit yaju gariib le l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas. 
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil sawwo kulla cheyy al‑bukhuss al‑Laawiyiin misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa l‑Laawiyiin tahharo nufuushum wa khassalo khulgaanhum wa Haaruun gaddamaahum misil hadiiye marfuuʼa le Allah.Wa sawwa leehum al‑kaffaara achaan yabgo taahiriin.
Wa baʼad da,al‑Laawiyiin gidro khadamo fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ tihit muraakhabat Haaruun wa awlaadah.Wa sawwo kulla cheyy al‑bukhuss al‑Laawiyiin misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Daahu khidmit al‑Laawiyiin.Ayyi waahid al‑umrah min 25 sana wa foog,waajib yugumm wa yakhdim fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa kan umrah lihig 50 sana,khalaas khalli yagiif battaan ma yakhdim.
Hu yisaaʼid akhwaanah al‑gaaʼidiin yahfado wa yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ laakin ma yantuuh khidme khaassa leyah.Wa da l‑cheyy al‑waajib tisawwiih fi l‑khidme al‑tukhuss al‑Laawiyiin. 
Wa fi l‑chahar al‑awwal hana l‑sana al‑taaniye baʼad Bani Israaʼiil marago min balad Masir,Allah hajja le Muusa fi saharat Siinaaʼ wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil yiʼayyudu iid al‑Fisha fi l‑wakit al‑muhaddad leyah.
Wa fi yoom 14 hana l‑chahar da,fi l‑makhrib,intu tiʼayyudu al‑iid da fi l‑wakit al‑muhaddad leyah hasab kulla gawaaniinah wa churuutah. 
Wa Muusa gaal le Bani Israaʼiil yiʼayyudu iid al‑Fisha.
Wa fi saharat Siinaaʼ,Bani Israaʼiil ayyado al‑iid da fi yoom 14 hana l‑chahar al‑awwal fi l‑makhrib.Wa humman sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa laakin fi l‑yoom da,fi naas waahidiin limso janaaza wa najjaso nufuushum.Wa fi chaan da,humman ma yagdaro yiʼayyudu al‑iid fi l‑yoom da.Wa khalaas al‑naas dool jo giddaam Muusa wa Haaruun fi nafs al‑yoom
wa gaalo : Sahiih aniina ma taahiriin be sabab limisna janaaza.Laakin maala ma nagdaro nigaddumu hadiiye le Allah fi l‑wakit al‑muhaddad misil Bani Israaʼiil al‑aakhariin ? 
Wa Muusa gaal leehum : Arjooni lahaddi Allah yantiini amur fi chaanku. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil,humman wa kulla zurriiyaathum kan naas minhum ma taahiriin be sabab limso janaaza aw musaafiriin baʼiid kula,khalli yiʼayyudu iid al‑Fisha le Allah.
Wa laakin humman dool waajib yiʼayyudu al‑iid da be taʼkhiir yaʼni fi yoom 14 hana l‑chahar al‑taani fi l‑makhrib.Wa yaakulu al‑hamal wa l‑khubza bala tawwaara wa l‑khadaar al‑murr.
Wa ma yifaddulu cheyy min al‑akil da yagood lahaddi fajur.Wa ma yaksuru adum min laham al‑hamal.Wa yiʼayyudu iid al‑Fisha hasab gaanuunah sawa sawa.
 Wa laakin kan naadum taahir wa ma musaafir wa aba ma yiʼayyid iid al‑Fisha,al‑naadum da waajib yafsuluuh min ahalah be sabab hu ma gaddam hadiiye le Allah fi l‑yoom al‑muhaddad.Wa l‑naadum da waajib yilhammal masʼuuliiyit al‑zanib al‑hu sawwaah.
 Wa kan naadum ajnabi gaaʼid maʼaaku kula,khalli yiʼayyid iid al‑Fisha le Allah hasab kulla l‑gawaaniin wa l‑churuut hana iid al‑Fisha.Leeku intu al‑muwaatiniin wa le l‑ajnabi al‑maʼaaku kula,al‑gaanuun waahid bas. 
Wa wakit bano kheemat al‑ibaada,al‑sahaabaay nazalat wa khattat al‑kheema wa di l‑kheema al‑foogha al‑sanduug al‑indah liihaan al‑muʼaahada.Wa be l‑leel,al‑sahaabaay tidawwi misil al‑naar fi raas al‑kheema lahaddi fajur.
Wa l‑sahaabaay gaaʼide daayman mukhattiye al‑kheema wa be l‑leel tidawwi misil al‑naar.
Wa wakit al‑sahaabaay tugumm min al‑kheema,Bani Israaʼiil yisiiru.Wa wakit tanzil fi ayyi bakaan,Bani Israaʼiil yanzulu fi l‑bakaan da.
Bani Israaʼiil yisiiru be amur Allah wa yanzulu be amur Allah.Wa wakit al‑sahaabaay gaaʼide mukhattiye al‑kheema,humman yagoodu fi bakaanhum.
Wa kan al‑sahaabaay tagood titawwil mukhattiye kheemat al‑ibaada kula,Bani Israaʼiil yitiiʼu Allah wa ma yisiiru.
Hatta kan al‑sahaabaay tagood fi kheemat al‑ibaada le muddit ayyaam chiyya kula,Bani Israaʼiil yagoodu be amur Allah wa yisiiru be amur Allah.
Wa kan al‑sahaabaay tagood min achiiye lahaddi fajur wa tugumm tamchi kula,humman yisiiru.Wa kan tagood yoom wa leele wa tugumm tamchi kula,humman yisiiru.
Wa kan al‑sahaabaay tagood tiʼakhkhir mukhattiye al‑kheema misil yoomeen aw chahar aw ziyaada kula,Bani Israaʼiil yagoodu ma yisiiru abadan.Wa laakin wakit al‑sahaabaay tugumm tamchi,khalaas Bani Israaʼiil kula yisiiru.
Bani Israaʼiil yanzulu be amur Allah wa yisiiru be amur Allah.Wa humman yitiiʼu amur Allah al‑hu antaah be waasitat Muusa.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Sawwi leek burunji itneen madguugiin min fudda le tinaadi beehum mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wakit yilimmu aw wakit yisiiru hasab muʼaskaraathum.
Wakit yasmaʼo daribiin al‑burunji al‑itneen,kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yilimmu giddaamak fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa laakin wakit yasmaʼo daribiin al‑burunji al‑waahid,al‑chuyuukh wa l‑kubaaraat hana khuchuum buyuut Bani Israaʼiil bas yilimmu giddaamak.
Wa kan tadurbu al‑burunji iddat marraat,khalaas al‑muʼaskar al‑naazil sabaah yugumm yisiir.
Wa kan tadurbu al‑burunji iddat marraat darbe taaniye,al‑muʼaskar al‑naazil wati yugumm yisiir.Wa daribiin al‑burunji iddat marraat da yiwassif al‑masaar.
Wa laakin wakit tinaadu mujtamaʼ al‑chaʼab le yilimmu,adurbu al‑burunji marra waahide bas.
Wa l‑burunji al‑itneen dool yadurbuuhum rujaal al‑diin min zurriiyit Haaruun.Wa da yabga leeku chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye.
 Wa wakit tamchu le l‑harib didd udwaanku al‑gaaʼidiin yahjumuuku fi baladku,adurbu al‑burunji al‑itneen iddat marraat.Wa be da,ana Allah Ilaahku nifakkir foogku wa ninajjiiku min udwaanku.
Adurbu al‑burunji fi farahku wa iidku wa fi l‑yoom al‑awwal hana kulli chahar.Wa adurbu al‑burunji wakit tigaddumu dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya al‑salaama.Wa be da,ana Ilaahku nifakkir foogku.Wa ana Allah Ilaahku. 
Wa fi yoom 20 hana l‑chahar al‑taani fi l‑sana al‑taaniye baʼad Bani Israaʼiil marago min balad Masir,al‑sahaabaay gammat min kheemat al‑ibaada al‑foogha al‑sanduug al‑indah liihaan al‑muʼaahada wa machat.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil kula khalaas saaro min saharat Siinaaʼ lahaddi bakaan al‑sahaabaay nazalat foogah fi kadaadit Faaraan.
Wa da awwal masaar al‑amaraahum beyah Allah be waasitat Muusa.
Wa l‑maachi awwal,muʼaskar Yahuuza tihit raaytah hasab majmuuʼtah al‑askariiye.Wa khaaydah Nahchuun wileed Aminadaab.
Wa maʼaayah gabiilat Yassaakar wa khaayidha Nataniil wileed Suuʼar.
Wa maʼaayah battaan gabiilat Zabuluun wa khaayidha Aliyaab wileed Hiiluun.
Wa baʼad da,fartago kheemat al‑ibaada.Wa zurriiyit Girchuun wa zurriiyit Maraari chaalooha wa saaro beeha.
Wa baʼad al‑kheema,muʼaskar Raʼuubiin saar tihit raaytah hasab majmuuʼtah al‑askariiye.Wa khaaydah Alisuur wileed Chadayuur.
Wa maʼaayah gabiilat Chimʼuun wa khaayidha Chalumiyiil wileed Surichadaay.
Wa maʼaayah battaan gabiilat Gaad wa khaayidha Aliyaasaf wileed Daʼuwiil.
Wa baʼad da,zurriiyit Gahaat saaro chaayliin al‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhaddasiin.Wa gabul zurriiyit Gahaat ma yiwassulu,al‑Laawiyiin al‑aakhariin yabnu kheemat al‑ibaada wa yijahhuzuuha leehum.
Wa baʼad da,muʼaskar Afraayim saar tihit raaytah hasab majmuuʼtah al‑askariiye.Wa khaaydah Alichamaʼ wileed Amihuud.
Wa maʼaayah gabiilat Manassa wa khaayidha Gamaliyiil wileed Fadahsuur.
Wa maʼaayah battaan gabiilat Banyaamiin wa khaayidha Abidaan wileed Gidʼuuni.
Wa fi l‑akhiir,muʼaskar Daan hu macha wara kulla l‑muʼaskaraat le yahfadoohum min wara.Wa hu saar tihit raaytah hasab majmuuʼtah al‑askariiye.Wa khaaydah Akhiʼaazar wileed Amichadaay.
Wa maʼaayah gabiilat Achiir wa khaayidha Fagʼiyiil wileed Ukran.
Wa maʼaayah battaan gabiilat Naftaali wa khaayidha Akhiiraʼ wileed Inaan.
Wa da bas al‑nizaam al‑saayriin beyah Bani Israaʼiil.Humman saayriin hasab majmuuʼaathum al‑askariiye.
Wa Muusa gaal le Hubaab wileed nasiibah Raʼuwiil al‑Midyaani : Aniina saayriin le l‑bakaan al‑Allah gaal yantiih leena.Taʼaal namchu sawa wa nisawwu leek al‑kheer achaan Allah gaal yisawwi le Bani Israaʼiil al‑kheer. 
Wa hu gaal : La !Ana ma namchi maʼaaku.Ana namchi le baladi wa ahali. 
Wa Muusa gaal leyah : La !Ma tikhalliina wiheedna achaan inta taʼarif al‑bakaan al‑adiil fi l‑kadaade al‑aniina nanzulu foogha.Taʼaal abga leena giid.
Wa kan macheet maʼaana nantuuk min al‑kheer al‑Allah yantiina. 
Wa gammo min jabal Allah wa macho masaafit talaata yoom.Wa sanduug muʼaahadat Allah waddooh giddaamhum achaan yaʼarfu al‑bakaan al‑yanzulu foogah.
Wa sahaabaayit Allah mukhattiyeehum be nahaar wakit yisiiru min fariighum.
Wa wakit sanduug muʼaahadat Allah yugumm le l‑masaar,Muusa yuguul : Gumm,ya Allah !Udwaanak yichittu wa khusmaanak yajru giddaamak ! 
Wa wakit al‑sanduug yanzil,Muusa yuguul : Gabbil,ya Allah,le chaʼabak Bani Israaʼiil al‑adadhum katiiriin. 
Wa yoom waahid,Bani Israaʼiil gammo yachku be zaʼal le Allah.Wa wakit hu simiʼ chakwaahum,khidib khadab chadiid wa nazzal fooghum naar wa l‑naar di haragat taraf fariighum.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil koorako le Muusa wa hu chahad Allah wa l‑naar di maatat.
Wa khalaas,humman sammo al‑bakaan da Tabʼiira (maʼanaatah bakaan al‑hariige) achaan naar Allah nazalat fooghum wa haragat min al‑fariig.
Wa yoom aakhar,al‑ajaanib al‑gaaʼidiin maʼa Bani Israaʼiil girmo wa dawwaro leehum laham.Wa Bani Israaʼiil zaathum gammo yabku wa yuguulu : Al‑jaham katalna.Nidooru laham naakulu !
Al‑yoom aniina alfakkarna al‑huut al‑gaaʼidiin naakuluuh fi Masir saakit bala gurus wa l‑fagguus wa l‑chammaam wa l‑basal al‑akhdar wa l‑tuum wa l‑basal.
Wa hassaʼ da,niiyitna gafalat min al‑akil achaan akil aakhar binchaaf ke ma fiih,illa l‑manna di. 
Wa l‑manna hi misil al‑kussubarra wa tinchaaf misil al‑samukh.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil yamchu yukhummuuha wa yarhakooha fi l‑murhaaka aw yudugguuha fi l‑fundug.Wa yirakkubuuha fi l‑buraam wa yisalluluuha kisaar kula.Wa tuʼmitha misil al‑kaʼak al‑sawwooh be dihin.
Wa be l‑leel wakit al‑karany yanzil fi l‑fariig,al‑manna kula tanzil maʼaayah.
Wa Muusa simiʼ kulla khuchuum buyuut Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin yabku,ayyi waahid fi khachum baab kheemtah.Wa Allah khidib khadab chadiid wa achaan da,Muusa kula ziʼil.
Wa gaal le Allah : Maala sawweet cheyy fasil misil da leyi ana abdak ?Wa maala ma ridiit leyi ?Wa maala tukhutt masʼuuliiyit kulla l‑chaʼab da fi raasi ana ?
Kulla l‑naas dool,ana bas wilidtuhum walla ?Wa maala taamurni wa tuguul leyi :‹ Ahdinhum fi sadrak misil al‑amm tahdin sakhiirha,lahaddi tiwaddiihum fi l‑ard al‑ana waaʼadt beeha juduudhum. ›
Wa min ween ana nalga laham nantiih le kulla l‑chaʼab da ?Achaan humman gaaʼidiin yabku wa yuguulu leyi :‹ Antiina laham naakulu ! ›
Ana wiheedi ma nagdar nichiil masʼuuliiyithum achaan humman tugaal leyi.
Ya Rabb,kan di bas muʼaamalatak leyi,aktulni hassaʼ.Wa kan ana nalga minnak rida,battaan ma nichiif bala misil da. 
Wa Allah radda le Muusa wa gaal : Jiib leyi 70 raajil min chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil al‑inta taʼarifhum kadar humman chuyuukh wa mukallafiin min Bani Israaʼiil.Chiilhum wa jiibhum giddaam kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa hinaak humman yagiifu maʼaak.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,ana nanzil wa nikallim maʼaak wa nichiil min al‑ruuh al‑gaaʼid foogak wa nukhuttah fooghum.Wa be da,humman yichiilu maʼaak masʼuuliiyit al‑chaʼab wa battaan inta ma tichiilha wiheedak.
Wa guul le l‑chaʼab :‹ Khassusu nufuusku wa ambaakir taakulu laham achaan Allah simiʼ bakiiku wakit gultu :“Al‑jaham katalna nidooru laham naakulu !Aywa,akheer leena kan gaʼadna fi Masir.”Wa fi chaan da,Allah yantiiku laham wa intu taakuluuh.
Wa l‑laham da,ma taakuluuh le muddit yoom aw yoomeen aw khamsa aw achara aw 20 yoom.
Laakin taakuluuh le muddit chahar tamaam lahaddi yamrug leeku min manaakhirku wa yitiir leeku.Wa da achaan abeetu Allah al‑gaaʼid fi usutku wa bakeetu giddaamah wa gultu :“Maala maragna min Masir ?”› 
Wa Muusa radda le Allah wa gaal : Al‑chaʼab al‑ana gaaʼid fi usuthum adad al‑askar 600 000.Wa be da kula,inta gult tantiihum laham yaakulu le muddit chahar kaamil !
Wa laakin kan nadbaho kulla l‑khanam wa l‑bagar kula yitimmu leehum walla ?Wa kan nakurbu kulla huut al‑bahar kula yitimm leehum walla ? 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Iidi ana Allah gisayre walla ?Wa hassaʼ tichiif kan kalaami yilhaggag leek walla la. 
Wa Muusa marag min al‑kheema wa macha khabbaraahum le l‑chaʼab be kalaam Allah.Wa lamma al‑sabʼiin rujaal min chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil wa khattaahum hawaale al‑kheema.
Wa Allah nazal fi lubb al‑sahaabaay wa kallam leyah.Wa chaal min al‑ruuh al‑gaaʼid foog Muusa wa khattaah foog al‑sabʼiin chuyuukh.Wa wakit al‑ruuh gaʼad fooghum,tawwaali gammo yitnabbaʼo wa battaan yoom aakhar ma sawwooh.
Wa laakin rujaal itneen,al‑waahid usmah Alidaad wa l‑aakhar usmah Midaad,humman kula min al‑sabʼiin kubaaraat wa ma macho maʼa l‑aakhariin le l‑kheema.Wa laakin humman kula al‑ruuh nazal fooghum wa gammo yitnabbaʼo fi l‑fariig.
Wa wileed waahid jara khabbar Muusa wa gaal : Alidaad wa Midaad gaaʼidiin yitnabbaʼo fi l‑fariig. 
Wa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun musaaʼid Muusa min chabaabah,gaal : Ya sayyidi Muusa !Adharhum. 
Wa Muusa gaal leyah : Inta hasuud leyi walla chunu ?Aywa,khalli Allah yinazzil ruuhah fi kulla l‑chaʼab wa yisawwiihum kulluhum anbiya. 
Wa baʼad da,khalaas Muusa wa kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil gabbalo fi l‑fariig.
Wa khalaas,Allah jaab riih min ale l‑bahar wa jaabat maʼaaha tuyuur al‑salwa wa sabbathum fi l‑fariig fi ayyi jiihe lahaddi machi yoom.Munsabbiin fi l‑ard wa gaaymiin minha lahaddi duraaʼeen.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gammo yukhummu al‑salwa tuul al‑leel wa tuul al‑nahaar lahaddi l‑yoom al‑taani.Wa lammo al‑salwa wa l‑ligi chiyya kula ligi 25 chuwaal wa charrooha hawaale al‑fariig le tijiff.
Wa wakit gaaʼidiin yaakulu al‑laham wa lissaaʼ ma kammalo min aklah ke bas,Allah khidib khadab chadiid wa darabaahum be waba chadiid.
Wa sammo al‑bakaan da Khibruut Hattaawa (maʼanaatah khubuur al‑garam).Achaan da bas al‑bakaan al‑dafano foogah al‑naas al‑garmaaniin le akil al‑laham.
Wa min Khibruut Hattaawa,Bani Israaʼiil saaro wa macho le Hasiruut wa gaʼado hinaak.
Wa yoom waahid,Mariyam wa Haaruun gammo didd Muusa be sabab al‑mara al‑hu akhadaaha min balad al‑Habacha.
Wa humman gaalo : Allah wa la kallam le Muusa wiheedah ?Hu ma kallam leena aniina kula walla ? Wa Allah simiʼ kalaamhum.
Wa Muusa kamaan,hu raajil miskiin wa ma yichiif nafsah ziyaada min kula naas al‑ard.
Wa tawwaali,Allah kallam le Muusa wa Haaruun wa Mariyam wa gaal leehum : Intu al‑talaata taʼaalu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ. Wa khalaas humman al‑talaata macho.
Wa tawwaali,Allah nazal fi amuud hana sahaab wa wagaf fi khachum baab al‑kheema wa naada Haaruun wa Mariyam wa humman zahafo giddaam.
Wa gaal : Asmaʼo kalaami.Kan fi nabi fi usutku ana Allah niʼarrif nafsi leyah be ruʼya wa nikallim leyah wakit hu naayim.
Wa laakin da ma misil ana gaaʼid nisawwiih maʼa Muusa abdi achaan hu raajil amiin fi kulla chaʼabi.
Wa nikallim maʼaayah khachum be khachum be kalaam waadih ma mulabbad.Wa ana nibayyin nafsi leyah wa hu yichiifni ana Allah.Wa be da,maala ma khuftu wa gammeetu didd Muusa abdi ? 
Wa Allah khidib leehum khadab chadiid wa khalaas khallaahum.
Wa min al‑sahaabaay gammat min al‑kheema bas,khalaas Mariyam karabaaha al‑jidaamwa hi bigat beeda karr misil al‑laban.Wa Haaruun kula wakit anlafat hu chaaf hi mujaddime.
Wa Haaruun gaal le Muusa : Ya siidi,Allah yikhalliik !Ma tinazzil foogna ikhaab be sabab al‑zanib al‑sawweenaah misil ma indina raas.
Wa khalli Mariyam ma tabga misil sakhiir al‑rumaaye al‑marag min batun ammah nuss laham jildah maʼkuul. 
Wa fi chaan da,Muusa chahad Allah wa gaal : Ya Ilaahi,achfiiha ! 
Wa laakin Allah radda leyah wa gaal : Kan abuuha bazakh leeha fi wijihha,al‑khajla ma takrubha le muddit sabʼa yoom walla ?Wa achaan da,aturduuha barra min al‑fariig le muddit sabʼa yoom wa baʼad da,khalli tigabbil. 
Wa be misil da,taradooha le Mariyam barra min al‑fariig le muddit sabʼa yoom.Wa l‑chaʼab ma saaro min bakaanhum lahaddi hi gabbalat.
Wa khalaas baʼad da,humman saaro min Hasiruut wa nazalo fi kadaadit Faaraan.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Rassil naas le yuruukhu leek balad Kanʼaan al‑ana nantiiha le Bani Israaʼiil.Chiil min ayyi gabiila naadum aagil le yimassil gabiilat abbahaatah wa rassilhum. 
Wa khalaas Muusa rassalaahum min kadaadit Faaraan hasab kalaam Allah.Wa l‑rujaal dool kulluhum min kubaaraat Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa dool asaameehum.Min gabiilat Raʼuubiin,Chammuuʼ wileed Zakkuur.
Wa min gabiilat Chimʼuun,Chaafaat wileed Huuri.
Wa min gabiilat Yahuuza,Kaalib wileed Yafuuna.
Wa min gabiilat Yassaakar,Yigaal wileed Yuusuf.
Wa min gabiilat Afraayim,Huuchaʼ wileed Nuun.
Wa min gabiilat Banyaamiin,Falti wileed Raafu.
Wa min gabiilat Zabuluun,Gaddiyiil wileed Suudi.
Wa min gabiilat Yuusuf wa da min gabiilat Manassa,Gaddi wileed Suusi.
Wa min gabiilat Daan,Amiyiil wileed Gamaali.
Wa min gabiilat Achiir,Satuur wileed Mikaayiil.
Wa min gabiilat Naftaali,Nahbi wileed Wafsi.
Wa min gabiilat Gaad,Gawiil wileed Maaki.
Wa dool asaame al‑naas al‑rassalaahum Muusa le yuruukhu balad Kanʼaan.Wa Muusa samma Huuchaʼ wileed Nuun be usum Yachuuʼ.
Wa Muusa rassalaahum le yuruukhu balad Kanʼaan wa gaal leehum : Amurgu min hini.Addu be saharat al‑Nagab wa amchu giddaam ale l‑jibaal.
Wa chiifu kikkeef al‑balad di wa akkudu min naasha kan gawiyiin walla daʼiifiin wa kan katiiriin walla chiyya.
Wa battaan akkudu adiil kan al‑balad di zeene walla fasle wa akkudu min buyuutha kan khiyam saakit walla mudun gawiyiin.
Wa chiifu kan ard al‑balad di tigawwim maʼaach walla la wa kan indaha chadar walla ma indaha.Wa ma takhaafo,jiibu maʼaaku chiyya min fawaakihha. Wa da,wakit awwal intaaj al‑inab.
Wa khalaas macho raakho kulla l‑balad min saharat Siin lahaddi Rahuub gariib le Labu Hamaat.
Wa humman macho be saharat Nagab lahaddi wassalo hillit Hibruun,bakaan al‑aaychiin foogah khuchuum buyuut Akhimaan wa Chiichaay wa Talmaay min zurriiyit Bani Anakh.Wa hillit Hibruun di banooha be sabʼa sana gubbaal hillit Suʼaan al‑gaaʼide fi Masir.
Wa humman wassalo fi waadi Achkuul wa hinaak gataʼo firiʼ al‑indah anguud hana inab wa daraʼooh fi uud wa chaalooh ambeenaathum fi kataafeehum.Wa chaalo rummaan wa tiin.
Wa l‑bakaan da,sammooh waadi Achkuul (maʼanaatah waadi al‑anguud) achaan Bani Israaʼiil gataʼo minnah anguud al‑inab.
Wa humman raakho al‑balad fi muddit 40 yoom wa gabbalo.
Wa jo ligo Muusa wa Haaruun wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil fi Khaadich al‑gaaʼide fi kadaadit Faaraan.Wa kallamo leehum wa le kulla Bani Israaʼiil be khabar al‑balad di wa wassafo leehum al‑fawaakih al‑jaaboohum minha.
Wa humman gaalo le Muusa : Aniina macheena fi l‑balad al‑inta rassaltina leeha wa sahiih al‑balad di samhe wa malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal wa daahu fawaakihha.
Wa laakin naasha chudaad wa mudunhum kubaar wa gawiyiin wa chifna naas kubaar min zurriiyit Bani Anakh.
Wa l‑Amaalikh saakniin fi saharat Nagab wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin wa l‑Amuuriyiin saakniin fi balad al‑jibaal.Wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin saakniin jamb al‑bahar al‑Abyad wa fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun. 
Wa Kaalib sakkat al‑naas al‑gammo didd Muusa wa gaal : Gummu namchu nichiilu al‑balad achaan aniina nagdaro ninnasru fooghum ! 
Wa laakin al‑rujaal al‑raakho maʼaayah al‑balad gaalo : Ma nagdaro namchu nahjumu al‑naas dool achaan humman gawiyiin minnina. 
Wa khalaas,gammo ayyaro le Bani Israaʼiil al‑balad al‑humman macho raakhooha wa chaafooha.Wa gaalo : Al‑balad al‑rukhnaaha wa chifnaaha di ma adiile.Hi tikattil siyaadha wa kulla l‑naas al‑ligiinaahum hinaak foogha kula naas kubaar.
Wa aniina chifna naas min zurriiyit Bani Anakh wa humman naas tuwaal wa chudaad.Wa jambuhum aniina nichiifu nufuusna misil angurraasa.Wa humman kula yichiifuuna misil da. 
Wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin yikooruku wa yabku tuul al‑leele di.
Wa kulla l‑mujtamaʼ gammo yuluumu Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaalo leehum : Akheer leena kan mutna fi balad Masir aw numuutu fi l‑sahara di.
Maala Allah yiwaddiina fi l‑balad di achaan yaktuluuna be l‑seef ?Wa iyaalna wa awiinna yabgo kasiibe.Wa da akheer leena kan nigabbulu fi balad Masir. 
Wa gaalo ambeenaathum : Yalla nukhuttu leena cheekh aakhar wa nigabbulu fi balad Masir. 
Fi l‑bakaan da,Muusa wa Haaruun wagaʼo fi l‑turaab be wujuuhhum giddaam kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil al‑laammiin.
Wa min al‑naas al‑raakho al‑balad,Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun wa Kaalib wileed Yafuuna humman dool gammo charrato khulgaanhum min al‑zaʼal.
Wa gaalo le kulla l‑mujtamaʼ : Al‑balad al‑aniina rukhnaaha wa chifnaaha samhe marra waahid.
Kan Allah biriidna,yiwaddiina fi l‑balad di wa yantiiha leena hi al‑malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal.
Wa hassaʼ da,ma taʼaso Allah wa ma takhaafo min sukkaan al‑balad di.Humman lugma kula ma tammo leena !Wa ilaahaathum al‑yahmuuhum kula aboohum wa laakin aniina Allah maʼaana.Wa fi chaan da,ma takhaafo minhum. 
Wa be sabab da,kulla l‑mujtamaʼ dawwaro yarjumuuhum.Wa tawwaali,majd Allah baan fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ giddaam kulla Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Lahaddi mata al‑chaʼab da yahgirni ?Be kulla l‑ajaayib al‑ana sawweethum fi usuthum kula humman ma aamano beyi.Yiʼaamunu beyi mata ?
Achaan da,ana ninazzil fooghum waba wa ma nantiihum warasathum.Wa minnak inta ana namrug umma kabiire wa chadiide minhum. 
Wa laakin Muusa gaal le Allah : Al‑Masriyiin yaʼarfu kadar inta bas maragt al‑chaʼab da be gudurtak min usuthum
wa hajjo beyah le sukkaan al‑balad di.Wa be da,sukkaan al‑balad di kula simʼo kadar inta Allah gaaʼid fi usut chaʼabak da.Wa bayyant nafsak leehum wa humman chaafo majdak be uyuunhum.Wa sahaabaaytak gaaʼide min foog leehum wa inta bas maachi giddaamhum be nahaar fi amuud hana sahaab wa be l‑leel fi amuud hana naar.
Wa kan inta katalt al‑chaʼab da khachum waahid,al‑umam al‑yasmaʼo be l‑khabar hana l‑cheyy al‑inta sawweetah da,yuguulu :
‹ Daahu Allah ma gidir yiwaddi al‑chaʼab fi l‑balad al‑hu halaf wa gaal yantiiha leehum.Achaan da,hu dammaraahum fi l‑sahara. ›
Wa hassaʼ wassif azamat gudurtak,ya Rabb,achaan inta gult :
‹ Ana Allah al‑Sabuur wa l‑Muhibb,nakhfir le l‑khaati wa l‑aasi.Wa laakin al‑muznib ma najʼalah bari.Wa niʼaakhib al‑iyaal be zunuub abbahaathum lahaddi l‑zurriiye al‑taalta wa l‑raabʼe. ›
Ya Rabb,be rahmatak al‑wasiiʼe akhfir le l‑chaʼab dool khataayaahum misil inta khafart leehum min maragtuhum min balad Masir lahaddi jibtuhum hini. 
Wa Allah radda leyah wa gaal : Ana khafart leehum be sabab suʼaalak.
Sahiih,ana hayy wa majdi yamla kulla l‑ard.
Wa l‑naas dool kulluhum chaafo majdi wa l‑ajaayib al‑ana sawweethum fi Masir wa fi l‑sahara di wa be da kula,jarrabooni achara marraat wa ma simʼo kalaami.
Wa fi chaan da,waahid minhum ma yichiif al‑balad al‑ana halaft nantiiha le juduudhum.Wa l‑yahguruuni kula,waahid minhum ma yichiifha.
Wa laakin abdi Kaalib galbah bigi minhum chig.Hu taabaʼ kalaami bala chakk.Hu da,ana niwaddiih fi l‑ard al‑hu raakh foogha wa zurriiytah yichiiluuha wa yaskunu foogha.
Wa hassaʼ,al‑Amaalikh wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin saakniin fi l‑wudyaan.Wa intu kamaan,ambaakir gabbulu wa amchu battaan fi l‑sahara be l‑derib al‑yamchi beyah al‑bahar al‑Ahmar. 
Wa battaan Allah hajja le Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal :
 Le mata mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil al‑fasliin dool yuluumuuni ?Wa ana simiʼt al‑chakwa wa l‑luwaama al‑Bani Israaʼiil gaaymiin beeha diddi.
Guul leehum :‹ Nahlif be usmi al‑Hayy,niʼaamilku hasab kalaamku al‑intu gultuuh leyi.Wa da kalaam Allah.
Intu al‑hasabooku min umur 20 sana wa foog,kulluku tumuutu fi l‑sahara di achaan gammeetu tuluumuuni.
Abadan intu ma tadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑halaft wa gult nantiiha leeku le taskunu foogha.Illa Kaalib wileed Yafuuna wa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun bas yadkhuluuha.
Wa iyaalku al‑gultu yabgo kasiibe,niwaddiihum wa humman yadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑intu abeetuuha.
Wa laakin intu dool kamaan,tumuutu fi l‑sahara di.
Wa iyaalku yabgo ruhhal wa yarhalo fi l‑sahara le muddit 40 sana wa yatʼabo be sabab khiyaanitku.Wa taʼabhum da,ma yikammil illa kan intu kulluku muttu fi l‑sahara.
Wa l‑arbaʼiin sana dool fi adad al‑arbaʼiin yoom al‑intu rukhtu wa chiftu fooghum al‑balad.Wa tilhammalo ikhaab khataayaaku le muddit 40 sana wa da ayyi yoom yisaawi sana.Wa be da,taʼarfu adaawti. ›
Wa da,ana Allah bas gultah :‹ Da bas al‑cheyy al‑ana nisawwiih le kulla l‑mujtamaʼ al‑fasliin al‑gammo diddi.Humman dool yikammulu wa yumuutu fi l‑sahara di.› 
Wa l‑naas al‑Muusa rassalaahum macho raakho wa chaafo al‑balad gabbalo wa ayyaro al‑balad.Wa battaan gammo harracho kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil didd Muusa.
Wa l‑naas dool maato be waba giddaam Allah achaan humman gammo ayyaro al‑balad al‑humman chaafooha.
Wa min al‑naas al‑macho raakho wa chaafo al‑balad illa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun wa Kaalib wileed Yafuuna bas ma maato.
Wa wakit Muusa kallamaahum le Bani Israaʼiil be l‑kalaam da,humman hizno hizin chadiid.
Wa ambaakir be fajur badri,Bani Israaʼiil gammo macho ale balad al‑jibaal wa gaalo : Sahiih,aniina aznabna wa laakin hassaʼ khassadna namchu fi l‑balad al‑wassafaaha leena Allah. 
Wa laakin Muusa gaal : Maala tikhaalufu kalaam Allah ?Chokholku da,battaan ma yanjah.
Wa hassaʼ da,ma tamchu !Achaan Allah ma gaaʼid fi usutku wa kan tamchu,kula udwaanku yaktuluuku.
Wa l‑Amaalikh wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin gaaʼidiin giddaamku wa yaktuluuku achaan intu abeetu ma titaabuʼu Allah.Wa hu kula ma yukuun maʼaaku. 
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gawwo ruuseehum wa macho ale balad al‑jibaal wa laakin wa la sanduug muʼaahadat Allah wa la Muusa ma harrako min al‑muʼaskar.
Wa l‑Amaalikh wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin al‑saakniin fi l‑jibaal nazalo fooghum wa haaraboohum wa taradoohum lahaddi hillit Hurma.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Kan dakhaltu fi l‑balad al‑nantiiha leeku wa sakantu foogha,
waajib tigaddumu le Allah min bagarku aw khanamku hadiiye muharraga aw dahiiye muharraga aw dahiiye aakhara.Wa da achaan tihaggugu waʼadku aw tigaddumu hadiiye be niiyitku aw wakit tilimmu le l‑iid wa hu yarda be riihitha.
 ‹ Wa l‑yigaddim al‑hadiiye di le Allah,yigaddim maʼaaha hadiiye hana dagiig kooro mukhalbat be liitir hana dihin.
Wa battaan yigaddim liitir hana khamar hadiiyat charaab maʼa ayyi kharuuf dahiiye muharraga aw dahiiye aakhara.
 ‹ Wa kan le l‑kabich kamaan,yichiil maʼaayah hadiiye hana dagiig koorteen mukhalbat be liitir wa nuss hana dihin.
Wa yichiil liitir wa nuss hana khamar hadiiyat charaab wa yigaddimha le Allah wa hu yarda be riihitha.
 ‹ Wa kan yigaddim le Allah toor dahiiye muharraga aw dahiiye aakhara le yihaggig waʼadah aw le dahiiyat al‑salaama,
yigaddim maʼaayah hadiiye talaata kooro hana dagiig mukhalbat be liitreen hana dihin.
Wa yichiil liitreen hana khamar hadiiyat charaab wa yigaddimha hadiiye muharraga le Allah wa hu yarda be riihitha.
 ‹ Wa yisawwi misil da maʼa ayyi hadiiye hana toor wa kabich wa kharuuf wa anzaay.
Wa kan al‑bahaayim al‑yigaddimhum dool katiiriin kula,yisawwi maʼa ayyi waahid misil da.
Wa kan ayyi muwaatin yigaddim al‑hadaaya al‑muharragiin le Allah,khalli yisawwi misil da wa Allah yarda be riihithum.
 ‹ Wa kan naadum ajnabi gaaʼid maʼaaku mudda tawiile wa yidoor yigaddim hadiiye muharraga le Allah wa hu yarda be riihitha,khalli yisawwi misil intu gaaʼidiin tisawwuuh.
Wa da yabga leeku chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye le intu kulluku wa le l‑ajnabi al‑gaaʼid maʼaaku kula.Wa tisawwu misil da sawa sawa giddaam Allah.
Wa da yabga gaanuun waahid wa chart waahid leeku intu wa le l‑ajnabi al‑gaaʼid maʼaaku.› 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum :‹ Kan dakhaltu fi l‑balad al‑niwaddiiku foogha
wa kan taakulu min khubzitha,gaddumu minha hadiiye le Allah.
Wa min awwal dagiigku,sawwu khubza wa gaddumuuha leyi hadiiye misil al‑hadiiye al‑intu tigaddumuuha leyi wakt al‑gatiʼ hana ziraaʼitku.
Wa min zurriiye le zurriiye,gaddumu leyi hadiiye min awwal dagiigku.
 ‹ Wa kan intu kulluku bala raayku bas ma tabbagtu waahid min wasaaya Allah al‑gaalaahum le Muusa,
yaʼni kulla l‑wasaaya al‑amaraaku beehum Allah be waasitat Muusa min awwal yoom wa baʼad da min zurriiye le zurriiye,
wa kan mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil sawwo zanib bala raayhum wa kulluhum ma irfooh,khalaas kulluhum yigaddumu toor dahiiye muharraga le Allah wa hu yarda be riihitha.Wa yigaddumu hadiiye hana dagiig wa hadiiyat charaab misil fi l‑gaanuun wa tees dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.
Wa raajil al‑diin yisawwi kaffaara le zunuub kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa humman yalgo al‑khufraan.Achaan al‑zanib da sawwooh bala raayhum wa humman jaabo dahiiye muharraga le Allah wa gaddamo dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.
Wa l‑khufraan da le kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa le l‑ajnabi al‑saakin maʼaahum achaan al‑zanib al‑sawwooh bala raayhum da bukhuss kulla l‑chaʼab.
 ‹ Wa kan al‑zanib da sawwaah naadum waahid bas,hu yigaddim anzaay bitt sana dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib.
Wa raajil al‑diin yisawwi kaffaara le l‑zanib hana l‑naadum al‑sawwaah bala raayah giddaam Allah.Wa wakit raajil al‑diin yisawwi kaffaara,al‑naadum da yalga al‑khufraan.
Kan al‑naadum min Bani Israaʼiil aw kan naadum ajnabi saakin maʼaahum kula,al‑gaanuun hana l‑zanib al‑yisawwuuh bala raayhum da waahid bas.
 ‹ Wa kan naadum min Bani Israaʼiil aw ajnabi gaaʼid maʼaahum kula kan sawwa zanib be niiytah,al‑naadum da sawwa jariime didd Allah.Wa be sabab da,waajib yafsuluuh min ahalah.
Achaan hu aba kalaam Allah wa khaalaf wasiiyaatah.Wa be da,waajib yafsuluuh wa yilhammal ikhaabah.› 
Wa yoom waahid fi l‑sahara,Bani Israaʼiil ligo naadum waahid gaaʼid yilaggit hatab fi yoom al‑sabt.
Wa humman karabooh le l‑naadum da wa waddooh giddaam Muusa wa Haaruun wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil.
Al‑naadum da khattooh fi l‑sijin achaan fi l‑wakit daak,gaanuun al‑yihaakumuuh beyah ke ma fiih.
Wa khalaas baʼad da,Allah gaal le Muusa : Khalli kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yilimmu barra min al‑fariig wa yarjumu al‑naadum da lahaddi l‑moot. 
Wa khalaas,kulla l‑mujtamaʼ waddooh le l‑naadum da barra min al‑fariig wa rajamooh lahaddi maat.Wa da misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Muusa :
 Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum :‹ Min zurriiye le zurriiye tisawwu chanchali fi daayir khulgaanku wa khayyutuuh be kheet zahri.
Wa wakit tichiifu al‑chanchali da,tizzakkaro kulla wasaaya Allah wa titabbuguuhum.Wa be da,ma titaabuʼu chahwaat guluubku wa uyuunku al‑yiwadduuku fi l‑isyaan.
Wa misil da,tizzakkaro kulla wasiiyaatah wa titabbuguuhum wa tukuunu ummat Allah al‑saalhe.
Wa taʼarfu ana bas Allah Ilaahku al‑maragtuku min balad Masir le nabga Ilaahku.Wa ana bas Allah Ilaahku.› 
Wa Khuurah wileed Yishaar min khachum beet Gahaat min gabiilat Laawi chaal min gabiilat Raʼuubiin talaata naas wa humman Dataan wa Abiraam iyaal Aliyaab wa Uun wileed Faalat
wa gammo didd Muusa.Wa maʼaahum 250 raajil min chuyuukh wa masʼuuliin fi l‑mujtamaʼ wa naas maʼruufiin fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa humman kulluhum gammo didd Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaalo : Chokholku da bigi leena katiir !Kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil kulluhum mukhassasiin le Allah wa Allah gaaʼid maʼaahum.Wa maala intu tichiifu nufuusku ziyaada min jamaaʼat Allah ? 
Wa wakit Muusa simiʼ al‑kalaam da,wagaʼ be wijhah fi l‑turaab.
Wa baʼad da,gaal le Khuurah wa le naas Bani Israaʼiil al‑maʼaayah : Ambaakir fajur,Allah yiwassif leena al‑naadum al‑taabʼah wa l‑hu khassasah wa ridi beyah le yaji giddaamah.Wa l‑naadum al‑hu yaʼazilah da,hu bas yaji giddaamah.
Daahu al‑cheyy al‑tisawwuuh,inta Khuurah wa naas Bani Israaʼiil al‑maʼaak.Ayyi waahid yichiil mukhbar.
Wa ambaakir,subbu fooghum naar wa bakhuur wa gaddumuuh le Allah.Wa l‑naadum al‑Allah yaʼazilah da,hu bas al‑mukhassas.Wa chokholku da bigi leena katiir,ya iyaal Laawi. 
Wa Muusa gaal battaan le Khuurah : Asmaʼo,ya iyaal Laawi.
Kan Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil azalaaku min mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa ridi beeku le taju giddaamah wa takhdumu fi kheemat Allah wa tagiifu giddaam Bani Israaʼiil wa tisaaʼuduuhum,da chiyya leeku walla ?
Hu ridi beeku le taju giddaamah,inta wa kulla akhwaanak al‑Laawiyiin.Wa battaan tidooru khidmit rujaal al‑diin walla ?
Achaan da bas,inta wa kulla naasak gammeetu didd Allah.Wa Haaruun ke,hu yaatu intu tuluumuuh ? 
Wa Muusa naadaahum le Dataan wa Abiraam iyaal Aliyaab.Wa laakin humman gaalo leyah : Aniina abadan ma naju leek !
Inta maragtina min balad al‑malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal wa jibtina numuutu fi l‑sahara di.Da ma tammaak walla ?Wa be da kula,battaan tidoor tahkim foogna ?
Be l‑sahiih inta ma waddeetna fi balad al‑malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal.Wa ma anteetna warasa hana ziraaʼa wa la jineenaat inab.Inta tahsib aniina matmuusiin walla ?Khalaas,aniina abadan ma naju giddaamak. 
Wa min simiʼ al‑kalaam da,Muusa ziʼil zaʼal chadiid wa gaal : Ya Allah,ma takhbal hadaayaahum !Wa abadan ana ma chilt humaar hana naadum wa la sawweet leehum cheyy. 
Wa Muusa gaal battaan le Khuurah : Inta wa Bani Israaʼiil al‑maʼaak ambaakir taʼaalu giddaam Allah,inta wa humman wa Haaruun kula.
Wa ayyi waahid min naasak al‑miiteen wa khamsiin yichiil mukhbar wa yusubb foogah bakhuur wa ayyi waahid yigaddim mukhbarah giddaam Allah.Wa inta wa Haaruun kula tisawwu nafs al‑cheyy,tigaddumu makhaabirku. 
Wa khalaas ayyi waahid chaal mukhbarah wa sabba foogah naar wa bakhuur wa wagafo fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ maʼa Muusa wa Haaruun.
Wa Khuurah lamma kulla naasah giddaam Muusa wa Haaruun fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa tawwaali,majd Allah baan le kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa wa Haaruun :
 Amurgu min usut mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil dool achaan ana nidammirhum hassaʼ. 
Wa laakin fi l‑bakaan da,Muusa wa Haaruun wagaʼo be wujuuhhum fi l‑turaab wa gaalo : Ya Rabb,inta al‑Ilaah al‑tamluk fi kulla makhluug hayy.Takhdab le kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil be sabab naadum waahid sawwa zanib walla ? 
Wa Allah radda le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yikissu baʼiid min khiyam Khuurah wa Dataan wa Abiraam. 
Wa Muusa gamma macha bakaan Dataan wa Abiraam wa kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil taabaʼooh.
Wa Muusa hajja le mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal : Kissu baʼiid min khiyam al‑naas al‑aasiyiin dool.Wa ma tilammusu khumaamhum achaan ma tumuutu intu kula be sabab zunuubhum. 
Wa khalaas,kulla l‑chaʼab kasso baʼiid min al‑khiyam al‑saakniin fooghum Khuurah wa Dataan wa Abiraam.Wa laakin Dataan wa Abiraam marago waagfiin fi khuchuum biibaan khiyamhum maʼa awiinhum wa iyaalhum wa iyaal iyaalhum.
Wa Muusa gaal : Be misil da,taʼarfu kadar Allah bas rassalaani achaan nisawwi kulla cheyy be amrah.Wa taʼarfu ana ma sawweet cheyy be niiyti ana.
Kan al‑naas dool yumuutu moot tabiiʼi walla yabga leehum misil bigi fi l‑naas,Allah ma rassalaani.
Laakin kan Allah yisawwi cheyy al‑abadan ma bigi,misil kan al‑ard tinfatih wa tazruthum humman wa kulla cheyy al‑induhum wa hayyiin bas yindafnu maʼa l‑maytiin,be da intu taʼarfu kadar al‑naas dool hagaro Allah. 
Wa min Muusa kammal kalaamah da,tawwaali al‑ard anchaggat tihit rijleehum.
Wa zaratathum humman wa aayilaathum wa zaratat kulla naas Khuurah wa khumaamhum kula.
Humman wa khumaamhum hayyiin bas andafano maʼa l‑maytiin.Wa l‑ard ansaddat fooghum wa khalaas,bigo ma fiihum fi ust al‑mujtamaʼ.
Wa min chiddit siraakhhum,kulla naas Israaʼiil al‑simʼoohum arrado wa gaalo : Yalla najru achaan al‑ard ma tazrutna aniina kula ! 
Wa Allah nazzal naar akalat al‑miiteen wa khamsiin raajil al‑gaaʼidiin yigaddumu bakhuur le Allah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun yisill al‑makhaabir min ust al‑naar achaan humman mukhaddasiin wa khalli yichattit al‑jamur da baʼiid.
Wa be l‑makhaabir hana l‑naas al‑kaffo zunuubhum be ruuhhum dool,dugguuhum misil al‑birich wa aksu beehum al‑madbah.Wa l‑makhaabir al‑gaddamoohum le Allah dool mukhaddasiin.Wa l‑makhaabir al‑daggoohum dool yabgo alaamat tahziir le Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa khalaas,raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar chaal al‑makhaabir hana l‑nahaas al‑gaddamoohum al‑naas al‑hirgo.Wa daggoohum misil al‑birich wa kaso beehum al‑madbah.
Wa da yanti fikir le Bani Israaʼiil achaan ayyi naadum al‑ma min zurriiyit Haaruun ma yigaddim bakhuur le Allah wa yahrag misil Khuurah wa Bani Israaʼiil al‑maʼaayah.Wa da misil Allah gaalah be waasitat Muusa.
Wa ambaakir fajur,kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil gammo didd Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaalo : Intu bas kataltu chaʼab Allah ! 
Wa laakin wakit kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil lammo wa gammo didd Muusa wa Haaruun wa humman muwajjihiin ale kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ,tawwaali chaafo al‑sahaabaay khattat al‑kheema wa majd Allah baan.
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun jo giddaam kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ
wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Amurgu min usut mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil dool achaan ana nidammirhum hassaʼ. Fi l‑bakaan da,Muusa wa Haaruun wagaʼo be wujuuhhum fi l‑turaab.
Wa Muusa gaal le Haaruun : Chiil al‑mukhbar wa subb foogah jamur min al‑madbah wa subb foogah bakhuur wa amchi ajala le mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa sawwi leehum al‑kaffaara achaan khadab Allah nazal fooghum wa l‑waba bada khalaas. 
Wa Haaruun chaal al‑mukhbar misil Muusa gaalah leyah wa jara le l‑chaʼab wa ligi al‑waba bada fi usuthum khalaas.Hu sabba al‑bakhuur fi l‑mukhbar wa sawwa leehum al‑kaffaara.
Wa hu wagaf ambeen al‑hayyiin wa l‑maytiin wa khalaas al‑waba wagaf.
Wa l‑naas al‑katalhum al‑waba adadhum 14 700.Wa da bala l‑naas al‑maato fi muchkilat Khuurah.
Wa Haaruun gabbal le Muusa fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ achaan al‑waba wagaf khalaas.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil ayyi cheekh gabiila yijiib asa wa da fi adad gabaayilhum al‑atnaachar.Wa aktib usum ayyi cheekh fi asaatah.
Wa fi asaat gabiilat Laawi aktib usum Haaruun achaan ayyi cheekh gabiila indah asa waahide.
Wa khutt al‑isay dool fi lubb kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ giddaam al‑sanduug al‑foogah liihaan al‑muʼaahada fi l‑bakaan al‑ana nigaabilku foogah.
Wa l‑naadum al‑asaatah tikhaddir wa tisawwi nuwwaar,hu da bas al‑ana azaltah.Wa be da,ana niwaggif al‑luwaama al‑gaaymiin beeha Bani Israaʼiil didduku. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa kallam le Bani Israaʼiil wa kulla chuyuukhhum ayyi waahid jaab asaatah.Wa l‑chuyuukh al‑atnaachar ayyi cheekh gabiila jaab asaatah.Wa asaat Haaruun kula gaaʼide fi ust al‑isay dool.
Wa Muusa khatta al‑isay dool giddaam Allah fi lubb al‑kheema al‑foogha al‑sanduug al‑indah liihaan al‑muʼaahada.
Wa ambaakir fajur,Muusa dakhal fi l‑kheemat di wa chaaf asaat Haaruun al‑min gabiilat Laawi khaddarat wa sawwat nuwwaar wa indaha iyaal naajdiin.
Wa Muusa marag kulla l‑isay min giddaam Allah wa khattaahum giddaam Bani Israaʼiil wa ayyi cheekh chaaf asaatah wa chaalha.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Gabbil asaat Haaruun wa khuttaha giddaam al‑sanduug da wa ahfadha misil alaama le l‑muʼaaridiin.Wa tiwaggif kalaamhum diddi wa be da,ma yumuutu. 
Wa Muusa tabbag kalaam Allah sawa sawa misil hu amarah beyah.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gaalo le Muusa : Chiif daahu aniina kullina ke nahlako wa numuutu !
Wa ayyi naadum al‑yigarrib le kheemat Allah da yumuut !Wa da,ma numuutu kullina lahaddi aakhirna walla ? 
Wa Allah gaal le Haaruun : Inta wa iyaalak wa naas min ahalak tilhammalo al‑ikhaab hana ayyi khata al‑yukuun fi l‑muʼiddaat hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas.Wa inta wa iyaalak bas tilhammalo al‑ikhaab hana ayyi khata al‑yukuun fi khidmit rujaal al‑diin.
Wa akhwaanak naas gabiiltak al‑Laawiyiin,khalli humman kula yigarrubu maʼaak le l‑beet al‑mukhaddas wa yakhdumu maʼaak wa yisaaʼuduuk.Wa laakin inta wa iyaalak bas tagiifu giddaam al‑kheema al‑foogha al‑sanduug.
Al‑Laawiyiin yakhdumu tihit amrak wa yahfado kulla kheemat al‑ibaada wa laakin ma yigarrubu le l‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhassasiin wa la le l‑madbah achaan ma yijiibu al‑moot le nufuushum wa la leeku intu.
Wa humman bas yisaaʼuduuku wa yakhdumu maʼaaku fi kulla l‑khidme al‑tukuun fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa yahfadooha.Naadum aakhar ke ma yaji yakhdim maʼaaku.
Wa intu bas tahfado al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wa l‑madbah wa be da,battaan khadab Allah ma yanzil fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa daahu ana azalt akhwaanku al‑Laawiyiin min Bani Israaʼiil wa anteethum leeku misil hadiiye achaan yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa inta Haaruun wa awlaadak ahfado khidmit rujaal al‑diin wa akhdumu fi ayyi cheyy al‑bukhuss al‑madbah wa l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid al‑gaaʼid khaadi le l‑sitaar.Wa khidmit rujaal al‑diin di,ana anteetha leeku intu bas.Wa ayyi naadum aakhar kan yigarrib le l‑khidme di yumuut. 
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Haaruun : Daahu ana nantiik masʼuuliiye fi kulla l‑hadaaya al‑mukhaddasiin al‑yigaddumuuhum leyi Bani Israaʼiil.Wa l‑hadaaya dool,ana anteethum leek wa le awlaadak wa da yabga leeku hagg daayim.
Wa daahu haggak al‑talgaah min al‑hadaaya al‑mukhaddasiin al‑ma muharragiin misil kulla l‑hadaaya hana l‑dagiig wa kulla dahaaya le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa l‑dahaaya le kaffaarat al‑khata al‑yigaddumuuhum leyi ana.Kulla l‑hadaaya al‑mukhaddasiin dool,ana nantiihum leek inta wa awlaadak.
Wa min al‑hadaaya al‑mukhaddasiin dool inta taakul wa kulla l‑dukuur min iyaalak yaakuluuhum wa ajʼalhum mukhaddasiin leek.
 Wa daahu cheyy aakhar kula yabga haggak.Wa humman al‑hadaaya al‑yarfaʼoohum Bani Israaʼiil wa yigaddumuuhum,dool kula ana nantiihum leek inta wa le awlaadak wa le banaatak al‑gaaʼidaat maʼaak.Kulli insaan taahir min ahal beetak yagdar yaakul minhum wa da yabga leeku hagg daayim.
 Wa nantiik al‑zaka al‑yigaddumuuha le Allah min ahsan al‑dihin wa ahsan al‑khamar wa l‑gameh.
Wa ana nantiik inta kula awwal intaaj al‑yigaddumuuh le Allah min ziraaʼithum wa kulli insaan taahir min ahal beetak yagdar yaakul minnah.
Wa kulla cheyy al‑yikhassusuuh leyi Bani Israaʼiil,ana nantiih leek inta.
 Wa battaan nantiik kulla awlaad al‑bikir al‑yigaddumuuhum leyi ana Allah kan min al‑naas walla min al‑bahaayim kula.Wa laakin kulla awlaad al‑bikir min al‑naas wa l‑bahaayim al‑ma taahiriin,chiil tamanhum al‑yafdoohum beyah.
Wa wakit umur al‑wileed yitimm chahar,afdooh be 5 hajar fudda.Wa hasab al‑wazin al‑rasmi hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas,ayyi hajar fudda yawzin 12 giraam.
 Wa laakin ma tafda wileed al‑bikir hana l‑bagar wa l‑khanam wa l‑inze achaan dool mukhassasiin le Allah.Adbahhum wa ruchch dammuhum fi l‑madbah wa harrig chahamhum hadiiye muharraga al‑Allah yarda be riihitha.
Wa l‑laham hana l‑hadaaya dool yabga hanaak maʼa l‑zoor al‑yarfaʼooh wa yigaddumuuh hadiiye wa l‑gaayme al‑zeene.
 Kulla l‑hadaaya al‑mukhaddasiin al‑yigaddumuuhum Bani Israaʼiil le Allah yabgo hagg daayim leek inta wa awlaadak wa banaatak al‑gaaʼidaat maʼaak.Wa da yabga leek wa le zurriiytak muʼaahada daayme maʼa Allah al‑abadan ma tingatiʼ. 
Wa battaan Allah gaal le Haaruun : Inta ma indak warasa fi arduhum wa la indak hagg maʼaahum.Ana bas nabga leek misil hagg wa warasa fi Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa Allah gaal : Le zurriiyit Laawi ana nantiihum kulla l‑uchuur fi Israaʼiil warasa.Wa da fi badal al‑khidme al‑humman gaaʼidiin yakhdumuuha fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa be da,Bani Israaʼiil ma yigarrubu battaan le kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ achaan da zanib al‑yijiib leehum al‑moot.
Wa l‑Laawiyiin humman bas yakhdumu fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa humman yilhammalo natiijat khataahum.Wa da yabga leehum chart daayim min zurriiye le zurriiye.Wa laakin ma induhum warasa al‑yawrusuuha misil Bani Israaʼiil.
Al‑uchuur al‑yigaddumuuhum Bani Israaʼiil hadiiye le Allah dool,ana anteethum le l‑Laawiyiin misil warasa.Achaan ana gult humman ma induhum warasa al‑yawrusuuha misil Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le l‑Laawiyiin :‹ Kan ligo min Bani Israaʼiil al‑uchuur al‑ana anteethum leehum misil warasa,khalli humman kula yamurgu uchur al‑uchuur hadiiye le Allah.
Wa da yabga leeku misil hadaaya al‑yigaddumuuhum al‑naas al‑aakhariin min al‑gameh fi l‑madagg aw min asiir al‑inab.
Wa misil da,intu kula tigaddumu hadaaya le Allah min kulla l‑uchuur al‑intu talgoohum min Bani Israaʼiil.Wa l‑hadaaya dool hana Allah,antuuhum le Haaruun raajil al‑diin.
Wa min kulla cheyy al‑yantuuku,gaddumu minnah hadiiye le Allah wa l‑hadiiye al‑ahsan khassusuuha leyah. ›
 Wa guul leehum battaan :‹ Kan gaddamtu min kulla cheyy al‑ahsan,al‑faddal yagood leeku intu al‑Laawiyiin misil al‑faddal le l‑naas min al‑gameh fi l‑madagg wa asiir al‑inab.
Wa intu wa aayilaatku tagdaro taakulu minnah fi ayyi bakaan achaan di bas ujrat khidmitku al‑gaaʼidiin tisawwuuha fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa be misil da,wakit gaddamtu al‑ahsan min al‑achya dool,ma tilhammalo ayyi zanib.Wa ahtarumu al‑hadaaya al‑mukhaddasiin hana Bani Israaʼiil wa be da,ma tijiibu al‑moot le nufuusku.› 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa wa Haaruun :
 Dool humman gawaaniin al‑chariiʼa al‑Allah amar beehum.Guul le Bani Israaʼiil yijiibu leek bagara chagra ma mukhalgana wa ma indaha ayyi eeb wa yoom waahid kula ma harato beeha.
Wa l‑bagara di sallumuuha le raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa yiwaddiiha barra min al‑fariig wa yadbahooha giddaamah.
 Hu yichiil min dammaha be usbaʼah wa yuruchchah sabʼa marraat ale jiihat khachum kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa fi giddaam raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar,yiharrugu al‑bagara di kullaha ke,farwitha wa lahamha wa dammaha wa baʼarha kula.
Wa raajil al‑diin yichiil uud hana arz wa firiʼ hana zuufa wa kheet ahmar wa yazgulhum fi l‑naar al‑gaaʼide tahrag foogha al‑bagara.
Wa raajil al‑diin yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad wa baʼad da,yigabbil fi l‑fariig wa laakin yagood nijis lahaddi achiiye.
Wa l‑harrag al‑bagara kula yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad be almi wa laakin yagood nijis lahaddi achiiye.
 Wa naadum waahid taahir yukhumm al‑rumaad hana l‑bagara wa yukhuttah barra min al‑fariig fi bakaan taahir.Wa mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yahfado al‑rumaad le yisawwu beyah almi al‑tathiir al‑yistaʼmalooh le mahiyiin al‑khata.
Wa l‑naadum al‑yukhumm al‑rumaad hana l‑bagara,hu kula yikhassil khulgaanah wa laakin yagood nijis lahaddi achiiye.Wa da yabga chart daayim le Bani Israaʼiil wa le l‑ajnabi al‑saakin maʼaahum.
 Kan naadum limis janaaza,hu yabga nijis le muddit sabʼa yoom.
Wa l‑naadum da,khalli yitahhir nafsah be almi al‑tathiir al‑sawwooh be rumaad al‑bagara fi l‑yoom al‑taalit wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ wa be da,hu yukuun taahir.Wa laakin kan ma yitahhir nafsah fi l‑yoom al‑taalit wa l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,hu ma yabga taahir.
Kan naadum limis janaaza wa ma tahhar nafsah,yinajjis kheemat Allah.Wa l‑naadum da waajib yafsuluuh min Bani Israaʼiil achaan hu ma rachchooh be almi al‑tathiir wa hu nijis wa gaaʼid be najaastah.
 Wa daahu gaanuun al‑bukhuss al‑naadum al‑yumuut fi l‑kheema.Wa fi l‑haala di,ayyi naadum al‑yadkhul fi l‑kheema di aw gaaʼid foogha yabga nijis le muddit sabʼa yoom.
Wa ayyi maaʼuun maftuuh al‑ma indah sidaade masduuda foogah kula yukuun nijis.
 Ayyi naadum kan maachi fi l‑kadaade wa limis naadum maktuul be l‑seef aw limis naadum mayyit moot saakit aw limis udaam hana naadum aw limis khabur,al‑naadum da yabga nijis le muddit sabʼa yoom.
Wa le l‑naadum al‑ma taahir da,yichiilu min rumaad al‑bagara al‑harragooha le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa yusubbuuh fi maaʼuun wa yusubbu foogah almi nadiif.
Wa raajil waahid taahir yichiil firiʼ hana zuufa wa yidissah fi l‑almi da wa yuruchch beyah al‑kheema wa kulla l‑mawaaʼiin wa kulla l‑naas al‑gaaʼidiin fi lubbaha.Wa yuruchch al‑naadum al‑limis udaam hana naadum mayyit aw limis naadum maktuul be l‑seef aw limis naadum mayyit moot saakit aw limis khabur.
Wa l‑raajil al‑taahir yuruchch al‑naadum al‑nijis fi l‑yoom al‑taalit wa l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ da,khataayah yinmahi.Wa baʼad da,yikhassil khulgaanah wa yilbarrad wa be achiiye hu yabga taahir.
Wa laakin al‑naadum al‑najjas nafsah wa ma tahharha,waajib yafsuluuh min al‑chaʼab achaan hu najjas al‑beet al‑mukhaddas hana Allah.Wa l‑naadum da gaaʼid be najaastah achaan ma rachchooh be almi al‑tathiir.
 Wa da yabga leehum chart daayim.Wa l‑naadum al‑yuruchch almi al‑tathiir da,waajib yikhassil khulgaanah.Wa kan naadum limis almi al‑tathiir da,yukuun nijis lahaddi achiiye.
Ayyi cheyy al‑yilammisah al‑naadum al‑nijis da,yukuun nijis wa l‑naadum limis naadum nijis,hu kula yukuun nijis lahaddi achiiye. 
Wa fi l‑chahar al‑awwal,kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wassalo fi saharat Siin wa gaʼado fi hillit Khaadich wa da bakaan Mariyam maatat foogah wa dafanooha.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,almi ma fiih wa Bani Israaʼiil lammo wa gammo didd Muusa wa Haaruun.
Wa humman harajo Muusa wa gaalo : Akheer leena kan mutna maʼa akhwaanna al‑maato min khadab Allah.
Maala jibtu jamaaʼat Allah fi l‑sahara di ?Achaan numuutu aniina wa bahaayimna walla ?
Maala maragtuuna min Masir wa jibtuuna fi l‑bakaan al‑fasil da ?Wa l‑bakaan da ma indah maʼaach wa la indah tiin wa la indah inab wa la indah rummaan.Wa almi hana charaab kula ma fiih. 
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun khallo al‑chaʼab wa macho fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa wagaʼo be wujuuhhum fi l‑turaab.Wa khalaas majd Allah baan leehum.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Chiil asaatak.Inta wa akhuuk Haaruun limmu mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa giddaamhum kulluhum guulu le l‑hajar :‹ Amrug almi !› Wa khalaas al‑hajar yamrug almi wa be l‑almi al‑yamrug min al‑hajar da,azgi kulla Bani Israaʼiil wa bahaayimhum. 
Wa misil Allah amarah beyah,Muusa chaal al‑asa min giddaam Allah min kheemat al‑ibaada.
Wa Muusa wa Haaruun lammo kulla Bani Israaʼiil giddaam al‑hajar.Wa Muusa gaal leehum : Asmaʼo,ya aasiyiin !Aniina namurgu leeku almi min al‑hajar da walla ? 
Wa Muusa rafaʼ iidah wa darab al‑hajar marrateen be asaatah.Wa khalaas almi jara be katara min al‑hajar.Wa mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil chirbo wa zago kulla bahaayimhum.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa wa Haaruun : Intu ma aamantu beyi wa giddaam Bani Israaʼiil ma ahtaramtuuni ana al‑Khudduus.Wa fi chaan da,intu abadan ma tiwaddu al‑chaʼab da fi l‑ard al‑ana anteetha leehum. 
Wa l‑bakaan da sammooh almi Mariiba (maʼanaatah almi al‑huraaj) achaan Bani Israaʼiil gammo didd Allah.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Allah wassaf leehum khadaastah.
Wa min Khaadich,Muusa rassal naas le malik Adoom.Wa l‑naas dool gaalo le l‑malik : Akhwaanak Bani Israaʼiil yuguulu leek ke :‹ Inta taʼarif kulla l‑machaakil al‑bigo foogna.
Wa juduudna macho fi balad Masir wa aniina sakanna foogha mudda tawiile.Wa hinaak al‑Masriyiin sawwo al‑fasaala foog juduudna wa foogna aniina kula.
Wa aniina sarakhna wa chahadna Allah wa hu simiʼna wa rassal leena malak le yamrugna min Masir.Wa daahu aniina fi Khaadich al‑hille al‑gariib le huduud baladak.
Wa hassaʼ nidooru nuchuggu ardak wa ma nitallufu al‑ziraaʼa wa la chadar al‑inab wa ma nacharbo almi biyaarak.Aniina nichiilu al‑derib al‑usmah Derib al‑Malik wa la nimayyulu minnah isra wa la zeene lahaddi nagtaʼo ardak.› 
Wa laakin malik Adoom gaal : Ma tuchuggu ardi.Wa kan abeetu,namrug leeku wa nihaaribku. 
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gaalo leyah : Aniina nichiilu al‑derib wa kan nidooru almi leena walla le bahaayimna kula,nachruuh minnak chari.Wa laakin nidooru minnak tikhalliina nuchuggu ardak bas. 
Wa laakin malik Adoom gaal leehum : Ma tuchuggu ardi ! Wa hu marag laagaahum be deech kabiir wa gawi.
Wa be misil da,malik Adoom aba ma yikhalliihum le Bani Israaʼiil yuchuggu ardah.Wa humman gabbalo wa macho be derib aakhar.
Wa kulla l‑mujtamaʼ saaro min Khaadich wa nazalo fi jabal Hoor
al‑gaaʼid fi huduud balad Adoom.Wa hinaak Allah hajja le Muusa wa Haaruun wa gaal :
 Haaruun yumuut wa yalhag abbahaatah.Wa hu ma yadkhul fi l‑balad al‑ana anteetha le Bani Israaʼiil achaan intu isiitu kalaami fi almi Mariiba.
Wa inta,ya Muusa,chiil Haaruun wa wileedah Aliʼaazar wa atlaʼ beehum fi jabal Hoor.
Wa sill khulgaan raajil al‑diin min Haaruun wa labbishum le wileedah Aliʼaazar wa khalaas Haaruun yumuut fi l‑bakaan daak. 
Wa Muusa sawwa kulla cheyy misil Allah amarah beyah.Giddaam kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil,humman talaʼo fi jabal Hoor.
Wa Muusa salla khulgaan Haaruun minnah wa labbasaahum le wileedah Aliʼaazar.Wa khalaas Haaruun maat fi raas jabal Hoor.Wa baʼad da,Muusa wa Aliʼaazar nazalo min al‑jabal.
Wa wakit kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil irfo kadar Haaruun maat khalaas,humman bako wa hizno leyah le muddit 30 yoom.
Wa wakit al‑malik Araad al‑Kanʼaani al‑gaaʼid yaskun fi saharat Nagab simiʼ kadar Bani Israaʼiil jaayiin be derib Ataariim,hu laagaahum wa haarabaahum wa karab minhum masaajiin.
Wa baʼad da,Bani Israaʼiil aahado Allah wa gaalo : Kan dasseet leena al‑chaʼab da fi iideenna,aniina kula nidammuru kulla hillaalhum ma nikhallu minhum cheyy. 
Wa Allah khibil kalaamhum wa nasaraahum fi l‑Kanʼaaniyiin dool.Wa Bani Israaʼiil dammaro kulla l‑Kanʼaaniyiin dool wa hillaalhum ma khallo minhum cheyy.Wa sammo al‑bakaan da Hurma (maʼanaatah al‑damaar).
Wa Bani Israaʼiil saaro min jabal Hoor wa macho be l‑derib al‑yufuut be l‑bahar al‑Ahmar achaan humman yidooru yihawwugu baʼiid min balad Adoom.Wa laakin fi l‑derib,humman ma sabaro.
Wa gammo didd al‑Rabb wa didd Muusa wa gaalo : Maala maragtuuna min balad Masir wa jibtuuna le numuutu fi l‑sahara di ?Achaan hini ma fi khubza wa la almi wa akilna da,akil ma yanfaʼ.Taar leena khalaas. 
Wa khalaas Allah rassal leehum dabiib amchideegaat wa addo katiir min Bani Israaʼiil wa katalaahum.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil jo le Muusa wa gaalo leyah : Aniina aznabna wakit gammeena didd Allah wa diddak inta.Hassaʼ da,achhad leena Allah achaan yibaʼʼid minnina al‑dabiib da. Wa Muusa chahad leehum Allah.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Asnaʼ daabi amchideegaat wa arfaʼah foog fi uud.Wa ayyi naadum al‑addaah daabi kan chaafah,battaan ma yumuut. 
Wa khalaas,Muusa sanaʼ daabi hana nahaas wa rafaʼah foog fi uud.Wa wakit daabi yiʼaddi naadum,kan al‑naadum da chaaf al‑daabi hana l‑nahaas da battaan ma yumuut.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil saaro wa nazalo fi Ubuut.
Wa battaan saaro min Ubuut wa nazalo fi Iyy Abaariim fi l‑sahara sabaah min balad Muwaab.
Wa min al‑bakaan da,saaro wa nazalo fi khachum waadi Zarad.
Wa minnah saaro wa nazalo khaadi le waadi Arnuun wa da l‑waadi al‑yuchugg al‑sahara wa jaayi min turaab al‑Amuuriyiin.Wa hu gaaʼid huduud ambeen balad Muwaab wa balad al‑Amuuriyiin.
Wa fi chaan da,fi kalaam maktuub fi kitaab al‑Huruub hana Allah wa l‑kalaam da bukhuss madiinat Waahib fi Suufa be wudyaanha wa waadi Arnuun
wa rujuulah al‑yusubbu ale madiinat Aar yabgo huduud Muwaab.
Wa min al‑bakaan da,saaro wa nazalo fi hillit Biir.Wa da l‑bakaan al‑Allah amar Muusa wa gaal leyah : Limm al‑chaʼab wa ana nantiihum almi. 
Wa Bani Israaʼiil khanno be l‑khine da : Atmi,ya biir,wa ya naas,khannu leeha katiir.
Wa l‑biir di hafarooha al‑kubaaraatwa gaddooha al‑hukkaambe isay mulukhumwa isay kheezaraanhum. Wa min al‑sahara,saaro lahaddi Mattaana
wa min Mattaana lahaddi Nahliyiil wa min Nahliyiil lahaddi Baamoot.
Wa min Baamoot saaro lahaddi l‑waadi al‑fi balad Muwaab wa da ale raas jabal al‑Fisga al‑minnah tinchaaf kulla l‑sahara.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil rassalo naas le Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin wa gaalo leyah :
 Nidooru nuchuggu ardak wa ma nitallufu al‑ziraaʼa wa la chadar al‑inab wa ma nacharbo almi biyaarak.Aniina nichiilu al‑derib al‑usmah Derib al‑Malik lahaddi nagtaʼo ardak. 
Wa laakin al‑malik Siihuun aba ma yanti izin le Bani Israaʼiil yuchuggu ardah.Hu lamma deechah wa marag laaga Bani Israaʼiil fi l‑sahara.Wa hu ja fi Yahaas wa haarabaahum le Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa laakin Bani Israaʼiil haarabooh wa katalooh be l‑seef wa chaalo ardah min waadi Arnuun lahaddi waadi Yabbuukh.Wa laakin wagafo fi l‑huduud al‑gawiiye hana Bani Ammuun.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil chaalo kulla mudun al‑Amuuriyiin wa sakano fooghum.Humman sakano fi Hachbuun wa kulla l‑hillaal al‑taabʼiin leeha.
Wa Hachbuun hi madiinat Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin al‑haarab malik Muwaab al‑awwal wa chaal minnah kulla ardah lahaddi waadi Arnuun.
Wa be sabab da,al‑khannaayiin gaalo : Taʼaalu le madiinat al‑malik Siihuunnabnu Hachbuun wa nigawwuuha.
Achaan min Hachbuun maragat naarwa min hillit Siihuun maragat ambalbaalawa akalat hillit Aar fi balad Muwaabwa siyaad al‑bakaan al‑aalijamb waadi Arnuun.
Ya khasaaritki,ya balad Muwaab !Ya chaʼab al‑ilaahku Kamuuch,intu addammartu khalaas.Intu jaʼaltu awlaadku matruudiinmin malik al‑Amuuriyiinwa hasabtu banaatku masjuunaatfi iideen Siihuun.
Wa laakin hassaʼ aniina Bani Israaʼiiltaʼʼanna al‑Amuuriyiin be l‑huraabwa dammarnaahummin Hachbuun lahaddi Diibuunwa kharabnaahummin Nuufah lahaddi Miidba. 
Wa be misil da,Bani Israaʼiil sakano fi balad al‑Amuuriyiin.
Wa Muusa rassal naas le yuruukhu madiinat Yaʼziir.Wa Bani Israaʼiil chaalo kulla l‑hillaal al‑taabʼiin leeha.Wa nahabo al‑Amuuriyiin al‑saakniin fooghum.
Wa baʼad da,Bani Israaʼiil chaalo derib aakhar wa macho ale Baachaan.Wa Oog malik Baachaan marag laagaahum hu wa kulla chaʼabah le yihaaribhum fi Idraʼi.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Ma takhaaf minnah,ana nisallimah leek fi iidak,hu wa kulla chaʼabah wa baladah.Wa inta tisawwi foogah misil inta sawweet foog Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin al‑hakam fi Hachbuun. 
Wa khalaas Bani Israaʼiil annasaro foog Oog malik Baachaan wa katalooh hu wa iyaalah wa kulla chaʼabah lahaddi naadum waahid kula minhum ma faddal.Wa chaalo baladah.
Bani Israaʼiil saaro wa nazalo fi kadaadit Muwaab sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun mugaabiliin Ariiha.
Wa hassaʼ,taʼaal alʼanhum achaan humman gawiyiin minnina.Wa be da,akuun ana ninnasir fooghum wa natrudhum min al‑balad.Achaan ana naʼarif kadar al‑naadum al‑inta baaraktah yabga mubaarak wa l‑laʼantah yabga malʼuun. 
Wa kubaaraat Muwaab wa kubaaraat Midyaan chaalo maʼaahum bayaad wa macho le Balʼaam.Wa wakit humman wassalo,khabbarooh be kalaam Balaakh.
Wa Balʼaam gaal leehum : Al‑leele arugdu maʼaayi hini wa ambaakir,ana nikhabbirku be kalaam Allah al‑yuguulah leyi. Wa khalaas,kubaaraat al‑Muwaabiyiin gaʼado maʼa Balʼaam.
Wa be l‑leel,al‑Rabb saʼal Balʼaam wa gaal leyah : Al‑rujaal al‑maʼaak dool yaatumman ? 
Wa Balʼaam gaal le l‑Rabb : Balaakh wileed Siffuur malik Muwaab rassalaahum leyi wa gaal :
‹ Daahu fiyah chaʼab katiiriin marra waahid marago min balad Masir.Taʼaal alʼanhum leyi wa be da,akuun ana ninnasir fooghum wa natrudhum.› 
Wa l‑Rabb gaal le Balʼaam : Inta wa la tamchi maʼaahum wa la talʼan al‑chaʼab da achaan al‑chaʼab da mubaarak. 
Wa ambaakir fajur,Balʼaam gamma wa gaal le kubaaraat Balaakh : Gabbulu baladku.Allah aba ma yikhalliini namchi maʼaaku. 
Wa kubaaraat Muwaab gabbalo le Balaakh wa gaalo leyah : Balʼaam aba ma yaji maʼaana. 
Wa laakin Balaakh battaan rassal kubaaraat aakhariin katiiriin wa muhimmiin min al‑awwal.
Wa l‑kubaaraat jo le Balʼaam wa gaalo leyah : Balaakh wileed Siffuur buguul leek ke :‹ Min fadlak,taʼaal leyi ma taaba.
Wa ana nicharrifak wa nisawwi leek ayyi cheyy al‑tidoorah minni.Min fadlak,taʼaal !Alʼan leyi al‑chaʼab da.› 
Wa Balʼaam radda le l‑naas al‑rassalaahum Balaakh wa gaal : Kan Balaakh yantiini kulla l‑fudda wa l‑dahab al‑fi beetah kula,ana ma nagdar nisawwi leyah cheyy wa la kabiir wa la sakhayyar didd amur Allah Ilaahi.
Wa hassaʼ da,intu kula al‑leele agoodu hini lahaddi ana naʼarif al‑cheyy al‑yuguulah leyi Allah battaan. 
Wa be l‑leel,al‑Rabb hajja le Balʼaam wa gaal leyah : Kan al‑naas dool jo battaan le yinaaduuk,khalaas amchi maʼaahum.Wa laakin sawwi al‑cheyy al‑ana nuguulah leek bas. 
Wa ambaakir fajur,Balʼaam gamma chadda humaartah wa macha maʼa kubaaraat Muwaab.
Wa be da kula,Allah khidib le Balʼaam wakit gamma maachi wa khalaas malak Allah wagaf leyah fi l‑derib achaan yadharah.Wa Balʼaam raakib fi humaartah wa maʼaayah itneen min khaddaamiinah.
Wa wakit al‑humaara chaafat malak Allah waagif fi l‑derib wa seefah masluul fi iidah,talagat al‑derib wa dagachat al‑khala.Wa Balʼaam gamma yudugg al‑humaara le yijiibha fi l‑derib.
Wa battaan malak Allah macha wagaf fi l‑derib fi bakaan chiyya dayyig al‑yufuut ambeen daraadir itneen hana jineenaat inab.
Wa wakit al‑humaara chaafat malak Allah,lammat fi l‑durdur wa asarat rijil Balʼaam fi l‑durdur.Wa hu gamma battaan yuduggaha.
Wa battaan malak Allah macha giddaam wagaf fi bakaan dayyig marra waahid ma indah faraga al‑yufuutu beeha wa la isra wa la zeene.
Wa wakit al‑humaara chaafat malak Allah,ragadat be Balʼaam.Wa hu ziʼil wa gamma yuduggaha be asaatah.
Wa Allah anta khachum le l‑humaara achaan tihajji wa gaalat le Balʼaam : Ana sawweet leek chunu lahaddi tuduggini talaata marraat ? 
Wa Balʼaam gaal leeha : Inti gaaʼide talʼabe beyi wa kan awwal ana indi seef,wakit da ana gataʼt raaski khalaas. 
Wa l‑humaara gaalat le Balʼaam : Ana ma humaartak al‑gaaʼid tarkab foogi min zamaan lahaddi l‑yoom ?Wa yoom waahid kula,ana sawweet cheyy misil da walla ? Wa Balʼaam gaal : La,abadan. 
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Allah kachaf le Balʼaam wa hu chaaf malak Allah waagif fi ust al‑derib wa seefah masluul fi iidah.Wa tawwaali,Balʼaam dangar fi l‑ard wa sajad.
Wa malak Allah gaal leyah : Maala daggeet humaartak talaata marraat ?Wa daahu ana jiit le nadharak achaan makhatarak da ma ajabni.
Al‑humaara chaafatni wa talaata marraat hi baarat minni.Wa kan awwal hi ma baarat minni,wakit da ana kataltak khalaas wa khalleetha hi hayye. 
Wa Balʼaam gaal le malak Allah : Ana aznabt wa ma irift kadar inta bas gaaʼid fi derbi.Wa kan makhatari da ma ajabaak,ana nigabbil. 
Wa laakin malak Allah gaal leyah : Amchi maʼa l‑rujaal dool.Wa laakin guul al‑kalaam al‑ana nuguulah leek bas. Wa khalaas Balʼaam macha maʼa l‑kubaaraat al‑rassalaahum Balaakh.
Wa wakit Balaakh simiʼ kadar Balʼaam jaayi leyah,hu marag laagaah fi madiinat Iir fi huduud Muwaab jamb waadi Arnuun.
Wa Balaakh gaal le Balʼaam : Maala ma jiit wakit ana rassalt leek awwal marra wa azamtak ?Inta tahsib ana ma nagdar nantiik charaf walla ? 
Wa Balʼaam radda leyah wa gaal : Hassaʼ daahu ana jiit leek !Wa ana ma nagdar nuguul ayyi cheyy illa l‑kalaam al‑yuguulah leyi al‑Rabb. 
Wa Balʼaam macha maʼa Balaakh wa dakhalo fi hillit Kharyat Husuut.
Wa Balaakh gaddam dahaaya hana bagar wa khanam wa anta minhum le Balʼaam wa l‑kubaaraat al‑jo maʼaayah.
Wa ambaakir fajur,Balaakh chaal Balʼaam wa talaʼo fi raas hajar al‑binaaduuh Baamoot Baʼal wa min hinaak,humman chaafo nuss min Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Balʼaam gaal le Balaakh : Abni leyi hini sabʼa madbah wa jiib leyi sabʼa tiiraan wa sabʼa kubchaan. 
Wa Balaakh sawwa misil Balʼaam gaalah leyah.Wa humman al‑itneen gaddamo dahiiye hana toor wa kabich fi ayyi madbah.
Wa Balʼaam gaal le Balaakh : Agiif jamb dahiiytak al‑muharraga wa ana kamaan namchi hinaak.Akuun Allah yaji wa yihajji leyi wa ayyi kalaam al‑yuguulah leyi ana nuguulah leek. Wa macha fi raas al‑jabal.
Wa l‑Rabb baan wa Balʼaam gaal leyah : Ana baneet sabʼa madbah wa gaddamt dahiiye fi ayyi waahid toor wa kabich. 
Wa Allah kallam le Balʼaam wa gaal leyah : Gabbil amchi le Balaakh wa guul leyah al‑kalaam da. 
Wa Balʼaam gabbal le Balaakh wa ligiih waagif jamb dahiiytah al‑muharraga wa kulla kubaaraat Muwaab waagfiin maʼaayah.
Wa khalaas,bada be l‑chiʼir wa gaal : Min Araam,Balaakh malik Muwaab jaabaaniwa min jibaal al‑sabaah,naadaani wa gaal :‹ Taʼaal le Yaakhuub alʼanah leyiwa taʼaal ayyir Israaʼiil aduuyi. ›
Wa kikkeef nalʼan naadumal‑Ilaah ma laʼanah ?Wa kikkeef nihaddid naadumal‑Allah ma haddadah ?
Wa wakit nichiifhummin raas al‑hajarwa wakit niraakhibhummin raas al‑jabal,ana nichiifhum chaʼab yaskun maʼzuulwa ma mahsuubiin maʼa baagi al‑umam.
Zurriiyit Yaakhuub misil al‑turaab.Yaatu yagdar yahsibhum ?Wa Bani Israaʼiil misil al‑ramla.Yaatu yalga adadhum ?Khalli ana numuut fi moot al‑saalihiinwa nintahi misil humman antaho. 
Wa Balaakh gaal le Balʼaam : Chunu al‑sawweetah leyi da ?Ana naadeetak le talʼan leyi aduuyi wa daahu inta baaraktuhum khalaas ! 
Wa Balʼaam radda leyah wa gaal : Ana ma nikallim al‑kalaam al‑Allah gaalah leyi walla ? 
Wa Balaakh gaal battaan : Taʼaal maʼaayi fi bakaan aakhar wa min hinaak,tichiif al‑chaʼab da.Wa inta tichiif nussuhum bas ma kulluhum ke.Wa min al‑bakaan da,alʼanhum leyi. 
Wa wadda Balʼaam foog fi raas jabal al‑Fisga wa da l‑bakaan al‑yiraakhubu minnah.Wa bana sabʼa madbah wa gaddam dahiiye hana toor wa kabich fi ayyi madbah.
Wa Balʼaam gaal le Balaakh : Agiif jamb dahiiytak al‑muharraga wa ana kamaan namchi hinaak narja Allah yaji leyi. 
Wa khalaas,Allah ja le Balʼaam wa kallamah.Wa gaal leyah : Gabbil amchi le Balaakh wa guul leyah al‑kalaam da. 
Wa Balʼaam gabbal le Balaakh wa ligiih waagif jamb dahiiytah al‑muharraga wa kulla kubaaraat Muwaab waagfiin maʼaayah.Wa Balaakh saʼalah wa gaal leyah : Allah gaal leek chunu ? 
Wa khalaas,Balʼaam bada be l‑chiʼir wa gaal : Gumm,ya Balaakh,wa asmaʼwa khutt adaanak leyi,ya wileed Siffuur.
Al‑Ilaah ma misil al‑insaan yakdibwa la misil Bani Adam yandam.Kulla cheyy al‑yuguulah,hu yisawwiihwa yihaggig kalaamah al‑yihajjiih.
Ana ligiit amur nibaarikachaan hu baarakaahum khalaas.Wa battaan ana ma nagdar nisawwicheyy aakhar.
Ma fi zanib fi zurriiyit Yaakhuubwa la zulum fi Bani Israaʼiil.Allah Ilaahhum yukuun maʼaahumwa humman yahmudu Allah malikhum.
Allah maragaahum min balad Masirwa induhum gudramisil gudrat al‑jaamuus.
Ma fi al‑yikallim be ilim al‑kheebfi zurriiyit Yaakhuubwa ma fi al‑yichawwiffi Bani Israaʼiil.Wa fi wakit muwaafig,zurriiyit Yaakhuub wa Bani Israaʼiilyaʼarfu kulla cheyy al‑Allah yisawwiih.
Daahu al‑chaʼabgamma misil al‑nimirwa wagaf misil al‑duud.Ma yunuum kan ma akalseede al‑hu saadaahawa la yargud kan ma chiribdamm al‑seede al‑hu katalaaha. 
Wa Balaakh gaal le Balʼaam : Kan ma talʼanhum da,ma tibaarikhum kula ! 
Wa Balʼaam radda leyah wa gaal : Ana ma gult leek ?Ana nihajji kulla l‑kalaam al‑Allah yuguulah leyi. 
Wa Balaakh gaal le Balʼaam : Taʼaal niwaddiik bakaan aakhar.Akuun min al‑bakaan daak al‑Rabb yarda inta talʼan leyi al‑chaʼab da. 
Wa Balaakh wadda Balʼaam fi raas jabal Faʼuur wa min al‑bakaan da,tinchaaf al‑sahara.
Wa Balʼaam gaal le Balaakh : Abni leyi hini sabʼa madbah wa jiib leyi sabʼa tiiraan wa sabʼa kubchaan. 
Wa Balaakh sawwa misil Balʼaam gaalah leyah wa gaddam dahiiye hana toor wa kabich fi ayyi madbah.
Wa wakit Balʼaam irif kadar Allah yidoor yibaarik Bani Israaʼiil,hu ma sawwa misil al‑marraat al‑awwal le yaʼarif al‑kheeb wa laakin wajjah ale l‑sahara.
Wa wakit Balʼaam rafaʼ raasah,chaaf kulla Bani Israaʼiil naazliin hasab gabaayilhum.Wa khalaas Ruuh Allah nazal foogah.
Wa bada be l‑chiʼir wa gaal : Da kalaam Balʼaam wileed Baʼuur.Da kalaam al‑raajil al‑yichiif adiil.
Da kalaam al‑naadumal‑yasmaʼ kalaam al‑Ilaahwa wakit yasjud,uyuunah yinfathuyichiif al‑ruʼyaal‑yiwassifha leyah Allah al‑Gaadir.
Khiyamku samhiin,ya zurriiyit Yaakhuub,wa masaakinku al‑taskunu fooghum,ya Bani Israaʼiil.
Khiyamku marsuusiin misil waadiwa misil jineenaat fi khachum al‑baharwa misil chadar al‑kitir al‑Allah gawwamahwa misil chadar al‑arz fi khachum al‑almi.
Almi yisiil min eenahwa bizirtah yazguuha be almi katiir.Wa malikhum yabga ziyaada min al‑malik Agaagwa mamlakatah tabga gawiiye.
Wa l‑Ilaah maragaahummin balad Masirwa induhum gudratmisil gudrat al‑jaamuus.Wa yidammuru al‑umamal‑humman udwaanhumwa yitaʼʼunuuhum be nuchchaabhumwa yikassuru udaamhum.
Humman misil al‑duud al‑yabrukwa l‑duudaay al‑targud.Yaatu al‑yagdar yigawwimhum ?Mabruuk al‑yibaarikkuwa malʼuun al‑yalʼanku. 
Wa khalaas Balaakh ziʼil didd Balʼaam wa darab ambeenaat iideenah wa gaal : Ana naadeetak le talʼan leyi udwaani.Wa daahu le taalit marra inta baaraktuhum !
Yalla !Amchi baladak !Awwal ana gult nicharrifak wa laakin daahu Allah daharak min al‑charaf da. 
Wa Balʼaam radda le Balaakh wa gaal : Ana kallamtuhum le naasak al‑inta rassaltuhum wa gult :
‹ Kan Balaakh yantiini kulla l‑fudda wa l‑dahab al‑fi beetah kula,ana ma nagdar nisawwi cheyy didd amur Allah wa ana be nafsi ma nagdar nisawwi kheer wa la charr.Ana nuguul illa l‑kalaam al‑Allah gaalah bas.› 
Wa battaan Balʼaam gaal : Hassaʼ,gubbaal ma nigabbil le chaʼabi,taʼaal niʼooriik be l‑cheyy al‑yisawwiih al‑chaʼab da baʼadeen fi chaʼabak. 
Wa khalaas,bada be l‑chiʼir wa gaal : Da kalaam Balʼaam wileed Baʼuur.Da kalaam al‑raajil al‑yichiif adiil.
Da kalaam al‑naadumal‑yasmaʼ kalaam al‑Ilaahwa indah ilim min al‑Aaliwa wakit yasjud,uyuunah yinfathuyichiif al‑ruʼyaal‑yiwassifha leyah Allah al‑Gaadir.
Ana nichiif al‑jaayiwa laakin ma yaji hassaʼ.Ana gaaʼid nichiifahwa laakin ma min gariib.Min zurriiyit Yaakhuub tatlaʼ najmawa min Bani Israaʼiil yaji malik.Be asaat mulkah yaksir jabhat Muwaabwa yaktul kulla zurriiyit Chiit.
Wa balad Adoom yichiilhawa yichiil Saʼiir balad udwaanhumwa Bani Israaʼiil gudrithum tiziid.
Wa yaji malik gawimin zurriiyit Yaakhuubwa yidammir al‑naasal‑faddalo fi l‑madiina. 
Wa Balʼaam chaaf balad al‑Amaalikh wa bada be l‑chiʼir wa gaal : Amaalikh hu al‑awwal fi l‑umamwa laakin fi l‑akhiir yiddammar. 
Wa Balʼaam chaaf balad al‑Khiiniyiin wa bada be l‑chiʼir wa gaal : Buyuutku gaaʼidiin be amaanmisil uchuuch fi raas al‑hajar.
Laakin balad al‑Khiiniyiin tahrag be naarwakit Achuur yakrubku masaajiin. 
Wa battaan Balʼaam bada be l‑chiʼir wa gaal : Ya khasaaritna !Yaatu yagdar yiʼiichkan al‑Ilaah bas jaʼalah misil da ?
Fi sufun yaju min Khubrus.Yazulmu Achuur wa yazulmu Ibaarwa humman kula yiddammaro. 
Wa khalaas,Balʼaam gabbal baladah wa Balaakh kula chaal derbah.
Wakit Bani Israaʼiil gaʼado fi Chittiim,gammo yafsudu maʼa banaat al‑Muwaabiyiin.
Banaat al‑Muwaabiyiin yaʼaziman Bani Israaʼiil fi gaddimiin al‑dahaaya le ilaahaathin.Wa humman yaakulu maʼaahin laham dahaayaahin wa yasjudu le ilaahaathin.
Wa be misil da,Bani Israaʼiil chaarako fi ibaadat ilaah Baʼal hana jabal Faʼuur wa Allah khidib khadab chadiid didduhum.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Akrub kulla kubaaraat al‑chaʼab al‑fasado wa jiibhum giddaami ana Allah wa gaabilhum le l‑harraay wa achnighum.Wa be da,khadabi al‑muhrig battaan ma yalhaghum le Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa Muusa gaal le l‑gudiya hana Bani Israaʼiil : Ayyi waahid minku yaktul rujaalah al‑chaarako fi ibaadat ilaah Baʼal hana jabal Faʼuur. 
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin yabku fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ,fi raajil min Bani Israaʼiil jaayi le akhwaanah maʼa mara Midyaaniiye.Wa Muusa wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil chaafooh.
Wa khalaas fi l‑bakaan da,Fiinhaas wileed Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun raajil al‑diin,gamma min usut mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa chaal harba fi iidah.
Wa taabaʼ al‑raajil lahaddi fi lubb al‑kheema wa taʼanaahum humman al‑itneen taʼne waahide bas.Al‑raajil wa l‑mara taʼanaahum fi butuunhum.Wa khalaas al‑waba wagaf min Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa l‑maato min al‑waba da,adadhum 24 000 naas.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Fiinhaas wileed Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun raajil al‑diin waggaf khadabi min Bani Israaʼiil wakit wassaf khiirti ana Allah fi usuthum.Wa be sabab al‑cheyy al‑sawwaah Fiinhaas,ana battaan ma niwassif khiirti wa nikammil Bani Israaʼiil.
Achaan da,guul leyah ana nantiih muʼaahadati hana l‑salaam.
Wa l‑muʼaahada di tabga maʼaayah hu wa zurriiytah al‑yaju min baʼadah.Wa hi tadman leehum khidmit rujaal al‑diin le l‑abad achaan hu wassaf khiirtah fi chaani ana Ilaahah wa sawwa kaffaara le zunuub Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa l‑raajil al‑min Bani Israaʼiil al‑katalooh maʼa l‑Midyaaniiye usmah Zimri wileed Saalu cheekh hana aayila min gabiilat Chimʼuun.
Wa l‑mara al‑Midyaaniiye al‑katalooha usumha Kuzbi bineeyit Suur kabiir hana khachum beet min khuchuum buyuut Midyaan.
Wa khalaas,Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Ahjumu al‑Midyaaniyiin wa aktuluuhum.
Achaan humman khachchooku fi muchkilat Faʼuur wa fi muchkilat akhuthum Kuzbi bitt kabiir Midyaan al‑katalooha fi yoom al‑waba al‑nazal fi muchkilat Faʼuur. 
Wa baʼad al‑waba da,Allah gaal le Muusa wa le Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun raajil al‑diin :
 Min kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil,ahsubu kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum min 20 sana wa foog al‑yagdaro le khidmit al‑askariiye hasab aayilaathum. 
Wa fi kadaadit Muwaab fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun al‑mugaabil hillit Ariiha,Muusa wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar gaalo le l‑chaʼab :
 Aniina nahsubuuku intu al‑rujaal al‑umurku min 20 sana wa foog misil Allah amar beyah Muusa. Wa daahu gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil al‑marago min balad Masir.
Wa Raʼuubiin hu bikir Israaʼiil wa dool zurriiytah hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Hanuuk jaab al‑Hanuukiyiinwa Fallu jaab al‑Falluwiyiin
wa Hasruun jaab al‑Hasruuniyiinwa Karmi jaab al‑Karmiyiin.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Raʼuubiin adadhum 43 730 naas.
Wa Fallu jaab Aliyaab
wa Aliyaab jaab Namuwiil wa Dataan wa Abiraam.Wa Dataan wa Abiraam dool kubaaraat mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil al‑gammo didd Muusa wa Haaruun.Humman maʼa naas Khuurah wakit gammo didd Allah.
Wa l‑ard anfatahat wa zaratathum humman wa Khuurah wa l‑naas al‑maʼaahum wa l‑naar haragat 250 naadum wa bigo masal le l‑aakhariin.
Wa laakin iyaal Khuurah ma maato fi l‑yoom daak.
Wa dool zurriiyit Chimʼuun hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Namuwiil jaab al‑Namuwiiliyiinwa Yaamiin jaab al‑Yaamiiniyiinwa Yaakiin jaab al‑Yaakiiniyiin
wa Zaarah jaab al‑Zaarahiyiinwa Chaawuul jaab al‑Chaawuuliyiin.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Chimʼuun adadhum 22 200 naas.
Wa dool zurriiyit Gaad hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Safuun jaab al‑Safuuniyiinwa Haggi jaab al‑Haggiyiinwa Chuuni jaab al‑Chuuniyiin
wa Uzni jaab al‑Uzniyiinwa Iiri jaab al‑Iriyiin
wa Aruudi jaab al‑Aruudiyiinwa Ariili jaab al‑Ariiliyiin.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Gaad adadhum 40 500 naas.
Wa iyaal Yahuuza humman Iir wa Unaanwa humman dool maato fi balad Kanʼaan.
Wa dool zurriiyit Yahuuza hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Chiila jaab al‑Chiiliyiinwa Faaris jaab al‑Faarisiyiinwa Zaarah jaab al‑Zaarahiyiin.
Wa min al‑Faarisiyiin marago Hasruun wa Haamul.Wa Hasruun jaab al‑Hasruuniyiinwa Haamul jaab al‑Haamuliyiin.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Yahuuza adadhum 76 500 naas.
Wa dool zurriiyit Yassaakar hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Tuulaʼ jaab al‑Tuulaʼiyiinwa Fuwwa jaab al‑Fuwwiyiin.
Wa Yachuub jaab al‑Yachuubiyiinwa Chimruun jaab al‑Chimruuniyiin.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Yassaakar adadhum 64 300 naas.
Wa dool zurriiyit gabiilat Zabuluun hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Saarad jaab al‑Saaradiyiinwa Iluun jaab al‑Iluuniyiinwa Yahaliil jaab al‑Yahaliiliyiin.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Zabuluun adadhum 60 500 naas.
Wa dool zurriiyit Yuusuf,gabaayil Manassa wa Afraayim hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.
Manassa jaab Makiirwa Makiir jaab al‑Makiiriyiinwa min al‑Makiiriyiin marag Gilʼaadwa Gilʼaad jaab al‑Gilʼaadiyiin.
Wa min al‑Gilʼaadiyiin marago Iyaʼzar al‑jaab al‑Iyaʼzariyiinwa Hilakh al‑jaab al‑Hilakhiyiin.
Wa Asriyiil al‑jaab al‑Asriyiiliyiinwa Chakiim al‑jaab al‑Chakiimiyiin.
Wa Chamiidaʼ al‑jaab al‑Chamiidaʼiyiinwa Hiifar al‑jaab al‑Hiifariyiin.
Wa Saluufhad wileed Hiifar ma jaab awlaad wa laakin jaab banaat bas.Wa banaatah asaameehum Mahla wa Nuuʼa wa Hugla wa Milka wa Tirsa.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Manassa adadhum 52 700 naas.
Wa dool zurriiyit Afraayim hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Chutaalah jaab al‑Chutaalahiyiinwa Baakar jaab al‑Baakariyiinwa Taahan jaab al‑Taahaniyiin.
Wa min al‑Chutaalahiyiin marag Araan.Wa Araan jaab al‑Araaniyiin.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Afraayim adadhum 32 500 naas.Wa dool gabaayil Manassa wa Afraayim iyaal Yuusuf hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.
Wa dool zurriiyit Banyaamiin hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Baalaʼ jaab al‑Baalaʼiyiinwa Achbiil jaab al‑Achbiiliyiinwa Ahiraam jaab al‑Ahiraamiyiin
wa Chafuufam jaab al‑Chafuufamiyiinwa Huufam jaab al‑Huufamiyiin.
Wa min al‑Baalaʼiyiin marago Arad wa Naʼamaan.Wa Arad jaab al‑Aradiyiinwa Naʼamaan jaab al‑Naʼamaaniyiin.
