Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Banyaamiin adadhum 45 600 naas.
Wa dool zurriiyit Daan hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Chuhaam jaab al‑Chuhaamiyiin.Wa dool zurriiyit gabiilat Daan hasab khachum beethum.
Wa khachum beet al‑Chuhaamiyiin adadah 64 400 naas.
Wa dool zurriiyit Achiir hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Yimna jaab al‑Yimniyiinwa Yichwi jaab al‑Yichwiyiinwa Bariiʼa jaab al‑Bariiʼiyiin.
Wa min al‑Bariiʼiyiin marago Haabar wa Malkiyiil.Wa Haabar jaab al‑Haabariyiinwa Malkiyiil jaab al‑Malkiyiiliyiin.
Wa Achiir jaab bineeye usumha Saarah.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Achiir adadhum 53 400 naas.
Wa dool zurriiyit Naftaali hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Yahsiil jaab al‑Yahsiiliyiinwa Guuni jaab al‑Guuniyiin
wa Yisar jaab al‑Yisriyiinwa Chilliim jaab al‑Chilliimiyiin.
Wa khuchuum buyuut gabiilat Naftaali adadhum 45 400 naas.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil adadhum bigi 601 730 naas.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Gassim al‑balad di warasa ambeenaat al‑gabaayil dool wa gassimha leehum hasab adad al‑naas.
Al‑gabiila al‑kabiire antiiha ard warasa kabiire wa l‑gabiila al‑sakhayre antiiha ard warasa sakhayre.Ayyi gabiila,antiiha warasa hasab adad naasha.
Wa gassimiin al‑balad di yabga be amʼiyeedaat.Wa ayyi gabiila talga warasatha hasab adad naasha.
Wa be amʼiyeedaat ambeenaat al‑gabaayil al‑kubaar wa l‑dugaag,ayyi gabiila talga warasatha. 
Wa dool zurriiyit Laawi hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.Girchuun jaab al‑Girchuuniyiinwa Gahaat jaab al‑Gahaatiyiinwa Maraari jaab al‑Maraariyiin.
Wa min khuchuum al‑buyuut al‑talaata dool marago khuchuum buyuut Libni wa Habruun wa Mahli wa Muuchi wa Khuurah.Wa min khachum beet Gahaat marag al‑raajil al‑bisammuuh Amraam.
Wa marit Amraam usumha Yuukaabad bineeyit Laawi al‑wildooha fi Masir.Wa Yuukaabad jaabat le Amraam,Haaruun wa Muusa wa akhuthum Mariyam.
Wa Haaruun jaab Nadaab wa Abiihu wa Aliʼaazar wa Itamaar.
Wa Nadaab wa Abiihu maato achaan humman gaddamo le Allah fi lubb kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ bakhuur fi naar al‑hu ma azan beeha.
Wa l‑Laawiyiin al‑dukuur min wileed chahar wa foog,adadhum 23 000 naas.Wa ma hasaboohum maʼa Bani Israaʼiil al‑aakhariin achaan ma induhum warasa min al‑balad maʼa Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa dool al‑naas al‑hasaboohum Muusa wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wakit hasabo Bani Israaʼiil fi kadaadit Muwaab fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun al‑mugaabil hillit Ariiha.
Wa laakin Bani Israaʼiil al‑zamaan hasaboohum Muusa wa raajil al‑diin Haaruun fi saharat Siinaaʼ,waahid kula minhum ma faddal.
Achaan Allah gaal : Humman kulluhum yumuutu fi l‑sahara. Wa khalaas,waahid kula minhum ma faddal illa Kaalib wileed Yafuuna wa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun.
Wa Saluufhad wileed Hiifar wileed Gilʼaad wileed Makiir wileed Manassa indah banaat.Wa l‑banaat deel asaameehin Mahla wa Nuuʼa wa Hugla wa Milka wa Tirsa.Wa hinna min gabiilat Manassa wileed Yuusuf.Wa yoom waahid,jin
wa wagafan giddaam Muusa wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa l‑chuyuukh wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Wa gaalan :
 Abuuna maat fi l‑sahara wa hu ma maʼa Bani Israaʼiil wa Khuurah al‑gammo didd Allah.Wa laakin hu maat be sabab zanbah halaalah.Wa ma indah wileed.
Hal usum abuuna yingachcha min khachum beetah be sabab hu ma indah wileed walla ?Antiina aniina kula warasatna min al‑ard misil tanti akhwaan abuuna. 
Wa daliimat al‑banaat di,Muusa gaddamaaha le Allah.
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa :
 Banaat Saluufhad indihin hagg.Antiihin warasathin min al‑ard misil tanti akhwaan abuuhin.Antiihin kulla l‑warasa hana abuuhin.
Wa guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Kan naadum maat wa ma khalla wileed,warasatah antuuha le bineeytah.
Wa kan ma indah bineeye,warasatah antuuha le akhwaanah.
Wa kan ma indah akhwaan,warasatah antuuha le akhwaan abuuh.
Wa kan abuuh ma indah akhwaan,warasatah antuuha le l‑gariib leyah min khachum beetah.Wa hu da bas yichiil al‑warasa di.Wa da yabga gaanuun hagg le Bani Israaʼiil misil ana Allah amartak beyah,ya Muusa.› 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa : Atlaʼ fi raas jabal Abaariim wa chiif al‑balad al‑ana nantiiha le Bani Israaʼiil.
Inta tichiifha wa baʼad da,tumuut inta kula misil akhuuk Haaruun wa talhag abbahaatak.
Wa da achaan fi saharat Siin wakit mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil gammo diddi,intu kula isiitu awaamiri.Achaan ana gult leeku :‹ Wassufu leehum kadar ana bas Allah al‑Khudduus wa amurgu leehum almi al‑humman dawwarooh.Wa da almi Mariiba al‑fi Khaadich fi saharat Siin.› 
Wa Muusa gaal le Allah :
 Inta Allah al‑Rabb al‑tamluk fi kulla makhluug hayy.Kallif naadum fi raas Bani Israaʼiil dool.
Wa l‑naadum da yuguudhum,yamrug wa yaji beehum wa yimarrighum wa yidakhkhilhum.Wa be da,chaʼab Allah ma yabgo misil al‑khanam al‑ma induhum raaʼi. 
Wa Allah radda le Muusa wa gaal : Chiil Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun al‑ruuhi gaaʼide foogah wa khutt iidak foogah.
Wa waggifah giddaam raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa giddaam kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil wa darrijah wa antiih masʼuuliiytah fi giddaamhum.
Wa antiih masʼuuliiye min masʼuuliiytak achaan mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yitiiʼu amrah.
Wa kan indah suʼaal yaji giddaam raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa Aliʼaazar yasʼal leyah Allah be l‑Uriim wa l‑Tummiim al‑beehum yasʼalo Allah.Wa be da,hu wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yamurgu wa yaju be izin raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar. 
Wa Muusa sawwa misil Allah amarah beyah wa chaal Yachuuʼ wa waggafah giddaam raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa giddaam kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Muusa khatta iidah foogah wa darrajah wa antaah masʼuuliiytah misil Allah gaalah leyah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Aamur Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum :‹ Fakkuru adiil wa waajib tigaddumu leyi dahiiye muharraga fi l‑wakit al‑muhaddad al‑ana Allah narda be riihitha. ›
Wa guul leehum :‹ Daahu al‑dahaaya al‑muharragiin al‑tigaddumuuhum le Allah.Ayyi yoom,chiilu khurfaan itneen awlaad sana al‑ma induhum ayyi eeb wa gaddumuuhum dahiiye muharraga daayme.
Al‑kharuuf al‑waahid tigaddumuuh be fajur wa l‑taani tigaddumuuh fi l‑makhrib.
Wa tigaddumu maʼaayah hadiiye hana dagiig kooro mukhalbat be liitir hana dihin adiil.
Wa di dahiiye muharraga daayme misil al‑awwal gaddamooha fi jabal Siinaaʼ ana Allah ridiit be riihitha.
Wa tigaddumu le Allah maʼa l‑kharuuf al‑awwal fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas liitir hana khamar hadiiyat charaab.
Wa l‑kharuuf al‑taani tigaddumuuh be makhrib wa tigaddumu maʼaayah hadiiyat dagiig wa hadiiyat charaab misil al‑gaddamtuuhum fajur.Wa di dahiiye muharraga al‑Allah yarda be riihitha.
 ‹ Wa fi ayyi yoom sabt,tigaddumu dahiiye itneen kharuuf awlaad sana al‑ma induhum ayyi eeb wa tigaddumu maʼaahum hadiiye hana dagiig koorteen mukhalbat be dihin wa maʼaayah hadiiyat charaab.
Wa l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga hana l‑sabt di,tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑yoomiiye wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi awwal yoom fi ayyi chahar,tigaddumu le Allah dahiiye muharraga itneen toor wa kabich wa sabʼa kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa maʼa ayyi toor,gaddumu hadiiye hana dagiig talaata kooro mukhalbat be dihin.Wa maʼa l‑kabich,gaddumu hadiiye hana dagiig koorteen mukhalbat be dihin.
Wa maʼa ayyi kharuuf,gaddumu hadiiye kooro hana dagiig mukhalbat be dihin.Wa di dahiiye muharraga al‑tigaddumuuha le Allah wa hu yarda be riihitha.
Wa hadiiyat al‑charaab hana l‑khamar al‑tigaddumuuha maʼa ayyi toor,liitreen wa maʼa l‑kabich,liitir wa nuss wa maʼa ayyi kharuuf,liitir.Wa di l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑tigaddumuuha fi awwal yoom fi ayyi chahar fi l‑sana.
Wa battaan tigaddumu le Allah tees dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑yoomiiye wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi yoom 14 hana l‑chahar al‑awwal,da yoom iid al‑Fisha le Allah.
 ‹ Wa yoom 15 hana l‑chahar,da bidaayit al‑iid hana l‑sabʼa yoom al‑taakulu foogah khubza bala tawwaara.
Fi l‑yoom al‑awwal,limmu fi malamma khaassa wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.
Wa gaddumu le Allah dahaaya muharragiin itneen toor wa kabich wa sabʼa kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa kan le l‑hadiiye hana l‑dagiig al‑mukhalbat be dihin kamaan,gaddumuuha talaata kooro maʼa ayyi toor wa koorteen maʼa l‑kabich.
Wa gaddumu kooro maʼa ayyi kharuuf min al‑khurfaan al‑sabʼa.
Wa battaan tigaddumu tees dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tabga leeku kaffaara.
Wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑yoomiiye hana l‑fajur.
Ayyi yoom min ayyaam usbuuʼ al‑iid da,tichiilu nafs al‑dahaaya dool wa tigaddumuuhum le Allah dahaaya muharragiin al‑hu yarda be riihithum.Wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑yoomiiye wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,tilimmu malamma khaassa wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.
 ‹ Wa fi yoom al‑gatiʼ hana l‑ziraaʼa,tigaddumu hadiiye le Allah min awwal khalla al‑intu gataʼtuuha min al‑zereʼ le iid al‑Gatiʼ.Wa tilimmu malamma khaassa wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.
Wa tigaddumu le Allah dahiiye muharraga al‑hu yarda be riihitha itneen toor wa kabich wa sabʼa kharuuf awlaad sana.
Wa kan le l‑hadiiye hana l‑dagiig al‑mukhalbat be dihin kamaan,gaddumuuha talaata kooro maʼa ayyi toor wa koorteen maʼa l‑kabich.
Wa gaddumu kooro maʼa ayyi kharuuf min al‑khurfaan al‑sabʼa.
Wa battaan tigaddumu tees dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tabga leeku kaffaara.
Wa gaddumu maʼaahum hadiiyat charaab wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑yoomiiye wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig al‑maʼaaha.Wa gaddumu bahaayim al‑ma induhum ayyi eeb.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑awwal hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ,tilimmu malamma khaassa.Wa fi l‑yoom da,ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.Wa fi l‑yoom da bas,tadurbu al‑buug.
Wa tigaddumu le Allah dahiiye muharraga al‑hu yarda be riihitha,waahid toor wa waahid kabich wa 7 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa kan le l‑hadiiye hana l‑dagiig al‑mukhalbat be dihin kamaan,gaddumuuha talaata kooro maʼa l‑toor wa koorteen maʼa l‑kabich.
Wa gaddumu kooro maʼa ayyi kharuuf min al‑khurfaan al‑sabʼa.
Wa battaan tigaddumu tees dahiiye le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tabga leeku kaffaara.
Wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga hana l‑chahar wa l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaahum hasab al‑churuut.Kulla l‑hadaaya al‑muharragiin dool Allah yarda be riihithum.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑aachir hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ da,tilimmu malamma khaassa.Wa fi l‑yoom da,tusuumu wa ma tisawwu ayyi khidme.
Wa tigaddumu le Allah dahiiye muharraga al‑hu yarda be riihitha waahid toor wa waahid kabich wa sabʼa kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa kan le l‑hadiiye hana l‑dagiig al‑mukhalbat be dihin kamaan,gaddumuuha talaata kooro maʼa l‑toor wa koorteen maʼa l‑kabich.
Wa gaddumu kooro maʼa ayyi kharuuf min al‑khurfaan al‑sabʼa.
Wa tigaddumu hadiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye hana kaffaarat al‑zanib wa l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa yoom 15 hana l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ,tilimmu malamma khaassa.Wa fi l‑yoom da,ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.Wa tiʼayyudu le Allah le muddit sabʼa yoom.
Wa tigaddumu 13 toor wa 2 kabich wa 14 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa di dahiiye muharraga wa hi hadiiye muharraga al‑riihitha Allah yarda beeha.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa kan le l‑hadiiye hana l‑dagiig al‑mukhalbat be dihin kamaan,gaddumuuha talaata kooro maʼa ayyi toor min al‑tiiraan al‑talaataachar wa koorteen maʼa ayyi kabich min al‑kubchaan al‑itneen.
Wa gaddumu kooro maʼa ayyi kharuuf min al‑khurfaan al‑arbaʼtaachar.
Wa tigaddumu dahiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taani,gaddumu 12 toor wa 2 kabich wa 14 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab tigaddumuuhum hasab adad al‑tiiraan wa l‑kubchaan wa l‑khurfaan hasab al‑churuut.
Wa tigaddumu dahiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taalit,gaddumu 11 toor wa 2 kabich wa 14 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab tigaddumuuhum hasab adad al‑tiiraan wa l‑kubchaan wa l‑khurfaan hasab al‑churuut.
Wa tigaddumu dahiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑raabiʼ,tigaddumu 10 toor wa 2 kabich wa 14 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab tigaddumuuhum hasab adad al‑tiiraan wa l‑kubchaan wa l‑khurfaan hasab al‑churuut.
Wa tigaddumu dahiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑khaamis,tigaddumu 9 toor wa 2 kabich wa 14 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab tigaddumuuhum hasab adad al‑tiiraan wa l‑kubchaan wa l‑khurfaan hasab al‑churuut.
Wa tigaddumu dahiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saadis,tigaddumu 8 toor wa 2 kabich wa 14 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab tigaddumuuhum hasab adad al‑tiiraan wa l‑kubchaan wa l‑khurfaan hasab al‑churuut.
Wa tigaddumu dahiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,tigaddumu 7 toor wa 2 kabich wa 14 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab tigaddumuuhum hasab adad al‑tiiraan wa l‑kubchaan wa l‑khurfaan hasab al‑churuut.
Wa tigaddumu dahiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taamin,khalaas tisawwu hafla hana kumaalit al‑iid wa fi l‑yoom da,ma tisawwu ayyi khidme gaasiye.
Wa tigaddumu toor wa kabich wa 7 kharuuf awlaad sana.Wa di dahiiye muharraga wa hi hadiiye muharraga al‑riihitha Allah yarda beeha.Wa kulla l‑bahaayim dool yukuunu ma induhum ayyi eeb.
Wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab tigaddumuuhum hasab adad al‑tiiraan wa l‑kubchaan wa l‑khurfaan hasab al‑churuut.
Wa tigaddumu dahiiye hana tees le kaffaarat al‑zanib wa di tiziid fi l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga al‑daayme wa hadiiyat al‑dagiig wa hadiiyat al‑charaab al‑maʼaaha.
 ‹ Wa dool bas al‑hadaaya al‑waajib tigaddumuuhum le Allah fi ayyaam aʼyaadku.Wa l‑hadaaya dool,yiziidu fi dahaaya al‑muʼaahada wa l‑hadaaya al‑tigaddumuuhum be niiyitku wa l‑dahaaya al‑muharragiin wa l‑hadaaya hana l‑dagiig wa l‑hadaaya hana l‑charaab wa dahaaya al‑salaama.› 
Wa Muusa gaal le Bani Israaʼiil kulla l‑kalaam al‑Allah amarah beyah.
Wa Muusa kallam le kubaaraat gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal : Daahu amur Allah al‑gaalah.
Kan raajil yisawwi nazir le Allah wa yahlif wa yuguul yitimm haliiftah,waajib al‑raajil da ma yafchul min al‑nazir wa yitabbig sawa sawa al‑kalaam al‑hu gaalah.
 Wa kan bitt sabiiye gaaʼide fi beet abuuha wa tisawwi nazir le Allah wa tahlif wa tuguul titimm haliifitha,
kan abuuha simiʼ be nazirha wa haliifitha wa ma gaal cheyy,khalaas nazirha da hi masʼuula minnah wa haliifitha kula hi masʼuula minha.
Wa laakin kan fi nafs al‑yoom wakit abuuha simiʼ bas daharha,khalaas hi ma masʼuula min al‑nazir wa la min al‑haliife wa Allah yakhfir leeha achaan abuuha daharha.
 Wa kan al‑bitt di sawwat nazirha wa l‑kalaam al‑hi halafat beyah wa baʼad da akhadat,
kan raajilha simiʼ wa ma gaal cheyy,khalaas nazirha da hi masʼuula minnah wa haliifitha kula hi masʼuula minha.
Wa laakin kan fi nafs al‑yoom wakit raajilha simiʼ bas daharha,khalaas hu yibattil al‑nazir wa l‑haliife al‑sawwathum wa be da,Allah yakhfir leeha.
 Wa kan le l‑mara al‑armala aw al‑mutallaga,kan sawwat nazir aw haliife,hi masʼuula minnah.
 Wa laakin kan al‑mara fi beet raajilha bas hi sawwat nazir wa halafat wa gaalat tisawwi cheyy
kan raajilha simiʼ wa ma gaal cheyy wa ma daharha,khalaas nazirha da hi masʼuula minnah wa haliifitha kula hi masʼuula minha.
Wa laakin kan raajilha yibattil kalaamha fi nafs al‑yoom wakit hu simiʼ,khalaas hi ma indaha nazir wa la indaha haliife achaan raajilha battalaahum wa Allah yakhfir leeha.
 Wa ayyi nazir aw haliife hana siyaam,raajilha bas yibattilah aw yiʼakkidah.
Wa kan raajilha ma gaal cheyy lahaddi ambaakir,khalaas hu sawwaaha masʼuula min al‑nazir aw al‑haliife achaan hu ma gaal cheyy fi l‑yoom al‑awwal wakit hu simiʼ.
Wa laakin kan hu battal al‑nazir aw al‑haliife di baʼad yoom min hu simiʼ,khalaas hu yichiil masʼuuliiyit al‑khata hana martah. 
Wa dool al‑gawaaniin al‑Allah amar beehum Muusa wa bukhussu al‑raajil wa martah aw al‑abu wa bittah al‑sabiiye wakit hi lissaaʼ gaaʼide maʼaayah fi beetah.
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Chiil le Bani Israaʼiil taarhum fi l‑Midyaaniyiin wa baʼad da,tumuut wa talhag abbahaatak. 
Wa Muusa gaal le l‑chaʼab : Khalli rujaal waahidiin minku yichiilu silaahhum le yihaarubu al‑Midyaaniyiin wa yichiilu fiihum taar be usum Allah.
Wa chiilu 1 000 raajil min ayyi gabiila min gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil wa rassuluuhum le l‑harib da. 
Wa min aalaaf Bani Israaʼiil chaalo min ayyi gabiila 1 000 raajil wa adadhum bigi 12 000 rujaal musallahiin le l‑harib.
Wa Muusa chaal min ayyi gabiila 1 000 raajil wa rassalaahum le l‑harib.Wa raajil al‑diin Fiinhaas wileed Aliʼaazar kula macha maʼaahum.Wa hu indah kulla l‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhassasiin wa l‑burunji al‑yantu beyah ichaaraat fi l‑harib.
Wa humman macho wa haarabo balad Midyaan misil Allah amar beyah Muusa wa katalo kulla l‑rujaal.
Wa maʼa l‑rujaal dool humman katalo muluuk Midyaan al‑khamsa,Awiya wa Raakhim wa Suur wa Huur wa Raabiʼ.Wa Balʼaam wileed Baʼuur kula katalooh maʼaahum.
Bani Israaʼiil karabo awiin al‑Midyaaniyiin wa iyaalhum masaajiin wa nahabo kulla bahaayimhum wa khumaamhum wa maalhum.
Wa harrago kulla l‑mudun wa l‑furgaan hana l‑Midyaaniyiin.
Wa humman jaabo maʼaahum kulla l‑khaniime hana l‑khumaam al‑nahabooh wa l‑bahaayim wa l‑kasiibe hana l‑naas al‑karaboohum.
Wa jaabo al‑masaajiin wa l‑khumaam al‑nahabooh fi l‑harib wa l‑khaniime le Muusa wa le raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa le mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑fariig fi kadaadit Muwaab fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun mugaabil Ariiha.
Wa khalaas Muusa wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa kulla chuyuukh al‑mujtamaʼ marago le yilaaguuhum barra min al‑fariig.
Wa Muusa ziʼil fi khuyyaad al‑deech wakit gabbalo min al‑harib.Wa humman khuyyaad al‑aalaaf wa khuyyaad al‑miyaat min al‑askar.
Wa gaal : Maala intu khalleetu al‑awiin dool hayyiin ?
Dool bas ma al‑awiin al‑awwal Balʼaam gaal leehum khalli yilizzu Bani Israaʼiil yaʼaso Allah ?Wa hinna bas ma jaaban muchkilat Faʼuur lahaddi l‑waba nazal fi chaʼab Allah ?
Wa hassaʼ da,aktulu kulla l‑dukuur min al‑iyaal wa kulli mara al‑daakhle beet.
Wa laakin al‑banaat al‑udriiyaat al‑yoom waahid ma chaafan raajil,ma taktuluuhin,khalluuhin leeku.
 Wa kan leeku intu,agoodu barra min al‑fariig lahaddi sabʼa yoom.Wa ayyi naadum minku al‑katal naadum aw limis janaaza kula,waajib yitahhir nafsah fi l‑yoom al‑taalit wa l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ.Attahharo intu zaatku wa kulla masjuunaatku.
Tahhuru kulla cheyy al‑min gumaach wa kulla cheyy al‑min farwa wa kulla cheyy al‑min suuf al‑inze wa kulla cheyy al‑min hatab. 
Wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar gaal le l‑askar al‑jo min al‑harib : Daahu churuut al‑Tawraat al‑Allah amar beehum Muusa.
Al‑dahab wa l‑fudda wa l‑nahaas wa l‑hadiid wa l‑tuuta wa l‑hadiid al‑azrag
wa ayyi cheyy al‑yahmal al‑naar,dissuuh fi l‑naar le yabga taahir.Wa baʼad da,titahhuruuh be almi al‑tathiir kula.Wa ayyi cheyy al‑ma yahmal al‑naar,dissuuh fi almi al‑tathiir da.
Wa tikhassulu khulgaanku fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ wa khalaas tabgo taahiriin.Wa baʼad da,tadkhulu fi l‑fariig. 
Wa Allah gaal le Muusa :
 Inta wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa kubaaraat al‑aayilaat hana mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil ahsubu kulla l‑khaniime al‑nahabooha fi l‑harib wa l‑naas wa l‑bahaayim al‑karaboohum.
Wa gassim al‑khumaam al‑nahabooh da ambeen al‑askar al‑macho fi l‑harib wa kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa chiil zakaat Allah min gisim hana l‑askar al‑macho fi l‑harib.Waahid fi l‑khumsumiya min al‑naas wa waahid fi l‑khumsumiya min al‑bagar wa l‑hamiir wa l‑khanam.
Wa chiil al‑zaka di min gisim al‑askar wa antiiha le raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar hadiiye le Allah.
Wa min gisim chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil kamaan,chiil waahid fi l‑khamsiin min al‑naas wa l‑bagar wa l‑hamiir wa l‑khanam wa kulla l‑bahaayim.Wa antiih le l‑Laawiyiin al‑gaaʼidiin yahfado kheemat Allah. 
Wa Muusa wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar sawwo kulla cheyy misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa min al‑kasiibe wa l‑khaniime al‑nahabooha al‑askar faddal 675 000 khanam
wa 72 000 bagar
wa 61 000 hamiir.
Wa l‑banaat al‑udriiyaat al‑yoom waahid ma chaafan raajil kamaan adadhin 32 000.
Wa l‑gisim al‑antooh le l‑askar al‑macho fi l‑harib,hu 337 500 khanam
wa minhum 675 khanam zaka le Allah.
Wa l‑bagar adadhum 36 000 wa minhum 72 dool zaka le Allah.
Wa l‑hamiir kamaan adadhum 30 500 wa minhum 61 dool zaka le Allah.
Wa l‑banaat al‑udriiyaat adadhin 16 000 wa minhin 32 dool zaka le Allah.
Wa Muusa anta al‑zaka al‑yigaddumuuha hadiiye le Allah le raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa da misil Allah amarah beyah.
Wa kan le gisim mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil al‑Muusa chaalah min al‑askar al‑macho fi l‑harib da,
daahu gisim Bani Israaʼiil wa kulla ke indah 337 500 khanam
wa 36 000 bagar
wa 30 500 hamiir
wa 16 000 banaat udriiyaat.
Wa min gisim Bani Israaʼiil,Muusa chaal waahid fi l‑khamsiin min al‑naas wa l‑bahaayim wa antaah le l‑Laawiyiin al‑gaaʼidiin yahfado kheemat Allah.Wa da misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa khuyyaad al‑deech al‑macho fi l‑harib jo le Muusa wa humman khuyyaad al‑aalaaf wa khuyyaad al‑miyaat min al‑askar.
Wa gaalo leyah : Aniina abiidak hasabna askarna wa naadum waahid kula minnina ma fagadnaah.
Wa achaan da,ayyi waahid minnina yigaddim hadiiye le Allah min al‑achya hana l‑dahab al‑ligiinaahum misil al‑salaasil wa l‑suure wa l‑khatam wa l‑khuruus wa l‑hafaayid le yabgo leena kaffaara giddaam Allah. 
Wa Muusa wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar chaalo minhum al‑achya hana l‑dahab al‑madguug.
Wa kulla l‑dahab al‑jaabooh khuyyaad al‑aalaaf wa khuyyaad al‑miyaat hadiiye le Allah da,adadah 193 kiilo.
Wa l‑askar kamaan ayyi waahid karab al‑khumaam al‑nahabah le nafsah.
Wa Muusa wa raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar ligo al‑dahab min khuyyaad al‑aalaaf wa khuyyaad al‑miyaat wa waddooh fi kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa be da,Allah yifakkir fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad induhum bahaayim katiiriin marra waahid.Wa wakit chaafo ard Yaʼziir wa ard Gilʼaad,humman irfo kadar al‑ard di tiwaafig maʼa l‑bahaayim.
Wa khalaas jo le Muusa wa le raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa le chuyuukh al‑mujtamaʼ wa gaalo :
 Al‑hillaal hana Ataruut wa Diibuun wa Yaʼziir wa Nimra wa Hachbuun wa Aliʼaala wa Sabaam wa Nabu wa Baʼuun dool hillaal
hana l‑balad al‑Allah galaʼaaha wa antaaha le mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil.Wa l‑ard di muwaafge le l‑bahaayim.Wa daahu aniina abiidak kula indina bahaayim. 
Wa gaalo battaan : Kan tarda leena,antiina aniina abiidak al‑ard di misil warasa.Ma tajburna nagtaʼo bahar al‑Urdun. 
Wa Muusa gaal le gabiilat Gaad wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin : Maala tikhallu akhwaanku yamchu al‑harib wa intu tagoodu hini ?
Maala tifachchulu Bani Israaʼiil achaan ma yamchu fi l‑balad al‑Allah antaaha leehum ?
Wa da misil al‑cheyy al‑abbahaatku sawwooh wakit ana rassaltuhum min Khaadich Barniiʼa yuruukhu al‑balad.
Humman macho lahaddi waadi Achkuul wa baʼad irfo al‑balad,gammo yikallumu le yifachchulu Bani Israaʼiil achaan ma yadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑Allah antaaha leehum.
 Wa fi l‑wakit daak,Allah khidib khadab chadiid wa halaf wa gaal :
‹ Abadan al‑naas al‑umurhum min 20 sana wa foog al‑marago min balad Masir dool,ma yadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑ana waaʼadt beeha Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub achaan al‑naas dool abo ma yasmaʼo kalaami.
Illa Kaalib wileed Yafuuna al‑Khinaazi wa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun humman dool bas yadkhulu balad Kanʼaan achaan humman taabaʼo kalaami ana Allah. ›
 Wa khalaas,Allah khidib khadab chadiid le Bani Israaʼiil wa khallaahum aayriin fi l‑sahara le muddit 40 sana lahaddi kulla l‑zurriiye al‑sawwo al‑fasaala giddaam Allah maato.
Wa daahu intu kula tidooru tichiilu derib abbahaatku al‑muznibiin wa battaan tijiibu khadab Allah al‑muhrig fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Achaan kan abeetu ma titiiʼu Allah,hu battaan yikhalliiku fi l‑sahara le mudda tawiile wa be da,tisabbubu moot hana kulla l‑chaʼab da. 
Wa khalaas,humman garrabo le Muusa wa gaalo leyah : Aniina nisawwu zaraayib le khanamna wa bahaayimna wa nabnu mudun le iyaalna hini.
Wa baʼad da,nichiilu silaahna wa namchu giddaam Bani Israaʼiil wa niwadduuhum lahaddi fi l‑bakaan al‑Allah antaahum.Wa laakin iyaalna yagoodu hini fi l‑mudun al‑gawiyiin min sukkaan al‑balad di.
Wa aniina ma nigabbulu fi buyuutna lahaddi ayyi naadum min Bani Israaʼiil yalga warasatah.
Wa aniina ma nalgo maʼaahum warasa khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun achaan warasatna aniina gaaʼide be jaayi le bahar al‑Urdun fi nussah al‑sabhaani. 
Wa Muusa gaal : Tabbugu kalaamku wa assallaho wa haarubu fi chaan Allah.
Wa khalli kulla rujaalku yissallaho wa yagtaʼo bahar al‑Urdun fi chaan Allah wa yichiilu ard udwaanah.
Wa khalli rujaalku ma yigabbulu lahaddi al‑ard tabga tihit masʼuuliiyit Allah.Wa misil da,wa la Allah wa la Bani Israaʼiil kula yajʼalooku bariyiin wa khalaas al‑ard al‑intu gaaʼidiin foogha,Allah yarda hi tabga misil warasatku.
Wa laakin kan waʼadku da ma tabbagtuuh,intu sawweetu zanib didd Allah wa be da,taʼarfu kadar zanibku da yalhagku.
Wa hassaʼ da,abnu mudun le iyaalku wa zaraayib le khanamku wa laakin al‑waʼad al‑gultuuh timmuuh. 
Wa gabiilat Gaad wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin gaalo le Muusa : Abiidak yitabbugu amrak,ya siidna.
Hassaʼ da,iyaalna wa awiinna wa bahaayimna wa kulla maalna yagoodu hini fi mudun Gilʼaad.
Wa aniina abiidak kamaan nissallaho wa namchu al‑harib tihit amur Allah misil inta gultah ya siidna. 
Wa fi sababhum,Muusa anta amur le raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa le Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun wa le kubaaraat al‑aayilaat hana gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa gaal : Kan gabiilat Gaad wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin yissallaho wa yagtaʼo bahar al‑Urdun maʼaaku wa yihaarubu fi chaan Allah lahaddi al‑balad tabga tihit masʼuuliiyitku,intu kula tantuuhum balad Gilʼaad misil warasa.
Wa laakin kan abo ma yissallaho wa yagtaʼo maʼaaku,humman yalgo warasathum maʼaaku fi balad Kanʼaan. 
Wa gabiilat Gaad wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin raddo leyah wa gaalo : Aniina nitabbugu kalaam Allah al‑gaalah leena aniina abiidak.
Wa nichiilu al‑silaah wa namchu le balad Kanʼaan misil Allah amaraana wa laakin warasatna min al‑ard tukuun be hini jaay le bahar al‑Urdun. 
Wa le gabiilat Gaad wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa nuss min gabiilat Manassa wileed Yuusuf,Muusa antaahum mamlakat Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin wa mamlakat Oog malik Baachaan yaʼni kulla l‑balad wa mudunha wa l‑hillaal al‑muhawwigiinhum.
Wa gabiilat Gaad bano hillaal Diibuun wa Ataruut wa Aruuʼir
wa Ataruut Chuufan wa Yaʼziir wa Yugbaha
wa Beet Nimra wa Beet Haaraan.Wa humman bano al‑mudun al‑gawiyiin dool wa sawwo zaraayib le khanamhum.
Wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin bano Hachbuun wa Aliʼaala wa Khiryataayim
wa Nabu wa Baʼal Maaʼoon wa Sibma.Wa humman khayyaro asaame hana hillaal waahidiin wa anto asaame jadiidiin le l‑hillaal al‑humman banoohum.
Wa khachum beet Makiir wileed Manassa macho balad Gilʼaad wa tarado al‑Amuuriyiin minha wa chaalooha.
Wa khalaas,Muusa anta balad Gilʼaad le khachum beet Makiir wileed Manassa le yaskunu foogha.
Wa zurriiyit Yayiir wileed Manassa macho chaalo furgaan al‑Amuuriyiin wa sammaahum furgaan Yayiir.
Wa Nuubah macha chaal Khanaat wa l‑hillaal al‑taabʼiin leeha wa sammaaha be usmah Nuubah.
Wa dool maraahil al‑masaar hana Bani Israaʼiil wakit marago min balad Masir hasab majmuuʼaathum al‑askariiye tihit khiyaadit Muusa wa Haaruun.
Wa Muusa yaktib al‑bakaanaat al‑yisiiru minhum wa l‑yanzulu fooghum hasab amur Allah wa daahu maraahilhum hasab masaarhum.
Wa humman gammo min Raʼamsiis yoom 15 hana l‑chahar al‑awwal wa da fi l‑yoom al‑taani hana iid al‑Fisha al‑awwal.Wa fi l‑yoom da,Bani Israaʼiil gammo macho be kulla hurriiye giddaam kulla l‑Masriyiin.
Wa l‑Masriyiin gaaʼidiin yadfunu janaazaat iyaalhum awlaad al‑bikir al‑Allah katalaahum.Wa katalaahum achaan yiʼaakhib ilaahaathum kula.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil saaro min Raʼamsiis wa nazalo fi Sukkuut.
Wa saaro min Sukkuut wa nazalo fi Itaam fi taraf al‑sahara.
Wa saaro min Itaam wa gabbalo jo fi Khachum al‑Hiruut mugaabil Baʼal Safuun wa nazalo giddaam Migduul.
Wa saaro min Khachum al‑Hiruut wa gataʼo al‑bahar wa wassalo fi l‑sahara.Wa baʼad talaata yoom hana ruwaakha fi lubb saharat Itaam,humman nazalo fi Murra.
Wa gammo min Murra wa wassalo fi Iliim.Wa da l‑bakaan al‑indah 12 een hana almi wa 70 chadara hana tamur wa fi l‑bakaan da bas,humman nazalo.
Wa saaro min Iliim wa nazalo jamb al‑bahar al‑Ahmar.
Wa saaro min al‑bahar al‑Ahmar wa nazalo fi saharat Siin.
Wa saaro min saharat Siin wa nazalo fi Dufga.
Wa saaro min Dufga wa nazalo fi Aluuch.
Wa saaro min Aluuch wa nazalo fi Rafidiim wa fi l‑bakaan da,al‑chaʼab ma ligo almi hana charaab.
Wa saaro min Rafidiim wa nazalo fi saharat Siinaaʼ.
Wa saaro min saharat Siinaaʼ wa nazalo fi Khibruut Hattaawa.
Wa saaro min Khibruut Hattaawa wa nazalo fi Hasiruut.
Wa saaro min Hasiruut wa nazalo fi Ritma.
Wa saaro min Ritma wa nazalo fi Rimmuun Faaris.
Wa saaro min Rimmuun Faaris wa nazalo fi Libna.
Wa saaro min Libna wa nazalo fi Rissa.
Wa saaro min Rissa wa nazalo fi Khahilaata.
Wa saaro min Khahilaata wa nazalo fi jabal Chafar.
Wa saaro min jabal Chafar wa nazalo fi Haraada.
Wa saaro min Haraada wa nazalo fi Maghiluut.
Wa saaro min Maghiluut wa nazalo fi Tahat.
Wa saaro min Tahat wa nazalo fi Taarah.
Wa saaro min Taarah wa nazalo fi Mitkha.
Wa saaro min Mitkha wa nazalo fi Hachmuuna.
Wa saaro min Hachmuuna wa nazalo fi Muusiruut.
Wa saaro min Muusiruut wa nazalo fi Bani Yaʼkhaan.
Wa saaro min Bani Yaʼkhaan wa nazalo fi Huur al‑Gidgaad.
Wa saaro min Huur al‑Gidgaad wa nazalo fi Yutbaata.
Wa saaro min Yutbaata wa nazalo fi Abruuna.
Wa saaro min Abruuna wa nazalo fi Asyuun Giibar.
Wa saaro min Asyuun Giibar wa nazalo fi saharat Siin wa da fi turaab Khaadich.
Wa saaro min Khaadich wa nazalo fi jabal Hoor fi huduud balad Adoom.
Wa be amur Allah,Haaruun raajil al‑diin talaʼ fi jabal Hoor wa maat fi l‑yoom al‑awwal hana l‑chahar al‑khaamis.Wa da,be 40 sana baʼad marigiin Bani Israaʼiil min balad Masir.
Wa Haaruun indah 123 sana wakit maat fi jabal Hoor.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,malik Araad al‑Kanʼaani gaaʼid yaskun fi saharat Nagab fi balad Kanʼaan simiʼ kadar Bani Israaʼiil jaayiin ale baladah.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil saaro min jabal Hoor wa nazalo fi Salmuuna.
Wa saaro min Salmuuna wa nazalo fi Funuun.
Wa saaro min Funuun wa nazalo fi Ubuut.
Wa saaro min Ubuut wa nazalo fi Iyy Abaariim fi huduud Muwaab.
Wa saaro min Iyy Abaariim wa nazalo fi Diibuun Gaad.
Wa saaro min Diibuun Gaad wa nazalo fi Almuun Diblataayim.
Wa saaro min Almuun Diblataayim wa nazalo fi jibaal Abaariim mugaabiliin Nabu.
Wa saaro min jibaal Abaariim wa nazalo fi kadaadit Muwaab fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun mugaabiliin hillit Ariiha.
Wa humman nazalo fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun fi kadaadit Muwaab min Beet Yachiimut lahaddi Abil Chittiim.
Wa fi kadaadit Muwaab fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun mugaabil hillit Ariiha,Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Hajji le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum :‹ Wakit tagtaʼo bahar al‑Urdun le tadkhulu fi balad Kanʼaan,
chiilu ard kulla sukkaan al‑balad wa dammuru kulla tamaasiilhum al‑sawwoohum min hajar wa kassuru asnaamhum al‑daggoohum min hadiid wa haddumu bakaanaathum al‑aaliyiin hana l‑ibaada.
Chiilu al‑balad di wa askunu foogha achaan ana anteetku al‑balad di le tabga hintuku.
Wa gassumu al‑balad di ambeenaat khuchuum buyuutku be amʼiyeedaat.Ayyi khachum beet kabiir yalga ard kabiire wa ayyi khachum beet sakhayyar yalga ard sakhayre wa ayyi waahid yalga warasatah fi l‑bakaan al‑yagaʼ leyah be amʼiyeedaat.Wa l‑gisim da yabga ambeenaat gabaayilku.
Wa laakin kan ma chiltu al‑ard min kulla sukkaan al‑balad di,al‑yifaddulu minhum yabgo leeku misil wagaʼaay fi l‑een aw misil chookaay fi l‑dahar.Wa yahjumuuku fi l‑bakaan al‑taskunu foogah.
Wa ana nisawwi foogku intu al‑cheyy al‑gult nisawwiih fooghum humman.› 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Anti amur le Bani Israaʼiil wa guul leehum :‹ Wakit tadkhulu fi balad Kanʼaan,di hi al‑balad al‑tabga leeku warasa wa daahu huduudha.
 ‹ Min al‑junuub,huduudku yabdo min saharat Siin gariib le balad Adoom.Wa l‑huduud dool yabdo min sabaah le l‑nuss al‑junuubi hana l‑bahar al‑Mayyit.
Wa battaan huduudku yihawwugu be junuub le giizaan al‑Agaarib wa yiʼaddu be saharat Siin lahaddi junuub Khaadich Barniiʼa.Wa min Khaadich Barniiʼa,huduudku yamurgu ale Hasar Addaar lahaddi Asmuun.
Wa min Asmuun,huduudku yihawwugu be waadi Masir lahaddi l‑bahar al‑Abyad al‑Mutawassit.
 ‹ Wa min al‑kharib,al‑bahar al‑Abyad yabga leeku huduud wa dool bas huduudku min al‑kharib.
 ‹ Wa min al‑munchaakh,daahu huduudku.Sawwu huduudku min al‑bahar al‑Abyad lahaddi jabal Hoor.
Wa battaan huduudku sawwuuhum min jabal Hoor lahaddi Labu Hamaat.Wa min al‑bakaan da,al‑huduud yamchu lahaddi Sadaad
wa Zifruun wa yagiifu fi Hasar Eenaan.Wa dool yabgo huduudku min al‑munchaakh.
 ‹ Wa min al‑sabaah,sawwu huduudku min Hasar Eenaan lahaddi Chafaam.
Wa min Chafaam,al‑huduud yamchu lahaddi Ribla sabaah le l‑Een wa minha,al‑huduud yamchu ale l‑giizaan al‑gaaʼidiin sabaah le bahar al‑Jaliil.
Wa fi l‑akhiir,al‑huduud yadkhulu bahar al‑Urdun wa minnah lahaddi l‑bahar al‑Mayyit.Wa di baladku be kulla huduudha.› 
Wa Muusa amar Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal : Di l‑balad al‑tigassumuuha be amʼiyeedaat wa Allah amar yigassumuuha ambeenaat al‑tisʼa gabaayil wa nuss gabiila.
Achaan al‑gabaayil al‑aakhariin,yaʼni aayilat Raʼuubiin wa aayilat Gaad wa aayilat nuss gabiilat Manassa,ligo warasathum khalaas.
Al‑gabaayil al‑itneen wa nuss al‑gabiila dool ligo warasathum khaadi sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun mugaabil Ariiha. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Daahu asaame al‑rujaal al‑yigassumu leeku warasatku hana l‑balad.Wa humman raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun.
Wa tichiilu maʼaahum cheekh waahid min ayyi gabiila le yigassumu al‑balad.
Wa daahu asaame al‑naas dool.Min gabiilat Yahuuza,Kaalib wileed Yafuuna.
Wa min gabiilat Chimʼuun,Chamuwiil wileed Amihuud.
Wa min gabiilat Banyaamiin,Alidaad wileed Kisluun.
Wa min gabiilat Daan,al‑cheekh Bukhi wileed Yugli.
Wa min zurriiyit Yuusuf kamaan,min gabiilat Manassa,al‑cheekh Hanniyiil wileed Ifuud
wa min gabiilat Afraayim,al‑cheekh Khamuwiil wileed Chiftaan.
Wa min gabiilat Zabuluun,al‑cheekh Alisaafan wileed Farnaak.
Wa min gabiilat Yassaakar,al‑cheekh Faltiyiil wileed Azzaan.
Wa min gabiilat Achiir,al‑cheekh Akhihuud wileed Chaluumi.
Wa min gabiilat Naftaali,al‑cheekh Fadahiil wileed Amihuud. 
Dool bas al‑naas al‑amaraahum Allah yigassumu balad Kanʼaan warasa le Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa fi kadaadit Muwaab fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun mugaabil Ariiha,Allah kallam le Muusa wa gaal :
 Aamur Bani Israaʼiil yantu min warasathum hillaal le l‑Laawiyiin yaskunu fooghum wa yantuuhum ard hana sarha le bahaayimhum hawaale al‑hillaal dool.
Wa l‑hillaal dool yabgo hineehum halaalhum le yaskunu fooghum wa ard al‑sarha al‑hawaaleehum le bahaayimhum wa khumaamhum wa kulla haywaanaathum.
Wa ard al‑sarha al‑tantuuha le l‑Laawiyiin tabga nuss kiilomitir barra min al‑durdur hana l‑hille fi kulli jiihe.
Wa l‑ard di tukuun murabbaʼa.Tuulha ale jiihat al‑sabaah kiilomitir waahid wa ale jiihat al‑wati kiilomitir waahid wa ale jiihat al‑kharib kiilomitir waahid wa ale jiihat al‑munchaakh kiilomitir waahid wa l‑hille kamaan,tabga usut.Wa di tabga ard hana sarha hawaale ayyi hille al‑tantuuha leehum.
 Wa tantu le l‑Laawiyiin sitte mudun hana luju achaan kan naadum katal naadum bala raayah yagdar yajri yagood fooghum.Wa tiziidu fi l‑mudun al‑sitte dool 42 hillaal aakhariin.
Wa l‑hillaal al‑tantuuhum le l‑Laawiyiin adadhum yabga 48 hille wa ayyi waahide indaha ard hana sarha hawaaleeha.
Wa l‑hillaal al‑tichiiluuhum min Bani Israaʼiil,chiiluuhum hasab al‑warasa hana ayyi gabiila.Min al‑gabiila al‑ligat katiir,tichiilu katiir.Wa min al‑gabiila al‑ligat chiyya,tichiilu chiyya.Ayyi gabiila hasab warasatha tanti hillaal le l‑Laawiyiin. 
Wa Allah hajja le Muusa wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Kan gataʼtu bahar al‑Urdun le tadkhulu fi balad Kanʼaan,
aʼazulu leeku mudun hana luju achaan kan naadum katal naadum bala raayah yagdar yajri yagood fooghum.
Wa l‑mudun dool yabgo leeku mudun hana luju wa yinajju al‑kaatil min siid al‑taar.Achaan al‑kaatil ma waajib yaktuluuh gubbaal ma yagiif giddaam mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil le yihaakumuuh.
Wa l‑mudun al‑sitte dool yabgo leeku mudun hana luju.
Wa mudun al‑luju dool,talaata minhum yukuunu sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun wa talaata fi balad Kanʼaan.
Wa l‑mudun al‑sitte dool yabgo bakaan hana luju le Bani Israaʼiil wa le l‑ajnabi al‑gaaʼid maʼaahum wa le l‑deef al‑khaatir.Ayyi waahid kan katal naadum bala raayah yagdar yajri yagood fi madiina waahide minhum.
 ‹ Wa laakin kan naadum darab naadum be silaah hana hadiid wa katalah,al‑naadum da bigi kaatil dimme wa fi chaan da,waajib yaktuluuh.
Wa kan naadum darab naadum be hajar al‑yagdar yaktul wa katalah,al‑naadum da bigi kaatil dimme wa fi chaan da,waajib yaktuluuh.
Aw kan naadum darab naadum be uud al‑yagdar yaktul wa katalah,al‑naadum da bigi kaatil dimme wa fi chaan da,waajib yaktuluuh.
Wa siid al‑taar hu yaktul kaatil al‑dimme wa yichiil foogah al‑taar kan laagaah.
Wa kan naadum lazza naadum achaan hu indah maʼaayah muchkila aw zaragah be niiytah bas wa katalah
aw darabah be iidah fi duwaas wa katalah,al‑naadum al‑darab da yaktuluuh achaan hu bigi kaatil dimme.Wa siid al‑taar hu yaktul kaatil al‑dimme wa yichiil foogah al‑taar kan laagaah.
 ‹ Wa laakin akuun naadum katal naadum bala raayah.Lazzaah wa ma indah maʼaayah ayyi muchkila aw zaragah be ayyi cheyy bala niiytah
aw ma chaafah wa darabah be hajar al‑yagdar yaktul wa katalah.Wa wakit zarag al‑hajar da,hu ma indah maʼaayah adaawa wa la yidoor yisawwi leyah cheyy fasil.
Khalaas,mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yahkumu been kaatil al‑dimme wa siid al‑taar hasab al‑churuut dool.
Wa be da,mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil yinajju kaatil al‑dimme min siid al‑taar wa yigabbuluuh fi madiinat al‑luju al‑hu jara gaʼad foogha.Wa hu yagood hinaak lahaddi moot kabiir rujaal al‑diin al‑masahooh be l‑dihin al‑mukhaddas wa darrajooh.
Wa laakin kan al‑kaatil marag barra min huduud madiinat al‑luju al‑hu jara wa gaʼad foogha
wa siid al‑taar ligiih barra min madiinat al‑luju wa katalah,siid al‑taar da,ma yajʼalooh kaatil dimme.
Waajib le l‑kaatil yagood fi madiinat al‑luju lahaddi moot kabiir rujaal al‑diin.Wa baʼad moot kabiir rujaal al‑diin da,al‑kaatil yagdar yigabbil fi ard warasatah.
 ‹ Wa da yabga leeku gaanuun hana chariiʼa le kulla zurriiyaatku fi ayyi bakaan al‑taskunu foogah.
 ‹ Fi kulla wakit,kaatil al‑dimme be raayah ma yaktuluuh illa be chahaada hana naas waahidiin achaan be chahaada hana naadum waahid ma yagdaro yahkumu le naadum be l‑moot.
Ma tardo le yafdo ruuh kaatil al‑dimme be gurus al‑waajib leyah al‑moot.Hu waajib yumuut.
Wa ma tardo le yikaffu gurus achaan yikhallu kaatil al‑dimme yamrug yufuut min madiinat al‑luju wa yigabbil fi ardah gubbaal moot raajil al‑diin.
Ma tinajjusu arduku al‑saakniin foogha achaan damm al‑maktuul yinajjis al‑ard wa ma tittahhar illa be damm hana kaatil al‑dimme.
Ma tinajjusu al‑ard al‑intu saakniin foogha wa ana zaati gaaʼid fi usutha.Achaan ana Allah saakin fi usut Bani Israaʼiil.› 
Wa kubaaraat al‑aayilaat hana khachum beet Gilʼaad wileed Makiir wileed Manassa min khuchuum buyuut zurriiyit Yuusuf jo giddaam Muusa wa kubaaraat al‑aayilaat hana Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa gaalo : Allah amarak inta sayyidna Muusa tigassim al‑balad le Bani Israaʼiil be amʼiyeedaat.Wa hu amarak inta tanti warasat akhuuna Saluufhad le banaatah.
Wa laakin kan al‑banaat deel yaakhudan rujaal min gabiila aakhara min gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil,warasatna tangus wa warasat al‑gabiila al‑aakhara tiziid.Wa be da,warasatna al‑nalgooha be amʼiyeedaat tangus.
Wa fi sanit al‑Hurriiye hana Bani Israaʼiil,warasathin tiziid fi warasat al‑gabiila al‑hinna mutazawwijaat foogha.Wa be da,warasat gabiilitna tangus. 
Wa be amur min Allah,Muusa gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Naas zurriiyit Yuusuf induhum hagg.
Wa daahu kalaam Allah fi sabab banaat Saluufhad.Hu gaal :‹ Hinna yaakhudan ayyi raajil al‑yidoorannah wa laakin ma yukuun barra min khuchuum buyuut gabiilat abuuhin.
Wa be misil da,ayyi gabiila min Bani Israaʼiil ma tichiil warasa hana gabiila aakhara.Wa ayyi naadum yakrub gawi warasat gabiilat abbahaatah.
Ayyi bineeye al‑talga warasa fi waahide min gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil,ma taakhud illa fi daakhal khuchuum buyuut gabiilat abuuha.Wa be da,Bani Israaʼiil yagdaro yahfado warasat abbahaathum.Ayyi waahid yahfad haggah.
Wa be da,al‑warasa hana gabiila waahide ma yantuuha le gabiila aakhara wa laakin gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil,ayyi waahide titmassak be warasatha.› 
Wa banaat Saluufhad sawwan misil Allah amar beyah Muusa.
Wa banaat Saluufhad hinna Mahla wa Tirsa wa Hugla wa Milka wa Nuuʼa,akhadan iyaal amaameehin.
Hinna akhadan rujaal min aayilaat Manassa min zurriiyit Yuusuf.Wa warasathin gaʼadat fi khachum beet gabiilat abuuhin.
Wa dool al‑wasaaya wa l‑churuut al‑Allah amar beehum Bani Israaʼiil be waasitat Muusa fi kadaadit Muwaab fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun mugaabil Ariiha.
Wa daahu al‑kalaam al‑Muusa gaalah le kulla Bani Israaʼiil sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun fi l‑sahale mugaabil Suuf.Wa da ambeen Faaraan wa Tuufal wa Laabaan wa Hasiruut wa Dizahaab.
Wa min Huuriib le Khaadich Barniiʼa,indah 11 yoom be l‑rijil.Wa da be l‑derib al‑yiʼaddi be balad jibaal Saʼiir.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑awwal fi chahri 11 hana sanit 40 baʼad marago min balad Masir,Muusa kallam le Bani Israaʼiil hasab kulla l‑kalaam al‑amarah beyah Allah.
Wa da baʼad annasar fi Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin al‑gaaʼid fi Hachbuun wa annasar fi Oog fi hillit Idraʼi.Wa Oog da malik Baachaan al‑saakin fi Achtaruut.
Wa Muusa gamma yiwaddih wasaaya Allah fi balad Muwaab sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun wa gaal :
Wakit aniina gaaʼidiin fi jabal Huuriib,Allah Ilaahna kallam leena wa gaal : Kafaaku ma tagoodu fi l‑jabal da.
Gummu siiru battaan wa amchu le jibaal al‑Amuuriyiin wa le kulla l‑naas al‑hawaaleehum fi l‑Araba wa balad al‑jibaal wa l‑sahale wa saharat Nagab wa khachum al‑bahar al‑Abyad wa balad al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa Lubnaan wa lahaddi l‑Furaat al‑bahar al‑kabiir.
Daahu ana anteetku kulla l‑balad di.Amchu wa chiiluuha !Di l‑balad al‑ana Allah halaft nantiiha le juduudku Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub wa le zurriiyithum al‑baʼadhum. 
Fi l‑wakit daak,ana Muusa gult : Ana wiheedi ma nagdar nichiil masʼuuliiyitku.
Wa Allah Ilaahku kattaraaku wa l‑yoom bigiitu katiiriin misil nujuum al‑sama.
Wa khalli Allah Rabb juduudku yiziid adadku alif marra wa yibaarikku misil hu gaalah.
Wa kikkeef ana wiheedi nagdar nichiil al‑masʼuuliiye hana machaakilku wa tagalatku ?
Hassaʼ da,aʼazulu rujaal al‑induhum hikma wa faahimiin wa maʼruufiin fi gabaayilku le nukhuttuhum masʼuuliin foogku. 
Wa intu gultu leyi : Kalaamak al‑gultah da adiil.Nisawwuuh. 
Wa ana chilt naas wa khatteethum kubaaraat fi gabaayilku wa l‑naas dool humman rujaal al‑induhum hikma wa maʼruufiin.Wa ana khatteethum kubaaraat fi acharaat wa khamsiinaat wa miyaat wa aalaaf wa khatteethum misil muraakhibiin fi gabaayilku.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,ana anteet al‑amur da le gudiyaaku wa gult : Asmaʼo kalaam akhwaanku wa ahkumu le ayyi waahid be adaala kan maʼa akhuuh walla maʼa ajnabi kula.
Ma timayyulu fi l‑chariiʼa,asmaʼo al‑sakhayyar wa l‑kabiir.Ma takhaafo min naadum achaan al‑chariiʼa hint al‑Rabb.Wa kan al‑chariiʼa bigat leeku gawiiye kula,jiibuuha leyi ana nichiifha. 
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,ana anteetku amur fi kulla cheyy al‑waajib tisawwuuh.
Wa gammeena sirna min Huuriib wa chaggeena kulla l‑sahara al‑wasiiʼe wa l‑mukhiife al‑intu chiftuuha.Wa chilna derib jibaal al‑Amuuriyiin misil Allah Ilaahna amaraana beyah.Wa wassalna fi Khaadich Barniiʼa.
Wa ana gult leeku : Daahu jiitu fi jibaal al‑Amuuriyiin al‑yantiihum leena Allah Ilaahna al‑yoom.
Chiifu !Allah Ilaahku antaaku al‑balad.Gummu amchu chiiluuha misil Allah Rabb juduudku gaalah leeku.Ma takhaafo wa la tinbahtu. 
Wa intu kulluku garrabtu leyi wa gultu : Nirassulu naas giddaamna yuruukhu al‑balad wa yijiibu leena khabar al‑derib al‑nichiiluuh wa l‑mudun al‑namchu leehum. 
Wa ana chift al‑fikra di adiile wa chilt minku 12 raajil,min ayyi gabiila raajil waahid.
Wa l‑rujaal dool macho ale balad al‑jibaal wa wassalo lahaddi waadi Achkuul wa raakhooh.
Wa jaabo maʼaahum min fawaakih al‑balad di wa wassafoohum leena.Wa kallamo leena wa gaalo : Al‑balad al‑yantiiha leena Allah Ilaahna di,hi adiile. 
Wa laakin intu abeetu ma tamchu leeha wa isiitu amur Allah Ilaahku.
Wa gaawaltu fi lubb khiyamku wa gultu : Be sabab karaahiiytah leena,Allah maragaana min balad Masir le yisallimna le l‑Amuuriyiin wa yidammirna.
Ween namchu ?Akhwaanna waddaro chajaaʼitna wakit gaalo :‹ Sukkaan al‑balad di tuwaal wa chudaad minnina.Wa mudunhum mudun kubaar wa gawiyiin wa muhawwagiin be daraadir tuwaal lahaddi l‑sama.Wa battaan,hinaak chifna naas min Bani Anakh al‑tuwaal wa chudaad.› 
Wa ana gult leeku : Ma tinbahtu wa la takhaafo minhum.
Allah Ilaahku yamchi giddaamku wa hu zaatah yihaarib leeku misil hu sawwaah awwal fi Masir wa intu chiftuuh be uyuunku.
Wa battaan fi l‑sahara hinaak,chiftu Allah Ilaahku chaalku misil raajil yichiil wileedah,fi kulla tuul al‑derib al‑intu rukhtu foogah lahaddi jiitu fi l‑bakaan da. 
Wa be da kula,ma induku amaan le Allah Ilaahku.
Wa hu maachi giddaamku fi l‑derib le yifattich leeku bakaan al‑tanzulu foogah.Wa maachi giddaamku be l‑leel fi amuud hana naar le yidawwi leeku fi l‑derib al‑intu maachiin foogah wa be nahaar fi amuud hana sahaab.
Wa Allah simiʼ be l‑kalaam al‑intu gultuuh.Wa fi khadabah,hu halaf wa gaal :
 Waahid min al‑zurriiye al‑fasle di ma yichiif al‑balad al‑adiile al‑ana waaʼadt wa gult nantiiha le juduudhum.
Illa Kaalib wileed Yafuuna bas yichiifha.Hu raakh al‑balad di zamaan wa ana nantiiha leyah hu wa le zurriiytah achaan hu taabaʼ derib Allah tamaam. 
Wa hatta foogi ana Muusa kula,Allah khidib wa da fi chaanku intu.Wa gaal : Inta kula,ya Muusa,abadan ma tadkhul fi l‑balad di.
Wa laakin khaddaamak Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun yadkhul foogha.Wa inta chajjiʼah achaan hu bas al‑yanti al‑balad di le Bani Israaʼiil misil warasa.
Wa iyaalku al‑gultu yabgo kasiibe wa iyaalku al‑ma yafsulu been al‑kheer wa l‑charr,humman dool bas yadkhuluuha.Wa leehum humman,ana anteet al‑balad wa humman yichiiluuha.
Wa laakin intu kamaan,gabbulu wa amchu le l‑sahara ale l‑bahar al‑Ahmar. 
Wa intu gultu leyi : Sahiih !Aniina aznabna didd Allah.Wa hassaʼ namchu nihaarubu hasab kulla cheyy al‑amar beyah Allah Ilaahna. Wa ayyi waahid minku chaal silaahah hana l‑harib wa hasabtu be suhuula bas tichiilu balad al‑jibaal.
Wa laakin Allah gaal leyi : Guul leehum :‹ Ma tamchu wa la tihaarubu achaan ana ma gaaʼid fi usutku !Wa be da,udwaanku yinnasru foogku.› 
Wa ana kallamt leeku wa laakin intu ma simiʼtuuni wa isiitu amur Allah wa gammeetu be istikbaar macheetu ale balad al‑jibaal.
Wa khalaas,al‑Amuuriyiin al‑saakniin fi l‑balad di marago foogku misil nahale wa taradooku wa katalooku fi balad Saʼiir lahaddi hillit Hurma.
Wa battaan gabbaltu jiitu bakeetu le Allah wa laakin hu ma simiʼ hissuku wa la dawwar yasmaʼku.
Wa fi chaan da bas,gaʼadtu fi Khaadich wa tawwaltu fiiha ziyaada.
Wa Muusa gaal :Khalaas wajjahna ale l‑sahara wa macheena ale l‑bahar al‑Ahmar,misil Allah gaalah leyi.Wa mudda tawiile gaaʼidiin nuluudu balad jibaal Saʼiir.
Wa Allah gaal leyi :
 Min mudda tawiile,intu gaaʼidiin tuluudu balad al‑jibaal di.Wa hassaʼ da,kafaaku.Wajjuhu ale l‑munchaakh.
Ya Muusa,daahu al‑amur al‑tantiih le l‑chaʼab.Guul leehum :‹ Fuutu gariib le huduud akhwaanku zurriiyit Isuu al‑saakniin fi balad Saʼiir.Wa humman yakhaafo minku wa laakin intu ahfado nufuusku.
Ma tujukhkhuuhum.Ana ma nantiiku wa la chibir min arduhum achaan balad jibaal Saʼiir di,ana anteetha warasa le zurriiyit Isuu.
Hatta al‑akil al‑taakuluuh wa l‑charaab al‑tacharbooh kula,waajib tachruuh minhum be gurusku.
Achaan ana Allah Ilaahku baaraktuku fi kulla cheyy al‑sawweetuuh.Wa ana naʼarif be masaarku fi l‑sahara al‑kabiire di.Wa daahu 40 sana,ana gaaʼid maʼaaku wa cheyy gassar leeku kula ma fiih.› 
Wa aniina futna baʼiid min akhwaanna zurriiyit Isuu al‑saakniin fi balad Saʼiir.Wa khalleena derib al‑Araba wa Ilaat wa Asyuun Giibar wa chilna derib hana saharat Muwaab.
Wa Allah gaal leyi : Ma tahjumu al‑Muwaabiyiin wa la tugummu didduhum le tihaaribhum.Ana ma nantiiku ard warasa min baladhum achaan balad Aar di,ana anteetha le l‑Muwaabiyiin zurriiyit Luut. 
Wa zamaan al‑Imiyiin saakniin fi l‑ard di wa humman chaʼab chudaad wa katiiriin wa tuwaal misil Bani Anakh.
Wa humman kula jaʼaloohum misil Rafaayiin wa misil Bani Anakh wa laakin al‑Muwaabiyiin binaaduuhum Imiyiin.
Wa zamaan,al‑Huuriyiin saakniin fi balad Saʼiir wa zurriiyit Isuu jo dammaroohum wa chaalo arduhum wa sakano fi badalhum.Wa da misil Bani Israaʼiil sawwooh fi l‑ard al‑Allah antaaha leehum warasa wa chaalooha.
Wa Allah gaal leena : Hassaʼ gummu agtaʼo waadi al‑Zarad. Wa khalaas gammeena gataʼna waadi al‑Zarad.
Wa min gammeena min Khaadich Barniiʼa lahaddi gataʼna waadi al‑Zarad,khatteena 38 sana.Wa da lahaddi kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum taamm le l‑askariiye min bidaayit al‑masaar bigo ma fiihum fi l‑fariig.Wa bigi misil Allah halaf beyah wa gaalah leehum.
Wa Allah darabaahum lahaddi kulluhum angachcho min al‑fariig.
Wa wakit kulla l‑rujaal al‑umurhum taamm le l‑askariiye maato wa bigo ma fiihum fi ust al‑chaʼab,
khalaas Allah hajja leyi wa gaal :
 Al‑yoom intu tagtaʼo huduud Muwaab wa tuchuggu balad Aar.
Wa talgo giddaamku Bani Ammuun.Ma tahjumuuhum wa la tugummu didduhum.Ana ma nantiiku ayyi ard fi baladhum achaan al‑balad di,ana anteetha warasa le Bani Ammuun zurriiyit Luut. 
Wa l‑ard di kula,jaʼalooha ard al‑Rafaayiin achaan awwal al‑Rafaayiin sakano foogha wa Bani Ammuun binaaduuhum al‑Zamzuumiyiin.
Wa l‑Rafaayiin dool,humman chaʼab kubaar wa katiiriin wa tuwaal misil Bani Anakh.Wa Allah dammaraahum le l‑Rafaayiin wa Bani Ammuun chaalo arduhum wa sakano fi badalhum.
Wa da misil Allah sawwaah le zurriiyit Isuu al‑saakniin fi balad Saʼiir.Allah dammaraahum le l‑Huuriyiin wa zurriiyit Isuu chaalo arduhum wa sakano foogha lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa l‑Kaftuuriyiin jo min Kaftuur wa dammaroohum le l‑Awwiyiin al‑saakniin fi l‑hillaal hana mantagat Khazza wa sakano fi badalhum.
Wa baʼad da,Allah gaal leena : Yalla gummu !Amchu agtaʼo waadi Arnuun.Wa daahu ana sallamt leeku Siihuun malik Hachbuun al‑Amuuri wa baladah.Min hassaʼ,gummu diddah haarubuuh wa chiilu baladah.
Wa min al‑yoom,ana nabda ninazzil al‑ruʼub wa l‑khoof fi kulla chuʼuub al‑ard wa humman yakhaafo minku.Wa wakit yasmaʼo beeku,yibarjulu wa yinbahtu. 
Min saharat Khadimuut,ana Muusa rassalt naas le Siihuun malik Hachbuun be kalaam hana salaam wa gult :
 Khalliina nuchuggu ardak wa nichiilu al‑derib wa ma nikissu minnah wa la isra wa la zeene.
Wa l‑akil al‑naakuluuh wa l‑almi al‑nacharbooh kula,antiih leena be gurus wa laakin nidooru nuchuggu ardak bas.
Wa zurriiyit Isuu al‑saakniin fi Saʼiir wa l‑Muwaabiyiin al‑saakniin fi Aar khalloona chaggeena arduhum.Inta kula khalliina nuchuggu ardak lahaddi nagtaʼo bahar al‑Urdun wa nadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑yantiiha leena Allah Ilaahna. 
Wa laakin Siihuun malik Hachbuun aba ma yikhalliina nuchuggu ardah achaan Allah Ilaahna bas gawwa raasah wa ama galbah le yisallimah leena fi iideenah fi l‑yoom da.
Wa Allah gaal leyi : Daahu ana badeet nisallim leeku Siihuun wa ardah.Wa intu kula abdo adkhulu fi ardah wa chiiluuha. 
Wa Siihuun marag min Hachbuun,hu wa kulla chaʼabah le yihaaribna fi Yahaas.
Wa Allah Ilaahna sallamah leena wa aniina annasarna foogah hu wa iyaalah wa kulla chaʼabah.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,aniina chilna kulla mudunah.Wa dammarna al‑rujaal wa l‑awiin wa l‑iyaal lahaddi waahid minhum kula ma faddal hayy.
Wa laakin aniina chilna bahaayim misil khaniime wa nahabna khumaam al‑mudun al‑chilnaahum.
Wa min hillit Aruuʼir al‑fi khachum waadi Arnuun wa l‑madiina al‑fi l‑waadi lahaddi Gilʼaad,ma fi madiina al‑gidrat waajahatna.Wa Allah Ilaahna sallam leena kulla l‑mudun dool.
Wa laakin aniina ma dakhalna fi ard Bani Ammuun.Wa laakin al‑balad hana khachum waadi Yabbuukh wa l‑mudun hana balad al‑jibaal,ma dakhalna fooghum.Ma dakhalna fi ayyi bakaan al‑Allah Ilaahna daharaana ma nadkhulu foogah.
Wa baʼad da,aniina wajjahna ale Baachaan.Wa laakin Oog malik Baachaan wa chaʼabah marago wa haaraboona fi Idraʼi.
Wa Allah gaal leyi ana Muusa : Ma takhaaf achaan ana nisallimah leek fi iidak,hu wa chaʼabah wa baladah.Wa sawwi foogah misil sawweet fi Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin al‑gaaʼid fi Hachbuun. 
Wa khalaas,Allah Ilaahna sallam leena fi iidna Oog malik Baachaan wa kulla chaʼabah.Wa aniina katalnaahum lahaddi waahid minhum kula ma faddal hayy.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,chilna kulla mudunah wa ma fi madiina al‑ma chilnaaha.Wa adad al‑mudun dool 60 fi mantagat Arguub fi balad Baachaan al‑haakim foogha Oog.
Wa kulla l‑mudun dool,humman mudun gawiyiin wa induhum daraadir tuwaal wa biibaan wa hawaadir al‑yisiddu beehum al‑biibaan.Wa fi hillaal aakhariin kula katiiriin al‑ma induhum daraadir.
Aniina chilna al‑mudun dool wa dammarnaahum misil dammarna Siihuun malik Hachbuun.Wa katalna al‑rujaal wa l‑awiin wa l‑iyaal hana l‑mudun dool lahaddi waahid minhum kula ma faddal hayy.
Wa nahabna kulla l‑bahaayim wa chilna khumaam al‑mudun dool misil khaniime.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,aniina chilna balad muluuk al‑Amuuriyiin al‑itneen dool yaʼni Oog wa Siihuun.Wa di l‑ard al‑gaaʼide sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun min waadi Arnuun fi l‑wati lahaddi jabal Harmuun fi l‑munchaakh.
Wa jabal Harmuun da,naas balad Seeda sammooh Siryuun wa l‑Amuuriyiin kula sammooh Saniir.
Wa aniina chilna kulla mudun al‑sahale wa kulla turaab Gilʼaad wa kulla turaab Baachaan lahaddi mudun Salka wa Idraʼi.Wa dool mudun Baachaan al‑hakam fooghum al‑malik Oog.
Wa Oog malik Baachaan,hu aakhir waahid al‑faddal min al‑Rafaayiin.Wa sariirah hana hadiid gaaʼid fi Rabba aasimat Bani Ammuun.Wa tuul al‑sariir da 9 duraaʼ wa urdah 4 duraaʼ.
Wa wakit aniina chilna al‑balad di,ana anteet le gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad al‑ard min hillit Aruuʼir al‑fi waadi Arnuun lahaddi nuss balad jibaal Gilʼaad wa mudunah.
Wa l‑faddal min Gilʼaad wa kulla mamlakat Oog fi Baachaan,ana anteetah le nuss gabiilat Manassa.Wa da,kulla mantagat Arguub wa kulla Baachaan al‑awwal binaaduuh balad al‑Rafaayiin.
Wa zurriiyit Yayiir wileed Manassa chaalo kulla mantagat Arguub lahaddi turaab al‑Gachuuriyiin wa l‑Maʼaakiyiin.Wa sammo balad Baachaan be usum jidduhum Yayiir wa lahaddi l‑yoom kula,binaaduuha Furgaan Yayiir.
Wa ana anteet al‑nuss al‑munchaakhi hana Gilʼaad le zurriiyit khachum beet Makiir wileed Manassa.
Wa le gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad,ana anteethum nuss balad Gilʼaad lahaddi waadi Arnuun wa ust al‑waadi da bigi huduudhum al‑junuubiiye.Wa anteethum battaan lahaddi waadi Yabbuukh wa hu kula bigi huduudhum maʼa Bani Ammuun.
Wa l‑huduud al‑kharbaaniiye hana khachum beet Makiir wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad,humman macho maʼa tuul waadi al‑Urdun min bahar al‑Jaliil fi l‑munchaakh lahaddi l‑bahar al‑Mayyit fi l‑wati.Wa minnah,al‑huduud macho lahaddi gaʼar jabal al‑Fisga fi l‑sabaah.
Achaan fi l‑wakit daak,ana amartuhum wa gult : Allah Ilaahku antaaku al‑balad di warasa.Wa intu al‑rujaal al‑fahaliin,chiilu silaahku wa agtaʼo bahar al‑Urdun giddaam akhwaanku Bani Israaʼiil al‑aakhariin.
Illa awiinku wa iyaalku wa maalku yagoodu fi l‑hillaal al‑ana anteethum leeku.Wa ana naʼarif kadar intu induku maal katiir.
Wa saaʼudu akhwaanku lahaddi Allah yantiihum al‑raaha misilku.Wa wakit humman kula chaalo al‑balad al‑yantiiha leehum Allah Ilaahku warasa kharib le bahar al‑Urdun,fi l‑wakit da,intu tigabbulu wa tagoodu ayyi waahid fi ardah al‑ana anteetha leyah. 
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,ana anteet amur le Yachuuʼ wa gult leyah : Inta chift be uyuunak kulla cheyy al‑sawwaah Allah Ilaahku le l‑muluuk al‑itneen dool yaʼni Oog wa Siihuun.Wa hu yisawwi nafs al‑cheyy fi kulla l‑mamaalik al‑tamchu leehum kharib le bahar al‑Urdun.
Ma takhaafo minhum achaan Allah Ilaahku,hu zaatah yihaarib leeku. 
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,ana chahadt Allah wa gult :
 Ya Allah al‑Rabb,inta badeet tiwassif le abdak azamatak wa iidak al‑chadiide.Hal fi ilaah fi l‑sama aw fi l‑ard al‑yagdar yisawwi misil amalak wa khidimtak al‑chadiide walla ?
Ya Allah,nachhadak khalliini nagtaʼ kharib le bahar al‑Urdun achaan nichiif al‑balad al‑adiile di wa l‑jibaal al‑samhiin wa Lubnaan. 
Wa laakin Allah khidib aleyi be sababku intu wa ma simiʼ suʼaali.Wa gaal leyi : Khalaas,battaan ma tihajji leyi be l‑kalaam da.
Atlaʼ fi raas jabal al‑Fisga wa chiif munchaakh wa wati wa kharib wa sabaah.Wa chiif al‑bakaan da adiil achaan inta ma tagtaʼ bahar al‑Urdun da.
Anti amur le Yachuuʼ wa khalli yabga chadiid wa fahal achaan hu bas al‑yagtaʼ bahar al‑Urdun fi raas al‑chaʼab da wa hu bas al‑yantiihum warasa al‑balad al‑inta gaaʼid tichiifha. 
Wa min al‑wakit da,aniina gaaʼidiin hini fi l‑waadi mugaabiliin Beet Faʼuur.
Wa Muusa gaal :Hassaʼ da,ya Bani Israaʼiil,asmaʼo al‑churuut wa l‑gawaaniin al‑ana zaati niʼallimhum leeku wa tabbuguuhum.Wa be da,talgo al‑haya wa tadkhulu fi l‑balad al‑yantiiha leeku Allah Rabb juduudku wa tichiiluuha warasa.
Ma tiziidu cheyy fi l‑awaamir al‑ana amartuku beehum wa la tangusu minhum cheyy.Achaan tahfado wasaaya Allah Ilaahku al‑ana amartuku beehum.
Wa intu chiftu be uyuunku al‑cheyy al‑sawwaah Allah fi hillit Baʼal Faʼuur.Wa fi usutku,Allah Ilaahku katal kulla l‑naas al‑abado ilaah Baʼal hana jabal Faʼuur.
Wa laakin intu al‑munrabitiin maʼa Allah Ilaahku,kulluku hayyiin al‑yoom.
Chiifu,ana allamtuku gawaaniin wa churuut misil Allah Ilaahi amaraani beyah achaan titabbuguuhum fi l‑balad al‑tadkhulu foogha wa tichiiluuha warasa.
Ahfadoohum wa tabbuguuhum wa beehum talgo al‑maʼrafa wa l‑hikma giddaam al‑chuʼuub al‑mujaawiriinku.Wa wakit al‑chuʼuub al‑mujaawiriinku yasmaʼo al‑churuut dool,yuguulu : Akiid al‑umma al‑kabiire di indaha maʼrafa wa hikma. 
Achaan weeni al‑umma al‑kabiire al‑indaha ilaahaat gariibiin leeha misil Allah Ilaahna wakit ninaaduuh fi ayyi wakit ?
Wa weeni al‑umma al‑kabiire al‑indaha gawaaniin wa churuut aadiliin min kulla l‑wasaaya al‑ana al‑yoom nantiihum leeku dool ?
Wa laakin angarʼu !Ahfado adiil nufuusku achaan ma tanso al‑achya al‑chaafoohum uyuunku.Wa fi kulla muddit hayaatku,khalli ma yamurgu min guluubku.Wa arrufuuhum le iyaalku wa le iyaal iyaalku.
Fakkuru fi l‑yoom al‑wagaftu foogah giddaam Allah Ilaahku fi jabal Huuriib wakit Allah gaal leyi : Limm leyi al‑chaʼab achaan yasmaʼo al‑kalaam al‑nuguulah leehum wa be da,yilʼallamo kikkeef yakhaafo minni fi kulla muddit hayaathum.Wa yiʼallumuuh le awlaadhum kula. 
Wa fi l‑yoom da,garrabtu leyi wa wagaftu fi gaʼar al‑jabal wa l‑jabal mugabbad naar lahaddi naarah taalʼe fi l‑sama wa indah dalaam wa sahaab wa khamaam azrag kurum.
Wa Allah hajja leeku min ust al‑naar wa intu simiʼtu kalaamah.Ma chiftu ayyi hajim wa laakin simiʼtu hissah.
Wa hu ooraaku be muʼaahadatah wa amaraaku titabbugu al‑wasaaya al‑achara wa hu katabaahum fi liihaan itneen hana hajar.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,Allah amaraani niʼallimku al‑gawaaniin wa l‑churuut achaan titabbuguuhum fi l‑balad al‑tadkhulu foogha wa tichiiluuha warasa.
Angarʼu wa ahfado nufuusku achaan intu ma chiftu ayyi hajim wakit Allah hajja leeku min ust al‑naar fi Huuriib.
Wa da achaan ma titallufu nufuusku wa tasnaʼo leeku sanam fi ayyi hajim wa taʼabuduuh misil fi hajim raajil aw fi hajim mara
aw fi hajim ayyi haywaan fi l‑ard aw fi hajim ayyi teeraay al‑titiir fi l‑sama
aw fi hajim ayyi haywaan al‑yazhaf fi l‑ard aw fi hajim ayyi huut fi lubb al‑almi.
Ma tarfaʼo uyuunku le l‑sama wa tichiifu al‑harraay wa l‑gamar wa l‑nujuum wa kulla khuwwaat al‑sama wa yaʼajubuuku wa tasjudu giddaamhum wa taʼabuduuhum.Humman dool,Allah Ilaahku antaahum le kulla l‑chuʼuub al‑aakhariin al‑gaaʼidiin tihit al‑sama.
Wa laakin intu bigiitu hineey Allah,hu al‑chaalaaku wa maragaaku min balad Masir wa hi balad al‑misil jahannam al‑tagtaʼ al‑hadiid.Wa da,achaan tabgo chaʼabah wa warasatah misil intu bigiitu leyah al‑yoom.
Wa Allah khidib aleyi fi chaanku intu.Wa halaf wa gaal abadan ana ma nagtaʼ bahar al‑Urdun wa ma nadkhul fi l‑balad al‑adiile al‑Allah Ilaahku yantiiha leeku warasa.
Wa kan leyi ana,numuut fi l‑balad di,ma nagtaʼ bahar al‑Urdun maʼaaku.Wa laakin intu tagtaʼooh wa tichiilu al‑balad al‑adiile di warasa.
Angarʼu ma tanso al‑muʼaahada al‑sawwaaha maʼaaku Allah Ilaahku wa la tisawwu leeku sanam fi ayyi hajim.Wa da l‑cheyy al‑hu daharaaku minnah.
Achaan khadab Allah Ilaahku misil naar al‑tahrig.Wa hu Ilaah khayyuur yaʼni ma yidoor taʼabudu ilaah aakhar.
Wa wakit taskunu wa titawwulu fi l‑balad di,wa taldo iyaal wa iyaalku kula yaldo iyaal,ma tisawwu sanam fi ayyi hajim le tisawwu al‑fasaala giddaam Allah Ilaahku wa tikhaddubuuh.
Wa khalaas al‑yoom bas,ana nichahhid foogku al‑samaawaat wa l‑ard.Kan sawweetu fasaala misil di,Allah yuguchchuku tawwaali min al‑balad al‑tichiiluuha warasa wa tagoodu foogha khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun.Wa l‑ard di ma tagoodu foogha titawwulu achaan hu yidammirku marra waahid.
Wa Allah yichattitku fi lubb al‑umam wa tifaddil minku umma sakhayre bas fi lubb al‑umam al‑Allah yiwaddiiku fi bakaanhum.
Wa hinaak taʼabudu ilaahaat hana hatab wa hajar al‑sanaʼaahum insaan be iidah,al‑abadan ma chaafo wa la simʼo wa la akalo wa la chammo.
Wa khalaas,min hinaak tifattuchu Allah Ilaahku.Wa kan tifattuchuuh be kulla guluubku wa kulla fikirku,khalaas talgooh.
Wa kan fi diigitku tiwaajuhu kulla l‑kalaam da,khalaas fi l‑akhiir,tigabbulu le Allah Ilaahku wa tasmaʼo kalaamah.
Achaan Allah Ilaahku,hu Ilaah rahiim.Wa la yaabaaku wa la yidammirku wa la yansa al‑muʼaahada al‑halaf beeha le abbahaatku.
Fakkuru fi l‑zaman al‑faat min Allah khalag al‑insaan fi l‑ard.Wa fakkuru fi kulla cheyy al‑bigi fi l‑dunya min tarafha le tarafha.Cheyy kabiir misil da bigi walla ?Wa simiʼtu cheyy mislah walla ?
Wa hal fi naas misilku intu al‑simʼo hiss al‑Rabb hajja leehum min ust al‑naar wa gaʼado hayyiin walla ?
Wa hal fi ilaah aakhar al‑jarrab yichiil le nafsah umma min usut umma aakhara be tajriba aw be alaamaat aw be ajaayib aw be harib aw be iid chadiide aw be duraaʼ gawi aw be khoof chadiid misil al‑sawwaah Allah Ilaahku fi balad Masir walla ?Wa da intu chiftuuh be uyuunku.
Wa waddah leeku le taʼarfu kadar Allah hu bas al‑Ilaah wa la ilaah illa hu.
Wa min al‑sama,hu khallaaku simiʼtu hissah le yantiiku adab.Wa fi l‑ard,hu chawwafaaku naarah al‑kabiire wa min ust al‑naar intu simiʼtu kalaamah.
Wa da achaan hu habba abbahaatku wa azal zurriiyithum al‑baʼadhum.Wa maragaaku min balad Masir be gudurtah al‑kabiire
le yaglaʼ balad al‑umam al‑kubaar wa chudaad minku.Wa yantiiha leeku warasa wa tadkhulu foogha.Wa da,misil al‑gaaʼid yabga al‑yoom.
Wa l‑yoom,aʼarfu wa khuttu fi guluubku kadar Allah hu bas Rabb al‑samaawaat wa l‑ard.Wa la ilaah illa hu.
Wa intu wa le iyaalku,ahfado al‑churuut wa l‑wasaaya al‑naamurku beehum al‑yoom achaan talgo al‑kheer wa umurku kula yabga tawiil fi l‑ard al‑antaaha leeku Allah Ilaahku le l‑abad.
Wa khalaas,Muusa azal talaata mudun sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun.
Wa l‑mudun dool yabgo hana luju le l‑naadum al‑katal naadum aakhar bala raayah,al‑ma indah maʼaayah ayyi karaahiiye min awwal.Wa wakit al‑kaatil yajri wa yamchi le waahide min al‑mudun dool,hayaatah madmuuna.
Wa l‑mudun dool,humman Baasar al‑fi l‑khala fi l‑sahale le gabiilat Raʼuubiin,wa Raamuut al‑fi Gilʼaad le gabiilat Gaad,wa Joolaan fi turaab Baachaan le gabiilat Manassa.
Wa dool al‑gawaaniin al‑Muusa khattaahum le Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa baʼad marago min balad Masir,Muusa anta Bani Israaʼiil faraayid wa churuut wa gawaaniin.
Wa da khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun fi waadi al‑mugaabil hillit Beet Faʼuur fi balad Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin al‑sakan fi Hachbuun.Wa wakit Muusa wa Bani Israaʼiil marago min balad Masir,haarabooh le l‑malik da wa annasaro foogah.
Wa humman chaalo baladah wa balad Oog malik Baachaan.Wa humman al‑itneen dool muluuk al‑Amuuriyiin al‑gaaʼidiin sabaah khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun.
Wa buldaanhum macho min hillit Aruuʼir al‑fi khachum waadi Arnuun lahaddi jabal Siyuun al‑binaaduuh Harmuun,
wa kulla l‑Araba sabaah khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun lahaddi l‑bahar al‑Mayyit fi gaʼar jabal al‑Fisga.
Wa Muusa naada kulla Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal leehum :Asmaʼo,ya Bani Israaʼiil,al‑churuut wa l‑gawaaniin al‑niʼooruuku beehum al‑yoom.Allumuuhum wa ahfadoohum wa tabbuguuhum.
Allah Ilaahna sawwa maʼaana muʼaahada fi Huuriib.
Wa l‑muʼaahada di,Allah ma sawwaaha maʼa abbahaatna bas wa laakin sawwaaha maʼaana aniina kula al‑gaaʼidiin hayyiin al‑yoom.
Wa Allah gaabalaaku wa hajja maʼaaku fi l‑jabal,min ust al‑naar.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,ana bigiit wasiit ambeenku intu wa Allah le niʼooriiku be kalaamah.Achaan intu khuftu min al‑naar wa ma talaʼtu fi l‑jabal.Wa Allah gaal :
 Ana Allah Ilaahak bas al‑maragtak min Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye.
 Ma taʼabud ilaahaat aakhariin illa ana.
 Ma tasnaʼ sanam fi ayyi hajim min al‑achya al‑gaaʼidiin foog fi l‑sama aw tihit fi l‑ard aw fi lubb al‑almi al‑fi l‑ard.
Wa ma tasjud giddaam al‑asnaam dool wa la taʼabudhum achaan ana bas Allah Ilaahak.Ana Allah khayyuur yaʼni ma nidoor taʼabud ilaah aakhar.Wa ana niʼaakhib al‑iyaal wa iyaal al‑iyaal be zunuub abbahaathum lahaddi l‑zurriiye al‑taalta wa l‑raabʼe kan humman yakrahooni.
Wa laakin ana nisawwi al‑kheer le aalaaf al‑zurriiyaat al‑yihibbuuni wa yitabbugu wasiiyaati.
 Ma tahlif be usmi ana Allah Ilaahak be kidib achaan al‑yahlif be usmi be kidib,ana Allah ma najʼalah bari.
 Ahfad yoom al‑sabt wa ajʼalah yoom mukhaddas misil ana Allah Ilaahak amarak beyah.
Inta takhdim le muddit sitte yoom wa tikammil kulla khidimtak.
Wa laakin al‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,hu sabt leyi ana Allah Ilaahak.Fi l‑yoom da,ma takhdim ayyi cheyy,wa la inta wa la awlaadak wa la banaatak wa la abiidak wa la khadiimak wa la tiiraanak wa la hamiirak wa la kulla bahaaymak wa la l‑ajaanib al‑gaaʼidiin maʼaak fi hillitak.Wa da yikhalli abdak wa khaadmak kula yinjammo mislak.
Wa azzakkar kadar inta bigiit abid fi balad Masir wa ana Allah Ilaahak maragaak be iid chadiide wa be duraaʼ gawi wa fi chaan da,ana Allah Ilaahak amarak tikarrim yoom al‑sabt.
 Karrim ammak wa abuuk misil ana Allah Ilaahak amarak beyah achaan umrak yabga tawiil wa talga al‑kheer fi l‑ard al‑nantiiha leek ana Allah Ilaahak.
 Ma taktul dimme.
 Ma tazna.
 Ma tasrig.
 Ma tachhad be kidib fi ayyi waahid min jiiraanak.
 Ma titmanna marit jaarak.Wa la tatmaʼ fi beet jaarak wa la zerʼah wa la abdah wa la khaadmah wa la toorah wa la humaarah wa la ayyi cheyy hanaayah. 
Wa l‑kalaam da,Allah gaalah le kulla l‑chaʼab fi l‑jabal,min ust al‑naar wa l‑sahaab wa khamaam azrag kurum.Wa kallamaahum be soot aali wa ma zaad foogah cheyy.Wa l‑kalaam da,hu katabah fi liihaan itneen hana hajar wa antaahum leyi ana Muusa.
Wa wakit simiʼtu al‑hiss min ust al‑dalaam wa l‑jabal gaaʼid yahrag,intu garrabtu leyi maʼa kulla chuyuukh gabaayilku wa kubaaraatku.
Wa intu gultu : Daahu Allah Ilaahna bayyan leena majdah wa azamatah wa simiʼna hissah min ust al‑naar.Wa l‑yoom,aniina chifna wa irifna kadar mumkin Allah yihajji le l‑insaan wa l‑insaan da ma yumuut.
Wa hassaʼ maala numuutu be l‑naar al‑kabiire al‑taakulna ?Achaan kan battaan gaaʼidiin nasmaʼo hiss Allah Ilaahna,numuutu.
Hal fi insaan misilna simiʼ hiss Allah al‑Hayy min ust al‑naar wa gaʼad hayy walla ?
Wa khalaas hassaʼ da,inta ya Muusa,garrib le Allah Ilaahna wa asmaʼ kulla kalaamah.Wa baʼadeen,hajjiina be kulla l‑kalaam al‑yuguulah leek Allah Ilaahna.Wa aniina nasmaʼo kalaamah wa nitabbuguuh. 
Wa Allah simiʼ kulla kalaamku al‑gultuuh leyi wa gaal : Ana simiʼt kulla l‑kalaam al‑gaalooh leek al‑chaʼab wa kalaamhum da kulla ke adiil.
Wa nitmanna kulla yoom humman yakhaafo minni wa yitabbugu kulla wasiiyaati.Wa da le yalgo al‑kheer,humman wa iyaalhum ila l‑abad.
Amchi guul leehum :‹ Gabbulu fi khiyamku. ›
Wa inta kamaan,ya Muusa,agood giddaami hini wa ana nikallimak kulla l‑wasaaya wa l‑churuut wa l‑gawaaniin.Wa allimhum le chaʼabi wa humman yitabbuguuhum fi l‑balad al‑ana nantiiha leehum warasa. 
Wa Muusa gaal battaan :Khalaas ahfado wa sawwu kulla cheyy misil Allah Ilaahku amaraaku beyah.Ma tikissu wa la isra wa la zeene.
Chiilu daayman derib Allah Ilaahku al‑amaraaku beyah.Wa be da,tahyo wa umurku yabga tawiil wa tiʼiichu adiil fi l‑balad al‑tichiiluuha warasa.
Daahu al‑wasaaya wa l‑churuut wa l‑gawaaniin al‑amar beehum Allah Ilaahku le niʼallimhum leeku wa titabbuguuhum fi l‑balad al‑intu maachiin tichiiluuha warasa.
Wa da achaan takhaafo min Allah Ilaahku intu wa iyaalku wa iyaal iyaalku wa tahfado fi kulla muddit hayaatku kulla l‑churuut wa l‑wasaaya al‑nantiihum leeku.Wa be da,umurku yabga tawiil.
Asmaʼo !Ya Bani Israaʼiil,ahfado al‑churuut wa l‑wasaaya wa tabbuguuhum.Wa da achaan talgo al‑kheer wa tabgo katiiriin misil gaalah leeku Allah Rabb juduudku fi l‑balad al‑malaane be l‑laban wa l‑asal.
Asmaʼo,ya Bani Israaʼiil !Allah Ilaahna hu Allah al‑Waahid.
Hibbu Allah Ilaahku be kulla guluubku wa be kulla fikirku wa be kulla gudritku.
Wa l‑wasaaya al‑nantiihum leeku al‑yoom dool,ahfadoohum fi guluubku.
Wa allumuuhum le iyaalku wa kallumu beehum fi l‑beet wa fi l‑safar wa wakit raagdiin wa gaaymiin.
Wa sawwuuhum misil alaama al‑tarbutuuha fi iideeku wa misil hilaal al‑tiʼalluguuh fi jabhaatku ambeenaat uyuunku.
Wa aktubuuhum fi iidaan biibaan buyuutku wa fi madkhal hillaalku.
Wa Allah Ilaahku yiwaddiiku fi l‑balad al‑hu halaf le juduudku Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub wa gaal yantiiha leeku,be mudunha al‑kubaar wa adiiliin al‑intu ma baneetuuhum.
Wa l‑ard indaha buyuut al‑malaaniin be l‑khumaam al‑intu ma sabbeetuuh wa biyaar al‑intu ma nakattuuhum wa jineenaat inab wa zaytuun al‑intu ma maggantuuhum.Wa wakit taakulu wa tachbaʼo,
fakkuru ma tanso Allah al‑maragaaku min Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye.
Wa akhaafo min Allah Ilaahku wa leyah hu bas,aʼabuduuh wa be usmah hu bas,ahalfu.
Ma titaabuʼu ilaahaat aakhariin hana l‑chuʼuub al‑mujaawiriinku
achaan Allah Ilaahku al‑gaaʼid fi usutku hu Ilaah khayyuur yaʼni ma yidoor taʼabudu ilaah aakhar.Wa kan khidib leeku khadabah yikammilku min wijh al‑ard.
Ma tijarrubu Allah Ilaahku misil awwal jarrabtuuh fi Massa (maʼanaatah al‑tajriba).
Wa waajib tahfado adiil wasaaya Allah Ilaahku wa l‑muʼaahada wa l‑churuut al‑amaraaku beehum.
Wa tisawwu al‑adiil wa l‑zeen giddaam Allah.Wa da,achaan talgo al‑kheer wa tichiilu al‑balad al‑adiile al‑fi chaanha Allah halaf yantiiha le juduudku.
Wa yatrud udwaanku baʼiid minku misil hu gaalah.
Wa kan iyaalku yasʼalooku wa yuguulu : Maala Allah Ilaahna amaraaku be l‑faraayid wa l‑churuut wa l‑gawaaniin ,
khalaas guulu leehum : Awwal aniina bigiina abiid le Firʼoon malik Masir wa laakin Allah maragaana min Masir be iid chadiide.
Wa fi uyuunna Allah sawwa alaamaat wa ajaayib kubaar wa mukhiifiin le yahlik Masir wa l‑malik Firʼoon wa kulla beetah.
Wa maragaana min al‑bakaan da wa waddaana le yantiina al‑balad al‑hu halaf yantiiha le juduudna.
Wa Allah Ilaahna amaraana nitabbugu kulla l‑churuut dool wa nakhaafo minnah.Wa da achaan nalgo al‑kheer al‑daayim wa yahfadna hayyiin misil hu sawwaah leena al‑yoom.
Wa nabgo saalihiin kan nahfado wa nitabbugu kulla l‑wasaaya dool giddaam Allah Ilaahna misil hu amaraana beyah. 
Wa Muusa gaal battaan :Wakit Allah Ilaahku yiwaddiiku fi l‑balad al‑tadkhulu foogha wa tichiiluuha warasa,hu yatrud giddaamku sabʼa umam katiiriin wa chudaad minku wa humman al‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Girgaachiyiin wa l‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin.
Wa wakit Allah Ilaahku yansurku fooghum wa yisallimhum leeku fi iideeku,waajib tidammuruuhum marra waahid wa abadan ma tisawwu maʼaahum alaakha wa la tarhamoohum.
Al‑umam dool ma taakhudu minhum wa la tantu banaatku le awlaadhum wa la taakhudu le awlaadku min banaathum.
Achaan da,yibaʼʼid iyaalku min Allah wa yaʼabudu ilaahaat aakhariin wa Allah yakhdab aleeku khadab chadiid wa yidammirku bala taʼkhiir.
Wa laakin daahu al‑cheyy al‑tisawwuuh le l‑umam dool.Haddumu madaabihhum wa armu hujaarhum al‑khazzoohum le l‑ibaada wa kassuru iidaanhum al‑khazzoohum le ibaadat Achiira wa harrugu asnaamhum.
Achaan intu chaʼab mukhassasiin le Allah Ilaahku wa Allah Ilaahku azalaaku min kulla l‑chuʼuub al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑ard le tabgo chaʼabah halaalah.
Wa Allah habbaaku wa azalaaku ma achaan intu katiiriin min kulla l‑chuʼuub al‑aakhariin.La !Intu bas al‑chiyya.
Achaan Allah yihibbuku bas,hu hafad al‑haliife al‑halaf beeha le juduudku.Wa fi chaan da bas,hu maragaaku be iid chadiide wa fadaaku min iid Firʼoon malik Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye.
Wa be da,taʼarfu tamaam kadar Allah Ilaahku,hu bas al‑Rabb.Wa hu saadikh wa yahfad muʼaahadatah wa kheerah le alif zurriiye.Wa da,le l‑naas al‑yihibbuuh wa yitabbugu wasiiyaatah.
Wa laakin yijaazi al‑yakrahooh wa yidammirhum wa bala taʼkhiir al‑yakrahooh hu yijaaziihum.
Wa ahfado al‑wasaaya wa l‑churuut wa l‑gawaaniin al‑naamurku beehum al‑yoom wa tabbuguuhum.
Kan intu simiʼtu al‑churuut dool wa hafadtuuhum wa tabbagtuuhum,Allah Ilaahku kula yahfad leeku al‑muʼaahada wa l‑kheer al‑halaf beyah le juduudku.
Wa yihibbuku wa yibaarikku wa yikattirku wa yibaarik zurriiyitku wa intaaj arduku wa gamehku wa khamarku al‑jadiid wa dihinku wa waaluudit bagarku wa khanamku fi l‑ard al‑halaf le juduudku wa gaal yantiiha leeku.
Wa intu tabgo mubaarakiin ziyaada min kulla l‑chuʼuub al‑aakhariin wa fi lubbuku,ma fi raajil wa la mara aagre wa ma fi bahiime aagre fi lubb bahaayimku.
Wa Allah yibaʼʼid minku ayyi marad.Wa ma yirassil leeku al‑amraad al‑fasliin al‑chiftuuhum fi Masir wa laakin yirassilhum le kulla l‑naas al‑yakrahooku.
Wa tidammuru kulla l‑chuʼuub al‑yisallimhum leeku Allah Ilaahku wa ma tihinnu fooghum.Wa ma taʼabudu ilaahaathum achaan ma yabgo leeku charak.
Wa akuun tuguulu fi guluubku : Al‑umam dool katiiriin minnina wa kikkeef nagdaro naglaʼo arduhum ? 
Wa laakin ma takhaafo minhum.Fakkuru fi l‑cheyy al‑sawwaah Allah Ilaahku fi l‑malik Firʼoon wa kulla balad Masir.
Wa intu chiftu be uyuunku al‑alaamaat wa l‑ajaayib wa l‑iid al‑chadiide wa l‑duraaʼ al‑gawi al‑maragaaku beehum Allah Ilaahku.Wa be misil da,Allah Ilaahku yisawwi fi kulla l‑chuʼuub al‑intu gaaʼidiin takhaafo minhum.
Wa Allah Ilaahku yirassil leehum nahale tidammir al‑faddalo minhum wa l‑mullabbidiin minku.
Ma tinbahtu minhum achaan Allah Ilaahku gaaʼid fi usutku wa hu al‑Ilaah al‑aziim wa l‑mukhiif.
Wa Allah Ilaahku yatrud al‑umam dool baʼiid minku be chiyya chiyya.Intu ma tagdaro tikammuluuhum tawwaali ke achaan haywaanaat al‑kadaade yabgo katiiriin didduku.
Wa Allah Ilaahku yisallim leeku al‑chaʼab da fi iidku wa yibarjilhum marra waahid lahaddi yiddammaro.
Wa yisallim leeku muluukhum wa intu tuguchchuuhum min tihit al‑sama wa waahid minhum ma yagdar yagiif giddaamku lahaddi tikammuluuhum kulluhum.
Wa harrugu asnaam ilaahaathum be naar wa ma tatmaʼo wa tichiilu min al‑fudda wa l‑dahab al‑fooghum le nufuusku achaan da yabga leeku charak yakrubku wa Allah Ilaahku kula harramah.
Wa ma tijiibu al‑haraam fi buyuutku achaan beyah tahlako misilhum.Wa harrumu al‑haraam achaan hu yijiib al‑halaak.
Wa Muusa gaal :Hassaʼ da,kulla l‑wasaaya al‑naamurku beehum al‑yoom,ahfadoohum wa tabbuguuhum.Wa da achaan tahyo wa tabgo katiiriin wa Allah yiwaddiiku wa tichiilu warasa al‑balad al‑hu halaf yantiiha le juduudku.
Wa fakkuru fi l‑derib al‑waddaaku foogah Allah Ilaahku fi muddit 40 sana fi l‑sahara le yidaʼʼifku.Wa da le yijarribku wa yaʼarif al‑fi guluubku wa yichiif kan tahfado wasiiyaatah walla la.
Wa Allah daʼʼafku be l‑juuʼ wa baʼad da,akkalaaku al‑mannawa la intu wa la juduudku ma taʼarfuuha min awwal.Wa da achaan yiʼarrifku kadar al‑insaan ma yiʼiich be l‑akil wiheedah laakin yiʼiich be kulli kilme al‑yuguulha Allah.
Wa fi muddit al‑arbaʼiin sana dool,khulgaanku ma gidmo leeku fi jilidku wa rijleeku kula ma wirmo.
Wa aʼarfu tamaam wa khuttu fi guluubku kadar Allah Ilaahku yiʼaddibku misil naadum yiʼaddib wileedah.
Wa ahfado wasaaya Allah Ilaahku achaan tamchu fi derbah wa takhaafo minnah.
Wa be da,Allah Ilaahku yiwaddiiku fi balad adiile al‑indaha wudyaan wa uyuun almi wa almi al‑yamrug min tihit al‑ard wa yisiil fi l‑kadaade wa l‑jibaal.
Wa di l‑balad al‑indaha gameh abyad wa gameh ahmar wa inab wa tiin wa rummaan wa dihin zaytuun wa asal.
Wa fi l‑balad di,taakulu khubza bala taʼab wa cheyy yigassir leeku kula ma fiih.Wa hujaar al‑balad di induhum hadiid wa min jibaalha,tamurgu nahaas.
Wa wakit taakulu wa tachbaʼo,tahmudu Allah Ilaahku fi chaan al‑balad al‑adiile al‑antaaha leeku.
Ahfado nufuusku wa ma tanso Allah Ilaahku lahaddi ma titabbugu al‑wasaaya wa l‑gawaaniin wa l‑churuut al‑ana Muusa nantiihum leeku al‑yoom.
Wa da wakit taakulu wa tachbaʼo wa wakit tabnu buyuut adiiliin wa taskunu fooghum.
Wa da wakit yikattir leeku bagarku wa khanamku wa dahabku wa fudditku wa kulla cheyy al‑hanaaku.
Fi l‑wakit da,angarʼu !Khalli guluubku ma yistakbaro wa tanso Allah Ilaahku al‑maragaaku min Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye.
Wa hu al‑waddaaku fi l‑sahara al‑wasiiʼe wa l‑mukhiife,al‑indaha dabiib niiraani wa agaarib.Wa di balad al‑atach al‑ma yalgo foogha almi.Wa laakin hu marag leeku almi min al‑hajar al‑gawi.
Wa hu akkalaaku al‑manna fi l‑sahara al‑abadan juduudku ma irfooha wa battaan jaab leeku al‑duʼuf wa jarrabaaku wa fi l‑akhiir,sawwa leeku al‑kheer.
Angarʼu,ma tuguulu fi guluubku : Be juhudna wa gudrat duraaʼna aniina ligiina al‑khuna di. 
Fakkuru fi Allah Ilaahku achaan hu bas al‑antaaku al‑gudra al‑beeha ligiitu al‑khuna di.Wa be da,lahaddi l‑yoom hu akkad al‑muʼaahada al‑sawwaaha maʼa abbahaatku.
Wa kan nisiitu Allah Ilaahku wa taabaʼtu ilaahaat aakhariin wa abadtuuhum wa sajadtu giddaamhum,khalaas ana niʼakkid leeku al‑yoom kadar tiddammaro kulluku.
Aywa,tiddammaro misil al‑umam al‑dammaraahum Allah giddaamku achaan intu ma simiʼtu kalaam Allah Ilaahku.
Wa Muusa gaal :Asmaʼo,ya Bani Israaʼiil,al‑yoom tagtaʼo bahar al‑Urdun le tamchu tichiilu al‑balad min al‑umam al‑kubaar wa chudaad minku.Wa tichiilu mudunhum kubaar wa gawiyiin wa muhawwagiin be daraadir tuwaal lahaddi l‑sama.
Wa sukkaanhum Bani Anakh al‑humman kubaar wa tuwaal wa intu taʼarfuuhum wa simiʼtu al‑naas bihajju beehum wa buguulu : Yaatu yagdar yagiif giddaam Bani Anakh wa yihaaribhum ? 
Wa laakin aʼarfu tamaam kadar al‑yoom,Allah Ilaahku hu bas maachi giddaamku misil naar al‑tahrig wa hu bas yidammirhum wa yiʼayyibhum giddaamku.Wa be da,intu tichiilu khumaamhum wa tidammuruuhum tawwaali misil Allah gaalah leeku.
Wa wakit Allah Ilaahku yatrudhum giddaamku,ma tuguulu fi guluubku : Be sabab adaalitna Allah antaana al‑balad di. La !Allah yaglaʼ al‑balad min al‑umam wa yantiiha leeku be sabab al‑fasaala al‑humman gaaʼidiin yisawwuuha.
Wa ma be sabab adaalitku wa la be sabab takhwa guluubku,intu tichiilu al‑balad di.Wa laakin be sabab fasaalit al‑umam dool,Allah Ilaahak yaglaʼ minhum al‑balad wa yantiiha leeku.Wa da,le yiʼakkid al‑kalaam al‑hu waaʼad beyah juduudku Ibraahiim wa Ishaakh wa Yaakhuub.
Wa aʼarfu kadar Allah Ilaahku yikhalliiku tichiilu al‑balad al‑adiile di,ma achaan intu saalihiin.Laakin intu chaʼab raasku gawi.
Wa fakkuru ma tanso wakit khaddabtu Allah Ilaahku fi l‑sahara.Wa min maragtu min balad Masir lahaddi jiitu hini,intu aasiyiin Allah.
Wa fi Huuriib,intu khaddabtu Allah wa hu khidib aleeku lahaddi dawwar yidammirku.
Wa wakit ana talaʼt fi l‑jabal le nichiil al‑liihaan hana l‑hajar al‑fooghum al‑muʼaahada al‑sawwaaha Allah maʼaaku,ana gaʼadt 40 yoom wa 40 leelewa la akalt wa la chiribt.
Wa Allah antaani al‑liihaan al‑itneen hana l‑hajar al‑hu katab fooghum.Hu katab fooghum kulla l‑kalaam al‑hu gaalah leeku fi raas al‑hajar min ust al‑naar.Wa da fi yoom al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa baʼad 40 yoom wa 40 leele,Allah antaani al‑liihaan al‑itneen hana l‑hajar wa humman liihaan al‑muʼaahada.
