wa Hafaraayim wa Chiyuun wa Anaharat
wa Rabbiit wa Khichyuun wa Abiis
wa Raamat wa Een Ganniim wa Een Hadda wa Beet Fasiis.
Wa l‑huduud yiwassulu ale Taabuur wa Chahsiima wa Beet Chams wa yamchu lahaddi bahar al‑Urdun.Wa be l‑jumla 16 mudun wa hillaalhum al‑taabʼiin leehum.
Wa dool bas al‑mudun wa hillaalhum al‑taabʼiin leehum al‑ligoohum warasa gabiilat Yassaakar hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.
Wa l‑gisim al‑khaamis antooh le gabiilat Achiir hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.
Wa huduudhum fi Halkha wa Hali wa Baatan wa Akchaaf
wa Allamalik wa Amʼaad wa Michaal.Fi l‑kharib,yamchu min jabal al‑Karmal lahaddi Chiihuur Libna
wa yigabbulu sabaah ale Beet Daguun wa yamchu ale huduud gabiilat Zabuluun wa waadi Yiftahiil munchaakh le Beet Imakh wa Naʼiil.Wa yamchu ale jiihat Kaabuul
wa ale Abduun wa Rahuub wa Hammuun wa Khaana lahaddi Seeda al‑kabiire.
Wa l‑huduud yigabbulu ale l‑Raama wa lahaddi madiinat Suur al‑gawiiye.Wa l‑huduud yigabbulu lahaddi Huusa wa l‑bahar al‑Abyad wa yufuutu be Mahlab wa Akziib
wa Umma wa Afiikh wa Rahuub.Wa be l‑jumla 22 mudun wa hillaalhum al‑taabʼiin leehum.
Wa dool bas al‑mudun wa hillaalhum al‑taabʼiin leehum al‑ligoohum ard warasa gabiilat Achiir hasab khuchuum buyuuthum kulla.
Wa l‑gisim al‑saadis antooh le gabiilat Naftaali hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.
Wa huduudhum yamchu min Hiilaf wa l‑chadar al‑kubaar hana Saʼnaniim wa Adaami Nakhab wa Yabniyiil lahaddi Lakhuum wa yagiifu fi bahar al‑Urdun.
Wa min al‑kharib,al‑huduud yigabbulu lahaddi Aznuut Taabuur wa minha yamchu lahaddi Huugug wa lahaddi turaab gabiilat Zabuluun fi l‑junuub wa lahaddi turaab gabiilat Achiir fi l‑kharib wa Yahuuza gariib le bahar al‑Urdun ale sabaah.
Wa l‑mudun al‑gawiyiin humman Siddiim wa Siir wa Hammat wa Rakhat wa Kinaarat
wa Adama wa l‑Raama wa Haasuur
wa Khadach wa Idraʼi wa Een Haasuur
wa Yirwuun wa Migdaliil wa Huuriim wa Beet Anaat wa Beet Chams.Wa be l‑jumla 19 mudun wa hillaalhum al‑taabʼiin leehum.
Wa dool bas al‑mudun wa hillaalhum al‑taabʼiin leehum al‑ligoohum warasa gabiilat Naftaali hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.
Wa l‑gisim al‑saabiʼ antooh le gabiilat Daan hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.
Wa huduud ard warasathum Saarʼa wa Achtawuul wa Iir Chams
wa Chaʼalbiin wa Ayyaluun wa Yitla
wa Iluun wa Timna wa Akhruun
wa Alitakha wa Gibbatuun wa Baʼala
wa Yihuud wa Bani Barakh wa Gaat Rimmuun
wa Almi Yarguun wa Rakhuun wa l‑turaab al‑mugaabil Yaafa.
Wa laakin gabiilat Daan ma gidro yalgo turaabhum.Wa fi chaan da,humman gammo didd sukkaan Lacham haaraboohum wa kataloohum be l‑seef wa chaalo hillithum minhum.Wa gaʼado foogha wa sammooha Daan be usum jidduhum.
Wa dool bas al‑mudun wa hillaalhum al‑taabʼiin leehum al‑ligoohum warasa gabiilat Daan hasab khuchuum buyuuthum.
Wa baʼad gassamo ard warasathum be kulla huduudha,Bani Israaʼiil anto ard le Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun fi usuthum.
Wa hasab kalaam Allah,humman antooh al‑madiina al‑hu dawwaraaha yaʼni Timna Saarah fi jibaal Afraayim.Wa hu banaaha wa sakan foogha.
Wa da bas gisim al‑ard al‑sawwooh raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun wa chuyuukh aayilaat gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil be amʼiyeedaat.Sawwooh be amʼiyeedaat giddaam Allah fi Chiilooh fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.Wa be misil da,humman gassamo al‑balad.
Wa Allah hajja le Yachuuʼ wa gaal :
 Guul le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Khassusu leeku mudun hana luju hasab al‑kalaam al‑ana gultah leeku be waasitat Muusa.
Wa naadum al‑katal dimme bala raayah yagdar yajri le waahide minhum.Wa l‑mudun dool yagdaro yahfado al‑kaatil min siid al‑taar.
Wa l‑kaatil yajri le waahide min al‑mudun dool wa wakit yiwassil fi khachum baab al‑madiina,hu yigaabil kubaaraat al‑madiina wa yihajji leehum muchkiltah.Baʼad da,humman yantu izin yadkhul fi madiinithum wa yantuuh bakaan yagood fi usuthum.
Wa kan siid al‑taar macha waraayah kula,humman ma yisallumuuh leyah achaan hu katal dimme bala raayah wa ma indah leyah ayyi karaahiiye min awwal.
Wa yagood fi l‑madiina di lahaddi yagiif giddaam al‑mujtamaʼ le yihaakumuuh wa lahaddi moot kabiir rujaal al‑diin hana l‑zaman da.Wa baʼad da,al‑kaatil yagdar yigabbil fi madiintah wa fi beetah yaʼni fi l‑madiina al‑hu jara minha.› 
Wa khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil khassaso Khadach al‑Jaliil al‑fi jibaal Naftaali wa Chakiim al‑fi jibaal Afraayim wa Kharyat Arbaʼa yaʼni Hibruun al‑fi jibaal Yahuuza.
Wa khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun wa sabaah le Ariiha,humman khassaso Baasar al‑fi l‑sahara fi sahalat gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa Raamuut al‑fi turaab Gilʼaad hana gabiilat Gaad wa Joolaan fi turaab Baachaan hana gabiilat Manassa.
Wa dool bas al‑mudun hana l‑luju al‑khassasoohum Bani Israaʼiil le nufuushum wa le l‑ajnabi al‑saakin maʼaahum.Wa ayyi naadum al‑katal dimme bala raayah yagdar yajri leehum achaan siid al‑taar ma yaktulah gabul ma yagiif giddaam al‑mujtamaʼ le yihaakumuuh.
Wa baʼad da,kubaaraat aayilaat al‑Laawiyiin jo giddaam raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun wa kubaaraat aayilaat gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil
fi Chiilooh fi balad Kanʼaan.Wa gaalo leehum : Allah gaal be waasitat Muusa tantuuna mudunal‑naskunu fooghum wa induhum bakaan le bahaayimna yasraho foogah. 
Wa khalaas min ard warasathum,Bani Israaʼiil antoohum le l‑Laawiyiin mudun be bakaanaathum hana sarha hasab kalaam Allah.
Wa gassamo be amʼiyeedaat wa l‑gisim al‑awwal,antooh le khachum beet Gahaat.Wa minhum zurriiyit Haaruun raajil al‑diin ligo 13 mudun min gabiilat Yahuuza wa gabiilat Chimʼuun wa gabiilat Banyaamiin.
Wa l‑Laawiyiin al‑aakhariin hana khachum beet Gahaat ligo be amʼiyeedaat 10 mudun min gabiilat Afraayim wa gabiilat Daan wa nuss gabiilat Manassa.
Wa khachum beet Girchuun ligi be amʼiyeedaat 13 mudun min gabiilat Yassaakar wa gabiilat Achiir wa gabiilat Naftaali wa nuss gabiilat Manassa al‑fi turaab Baachaan.
Wa khachum beet Maraari ligi 12 mudun min gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa gabiilat Zabuluun.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil anto kulla l‑mudun dool be bakaanaathum hana l‑sarha be amʼiyeedaat le l‑Laawiyiin misil Allah amar beyah be waasitat Muusa.
Wa daahu asaame al‑mudun al‑antoohum gabiilat Yahuuza wa gabiilat Chimʼuun
le zurriiyit Haaruun min khachum beet Gahaat min gabiilat Laawi gisimhum antooh leehum be amʼiyeedaat fi l‑awwal.
Wa anto Kharyat Arbaʼa yaʼni Hibruun al‑gaaʼide fi jibaal Yahuuza be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha al‑muhawwigiinha.Wa sammo al‑madiina di Kharyat Arbaʼa be usum hana Arbaʼa abu Anuukh.
Wa laakin al‑ziraaʼa wa l‑hillaal hana l‑madiina di antoohum warasa le Kaalib wileed Yafuuna.
Wa ziyaada min Hibruun madiinat al‑luju be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha,zurriiyit Haaruun raajil al‑diin ligo Libna be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Yattiir be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Achtamuuʼa be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Huluun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Dabiir be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Achan be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Yutta be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Beet Chams be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 9 mudun al‑antoohum gabiilat Yahuuza wa gabiilat Chimʼuun.
Wa min gabiilat Banyaamiin ligo Gibʼuun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Gabaʼ be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Anatuut be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Almuun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 4 mudun.
Wa adad al‑mudun hana rujaal al‑diin zurriiyit Haaruun 13 mudun be bakaanaathum hana l‑sarha.
Wa l‑Laawiyiin al‑aakhariin min khachum beet Gahaat ligo mudun be amʼiyeedaat min gabiilat Afraayim.
Wa humman antoohum Chakiim madiinat al‑luju le l‑kaatil al‑gaaʼide fi jibaal Afraayim be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Gaazar be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Khibsiim be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Beet Huruun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 4 mudun.
Wa min gabiilat Daan ligo hillit Alitakha be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Gibbatuun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.
Wa Ayyaluun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Gaat Rimmuun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 4 mudun.
Wa min nuss gabiilat Manassa ligo Taʼnak be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Yiblaʼaam be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 2 mudun.
Wa be l‑jumla al‑Laawiyiin al‑aakhariin min khachum beet Gahaat ligo 10 mudun be bakaanaathum hana l‑sarha.
Wa l‑Laawiyiin min khachum beet Girchuun ligo min nuss gabiilat Manassa,Joolaan madiinat al‑luju le l‑kaatil fi Baachaan be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Baʼachtara be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 2 mudun.
Wa min gabiilat Yassaakar,ligo Khichyuun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Dabra be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Yarmuut be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Een Ganniim be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 4 mudun.
Wa min gabiilat Achiir ligo Michaal be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Abduun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Halkha be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Rahuub be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 4 mudun.
Wa min gabiilat Naftaali ligo Khadach fi l‑Jaliil madiinat al‑luju be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Hammuut Duur be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Khartaan be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 3 mudun.
Wa khachum beet Girchuun be l‑jumla ligo 13 mudun be bakaanaathum hana l‑sarha.
Wa l‑Laawiyiin min khachum beet Maraari ligo min gabiilat Zabuluun Yakhnaʼaam be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Kharta be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Rimuuna be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Nahlaal be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 4 mudun.
Wa min gabiilat Raʼuubiin sabaah khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun mugaabil Ariiha ligo Baasar madiina le luju al‑kaatil al‑gaaʼide fi l‑sahara fi l‑kadaade be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha,wa Yahaas be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Khadimuut be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Mifaʼat be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 4 mudun.
Wa min gabiilat Gaad anto Raamuut al‑fi Gilʼaad madiinat al‑luju le l‑kaatil be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Mahanaayim be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha
wa Hachbuun be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha wa Yaʼziir be bakaanaatha hana l‑sarha.Wa be l‑jumla 4 mudun.
Wa be l‑jumla adad al‑mudun al‑antoohum be amʼiyeedaat le l‑Laawiyiin min khachum beet Maraari 12 mudun.
Wa be l‑jumla adad al‑mudun al‑antoohum le l‑Laawiyiin fi lubb Bani Israaʼiil 48 mudun be bakaanaathum hana l‑sarha.
Wa ayyi waahide min al‑mudun dool indaha bakaanaat hana sarha.
Wa Allah anta Bani Israaʼiil kulla l‑balad al‑hu halaf le juduudhum wa gaal yantiiha leehum.Wa humman chaalooha wa gaʼado foogha.
Wa Allah antaahum al‑raaha min kulli jiihe hasab al‑haliife al‑halaf beeha le juduudhum.Wa min kulla udwaanhum,waahid kula ma gidir yihaaribhum wa be da,Allah sallam leehum kulla udwaanhum.
Wa min kulla kalaam al‑kheer al‑Allah gaalah le Bani Israaʼiil,ma fi kilme al‑ma alhaggagat.Kulla l‑kalaam da alhaggag leehum.
Wa khalaas,Yachuuʼ naada gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa nuss gabiilat Manassa
wa gaal leehum : Intu tabbagtu kulla l‑kalaam al‑amaraaku beyah Muusa abd Allah wa simiʼtu kulla kalaami al‑ana amartuku beyah.
Wa min wakit tawiil lahaddi l‑yoom,intu ma abeetu akhwaanku wa hafadtu wasaaya Allah Ilaahku.
Wa hassaʼ Allah Ilaahku anta al‑raaha le akhwaanku misil hu waaʼadaahum beeha.Wa hassaʼ tagdaro tamchu le khiyamku fi baladku al‑antaaha leeku Muusa abd Allah sabaah khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun.
Wa laakin fakkuru chadiid wa tabbugu al‑wasiiye wa l‑gaanuun al‑amaraaku beyah Muusa abd Allah.Hibbu Allah Ilaahku wa amchu adiil fi derbah wa tabbugu wasiiyaatah wa atmassako be Allah wa aʼabuduuh be kulla guluubku wa be kulla fikirku. 
Wa Yachuuʼ baarakaahum wa gaal leehum yamchu le khiyamhum wa humman macho.
Wa le nuss waahid min gabiilat Manassa,Muusa antaahum ard fi Baachaan sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun.Wa l‑nuss al‑aakhar,Yachuuʼ antaahum ard maʼa akhwaanhum kharib le bahar al‑Urdun.Wa wakit Yachuuʼ gaal leehum yamchu le khiyamhum,hu baarakaahum
wa gaal leehum : Amchu le khiyamku be l‑khuna al‑ligiituuha hana l‑bahaayim wa l‑fudda wa l‑dahab wa l‑nahaas wa l‑hadiid wa l‑lubaas al‑katiir.Gassumu maʼa akhwaanku al‑khaniime al‑ligiituuha min udwaanku. 
Wa be misil da,gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa nuss gabiilat Manassa gammo min bakaan Bani Israaʼiil fi Chiilooh fi balad Kanʼaan wa macho le balad Gilʼaad ard warasathum al‑Allah antaaha leehum be waasitat Muusa.
Wa wakit jo fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun fi balad Kanʼaan,gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa nuss gabiilat Manassa bano madbah jamb al‑bahar.Wa l‑madbah da binchaaf kabiir.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil simʼo be l‑khabar al‑buguul : Daahu gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa nuss gabiilat Manassa bano madbah fi balad Kanʼaan fi khachum bahar al‑Urdun wa da fi ard Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil simʼo al‑khabar da,tawwaali kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil lammo fi Chiilooh achaan yamchu yahjumuuhum.
Wa Laakin gubbaal ma yamchu,Bani Israaʼiil rassalo Fiinhaas wileed raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar le turaab Gilʼaad achaan yamchi yihajji le gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa nuss gabiilat Manassa.
Wa macho maʼaayah achara rujaal min kubaaraat aayilaat Bani Israaʼiil,ayyi waahid masʼuul fi aayiltah ambeen aayilaat Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa l‑naas dool jo le gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa nuss gabiilat Manassa fi turaab Gilʼaad wa gaalo leehum :
 Daahu kulla mujtamaʼ Allah buguulu leeku :‹ Maala sawweetu khiyaana misil di didd Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil ?Wa maala al‑yoom khalleetu derib Allah wa baneetu leeku madbah wa isiitu Allah ?
Wa l‑khata al‑sawweena fi Faʼuurma tamma leena walla ?Lahaddi al‑yoom ma tahharna nufuusna min al‑khata da,kan Allah nazal fi chaʼabah waba kula.
Wa chiifu !Al‑yoom,intu khalleetu derib Allah wa isiituuh.Wa ambaakir,hu yazʼal didd kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil !
Wa kan ard warasatku ma taahire,taʼaalu agoodu maʼaana fi ard warasatna al‑foogha kheemat Allah wa awrusuuha maʼaana sawa.Wa laakin ma tugummu didd Allah wa la diddina aniina wa tabnu leeku madbah aakhar bala madbah Allah Ilaahna !
Wakit Akaan wileed Zaarah isi wa chaal al‑khumaam al‑haraam,hu ma hilik wiheedah be sabab khataayah laakin khadab Allah wagaʼ fi kulla mujtamaʼ Bani Israaʼiil !› 
Wa gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa nuss gabiilat Manassa raddo le kubaaraat aayilaat Bani Israaʼiil wa gaalo :
 Allah hu bas Ilaah al‑Ilaahaat !Allah hu al‑Rabb !Allah yaʼarif al‑sahiih wa waajib Bani Israaʼiil kula yaʼarfuuh !Kan aniina gammeena didd Allah wa isiinaah,khalli ma tinajjuuna al‑yoom.
Wa kan baneena leena madbah le nikhallu derib Allah wa le nigaddumu foogah dahaaya muharragiin aw hadaaya hana dagiig aw dahaaya salaama,khalli Allah yiʼaakhibna !
La,aniina sawweena al‑cheyy da achaan nakhaafo yoom waahid iyaalku yuguulu le iyaalna :‹ Chunu alaakhitku intu be Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil ?
Allah khatta bahar al‑Urdun huduud ambeenna aniina wa intu gabaayil Raʼuubiin wa Gaad.Wa intu ma induku ayyi hagg fi Allah.› Wa be da,iyaalku yilizzu iyaalna achaan ma yakhaafo Allah.
Wa be sabab da bas,aniina chilna niiye nabnu madbah wa laakin wa la le dahaaya muharragiin wa la le dahaaya aakhariin.
Wa da yukuun chahaada ambeenna aniina wa intu wa zurriiyitna al‑yaju waraana kadar indina hagg naʼabudu Allah be gaddimiin dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya salaama.Wa be da,ambaakir iyaalku ma yuguulu le iyaalna :‹ Intu ma induku hagg taʼabudu Allah. ›
Wa aniina gulna ambeenaatna :‹ Kan ambaakir al‑kalaam da gaalooh leena walla le zurriiyitna,aniina nuguulu :“Chiifu hajim madbah Allah al‑banooh abbahaatna.Hu ma hana dahaaya muharragiin wa la hana dahaaya aakhariin wa laakin le yabga chahaada beenna aniina wa intu.” ›
Istakhfar Allah !Abadan ma nugummu didd Allah wa la khalleena derbah al‑yoom.Wa ma nabnu madbah hana dahaaya muharragiin wa hadaaya hana dagiig wa dahaaya aakhariin bala madbah Allah Ilaahna al‑gaaʼid giddaam kheemtah. 
Wa wakit raajil al‑diin Fiinhaas wa chuyuukh al‑mujtamaʼ wa kubaaraat aayilaat Bani Israaʼiil al‑macho maʼaayah simʼo al‑kalaam al‑gaalooh gabiilat Raʼuubiin wa gabiilat Gaad wa nuss gabiilat Manassa,humman khassado beyah.
Wa Fiinhaas wileed raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar gaal leehum : Al‑yoom aniina naʼarfu kadar Allah gaaʼid fi usutna achaan intu ma isiitu Allah.Wa be da,intu najjeetu Bani Israaʼiil min khadab Allah. 
Wa Fiinhaas wileed raajil al‑diin Aliʼaazar wa l‑kubaaraat gammo min gabaayil Raʼuubiin wa Gaad wa jo min turaab Gilʼaad le Bani Israaʼiil fi balad Kanʼaan.Wa kallamoohum be kulla cheyy al‑hasal.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil kula khassado wa chakaro al‑Rabb.Wa khallo minhum al‑harib wa l‑kharaab al‑awwal dawwaro yijiibu didd gabaayil Raʼuubiin wa Gaad.
Wa gabaayil Raʼuubiin wa Gaad gaalo : Al‑madbah da yachhad kadar Allah hu Ilaahna kullina ! Wa sammo al‑madbah da Chaahid.
Wa baʼad mudda tawiile,Allah anta al‑raaha le Bani Israaʼiil min kulla udwaanhum al‑mujaawiriinhum.Wa Yachuuʼ chayyab wa umrah bigi tawiil.
Wa hu naada kulla Bani Israaʼiil wa chuyuukhhum wa kubaaraathum wa gudiyaahum wa masaaʼiilhum wa gaal : Ana chayyabt wa umri bigi tawiil.
Wa intu zaatku chiftu kulla cheyy al‑sawwaah Allah Ilaahku didd al‑umam dool fi sababku.Achaan Allah Ilaahku,hu bas al‑haarab leeku.
Wa chiifu,ana anteetku ard warasatku be amʼiyeedaat hasab gabaayilku.Wa di ard al‑umam al‑ana dammartuhum wa ard al‑umam al‑lissaaʼhum gaaʼidiin.Wa l‑ard di tamchi min bahar al‑Urdun fi l‑sabaah lahaddi l‑bahar al‑Abyad fi l‑kharib.
Wa Allah Ilaahku,hu bas yatrud giddaamku al‑umam al‑lissaaʼhum gaaʼidiin achaan intu tichiilu baladhum misil hu waaʼadaaku beyah.
 Wa be da,abgo chudaad wa fakkuru achaan tisawwu ayyi cheyy hasab al‑wasaaya al‑maktuubiin fi Tawraat Muusa.Ma tibaaru minhum wa la isra wa la zeene.
Wa ma tilkhalbato maʼa l‑umam al‑lissaaʼhum jambuku wa la tifakkuru fi asaame ilaahaathum wa la tahalfu beehum wa la taʼabuduuhum wa la tasjudu leehum.
Wa waajib intu titmassako be Allah Ilaahku misil intu sawweetuuh min awwal lahaddi l‑yoom.
 Chiifu !Allah galaʼ giddaamku ard al‑umam al‑kubaar wa chudaad.Wa waahid minhum ma gidir yagiif giddaamku lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa naadum waahid minku yatrud alif naadum achaan Allah Ilaahku gaaʼid yihaarib leeku misil hu gaalah leeku.
Wa chiilu niiye achaan tihibbu Allah Ilaahku.
Wa laakin kan khalleetu derib Allah wa atmassaktu be l‑umam al‑lissaaʼhum jambuku wa kan akhadtu minhum wa alkhalbattu maʼaahum,
khalaas,aʼarfu kadar Allah Ilaahku battaan ma yaglaʼ ard al‑umam dool giddaamku.Wa humman yabgo leeku misil amkajjaama wa charak wa soot al‑yafruchku wa chook fi uyuunku,lahaddi kulluku tikammulu fi l‑ard al‑samhe di al‑antaaha leeku Allah Ilaahku.
 Wa daahu gariib numuut misil kulla makhluug fi l‑ard.Wa laakin waajib taʼarfu be kulla guluubku wa be kulla fikirku kadar kulla l‑kalaam al‑kheer al‑gaalah Allah Ilaahku fi chaanku,alhaggag.Kulla l‑kalaam da alhaggag leeku,ma fi kilme waahide kula al‑ma alhaggagat.
Wa laakin angarʼu !Al‑kalaam al‑kheer al‑gaalah Allah Ilaahku alhaggag.Wa misil da,al‑kalaam al‑cheen al‑gaalah didduku kula yilhaggag lahaddi kulluku tikammulu fi l‑ard al‑samhe di,al‑antaaha leeku Allah Ilaahku.
Wa kan nagadtu muʼaahadat Allah Ilaahku al‑hu amaraaku beeha wa kan abadtu ilaahaat aakhariin wa sajadtu giddaamhum,khalaas khadab Allah yanzil foogku wa tawwaali tikammulu fi l‑balad al‑adiile al‑hu antaaha leeku. 
Wa Yachuuʼ lamma kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil fi Chakiim wa naada chuyuukhhum wa kubaaraathum wa gudiyaahum wa masaaʼiilhum wa humman jo giddaam al‑Rabb.
Wa Yachuuʼ gaal le kulla l‑chaʼab : Daahu Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil gaal :‹ Zamaan,juduudku sakano khaadi le bahar al‑Furaat wa abado ilaahaat aakhariin.Wa Taarah abu Ibraahiim wa Naahuur kula ambeenaathum.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,ana chilt abuuku Ibraahiim min khaadi le bahar al‑Furaat wa jibtah fi balad Kanʼaan.Wa ana kattart zurriiytah wa anteetah wileedah Ishaakh.
Wa le Ishaakh,ana anteetah awlaadah Yaakhuub wa Isuu.Wa anteetah le Isuu balad jibaal Saʼiir le yichiilha wa Yaakhuub wa iyaalah kamaan macho ale balad Masir.
 ‹ Wa baʼad da,ana rassalt Muusa wa Haaruun wa darabt balad Masir be l‑waba al‑nazzaltah fooghawa khalaas,maragtuku minha.
Wa ana maragt juduudku min Masir wa jo lahaddi l‑bahar al‑Ahmar.Wa laakin al‑Masriyiin tarado juduudku be arabaat harib wa siyaad kheel lahaddi l‑bahar da.
Wa wakit juduudku sarakho leyi,ana Allah khatteet dalaam beenhum wa been al‑Masriyiin.Wa baʼad da,chilt al‑bahar wa khatteet beyah al‑Masriyiin.Wa intu chiftuuh be uyuunku al‑cheyy al‑ana sawweetah le l‑Masriyiin. ‹ Wa baʼad da,intu gaʼadtu fi l‑sahara le mudda tawiile.
Wa ana waddeetku le balad al‑Amuuriyiin al‑saakniin sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun.Wa humman haarabooku wa laakin ana hazamtuhum wa dammartuhum giddaamku wa intu chiltu baladhum.
Wa Balaakh wileed Siffuur malik Muwaab gamma le yihaarib Bani Israaʼiil wa rassal le Balʼaam wileed Baʼuur achaan yaji yalʼanku.
Wa laakin ana ma simiʼt kalaam Balʼaam wa fi l‑akhiir,hu baarakaaku be baraka kabiire.Wa ana najjeetku min iid Balaakh malik Muwaab.
 ‹ Wa gataʼtu bahar al‑Urdun wa wassaltu Ariiha.Wa sukkaanha gammo haarabooku wa maʼaahum al‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Girgaachiyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin.Wa laakin ana sallamtuhum leeku fi iideeku.
Wa rassalt ruʼub chadiid le natrud min giddaamku al‑muluuk al‑itneen hana l‑Amuuriyiin wa da ma be suyuufku wa la be nachaachiibku !
Wa ana anteetku balad al‑ma tiʼibtu foogha wa anteetku mudun al‑intu ma baneetuuhum wa hassaʼ gaaʼidiin taskunu fooghum.Wa anteetku ziraaʼa hana inab wa zaytuun al‑ma teerabtuuh wa hassaʼ gaaʼidiin taakulu minnah.› 
Wa Yachuuʼ gaal battaan : Hassaʼ,akhaafo Allah wa aʼabuduuh be sahiih wa amaan.Wa baʼʼudu minku kulla l‑asnaam al‑juduudku abadoohum khaadi le bahar al‑Furaat wa fi Masir wa aʼabudu Allah.
Wa laakin kan ma tidooru taʼabudu Allah,aʼazulu al‑yoom al‑ilaah al‑tidooru taʼabuduuh.Mumkin tichiilu ilaahaat al‑abadoohum juduudku khaadi le bahar al‑Furaat,walla tichiilu ilaahaat al‑Amuuriyiin min al‑balad al‑intu saakniin foogha.Wa laakin ana wa aayilti kamaan,aniina naʼabudu Allah ! 
Wa l‑chaʼab raddo leyah wa gaalo : La,abadan !Ma naabo Allah le naʼabudu ilaahaat aakhariin !
Achaan Allah Ilaahna,hu bas al‑maragaana aniina wa abbahaatna min Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye wa sawwa al‑ajaayib al‑kubaar dool giddaamna.Wa hafadaana fi tuul al‑derib al‑macheena foogah wa fi ust kulla l‑chuʼuub al‑chaggeenaahum.
Wa Allah tarad giddaamna al‑Amuuriyiin wa kulla l‑chuʼuub al‑aakhariin al‑sakano fi l‑balad di.Wa fi chaan da,aniina kula naʼabudu Allah achaan hu bas Ilaahna. 
Wa Yachuuʼ gaal le l‑chaʼab : Intu ma tagdaro taʼabudu Allah achaan hu al‑Ilaah al‑Khudduus wa hu al‑Ilaah al‑Khayyuur,ma yahmal isyaanku wa zunuubku.
Wa wakit taabo Allah wa taʼabudu ilaahaat aakhariin,hu yugumm didduku wa yiʼaakhibku wa yikammilku baʼad hu sawwa leeku kulla l‑kheer da. 
Wa l‑chaʼab gaalo le Yachuuʼ : La,naʼabudu Allah bas. 
Wa Yachuuʼ gaal le l‑chaʼab : Intu zaatku chuhuud fi nufuusku kadar azaltu Allah wa taʼabuduuh. Wa humman gaalo : Aywa,aniina chuhuud. 
Wa Yachuuʼ gaal : Kan ke da khalaas,baʼʼudu al‑ilaahaat al‑ajnabiyiin min usutku wa khuttu guluubku fi Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa l‑chaʼab gaalo le Yachuuʼ : Aniina naʼabudu Allah Ilaahna bas wa nasmaʼo kalaamah. 
Wa khalaas fi l‑yoom da fi Chakiim,Yachuuʼ sawwa muʼaahada been al‑chaʼab wa Allah wa sawwa leehum gawaaniin wa churuut.
Wa Yachuuʼ katab al‑kalaam da fi kitaab Tawraat Allah.Wa chaal hajar kabiir wa khazzaah fi l‑bakaan da,tihit al‑chadara al‑kabiire al‑gaaʼide jamb al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas hana Allah.
Wa gaal le kulla l‑chaʼab : Daahu al‑hajar yukuun chaahid foogna achaan hu simiʼ kulla kalaam Allah wakit kallam maʼaana.Wa l‑hajar da yachhad foogku achaan ma tankuru Ilaahku. 
Wa khalaas,Yachuuʼ gaal le l‑chaʼab khalli ayyi waahid yamchi le ard warasatah.
Wa baʼad da,Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun abd Allah maat fi umur hana 110 sana.
Wa dafanooh fi ard warasatah fi Timna Saarah fi jibaal Afraayim munchaakh le jabal Gaʼach.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil abado Allah fi kulla muddit ayyaam Yachuuʼ.Wa baʼad mootah,abado Allah fi kulla muddit ayyaam al‑chuyuukh al‑chaafo kulla l‑aʼmaal al‑sawwaahum Allah fi chaan Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa kan le udaam Yuusuf al‑chaaloohum Bani Israaʼiil min balad Masir,humman dafanoohum fi Chakiim fi l‑zereʼ al‑charaah Yaakhuub be 100 hajar fudda min awlaad Hamuur abu Chakiim.Wa da kula bigi warasa le zurriiyit Yuusuf.
Wa Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun kula maat wa dafanooh fi l‑jabal al‑anto le wileedah Fiinhaas fi jibaal Afraayim.
Wa baʼad moot Yachuuʼ,Bani Israaʼiil saʼalo Allah wa gaalo : Yaatu minnina yugumm awwal yahjim al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa yihaaribhum ? 
Wa Allah gaal : Gabiilat Yahuuza bas yahjumuuhum achaan ana khalaas anteethum al‑balad di fi iideehum. 
Wa gabiilat Yahuuza gaalo le akhwaanhum gabiilat Chimʼuun : Yalla !Taʼaalu maʼaana le ardina al‑gassamooha leena wa nihaarubu al‑Kanʼaaniyiin sawa.Wa baʼadeen,aniina kula namchu maʼaaku le nichiilu arduku. Wa khalaas,gabiilat Chimʼuun macho maʼaahum.
Wa gabiilat Yahuuza hajamo udwaanhum wa Allah sallam leehum fi iideehum al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin.Wa fi hillit Baazakh,humman katalo minhum 10 000 raajil.
Wa hinaak humman ligo al‑malik Aduuni Baazakh wa haarabooh wa annasaro fi l‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin.
Wa Aduuni Baazakh arrad wa laakin humman taabaʼooh wa karabooh wa gattaʼo asaabʼah al‑kubaar hana iideenah wa rijileenah.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Aduuni Baazakh gaal : 70 malik ana gattaʼt asaabiʼhum al‑kubaar hana iideehum wa rijleehum wa humman laggato al‑akil al‑mudaffig fi bakaan dabalaayti.Al‑cheyy al‑ana sawweetah bas,al‑Rabb gabbalah leyi. Wa humman chaalooh wa waddooh fi madiinat Uruchaliim wa maat hinaak.
Wa gabiilat Yahuuza hajamo madiinat Uruchaliim wa chaalooha wa katalo kulla sukkaanha be l‑seef wa harragooha.
Wa baʼad da,gabiilat Yahuuza macho achaan yihaarubu al‑Kanʼaaniyiin al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑jibaal wa fi saharat Nagab wa fi sahalat Chafiila.
Gabiilat Yahuuza gammo didd al‑Kanʼaaniyiin al‑gaaʼidiin fi Hibruun al‑awwal usumha Kharyat Arbaʼa.Wa hinaak,humman hazamo khuchuum buyuut Chiichaay wa Akhimaan wa Talmaay.
Wa min al‑bakaan da,gabiilat Yahuuza gammo didd sukkaan Dabiir al‑awwal usumha Kharyat Siifar.
Wa Kaalib gaal : Al‑naadum al‑hajam Kharyat Siifar wa chaalha,ana nantiih bineeyti Aksa yaakhudha. 
Wa Utniyiil wileed Khinaaz tariidah le Kaalib,hajam Kharyat Siifar wa chaalha.Wa Kaalib antaah bineeytah Aksa le yaakhudha.
Wa laakin min jaat leyah,hi harrachatah wa gaalat : Asʼal abuuyi yantiik zereʼ. Wa baʼad hi addallat min humaarha,Kaalib gaal leeha : Tidoori chunu ? 
Wa hi raddat leyah wa gaalat : Hassaʼ da,baarikni.Inta anteetni turaab fi saharat Nagab wa hassaʼ antiini uyuun almi kula. Wa hu antaaha uyuun almi al‑foog wa l‑tihit kula.
Wa zurriiyit Khiini nasiib Muusa marago min madiinat al‑Nakhal wa macho maʼa gabiilat Yahuuza fi kadaadit Yahuuza ale junuub Araad.Wa humman sakano maʼa l‑chaʼab hinaak.
Wa baʼad da,gabiilat Yahuuza gammo macho maʼa akhwaanhum gabiilat Chimʼuun le yichiilu arduhum.Wa haarabo al‑Kanʼaaniyiin al‑saakniin fi Safat wa dammaro al‑hille di wa sammooha Hurma (maʼanaatah al‑damaar).
Wa gabiilat Yahuuza chaalo mudun Khazza wa Achgaluun wa Akhruun be kula turaabhum.
Wa Allah saaʼad gabiilat Yahuuza wa humman chaalo manaatig hana l‑jibaal.Wa laakin ma gidro yichiilu balad sukkaan al‑sahale achaan al‑sukkaan dool induhum arabaat hana hadiid le l‑harib.
Wa hasab kalaam Muusa,hillit Hibruun antooha le Kaalib wa hu bas chaalha min al‑talaata khuchuum buyuut hana Bani Anakh.
Wa kan le l‑Yabuusiyiin al‑saakniin fi Uruchaliim,gabiilat Banyaamiin ma chaalo minhum arduhum.Wa l‑Yabuusiyiin saakniin maʼa gabiilat Banyaamiin fi Uruchaliim lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa zurriiyit Yuusuf gammo didd hillit Beet Iil wa Allah kaan maʼaahum.
Wa zurriiyit Yuusuf rassalo naas achaan yuruukhu Beet Iil al‑awwal usumha Luuz.
Wa l‑rawwaakhiin dool wakit jo fi l‑hille,ligo raajil maarig minha.Wa humman gaalo leyah : Wassif leena madkhal al‑hille wa aniina nisawwu leek al‑kheer. 
Wa hu wassaf leehum min ween yadkhulu al‑hille.Wa humman dakhalo wa katalo kulla sukkaanha be l‑seef.Wa laakin le l‑raajil al‑wassaf leehum al‑derib,khallooh hu wa kulla aayiltah yamchu be salaam.
Wa l‑raajil da macha fi balad al‑Hittiyiin wa bana leyah hille wa sammaaha Luuz.Wa da usumha lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa gabiilat Manassa ma chaalo ard sukkaan Beet Chaan wa Taʼnak wa Duur wa Yiblaʼaam wa Magiddu wa hillaalhum al‑taabʼiin leehum.Wa be da,al‑Kanʼaaniyiin gaaʼidiin yaskunu fi l‑balad di.
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil ligo gudra,gammo abbadoohum le l‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa laakin ma chaalo minhum arduhum.
Wa gabiilat Afraayim ma chaalo ard al‑Kanʼaaniyiin al‑saakniin fi Gaazar.Wa be da,al‑Kanʼaaniyiin sakano fi usut gabiilat Afraayim.
Wa gabiilat Zabuluun ma chaalo ard al‑Kanʼaaniyiin al‑saakniin fi Khitruun wa fi Nahlaal.Wa be da,al‑Kanʼaaniyiin sakano fi usut gabiilat Zabuluun laakin gabiilat Zabuluun gammo abbadoohum.
Wa gabiilat Achiir ma chaalo ard sukkaan Akku wa Seeda wa Ahlab wa Akziib wa Halba wa Afiikh wa Rahuub.
Wa gabiilat Achiir sakano fi ust al‑Kanʼaaniyiin al‑saakniin fi l‑balad achaan ma chaalo minhum arduhum.
Wa gabiilat Naftaali ma chaalo ard al‑Kanʼaaniyiin al‑saakniin fi Beet Chams wa Beet Anaat.Wa be da,humman sakano fi ust al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa laakin gabiilat Naftaali gammo abbadoohum le sukkaan al‑hillaal al‑tineen dool.
Wa l‑Amuuriyiin gammo haasaroohum le gabiilat Daan fi l‑jibaal wa daharoohum ma yanzulu fi l‑wudyaan.
Wa be da,al‑Amuuriyiin gaaʼidiin saakniin fi jabal Haaras wa Ayyaluun wa Chaʼalbiim wa laakin wakit zurriiyit Yuusuf ligo gudra,abbadoohum.
Wa huduud balad al‑Amuuriyiin yamchu min giizaan al‑Agaarib wa lahaddi khaadi le Saalaʼ.
Wa malak Allah gamma min Gilgaal wa macha le Bukiim.Wa gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Ana maragtuku min balad Masir wa waddeetku fi l‑balad al‑ana halaft le juduudku wa gult nantiiha leehum.Wa ana gult :‹ Abadan ma nangud muʼaahadati maʼaaku.
Wa intu kula ma tisawwu muʼaahada maʼa sukkaan al‑balad di.Wa haddumu madaabihhum.› Wa laakin intu ma simiʼtu kalaami.Wa maala sawweetu misil da ?
Wa khalaas,ana nuguul :‹ Ma natrud sukkaan al‑balad di min giddaamku.Wa humman yabgo leeku misil amkajjaama wa ilaahaathum yabgo leeku charak.› 
Wa laakin wakit malak Allah gaal al‑kalaam da le kulla Bani Israaʼiil,tawwaali al‑chaʼab gammo yikooruku wa yabku.
Wa humman sammo al‑bakaan da Bukiim (maʼanaatah al‑bakkaayiin) wa gaddamo dahaaya le Allah.
Wa Yachuuʼ gaal le l‑chaʼab yamchu.Wa ayyi waahid min Bani Israaʼiil macha le yichiil ard warasatah.Wa be da,chaalo al‑balad.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil abado Allah fi kulla muddit ayyaam Yachuuʼ.Wa baʼad mootah,abado Allah fi kulla muddit ayyaam al‑chuyuukh al‑chaafo kulla l‑aʼmaal al‑sawwaahum Allah fi chaan Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Yachuuʼ wileed Nuun abd Allah,maat fi umur hana 110 sana.
Wa dafanooh fi ard warasatah fi Timna Haaras fi jibaal Afraayim munchaakh le jabal Gaʼach.
Wa baʼad kulla l‑zurriiye di maatat wa lihgat abbahaatha,zurriiye aakhara gammat baʼadha wa laakin al‑zurriiye di ma irfat Allah wa la l‑aʼmaal al‑sawwaahum le Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil sawwo al‑fasaala giddaam Allah wa abado asnaam Baʼal.
Wa humman abo Allah Rabb juduudhum al‑maragaahum min balad Masir.Wa taabaʼo leehum ilaahaat aakhariin min ilaahaat al‑chuʼuub al‑mujaawiriinhum wa sajado giddaamhum.Wa be da,khaddabo Allah.
Wa humman abo Allah wa abado asnaam Baʼal wa Achtaruut.
Wa khadab Allah nazal fi Bani Israaʼiil wa hu sallamaahum le l‑nahhaabiin wa nahaboohum.Hu sallamaahum le udwaanhum al‑mujaawiriinhum wa ma gidro yagiifu giddaamhum.
Wa fi kulli wakit kan yamurgu le l‑harib,Allah yijiib fooghum al‑fasaala wa da misil Allah gaalah wa misil hu halaf leehum beyah.Wa be da,al‑mudaayaga bigat chadiide.
Wa khalaas,Allah khatta leehum hukkaam achaan yinajjuuhum min al‑naas al‑yanhaboohum.
Wa laakin al‑chaʼab abo ma yasmaʼo kalaam hukkaamhum wa achcharmato maʼa ilaahaat aakhariin wa abadoohum.Wa ajala ke bas,humman abo derib juduudhum al‑simʼo wasaaya Allah wa ma sawwo misilhum.
Wa wakit Allah khatta leehum al‑hukkaam,hu kaan maʼa ayyi haakim.Wa fi kulla muddit hayaatah,Allah yinajjiihum le Bani Israaʼiil min udwaanhum.Wakit gaaʼidiin yaguntu min al‑naas al‑yazulmuuhum wa yitaʼʼubuuhum,Allah hanna fooghum.
Wa laakin baʼad moot al‑haakim,al‑chaʼab yigabbulu fi zunuubhum wa yitallufu ziyaada min juduudhum achaan humman yitaabuʼu ilaahaat aakhariin wa yaʼabuduuhum wa yasjudu giddaamhum.Wa humman gawwo raashum wa abadan ma khayyaro amalhum.
Wa Allah khidib khadab chadiid didd Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal : Al‑umma di nagadat al‑muʼaahada al‑ana sawweetha maʼa juduudhum wa ma simʼo kalaami.
Wa ana kula battaan ma naglaʼ giddaamhum ard hana ayyi naadum min al‑umam al‑Yachuuʼ khallaahum fi l‑balad gabul ma yumuut.
Wa be l‑umam dool,nijarrib Bani Israaʼiil wa nichiif kan yakurbu derbi ana Allah al‑macho foogah juduudhum. 
Wa achaan da,Allah khalla fi l‑balad di kulla l‑umam al‑ma sallamaahum le Yachuuʼ.Wa ma galaʼ minhum arduhum ajala.
Wa dool al‑umam al‑khallaahum Allah yagoodu wa beehum yijarrib kulla naas Bani Israaʼiil al‑ma hidro wakit haarabo le yichiilu balad Kanʼaan.
Wa hu sawwa misil ke le yiʼallim al‑harib le l‑zurriiyit al‑jadiide hana Bani Israaʼiil achaan awwal humman ma haarabo.
Daahu al‑umam al‑Allah khallaahum fi l‑balad.Humman khamsa kubaaraat hana l‑Filistiyiin wa kulla l‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Seeduuniyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin al‑saakniin fi jibaal Lubnaan min jabal Baʼal Harmuun lahaddi Labu Hamaat.
Wa be l‑umam dool,Allah yijarrib Bani Israaʼiil le yaʼarif kan humman yasmaʼo wasiiyaatah al‑amar beehum juduudhum be waasitat Muusa.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil sakano fi ust al‑Kanʼaaniyiin wa l‑Hittiyiin wa l‑Amuuriyiin wa l‑Firizziyiin wa l‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Yabuusiyiin.
Bani Israaʼiil akhado banaat al‑umam dool wa anto banaathum al‑halaalhum le awlaadhum.Wa abado ilaahaathum kula.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil sawwo al‑fasaala giddaam Allah.Humman niso Allah ilaahhum wa abado asnaam Baʼal wa Achiira.
Wa Allah khidib khadab chadiid didd Bani Israaʼiil wa sallamaahum le Kuuchan Richaʼtaayim malik Araam been al‑Nahreen.Wa Bani Israaʼiil khadamo abiid le Kuuchan Richaʼtaayim le muddit tamaane sana.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil koorako le Allah wa dawwaro al‑fazaʼ wa Allah rassal leehum munajji.Wa hu Utniyiil wileed Khinaaz tariidah le Kaalib.
Wa Ruuh Allah nazal fi Utniyiil wa hu hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil.Wa hu macha haarab Kuuchan Richaʼtaayim malik balad Araam wa Allah nasarah.
Wa l‑balad gaaʼide fi raaha le muddit 40 sana wa baʼad da,Utniyiil wileed Khinaaz maat.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gammo battaan sawwo al‑fasaala giddaam Allah.Wa fi chaan da,Allah anta gudra le Agluun malik Muwaab le yugumm didduhum.
Wa Agluun lamma maʼa Bani Ammuun wa l‑Amaalikh wa haarab Bani Israaʼiil.Wa annasar fooghum wa chaal minhum Ariiha madiinat al‑Nakhal.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil khadamo abiid le Agluun malik Muwaab le muddit 18 sana.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil koorako le Allah wa Allah rassal leehum munajji.Wa hu Ihuud al‑israay,wileed Giira min gabiilat Banyaamiin.Wa Bani Israaʼiil rassalo Ihuud yiwaddi hadaaya le Agluun malik Muwaab.
Wa Ihuud sawwa le nafsah seef tuulah duraaʼ wa tarragah jaay wa jaay wa rabatah fi daarijtah al‑zeene be daakhal le khalagah.
Wa wadda al‑hadaaya dool le Agluun malik Muwaab.Wa Agluun hu samiin marra waahid.
Wa wakit anta al‑hadaaya khalaas,Ihuud faat maʼa naasah al‑jaabo al‑hadaaya.
Wa wakit wassalo bakaan al‑asnaam gariib le hillit Gilgaal,Ihuud gabbal le l‑malik wa gaal : Ya l‑malik,indi leek kalaam sirr. Wa l‑malik amar kulla khaddaamiinah yamchu wa humman marago min giddaamah.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,al‑malik gaaʼid fi khurfitah al‑baarde al‑jahhazooha leyah foog.Wa Ihuud macha gariib leyah wa gaal : Indi kalaam min al‑Rabb nidoor nuguulah leek. Wa khalaas,al‑malik gamma min kursiih.
Wa tawwaali be iidah al‑isra,Ihuud salla al‑seef min daarijtah al‑zeene wa taʼanah le l‑malik fi batnah.
Salaʼat al‑seef kula dakhalat fi batnah wa khalaas al‑chaham sadda foogah achaan Ihuud ma salla al‑seef min batun al‑malik.Wa khalaas,Ihuud marag min wara.
Wa gubbaal ma yufuut,hu sadda biibaan al‑khurfa wa gaffalaahum.
Wa baʼad hu marag,khaddaamiin al‑malik jo wa ligo biibaan al‑khurfa al‑foog mugaffaliin wa gaalo : Akiid al‑malik gaaʼid yagdi haajtah fi l‑khurfa al‑baarde. 
Wa humman arrajjooh wakit tawiil wa laakin hu ma fatah leehum biibaan khurfitah.Wa baʼad da,humman chaalo al‑muftaah wa fataho al‑baab wa ligo siidhum waagiʼ fi l‑turaab wa mayyit.
Wa wakit humman gaaʼidiin yarjo da,Ihuud anbalas wa faat khaadi le bakaan al‑asnaam wa arrad ale Saʼiira.
Wa wakit wisil hinaak,darab al‑buug fi jibaal Afraayim.Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil nazalo maʼaayah min al‑jibaal wa hu maachi giddaamhum.
Wa gaal leehum : Taabuʼuuni achaan Allah sallam leeku udwaanku al‑Muwaabiyiin fi iideeku. Wa humman nazalo waraayah wa chaalo al‑maʼadd hana bahar al‑Urdun min al‑Muwaabiyiin wa ma khallo naadum waahid kula yuchugg al‑bahar da.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,katalo min al‑Muwaabiyiin gariib 10 000 raajil,kulluhum induhum gudra wa fahaliin.Wa naadum waahid kula minhum ma niji.
Wa min al‑yoom da,al‑Muwaabiyiin gaʼado tihit hukum Bani Israaʼiil wa l‑balad gaaʼide fi raaha le muddit 80 sana.
Wa baʼad Ihuud,hakam Chamgar wileed Anaat.Wa Chamgar da katal 600 raajil min al‑Filistiyiin be kookaab hana garin toor wa hu kula najja Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa baʼad Ihuud maat,Bani Israaʼiil gammo battaan sawwo al‑fasaala giddaam Allah.
Wa Allah sallamaahum le Yaabiin malik Kanʼaan al‑haakim fi madiinat Haasuur.Wa khaayid deechah usmah Siisra wa Siisra da saakin fi Haruuchat Guuyim.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil sarakho le Allah achaan Siisra indah 900 araba hint hadiid wa hu zalamhum le Bani Israaʼiil zulum chadiid le muddit 20 sana.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,Dabuura al‑nabiiye gaaʼide tahkim fi Bani Israaʼiil.Wa raajilha usmah Lafiiduut.
Wa hi sakanat tihit nakhal al‑binaaduuh Dabuura ambeen hillit al‑Raama wa hillit Beet Iil fi jibaal Afraayim.Wa Bani Israaʼiil yamchu leeha wa hi tisawwi leehum chariiʼa ambeenaathum.
Wa yoom waahid,hi rassalat naadat Baaraakh wileed Abinuuʼam min Khadach turaab Naftaali wa gaalat leyah : Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil amarak be l‑kalaam da :‹ Yalla gumm amchi le jabal Taabuur wa chiil maʼaak 10 000 raajil min gabaayil Naftaali wa Zabuluun.
Wa ana nilizz Siisra khaayid deech Yaabiin le yihaaribku hu wa kulla askarah wa arabaatah hana l‑harib wa nijiibhum fi waadi Khiichuun.Wa nisallimhum leek fi iideenak.› 
Wa Baaraakh gaal le Dabuura : Kan tamchi maʼaayi,namchi.Wa laakin kan ma tamchi maʼaayi,ana ma namchi. 
Wa hi gaalat leyah : Khalaas ana namchi maʼaak.Wa laakin fi l‑tariig al‑tamchi foogah,al‑charaf ma yukuun leek inta achaan Allah yisallim Siisra fi iideen hana mara bas. Wa khalaas,Dabuura gammat machat le Baaraakh fi Khadach.
Wa fi Khadach,Baaraakh naada rujaal gabaayil Zabuluun wa Naftaali wa humman macho maʼaayah wa adadhum 10 000 raajil.Wa Dabuura kula machat maʼaahum.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,Haabar al‑Khiini anfarag min al‑Khiiniyiin al‑aakhariin al‑min iyaal Hubaab nasiib Muusa.Wa bana kheemtah jamb al‑chadara al‑kabiire hana Saʼnaniim gariib le Khadach.
Wa jo khabbarooh le Siisra kadar Baaraakh wileed Abinuuʼam wa deechah talaʼo fi jabal Taabuur.
Wa khalaas Siisra lamma kulla arabaatah hana l‑hadiid al‑adadhum 900 wa kulla deechah.Wa gamma min Haruuchat Guuyim wa macha le waadi Khiichuun.
Wa Dabuura gaalat le Baaraakh : Yalla gumm !Al‑yoom bas Allah yisallim leek Siisra fi iideenak.Aywa,Allah macha giddaamak. Wa khalaas,Baaraakh nazal min jabal Taabuur wa maʼaayah 10 000 raajil.
Wa Allah hazam Siisra be arabaatah wa askarah giddaam Baaraakh wa deechah.Wa Siisra addalla min arabatah wa arrad be rijileenah.
Wa Baaraakh taabaʼ al‑arabaat wa l‑askar lahaddi Haruuchat Guuyim.Wa kulla askar Siisra kataloohum be l‑seef wa waahid kula minhum ma faddal.
Wa laakin Siisra arrad be rijileenah lahaddi kheemat Yaaʼil marit Haabar al‑Khiini achaan fi salaam ambeen Yaabiin malik Haasuur wa aayilat Haabar al‑Khiini.
Wa Yaaʼil maragat laagat Siisra wa gaalat leyah : Taʼaal adkhul hini fi bakaani,ya sayyidi.Wa ma takhaaf. Wa hu dakhal fi kheemitha wa hi khattatah be khattaay wa labbadatah.
Wa hu gaal leeha : Ana atchaan.Min fadulki,antiini almi chiyya nachrab. Wa Yaaʼil chaalat bukhsa malaane laban wa antatah chirib minha.Wa baʼad da,khattatah battaan be l‑khattaay.
Wa hu gaal leeha : Agoodi fi madkhal al‑kheema.Akuun naadum yasʼalki wa yuguul :‹ Fi naadum hini walla ?› Khalaas,guuli leyah :‹ La !Ma fiih.› 
Wa laakin wakit Siisra naayim min al‑aya,Yaaʼil marit Haabar chaalat witid min wutaad al‑kheema wa mitraga wa dakhalat bicheech jambah.Wa hi taʼanatah be l‑witid fi raasah lahaddi al‑witid andafan fi l‑turaab.Wa be da,Siisra maat.
Wa wakit Baaraakh chaayil derib Siisra ja,Yaaʼil maragat leyah laagatah wa gaalat : Taʼaal,niwassifak al‑raajil al‑inta gaaʼid tifattichah. Wa wakit dakhal fi beetha,hu ligi Siisra waagiʼ mayyit wa l‑witid fi raasah.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,al‑Rabb hazam Yaabiin malik Kanʼaan giddaam Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa gudrat Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼide tiziid didd Yaabiin malik Kanʼaan lahaddi katalooh.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,Dabuura wa Baaraakh wileed Abinuuʼam khanno wa gaalo :
 Fi Israaʼiil,ayyi raajil jaahiz le l‑haribwa l‑chaʼab yamchu le l‑harib be niiye waahide.Baarak Allah !
 Asmaʼo,ya l‑muluuk,wa aftaho adaanku,ya l‑salaatiin.Ana nikhanni le Allahwa le Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil ana nahmudah.
Ya Allah,wakit inta maragt min Saʼiirwa wakit inta jiit min balad Adoom,al‑ard rajafatwa min al‑sama,almi sabba chadiidwa l‑sahaab nazzal matar.
Al‑jibaal maaʼo misil al‑almigiddaam Allahaywa,jabal Siinaaʼ maaʼgiddaam Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil.
 Fi ayyaam Chamgar wileed Anaatwa fi ayyaam Yaaʼil,naas katiir khallo al‑duruubwa l‑musaafiriin yamchu be dabaali uwuj.
Sukkaan al‑hillaal khallo hillaalhumaywa,khallo hillaalhumlahaddi ana Dabuura jiitwa bigiit misil amm le Bani Israaʼiil.
Humman chaalo leehum ilaahaat aakhariin,wakit al‑harib garrab le madaakhil al‑hillaal.Fi l‑wakit da,bigi leena gaasile nalgo daraga aw harbale deech Israaʼiilal‑adadhum 40 000 raajil.
Wa galbi maʼa khuyyaad Israaʼiilwa maʼa l‑chaʼabal‑yihaarubu be niiye waahide.Baarak Allah !
 Intu al‑raakbiin fi hamiir buyudwa intu al‑jaalsiin fi busaataatwa intu al‑maachiin fi l‑duruub,fakkuru adiil !
Wa l‑yusubbu almi fi l‑hiitaankhanno be amal adaalit Allah.Wa da l‑nasur al‑antaah Allahle khuyyaad Israaʼiilwakit chaʼab Allah nazalofi biibaan al‑madiina.
 Yalla gummi !Yalla gummi,ya Dabuura.Yalla gummi !Yalla gummi wa khanni.Yalla gumm,ya Baaraakh wileed Abinuuʼam !Wa jiib masaajiinak.
 Khalaas al‑faddalo hayyiinnazalo ale l‑kubaaraatwa chaʼab Allah gammo fi chaanimisil al‑furraas.
Al‑dammaro al‑Amaalikhmarago min gabiilat Afraayimwa maʼaahum gabiilat Banyaamiin maʼa askarhum.Wa min khachum beet Makiirmarago al‑khuyyaadwa min gabiilat Zabuluunmarago kubaaraat al‑askar.
Wa kubaaraat gabiilat Yassaakarandammo le Dabuurawa rujaal Yassaakar taabaʼo Baaraakhwa macho waraayah fi l‑waadi.Wa laakin ambeenaat khuchuum buyuut Raʼuubiingammo machaakil bala hadd.
Wa maala intu gaʼadtu jamb al‑zaraayible tasmaʼo baki al‑bahaayimwa tasmaʼ baki al‑maal ?Wa ambeenaat khuchuum buyuut Raʼuubiingammo machaakil bala hadd.
Wa naas Gilʼaadgaʼado fi arduhum sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun.Wa maala gabiilat Daangaʼadat jamb sufunha ?Wa gabiilat Achiirgaʼadat fi khachum al‑baharwa ma gammat min bakaanha foogah.
Wa laakin gabiilat Zabuluundasso nufuushum fi l‑khutuurawa gabiilat Naftaalikhaataro be hayaathum fi bakaan al‑harib.
 Wa jo muluuk wa haarabo.Khalaas,muluuk Kanʼaan kula haarabo.Fi Taʼnak gariib le almi Magiddu,ma ligo khaniime hana fudda.
Wa min al‑sama,al‑nujuum chaarako fi l‑haribwa min bakaanhum al‑baʼiid,haarabo Siisra.
Wa waadi Khiichuun chaalaahum,hu al‑waadi al‑gadiim,waadi Khiichuun.Amchi,ya nafsi,be gudra !
 Harakat rijle al‑kheel ansamaʼatwakit gaaʼidiin yajru,yajru misil kheel al‑sabag.
Wa malak Allah gaal :‹ Alʼano hillit Miruuzwa alʼano sukkaanha laʼana chadiide.Achaan humman ma jo haarabo le Allahwa ma jo fazaʼo al‑furraas. ›
 Ya Yaaʼil,marit Haabar al‑Khiini,Allah yibaarikki min kulla l‑awiin.Aywa,khalli Allah yibaarikki,min kulla l‑awiin al‑saaknaat fi l‑khiyam.
Wakit Siisra saʼalha almi,hi antatah labanwa antatah zibde fi kaas al‑furraas.
Wa hi chaalat witid al‑kheemabe iidha al‑israwa be iidha al‑zeene,chaalat mitragat al‑khaddaam.Wa hi darabat Siisrawa rihkat raasahwa taʼanatah fi raasah.
Giddaamha,hu barakwa wagaʼ giddaamha wa ragad.Wa l‑bakaan al‑wagaʼ foogah,da bas maat foogah.
 Min al‑chubbaak,amm Siisra gaaʼide tichiifwa min al‑chubbaak,hi tuguul :‹ Maala arabaatah hana l‑harib ma jo ?Maala arabat wileedi hana l‑harib akhkharat ? ›
Wa l‑indihin hikma min awiin al‑kubaaraatyikalliman leehawa hi tiraddid fi nafisha kalaamhinwa tuguul :
‹ Akiid ligo khaniimewa gaaʼidiin yigassumuuha.Bitt waahide aw banaat itneenle kulli muhaarib.Toob mulawwan wa mukallaf le Siisrawa kadmuul mukallaf al‑yarbutuuh fi ragabat al‑munnasir. ›
 Ya Allah,khalli kulla udwaanakyiddammaro misil Siisrawa l‑yihibbuukyabgo misil deyy al‑harraay wakit tatlaʼ. Wa baʼad da,al‑balad gaaʼide fi raaha le muddit 40 sana.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gammo battaan sawwo al‑fasaala giddaam Allah.Wa Allah sallamaahum le balad Midyaan le muddit sabʼa siniin.
Wa hukum Midyaan bigi chadiid fi Bani Israaʼiil wa be sabab da,Bani Israaʼiil sawwo bakaanaat hana maljaʼ fi karaakiir al‑jibaal wa fi waʼar al‑hajar.
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil teerabo ziraaʼithum,al‑Midyaaniyiin wa l‑Amaalikh wa gabaayil aakhariin min al‑sabaah gammo hajamoohum.
Wa humman nazalo jamb Bani Israaʼiil wa dammaro intaaj al‑ziraaʼa hana l‑balad lahaddi Khazza.Wa ma khallo cheyy le Bani Israaʼiil yiʼiichu beyah wa la khanamaay wa la bagara wa la humaar.
Wakit jo,jo katiiriin misil saar al‑leel,humman be khiyamhum wa maalhum.Jo be jumaalhum bala adad wa be da,dammaro al‑balad.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil tiʼibo ziyaada be sabab al‑Midyaaniyiin wa koorako le Allah.
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil koorako le Allah wa dawwaro al‑fazaʼ min al‑Midyaaniyiin,
khalaas Allah rassal nabi le Bani Israaʼiil.Wa hu gaal leehum : Daahu Allah gaal :‹ Ana Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,al‑maragtuku min Masir balad al‑ubuudiiye.
Ana najjeetku min iid al‑Masriyiin wa min kulla l‑naas al‑zalamooku wa taradtuhum giddaamku wa anteetku baladhum.
Wa gult leeku :“Ana Allah Ilaahku.Ma takhaafo min ilaahaat al‑Amuuriyiin al‑intu saakniin fi baladhum.”Wa laakin intu ma simiʼtu kalaami. › 
Wa baʼad da,malak Allah ja wa gaʼad tihit al‑chadarat al‑kabiire fi hillit Ufra,hint Yuwaach al‑min khachum beet Abiʼaazar.Wa wileedah Gidʼuun gaaʼid yudugg gameh fi assaarat al‑inab achaan al‑Midyaaniyiin ma yichiifuuh.
Wa malak Allah baan leyah wa gaal : Allah gaaʼid maʼaak,ya l‑raajil al‑faaris. 
Wa Gidʼuun gaal leyah : Min fadlak ya siidi,kan Allah gaaʼid maʼaana,maala kulla l‑taʼab da ja foogna ?Wa ween al‑ajaayib al‑hajjo beehum juduudna wakit ooroona kikkeef Allah maragaahum min Masir ?Wa hassaʼ da,Allah abaana wa sallamna le l‑Midyaaniyiin. 
Wa khalaas,Allah wajjah aleyah wa gaal : Amchi be l‑gudra al‑indak wa najji Bani Israaʼiil min al‑Midyaaniyiin.Ana bas rassaltak ! 
Wa laakin Gidʼuun gaal leyah : Ya siidi,saamihni !Kikkeef ana nagdar ninajji Bani Israaʼiil ?Khachum beeti aakhir khachum beet fi gabiilat Manassa wa ana kula aakhar naadum fi aayilat abuuyi. 
Wa Allah radda leyah wa gaal : Ana nukuun maʼaak wa be da,taktul kulla l‑Midyaaniyiin misil naadum waahid. 
Wa Gidʼuun gaal : Kan inta ridiit leyi,wassif leyi alaama kadar da inta bas al‑gaaʼid tihajji leyi.
Min fadlak,ma tamchi min hini lahaddi nigabbil leek wa nukhutt giddaamak hadiiyti. Wa Allah gaal : Ana nagood lahaddi inta tigabbil. 
Wa Gidʼuun macha wa jahhaz sakhal maʼa 10 kooro hana dagiig wa sawwa khubza bala tawwaara.Wa khatta al‑laham fi guffa wa l‑mulaah fi burma.Wa waddaah wa gaddamah leyah tihit al‑chadarat al‑kabiire.
Wa malak Allah gaal leyah : Chiil al‑laham wa l‑khubza bala tawwaara wa khuttuhum fi l‑hajar da wa ruchch al‑mulaah. Wa Gidʼuun tabbag kulla l‑kalaam da.
Wa malak Allah matta al‑asa al‑fi iideenah wa limis beeha al‑laham wa l‑khubza bala tawwaara.Wa l‑naar gammat min al‑hajar wa akalat al‑laham wa l‑khubza bala tawwaara.Wa khalaas,malak Allah bigi ma fiih.
Wa wakit Gidʼuun irif kadar da malak Allah,hu gaal : Ya Allah Rabbi,ana gaabalt malak Allah wijih be wijih ! 
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Al‑salaam maʼaak !Ma takhaaf,inta ma tumuut. 
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Gidʼuun bana madbah le Allah wa sammaah Allah Hu al‑Salaam.Wa lahaddi l‑yoom,al‑madbah da gaaʼid fi hillit Ufra fi ard khachum beet Abiʼaazar.
Wa fi l‑leele di,Allah gaal le Gidʼuun : Chiil al‑toor al‑taani hana abuuk al‑hu wald sabʼa sana.Wa ahdim madbah Baʼal hana abuuk wa agtaʼ al‑uud al‑khazzooh le ibaadat Achiira al‑gaaʼid jambah.
Wa abni madbah be nizaam le Allah Ilaahak fi raas al‑bakaan al‑gawi da.Wa chiil al‑toor da wa gaddimah dahiiye muharraga be l‑uud hana ibaadat Achiira al‑inta gataʼtah. 
Wa Gidʼuun chaal achara raajil min abiidah wa tabbag amur Allah al‑gaalah leyah.Wa laakin hu sawwa al‑khidme di be l‑leel achaan be l‑nahaar,hu khaayif min aayiltah wa min naas al‑hille.
Wa be fajur badri,naas al‑hille gammo chaafo madbah Baʼal muhaddam wa l‑uud al‑khazzooh le ibaadat Achiira al‑gaaʼid jambah magtuuʼ wa l‑toor al‑taani gaddamooh dahiiye muharraga fi l‑madbah al‑banooh.
Wa humman gaalo ambeenaathum : Yaatu sawwa al‑cheyy da ? Wa saʼalo wa fattacho wa gaalo : Da Gidʼuun wileed Yuwaach.Hu bas sawwa al‑cheyy da. 
Wa naas al‑hille gaalo le Yuwaach : Jiib leena wileedak naktuluuh achaan hu bas al‑haddam madbah Baʼal wa kassar al‑uud hana ibaadat Achiira al‑gaaʼid jambah. 
Wa Yuwaach gaal le kulla l‑naas al‑waagfiin jambah : Hal intu bas al‑tidaafuʼu le Baʼal walla ?Wa intu bas al‑tafzaʼooh walla ?Ayyi naadum al‑yidaafiʼ le Baʼal,waajib yumuut gabul al‑harraay ma tatlaʼ.Wa kan Baʼal hu ilaah,khalli yidaafiʼ le nafsah kan naadum haddam madbahah. 
Wa fi l‑yoom da,sammo Gidʼuun Yarbaʼal wa gaalo : Khalli Baʼal yidaafiʼ le nafsah minnah achaan hu haddam madbahah. 
Wa baʼad da,kulla l‑Midyaaniyiin wa l‑Amaalikh wa gabaayil al‑sabaah lammo kalaamhum sawa wa gataʼo bahar al‑Urdun wa nazalo fi waadi Yazraʼiil.
Wa Ruuh Allah nazal fi Gidʼuun wa hu darab al‑buug wa khachum beet Abiʼaazar macho waraayah.
Wa hu rassal naas yiʼooru kulla gabiilat Manassa achaan yitaabuʼuuh.Wa battaan rassal naas le gabaayil Achiir wa Zabuluun wa Naftaali achaan humman kula yindammo leyah.
Wa Gidʼuun gaal le l‑Rabb : Kan tidoor tinajji Bani Israaʼiil beyi ana misil inta gultah,
daahu ana nukhutt farwa be suufha fi l‑madagg.Wa kan al‑karany yanzil fi l‑suuf da wa ma yibill al‑nagaʼa,khalaas ana naʼarif kadar inta tinajji Bani Israaʼiil be iidi ana. 
Wa bigi misil da.Wa wakit ambaakir Gidʼuun gamma,macha asar al‑suuf wa almi marag minnah malyit kooro.
Wa khalaas,Gidʼuun gaal le l‑Rabb : Ya Ilaahi,ma takhdab leyi kan nikallim battaan.Khalliini nijarrib al‑suuf da battaan.Wa fi l‑marra di,khalli al‑suuf yagood yaabis wa l‑nagaʼa kamaan tinballa be l‑karany. 
Wa l‑Rabb sawwa misil da fi l‑leele di.Al‑suuf gaʼad yaabis wa l‑nagaʼa anballat.
Wa be fajur badri,Yarbaʼal wa hu Gidʼuun gamma,hu wa kulla l‑chaʼab al‑maʼaayah wa nazalo gariib le Een Haruud.Wa muʼaskar al‑Midyaaniyiin kamaan gaaʼid munchaakh fi l‑waadi ale jabal Muura.
Wa Allah gaal le Gidʼuun : Al‑chaʼab al‑maʼaak dool katiiriin marra waahid.Wa kan ana nisallim leehum al‑Midyaaniyiin fi iideehum,Bani Israaʼiil yafchuru be nufuushum wa yuguulu :‹ Be duraaʼna bas najjeena nufuusna. ›
Wa hassaʼ,guul le chaʼabak :‹ Ayyi naadum al‑khaaf wa gaaʼid yarjif,khalli yigabbil min jibaal Gilʼaad.›  Wa khalaas,22 000 raajil min al‑chaʼab gabbalo wa faddalo 10 000 raajil.
Wa Allah gaal le Gidʼuun : Ya hassaʼ kula,al‑chaʼab dool katiiriin ziyaada.Dalliihum fi khachum al‑almi wa hinaak,ana nijarribhum leek.Wa ayyi naadum al‑nuguul leek :‹ Khalli yamchi maʼaak ›,hu da yamchi maʼaak.Wa l‑naadum al‑nuguul leek :‹ Ma yamchi maʼaak ›,hu da khalli ma yamchi maʼaak. 
Wa khalaas,Gidʼuun wadda al‑chaʼab fi khachum al‑almi.Wa Allah gaal leyah : Ayyi naadum al‑yakhrif almi be iideenah wa yuluggah misil kalib,khuttah chig.Wa l‑yabruk wa yachrab kula,khuttah chig. 
Wa l‑naas al‑kharafo almi be iideehum wa laggooh misil kulaab,adadhum bigi tultumiya.Wa laakin al‑baagi min al‑chaʼab,kulluhum barako wa chirbo almi.
Wa Allah gaal le Gidʼuun : Be l‑tultumiya rujaal al‑laggo almi misil kulaab dool bas,ana ninajjiiku wa nisallim leeku al‑Midyaaniyiin fi iideeku.Wa khalaas,khalli kulla l‑baagi min al‑chaʼab yamchu buyuuthum. 
Wa khalaas,al‑rujaal al‑tultumiya chaalo zaad al‑baagi min al‑chaʼab wa bawagaahum.Wa Gidʼuun gaal le l‑baagi min chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil khalli ayyi waahid yigabbil beetah.Wa hu khatta al‑tultumiya naas dool maʼaayah.Wa muʼaskar al‑Midyaaniyiin gaaʼid tihithum fi l‑waadi.
Wa fi l‑leele di,Allah gaal le Gidʼuun : Gumm anzil wa ahjim muʼaskar al‑Midyaaniyiin.Ana sallamtah leek !
Wa laakin kan khuft ma tanzil wa tahjim,dalli chiif ale l‑muʼaskar maʼa khaddaamak Fuura.
Wa tasmaʼ kalaamhum wa khalaas,talga gudra wa tahjim al‑muʼaskar. Wa hu dalla maʼa Fuura khaddaamah lahaddi gariib le khachum al‑muʼaskar.
Wa l‑Midyaaniyiin wa l‑Amaalikh wa kulla gabaayil al‑sabaah muchattatiin fi l‑waadi misil saar al‑leel wa jumaalhum katiiriin misil ramla hana khachum al‑bahar.
Wa wakit Gidʼuun dalla,hu simiʼ waahid min al‑askar gaaʼid yihajji le rafiigah be ruʼya.Wa gaal : Ana riʼiit wa di hi al‑ruʼya al‑ana chiftaha.Ana chift khubza waahide hint gameh abyad gaaʼid yiddargas fi muʼaskarna.Wa l‑khubza di jaat lahaddi kheema waahide wa darabaaha wa l‑kheema di achchaglabat wa wagaʼat marra waahid. 
Wa rafiigah gaal leyah : Da bas yabga seef Gidʼuun wileed Yuwaach al‑min Israaʼiil.Al‑Rabb sallam leyah Midyaan wa kulla muʼaskarna. 
Wa min Gidʼuun simiʼ al‑ruʼya wa tafsiirha,gamma sajad.Wa gabbal le muʼaskar Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal : Gummu achaan Allah sallam muʼaskar Midyaan fi iideeku ! 
Wa Gidʼuun gassam al‑tultumiya rujaal ale talaata majmuuʼaat wa anta ayyi raajil buug wa jarr faadi wa fi ayyi jarr fi deyy.
Wa gaal leehum : Chiifu aleyi wa sawwu misli.Wa wakit niwassil fi khachum al‑muʼaskar,al‑cheyy al‑ana nisawwiih,intu kula sawwuuh.
Wakit ana wa l‑naas al‑maʼaayi nadurbu al‑buug,intu kula hawwugu al‑muʼaskar wa adurbu bawagaaku wa guulu :‹ Le Allah wa le Gidʼuun !› 
Wa gubbaal al‑leel ma yingasim Gidʼuun wa l‑miya naas al‑maʼaayah jo fi khachum al‑muʼaskar wa da wakit baddalo al‑haraasa.Humman darabo al‑buug wa kassaro al‑jiraar al‑fi iideehum.
Wa l‑talaata majmuuʼaat kulluhum darabo al‑buug wa kassaro jiraarhum.Ayyi raajil be iidah al‑isra,kaarib al‑deyy wa be iidah al‑zeene,kaarib al‑buug al‑gaaʼid yadurbah.Wa gaalo : Al‑seef le Allah wa le Gidʼuun ! 
Wa humman hawwago al‑muʼaskar ayyi waahid waagif fi bakaanah.Wa khalaas,kulla rujaal fi muʼaskar al‑Midyaaniyiin gammo barjalo wa koorako wa arrado.
Wa wakit al‑tultumiya naas darabo al‑bawaga,Allah sawwa fi lubb al‑muʼaskar kadar ayyi raajil yaktul rafiigah be seefah.Wa kulla l‑askar arrado lahaddi Beet Chitta ale Sariira wa lahaddi khachum Abil Mahuula gariib le Tabbat.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil lammo rujaal gabaayil Naftaali wa Achiir wa kulla gabiilat Manassa wa taarado al‑Midyaaniyiin.
Wa Gidʼuun rassal naas le kulla jibaal Afraayim le yuguulu : Anzulu wa ahjumu al‑Midyaaniyiin.Akurbu giddaamhum ayyi maʼadd fi bahar al‑Urdun lahaddi Beet Bara. Wa be da,kulla rujaal Afraayim karabo ayyi maʼadd fi bahar al‑Urdun lahaddi Beet Bara.
Wa karabo itneen min khuyyaad al‑Midyaaniyiin wa humman Uriib wa Ziib.Wa katalo Uriib fi hajar hana Uriib wa Ziib fi assaarat Ziib.Wa humman taarado al‑Midyaaniyiin lahaddi turaab Midyaan.Wa baʼad da,jaabo ruuse Uriib wa Ziib le Gidʼuun khaadi le bahar al‑Urdun.
Wa rujaal Afraayim gaalo le Gidʼuun : Maala ma hajjeetna wakit maachi tihaarib al‑Midyaaniyiin ? Wa humman harajo maʼaayah huraaj chadiid.
Wa Gidʼuun gaal leehum : Ana ma sawweet cheyy yisaawi al‑cheyy al‑intu sawweetuuh !Wa l‑kichcheeb gabiilitku Afraayim ma akheer min kulla l‑gatiʼ hana khachum beeti Abiʼaazar walla ?
Wa leeku intu bas,al‑Rabb sallam Uriib wa Ziib khuyyaad al‑Midyaaniyiin.Ana ma sawweet cheyy yisaawi al‑cheyy al‑intu sawweetuuh ! Wa min hu gaal al‑kalaam da,khalaas zaʼalhum da bigi ma fiih.
Wa Gidʼuun wa l‑rujaal al‑tultumiya al‑maʼaayah wassalo bahar al‑Urdun wa gataʼooh.Hatta kan ayyaaniin kula,humman gaaʼidiin yitaarudu udwaanhum.
Wa wakit wassalo hillit Sukkuut,Gidʼuun gaal le sukkaanha : Min fadulku,antu khubza le l‑rujaal al‑maʼaayi achaan humman ayyaaniin.Ana gaaʼid natrud Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ muluuk Midyaan. 
Wa laakin kubaaraat Sukkuut gaalo leyah : Inta lissaaʼ ma gidirt tukhutt Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ tihit sultitak.Maala nantu akil le deechak ? 
Wa Gidʼuun radda leehum wa gaal : Kan Allah sallam leyi Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ,ana nafruchku be chook al‑sahara wa l‑haskaniit. 
Wa min al‑bakaan da,hu macha hillit Fanuwiil wa hajja le sukkaanha be nafs al‑kalaam wa naas Fanuwiil kula raddo leyah be nafs al‑kalaam misil hana naas Sukkuut.
Wa hu gaal le naas Fanuwiil : Kan jiit be sihha wa salaama,nihaddim gasirku da. 
Wa fi l‑wakit da,Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ gaaʼidiin fi Garguur maʼa askarhum al‑adadhum yisaawi 15 000 raajil.Wa dool bas al‑faddalo min kulla deech gabaayil al‑sabaah achaan 120 000 askar al‑yaʼarfu harb al‑suyuuf maato.
Wa Gidʼuun macha be murhaal al‑sayyaara sabaah le Nuubah wa Yugbaha wa katal al‑askar al‑yahsubu humman gaaʼidiin be amaan.
Wa Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ muluuk Midyaan arrado wa Gidʼuun taradaahum wa karabaahum.Wa khalaas be da,barjal kulla askarhum.
Wa Gidʼuun wileed Yuwaach gabbal min al‑harib be gooz Haaras.
Wa hu karab sabi min naas Sukkuut wa saʼalah.Wa hu katab leyah kulla asaame al‑kubaaraat wa l‑chuyuukh hana Sukkuut wa adadhum 77 raajil.
Wa Gidʼuun macha le naas Sukkuut wa gaal leehum : Chiifu !Daahu Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ al‑be sababhum intu gultu leyi :‹ Inta lissaaʼ ma gidirt tukhutt Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ tihit sultitak.Maala nantu akil le deechak ?› 
Wa hu chaal chuyuukh al‑hille wa chaal chook al‑sahara wa haskaniit wa farach beehum naas Sukkuut.
Wa hu haddam al‑gasir al‑fi Fanuwiil wa katal rujaal al‑hille.
Wa baʼad da,Gidʼuun gaal le Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ : Al‑naas al‑kataltuuhum fi Taabuur yichaabuhu yaatu ? Wa humman raddo leyah wa gaalo : Al‑naas dool mislak.Wa ayyi waahid minhum misil wileed malik. 
Wa hu gaal leehum : Humman dool akhwaani iyaal ammi.Nahlif leeku be Allah al‑Hayy,kan awwal ma kataltuuhum,ana abadan ma naktulku. 
Wa Gidʼuun gaal le Yatar wileedah al‑bikir : Gumm wa aktulhum ! Wa laakin al‑wileed ma salla seefah.Hu khaaf achaan hu wileed sabi.
Wa Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ gaalo : Gumm,inta zaatak bas aktulna achaan di khidmit al‑raajil al‑fahal. Wa khalaas,Gidʼuun gamma katalaahum le Zabah wa Salmuunaʼ wa chaal al‑ziina min rigaab jumaalhum.
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil gaalo le Gidʼuun : Inta bas abga malikna.Wa baʼadak inta,wileedak wa wileed wileedak yabgo muluukna achaan inta najjeetna min al‑Midyaaniyiin. 
Wa laakin Gidʼuun gaal leehum : Ana ma nabga malik foogku wa la wileedi.Khalli Allah bas yamluk foogku. 
Wa battaan gaal leehum : Nidoor nasʼalku cheyy waahid.Khalli ayyi waahid minku yijiib leyi khaatim waahid min al‑khaniime al‑ligiituuha fi l‑harib. Udwaanhum al‑Ismaaʼiiliyiin induhum khatam.
Wa humman gaalo leyah : Tamaam,nantuuhum leek. Wa humman faracho khalag wa ayyi waahid zagal foogah khaatim waahid min khaniimtah.
Wa l‑khatam al‑talabaahum Gidʼuun wazinhum yisaawi 2 500 jineeh hana dahab.Wa da bala l‑suure wa l‑khuruus wa l‑khulgaan al‑loonhum garadi al‑yalbasoohum muluuk Midyaan wa l‑ribig al‑yarbutuuh fi rigaab jumaalhum.
Wa Gidʼuun chaal al‑dahab da wa daggah farmala wa khattaah fi hillitah Ufra.Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil yaju yaʼabudu al‑farmala di wa da bigi charak le Gidʼuun wa le kulla aayiltah.
Wa khalaas,al‑Midyaaniyiin gaʼado tihit hukum Bani Israaʼiil wa ma gidro battaan yarfaʼo ruuseehum.Wa fi muddit hayaat Gidʼuun,al‑balad gaaʼide fi raaha le muddit 40 sana.
Wa Yarbaʼal wa hu Gidʼuun wileed Yuwaach gabbal sakan fi beetah.
Wa Gidʼuun jaab 70 awlaad achaan hu indah awiin katiiraat.
Wa indah sirriiye fi Chakiim.Hi kula jaabat leyah wileed wa hu sammaah Abiimalik.
Wa Gidʼuun wileed Yuwaach chayyab marra waahid wa aach fi halu.Wa baʼad da,maat wa dafanooh fi khabur abuuh Yuwaach fi Ufra hint khachum beet Abiʼaazar.
Wa baʼad moot Gidʼuun,Bani Israaʼiil gammo battaan achcharmato maʼa asnaam Baʼal wa abadoohum wa sawwo Baʼal Bariit ilaahhum.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil abadan ma fakkaro fi Allah ilaahhum al‑najjaahum min udwaanhum al‑muhawwigiinhum.
Wa be kulla l‑kheer al‑sawwaah leehum Yarbaʼal wa hu Gidʼuun,Bani Israaʼiil ma sawwo kheer le aayiltah.
Wa Abiimalik wileed Yarbaʼal macha Chakiim le yalga akhwaan ammah wa kulla aayilat abu ammah.Wa gaal leehum :
 Guulu le kulla sukkaan Chakiim :‹ Akheer yahkumuuku 70 hukkaam kulluhum min awlaad Yarbaʼal aw yahkimku raajil waahid bas ?Wa aʼarfu kadar ana da min dammuku wa lahamku.› 
Wa akhwaan ammah kallamo kulla kalaam Abiimalik le sukkaan Chakiim wa humman dawwarooh achaan gaalo ambeenaathum : Hu da akhuuna. 
Wa humman antooh 70 hajar fudda min beet ilaahhum Baʼal Bariit le Abiimalik.Wa be l‑fudda di,hu ajjar naas ma naafʼiin wa rabbaatiin duruub le yitaabuʼuuh.
Wa hu gabbal le beet abuuh fi Ufra wa katal kulla akhwaanah iyaal abuuh Yarbaʼal,humman al‑sabʼiin,kulluhum fi hajar waahid.Wa illa Yuutaam al‑sakhayyar wileed Yarbaʼal faddal minhum achaan hu da allabbad.
Wa kulla sukkaan Chakiim wa kulla chaʼab Beet Millu macho le l‑chadara al‑kabiire al‑gaaʼide jamb al‑hajar al‑khazzooh fi Chakiim.Wa hinaak darrajo Abiimalik malik.
Wa wakit khabbaro Yuutaam,hu macha talaʼ fi raas jabal Gariziim wa sarakh be hiss aali wa gaal : Asmaʼooni,ya sukkaan Chakiim,wa l‑Rabb kula yasmaʼku.
Yoom min al‑ayyaam,kulla chadar al‑khaaba gammo le yamsaho wa yidarruju leehum malik wa gaalo le chadar al‑zaytuun :‹ Abga foogna malik. ›
Wa chadar al‑zaytuun gaal :‹ Hal nikhalli dihni al‑be sababah al‑Rabb wa l‑naas kula chakarooni wa namchi nabga kabiir fi l‑chadar walla ? ›
Wa chadar al‑khaaba gaalo le chadar al‑tiin :‹ Taʼaal wa abga foogna malik. ›
Wa chadar al‑tiin gaal :‹ Hal nikhalli tuʼumti al‑haluuwe wa ma nalda fawaakihi al‑haluwiin wa namchi nabga kabiir fi l‑chadar walla ? ›
Wa chadar al‑khaaba gaalo le chadar al‑inab :‹ Taʼaal wa abga foogna malik. ›
Wa chadar al‑inab gaal :‹ Hal nikhalli asiiri al‑yafrah beyah al‑Rabb wa l‑naas wa namchi nabga kabiir fi l‑chadar walla ? ›
Wa khalaas,kulla chadar al‑khaaba gaalo le l‑chadar al‑indah chook :‹ Taʼaal wa abga foogna malik. ›
Wa l‑chadar al‑indah chook gaal leehum :‹ Kan sahiih ke intu tidooru tamsahooni wa tidarrujuuni malik foogku da,taʼaalu agoodu tihti fi dulli.Wa laakin kan abeetu kamaan,tamrug naar minni wa taakul arz Lubnaan.› 
Wa Yuutaam gaal battaan : Hassaʼ,ya sukkaan Chakiim,wakit darrajtu Abiimalik malik,hal darrajtuuh be l‑hagg wa l‑adaala ?Wa hal sawweetu al‑kheer maʼa Yarbaʼal wa aayiltah walla ?Wa hal fakkartu fi l‑cheyy al‑hu sawwaah leeku ?
Abuuyi haarab fi chaanku wa dassa nafsah fi l‑khutuura wa najjaaku min al‑Midyaaniyiin.
Wa l‑yoom,intu gammeetu didd aayiltah wa kataltu awlaadah al‑sabʼiin fi hajar waahid.Wa Abiimalik wileed sirriiytah bas darrajtuuh malik fi sukkaan Chakiim achaan hu akhuuku.
Wa kan al‑yoom intu gammeetu maʼa Yarbaʼal wa maʼa aayiltah be l‑hagg wa l‑adaala,khalaas afraho be Abiimalik wa khalli Abiimalik kula yafrah beeku.
Wa kan abeetu kamaan,khalli naar tamrug min Abiimalik wa taakul sukkaan Chakiim wa chaʼab Beet Millu.Wa khalli naar tamrug min sukkaan Chakiim wa chaʼab Beet Millu wa taakul Abiimalik. 
Wa khalaas,Yuutaam jara wa macha le hillit Biir wa sakan hinaak baʼiid min akhuuh Abiimalik.
Wa Abiimalik hakam fi Israaʼiil muddit talaata sana.
Wa baʼad da,al‑Rabb rassal ruuh fasle jaabat khilaaf ambeen Abiimalik wa sukkaan Chakiim wa humman gammo khaanooh.
Wa be sabab dimmit awlaad Yarbaʼal al‑sabʼiin,al‑ikhaab wagaʼ fi raas akhuuhum Abiimalik al‑katalhum wa fi raas sukkaan Chakiim al‑lazzooh fi l‑katil.
Wa sukkaan Chakiim gammo yarbutu leyah kamiin fi ruuse al‑jibaal wa yaglaʼo khumaam kulla l‑naas al‑yiʼaddu beyah.Wa khalaas,jo khabbaro Abiimalik.
Wa yoom waahid,raajil waahid al‑binaaduuh Gaʼal wileed Aabad ja maʼa akhwaanah fi Chakiim wa sukkaan Chakiim aamanooh.
Wa l‑sukkaan marago fi l‑kadaade wa gataʼo jineenaathum hana l‑inab wa asarooh wa sawwo aazuuma.Wa macho le beet ilaahhum wa akalo wa chirbo wa laʼano Abiimalik.
Wa Gaʼal wileed Aabad gaal : Abiimalik hu yaatu lahaddi aniina naas Chakiim nagoodu tihtah ?Hu wileed Yarbaʼal bas wa l‑masʼuul fi l‑hille di,hu Zabuul.Nagoodu tihit zurriiyit Hamuur abu Chakiim.Maala nidooru nagoodu tihit hukum Abiimalik ?
Kan kulla l‑naas aamano beyi,ana nitarrif Abiimalik.Wa nuguul le Abiimalik :‹ Limm askarak wa amrug le l‑harib !› 
Wa Zabuul haakim al‑hille ziʼil zaʼal chadiid wakit simiʼ kalaam Gaʼal wileed Aabad.
Wa hu rassal naas be sirr le yikhabburu Abiimalik wa gaalo leyah : Daahu Gaʼal wileed Aabad wa akhwaanah jo fi Chakiim wa gawwamo kulla naas al‑hille diddak.
Wa hassaʼ da,gumm be l‑leel,inta wa askarak wa amchi arbut leehum kamiin fi l‑kadaade.
Wa be fajur wakit al‑harraay tatlaʼ,amchi wa ahjim al‑hille.Wa wakit Gaʼal wa l‑naas al‑maʼaayah yamurgu le yihaarubuuk,khalaas sawwi foogah ayyi cheyy al‑tidoorah. 
Wa Abiimalik wa kulla askarah gammo be l‑leel wa angasamo ale arbaʼa majmuuʼaat wa rabato kamiin gariib le hillit Chakiim.
Wa Gaʼal wileed Aabad marag wa wagaf fi khachum baab al‑hille.Wa khalaas,Abiimalik wa askarah marago min bakaanaathum al‑rabato fooghum kamiin.
Wa wakit chaafhum,Gaʼal gaal le Zabuul : Daahu rujaal gaaʼidiin yiddallo min al‑jibaal. Wa laakin Zabuul gaal leyah : Da dull hana l‑jibaal bas wa inta tahsibah naas. 
Wa Gaʼal gaal battaan : Daahu naas gaaʼidiin yiddallo min al‑jabal al‑fi usut wa fi aakhariin kula jaayiin be derib chadarat al‑Chawwaafiin. 
Wa Zabuul gaal leyah : Ween kalaamak al‑inta awwal hajjeetah ?Awwal inta ma gult :‹ Abiimalik hu yaatu lahaddi aniina nagoodu tihtah ?› Wa daahu al‑naas al‑inta hagartuhum.Hassaʼ da,amrug wa haaribhum ! 
Wa khalaas,Gaʼal marag fi raas sukkaan Chakiim wa haarab Abiimalik.
Wa laakin Abiimalik annasar fi Gaʼal wa taradah giddaamah lahaddi khachum baab al‑hille wa naas katiir maato.
Wa baʼad da,Abiimalik macha gaʼad fi Aruuma.Wa Zabuul tarad Gaʼal wa akhwaanah wa ma yikhalliihum yaskunu fi Chakiim.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taani,chaʼab Chakiim macho fi ziraaʼithum wa Abiimalik simiʼ be l‑khabar da.
Wa Abiimalik chaal askarah wa gassamaahum ale talaata majmuuʼaat wa rabat kamiin fi l‑kadaade.Wa wakit chaafo al‑chaʼab marago min al‑hille,al‑askar gammo didduhum wa kataloohum.
Wa Abiimalik wa l‑majmuuʼa al‑maʼaayah macho karabo khachum baab al‑hille wa gaʼado foogah.Wa l‑majmuuʼteen al‑aakhariin hajamo kulla l‑naas al‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑ziraaʼa wa kataloohum.
Wa tuul al‑nahaar da,Abiimalik gaaʼid yihaarib fi l‑hille wa baʼad da,chaalha.Wa katal kulla l‑chaʼab wa dammar al‑hille wa sabba fi bakaanha mileh.
Wa wakit kulla rujaal Migdal Chakiim simʼo al‑khabar da,humman macho allabbado fi l‑nugra al‑gaaʼide tihit beet al‑ibaada hana Iil Bariit.
Wa jo khabbaro Abiimalik kadar kulla rujaal Migdal Chakiim lammo bakaan waahid.
Wa khalaas,Abiimalik wa kulla askarah talaʼo fi jabal Salmuun.Wa Abiimalik chaal faas wa gataʼ firiʼ yaabis wa khattaah fi kitfah wa gaal le askarah : Ajala,sawwu misil ana sawweetah. 
Wa ayyi waahid min askarah gataʼ firiʼ yaabis wa taabaʼo Abiimalik.Wa humman khatto al‑furuuʼ dool fi khachum al‑nugra di wa tachchooha.Wa kulla naas Migdal Chakiim al‑gaaʼidiin fi lubb al‑nugra di maato,awiin wa rujaal adadhum gariib 1 000.
Wa baʼad da,Abiimalik chaal derib hillit Tiibis wa haasarha wa chaalha.
Wa fiyah gasir gawi fi ust al‑hille wa kulla l‑sukkaan,awiin wa rujaal,dakhalo foogah.Wa baʼad saddo al‑baab,talaʼo fi raas al‑gasir.
Wa Abiimalik ja hajam al‑gasir al‑gawi da.Hu ja gariib le baabah achaan yitichchah.
Wa khalaas,mara waahide zaragat Abiimalik be murhaaka wa kassarat raasah.
Wa tawwaali,Abiimalik naada al‑sabi al‑chaayil leyah silaahah wa gaal leyah : Sill seefak wa aktulni achaan ma yuguulu :‹ Mara bas katalatah.›  Wa l‑sabi taʼanah wa hu maat.
Wa wakit rujaal Bani Israaʼiil chaafo Abiimalik maat,ayyi waahid macha beetah.
Wa l‑Rabb gabbal fi raas Abiimalik al‑fasaala al‑hu sawwaaha le abuuh wakit katal akhwaanah al‑sabʼiin.
Wa l‑Rabb gabbal fi raas sukkaan Chakiim kulla l‑fasaala al‑humman sawwooha.Wa be misil da,al‑laʼana al‑laʼanaahum beeha Yuutaam wileed Yarbaʼal kula lihgathum.
Wa baʼad moot Abiimalik,Tuulaʼ wileed Fuwwa wileed Duudu al‑min gabiilat Yassaakar gamma le yinajji Bani Israaʼiil.Wa hu saakin fi Chamiir fi jibaal Afraayim.
Hu hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil 23 sana.Wa baʼad da,maat wa dafanooh fi Chamiir.
Wa baʼadah gamma Yayiir al‑min turaab Gilʼaad wa hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil 22 sana.
Wa hu indah 30 awlaad raakbiin fi 30 duhuuch wa induhum 30 hillaal al‑bisammuuhum lahaddi l‑yoom furgaan Yayiir fi turaab Gilʼaad.
Wa Yayiir maat wa dafanooh fi Khaamuun.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gammo battaan yisawwu al‑fasaala giddaam Allah.Wa abado asnaam Baʼal wa Achtaruut wa ilaahaat hana buldaan aakhariin,misil Araam wa Seeda wa Muwaab wa Bani Ammuun wa l‑Filistiyiin.Wa humman abo Allah wa battaan ma abadooh.
Wa Allah khidib khadab chadiid didd Bani Israaʼiil wa sallamaahum le l‑Filistiyiin wa Bani Ammuun.
Wa min al‑wakit da,humman rihko Bani Israaʼiil wa zalamoohum fi muddit 18 sana lahaddi kulla Bani Israaʼiil al‑gaaʼidiin sabaah le bahar al‑Urdun fi balad al‑Amuuriyiin fi turaab Gilʼaad.
Wa Bani Ammuun gataʼo bahar al‑Urdun achaan yihaarubu gabaayil Yahuuza wa Banyaamiin wa Afraayim.Wa Bani Israaʼiil addaayago mudaayaga chadiide.
Wa khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil sarakho le Allah wa gaalo : Sahiih,aniina aznabna achaan abeenaak inta Ilaahna wa abadna asnaam Baʼal. 
Wa Allah gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Wakit al‑Masriyiin wa l‑Amuuriyiin wa Bani Ammuun wa l‑Filistiyiin
wa l‑Seeduuniyiin wa l‑Amaalikh wa l‑Maaʼooniyiin zalamooku wa wakit sarakhtu leyi,ana ma najjeetku minhum walla ?
Wa laakin intu abeetuuni wa abadtu leeku ilaahaat aakhariin wa fi chaan da,ana ma ninajjiiku battaan.
Yalla !Amchu asrakho le ilaahaatku al‑intu azaltuuhum.Khalli humman bas yafzaʼooku wakit tatʼabo ! 
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gaalo le Allah : Sahiih,aniina aznabna.Sawwi foogna kulla cheyy al‑tidoorah wa laakin najjiina al‑yoom. 
Wa humman baʼʼado minhum al‑ilaahaat al‑ajnabiyiin wa abado Allah.Wa hu hanna fooghum fi chaan taʼabhum.
Wa deech Bani Ammuun lammo wa khatto muʼaskarhum fi Gilʼaad.Wa Bani Israaʼiil lammo wa khatto muʼaskarhum fi Misfa.
Al‑chaʼab wa kulla kubaaraat Gilʼaad gaalo ambeenaathum : Al‑raajil al‑yabda al‑harib maʼa Bani Ammuun,hu da bas yabga kabiir fi kulla sukkaan Gilʼaad. 
Wa Yiftaah al‑min turaab Gilʼaad hu raajil faaris.Wa ammah mara charmuuta wa abuuh usmah Gilʼaad.
Wa l‑mara al‑aakhara hint Gilʼaad jaabat leyah iyaal aakhariin.Wakit al‑iyaal dool kibro,humman taradooh le Yiftaah wa gaalo leyah : Inta ma talga warasa maʼa aayilitna achaan ammak aakhara. 
Wa Yiftaah arrad baʼiid min akhwaanah wa macha sakan fi balad Toob.Wa naas waahidiin ma naafʼiin andammo maʼa Yiftaah wa gaaʼidiin yihaarubu maʼaayah.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,Bani Ammuun gammo yihaarubu Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa wakit gammo didduhum,kubaaraat Gilʼaad macho fattacho Yiftaah fi balad Toob.
Wa humman gaalo leyah : Taʼaal abga foogna khaayid le nihaarubu Bani Ammuun. 
Wa Yiftaah gaal le kubaaraat Gilʼaad : Intu bas ma kirihtuuni wa taradtuuni min aayilat abuuyi ?Wa maala al‑yoom wakit addaayagtu,jiitu leyi ? 
Wa kubaaraat Gilʼaad gaalo le Yiftaah : Hassaʼ aniina jiina leek achaan tamchi maʼaana wa nihaarubu Bani Ammuun.Wa tabga kabiir foogna wa fi kulla sukkaan Gilʼaad. 
Wa Yiftaah gaal le kubaaraat Gilʼaad : Kan tigabbuluuni le nihaarib Bani Ammuun wa kan Allah sallamaahum leyi fi iidi,ana nabga kabiir foogku. 
Wa kubaaraat Gilʼaad gaalo le Yiftaah : Allah yachhad ambeenaatna kan ma sawweena misil inta gultah. 
Wa khalaas,Yiftaah macha maʼa kubaaraat Gilʼaad wa l‑chaʼab khattooh fooghum kabiir wa khaayid.Wa fi hillit Misfa giddaam Allah,Yiftaah sabbat al‑alaakha al‑sawwaaha maʼa kubaaraat Gilʼaad.
Wa baʼad da,Yiftaah rassal naas le malik Bani Ammuun wa gaal leyah : Chunu al‑beeni wa beenak le taji tihaaribni fi baladi ? 
Wa malik Bani Ammuun gaal le l‑naas al‑rassalhum Yiftaah : Wakit Bani Israaʼiil marago min balad Masir chaalo kulla ardi min waadi Arnuun le waadi Yabbuukh wa lahaddi bahar al‑Urdun.Wa hassaʼ da,gabbulu leyi ardi be l‑salaama. 
Wa battaan Yiftaah rassal naas le malik Bani Ammuun
le yuguulu leyah : Daahu Yiftaah gaal leek :‹ Bani Israaʼiil ma chaalo balad Muwaab wa la balad Bani Ammuun.
Wakit marago min balad Masir,Bani Israaʼiil chaggo al‑sahara lahaddi l‑bahar al‑Ahmar wa jo fi Khaadich.
Wa rassalo naas le malik Adoom wa gaalo leyah :“Min fadlak,khalliina nuchuggu baladak.”Wa laakin malik Adoom aba ma simiʼ kalaamhum.Wa le malik Muwaab kula,gaddamo leyah nafs al‑talab wa laakin hu kula aba.Wa khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil gaʼado fi Khaadich.
Wa baʼad da,Bani Israaʼiil gammo maachiin fi l‑sahara wa baaro balad Adoom wa balad Muwaab.Wa wassalo sabaah le Muwaab wa nazalo khaadi le waadi Arnuun wa laakin ma dakhalo balad Muwaab achaan waadi Arnuun da huduud Muwaab.
 ‹ Wa Bani Israaʼiil rassalo naas le Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin al‑gaaʼid fi Hachbuun wa gaalo leyah :“Min fadlak,khalliina nuchuggu baladak lahaddi nawsalo bakaanna.”
Wa laakin Siihuun ma aamanaahum le Bani Israaʼiil wa aba ma khallaahum yuchuggu baladah.Wa hu lamma kulla askarah wa khatto muʼaskarhum fi Yahaas wa haarabo Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil sallam Siihuun wa kulla chaʼabah le Bani Israaʼiilwa humman annasaro fooghum.Wa Bani Israaʼiil chaalo kulla ard al‑Amuuriyiin al‑saakniin fi l‑balad di.
Wa chaalo kulla ard al‑Amuuriyiin min waadi Arnuun lahaddi waadi Yabbuukh wa min al‑sahara lahaddi bahar al‑Urdun.
 ‹ Wa hassaʼ,Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil galaʼ ard al‑Amuuriyiin wa antaaha le chaʼabah Bani Israaʼiil.Wa inta tidoor taglaʼha minhum walla ?
Wa inta ma warast al‑ard al‑antaaha leek ilaahak Kamuuch walla ?Wa aniina kula indina hagg nawrusu al‑ard al‑antaaha leena Allah Ilaahna.
Walla inta chadiid min Balaakh wileed Siffuur malik Muwaabwalla ?Laakin hu ma haraj maʼa Bani Israaʼiil lahaddi haarabaahum.
 ‹ Min muddit 300 sana Bani Israaʼiil sakano fi Hachbuun wa hillaalha al‑taabʼiin leeha wa fi Aruuʼir wa hillaalha al‑taabʼiin leeha wa fi kulla l‑mudun al‑fi khachum waadi Arnuun.Wa maala intu ma galaʼtu al‑balad di fi kulla l‑mudda di ?
Wa kan leyi ana,ma khitiit foogak.Wa laakin inta bas khitiit foogi wa gaaʼid tihaaribni.Wa khalli Allah yahkim al‑yoom been Bani Israaʼiil wa Bani Ammuun !› 
Wa laakin malik Bani Ammuun ma simiʼ al‑kalaam al‑Yiftaah rassal wa gaalah leyah.
Wa baʼad da,Ruuh Allah nazal fi Yiftaah.Wa Yiftaah gamma chagga turaab Gilʼaad wa turaab Manassa.Wa baʼad da,macha fi Misfa Gilʼaad wa minha wassal huduud Bani Ammuun.
Wa Yiftaah aahad Allah wa gaal : Kan inta sallamt leyi Bani Ammuun,
wakit nigabbil be sihha wa salaama min al‑harib maʼa Bani Ammuun,awwal makhluug al‑yamrug min beeti le yilaagiini ana nikhassisah le Allah wa nigaddimah dahiiye muharraga. 
Wa Yiftaah gataʼ huduud Bani Ammuun wa haarabaahum.Wa Allah sallamaahum leyah fi iidah.
Wa hu annasar fooghum min hillit Aruuʼir lahaddi gariib le Minniit wa da 20 mudun wa lahaddi Abil Karaamiim.Wa l‑haziime bigat kabiire lahaddi Bani Ammuun gaʼado tihit Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa wakit Yiftaah jaayi le beetah fi Misfa,hu chaaf bittah maragat le tilaagiih gaaʼide tudugg tambal wa talʼab.Wa di bineeytah al‑waahide wa balaaha,ma indah wa la bitt wa la walad.
Wa min hu chaaf bittah,tawwaali gamma charrat khulgaanah wa gaal : Ya khasaarti !Ya bineeyti,rameetiini fi l‑hizin !Inti bas jibti leyi al‑taʼab !Ana aahadt Allah wa battaan ma nagdar nangud al‑ahad. 
Wa laakin hi gaalat leyah : Ya abuuyi,kan inta aahadt Allah,sawwi foogi misil inta gultah achaan Allah chaal leek al‑taar fi udwaanak Bani Ammuun. 
Wa battaan gaalat le abuuha : Natlub minnak bas muddit chahareen namchi fi l‑jibaal ana wa rafiigaati achaan nabki le banaatiiyti. 
Wa hu gaal leeha : Amchi. Wa hu khallaaha machat le muddit chahareen maʼa rafiigaatha le tabki le banaatiiyitha fi l‑jibaal.
Wa baʼad chahareen,hi gabbalat le abuuha wa hu tabbag ahadah al‑gaalah.Wa hi ma chaafat raajil.Wa da bigi aade fi Bani Israaʼiil,
kadar ayyi sana,banaat Bani Israaʼiil yamchan yahzanan le muddit arbaʼa yoom le bitt Yiftaah al‑min turaab Gilʼaad.
Wa rujaal Afraayim lammo wa macho ale Safuun.Wa humman gaalo le Yiftaah : Maala gataʼt huduud Bani Ammuun le tihaaribhum wa ma khabbartina achaan namchu maʼaak ?Fi chaan da,aniina niharrugu beetak fi raasak. 
Wa Yiftaah radda leehum wa gaal : Ana wa chaʼabi indina muchkila kabiire maʼa Bani Ammuun.Wa wakit ana naadeetku,intu ma jiitu fazaʼtuuni.
Wa wakit ana irift kadar intu ma taju tafzaʼooni,ana dasseet nafsi fi l‑khutuura wa gataʼt huduud Bani Ammuun wa Allah sallamaahum leyi fi iidi.Wa maala al‑yoom jiitu le tihaarubuuni ? 
Wa khalaas,Yiftaah lamma kulla rujaal Gilʼaad wa haarab gabiilat Afraayim.Wa rujaal Gilʼaad annasaro fi gabiilat Afraayim achaan awwal naas Afraayim gaalo : Intu ya rujaal Gilʼaad,intu arradtu min gabiilat Afraayim.Wa khalleetu gabiilitna le tamchu tabgo fi gabiilat Manassa. 
Wa rujaal Gilʼaad karabo ayyi derib hana bahar al‑Urdun al‑maachi ale ard Afraayim.Wa wakit raajil min Afraayim muʼarrid yuguul : Khalluuni nagtaʼ  ,rujaal Gilʼaad yuguulu leyah : Inta min gabiilat Afraayim walla ? Wa kan hu yuguul : La ,
humman yuguulu leyah : Min fadlak,guul :‹ Chibuuleet !›  Wa kan hu yuguul : Sibuuleet  achaan ma natagah adiil,khalaas humman yakurbuuh wa yadbahooh fi l‑derib hana bahar al‑Urdun.Wa fi l‑wakit daak,katalo 42 000 raajil min Afraayim.
Wa Yiftaah hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil sitte sana.Wa baʼad da,maat wa dafanooh fi waahide min mudun Gilʼaad.
Wa baʼad Yiftaah,Ibsaan al‑min Beet Laham hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Ibsaan indah 30 awlaad wa 30 banaat.Hu chaal banaatah al‑talaatiin wa jawwazaahum barra min al‑gabiila wa jaab le awlaadah 30 banaat min barra.Wa hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil sabʼa sana.
Wa baʼad da,Ibsaan maat wa dafanooh fi Beet Laham.
Wa baʼad Ibsaan,Iluun al‑min gabiilat Zabuluun hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil le muddit achara sana.
Wa baʼad da,Iluun maat wa dafanooh fi Ayyaluun fi ard gabiilat Zabuluun.
Wa baʼad Iluun,Abduun wileed Hilliil al‑min hillit Firʼatuun hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Abduun da iyaalah 40 wa iyaal iyaalah 30 wa kulluhum raakbiin fi 70 duhuuch.Wa hu hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil muddit tamaane sana.
Wa baʼad da,Abduun maat wa dafanooh fi hillit Firʼatuun fi ard gabiilat Afraayim,fi jibaal Amaalikh.
Wa battaan Bani Israaʼiil gammo yisawwu al‑fasaala giddaam Allah.Wa be da,Allah sallamaahum le l‑Filistiyiin le muddit 40 sana.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,fiyah raajil waahid min gabiilat Daan al‑yaskun fi hillit Saarʼa wa usmah Manuuh.Wa l‑raajil da,martah aagre ma jaabat iyaal.
Wa yoom waahid,malak Allah baan le martah wa gaal leeha : Ana naʼarif kadar inti aagre ma indiki iyaal.Wa laakin hassaʼ,inti tabge khalbaane wa tijiibi wileed.
Min hini le giddaam,fakkiri ma tacharbe khamar wa la ayyi charaab al‑bisakkir wa ma taakuli akil nijis,
achaan inti tabge khalbaane wa talde wileed.Wa kan wilidtiih,ma tizayyini raasah achaan al‑wileed da mukhassas le l‑Rabb min hu fi batunki.Wa hu bas al‑yabda yinajji Bani Israaʼiil min al‑Filistiyiin. 
Wa khalaas,al‑mara gabbalat fi l‑beet wa gaalat le raajilha : Fiyah raajil saalih hana Allah ja leyi wa l‑raajil da chooftah tikhawwif ziyaada.Akuun hu da malak Allah.Wa ana ma saʼaltah hu min ween wa hu kula ma ooraani usmah.
Wa hu gaal leyi :‹ Inti tabge khalbaane wa talde wileed.Wa min hini le giddaam,ma tacharbe khamar wa la ayyi charaab al‑bisakkir wa ma taakuli akil nijis achaan al‑wileed da mukhassas le l‑Rabb min hu fi batunki lahaddi yumuut.› 
Wa Manuuh saʼal Allah wa gaal : Ya Rabb,khalli al‑raajil al‑saalih al‑inta rassaltah da,yajiina battaan wa khalli yiwassifna al‑cheyy al‑nisawwuuh wakit al‑wileed da yaldooh. 
Wa khalaas,Allah khibil suʼaal Manuuh wa malak Allah ja battaan le martah wakit hi gaaʼide tihit fi l‑zereʼ.Wa raajilha Manuuh ma maʼaaha.
Wa tawwaali,al‑mara jarat le raajilha khabbaratah wa gaalat leyah : Daahu al‑raajil al‑jaani al‑yoom daak,battaan baan leyi ! 
Wa Manuuh gamma taabaʼ martah wa jo le l‑raajil.Wa hu gaal leyah : Inta bas al‑raajil al‑awwal kallamt le marti walla ? Wa hu radda leyah wa gaal : Aywa,ana bas. 
Wa Manuuh gaal leyah : Wakit kalaamak da yilhaggag,chunu al‑churuut al‑waajib leyah ?Wa aniina nisawwu chunu le l‑wileed da ? 
Wa malak Allah gaal le Manuuh : Kulla cheyy al‑ana gultah le martak di,khalli hi tifakkir foogah.
