Ma taakul ayyi cheyy al‑jaayi min al‑inab wa la tachrab khamar wa la ayyi charaab al‑bisakkir wa ma taakul akil nijis.Waajib hi titabbig kulla l‑kalaam al‑ana gultah leeha. 
Wa Manuuh gaal le malak Allah : Min fadlak,khalli nidayyufuuk wa nigaddumu leek sakhal. 
Wa malak Allah gaal le Manuuh : Hatta kan tidayyifni kula,ana ma naakul aklak.Wa laakin kan tidoor tigaddim dahiiye muharraga,gaddimha le Allah. Wa Manuuh ma irif kadar al‑raajil hu malak Allah.
Wa Manuuh gaal le malak Allah : Usmak yaatu ?Achaan wakit kalaamak da yilhaggag,nicharrufuuk ziyaada. 
Wa malak Allah gaal leyah : Maala tasʼalni min usmi ?Usmi hu ajiib bilheen. 
Wa Manuuh chaal sakhal wa hadiiye hana dagiig wa gaddamaahum dahiiye muharraga fi raas hajar waahid le Allah.Wa tawwaali,cheyy ajiib bigi giddaam Manuuh wa martah.
Wa wakit lahiib al‑naar gaaʼid yatlaʼ min al‑madbah le l‑sama,malak Allah kula talaʼ fi l‑lahiib.Wa wakit chaafo al‑cheyy da,Manuuh wa martah wagaʼo be wujuuhhum fi l‑ard.
Wa khalaas,Manuuh irif kadar da malak Allah.Wa malak Allah ma baan leyah hu wa la le martah battaan.
Wa Manuuh gaal le martah : Akiid aniina numuutu achaan chifna al‑Rabb ! 
Wa laakin martah gaalat leyah : Kan Allah dawwar yaktulna,ma khibil minnina al‑dahiiye al‑muharraga wa l‑hadiiye wa la wassafna kulla l‑achya dool wa la ooraana kulla l‑kalaam da. 
Wa l‑mara wildat wileed wa sammatah Chamchuun.Wa l‑wileed kibir wa Allah baarakah.
Wa fi mantagat Daan ambeen Saarʼa wa Achtawuul,Ruuh Allah nazal fi Chamchuun wa bada yichajjiʼah.
Wa yoom waahid,Chamchuun macha fi Timna wa hinaak hu chaaf mara waahide min banaat al‑Filistiyiin.
Wa hu macha le abuuh wa ammah wa gaal leehum : Fi Timna,ana chift mara waahide min banaat al‑Filistiyiin.Wa hassaʼ,amchu aakhuduuha leyi. 
Wa abuuh wa ammah gaalo leyah : Ma ligiit mara min banaat akhwaanak wa la min chaʼabna walla ?Maala tamchi tichiil mara min al‑Filistiyiin al‑ma mutahhariin dool ? Wa laakin Chamchuun gaal le abuuh : Al‑bineeye di bas ajabatni.Amchi aakhudha leyi ! 
Wa abuuh wa ammah ma irfo kadar be l‑cheyy da Allah yijiib fursa le muhaarabat al‑Filistiyiin.Wa hu gaaʼid yifattich tariiga le yihaarib al‑Filistiyiin.Achaan fi l‑wakit da,Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin tihit hukum al‑Filistiyiin.
Wa khalaas,Chamchuun macha Timna maʼa abuuh wa ammah.Wa wakit wassalo fi jineenaat al‑inab hana Timna,Chamchuun chaaf farkh hana duud gaaʼid yikirr jaari jaayi leyah.
Fi l‑bakaan da,Ruuh Allah nazal fi Chamchuun.Hu ma indah silaah fi iidah wa laakin be iideenah bas,karab al‑duud wa chaggah tineen misil sakhal.Wa hu ma kallam abuuh wa la ammah be l‑cheyy al‑sawwaah.
Wa hu macha Timna wa kallam maʼa l‑mara wa hi ajabatah.
Wa baʼad ayyaam,hu gabbal le yaakhudha.Wa hu baara min derbah achaan yichiif al‑rimme hana l‑duud.Wa fi lubb al‑rimme di,hu ligi beet hana nahale malaan asal.
Hu chaal min al‑asal da fi lubb iidah wa maachi wa gaaʼid yaakul.Wa wakit wassal bakaan abuuh wa ammah,hu antaahum wa akalo humman kula.Wa laakin ma khabbaraahum kadar chaal al‑asal da min lubb al‑rimme hana l‑duud.
Wa khalaas,abuuh gamma macha bakaan al‑mara.Chamchuun sawwa aazuuma hinaak wa da misil aadit al‑subyaan fi l‑wakit da.
Wa wakit al‑Filistiyiin chaafooh,humman azalo 30 subyaan le yagoodu maʼaayah.
Wa Chamchuun gaal leehum : Min fadulku,khalli nihajji leeku hijjeeye.Kan gidirtu iriftu maʼanaatha wa halleetuuha fi l‑sabʼa yoom hana l‑aazuuma,ana nantiiku 30 jawwaaniiye wa 30 khulgaan tikhayyuru beehum.
Wa laakin kan ma gidirtu halleetu al‑hijjeeye kamaan,intu tantuuni 30 jawwaaniiye wa 30 khulgaan nikhayyir beehum. Wa humman gaalo leyah : Guul hijjeeytak wa aniina nasmaʼooha. 
Wa Chamchuun gaal leehum : Min al‑biyaakul marag al‑akilwa min al‑gawi marag al‑halu. Wa muddit talaata yoom,al‑subyaan ma gidro yifassuru maʼana al‑hijjeeye di.
Wa laakin fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,humman gaalo le marit Chamchuun : Khuchchi raajilki le yiʼooriina maʼana al‑hijjeeye di.Kan ma khachcheetiih,aniina niharruguuki inti wa aayilat abuuki.Walla intu azamtuuna le tanhaboona ? 
Wa be da,marit Chamchuun bakat katiir wa gaalat leyah : Inta kirihtini wa abadan ma tihibbini.Al‑hijjeeye al‑inta gultaha le subyaan chaʼabi kula inta ma ooreetni maʼanaatha. Wa hu gaal leeha : Ana le abuuyi wa ammi kula ma ooreethum wa leeki inti bas niʼooriiki walla ? 
Wa fi muddit sabʼa yoom hana l‑aazuuma,hi daayman tabki.Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ,hu gaal leeha al‑maʼana achaan hi taʼʼabatah.Wa khalaas,hi machat kallamat maʼana al‑hijjeeye di le subyaan chaʼabha.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑saabiʼ gubbaal al‑harraay ma tagaʼ,naas al‑madiina gaalo leyah : Chunu al‑halu min al‑asalwa chunu al‑gawi min al‑duud ? Wa hu radda leehum wa gaal : Kan ma harattu maʼa ijilti,ma tihillu hijjeeyti. 
Wa khalaas,Ruuh Allah nazal foogah.Wa Chamchuun macha madiinat Achgaluun wa katal min sukkaanha 30 raajil wa chaal khulgaanhum wa antaahum le l‑naas al‑hallo al‑hijjeeye.Wa ziʼil chadiid wa gabbal le beet abuuh.
Wa marit Chamchuun kamaan,antooha le sabi al‑bigi waziirah.
Wa baʼad ayyaam fi wakit gatiʼiin al‑gameh,Chamchuun saafar macha bakaan martah.Wa wadda maʼaayah sakhal wa gaal : Nidoor nadkhul fi khurfit marti. Wa laakin abu martah ma antaah izin le yadkhul.
Wa gaal le Chamchuun : Ana hasabt inta abeetha wa ana anteetha le waziirak.Wa akhutha tariiditha ma samhe minha walla ?Khalaas chiilha fi badalha. 
Wa Chamchuun gaal : Hassaʼ da,kan nisawwi cheyy fasil fi l‑Filistiyiin kula,ma yagdaro yuluumuuni ! 
Wa macha karab 300 baʼaachiim wa kulli baʼaachiim itneen rabat dunubbaahum sawa.Wa khatta ambeenaat al‑dunubba al‑itneen dool kaniite.
Wa baʼad da,hu gabbad al‑kaniite wa talag al‑baʼaachiim fi ziraaʼat al‑Filistiyiin.Wa be da,hu harrag ganaadiil al‑gameh al‑waagif foog wa rubat al‑gameh al‑magtuuʼ.Wa hatta jineenaat al‑inab wa l‑zaytuun kula hirgo.
Wa l‑Filistiyiin gaalo : Yaatu al‑sawwa al‑cheyy da ? Wa gaalo leehum : Da Chamchuun nasiib al‑raajil al‑min hillit Timna achaan hu da,chaal martah wa antaaha le waziirah. Wa khalaas,al‑Filistiyiin macho harrago al‑mara di wa abuuha.
Wa Chamchuun gaal leehum : Hatta kan sawweetu al‑cheyy da kula,ana ma nagiif lahaddi nichiil taari foogku. 
Khalaas,hu hajamaahum wa hazamaahum haziime kabiire.Wa baʼad da,macha dakhal fi karkuur hajar Itaam wa gaʼad foogah.
Wa baʼad da,al‑Filistiyiin gammo khatto muʼaskarhum fi turaab Yahuuza wa hajamo Laahi.
Wa rujaal Yahuuza gaalo leehum : Maala gammeetu diddina ? Wa l‑Filistiyiin gaalo : Aniina gammeena achaan nakurbu Chamchuun wa nisawwu foogah misil hu sawwa foogna. 
Wa khalaas,3 000 raajil min Yahuuza gammo macho le l‑karkuur hana hajar Itaam.Wa gaalo le Chamchuun : Inta ma taʼarif kadar aniina gaaʼidiin tihit hukum al‑Filistiyiin walla ?Wa chunu al‑inta sawweetah da ? Wa hu gaal leehum : Ana sawweet fooghum misil humman sawwo foogi. 
Wa humman gaalo leyah : Aniina jiina le nakurbuuk wa nisallumuuk le l‑Filistiyiin. Wa Chamchuun gaal leehum : Ahalfu leyi kadar intu ke ma taktuluuni. 
Wa humman gaalo leyah : La,aniina nidooru nakurbuuk wa nisallumuuk leehum bas laakin ma naktuluuk. Khalaas,humman rabbatooh be hubaal judaad itneen wa maragooh min al‑karkuur.
Wa wakit ja gariib le Laahi,al‑Filistiyiin marago laagooh be korooraak hana harib.Laakin Ruuh Allah nazal foogah wa l‑hubaal al‑raabtiin beehum iideenah bigo misil al‑janaago al‑haragathum al‑naar wa daffago min iideenah.
Wa tawwaali,hu ligi saalfe hint humaar maat gariib waagʼe wa chaalha wa katal beeha 1 000 raajil.
Wa Chamchuun gaal : Be saalfit humaar,ana hazamtuhum !Be saalfit humaar bas,ana katalt 1 000 raajil. 
Wa min kammal kalaamah bas,hu zagal minnah al‑saalfe.Wa sammo al‑bakaan da Raamat Laahi (maʼanaatah jabal al‑Saalfe).
Wa hu atchaan ziyaada wa saʼal Allah wa gaal : Inta bas al‑jibt al‑nasur al‑kabiir da be iid ana abdak.Wa hassaʼ,hal ana numuut min al‑atach wa nagaʼ fi iideen al‑naas al‑ma mutahhariin walla ? 
Wa l‑Rabb chagga al‑jabal al‑fi Laahi wa almi jara minnah.Wa Chamchuun chirib wa battaan bigi chadiid wa hiyi.Wa be sabab da,een almi al‑gaaʼide lahaddi l‑yoom fi Laahi sammooha Een Khuuri (maʼanaatah een hana l‑naadum al‑yasʼal Allah).
Wa fi wakit al‑Filistiyiin,Chamchuun hakam fi balad Israaʼiil 20 sana.
Yoom waahid,Chamchuun macha madiinat Khazza wa hinaak hu chaaf mara charmuuta wa macha ragad fi beetha.
Wa gaalo le sukkaan Khazza : Chamchuun ja hini. Khalaas humman hawwago al‑madiina wa karaso jamb baab al‑madiina tuul al‑leel.Wa ma harrako min bakaanhum tuul al‑leel achaan gaalo : Khalli narjo nuur al‑fajur wa naktuluuh. 
Wa laakin Chamchuun ragad lahaddi ust al‑leel.Wa fi ust al‑leel,gamma macha marrag biibaan al‑madiina wa maraadiishum wa chaalaahum fi kataafeeh wa waddaahum lahaddi raas al‑hajar al‑mugaabil Hibruun.
Wa baʼad da,Chamchuun dawwar mara waahide usumha Daliila al‑gaaʼide ale waadi Suurikh.
Wa kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin macho le l‑mara di wa gaalo leeha : Khuchchiih wa asʼaleeh min ween yaji sirr gudurtah al‑kabiire di.Fattichi kikkeef nagdaro foogah wa nirabbutuuh.Wa ayyi waahid minnina yantiiki 1 100 hajar fudda. 
Wa Daliila gaalat le Chamchuun : Ooriini min ween ligiit sirr gudurtak al‑kabiire di wa be chunu yarbutuuk wa gudurtak al‑kabiire di tabga ma fiiha. 
Wa Chamchuun gaal leeha : Kan rabbatooni be sabʼa hubaal hana nubbaal neyyiin ma muyabbasiin,khalaas gudurti tabga ma fiiha wa nabga misil kulla l‑naas. 
Wa kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin jaabo le Daliila sabʼa hubaal hana nubbaal neyyiin ma muyabbasiin wa hi rabbatatah be l‑hubaal dool.
Wa naas waahidiin allabbado fi khurfitha wa l‑mara koorakat wa gaalat : Chamchuun,al‑Filistiyiin hajamook ! Wa khalaas,Chamchuun gataʼ al‑hubaal dool misil gataʼoohum be naar.Wa laakin ma ligo al‑sirr hana gudurtah.
Wa Daliila gaalat le Chamchuun : Inta khachcheetni wa gult leyi kalaam kidib.Wa hassaʼ,ooriini be chunu yirabbutuuk ? 
Wa hu gaal leeha : Kan rabbatooni gawi be hubaal judaad al‑yoom waahid ma sawwo beehum khidme,khalaas gudurti tabga ma fiiha wa nabga misil kulla l‑naas. 
Wa khalaas,Daliila chaalat hubaal judaad wa rabbatatah wa gaalat : Chamchuun,al‑Filistiyiin hajamook ! Wa fi l‑wakit daak,naas waahidiin mullabbidiin fi l‑khurfa wa laakin Chamchuun gataʼ al‑hubaal al‑marbuut beehum misil al‑kheet.
Wa Daliila gaalat le Chamchuun : Hassaʼ kula inta khachcheetni wa gult leyi kalaam kidib.Ooriini be chunu yirabbutuuk ? Wa hu gaal leeha : Kan machatti sabʼa chaʼar fi raasi be khuyuut hana gabag wa rabattiihum fi mutraara,khalaas gudurti tabga ma fiiha wa nabga misil kulla l‑naas. 
Wa khalaas,hi nawwamatah wa machatat sabʼa chaʼar fi raasah be khuyuut hana gabag wa rabatatah fi witid wa gaalat : Chamchuun,al‑Filistiyiin hajamook ! Fi l‑bakaan da,Chamchuun wiʼi min noomah wa marag al‑mutraara al‑marbuut foogha al‑chaʼar al‑madfuur be khuyuut al‑gabag.
Wa Daliila gaalat : Kikkeef tagdar tuguul leyi :‹ Ana nihibbiki !› Galbak ma maʼaayi !Wa daahu talaata marraat,inta khachcheetni wa abeet ma ooreetni sirr gudurtak al‑kabiire di. 
Wa hi gaaʼide tibachtinah kulla yoom le Chamchuun lahaddi hu iyi min bachtanatha.
Wa khalaas,ooraaha sirrah min daakhal galbah wa gaal : Ana raasi yoom waahid ma zayyanooh achaan ana mukhassas le l‑Rabb min ana fi batun ammi.Kan zayyanooni,gudurti tabga ma fiiha marra waahid wa nabga misil kulla l‑naas. 
Wa wakit Daliila irfat kadar hu ooraaha sirrah min daakhal galbah,hi rassalat le kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin wa gaalat leehum : Al‑yoom kula taʼaalu achaan hu ooraani sirrah min daakhal galbah. Wa kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin jo fi bakaanha chaayliin maʼaahum al‑fudda al‑hajjooha leeha.
Hi nawwamat Chamchuun fi rijilha wa naadat naadum waahid zayyan al‑sabʼa chaʼar al‑mamchuut fi raasah.Khalaas fi l‑bakaan da,hi gidrat foogah wa gudurtah kula bigat ma fiiha.
Wa Daliila gaalat leyah : Chamchuun,al‑Filistiyiin hajamook ! Tawwaali,hu wiʼi min noomah wa fakkar wa gaal : Namrug minhum misil awwal wa ninbalis. Wa laakin hu ma irif kadar Allah baʼʼadah minnah.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,al‑Filistiyiin karabooh wa gaddado uyuunah.Wa humman chaalooh wa waddooh fi Khazza.Wa rabbatooh be guyuud hana nahaas wa jabarooh yarhak gameh fi lubb al‑sijin.
Wa laakin baʼad zayyanooh,battaan suuf raasah bada yugumm.
Yoom waahid,kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin lammo wa gaddamo dahiiye kabiire le ilaahhum Daguun.Wa gaaʼidiin yafraho wa yuguulu : Ilaahna sallam leena aduuna Chamchuun fi iideenna ! 
Wa wakit al‑chaʼab chaafo Chamchuun,chakaro ilaahhum wa gaalo : Ilaahna sallam leena aduuna fi iideenna !Hu bas al‑kharab baladna wa kattar maytiinna. 
Wa laakin wakit firho ziyaada,gaalo : Naadu leena Chamchuun le yidahhikna. Wa humman jaabooh min al‑sijin wa jabarooh yalʼab giddaamhum.Wa humman waggafooh ambeen amad beet al‑ibaada da.
Wa Chamchuun gaal le l‑sabi al‑karabah min iidah : Guudni wa khalliini nalmas al‑amad hana beet al‑ibaada achaan nirrakkaz fooghum. 
Wa beet al‑ibaada da malaan be rujaal wa awiin wa kulla kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin kula gaaʼidiin.Wa battaan fi raas al‑beet,hawaale 3 000 rujaal wa awiin gaaʼidiin yichiifu Chamchuun al‑gaaʼid yalʼab.
Wa Chamchuun naada Allah wa gaal : Ya Allah Rabbi,fakkir foogi wa gaddirni aakhir marra le nichiil al‑taar fi l‑Filistiyiin fi chaan gaddado uyuuni. 
Wa Chamchuun karab al‑amad al‑itneen al‑ust al‑bano fooghum beet al‑ibaada wa arrakkaz fooghum iidah al‑zeene fi amuud wa l‑isra kula fi l‑amuud al‑aakhar.
Wa gaal : Khalli numuut maʼa l‑Filistiyiin ! Wa be gudra lazza al‑amad al‑itneen wa khalaas beet al‑ibaada wagaʼ fi l‑kubaaraat wa kulla l‑chaʼab al‑gaaʼidiin foogah.Wa l‑naas al‑katalaahum maʼaayah fi wakit mootah aktar min al‑naas al‑katalaahum wakit hu hayy.
Wa khalaas akhwaanah wa kulla aayilat abuuh jo chaalo janaaztah wa waddooh dafanooh ambeen hillaal Saarʼa wa Achtawuul fi khabur abuuh Manuuh.Wa Chamchuun hakam fi Israaʼiil 20 sana.
Fiyah raajil waahid min jibaal Afraayim usmah Miika.
Wa l‑raajil da gaal le ammah : Ana simiʼtiki talʼane al‑naadum al‑sirig minki 1 100 hajar fudda.Al‑fudda di fi bakaani.Ana bas chiltaha. Wa ammah gaalat leyah : Allah yibaarikak,ya wileedi. 
Wa hu gabbal al‑alif wa miya hajar fudda le ammah wa laakin hi gaalat leyah : Ana khassast al‑fudda di le Allah wa nantiiha leek inta wileedi achaan tasnaʼ beeha sanam wa timsaal hana hadiid.Wa daahu ana nigabbilha leek. 
Wa misil da,wakit hu gabbal al‑fudda le ammah,hi chaalat 200 hajar fudda wa antathum le l‑haddaadi.Wa hu sanaʼ beeha sanam wa timsaal hana hadiid wa khattoohum fi beet Miika.
Wa Miika indah beet hana ilaahah.Hu sanaʼ farmala hana raajil al‑diin wa tamaasiil wa darraj waahid min awlaadah le yabga leyah raajil diin.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,ma fi malik fi Israaʼiil wa ayyi naadum bisawwi cheyy al‑hu bidoorah.
Wa fiyah sabi waahid Laawi al‑saakin fi Beet Laham fi turaab gabiilat Yahuuza.
Wa yoom waahid,al‑naadum da gamma macha min Beet Laham fi turaab Yahuuza le yifattich bakaan aakhar yaskun foogah.Wa wakit ja fi jibaal Afraayim,sudfa fi derbah hu ligi beet Miika.
Wa Miika gaal leyah : Inta jaayi min ween ? Wa hu gaal leyah : Ana Laawi min Beet Laham fi turaab Yahuuza wa maachi nifattich bakaan naskun foogah. 
Wa khalaas,Miika gaal leyah : Agood maʼaayi wa abga leyi abu wa raajil diin.Wa ana nantiik achara hajar fudda fi ayyi sana wa khulgaan wa akil. Wa l‑Laawi dakhal beetah.
Wa hu khassad yagood maʼa Miika wa hu jaʼalah misil waahid min awlaadah.
Wa Miika darraj al‑Laawi da raajil diin wa gaʼʼadah maʼaayah fi beetah.
Wa Miika gaal : Hassaʼ da,ana naʼarif kadar Allah yisawwi leyi al‑kheer achaan al‑Laawi da bigi leyi raajil diin. 
Wa fi l‑wakit da,ma fi malik fi Israaʼiil.Wa gabiilat Daan gaaʼide tifattich turaab al‑taskun foogah achaan hi lissaaʼ ma ligat ard warasa ambeen gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa min hillaalhum Saarʼa wa Achtawuul,naas gabiilat Daan rassalo rujaal khamsa fahaliin min gabiilithum achaan yamchu yuruukhu wa yichiifu al‑balad.Wa gaalo leehum : Amchu chiifu al‑balad. Wa l‑rujaal al‑khamsa wassalo fi jibaal Afraayim wa ligo beet Miika wa naamo foogah.
Wa wakit gaaʼidiin jamb beet Miika,humman irfo al‑lahja al‑hajja beeha al‑sabi al‑Laawi.Wa garrabo leyah wa saʼalooh wa gaalo : Yaatu al‑jaabak hini ?Gaaʼid tisawwi chunu fi l‑bakaan da ?Wa chunu al‑gaʼʼadaak hini ? 
Wa hu radda leehum wa gaal : Miika sawwa leyi misil da wa hu ajjaraani wa ana bigiit leyah raajil diin. 
Wa humman gaalo leyah : Asʼal leena al‑Rabb achaan naʼarfu kan makhatarna da yanjah walla la. 
Wa raajil al‑diin gaal leehum : Amchu be l‑salaam fi makhatarku.Allah maʼaaku. 
Wa l‑rujaal al‑khamsa macho giddaam wa wassalo hillit Layich.Wa chaafo kadar sukkaanha haadiyiin wa aaychiin fi raaha wa amaan hasab aadit al‑Seeduuniyiin.Wa fi l‑balad di,ma fi naadum yibarjilhum walla yazlumhum.Wa sukkaan Layich baʼiidiin min al‑Seeduuniyiin wa ma induhum naas al‑yahfadoohum.
Wakit al‑rujaal al‑khamsa gabbalo le akhwaanhum fi Saarʼa wa Achtawuul,akhwaanhum gaalo leehum : Chunu al‑khabar ? 
Wa humman raddo leehum wa gaalo : Yalla !Nugummu didduhum achaan aniina chifna al‑balad wa hi samha marra waahid.Ma tagoodu saakit !Yalla !Gummu amchu le l‑balad di le tichiiluuha.
Wa wakit tiwassulu fi l‑balad di,talgo chaʼab gaaʼidiin be amaan wa kulla l‑balad wasiiʼe giddaamku achaan al‑Rabb sallamaaha leeku fi iideeku.Wa cheyy mugassir fi l‑balad di ke ma fiih. 
Wa khalaas min gabiilat Daan,600 rujaal musallahiin gammo min Saarʼa wa Achtawuul wa macho.
Wa humman macho nazalo fi Kharyat Yaʼariim fi turaab Yahuuza.Achaan da,lahaddi l‑yoom yinaadu al‑bakaan da Mahana Daan (maʼanaatah fariig Daan).Wa l‑bakaan da gaaʼid kharib le Kharyat Yaʼariim.
Wa min al‑bakaan da,macho le jibaal Afraayim wa ligo beet Miika.
Wa l‑rujaal al‑khamsa al‑macho raakho hillit Layich gaalo le akhwaanhum : Hal taʼarfu kadar fi l‑buyuut dool fi farmala hana raajil al‑diin wa tamaasiil wa sanam wa timsaal hana hadiid walla ?Wa hassaʼ da,fakkuru fi l‑cheyy al‑waajib tisawwuuh. 
Wa jo dakhalo fi beet al‑sabi al‑Laawi al‑gaaʼid maʼa Miika wa sallamooh.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,al‑suttumiya rujaal musallahiin al‑min naas gabiilat Daan waagfiin fi khachum al‑baab.
Wa l‑rujaal al‑khamsa al‑macho raakho al‑balad dakhalo wa chaalo al‑sanam wa l‑farmala wa l‑tamaasiil wa timsaal hana l‑hadiid.Wa fi l‑wakit da,raajil al‑diin wa l‑suttumiya rujaal musallahiin waagfiin fi khachum al‑baab.
Wa wakit al‑rujaal dool dakhalo fi beet Miika wa chaalo al‑sanam wa l‑farmala wa l‑tamaasiil wa l‑timsaal hana l‑hadiid,raajil al‑diin gaal leehum : Tisawwuuh chunu ? 
Wa humman gaalo leyah : Askut wa khutt iidak fi khachmak !Taʼaal maʼaana wa abga leena abu wa raajil diin.Da akheer leek tabga raajil diin le aayila hana raajil waahid bas aw le gabiila tamaama fi Israaʼiil ? 
Wa khalaas,raajil al‑diin galbah firih wa chaal al‑farmala wa l‑tamaasiil wa l‑sanam wa macha maʼa l‑rujaal al‑musallahiin.
Wa khalaas,gammo maachiin wa khatto giddaamhum al‑iyaal wa l‑bahaayim wa l‑khumaam.
Wa wakit baʼʼado min beet Miika,al‑rujaal al‑saakniin jamb beet Miika lammo wa gammo didd naas gabiilat Daan wa macho waraahum.
Wa l‑rujaal dool gaaʼidiin yiʼiitu foog naas gabiilat Daan.Wa naas gabiilat Daan gabbalo le Miika wa gaalo leyah : Maala gawwamt al‑rujaal dool diddina ? 
Wa Miika gaal : Al‑ilaahaat al‑ana sawweethum,intu chiltuuhum !Wa raajil al‑diin kula chiltuuh wa macheetu beyah.Battaan faddal leyi chunu ?Wa kikkeef tuguulu leyi :‹ Inta maalak ?› 
Wa naas gabiilat Daan raddo leyah wa gaalo : Ma tiʼayyiina be kalaamak.Wa kan abeet kamaan,rujaal galibhum murr yahjumuuk wa inta tijiib al‑moot fi nafsak wa fi aayiltak ! 
Wa khalaas,naas gabiilat Daan chaalo deribhum wa macho.Wa wakit Miika chaaf humman induhum gudra ziyaada minnah,hu gabbal beetah.
Wa naas gabiilat Daan chaalo al‑khumaam al‑Miika sanaʼaahum wa raajil al‑diin al‑khadam leyah wa macho fi Layich.Wa sukkaanha al‑gaaʼidiin fi raaha wa amaan,kataloohum be l‑seef wa harrago al‑madiina.
Wa ma fi naadum al‑yinajjiihum achaan al‑hille baʼiide min Seeda wa ma induhum alaakha maʼa naas aakhariin kula.Hi gaaʼide fi l‑waadi hana Beet Rahuub.Wa naas gabiilat Daan bano al‑hille di battaan wa gaʼado foogha.
Wa sammo al‑hille be usum jidduhum Daan wileed Yaakhuub wa laakin al‑hille di zamaan binaaduuha Layich.
Wa naas gabiilat Daan khatto leehum sanam Miika.Wa Yuunataan wileed Girchuum wileed Muusa wa iyaalah bigo rujaal diin le naas gabiilat Daan lahaddi chaaloohum wa waddoohum fi l‑khurba.
Wa l‑sanam al‑sanaʼah Miika gaaʼid fi bakaanah fi kulla l‑mudda al‑gaaʼid foogha beet Allah fi Chiilooh.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,ma fi malik fi Israaʼiil.Wa fiyah raajil waahid Laawi saakin fi jibaal Afraayim wa akhad leyah mara sirriiye min Beet Laham fi turaab Yahuuza.
Wa l‑sirriiye di alkhabbanat minnah wa machat beet abuuha fi Beet Laham fi turaab Yahuuza wa gaʼadat hinaak le muddit arbaʼa chahar.
Wa l‑raajil macha waraaha achaan yiraddiiha wa yijiibha.Wa hu chaal maʼaayah khaddaamah wa hamiir itneen.Wa l‑sirriiye di faddalat raajilha fi beet abuuha wa wakit abuuha chaafah,gamma laagaah be farah.
Wa abu al‑mara di dayyaf nasiibah wa fi muddit talaata yoom,al‑Laawi wa khaddaamah yaakulu wa yacharbo wa yunuumu fi l‑bakaan da.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑raabiʼ,al‑Laawi gamma be fajur badri wa jahhaz khumaamah le l‑safar.Wa abu martah gaal leyah : Agiif,aakul leek akil chiyya wa baʼad da,amchu. 
Khalaas,humman al‑itneen gaʼado wa akalo wa chirbo sawa.Wa abu al‑mara gaal le nasiibah : Min fadlak,khassid al‑leele kula,nuum maʼaana wa anjamma. 
Al‑Laawi gamma yidoor yamchi wa laakin fi chaan talab nasiibah,hu naam al‑leele di.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑khaamis,al‑Laawi gamma be fajur badri le yisaafir.Wa laakin abu martah gaal leyah : Min fadlak,anjamma wa akhkhir safarak da lahaddi baʼad al‑duhur. Wa humman al‑itneen akalo sawa.
Wa baʼad da,al‑raajil gamma yidoor yamchi hu wa sirriiytah wa khaddaamah.Wa laakin abu martah gaal leyah : Ana nichiif al‑wata di bigat achiiye wa l‑harraay kula gariib tagaʼ,khalaas al‑leele di kula nuum hini wa anjamma.Wa ambaakir fajur kamaan,saafuru gabbulu beetku. 
Wa laakin fi l‑marra di,al‑Laawi aba ma yunuum.Wa gamma macha maʼa hamiirah al‑itneen machduudiin wa sirriiytah lahaddi wassal mugaabil Yabuus yaʼni Uruchaliim.
Wa wakit wassalo gariib le Yabuus,al‑makhrib garrabat.Wa l‑khaddaam gaal le siidah : Khalli nidallu fi madiinat al‑Yabuusiyiin di wa nunuumu foogha. 
Wa siidah gaal leyah : Ma nidallu fi madiina ajnabiiye al‑sukkaanha ma min Bani Israaʼiil.Khalli namchu giddaam lahaddi Gibeeʼa. 
Wa gaal battaan le khaddaamah : Yalla namchu ale hillaal Gibeeʼa aw al‑Raama wa nunuumu fi waahide minhum. 
Wa macho giddaam wa fi wakit al‑makhrib,wassalo gariib le hillit Gibeeʼa fi turaab Banyaamiin.
Wa dallo fi Gibeeʼa le yunuumu foogha.Wa dakhalo al‑hille wa gaʼado fi nagaʼa fi usutha wa laakin naadum waahid kula ma faddalaahum fi beetah le yunuumu maʼaayah.
Wa khalaas,humman chaafo chaayib waahid jaayi min al‑ziraaʼa be makhrib.Wa l‑chaayib da min jibaal Afraayim wa aayich fi Gibeeʼa fi turaab Banyaamiin.
Wa wakit al‑chaayib rafaʼ raasah,chaaf al‑raajil al‑musaafir fi nagaʼat al‑hille wa gaal : Jaayi min ween wa maachi ween ? 
Wa hu radda leyah wa gaal : Aniina jaayiin min Beet Laham fi turaab Yahuuza wa maachiin lahaddi lubb jibaal Afraayim achaan ana naskun hinaak.Ana macheet Beet Laham wa hassaʼ,mugabbil le beet Allah fi bakaani.Wa laakin naadum faddalaani fi beetah ke ma fiih.
Indina gechch wa alfa le hamiirna wa khubza wa khamar leyi ana wa sirriiyti wa l‑khaddaam al‑maʼaana.Wa cheyy gassar leena ke ma fiih. 
Wa l‑chaayib radda leyah wa gaal : Al‑salaam aleekum !Akiid kulla cheyy al‑tidoorah ana nichiil masʼuuliiytah wa laakin ma tunuum fi l‑nagaʼa di. 
Wa hu waddaahum beetah wa anta al‑hamiir alfa.Wa l‑diifaan khassalo rijleehum wa akalo wa chirbo.
Wa wakit humman gaaʼidiin yinjammo,tawwaali rujaal waahidiin ma naafʼiin min al‑hille jo hawwago al‑beet.Wa taggo al‑baab be chidde wa gaalo le l‑chaayib siid al‑beet : Amrug leena al‑naadum al‑dakhal fi beetak da achaan narugdu maʼaayah. 
Wa siid al‑beet marag wa gaal leehum : La,ya akhwaani,ma tisawwu al‑fasil da !Al‑raajil da deef fi beeti wa khalaas ma tisawwu leyah al‑fiʼil al‑cheen da !
Wa di hi bineeyti udriiye wa sirriiyit al‑raajil da.Namrughin leeku le tisawwu fooghin kulla cheyy al‑tidooruuh.Wa laakin le l‑raajil da,ma tisawwu leyah fiʼil cheen misil da. 
Wa l‑rujaal dool abo ma yasmaʼo kalaam al‑chaayib.Wa khalaas,al‑Laawi karab sirriiytah wa maragaaha leehum barra.Wa humman chaalooha wa ragado maʼaaha be gu tuul al‑leel lahaddi fajur.Wa gariib sabaah bas,humman khallooha.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,al‑mara jaat wagaʼat fi khachum baab al‑chaayib al‑raajilha gaaʼid fi bakaanah wa ragadat fi bakaanha da lahaddi al‑harraay talaʼat.
Wa be fajur badri,wakit raajilha fatah al‑baab le yisaafir,hu ligi sirriiytah waagʼe fi khachum al‑baab be iideenha fi l‑ataba.
Wa hu gaal leeha : Yalla gummi namchu. Wa laakin hi ma raddat leyah.Khalaas,hu chadda janaazitha fi l‑humaar wa macha lahaddi wassal bakaanah.
Wakit wassal beetah,chaal sakkiin wa gattaʼ janaazit sirriiytah ale 12 koom wa rassalhum le ayyi gabiila fi balad Israaʼiil.
Wa l‑Laawi gaal le murassaliinah : Guulu le kulla Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Min maragna min balad Masir lahaddi l‑yoom,hal cheyy misil da bigi walla ?Fakkuru wa achchaawaro ambeenaatku wa kallumu be raayku !›  Wa ayyi naadum al‑chaaf al‑cheyy da gaal : Min Bani Israaʼiil marago min balad Masir lahaddi l‑yoom da,cheyy misil da ma bigi. 
Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil marago min Daan fi l‑munchaakh lahaddi Biir Sabʼa fi l‑wati wa lahaddi turaab Gilʼaad wa lammo be galib waahid giddaam Allah fi hillit Misfa.
Wa kubaaraat al‑chaʼab hana kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil hidro fi malammat chaʼab al‑Rabb.Wa adadhum 400 000 askar al‑yaʼarfu harb al‑suyuuf.
Wa naas gabiilat Banyaamiin simʼo kadar Bani Israaʼiil jo fi Misfa.Wa Bani Israaʼiil gaalo : Ooruuna kikkeef al‑fasaala di bigat. 
Wa l‑Laawi raajil al‑mara al‑katalooha gaal : Ana wa sirriiyti wassalna fi Gibeeʼa fi turaab Banyaamiin le nunuumu foogha.
Wa sukkaan Gibeeʼa gammo diddi wa be l‑leel,hawwago al‑beet al‑ana dalleet foogah wa dawwaro yaktuluuni.Wa chaalo sirriiyti wa ragado maʼaaha be gu lahaddi maatat.
Wa ana chilt janaazit sirriiyti wa gattaʼtaha wa rassaltaha fi kulla ard warasa hana Bani Israaʼiil achaan al‑naas dool sawwo fasaala wa fiʼil cheen fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Daahu intu kulluku,ya Bani Israaʼiil,hajju wa achchaawaro ambeenaatku hini bas wa antuuna raayku. 
Wa kulla l‑chaʼab gammo be galib waahid wa gaalo : Naadum minnina waahid kula ma yigabbil le kheemtah wa la le beetah.
Wa hassaʼ daahu al‑cheyy al‑nisawwuuh le Gibeeʼa.Nisawwu amʼiyeedaat wa nugummu diddaha.
Wa nichiilu rujaal min kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil.Min al‑miya,nichiilu 10 wa min al‑alif,nichiilu 100 wa min al‑achara alif nichiilu 1 000.Wa l‑naas dool yijiibu akil le l‑rujaal al‑yamchu yahjumu Gibeeʼa hana Banyaamiin le yisawwu fooghum hasab fiʼilhum al‑cheen al‑sawwooh fi Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa khalaas,kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil gammo be galib waahid didd al‑hille di.
Wa gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil rassalo rujaal le gabiilat Banyaamiin le yasʼaloohum wa yuguulu leehum : Chunu al‑fasaala al‑bigat fi bakaanku di ?
Wa hassaʼ da,sallumuuna al‑naas al‑ma naafʼiin hana Gibeeʼa le naktuluuhum wa namurgu al‑fasaala min Israaʼiil ! Wa laakin naas gabiilat Banyaamiin abo ma yasmaʼo kalaam akhwaanhum Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa naas gabiilat Banyaamiin jo min hillaalhum wa lammo fi Gibeeʼa achaan yihaarubu Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,naas gabiilat Banyaamiin al‑jo min al‑hillaal,hasaboohum wa adadhum bigi 26 000 askar al‑yaʼarfu harb al‑suyuuf.Wa da,bala sukkaan Gibeeʼa al‑adadhum 700 raajil min ahsan al‑muhaaribiin.
Wa min kulla l‑rujaal dool fiyah 700 rujaal israayiin min ahsan al‑muhaaribiin.Al‑waahid minhum be hajar miglaaʼah yagdar yagtaʼ al‑kheet.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil kula hasabo nufuushum bala naas gabiilat Banyaamiin wa adadhum bigi 400 000 askar al‑yaʼarfu harb al‑suyuuf wa kulluhum muhaaribiin.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil macho Beet Iil wa saʼalo al‑Rabb wa gaalo : Yaatu minnina yamchi awwal le muhaarabat naas gabiilat Banyaamiin ? Wa Allah gaal leehum : Naas gabiilat Yahuuza bas yamchu awwal. 
Wa khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil gammo be fajur badri wa macho nazalo jamb Gibeeʼa.
Wa gammo le yihaarubu Banyaamiin wa rasso le l‑harib mugaabiliin Gibeeʼa.
Wa naas gabiilat Banyaamiin marago min Gibeeʼa le yihaarubuuhum.Wa fi l‑yoom da,katalo 22 000 raajil min Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa rujaal Israaʼiil chaddo heelhum wa battaan rasso le l‑harib fi bakaanhum al‑awwal yoom rasso foogah.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil macho bako giddaam Allah lahaddi l‑achiiye wa saʼalooh wa gaalo : Battaan namchu nihaarubu didd akhwaanna naas gabiilat Banyaamiin walla ? Wa Allah radda leehum wa gaal : Gummu didduhum. 
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taani,Bani Israaʼiil garrabo le naas gabiilat Banyaamiin
wa naas gabiilat Banyaamiin marago min Gibeeʼa le yigaabuluuhum.Wa fi l‑yoom da,katalo 18 000 raajil min Bani Israaʼiil,kulluhum askar al‑yaʼarfu harb al‑suyuuf.
Wa khalaas,kulla chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil macho Beet Iil wa gaʼado tihit wa bako le Allah.Wa l‑yoom da,saamo lahaddi l‑achiiye wa gaddamo dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya salaama le Allah.
Bani Israaʼiil saʼalo Allah achaan fi l‑wakit daak,sanduug muʼaahadat al‑Rabb gaaʼid fi Beet Iil.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,Fiinhaas wileed Aliʼaazar wileed Haaruun gaaʼid giddaam al‑sanduug da.Wa hu gaal : Battaan namchu nihaarubu didd akhwaanna naas gabiilat Banyaamiin walla la ? Wa Allah radda leehum wa gaal : Amchu,achaan ambaakir ana nisallimhum leeku. 
Wa khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil hawwago Gibeeʼa wa rabato kamiin.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taalit,Bani Israaʼiil gammo didd Banyaamiin wa rasso mugaabiliin Gibeeʼa misil fi l‑marraat al‑faato.
Wa iyaal Banyaamiin marago le yigaabulu rujaalhum wa macho baʼiid min al‑hille.Wa gammo yaktulu rujaalhum misil fi l‑marraat al‑faato.Wa katalo min Bani Israaʼiil hawaale 30 raajil fi l‑derib al‑maachi le Beet Iil wa fi l‑derib hana l‑kadaade al‑maachi le Gibeeʼa.
Wa iyaal Banyaamiin gaalo : Daahu battaan hazamnaahum misil awwal ! Wa laakin Bani Israaʼiil gaalo : Khalli niʼarrudu minhum wa namurguuhum baʼiid min al‑hille fi l‑duruub. 
Wa kulluhum arrado lahaddi wislo Baʼal Taamaar wa hinaak,laffo wa rasso battaan le l‑harib.Wa laakin rujaal Bani Israaʼiil fi l‑kamiin marago be surʼa min bakaanhum gariib le hillit Gabaʼ.
Wa 10 000 raajil min ahsan al‑muhaaribiin hana Bani Israaʼiil jo gaabalo Gibeeʼa wa l‑harib da bigi chadiid.Wa laakin iyaal Banyaamiin ma irfo kadar al‑masiibe taji fooghum.
Wa Allah hazam iyaal Banyaamiin giddaam Bani Israaʼiil.Fi l‑yoom da,Bani Israaʼiil katalo 25 100 raajil,kulluhum askar al‑yaʼarfu harb al‑suyuuf.
Wa baʼad da,iyaal Banyaamiin irfo kadar humman anhazamo.Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil arrado giddaam naas Banyaamiin achaan humman antakalo ale l‑kamiin al‑humman rabatooh hawaale Gibeeʼa.
Wa be surʼa,naas al‑kamiin gammo hajamo Gibeeʼa wa katalo kulla naas al‑hille be l‑seef.
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil astafago maʼa naas al‑kamiin achaan humman yisawwu alaama hana dukhkhaan fi l‑hille.
Wa be da,Bani Israaʼiil gabbalo battaan le l‑harib wa iyaal Banyaamiin bado yaktulu minhum hawaale 30 raajil.Wa gaalo : Daahu battaan hazamnaahum misil awwal ! 
Wa tawwaali,al‑alaama hint al‑dukhkhaan badat tatlaʼ min al‑hille.Wa wakit iyaal Banyaamiin anlafato,chaafo al‑hille kullaha ke gammat naar wa dukhkhaanha talaʼ fi l‑sama.
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil gabbalo le l‑harib.Wa rujaal Banyaamiin anbahato achaan humman irfo kadar al‑masiibe khalaas jaat fooghum.
Wa humman arrado giddaam Bani Israaʼiil wa jaro ale l‑sahara.Wa laakin dakhalo ambeen al‑rujaal al‑gaaʼidiin yitaaruduuhum wa l‑rujaal al‑marago min al‑hille.Wa humman kataloohum marra waahid.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil hajamoohum le iyaal Banyaamiin min kulli jiihe.Wa taaradoohum lahaddi sabaah min Gibeeʼa wa ma khalloohum yinjammo wa kataloohum hinaak.
Wa min iyaal Banyaamiin,18 000 rujaal fahaliin maato.
Wa aakhariin arrado ale l‑sahara le hajar Rimmuun.Wa Bani Israaʼiil katalo minhum 5 000 raajil fi l‑duruub wa taaradoohum lahaddi Gidʼuum wa katalo battaan minhum 2 000 raajil.
Wa be l‑jumla,adad iyaal Banyaamiin al‑maato fi l‑yoom da 25 000 askar al‑yaʼarfu harb al‑suyuuf.
Wa 600 rujaal kamaan arrado ale l‑sahara le hajar Rimmuun wa gaʼado fi l‑hajar da arbaʼa chahar.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gabbalo didd iyaal Banyaamiin wa katalo kulla sukkaan hillaalhum be l‑seef lahaddi bahaayimhum wa dammaro kulla cheyy al‑ligooh.Wa ziyaada min da,tachcho kulla l‑hillaal al‑fi deribhum.
Wakit Bani Israaʼiil lammo fi Misfa,humman halafo wa gaalo : Khalli ayyi naadum minnina ma yijawwiz bittah le raajil min gabiilat Banyaamiin. 
Wa baʼad al‑harib da,al‑chaʼab jo fi Beet Iil wa gaʼado giddaam al‑Rabb lahaddi l‑achiiye.Wa humman bako ziyaada wa dumuuʼhum kula daffago katiir.
Wa gaalo : Ya Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,maala al‑yoom waahide min gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil bigat ma fiiha ? 
Wa ambaakir,al‑chaʼab bakkaro wa bano madbah fi l‑bakaan da wa gaddamo foogah dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya salaama.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gaalo : Yaatu min kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil ma hidir fi l‑malamma fi Misfa giddaam Allah ? Achaan fi l‑yoom da fi Misfa,humman halafo le yaktulu ayyi naadum al‑ma hidir fi l‑malamma giddaam Allah.
Wa hassaʼ Bani Israaʼiil nidmo fi chaan akhwaanhum naas gabiilat Banyaamiin.Wa gaalo : Al‑yoom gabiila waahide anfasalat min Israaʼiil.
Wa kikkeef nisawwu le nijawwuzu awiin le l‑faddalo minhum achaan awwal aniina halafna be Allah wa gulna ma nijawwuzuuhum banaatna ? 
Wa battaan gaalo : Hal fiyah naas min gabaayil Israaʼiil al‑ma hidro giddaam Allah fi Misfa walla ? Wa khalaas,humman azzakkaro kadar naas Yaabiich fi turaab Gilʼaad ma jo fi l‑muʼaskar le l‑malamma al‑yoom daak.
Achaan wakit al‑chaʼab lammo le l‑hasaaba,naadum waahid kula min sukkaan Yaabiich Gilʼaad ma hidir.
Wa khalaas,humman rassalo 12 000 raajil min al‑muhaaribiin wa gaalo leehum : Amchu wa aktulu kulla sukkaan Yaabiich Gilʼaad be l‑seef hatta awiinhum wa iyaalhum kula aktuluuhum.
Wa daahu al‑cheyy al‑tisawwuuh.Dammuru kulla l‑dakar wa ayyi mara al‑daakhle beet. 
Wa min sukkaan Yaabiich Gilʼaad,ligo 400 banaat udriiyaat al‑ma dakhalan beet wa humman chaaloohin wa jaaboohin fi l‑muʼaskar fi Chiilooh fi turaab Kanʼaan.
Wa kulla l‑mujtamaʼ rassalo naas le gabiilat Banyaamiin fi hajar Rimmuun achaan yisawwu salaam.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,al‑rujaal al‑faddalo min gabiilat Banyaamiin gabbalo fi bakaanaathum.Wa Bani Israaʼiil antoohum al‑banaat al‑jaaboohin hayyaat min Yaabiich Gilʼaad.Wa laakin adad al‑banaat ma tamma wa rujaal waahidiin ma ligo awiin.
Wa l‑chaʼab nidmo fi chaan naas gabiilat Banyaamiin achaan Allah khalla faraga hana gabiila waahide min gabaayil Israaʼiil.
Wa kubaaraat al‑mujtamaʼ gaalo : Awiin Banyaamiin kammalo.Nisawwu chunu achaan al‑rujaal al‑faddalo kula yalgo awiin ? 
Wa gaalo battaan : Khalli gabiilat Banyaamiin kula talga zurriiye achaan gabiila waahide ma tiwaddir min Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa aniina zaatna ma nagdaro nantuuhum banaatna le yaakhuduuhin achaan aniina halafna wa gulna :‹ Malʼuun al‑yanti mara le iyaal Banyaamiin.› 
Wa baʼad da,gaalo : Kulli sana fiyah iid le Allah fi Chiilooh al‑gaaʼide munchaakh le Beet Iil wa wati le Labuuna wa sabaah le l‑derib al‑yamchi min Beet Iil le Chakiim. 
Wa amaro iyaal Banyaamiin wa gaalo leehum : Amchu allabbado fi jineenaat al‑inab.
Wa kan chiftu banaat min Chiilooh maragan yalʼaban sawa,khalaas intu amurgu fooghin min jineenaat al‑inab.Wa khalli ayyi waahid minku yakrub leyah mara min banaat Chiilooh.Chiiluuhin wa amchu beehin fi turaab Banyaamiin.
Wa kan abbahaathin aw akhwaanhin yaju yachku leena,nuguulu leehum :‹ Hinnu foogah akhwaanna min Banyaamiin achaan aniina ma ligiina leehum kulluhum awiin wakit haarabna Yaabiich Gilʼaad.Wa intu kula ma anteetu leehum banaatku be raayku wa be da,haliifitku ma talhagku.› 
Wa da bas al‑cheyy al‑iyaal Banyaamiin sawwooh.Humman chaalo min al‑banaat al‑laʼʼaabaat hasab adadhum.Wa macho beehin fi ard warasathum wa bano hillaalhum battaan wa sakano fooghum.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,Bani Israaʼiil chatto.Ayyi waahid macha le gabiiltah wa le khachum beetah wa gaʼad fi ard warasatah.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,ma fi malik fi Israaʼiil wa ayyi naadum bisawwi cheyy al‑hu bidoorah.
Fi wakit al‑hukkaam gubbaal Bani Israaʼiil ma induhum malik,juuʼ chadiid ja fi balad Yahuuza wa fi chaan da,raajil waahid min hillit Beet Laham macha le balad Muwaab le yaskun hinaak.Wa l‑raajil da macha maʼa martah wa awlaadah al‑itneen.
Wa hu usmah Aliimalik wa martah usumha Naʼiima wa awlaadah asaameehum Mahluun wa Kilyuun.Wa humman min khachum beet Afraata min hillit Beet Laham fi turaab Yahuuza.Wa humman macho le balad Muwaab wa sakano hinaak.
Wa Aliimalik maat wa martah Naʼiima gaʼadat wiheedha maʼa awlaadha al‑itneen.
Wa awlaadha al‑itneen akhado awiin min al‑Muwaabiyiin,al‑waahide usumha Urfa wa l‑aakhara usumha Raʼuus.Wa humman sakano gariib achara sana min jayyithum min Beet Laham.
Wa baʼad da,Mahluun wa Kilyuun maato wa khalaas ammuhum fagadat raajilha wa iyaalha.
Wa wakit Naʼiima gaaʼide fi balad Muwaab,simʼat kadar Allah raham chaʼabah wa antaahum intaaj sameh min ziraaʼithum.Wa khalaas,gammat jahhazat hi wa awiin awlaadha al‑itneen le yamurgan min al‑balad di.
Wa gamman min al‑bakaan al‑hinna sakanan foogah wa chaalan derib hana turaab Yahuuza.
Wa wakit maachaat fi l‑derib,Naʼiima gaalat le awiin awlaadha : Hassaʼ da,khalli ayyi waahide minkan tigabbil le beet ammaha.Wa khalli Allah yisawwi leekan al‑kheer misil intan sawweetannah le l‑maato wa leyi ana.
Wa khalli Allah yantiikan le ayyi waahide beet baarid bakaan raajilha ! Wa hi habbat kulli waahide minhin.Wa khalaas hinna bakan chadiid
wa gaalan le Naʼiima : La,aniina namchu maʼaaki bakaan ahalki. 
Laakin Naʼiima gaalat : Gabbilan,ya banaati !Maala tidooran tamchan maʼaayi ?Hal nalda awlaad al‑battaan yabgo leekan rujaal walla ?
Gabbilan amchan,ya banaati,achaan ana bigiit ajuuz wa battaan ma naakhud raajil.Wa kan nuguul indi acham naakhud raajil fi l‑leele di wa nalda awlaad kula
hal tagdaran tarjanhum lahaddi yakburu ?Taaban ma taakhudan rujaal aakhariin walla ?La,ya banaati !Al‑murr al‑foogi ana da chadiid min hanaakan intan.Wa Allah bas nazzal al‑taʼab foogi. 
Wa min simʼan al‑kalaam da,gamman battaan bakan.Wa baʼad da,Urfa habbat nasiibitha wa faatat.Laakin Raʼuus anrabatat maʼaaha.
Wa khalaas,Naʼiima gaalat le Raʼuus : Chiifi,hamaatki gabbalat le ahalha wa le ilaahaatha.Inti kula gabbili maʼaaha. 
Wa Raʼuus raddat le nasiibitha wa gaalat : Ma tajburiini le nikhalliikiwa nigabbil minki !Fi ayyi bakaan al‑tamchi,namchi maʼaakiwa fi ayyi bakaan al‑taskuni,naskun maʼaaki.Ahalki yabgo ahaliwa Ilaahki yabga Ilaahi.
Al‑bakaan al‑tumuuti,ana kula numuut wa yadfunuuni.Kan cheyy aakhar bala l‑moot bas faragaani minki da,khalli Allah yiʼaakhibni ikhaab chadiid ! 
Wakit Naʼiima chaafat kadar Raʼuus indaha niiye le tamchi maʼaaha,sakatat khallatha battaan ma jabaratha le tigabbil.
Wa khalaas,machan tineenithin lahaddi Beet Laham.Wa wakit wassalan hinaak,kulla awiin al‑hille ajjaban fooghin wa assaaʼalan ambeenaathin wa gaalan : Di Naʼiima walla ? 
Wa Naʼiima raddat leehin wa gaalat : Battaan ma tinaadanni Naʼiima laakin naadanni Murra achaan Allah al‑Gaadir marrar leyi hayaati.
Ana macheet min hini malaane wa Allah gabbalaani yaabse.Battaan maala tinaadanni Naʼiima achaan Allah al‑Gaadir taʼʼabaani wa nazzal foogi al‑hizin. 
Wa be misil da,Naʼiima wa marit waladha Raʼuus al‑Muwaabiiye gabbalan min balad Muwaab.Wa wassalan fi Beet Laham fi bidaayit gatiʼ al‑gameh al‑abyad.
Wa fiyah raajil waahid usmah taaliʼ wa hu min ahal Aliimalik,raajilha le Naʼiima.Wa l‑raajil da usmah Buʼaaz.
Wa Raʼuus al‑Muwaabiiye gaalat le Naʼiima : Khalliini namchi fi l‑ziraaʼa nikachchib kan siyaad al‑ziraaʼa yardo leyi. Wa Naʼiima gaalat leeha : Amchi,ya bineeyti. 
Wa khalaas,Raʼuus machat tilaggit wara l‑lammaamiin wa be sudfa hi machat fi zereʼ hana Buʼaaz min ahal Aliimalik.
Wa baʼad chiyya,Buʼaaz kula ja min Beet Laham wa gaal le l‑lammaamiin : Allah maʼaaku ! Wa humman gaalo leyah : Allah yibaarikak ! 
Wa Buʼaaz gaal le khaddaamah al‑wakkalah kabiir al‑lammaamiin : Al‑bitt di min ween ? 
Wa kabiir al‑lammaamiin gaal leyah : Di al‑bineeye al‑Muwaabiiye al‑jaat maʼa Naʼiima min balad Muwaab.
Hi jaat leyi wa saʼalat wa gaalat :‹ Antuuni izin nikachchib wa nilimm kulla l‑ganaadiil al‑khalloohum al‑lammaamiin waraahum.› Wa min al‑fajur hi jaat wa gaaʼide takhdim lahaddi hassaʼ wa ma anjammat fi l‑dull illa chiyya bas. 
Wa baʼad da,Buʼaaz gaal le Raʼuus : Asmaʼe,ya bineeyti.Ma tikhalli al‑zereʼ da wa tamchi tilaggiti fi zereʼ aakhar.Akhdimi hini maʼa khaddaamaati.
Wa fakkiri fi l‑bakaan al‑gaaʼidiin yagtaʼooh wa amchi waraahin.Wa ana kallamt le l‑khaddaamiin ma yilammusuuki.Wa kan atchaane kula,amchi acharbe min al‑mawaaʼiin al‑humman maloohum. 
Wa min simʼat kalaamah da,hi barakat giddaamah wa gaalat : Kikkeef ridiit beyi be ziyaada,ana al‑khariibe,lahaddi tifakkir foogi misil da ? 
Wa Buʼaaz radda leeha wa gaal : Ana simiʼt be kulla l‑kheer al‑inti sawweetiih le nasiibitki amm raajilki baʼad hu maat.Wa naʼarif inti khalleeti abuuki wa ammiki wa ardiki al‑wildooki foogha wa jiiti le naas al‑ma taʼarfiihum min awwal.
Wa Allah yantiiki ajur hana l‑kheer al‑inti sawweetiih.Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,al‑jiiti le lajaʼti tihit janaaheeh,hu bas yantiiki ajur kaamil ! 
Wa Raʼuus gaalat : Inta ridiit leyi,ya sayyidi,wa chajjaʼtini be kalaamak al‑halu.Wa laakin ana ma nisaawi waahide min khaddaamaatak. 
Wa wakit jahhazo al‑akil,Buʼaaz gaal le Raʼuus : Taʼaali hini aakuli.Chiili al‑khubza di wa mallihiiha fi l‑asiir al‑haamud. Wa hi gaʼadat jamb al‑lammaamiin wa Buʼaaz antaaha fariiki wa akalat wa chibʼat lahaddi faddalatah.
Wa baʼad hi gammat tilaggit,Buʼaaz amar khaddaamiinah wa gaal : Khalluuha tilaggit al‑ganaadiil al‑mudaffigiin ambeenaat al‑juruun.Ma tiʼaazuuha.
Wa laakin daffugu leeha be niiyitku ganaadiil min al‑juruun wa khalluuha tilaggithum,ma tikhawwufuuha. 
Wa Raʼuus laggatat fi l‑zereʼ da lahaddi l‑achiiye.Wa chakkat al‑gameh al‑abyad al‑lammatah wa bigi gariib 10 kooro.
Wa khalaas,Raʼuus chaalat al‑gameh al‑abyad al‑laggatatah wa gabbalat al‑hille antatah kulla le nasiibitha amm raajilha.Wa jaabat maʼaaha kula al‑akil al‑hi chibʼat wa faddalatah wa antatah le nasiibitha.
Wa nasiibitha gaalat leeha : Al‑yoom macheeti laggatti ween ?Wa khadamti ween ?Allah yibaarik al‑naadum al‑fakkar foogki ! Wa Raʼuus khabbarat nasiibitha be l‑naadum al‑hi khadamat fi bakaanah wa gaalat : Al‑raajil al‑ana khadamt fi bakaanah al‑yoom usmah Buʼaaz. 
Wa Naʼiima gaalat le marit waladha : Baarak Allah fi Buʼaaz !Wa ya hassaʼ kula naʼarif Allah gaaʼid yarham al‑hayyiin wa l‑maytiin. Wa Naʼiima gaalat battaan : Al‑raajil da gariibna wa hu wariis raajli. 
Wa Raʼuus al‑Muwaabiiye gaalat : Wa hu gaal leyi battaan :‹ Akhdimi hini maʼa khaddaamaati lahaddi kulla l‑lammiin yikammil.› 
Wa Naʼiima gaalat le Raʼuus marit waladha : Akheer leeki ya bitti,takhdimi maʼa khaddaamaatah achaan kan macheeti fi zereʼ aakhar mumkin yiʼaazuuki. 
Wa khalaas,Raʼuus khadamat maʼa khaddaamaat Buʼaaz fi laggitiin al‑ganaadiil lahaddi lammiin al‑gameh al‑abyad wa l‑ahmar kulla kammal.Wa hi sakanat maʼa nasiibitha amm raajilha.
Wa yoom waahid,Naʼiima gaalat le Raʼuus : Ya bineeyti,kan nifattich leeki al‑raaha da,ma akheer ?
Wa hassaʼ taʼarfi kadar Buʼaaz al‑inti khadamti maʼa khaddaamaatah da,hu gariibna.Wa l‑leele di,hu yaji fi l‑madagg le yidarri gamhah.
Yalla gummi albarrade wa alʼattare wa albase khulgaanki al‑samhiin wa amchi al‑madagg.Wa laakin ma tiwassifi nafiski kadar inti jiiti lahaddi Buʼaaz yaakul wa yachrab.
Wa wakit yargud,fakkiri adiil fi bakaan furaachah.Wa kan naam khalaas,fukki al‑khita min adal rijileenah wa arugdi.Wa hu yiʼooriiki al‑cheyy al‑waajib tisawwiih. 
Wa Raʼuus gaalat : Aywa,nisawwi kulla cheyy al‑gultiih leyi. 
Wa khalaas,Raʼuus machat al‑madagg wa sawwat ayyi cheyy misil nasiibitha gaalatah leeha.
Wa wakit Buʼaaz akal wa chirib wa galbah firih,gamma macha naam fi taraf al‑juruun hana l‑gameh.Wa Raʼuus gammat be bicheech wa machat fakkat al‑khita min adal rijileenah wa ragadat.
Wa fi ust al‑leel,Buʼaaz jafal wa achchaglab wa irif kadar fiyah mara raagde fi adal rijileenah.
Wa gaal : Inti yaati ? Wa hi gaalat : Ana Raʼuus khaddaamtak.Aakhudni achaan inta bas wariis indak hagg taʼagilni ! 
Wa Buʼaaz gaal : Allah yibaarikki,ya bineeyti !Al‑amaan al‑indiki al‑yoom le l‑aayila di,hu ziyaada min amaanki al‑awwal.Achaan inti ma talabti raajil min al‑subyaan,kan fagri walla khani kula.
Wa hassaʼ da,ma takhaafe,ya bineeyti !Ana nisawwi kulla cheyy al‑inti talabtiih minni achaan naas hilliti yaʼarfu tamaam kadar inti mara indiki khiima.
Sahiih,ana wariis le raajilki laakin wariis aakhar gariib leyah ziyaada minni ana kula fi.
Hassaʼ da,nuumi wa ambaakir fajur kamaan nichiifu.Kan hu yidoor yugumm be waajbah hana l‑wariis,al‑hamdulillah.Wa kan aba ma yugumm be waajbah kamaan,nahlif be Allah al‑Hayy,ana bas nugumm beyah.Hassaʼ da,nuumi lahaddi fajur. 
Wa Raʼuus naamat adal rijileenah lahaddi l‑fajur.Laakin hi gammat fajur badri gubbaal al‑chagaag achaan naadum ma yichiifha.Wa Buʼaaz kula ma yidoor al‑naas yaʼarfu kadar al‑mara di jaat fi l‑madagg.
Wa hu gaal leeha : Jiibi nuss farditki wa akurbiih adiil. Wa hu sabba leeha foogah sitte kayyaal hana gameh wa chayyalah leeha.Wa hu gabbal al‑hille.
Wa wakit Raʼuus gabbalat le nasiibitha,hi saʼalatha wa gaalat : Chunu al‑khabar,ya bineeyti ? Wa Raʼuus kallamatha be kulla cheyy al‑sawwaah leeha Buʼaaz.
Wa gaalat battaan : Hu antaani al‑sitte kayyaal hana l‑gameh da.Wa hu gaal leyi :‹ Ma tamchi iidki yaabse le nasiibitki.› 
Wa Naʼiima raddat wa gaalat : Arje,ya bineeyti,wa nichiifu al‑cheyy al‑yabga.Achaan al‑raajil da ma yinjamma al‑yoom lahaddi yikammil al‑cheyy da. 
Wa wakit Buʼaaz gabbal,macha gaʼad fi khachum baab al‑hille wa da bakaan al‑malamma.Wa l‑raajil al‑wariis al‑hu kallam beyah le Raʼuus kula ja faayit.Wa Buʼaaz gaal leyah : Taʼaal,ya gariibi,wa agood hini. Wa khalaas al‑raajil da ja gaʼad jambah.
Wa Buʼaaz naada achara rujaal min chuyuukh al‑hille wa gaal leehum : Min fadulku agoodu maʼaana. Wa humman gaʼado.
Wa khalaas,hajja le l‑raajil al‑wariis al‑hu min ahal Aliimalik wa gaal : Naʼiima al‑gabbalat min balad Muwaab tidoor tibiiʼ al‑zereʼ hana akhuuna Aliimalik.
Ana naadeetak achaan nikallimak be l‑cheyy da.Hassaʼ da,achri al‑ard di,giddaam al‑naas al‑gaaʼidiin dool wa giddaam chuyuukh chaʼabi.Kan chareetha,khalaas.Wa kan abeet ma tachriiha kamaan,ooriini achaan naʼarif.Achaan ma fi naadum aakhar wariis ziyaada minnak inta wa ana min baʼadak. Wa l‑raajil gaal : Aywa,nachriiha. 
Wa Buʼaaz gaal : Kan chareet al‑ard min Naʼiima da,aʼagil Raʼuus al‑Muwaabiiye marit al‑mayyit kula.Wa misil da,al‑ard tagood warasa le ahal al‑mayyit. 
Wa l‑raajil gaal : Kan ana wariis kula ma nagdar nachri al‑ard achaan ma nitallif warasati.Inta achriiha fi badali achaan ana ma nagdar nachriiha. 
Wa fi aadit Bani Israaʼiil fi l‑wakit daak,kan yibaddulu hagg al‑wariis aw yibiiʼu ard,al‑naadum al‑yibiiʼ yisill naʼaalah wa yantiiha le l‑naadum al‑yachri.Wa l‑cheyy da yabga leehum chahaada le l‑beeʼ.
Wa fi chaan da,al‑raajil al‑wariis salla naʼaalah antaaha le Buʼaaz wa gaal : Achriiha inta. 
Wa khalaas,Buʼaaz gaal le kulla l‑chuyuukh wa kulla l‑chaʼab : Intu chaahidiin.Ana al‑yoom chareet min Naʼiima kulla l‑khumaam hana Aliimalik wa awlaadah Kilyuun wa Mahluun.
Wa ana chilt Raʼuus al‑Muwaabiiye marit Mahluun le tabga marti achaan al‑ard tagood warasa le ahal al‑mayyit.Wa usmah ma yingachcha min al‑aayila wa yagood musajjal fi daftar al‑madiina.Intu al‑yoom chaahidiin ! 
Al‑chuyuukh wa kulla l‑chaʼab al‑gaaʼidiin fi khachum baab al‑hille gaalo : Aniina chaahidiin !Allah yibaarik al‑mara al‑tadkhul fi beetak wa yisawwiiha misil Raahiil wa Leeya,hinna al‑itneen ammahaat zurriiyit Yaakhuub jiddina.Wa inta tabga khani fi khachum beet Afraata wa machhuur ziyaada fi Beet Laham.
Wa be l‑zurriiye al‑Allah yantiiha leek min al‑mara di,beetak yabga misil beet Faaris,hu al‑Taamaar wildatah le jiddina Yahuuza. 
Wa khalaas,Buʼaaz chaal martah Raʼuus wa Allah antaaha bigat khalbaane wa wildat wileed.
Wa awiin hana Beet Laham gaalan le Naʼiima : Al‑hamdulillah !Allah ma khallaaki wa antaaki wileed al‑yabga leeki wariis wa yisawwiih machhuur fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa l‑wileed da yikhayyir hayaatki wa yisaaʼidki fi wakit tabge ajuuz achaan wildatah leeki marit wileedki al‑tiriidki.Wa hi akheer leeki min sabʼa awlaad ! 
Wa khalaas,Naʼiima chaalat al‑wileed hadanatah wa gaʼadat tirabbiih.
Wa jaaraat Naʼiima gaalan : Allah razakhaaha be wileed. Wa sammanah Ubeed.Wa hu bigi abu Yassa,abu malik Dawuud.
Wa di hi zurriiyit Faaris.Faaris wilid Hasruun
wa Hasruun wilid Raamwa Raam wilid Aminadaab.
Wa Aminadaab wilid Nahchuunwa Nahchuun wilid Salmuun.
Wa Salmuun wilid Buʼaazwa Buʼaaz wilid Ubeed.
Wa Ubeed wilid Yassawa Yassa wilid Dawuud.
Fiyah raajil waahid min hillit al‑Raama fi jibaal Afraayim min khachum beet Suuf.Usmah Alikhaana wileed Yaruuhaam wileed Aliihu wileed Tuuhu wileed Suuf.Wa hu min gabiilat Afraayim.
Hu indah awiin itneen,al‑kabiire usumha Hinna wa l‑sakhayre usumha Fininna.Wa Fininna wildat leyah iyaal wa laakin Hinna kamaan aagre.
Wa kulli sana Alikhaana yamrug min hillitah yatlaʼ wa yamchi le hillit Chiilooh achaan yasjud wa yigaddim dahiiye le Allah al‑Gaadir.Wa da l‑bakaan al‑gaaʼidiin foogah rujaal al‑diin al‑itneen Hufni wa Fiinhaas awlaad Ali.Wa humman masʼuuliin min al‑dahiiye al‑yigaddumuuha le Allah.
Wa kulli wakit kan ja wakit al‑dahiiye,Alikhaana yadbah wa yanti Fininna gisim al‑laham ale adadhum hi wa awlaadha wa banaatha.
Wa laakin le Hinna,yantiiha gisim khaass hana l‑laham achaan hu biriidha,hi al‑Allah jaʼalaaha aagre.
Wa darritha daayman tizaʼʼilha le tahrig galibha be sabab Allah jaʼalaaha aagre.
Wa l‑cheyy da gaaʼid yabga kulli sana.Wa wakit Hinna tatlaʼ le beet Allah,Fininna tiwaajiʼha lahaddi tabki wa taaba al‑akil.
Wa raajilha Alikhaana yuguul leeha : Ya Hinna,maalki tabki wa taabe al‑akil ?Maalki haznaane ?Ana raajilki ma akheer leeki min achara awlaad walla ? 
Wa yoom waahid baʼad ma akalo wa chirbo fi Chiilooh,Hinna gammat.Wa fi l‑wakit da,raajil al‑diin al‑usmah Ali gaaʼid fi kursiih jamb baab beet Allah.
Wa hi gaaʼide tasʼal Allah wa tabki be hurga.
Wa sawwat nazir wa gaalat : Ya Allah al‑Gaadir,chiifni ana khaadmak !Fakkir foogi wa ma tansaani !Antiini wileed.Kan anteetni wileed,ana nantiih leek muddit hayaatah.Wa ma nizayyin raasah abadan wa da yiwassif kadar ana anteetah leek. 
Wa wakit Hinna gaaʼide tasʼal Allah mudda tawiile,Ali gaaʼid yichiif khachumha.
Hi gaaʼide tasʼal Allah fi galibha wa chalaaliifha gaaʼidiin bilharrako laakin hissaha ma binsamiʼ.Khalaas fi l‑bakaan da,Ali yahsib hi sakraane.
Wa gaal leeha : Maala macheeti sikirti ?Amchi farrigi al‑khamar minki ! 
Wa Hinna raddat leyah wa gaalat : La,ya sayyidi !Ana mara haznaane.Wa la chiribt khamar wa la cheyy al‑bisakkir.Laakin ana gult kulla hamm galbi giddaam Allah.
Ma tahsib khaadmak mara sitt charr.Be sabab hizni wa zaʼali bas,ana tawwalt fi suʼaali le Allah. 
Wa Ali radda leeha wa gaal : Amchi be l‑salaama.Wa khalli Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil yantiiki al‑cheyy al‑saʼaltiih minnah. 
Wa hi gaalat leyah : Khalaas,ya sayyidi,kan inta ridiit leyi. Wa khalaas,machat akalat wa hizinha faat.
Wa ambaakir be fajur badri,gammo sajado le Allah wa gabbalo le beethum fi hillit al‑Raama.Wa baʼad da,Alikhaana lamma maʼa martah Hinna wa Allah fakkar leeha wa khibil suʼaalha
wa hi bigat khalbaane.Wa fi nafs al‑sana di,hi wildat wileed wa sammatah Samuwiil,maʼanaatah ana saʼaltah min Allah.
Wa baʼad da,Alikhaana wa kulla aayiltah dawwaro yamchu fi Chiilooh achaan yigaddim al‑dahiiye hana l‑sana di le Allah wa yigaddim al‑dahiiye al‑hu waaʼad beeha fi nazrah.
Wa laakin Hinna ma machat maʼaahum wa gaalat le raajilha : Ana kan faradt al‑wileed hatta namchi niwaddiih yagood hinaak fi beet Allah daayman. 
Wa raajilha gaal : Sawwi al‑cheyy al‑tidoorah.Wa agoodi lahaddi tafurdiih.Wa Allah bas yihaggig kalaamah. Wa khalaas,Hinna gaʼadat fi l‑beet wa karabat wileedha lahaddi faradatah.
Wa wakit faradatah,chaalat maʼaaha toor wald talaata sana wa 10 kooro hana dagiig wa girbe hana khamar.Wa machat fi hillit Chiilooh wa chaalat al‑wileed wa dakhalat beyah fi beet Allah.Wa fi l‑wakit da,al‑wileed lissaaʼah sakhayyar.
Wa dabaho al‑toor wa waddo al‑wileed le Ali raajil al‑diin.
Wa Hinna gaalat leyah : Ya sayyidi,iriftini walla ?Ana al‑mara al‑jaat leek yoom daak hini saʼalat Allah.
Ana saʼalt Allah achaan yantiini al‑wileed da.Wa daahu antaani al‑cheyy al‑ana talabtah minnah.
Wa hassaʼ,ana nantiih le Allah muddit hayaatah. Khalaas fi l‑bakaan da,kulluhum sajado le Allah.
Wa Hinna sallat wa gaalat : Niʼmat Allah malat galbi be l‑farah,Allah rafaʼ raasi wa antaani gudra.Giddaam udwaani,dihikt be hiss aaliwa be najaatak ana firiht,ya Rabbi.
Ma fi cheyy khudduus misil Allah.Ma fi ilaah illa intawa ma fi maljaʼ misil Ilaahna.
 Ma tikallumu be istikbaar ziyaadawa ma tamurgu kalaam bala adab.Achaan Allah hu al‑ilaah al‑aalim be kulla cheyywa yawzin aʼmaal al‑naas fi l‑miizaan.
Silaah al‑furraas addammarwa khalaas al‑daʼiifiin bigo gawiyiin.
Naas al‑awwal chabʼaaniin,khalaas fi chaan al‑akil bigo khaddaamiinwa l‑awwal jiiʼaaniin,khalaas bigo chabʼaaniin.Wa l‑mara al‑aagre wildat sabʼa iyaalwa l‑awwal indaha iyaal,galibha haznaan.
Allah yimowwit al‑insaanwa yihayyiihwa yinazzilah fi l‑khaburwa yigawwimah minnah.
Allah yufgir wa yukhniwa yizill wa yiʼizz.
Wa yigawwim al‑miskiin min al‑turaabwa yarfaʼ al‑fagraan min al‑rumaad.Maʼa l‑muluuk,yigaʼʼidhumwa izz wa charaf yantiihum misil warasa.Le Allah bas asaas al‑ardwa foogah,khatta al‑dunya.
Allah yahfad al‑naas al‑saalihiinwa fi l‑dalaam,yumuutu al‑fasliin.Achaan al‑insaanbe gudurtah ma yinnasir.
Udwaan Allah yiddammarowa hu yahrighum be raʼad min al‑sama.Wa Allah yahkim lahaddi aakhir al‑dunyawa yanti gudra le l‑malik al‑hu darrajah.Aywa,yarfaʼ raas al‑naadum al‑hu masahah. 
Wa baʼad da,Alikhaana wa aayiltah gabbalo beethum fi hillit al‑Raama.Wa l‑wileed Samuwiil gaaʼid yakhdim le Allah tihit muraakhabat Ali raajil al‑diin.
Wa laakin awlaad Ali ma naafʼiin wa ma khaayfiin min Allah.
Wa di hi al‑tariiga al‑humman gaaʼidiin yiʼaamulu beeha al‑naas.Kan ayyi naadum gaddam dahiiye,khaddaam awlaad Ali yaji leyah wakit gaaʼidiin yirakkubu al‑laham wa indah fi iidah hadiidaay al‑indaha talaata sunuun.
Wa yidiss al‑hadiidaay di fi l‑gidir aw al‑tahwa aw al‑kalool aw al‑burma al‑murakkibiin fiiha al‑laham.Wa l‑laham al‑yamrug fi raas al‑hadiidaay da,al‑khaddaam yichiilah wa yiwaddiih le raajil al‑diin.Wa di bas al‑tariiga al‑beeha awlaad Ali gaaʼidiin yiʼaamulu kulla Bani Israaʼiil al‑yaju le beet Allah fi hillit Chiilooh.
Wa bakaan waahid kamaan,khaddaam rujaal al‑diin yaji le l‑raajil mugaddim al‑dahiiye gubbaal ma yiharrig al‑chaham le l‑Rabb.Wa l‑khaddaam yuguul leyah : Antiini laham nutuchchah le raajil al‑diin achaan al‑laham al‑murakkab hu ma yakhbalah minnak,illa kan neyy ! 
Wa kan al‑raajil gaal : Khalliini niharrig al‑chaham hatta taʼaal chiil al‑yaʼajibak ,al‑khaddaam yuguul : La !Ma fiih !Hassaʼ da,antiini.Kan abeet nichiilah be gu ! 
Wa be da,khutuurat al‑zanib hana awlaad Ali bigat ziyaada giddaam Allah.Achaan humman ma yihtarumu al‑dahaaya al‑yigaddumuuhum le Allah.
Wa laakin fi l‑wakit da,Samuwiil gaaʼid yakhdim le Allah.Wa hu lissaaʼ sakhayyar wa laabis khalag hana rujaal al‑diin.
Wa ammah tisawwi leyah jallaabiiye sakhayre wa tiwaddiiha leyah kulli sana wakit hi tamchi maʼa raajilha le yigaddim dahiiyat al‑sana.
Wa Ali yibaarik Alikhaana wa martah wa yuguul : Allah yantiik zurriiye min al‑mara di fi gadd al‑wileed al‑hi antatah le Allah. Wa baʼad da,yigabbulu fi bakaanhum.
Wa Allah razakhaaha le Hinna wa wildat jaabat awlaad talaata wa banaat itneen.Wa l‑wileed Samuwiil gaaʼid yakbur giddaam Allah.
Wa Ali bigi chaayib kabiir wa gaaʼid yasmaʼ be l‑cheyy al‑fasil al‑awlaadah gaaʼidiin yisawwuuh fi jamiiʼ Bani Israaʼiil.Wa hu simiʼ kadar humman yarugdu maʼa l‑awiin al‑yakhdumu fi madkhal kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ.
Wa hu gaal leehum : Maala tisawwu fiʼil cheen misil da ?Wa ana simiʼtah min kulla chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil.
La,ya iyaali.Al‑cheyy al‑ana simiʼtah da hawaan !Ana simiʼt kadar intu bas al‑gaaʼidiin tilizzu kulla naas Allah achaan yaʼasooh.
Haay tara !Angarʼu !Kan naadum aznab fi naadum aakhar,Allah yahkim ambeenaathum.Wa laakin kan naadum aznab fi Allah,yaatu yagdar yilwassat leyah ? Wa be da kula,awlaad Ali ma simʼo kalaam abuuhum achaan Allah hakam leehum be l‑moot.
Wa laakin al‑wileed Samuwiil gaaʼid yakbur wa ligi rida Allah wa rida al‑naas.
Wa yoom waahid,nabi waahid ja le Ali wa gaal leyah : Daahu Allah gaal :‹ Ana bayyant nafsi le aayilat jiddak Haaruun wakit humman zamaan gaaʼidiin abiid tihit Firʼoon malik Masir.
Wa ana azaltuhum min kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil achaan yabgo rujaal al‑diin.Wa yiharrugu al‑bakhuur fi madbahi wa yalbaso giddaami khalag hana rujaal al‑diin.Wa battaan ana anteethum aayilat Haaruun gisim min kulla l‑dahaaya muharragiin al‑yiharruguuhum Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa laakin maala tahguru al‑dahaaya wa l‑hadaaya al‑ana amart beehum le yigaddumuuhum fi beeti ?Wa maala tikarrim awlaadak ziyaada minni ana Allah Rabbak ?Wa maala intu tisammunu nufuusku be ahsan laham al‑tiʼazzuluuh min al‑dahaaya al‑yigaddumuuhum leyi chaʼabi Bani Israaʼiil ?Da kikkeef ! ›
 Achaan da,daahu Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil gaal leek :‹ Akiid ana awwal gult beetak wa beet abuuk yagoodu fi khidimti daayman.› Laakin hassaʼ da,daahu kalaam Allah :‹ Abadan !Battaan ma nisawwiih !Nicharrif al‑yicharrufuuni wa laakin al‑yahguruuni yabgo mahguuriin.
Wa daahu yaji yoom waahid al‑foogah yumuutu kulla l‑rujaal min zurriiytak wa naadum waahid ma yakbur wa yabga chaayib fi beetak.
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil yiʼiichu fi l‑raaha,inta tukuun taʼbaan.Wa naadum min zurriiytak ke ma yiʼiich lahaddi yabga chaayib.
Wa ana nikhalli naadum waahid minku le yakhdim fi madbahi wa da yabga leek inta sabab maliyiin uyuunak be dumuuʼ wa galbak yahzan chadiid min al‑daliime.Wa zurriiytak yumuutu fi chabaabhum.
Wa nantiik alaama wa l‑alaama di tabga moot iyaalak Hufni wa Fiinhaas fi yoom waahid.
Wa naʼazil le nafsi raajil diin amiin achaan yisawwi al‑cheyy al‑galbi wa nafsi yidooruuh.Wa nisabbit aayiltah le takhdim daayman maʼa l‑malik al‑ana masahtah wa darrajtah.
Wa l‑faddal min zurriiytak yaji yabruk giddaam raajil al‑diin da,achaan yalga sile aw khubzaay.Wa yuguul battaan leyah :“Min fadlak,antiini amal maʼa rujaal al‑diin le nalga khubzaay naakul !”› 
Wa l‑wileed Samuwiil gaaʼid yakhdim le Allah tihit muraakhabat Ali.Wa fi l‑wakit daak,kalaam Allah al‑yihajjiih le l‑naas ma katiir wa l‑ruʼya kula chiyya.
Wa yoom waahid,Ali naayim fi bakaanah al‑yunuum foogah.Wa da wakit al‑hu chayyab khalaas wa choofah kula bigi daʼiif wa uyuunah ma bichiifu.
Wa Samuwiil kamaan naayim fi beet Allah fi l‑bakaan al‑foogah sanduug al‑Rabb.Wa da be l‑leel gabul faanuus al‑Rabb ma yumuut.
Wa Allah naada Samuwiil wa Samuwiil gaal : Naʼam ! 
Wa gamma jara macha le Ali wa gaal leyah : Daahuuni.Inta naadeetni wa ana jiit ! Wa Ali gaal leyah : Ana ma naadeetak,ya wileedi.Gabbil nuum ! Wa hu macha naam.
Wa battaan Allah naadaah le Samuwiil.Wa Samuwiil gamma jara le Ali wa gaal : Daahuuni.Inta naadeetni wa ana jiit ! Wa Ali gaal leyah : La !Ana ma naadeetak,ya wileedi.Gabbil nuum ! 
Wa fi l‑wakit da,Samuwiil ma irif Allah wa la Allah hajja leyah yoom waahid.
Wa Allah naadaah le Samuwiil le taalit marra.Wa Samuwiil gamma jara macha le Ali wa gaal : Daahuuni.Inta naadeetni wa ana jiit ! Wa khalaas fi l‑bakaan da,Ali irif kadar Allah gaaʼid yinaadi al‑wileed.
Wa Ali gaal le Samuwiil : Gabbil nuum.Wa kan naadaak battaan,guul leyah :‹ Kallim,ya Allah.Abdak gaaʼid yasmaʼak !› Wa Samuwiil gabbal fi bakaanah wa ragad.
Wa Allah ja wa naadaah le Samuwiil misil awwal : Ya Samuwiil !Ya Samuwiil ! Wa Samuwiil gaal : Kallim,ana abdak gaaʼid nasmaʼak ! 
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Nisawwi cheyy fi Bani Israaʼiil al‑yabhat kulla l‑naas al‑yasmaʼooh !
Wa fi l‑yoom da,ana nitimm kulla kalaami al‑gult nisawwiih fi zurriiyit Ali,min al‑bidaaya lahaddi l‑nihaaya.
Wa ana gult leyah niʼaakhib zurriiytah ikhaab daayim.Wa da,be sabab al‑hugra al‑awlaadah gaaʼidiin yisawwuuha wa hu ma aakhabaahum.
Wa be da,ana nahlif kadar zanib hana zurriiyit Ali abadan ma indah kaffaara wa la be dahiiye wa la be hadiiye aakhara. 
Wa baʼad da,Samuwiil gabbal ragad.Wa be fajur,gamma fatah biibaan beet Allah.Wa hu khaaf ma gidir yiʼooriih le Ali be l‑ruʼya di.
Laakin Ali naadaah wa gaal : Ya Samuwiil wileedi ! Wa Samuwiil gaal : Naʼam. 
Wa Ali gaal : Chunu al‑kalaam al‑gaalah leek Allah ?Ma tilabbid minni cheyy.Khalli al‑Rabb yiʼaakhibak ikhaab chadiid kan labbadt kilme waahide kula ! 
Khalaas,Samuwiil kallamah le Ali be kulla l‑kalaam da wa ma labbad minnah cheyy.Wa Ali gaal : Hu Allah.Wa hu yisawwi al‑cheyy al‑yidoorah. 
Wa Samuwiil bigi kabiir wa Allah kaan maʼaayah wa kulla l‑kalaam al‑gaalah leyah Allah da,tamma.
Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil min Daan fi l‑munchaakh lahaddi Biir Sabʼa fi l‑wati irfo kadar Allah sabbat Samuwiil nabi.
Wa daayman Allah gaaʼid yibayyin nafsah fi Chiilooh be kalaamah al‑hu gaaʼid yuguulah le Samuwiil.
Wa Samuwiil ballakh kalaam Allah le kulla Bani Israaʼiil.Wa achaan da,Bani Israaʼiil marago le yihaarubu al‑Filistiyiin.Wa lammo askarhum fi bakaan al‑usmah Aban Aazar (maʼanaatah hajar al‑Musaaʼada).Wa l‑Filistiyiin kamaan lammo askarhum fi hillit Afiikh.
Wa l‑Filistiyiin rasso rujaalhum le l‑harib giddaam Bani Israaʼiil.Wa l‑harib bada wa alwassaʼ wa Bani Israaʼiil anhazamo giddaam al‑Filistiyiin.Wa l‑Filistiyiin katalo min Bani Israaʼiil gariib 4 000 raajil fi l‑duwaas da.
Wa wakit al‑naas al‑arrado min al‑harib wassalo fi l‑muʼaskar da,chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil gaalo : Maala Allah hazamna al‑yoom giddaam al‑Filistiyiin ?Yalla !Namchu nijiibu sanduug muʼaahadat Allah min hillit Chiilooh wa nichiiluuh maʼaana achaan yinajjiina min aduuna. 
Wa khalaas,rassalo naas fi hillit Chiilooh wa jaabo sanduug muʼaahadat Allah al‑Gaadir,hu al‑gaaʼid fi l‑archah ambeen al‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin.Wa awlaad Ali al‑itneen Hufni wa Fiinhaas,humman kula macho maʼa sanduug muʼaahadat al‑Rabb.
Wa wakit sanduug muʼaahadat Allah wassal fi l‑muʼaskar da,Bani Israaʼiil sarakho min al‑farha wa min siraakhhum,al‑ard rajafat.
Wa l‑Filistiyiin simʼo al‑siraakh da wa gaalo : Chunu al‑haraka al‑chadiide al‑bigat fi muʼaskar al‑Ibraaniyiin ? Wa be da,al‑Filistiyiin irfo kadar sanduug Allah wassal fi muʼaskar Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa khaafo khoof chadiid wa gaalo ambeenaathum : Al‑ilaah ja fi muʼaskar Bani Israaʼiil.Ya khasaaritna !Da cheyy al‑awwal ke ma bigi abadan !
Ya khasaaritna !Yaatu yinajjiina min al‑ilaah al‑aziim da ?Wa da bas al‑ilaah al‑darab al‑Masriyiin be kulla l‑waba fi l‑sahara !
Chiddu heelku,ya l‑Filistiyiin,wa abgo rujaal !Kan ma ke da,aniina nabgo abiid le l‑Ibraaniyiin misil awwal humman bigo leena abiid.Abgo rujaal wa haarubuuhum be gudra ! 
Wa fi l‑bakaan da khalaas,al‑Filistiyiin hajamoohum le Bani Israaʼiil wa annasaro fooghum.Wa ayyi waahid min Bani Israaʼiil jara gabbal beetah.Wa l‑khasaara bigat kabiire fi ust Bani Israaʼiil wa waddaro fiiha 30 000 raajil.
Wa kan le sanduug al‑Rabb,al‑Filistiyiin chaalooh.Wa awlaad Ali al‑itneen Hufni wa Fiinhaas kula maato.
Wa fi nafs al‑yoom,raajil waahid min gabiilat Banyaamiin arrad min bakaan al‑harib wa jara lahaddi wisil Chiilooh.Wa l‑raajil da charrat khulgaanah wa sabba turaab fi raasah le yiwassif hiznah wa ja fi Chiilooh.
Wa wakit al‑raajil da wassal,Ali gaaʼid fi kursiih jamb al‑derib gaaʼid yarja al‑khabar achaan galbah khaayif le sanduug al‑Rabb.Wa l‑raajil da ja anta al‑khabar le naas al‑hille wa kulluhum gammo yikooruku.
Wakit Ali simiʼ korooraak hana naas al‑hille,hu saʼal wa gaal : Chunu al‑haraka al‑gaaʼid nasmaʼha di ? Wa l‑raajil ja ajala khabbarah le Ali be l‑khabar da.
Wa Ali indah 98 sana wa uyuunah faathiin wa ma bichiifu.
Wa l‑raajil gaal le Ali : Ana jaayi min bakaan al‑harib wa arradt min hinaak wa di bas jayti ! Wa Ali saʼalah wa gaal : Chunu al‑kaan hinaak,ya wileedi ? 
Wa l‑raajil al‑jaab al‑khabar gaal : Bani Israaʼiil arrado min al‑Filistiyiin wa maato katiiriin be ziyaada !Wa awlaadak Hufni wa Fiinhaas kula maato.Wa sanduug al‑Rabb,al‑Filistiyiin chaalooh ! 
Wa min simiʼ be khabar cheeliin sanduug al‑Rabb da,tawwaali Ali wagaʼ be gafaayah min kursiih jamb khachum baab al‑hille wa anfahag wa maat.Achaan hu bigi chaayib wa jismah kula tagiil.Wa gabul da,hu hakam 40 sana fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa marit wileedah Fiinhaas khalbaane gariib talda.Wa wakit simʼat khabar cheeliin sanduug al‑Rabb wa moot raajilha Fiinhaas wa abuuh,tawwaali talaga chadiide karabatha wa hi gangasat wa wildat.
Wa hilkat gariib tumuut wa l‑awiin al‑muhawwigiinha gaalan leeha : Ma takhaafe,wilidti wileed ! Laakin da ma lammaaha wa ma raddat leehin cheyy.
Wa sammat al‑wileed da Ikabuud (maʼanaatah majd Allah bigi ma fiih).Wa gaalat : Majd Allah rafaʼooh min Israaʼiil ! Wa da be sabab cheeliin sanduug al‑Rabb wa moot raajilha wa abuuh.
Wa be misil da,hi gaalat : Majd Allah rafaʼooh min Israaʼiil !Achaan sanduug al‑Rabb chaalooh. 
Wa baʼad chaalo sanduug al‑Rabb,al‑Filistiyiin nagalooh min hajar al‑Musaaʼada wa waddooh madiinat Achduud.
Wa jaabooh fi beet al‑ibaada hana sanamhum Daguun wa khatto sanduug al‑Rabb jamb al‑sanam da.
Wa ambaakir be fajur badri,sukkaan Achduud gammo wa daahu ligo Daguun waagiʼ be wijhah giddaam sanduug Allah !Wa humman chaalooh wa battaan khattooh fi bakaanah.
Wa ambaakir kula be fajur badri,gammo wa daahu ligo Daguun waagiʼ be wijhah giddaam sanduug Allah !Wa raasah wa iideenah mugattaʼiin wa waagiʼiin fi atabat al‑beet.Wa faddalat illa jittitah bas.
Wa fi chaan da bas fi Achduud,rujaal al‑diin hana Daguun wa kulla l‑naas al‑yadkhulu fi beet al‑ibaada hana Daguun ma yukhuttu rijleehum fi l‑ataba lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa Allah darab naas madiinat Achduud chadiid wa barjalaahum be ziyaada.Wa darab naas Achduud wa l‑hillaal al‑taabʼiinha be waba hana hubuun.
Wa wakit chaafo al‑cheyy al‑kaan fooghum,sukkaan Achduud gaalo : Sanduug ilaah Bani Israaʼiil ke ma yagood fi baladna achaan hu nazzal waba chadiid foogna aniina wa fi ilaahna Daguun. 
Wa naadoohum le l‑kubaaraat hana l‑Filistiyiin,lammoohum kulluhum ke wa gaalo : Hassaʼ da,nisawwu chunu be sanduug ilaah Bani Israaʼiil ? Wa humman raddo wa gaalo : Khalli yiwadduuh fi hillit Gaat. Wa khalaas,humman chaalo sanduug ilaah Bani Israaʼiil wa waddooh fi hillit Gaat.
Wa wakit waddooh hinaak,Allah darab al‑hille di darbe chadiide bilheen.Wa kulla sukkaanha barjalo marra waahid.Wa nazzal fooghum waba hana hubuun min dugaaghum lahaddi kubaarhum.
Wa khalaas,waddo sanduug al‑Rabb le madiinat Akhruun.Wa wakit dakhkhalooh fi Akhruun,kulla l‑sukkaan sarakho wa gaalo : Daahu jaabo leena sanduug ilaah Bani Israaʼiil achaan yikattuluuna kullina ke,aniina wa chaʼabna ! 
Wa humman rassalo le kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin wa lammoohum wa gaalo leehum : Gabbulu sanduug ilaah Bani Israaʼiil fi bakaanah achaan ma yaktulna aniina wa kulla chaʼabna. Achaan fi kulla l‑madiina di,barjaal chadiid min al‑moot nazal fooghum achaan Allah darabaahum be ruʼub chadiid.
Wa kulla l‑naas al‑ma maato,marad al‑hubuun karabaahum wa baki naas al‑madiina lihig lahaddi l‑sama.
Wa sanduug Allah gaʼad fi balad al‑Filistiyiin muddit sabʼa chahar.
Wa l‑Filistiyiin naado rujaal al‑diin wa l‑chawwaafiin wa saʼaloohum wa gaalo : Kikkeef nisawwu be sanduug Allah ?Wassufuuna kikkeef nisawwu le nigabbuluuh fi baladah. 
Wa humman gaalo : Kan tigabbulu sanduug ilaah Bani Israaʼiil fi baladah,ma tigabbuluuh saakit.Laakin gaddumu leyah hadiiye le kaffaarat al‑khata.Wa be da,intu tachfo min al‑marad wa taʼarfu maala Allah ma rafaʼ minku al‑waba da. 
Wa l‑Filistiyiin gaalo : Chunu al‑hadiiye le kaffaarat al‑khata al‑niwadduuha maʼaayah ? Wa humman raddo leehum wa gaalo : Gaddumu khamsa daraadim hana dahab misil al‑hubuun dool wa khamsa faar hana dahab ale adad kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin.Achaan al‑waba da lihigku intu kulluku wa kubaaraatku kula.
Adduluuhum misil al‑hubuun al‑karabooku wa l‑faar al‑kharab baladku.Wa timajjudu Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil.Wa be da,akuun yiwaggif nazziliin al‑waba minku intu wa min ilaahku wa min baladku.
Ma tigawwu ruuseeku misil zamaan al‑Masriyiin wa Firʼoon malik Masir sawwooh !Achaan Allah taʼʼabaahum hatta humman khallo Bani Israaʼiil faato.
 Wa hassaʼ da,sawwu kaarro jadiid wa chiilu bagar itneen chawaayil al‑yoom waahid kula ma rabato fooghum uud hana kaarro.Wa arbutuuhum fi l‑kaarro da.Wa gabbulu iyaalhum wa dissuuhum fi l‑zariibe.
Chiilu sanduug Allah wa khuttuuh fi l‑kaarro.Wa l‑khumaam hana l‑dahab al‑tigaddumuuhum misil hadiiye le kaffaarat al‑khata da,dissuhum fi sanduug aakhar wa khuttuuh jamb sanduug Allah.Wa khalaas,khallu al‑kaarro yamchi
wa chiifu.Kan al‑bagar macho ale huduud balad Israaʼiil ale hillit Beet Chams,taʼarfu kadar Allah bas darabaaku be kulla l‑waba da.Wa kan faato be derib aakhar kamaan,taʼarfu kadar al‑cheyy al‑jaaku,da ma min Allah laakin sudfa bas. 
Wa l‑Filistiyiin sawwo al‑cheyy al‑gaalo leehum da.Chaalo bagar itneen chawaayil wa rabatoohum fi l‑kaarro.Wa iyaalhum kamaan dassoohum fi l‑zariibe.
Wa khalaas,khatto sanduug Allah fi l‑kaarro maʼa l‑sanduug al‑indah foogah faar wa daraadim hana dahab.
Wa l‑bagar macho adiil ale hillit Beet Chams.Humman maachiin fi deribhum wa yabku wa ma mayyalo isra walla zeene.Wa kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin taabaʼoohum le l‑bagar lahaddi huduud Beet Chams.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,sukkaan Beet Chams gaaʼidiin fi l‑waadi yagtaʼo al‑gameh.Wa tawwaali wakit chaafo sanduug Allah da,firho farha chadiide.
Wa wakit al‑kaarro wassal fi zereʼ Yachuuʼ fi hillit Beet Chams,wagaf.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,fiyah hajar kabiir.Wa l‑naas chaggago hatab al‑kaarro wa dabaho al‑bagar al‑itneen wa harragoohum dahiiye muharraga le Allah.
Wa gubbaal da,al‑Laawiyiin rafaʼo sanduug Allah wa l‑sanduug al‑maʼaayah al‑foogah al‑achya hana l‑dahab wa nazzaloohum fi l‑hajar al‑kabiir da.Wa fi nafs al‑yoom,sukkaan Beet Chams gaddamo dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya aakhariin le Allah.
Wa baʼad chaafo kulla cheyy al‑bigi,kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin al‑khamsa gabbalo madiinat Akhruun fi nafs al‑yoom.
Wa daahu adad daraadim al‑dahab al‑Filistiyiin gaddamoohum misil hadiiye le kaffaarat al‑khata le Allah.Waahid le Achduud wa waahid le Khazza wa waahid le Achgaluun wa waahid le Gaat wa waahid le Akhruun.
Wa l‑faar hana l‑dahab kamaan,adadhum yimassil kulla l‑hillaal al‑taabʼiin le l‑kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin al‑khamsa.Wa l‑hillaal dool,humman al‑mudun al‑gawiyiin wa l‑furgaan lahaddi l‑huduud gariib le l‑hajar al‑kabiir al‑khatto foogah sanduug Allah.Wa l‑hajar da gaaʼid lahaddi l‑yoom,fi zereʼ Yachuuʼ al‑fi hillit Beet Chams.
Wa Allah darab sukkaan hillit Beet Chams achaan humman chaafo lubb sanduug Allah.Wa maato minhum 70 raajil.Wa l‑chaʼab bigo haznaaniin achaan Allah darabaahum darbe chadiide.
Wa sukkaan hillit Beet Chams gaalo : Yaatu al‑yagdar yagood giddaam Allah al‑Rabb al‑Khudduus ?Wa sanduug Allah da,hassaʼ niwadduuh ween ? 
Wa humman rassalo le sukkaan Kharyat Yaʼariim wa gaalo leehum : Al‑Filistiyiin gabbalo sanduug Allah.Hassaʼ da,taʼaalu wadduuh bakaanku ! 
Wa sukkaan hillit Kharyat Yaʼariim jo chaalo sanduug Allah wa khattooh fi beet Abinadaab fi raas al‑hajar.Wa khassaso wileedah Aliʼaazar le yahfadah.
Wa l‑sanduug da gaʼad ayyaam katiiriin fi Kharyat Yaʼariim,muddit 20 sana.Wa Bani Israaʼiil dawwaro yigabbulu battaan le Allah.
Wa Samuwiil kallamaahum wa gaal : Tamaam !Kan be kulla guluubku tidooru tigabbulu le Allah,baʼʼudu min kulla l‑ilaahaat al‑ajnabiyiin wa l‑ilaaha Achtaruut wa sabbutu guluubku fi Allah wa aʼabuduuh hu wiheedah bas.Be da,hu yinajjiiku min udwaanku al‑Filistiyiin. 
Wa khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil tarrafo minhum asnaam Baʼal wa Achtaruut wa abado Allah wiheedah.
Wa Samuwiil gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Limmu kulluku fi hillit Misfa achaan nasʼal leeku Allah. 
Khalaas,Bani Israaʼiil lammo fi Misfa wa chaalo almi wa sabbooh giddaam Allah.Wa di alaamit al‑tooba.Wa fi l‑yoom da,humman saamo wa gaalo : Nachhado fi nufuusna kadar aniina aznabna giddaam Allah. Wa fi l‑wakit da fi Misfa,Samuwiil bigi haakim fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wakit al‑Filistiyiin simʼo kadar Bani Israaʼiil lammo fi Misfa,kulla askar kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin gammo le yihaarubuuhum.Wa Bani Israaʼiil simʼo al‑khabar da wa khaafo khoof chadiid min al‑Filistiyiin.
Wa gaalo le Samuwiil : Asʼal Allah Ilaahna daayman achaan yinajjiina min al‑Filistiyiin. 
Wa Samuwiil chaal hamal radiiʼ wa gaddamah kulla ke dahiiye muharraga le Allah wa saʼal Allah fi chaan Bani Israaʼiil.Wa khalaas,Allah khibil suʼaalah.
Wa wakit Samuwiil gaaʼid yigaddim al‑dahiiye al‑muharraga da,al‑Filistiyiin garrabo le yahjumu Bani Israaʼiil.Wa laakin fi l‑yoom da,Allah darabaahum le l‑Filistiyiin be raʼad chadiid.Wa humman barjalo marra waahid wa anhazamo giddaam Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil gammo min Misfa wa taarado al‑Filistiyiin wa kataloohum lahaddi be khaadi le hillit Beet Kaar.
Wa Samuwiil chaal hajar wa khazzaah been Misfa wa l‑hajar al‑usmah Sinn wa samma al‑hajar da hajar al‑Musaaʼada.Wa gaal : Lahaddi hini,Allah saaʼadna. 
Wa l‑haziime di bigat chadiide le l‑Filistiyiin wa battaan ke ma gabbalo fi turaab Bani Israaʼiil.Achaan Allah daharaahum min turaab Bani Israaʼiil fi kulla wakit Samuwiil.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil galaʼo kulla l‑turaab wa l‑mudun al‑chaaloohum minhum al‑Filistiyiin min huduud madiinat Akhruun lahaddi hillit Gaat.Wa kaan salaam ambeen al‑Amuuriyiin wa Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Samuwiil hakam fi Bani Israaʼiil muddit hayaatah.
Wa hu yamchi kulla sana le Beet Iil wa Gilgaal wa Misfa wa yisawwi chariiʼa le Bani Israaʼiil fi kulla l‑hillaal al‑talaata dool.
Wa baʼad da,yigabbil fi hillit al‑Raama wa da l‑bakaan al‑hu saakin foogah.Wa hinaak kula hu yisawwi chariiʼa le Bani Israaʼiil.Wa bana madbah le ibaadat Allah.
Wa wakit Samuwiil bigi chaayib khalaas,darraj awlaadah hukkaam fi Israaʼiil.
Wa wileedah al‑bikir usmah Yuwiil wa l‑taani Abiiya.Wa humman gaaʼidiin yahkumu min hillit Biir Sabʼa.
Laakin al‑awlaad dool ma taabaʼo derib abuuhum.Dawwaro maslahat nafishum wa yakhbalo al‑rachwa wa yidangusu al‑chariiʼa.
Wa kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil lammo wa macho le Samuwiil fi hillit al‑Raama.
Wa gaalo leyah : Daahu inta bigiit chaayib wa awlaadak ma gaaʼidiin yitaabuʼu derbak.Hassaʼ da,darrij leena malik yahkimna,misil al‑umam al‑aakhariin. 
Wa Samuwiil ziʼil fi l‑kalaam al‑buguul : Darrij leena malik yahkimna. Wa gamma saʼal Allah.
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Asmaʼ kalaam al‑chaʼab fi kulla cheyy al‑buguuluuh leek.Humman ma rafadook inta laakin rafadooni ana.Wa ma yidooru nahkimhum.
Aʼarif !Min yoom al‑ana maragtuhum min balad Masir lahaddi hassaʼ,humman khallooni wa abado ilaahaat aakhariin.Wa l‑cheyy al‑daayman sawwooh leyi ana da,hassaʼ gaaʼidiin yisawwuuh leek inta kula !
Wa hassaʼ da khalaas,akhbal talabhum.Laakin hazzirhum wa arrifhum huguug al‑malik al‑yahkimhum. 
Wa Samuwiil hajja le Bani Israaʼiil al‑talabo minnah malik be kulla l‑kalaam al‑gaalah leyah Allah.
Wa gaal leehum : Daahu huguug al‑malik al‑yahkimku.Hu yichiil awlaadku le yusuugu leyah arabaatah hana l‑harib wa yarkabo fi kheelah wa yajru giddaam arabatah.
Wa yichiil waahidiin minhum wa yisawwiihum khuyyaad fi aalaaf wa khuyyaad fi khamsiinaat.Wa yahartu zerʼah wa yagtaʼo intaajah wa yasnaʼo leyah silaah hana l‑harib wa aalaat arabaatah hana l‑harib.
 Wa yichiil banaatku achaan yisawwan leyah riihe fi beetah wa yisawwan leyah akil wa yidissan leyah khubza fi l‑furun.
Wa yichiil al‑adiil min ziraaʼitku wa jineenaatku hana l‑inab wa l‑zaytuun wa yantiihum le khaddaamiinah.
Wa yichiil al‑uchur min intaaj ziraaʼitku wa inabku wa yantiihum le khaddaamiinah wa kubaaraatah.
Wa yichiil khaddaamiinku wa khaddaamaatku wa subyaanku wa hamiirku al‑induhum gudra le yakhdumu leyah.
Wa yichiil al‑uchur min khanamku.Wa fi l‑akhiir,intu zaatku tabgo leyah abiid !
Wa fi l‑wakit da,intu tabku le Allah achaan al‑malik al‑intu azaltuuh.Wa laakin fi l‑yoom da,Allah ma yasmaʼku abadan. 
Wa be da kula,al‑chaʼab abo ma simʼo kalaam Samuwiil wa gaalo : La !Ma lammaana !Darrij leena malik bas
achaan aniina kula nabgo misil al‑umam al‑aakhariin.Malikna yahkim foogna wa yamchi giddaam askarna wa yihaarib maʼaana. 
Wa Samuwiil simiʼ kulla kalaamhum wa kallamah le Allah.
Wa Allah gaal leyah : Kan ke da,asmaʼ kalaamhum wa darrij leehum malik. Wa khalaas,Samuwiil gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Khalli ayyi waahid yigabbil hillitah. 
Wa fiyah naadum waahid min balad Banyaamiin usmah Khiich.Wa aayich fi l‑balad di wa hu siid al‑maal.Wa hu wileed Abiyiil wileed Saruur wileed Bakuurat wileed Afiyah.
Wa Khiich indah wileed usmah Chaawuul.Hu sabi jamiil wa naadum min Bani Israaʼiil al‑yufuutah da,ma fiih.Hu faataahum kulluhum be tuul,raasah wa kataafeeh maargiin foog minhum.
Wa yoom waahid,hamiir hana Khiich abuuh Chaawuul waddaro.Wa Khiich gaal le wileedah Chaawuul : Chiil waahid min al‑khaddaamiin wa amchi fattich al‑hamiir. 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul wa l‑khaddaam macho yifattuchu al‑hamiir fi kulla jibaal Afraayim wa fi kulla balad Chaliicha wa ma ligoohum.Wa fattachoohum battaan fi kulla balad Chaʼaliim wa balad Banyaamiin wa laakin ma ligoohum.
Wa wakit wassalo fi balad Suuf,Chaawuul gaal le khaddaamah al‑maʼaayah : Khalli nigabbulu !Ana nakhaaf abuuyi hassaʼ ma yihimm le l‑hamiir laakin yihimm leena aniina. 
Wa l‑khaddaam gaal leyah : Fi l‑hille di,fiyah nabi Allah.Wa l‑naadum da hu maʼruuf wa kulla cheyy al‑buguulah yaji fi bakaanah.Khalli namchu leyah.Akuun yiwassif leena al‑derib al‑waajib nichiiluuh. 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul gaal le khaddaamah : Yalla namchu !Wa laakin niwaddu chunu le l‑nabi da ?Ma indina khubza fi mukhlaatna wa ma indina hadiiye al‑nigaddumuuha leyah.Ma indina cheyy ! 
Wa l‑khaddaam radda le Chaawuul wa gaal : Indi fi jeebi rubuʼ hana hajar fudda nantiih le nabi Allah.Wa hu yiwassif leena al‑derib. 
Wa fi aadit Bani Israaʼiil zamaan,kan yidooru yamchu yasʼalo al‑Rabb,humman yuguulu : Namchu le l‑chawwaafi. Achaan fi wakithum daak,humman le l‑nabi yinaaduuh chawwaafi.
Wa Chaawuul gaal le khaddaamah : Kalaamak adiil !Taʼaal namchu ! Wa khalaas,humman macho fi l‑hille al‑gaaʼid foogha nabi Allah.
Wa wakit gaaʼidiin yatlaʼo le yadkhulu fi l‑hille,laago banaat maargaat maachaat yichiilan almi.Wa humman saʼaloohin wa gaalo : Al‑chawwaafi da hini walla ? 
Wa l‑banaat raddan leehum wa gaalan : Aywa !Hu giddaamku !Amchu ajala talgooh.Hu ja fi l‑hille al‑yoom achaan al‑yoom fiyah dahiiye le l‑chaʼab fi l‑bakaan al‑aali hana l‑ibaada.
Amchu ajala talgooh gubbaal ma yatlaʼ fi bakaan al‑ibaada.Achaan al‑chaʼab ma yaakulu gubbaal hu ma yawsal wa yibaarik al‑dahiiye di.Wa baʼad da,al‑maʼzuumiin yaakuluuha.Hassaʼ da,amchu talgooh. 
Humman talaʼo ale l‑hille.Wa wakit daakhliin fi lubb al‑hille,chaafo daahu Samuwiil kulla jaayi mulaagiihum taaliʼ ale bakaan al‑ibaada.
Laakin gubbaal al‑lumma maʼa Chaawuul be yoom,Allah khabbarah le Samuwiil wa gaal leyah :
 Ambaakir fi nafs al‑wakit,nirassil leek naadum waahid min balad Banyaamiin.Amsahah wa darrijah le yabga kabiir le chaʼabi Bani Israaʼiil wa yinajjiihum min al‑Filistiyiin.Achaan ana chift taʼab chaʼabi wa siraakhhum wassalaani. 
Wa wakit Samuwiil chaaf Chaawuul,tawwaali Allah hajja leyah wa gaal : Da al‑raajil al‑kallamtak beyah wa hu bas al‑yakrub chaʼabi ! 
Wa Chaawuul lamma maʼa Samuwiil fi khachum baab al‑hille wa saʼalah wa gaal leyah : Al‑salaam aleek !Min fadlak,wassifni beet al‑chawwaafi. 
Wa Samuwiil radda leyah wa gaal : Ana bas al‑chawwaafi.Atlaʼ giddaami fi bakaan al‑ibaada.Al‑yoom,intu taakulu maʼaayi.Wa ambaakir fajur kamaan,nihajjiik be kulla cheyy al‑yihimmak wa niʼaddiik tamchi.
Wa kan le l‑hamiir al‑waddaro induhum talaata yoom,ma tihimm leehum.Humman anlago.Wa l‑muna hana chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil da,fi yaatu ?Ma fiik inta wa aayilat abuuk walla ? 
Wa Chaawuul radda wa gaal : Ana ma min gabiilat Banyaamiin walla ?Wa aniina min al‑gabaayil al‑dugaag hana Bani Israaʼiil !Wa khachum beeti kulla l‑sakhayyar fi khuchuum buyuut Banyaamiin.Wa maala tihajji leyi misil da ? 
Wa Samuwiil macha maʼa Chaawuul wa khaddaamah wa waddaahum fi l‑beet al‑baakulu foogah.Wa khattaahum fi l‑bakaan al‑indah charaf fi usut 30 maʼzuumiin aakhariin.
Wa Samuwiil gaal le l‑khaddaam al‑gaaʼid yisawwi al‑akil : Jiib al‑laham al‑anteetak wa gult leek ahfadah. 
Wa l‑khaddaam jaab al‑gaayme wa kulla l‑laham al‑foogha wa khattaaha giddaam Chaawuul.Wa Samuwiil gaal : Alfaddal.Daahu al‑cheyy al‑dammeena leek fi l‑munaasaba di wakit ana azamt al‑naas.Khuttah giddaamak wa aakul. Wa fi l‑yoom da,Chaawuul akal maʼa Samuwiil.
