Wa baʼad da,nazalo min bakaan al‑ibaada wa macho al‑hille.Wa Samuwiil hajja maʼa Chaawuul fi raas beetah.
Wa humman bakkaro.Wa wakit al‑chagaag chagga,Samuwiil naadaah le Chaawuul al‑gaaʼid fi raas al‑beet wa gaal leyah : Niʼaddiik. Wa khalaas,Chaawuul gamma wa Samuwiil macha maʼaayah le yiʼaddiih.
Wa wakit garrabo yamurgu min al‑hille,Samuwiil gaal le Chaawuul : Guul le khaddaamak khalli yigaddim. Wa hu gaddam.Wa Samuwiil gaal le Chaawuul : Hassaʼ da,inta agiif !Niʼooriik kalaam al‑Rabb. 
Wa Samuwiil chaal dihin wa sabbaah fi raas Chaawuul.Wa hadanah wa gaal : Be da,Allah darrajak le tabga kabiir le chaʼabah Bani Israaʼiil al‑misil warasatah.
Wa wakit al‑yoom tamchi min bakaani hini,tilimm maʼa rujaal itneen jamb khabur Raahiil al‑gaaʼid fi turaab Salsah fi huduud Banyaamiin.Wa humman yuguulu leek :‹ Al‑hamiir al‑inta macheet tifattichhum,khalaas anlago.Wa hassaʼ,abuuk khalla kalaam al‑hamiir wa gaaʼid yihimm leeku intu.Wa yasʼal nafsah kikkeef yalga wileedah. ›
 Min al‑bakaan da,amchi lahaddi tiwassil fi gaʼar al‑chadara al‑kabiire al‑fi jabal Taabuur.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,yalgook rujaal talaata al‑taaliʼiin le yaʼabudu al‑Rabb fi hillit Beet Iil.Wa waahid min al‑rujaal dool chaayil talaata sakhal wa l‑taani chaayil talaata khubza wa l‑taalit kamaan chaayil girbe hint asiir al‑inab.
Wa humman yisallumuuk wa yantuuk itneen khubza wa inta tichiilhum minhum.
Wa baʼad da,tamchi fi hillit Gibeeʼat Allah,al‑bakaan al‑gaaʼid foogah muʼaskar al‑Filistiyiin.Wa wakit tadkhul fi l‑hille di,tilimm maʼa majmuuʼa min al‑anbiya naazliin min bakaan al‑ibaada.Wa giddaamhum,fiyah naas al‑yadurbu jigindiiye wa nuggaara wa suffaara wa amsibeybe.Wa l‑anbiya dool yitnabbaʼo.
Wa tawwaali,Ruuh Allah yanzil foogak inta be chidde wa titnabbaʼ maʼaahum wa tikhayyir wa tabga raajil aakhar.
Wa wakit kulla l‑alaamaat dool yitimmu leek,khalaas sawwi kulla cheyy al‑inta tidoor tisawwiih achaan al‑Rabb maʼaak.
Wa anzil giddaami wa amchi fi hillit Gilgaal.Wa baʼad da,ana nalhagak le nigaddim dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya salaama.Wa arjaani muddit sabʼa yoom lahaddi ana najiik wa niʼooriik al‑cheyy al‑waajib tisawwiih. 
Wa min Chaawuul gabbal min Samuwiil wa macha,al‑Rabb khayyar galbah.Wa kulla l‑alaamaat dool tammo fi nafs al‑yoom.
Wa wakit Chaawuul wa khaddaamah wassalo fi hillit Gibeeʼa,laagoohum majmuuʼa min al‑anbiya.Wa tawwaali,Ruuh Allah nazal be chidde fi Chaawuul wa hu kula dakhal fi usuthum wa gamma yitnabbaʼ maʼaahum.
Wa wakit chaafooh yitnabbaʼ maʼa l‑anbiya,kulla l‑naas al‑awwal irfo Chaawuul assaaʼalo ambeenaathum wa gaalo : Chunu al‑bigi le wileed Khiich ?Chaawuul kula bigi nabi maʼaahum walla ? 
Wa naadum waahid min naas al‑bakaan da gaal : Yaatu sayyidhum ? Wa min al‑bakaan da bas,marag al‑masal al‑buguul : Chaawuul kula bigi nabi maʼaahum walla ? 
Wa wakit Chaawuul kammal min al‑tanabbu,talaʼ fi bakaan al‑ibaada.
Wa immah le Chaawuul saʼalah hu wa khaddaamah wa gaal leehum : Intu macheetu ween ? Wa Chaawuul radda leyah wa gaal : Aniina macheena nifattuchu al‑hamiir.Wa wakit ma ligiinaahum kamaan,macheena gaabalna Samuwiil. 
Wa immah le Chaawuul gaal : Khalaas,ooriini Samuwiil gaal leeku chunu ? 
Wa Chaawuul radda le immah wa gaal : Samuwiil khabbaraana kadar al‑hamiir anlago. Wa laakin labbad le immah al‑cheyy al‑bukhuss al‑muluk,al‑khabbarah beyah Samuwiil.
Wa Samuwiil naada al‑chaʼab le yilimmu giddaam Allah fi hillit Misfa.
Wa hu gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Daahu Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil gaal :‹ Ana bas al‑maragtuku intu Bani Israaʼiil min Masir.Wa ana bas al‑najjeetku min malik Masir wa min kulla l‑muluuk al‑gaaʼidiin yistaʼmarooku. ›
Wa laakin al‑yoom intu abeetu Ilaahku al‑najjaaku min kulla l‑masaayib wa min kulla l‑taʼab.Wa gultu leyah :‹ Aywa !Darrij leena malik !› Hassaʼ da,taʼaalu giddaam Allah be gabaayilku wa khuchuum buyuutku. 
Wa Samuwiil gaddam kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil wa sawwa leehum amʼiyeedaat wa l‑ikhtiyaar wagaʼ fi gabiilat Banyaamiin.
Wa battaan gaddam gabiilat Banyaamiin be kulla khuchuum buyuutha wa l‑ikhtiyaar wagaʼ fi khachum beet Matri.Wa fi l‑akhiir,al‑ikhtiyaar wagaʼ fi Chaawuul wileed Khiich.Wa humman fattachooh wa laakin ma ligooh.
Wa humman saʼalo Allah battaan wa gaalo : Al‑raajil da gaaʼid maʼaana hini walla ? Wa Allah gaal : Aywa !Chiifuuh !Mullabbid jamb al‑khumaam. 
Wa humman macho jaabooh.Wa wakit wagaf fi ust al‑chaʼab,hu bas faataahum be tuul,raasah wa kataafeeh maargiin foog minhum.
Wa Samuwiil gaal le kulla l‑chaʼab : Hal chiftu al‑naadum al‑Allah azalah walla ?Ma fi naadum mislah fi kulla l‑chaʼab ! Wa kulla l‑chaʼab aato be hiss waahid wa gaalo : Yiʼiich al‑malik ! 
Wa Samuwiil kallam le l‑chaʼab be kulla huguug al‑malik wa katabaahum fi kitaab wa khattaah giddaam Allah.Wa baʼad da,Samuwiil gaal le kulla l‑chaʼab khalli ayyi waahid yigabbil beetah.
Wa Chaawuul kula gabbal beetah fi hillit Gibeeʼa wa macho maʼaayah mujtamaʼ min al‑rujaal al‑chudaad al‑hadaahum al‑Rabb.
Wa laakin naas waahidiin al‑ma naafʼiin gaalo : Hu da yinajjiina walla ? Humman kirhooh wa ma gaddamo leyah hadaaya.Wa Chaawuul ma gaal cheyy.
Wa baʼad da,Nahaach malik Bani Ammuun macha fi hillit Yaabiich fi turaab Gilʼaad wa haasarha.Wa kulla sukkaan Yaabiich Gilʼaad gaalo leyah : Sawwi maʼaana muʼaahada wa nagoodu tihtak. 
Wa Nahaach gaal leehum : Tamaam !Kan nisawwi maʼaaku muʼaahada da,illa nisill kulla uyuunku al‑zeenaayaat.Wa be da,nijiib al‑ihaana fi kulla Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa chuyuukh Yaabiich gaalo : Arjaana sabʼa ayyaam.Nirassulu fi kulla balad Bani Israaʼiil wa kan ma ligiina naadum yafzaʼna,khalaas namurgu wa nagoodu tihtak. 
Wa wakit al‑murassaliin wassalo fi hillit Chaawuul al‑usumha Gibeeʼa,hajjo be l‑kalaam da le kulla l‑chaʼab wa l‑chaʼab gammo yabku be hiss aali.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,Chaawuul jaayi min al‑zereʼ wara bagarah wa gaal : Chunu al‑bigi le l‑chaʼab wa gaaʼidiin yabku ? Wa humman oorooh be l‑khabar hana naas Yaabiich.
Wa wakit Chaawuul simiʼ al‑kalaam da,tawwaali Ruuh Allah nazal foogah wa hu ziʼil zaʼal chadiid.
Wa chaal bagar itneen dabahaahum wa gattaʼaahum wa rassal lahamhum fi kulla balad Israaʼiil.Wa gaal : Guulu le Bani Israaʼiil :‹ Ayyi naadum al‑ma marag le l‑harib wara Chaawuul wa Samuwiil,bagarah nigattiʼhum misil da !›  Wa khalaas,khoof chadiid min Allah dakhal fi guluubhum wa marago kulluhum misil raajil waahid.
Wa fi hillit Baazakh,Chaawuul hasab askarah.Wa adad rujaal Bani Israaʼiil 300 000 wa rujaal gabiilat Yahuuza 30 000.
Wa l‑naas al‑lammo gaalo le l‑murassaliin al‑jo min hillit Yaabiich Gilʼaad : Guulu le naasku ambaakir gaayle yalgo al‑fazaʼ. Wa l‑murassaliin macho wa khabbaro naas hillit Yaabiich wa humman firho bilheen be l‑khabar da.
Wa gaalo le Bani Ammuun : Ambaakir aniina nisallumu nufuusna leeku wa tisawwu foogna kulla cheyy al‑tidooruuh. 
Wa ambaakir be fajur badri,Chaawuul gassam askarah ale talaata bakaan wa hajamo muʼaskar Bani Ammuun wa kataloohum lahaddi al‑harraay bigat gaayle.Wa l‑askar al‑faddalo chattato marra waahid,itneen maachiin sawa kula ma fiih !
Wa kulla l‑naas gaalo le Samuwiil : Yaatumman al‑gaalo :‹ Chaawuul ma yamluk foogna ?› Jiibuuhum hini naktuluuhum ! 
Wa laakin Chaawuul gaal : Fi l‑yoom da,ma yaktulu naadum waahid kula !Achaan Allah najja Bani Israaʼiil fi l‑yoom da. 
Wa Samuwiil gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Taʼaalu namchu hillit Gilgaal le nijaddudu sabbitiin al‑malik. 
Wa khalaas,kulla Bani Israaʼiil macho le hillit Gilgaal wa sabbato al‑malik Chaawuul giddaam Allah.Wa gaddamo dahaaya salaama le Allah.Wa baʼad da,Chaawuul wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil firho farha chadiide.
Wa Samuwiil gaal le Bani Israaʼiil : Daahu ana simiʼt kulla kalaamku wa darrajt leeku malik.
Wa hassaʼ da,daahu induku malik gaaʼid yuguudku.Wa kan leyi ana kamaan,ana bigiit chaayib wa raasi kula bigi abyad.Wa daahu iyaali kula gaaʼidiin maʼaaku wa taʼarfu kadar ana gudtuku min subaayi lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa daahu ana waagif giddaamku.Awurdu foogi chahaada giddaam Allah wa giddaam al‑malik al‑hu masahah wa darrajah.Kan ana chilt toor aw humaar min naadum aw zalamt naadum aw sawweet fasil le naadum,ooruuni !Kan chilt rachwa min naadum achaan nakhjal minnah wa ma niʼooriih al‑sahiih,ooruuni !Ooruuni achaan ana nikaffiiku al‑cheyy al‑zalamtuku beyah. 
Wa humman gaalo : La !Inta ma zalamtina wa la sawweet cheyy fasil le naadum wa la chilt cheyy min naadum. 
Wa hu gaal leehum : Al‑yoom Allah chaahid wa l‑malik al‑hu darrajah kula chaahid kadar intu ma ligiitu foogi eeb waahid kula. Wa humman gaalo : Aywa,hu chaahid ! 
Wa khalaas,Samuwiil gaal le l‑chaʼab : Aywa !Allah hu bas al‑azal Muusa wa Haaruun wa marag juduudku min balad Masir.
Wa hassaʼ da,taʼaalu.Ana madluum foogku giddaam Allah.Wa nifakkirku be kulla cheyy al‑aadil al‑Allah sawwaah leeku intu wa le juduudku.
Wa wakit juduudku iyaal Yaakhuub gaaʼidiin fi balad Masir,sarakho le Allah.Wa hu rassal Muusa wa Haaruun maragoohum min balad Masir wa jaaboohum hini.
Wa laakin humman niso Allah Ilaahhum wa Allah sallamaahum le Siisra khaayid hana madiinat Haasuur wa le l‑Filistiyiin wa le malik Muwaab wa humman haaraboohum.
Wa juduudku sarakho le Allah wa gaalo :‹ Aniina aznabna achaan abeena Allah wa abadna asnaam Baʼal wa Achtaruut.Wa laakin hassaʼ da,najjiina min udwaanna wa aniina naʼabuduuk battaan. ›
 Wa khalaas,Allah rassal Yarbaʼal wa Baaraakh wa Yiftaahwa ana Samuwiil.Wa najjaaku min udwaanku al‑muhawwigiinku wa be da,sakantu be amaan.
Wa wakit chiftu Nahaach malik Bani Ammuun gamma didduku,gultu :‹ Aniina kula nidooru malik yamluk foogna.› Wa be da kula,abeetu Allah Ilaahku wa hu bas malikku.
 Wa hassaʼ da,daahu al‑malik al‑intu dawwartuuh wa talabtuuh.Wa hu bas al‑malik al‑Allah darrajah foogku.
Wa kan intu khuftu min Allah wa abadtuuh wa simiʼtu kalaamah wa ma isiitu amur Allah Ilaahku wa taabaʼtuuh,intu wa l‑malik al‑gaaʼid yamluk foogku,da yabga leeku adiil.
Laakin kan ma simiʼtu kalaam Allah wa isiitu amrah,Allah yadrubku misil awwal darab juduudku.
 Wa hassaʼ da,taʼaalu wa chiifu al‑cheyy al‑ajiib al‑yisawwiih Allah giddaamku !
Da darat,wakit gatiʼiin al‑gameh.Wa hassaʼ bas,ana nasʼal Allah wa hu yinazzil matara wa raʼad.Wa be da,intu tichiifu wa taʼarfu kadar intu sawweetu khata kabiir giddaam Allah wakit intu talabtu minnah malik ! 
Wa khalaas,Samuwiil saʼal Allah wa Allah nazzal matara wa raʼad fi l‑yoom da.Wa kulla l‑chaʼab khaafo khoof chadiid min Allah wa min Samuwiil.
Wa kulla l‑chaʼab gaalo le Samuwiil : Achhad leena Allah ilaahak le ma numuutu !Achaan aniina zidna zanib kabiir fi zunuubna be sabab talabna malik. 
Wa Samuwiil gaal le l‑chaʼab : Ma takhaafo.Sahiih,intu sawweetu al‑khata da.Wa laakin ma tikhallu derib Allah wa aʼabuduuh be kulla guluubku.
Ma titaabuʼu al‑asnaam achaan humman ma yagdaro yafzaʼooku wa la yinajjuuku.Achaan humman ma naafʼiin.
 Wa fi chaan usmah al‑aziim,Allah ma yikhalli chaʼabah.Achaan dawwar yisawwiiku intu chaʼabah halaalah.
Wa kan leyi ana,ma niwaggif al‑duʼa fi chaanku achaan kan ana waggaftah,da zanib didd Allah.Wa waajib niwassifku al‑derib al‑sameh wa l‑adiil.
Wa laakin akhaafo min Allah wa aʼabuduuh be sahiih wa be kulla guluubku.Wa fakkuru fi l‑ajaayib al‑kubaar al‑hu sawwaahum leeku.
Wa kan sawweetu al‑fasaala,tahlako intu wa malikku kula ! 
Wa Chaawuul indah 30 sana wakit bigi malik fi Bani Israaʼiil wa hu hakam 42 sana lahaddi maat.
Wa yoom waahid,Chaawuul azal 3 000 raajil min Bani Israaʼiil.Wa 2 000 khattaahum maʼaayah fi Mikmaach wa fi jabal Beet Iil.Wa 1 000 kamaan khattaahum maʼa Yuunataan wileedah fi hillit Gibeeʼa Banyaamiin.Wa l‑faddalo min al‑rujaal,Chaawuul gaal khalli ayyi waahid yigabbil beetah.
Wa yoom waahid,Yuunataan katal khaayid al‑Filistiyiin al‑gaaʼid fi Gabaʼ.Wa l‑Filistiyiin kula simʼo be l‑khabar da.Wa Chaawuul amar le yadurbu al‑buug fi kulla l‑balad wa gaal : Khalli kulla l‑Ibraaniyiin yasmaʼo al‑khabar da ! 
Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil simʼo kadar Chaawuul katal khaayid al‑Filistiyiin wa humman irfo kadar al‑Filistiyiin gaaʼidiin yakrahoohum.Wa khalaas,kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil wagafo misil raajil waahid wara Chaawuul fi hillit Gilgaal.
Wa l‑Filistiyiin kula lammo le yihaarubu Bani Israaʼiil wa humman induhum 30 000 arabaat al‑harib wa 6 000 siyaad al‑kheel wa rujaal katiiriin misil ramla hana khachum al‑bahar.Wa jo wa dallo fi hillit Mikmaach sabaah le hillit Beet Awan.
Wa wakit rujaal Bani Israaʼiil chaafo kadar aduuhum ja leehum gariib,humman barjalo wa jaro allabbado fi l‑karaakiir wa l‑nugaar wa l‑hujaar wa l‑khaaba wa l‑biyaar.
Wa waahidiin min al‑Ibraaniyiin gataʼo bahar al‑Urdun wa wassalo balad Gaad wa Gilʼaad.Wa laakin Chaawuul kamaan gaʼad fi Gilgaal.Wa kulla l‑rujaal al‑maʼaayah gaaʼidiin yarjufu min al‑khoof.
Wa Chaawuul gaʼad sabʼa yoom hasab al‑waʼad al‑antaah leyah Samuwiil.Wa laakin Samuwiil ma ja leyah fi Gilgaal.Wa l‑rujaal bado yichattutu minnah.
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul gaal : Jiibu leyi bahaayim le l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga wa dahaaya al‑salaama. Wa hu gaddam al‑dahiiye al‑muharraga.
Wa wakit Chaawuul kammal min gaddimiin al‑dahiiye al‑muharraga,tawwaali chaaf Samuwiil wassal.Wa hu marag laagaah.
Wa Samuwiil gaal leyah : Chunu al‑sawweetah da ? Wa Chaawuul gaal : Wakit ana chift al‑rujaal gaaʼidiin yichattutu minni wa inta zaatak ma jiit fi l‑waʼad wa l‑Filistiyiin lammo fi Mikmaach,
ana gult akuun al‑Filistiyiin yahjumuuni fi Gilgaal gubbaal ma nachhad Allah.Wa khalaas,ana anjabart wa gaddamt al‑dahiiye al‑muharraga. 
Wa Samuwiil gaal le Chaawuul : Inta sawweet cheyy bala fikir wa ma taabaʼt wasiiyat Allah Ilaahak al‑hu amarak beeha.Wa kan awwal inta taabaʼt wasiiyat Allah,hu yisabbit mulkak daayman fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa hassaʼ da,mulkak ma yitawwil.Achaan Allah azal naadum aakhar al‑hu radyaan beyah wa darrajah le yahkim chaʼabah.Wa laakin inta ma taabaʼt wasiiyat Allah al‑amarak beeha. 
Wa baʼad da,Samuwiil gamma min Gilgaal wa macha le Gibeeʼa fi ard Banyaamiin.Wa Chaawuul hasab al‑rujaal al‑maʼaayah wa adadhum bigi hawaale 600 raajil.
Wa Chaawuul wa wileedah Yuunataan wa l‑rujaal al‑maʼaahum gaʼado fi Gabaʼ ard Banyaamiin.Wa l‑Filistiyiin kamaan khatto muʼaskarhum fi Mikmaach.
Wa l‑mukharribiin min al‑Filistiyiin marago min muʼaskarhum wa angasamo ale talaata majmuuʼaat.Al‑majmuuʼa al‑awwalaaniiye chaalat derib Ufra ale balad Chuuʼal.
Wa l‑majmuuʼa al‑taaniye machat ale derib Beet Huruun.Wa l‑majmuuʼa al‑taalta kamaan chaalat derib al‑maachi le l‑huduud ale waadi al‑Maraafʼiin fi l‑sahara.
Wa fi l‑wakit daak,ma fi haddaadi fi kulla balad Israaʼiil achaan al‑Filistiyiin khaafo wa gaalo : Akuun al‑Ibraaniyiin yasnaʼo suyuuf walla huraab. 
Wa ayyi naadum min Bani Israaʼiil waajib yamchi le haddaad al‑Filistiyiin hatta yitarrugu leyah jarraaytah aw haffaarah aw faasah aw kadankitah.
Wa tarrigiin al‑jarraay aw al‑kadanka tamanah itneen tilit hana hajar fudda.Wa tarrigiin al‑faas aw addiliin raas al‑kookaab tamanah tilit hana hajar fudda.
Wa achaan da fi yoom al‑harib,ma fi seef walla harba fi iideen kulla l‑rujaal al‑gaaʼidiin maʼa Chaawuul wa Yuunataan.Illa Chaawuul wa wileedah Yuunataan bas musallahiin.
Wa l‑Filistiyiin marago min al‑muʼaskar wa gaʼado fi derib Mikmaach.
Wa yoom waahid,Yuunataan wileed Chaawuul gaal le l‑sabi al‑chaayil leyah silaahah : Taʼaal,namchu le l‑muʼaskar hana l‑Filistiyiin al‑gaaʼid fi l‑nuss al‑hinaak. Wa laakin Yuunataan ma khabbar abuuh.
Wa Chaawuul gaaʼid fi taraf hillit Gibeeʼa fi gaʼar chadarat al‑rummaan fi turaab Migruun wa maʼaayah hawaale 600 raajil.
Wa fiyah raajil waahid usmah Akhiiya wileed Akhituub akhu Ikabuud wileed Fiinhaas wileed Ali al‑hu raajil al‑diin hana Allah fi hillit Chiilooh.Wa Akhiiya da,hu bas kabiir rujaal al‑diin wa laabis al‑farmala.Wa kulla l‑askar ma irfo kadar Yuunataan ma fiih.
Wa l‑derib al‑Yuunataan yidoor yamchi beyah wa yahjim muʼaskar al‑Filistiyiin indah hujaar itneen.Al‑waahid be hini usmah Busiis wa l‑aakhar be hinaak usmah Sanna.
Wa l‑hajar al‑waahid gaaʼid be munchaakh mugaabil Mikmaach wa l‑hajar al‑aakhar kamaan gaaʼid wati mugaabil Gabaʼ.
Wa Yuunataan gaal le l‑sabi al‑chaayil leyah silaahah : Taʼaal !Namchu le l‑muʼaskar hana l‑naas al‑ma mutahhariin dool.Akuun Allah yisaaʼidna wa ninnasru fooghum achaan Allah gaadir,yanti al‑nasur le naas katiiriin aw le naas chiyya kula. 
Wa khaddaamah gaal leyah : Sawwi kulla cheyy al‑tidoorah !Amchi wa ana waraak ! 
Wa Yuunataan gaal : Yalla !Khalli namchu leehum lahaddi yichiifuuna.
Wa kan yuguulu leena :‹ Agiifu fi bakaanku lahaddi najuuku ›,khalaas nagiifu wa ma natlaʼo leehum.
Wa laakin kan yuguulu leena :‹ Atlaʼo ›,natlaʼo leehum.Achaan di bas alaamat al‑nasur wa Allah yansurna fooghum. 
Wa khalaas,al‑Filistiyiin chaafoohum tineenithum wa gaalo : Chiifu !Al‑Ibraaniyiin maargiin min al‑nugaar al‑humman allabbado fooghum ! 
Wa l‑hurraas gaalo le Yuunataan wa khaddaamah : Atlaʼo leena jaay !Niʼooruuku kalaam waahid ! Wa Yuunataan gaal le khaddaamah : Atlaʼ waraayi achaan al‑yoom Allah dassaahum fi iideen Bani Israaʼiil ! 
Wa Yuunataan talaʼ fi l‑hajar wa khaddaamah talaʼ waraayah.Wa hu katal al‑Filistiyiin.Wa khalaas,al‑Filistiyiin anhazamo giddaam Yuunataan.Wa khaddaamah kula gaaʼid yaktulhum waraayah.
Wa fi l‑duwaas al‑awwal da,Yuunataan wa khaddaamah katalo hawaale 20 raajil fi masaafa gariibe bas.
Wa khalaas,khoof chadiid wagaʼ fi kulla deech al‑Filistiyiin wa fi kulla sukkaan al‑mantaga wa l‑gaaʼidiin fi l‑muʼaskar.Wa l‑hurraas wa l‑mukharribiin kulluhum barjalo.Wa l‑ard kula rajafat achaan al‑Rabb bas nazzal fooghum al‑barjaal da.
Wa hurraas Chaawuul al‑gaaʼidiin fi Gibeeʼa ard Banyaamiin gaaʼidiin bichiifu al‑Filistiyiin barjalo wa jaariyiin fi ayyi bakaan.
Wa Chaawuul gaal le l‑rujaal al‑maʼaayah : Ajala ahsubu al‑naas al‑gaaʼidiin wa chiifu yaatu al‑ma fiih ! Wa humman hasabo al‑naas wa ligo Yuunataan wa khaddaamah ma fiihum.
Wa Chaawuul gaal le Akhiiya : Jiib sanduug Allah ! Achaan fi l‑wakit daak,sanduug al‑Rabb gaaʼid fi bakaan Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa wakit Chaawuul gaaʼid yikallim maʼa Akhiiya raajil al‑diin,al‑korooraak gaaʼid yiziid fi muʼaskar al‑Filistiyiin wa tawwaali Chaawuul gaal le raajil al‑diin : Agiif !Khalaas khalliih ! 
Wa Chaawuul lamma kulla l‑rujaal al‑maʼaayah wa dakhalo fi l‑harib.Wa humman ligo al‑Filistiyiin gaaʼidiin yilkaatalo ambeenaathum.Wa l‑barjala di bigat chadiide.
Wa fi Ibraaniyiin waahidiin tawwalo maʼa l‑Filistiyiin wa gaaʼidiin yihaarubu maʼaahum.Wa fi l‑yoom da,humman lammo maʼa akhwaanhum Bani Israaʼiil al‑taabʼiin le Chaawuul wa Yuunataan.
Wa wakit simʼo al‑Filistiyiin arrado,kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil al‑mullabbidiin fi jibaal Afraayim,humman kula dakhalo fi l‑harib le yitaarudu al‑Filistiyiin.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,Allah najja Bani Israaʼiil.Wa l‑harib lihig lahaddi khaadi le hillit Beet Awan.
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil tiʼibo fi l‑yoom da achaan Chaawuul hallafaahum wa gaal : Malʼuun al‑naadum al‑yaakul gubbaal al‑achiiye,gabul ma ninnasir fi aduuyi ! Wa fi l‑yoom da,kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil ma akalo cheyy.
Wa kulla l‑deech dakhal fi l‑khaaba wa hinaak fiyah asal gaaʼid yisiil fi l‑ard.
Wa wakit dakhalo fi l‑khaaba,chaafo al‑asal al‑gaaʼid yisiil fi l‑ard laakin naadum ma akal minnah achaan khaafo min al‑haliife.
Wa Yuunataan ma simiʼ kadar abuuh hallaf al‑askar wa gamma madda asaatah al‑fi iidah wa chakka raasha fi l‑asal wa akalah.Wa tawwaali ke,jildah bigi nachiit.
Wa waahid min al‑askar gaal leyah : Abuuk hallaf al‑askar wa gaal :‹ Malʼuun al‑naadum al‑yaakul fi l‑yoom da.› Wa achaan da bas,kulla l‑deech bigi ayyaan. 
Wa Yuunataan gaal : Abuuyi sabbab barjaal le kulla l‑askar.Chiifuuni ana,kikkeef bigiit nachiit wakit dukht al‑asal da.
Wa kan al‑yoom al‑askar akalo min al‑khaniime al‑chaalooha min aduuhum di,akiid haziimat al‑Filistiyiin tabga akbar min da. 
Wa fi l‑yoom da,Bani Israaʼiil annasaro fi l‑Filistiyiin wa kataloohum min Mikmaach lahaddi hillit Ayyaluun.Wa askar Bani Israaʼiil iyo marra waahid.
Wa wagaʼo fi l‑khaniime wa chaalo al‑khanam wa l‑bagar wa l‑ajjaal wa kataloohum wa akalo al‑laham be dammah fi nafs al‑bakaan.
Wa naas waahidiin jo khabbaro Chaawuul kadar al‑askar aznabo wa iso Allah achaan akalo al‑laham be dammah.Wa Chaawuul gaal : Intu khaayniin.Hassaʼ da,dargusu hajar kabiir wa jiibuuh leyi hini. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal : Amchu ambeen al‑askar wa guulu leehum :‹ Khalli ayyi waahid yijiib leyi khanamaaytah aw toorah wa yadbahoohum hini wa yaakuluuhum.Achaan ma taakulu laham be dammah wa tisawwu zanib wa taʼaso Allah.› Wa khalaas fi l‑leele di,ayyi waahid min al‑askar jaab toorah wa dabahah fi l‑bakaan da.
Wa Chaawuul bana madbah le Allah wa da awwal madbah al‑hu bana le Allah.
Wa Chaawuul gaal : Khalli al‑leele di namchu wara l‑Filistiyiin wa naglaʼo khumaamhum lahaddi l‑fajur.Wa ma nikhallu waahid kula minhum yifaddil. Wa l‑askar raddo leyah wa gaalo : Sawwi kulla cheyy al‑tidoorah. Wa laakin raajil al‑diin gaal : Khalli hini bas nasʼalo al‑Rabb. 
Wa Chaawuul saʼal al‑Rabb wa gaal : Namchi wara l‑Filistiyiin walla ?Tisallimhum fi iideen Bani Israaʼiil walla ? Wa laakin al‑Rabb ma radda leyah fi l‑yoom da.
Wa Chaawuul gaal le kulla kubaaraat al‑deech : Limmu wa taʼaalu.Khalli al‑yoom nichiifu wa naʼarfu chunu al‑sabab hana l‑zanib da.
Wa nahlif be Allah al‑Hayy al‑najja Bani Israaʼiil,al‑naadum al‑sawwa al‑khata da kan wileedi Yuunataan kula,al‑yoom yumuut. Wa naadum min al‑deech radda leyah ma fiih.
Wa hu gaal le kulla Bani Israaʼiil : Agiifu intu be hinaak wa ana wa wileedi Yuunataan nagiifu be hini. Wa l‑askar gaalo le Chaawuul : Sawwi kulla cheyy al‑tidoorah. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal le Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil : Wassifna al‑hagg ! Wa sawwo amʼiyeedaat.Wa khalaas,wagaʼat fi raas Yuunataan wa Chaawuul wa l‑askar bigo bariyiin.
Wa Chaawuul gaal : Sawwu amʼiyeedaat beeni wa been wileedi Yuunataan ! Wa khalaas,wagaʼat fi Yuunataan.
Wa Chaawuul gaal le Yuunataan : Ooriini al‑cheyy al‑inta sawweetah. Wa Yuunataan hajja leyah wa gaal : Ana dukht al‑asal be raas al‑asa al‑fi iidi.Wa daahuuni le l‑moot. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal : Khalli al‑Rabb yiʼaakhibni ikhaab chadiid kan inta ma mutt,ya Yuunataan ! 
Wa l‑askar gaalo le Chaawuul : Yuunataan al‑jaab al‑nasur al‑kabiir le Israaʼiil da,yumuut ?Da ma sahiih !Nahalfu be Allah al‑Hayy,suufaay waahide kula min raasah ma tagaʼ fi l‑ard !Achaan fi l‑yoom da,hu najja Bani Israaʼiil be gudrat Allah.La !Yuunataan ma yumuut. Wa be da,al‑askar najjo Yuunataan min al‑moot.
Wa baʼad Chaawuul khalla mutaaradathum,al‑Filistiyiin gabbalo fi baladhum.
Wa wakit Chaawuul chaal al‑muluk fi Israaʼiil,hu haarab kulla udwaanah al‑mujaawiriinah misil naas Muwaab wa Bani Ammuun wa naas Adoom wa muluk Suuba wa l‑Filistiyiin.Wa fi ayyi bakaan yiwajjih,hu yinnasir.
Wa hu wassaf faraasiiytah wakit hazam al‑Amaalikh wa najja Bani Israaʼiil min al‑naas al‑yanhaboohum.
Wa awlaad Chaawuul humman Yuunataan wa Yichwi wa Malkichuuʼ.Wa banaatah kamaan itneen al‑kabiire usumha Miirab wa l‑sakhayre usumha Mikaal.
Wa marit Chaawuul usumha Akhinuuʼam bineeyit Akhimaaʼas.Wa khaayid askarah usmah Abniir wileed Niir.Wa Niir da,hu immah le Chaawuul.
Niir abu Abniir wa Khiich abu Chaawuul,humman kulluhum iyaal Abiyiil.
Fi wakit Chaawuul,al‑harib didd al‑Filistiyiin bigi chadiid bilheen.Wa Chaawuul gaaʼid yijannid kulla l‑rujaal al‑fahaliin wa l‑gaadriin.
Wa Samuwiil gaal le Chaawuul : Ana bas,Allah rassalaani masahtak wa darrajtak malik fi chaʼabah Bani Israaʼiil.Hassaʼ da,asmaʼ kalaam Allah.
Wa daahu Allah al‑Gaadir gaal :‹ Ana niʼaakhib chaʼab Amaalikh fi amalhum al‑sawwooh kan daharo al‑derib le Bani Israaʼiilwakit humman maargiin min balad Masir.
Hassaʼ da,amchi wa haarib chaʼab Amaalikh wa dammir kulla cheyy al‑induhum.Wa ma tihinn fooghum !Aktul al‑rujaal wa l‑awiin wa l‑iyaal wa l‑atfaal wa l‑bagar wa l‑khanam wa l‑jumaal wa l‑hamiir.› 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul lamma al‑deech fi hillit Talaayim wa ligi adadhum 200 000 askari wa 10 000 min gabiilat Yahuuza.
Wa Chaawuul macha maʼa askarah le madiinat al‑Amaalikh wa karaso fi l‑waadi.
Wa Chaawuul gaal le l‑Khiiniyiin : Amurgu min ust al‑Amaalikh wa amchu !Ma nidammirku maʼaahum achaan intu sawweetu al‑kheer le Bani Israaʼiil wakit humman maargiin min balad Masir. Wa khalaas,al‑Khiiniyiin anfarago min al‑Amaalikh.
Wa Chaawuul haarab al‑Amaalikh wa annasar fooghum min hillit Hawiila lahaddi gariib le hillit Chuur al‑mugaabile balad Masir.
Wa dammar kulla chaʼab Amaalikh be l‑seef wa karab malikhum Agaag.
Wa Chaawuul wa askarah khallo ma dammaro al‑malik Agaag wa kulla l‑bahaayim al‑samhiin wa sumaan misil al‑khanam wa l‑bagar wa l‑humlaan.Wa kulla cheyy sameh wa indah faayde ma dammarooh wa laakin dammaro kulla cheyy al‑daʼiif wa l‑ma indah faayde.
Wa Allah hajja le Samuwiil wa gaal :
 Awwal ana darrajt Chaawuul malik.Wa laakin hassaʼ,ana nidimt achaan hu abaani wa ma taabaʼ kalaami. Wa l‑kalaam da bigi le Samuwiil gaasi bilheen wa tuul al‑leel hu gaaʼid yasʼal Allah.
Wa be fajur badri,Samuwiil gamma macha le yigaabil Chaawuul.Wa oorooh kadar Chaawuul macha fi hillit Karmal sawwa leyah timsaal wa gabbal fi hillit Gilgaal.
Wa wakit Samuwiil wassal fi bakaan Chaawuul,Chaawuul gaal leyah : Allah yibaarikak !Ana sawweet al‑cheyy al‑Allah gaalah ! 
Wa Samuwiil gaal : Chunu al‑baki hana l‑bagar wa l‑khanam al‑gaaʼid nasmaʼ da ? 
Wa Chaawuul gaal : Dool al‑bagar wa l‑khanam al‑samhiin wa sumaan al‑aniina galaʼnaahum min al‑Amaalikh wa l‑askar khalloohum ma dammaroohum achaan yigaddumuuhum dahiiye le Allah Ilaahak.Wa laakin al‑faddalo kamaan,aniina dammarnaahum. 
Wa Samuwiil gaal le Chaawuul : Askut !Khalli nikallimak be l‑kalaam al‑Allah gaalah leyi albaareh. Wa Chaawuul gaal : Kallim ! 
Wa Samuwiil gaal : Inta taʼarif nafsak kadar inta ma tisaawi cheyy wa laakin hassaʼ bigiit kabiir fi gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil.Wa Allah bas masahak wa darrajak fooghum malik.
Wa Allah kallafaak wa gaal leek :‹ Amchi wa dammir kulla l‑Amaalikh al‑muznibiin wa haaribhum lahaddi tikammilhum marra waahid. ›
Wa laakin maala inta ma simiʼt kalaam Allah ?Wagaʼat fi l‑khaniime wa sawweet al‑fasaala giddaam Allah. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal le Samuwiil : Ana simiʼt kalaam Allah.Wa sawweet al‑cheyy al‑hu kallafaani beyah.Dammart kulla l‑Amaalikh wa karabt malikhum Agaag wa jibtah !
Wa l‑askar chaalo al‑khaniime hana l‑khanam wa l‑bagar al‑samhiin al‑waajib nidammuruuhum wa khalloohum le yigaddumuuhum dahiiye le Allah Ilaahak fi Gilgaal ! 
Wa Samuwiil gaal : Allah yafrah be dahaaya muharragiin wa be dahaaya aakhariin walla ?Walla yafrah kan titiiʼ kalaamah ?Achaan kan titiiʼah,da afdal min al‑dahaaya wa kan tasmaʼ kalaamah,da afdal min chaham al‑kubaach.
Al‑isyaan,hu khata misil al‑hije be ilim al‑kheeb.Wa gu al‑raas,hu charr misil ibaadat al‑asnaam !Wa be sabab inta abeet kalaam Allah,hu kula abaak wa maragaak min al‑muluk ! 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul gaal le Samuwiil : Ana aznabt !Achaan khaalaft awaamir Allah wa wasiiytak inta.Ana khuft min al‑rujaal al‑maʼaayi wa taabaʼt kalaamhum.
Wa hassaʼ da,min fadlak saamihni min zanbi.Wa taʼaal,nigabbulu sawa achaan ana nasjud le Allah. 
Wa Samuwiil gaal le Chaawuul : La,ana ma nigabbil maʼaak achaan inta abeet kalaam Allah wa Allah kula abaak.Wa battaan ma tabga malik fi Bani Israaʼiil. 
Wa wakit Samuwiil anlafat yidoor yamchi,Chaawuul karabah min chaarib khalagah wa l‑khalag ancharat.
Wa Samuwiil gaal leyah : Al‑yoom Allah yaglaʼ muluk Israaʼiil minnak wa yantiih le naadum aakhar al‑akheer minnak.
Wa Allah al‑Daayim Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil ma yakdib wa ma yandam.Achaan hu ma misil al‑insaan yandam. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal battaan : Ana aznabt.Hassaʼ da,Allah aleek ma tiʼayyibni giddaam chaʼabi Bani Israaʼiil wa kubaaraathum.Taʼaal nigabbulu sawa wa nasjud le Allah Ilaahak. 
Wa Samuwiil gabbal maʼa Chaawuul wa Chaawuul sajad le Allah.
Wa Samuwiil gaal : Jiib leyi Agaag malik al‑Amaalikh. Wa Agaag jaayi leyah farhaan wa buguul fi galbah : Akiid !Ana maʼa l‑moot da,fakka fakka. 
Wa Samuwiil gaal leyah : Misil seefak bakka awiin katiiriin,ammak inta kula al‑yoom tabki ! Wa Samuwiil katalah le l‑malik Agaag giddaam Allah fi Gilgaal.
Wa Samuwiil gabbal fi hillit al‑Raama wa Chaawuul kamaan gabbal beetah fi Gibeeʼa.
Wa Samuwiil hizin bilheen min Chaawuul wa ma macha chaafah lahaddi maat.Wa Allah nidim achaan darraj Chaawuul malik fi Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Allah gaal le Samuwiil : Le mata inta tahzan le Chaawuul,al‑ana abeetah battaan ma yamluk fi Israaʼiil ?Hassaʼ da,chiil garnak wa amla dihin wa taʼaal nirassilak le Yassa al‑min hillit Beet Laham achaan ana azalt waahid min iyaalah le yabga malik. 
Wa Samuwiil gaal : Kikkeef ana namchi ?Kan Chaawuul simiʼ,ma yaktulni walla ? Wa Allah gaal leyah : Chiil maʼaak ijle wa guul :‹ Ana jiit nigaddim dahiiye le Allah. ›
Wa taʼazim Yassa kula fi l‑dahiiye di.Wa ana niʼooriik be l‑cheyy al‑tisawwiih.Wa tamsah wa tidarrijah leyi al‑naadum al‑niwassifah leek. 
Wa Samuwiil sawwa kulla cheyy al‑gaalah leyah Allah.Wa wakit wassal fi hillit Beet Laham,kulla kubaaraat al‑hille barjalo wa marago le yigaabuluuh wa gaalo : Jaytak di aafe bas ? 
Wa Samuwiil gaal : Aafe bas !Jiit le nigaddim dahiiye le Allah.Khassusu nufuusku wa taʼaalu maʼaayi fi l‑dahiiye di. Wa hu khassas Yassa wa iyaalah wa azamaahum fi l‑dahiiye.
Wa wakit Yassa wa iyaalah jo,Samuwiil chaaf Aliyaab wa gaal fi nafsah : Akiid !Hu da bas al‑Allah darrajah.Wa daahu gaaʼid giddaamah ! 
Wa laakin Allah gaal le Samuwiil : Ana rafadtah.Wa khalli jamaalah wa tuulah ma yaʼajubuuk !Achaan ana ma nichiif al‑achya misil al‑insaan yichiifhum.Al‑insaan yichiif al‑zaahir bas wa laakin ana Allah nichiif al‑fi l‑galib. 
Wa baʼad da,Yassa naada Abinadaab wa jaabah giddaam Samuwiil.Wa Samuwiil gaal : Hu da kula,Allah ma azalah. 
Wa Yassa jaab wileedah Chamma giddaam Samuwiil wa Samuwiil gaal : Hu da kula,Allah ma azalah. 
Wa Yassa jaab sabʼa min iyaalah giddaam Samuwiil.Wa Samuwiil gaal le Yassa : Dool Allah ma azalaahum. 
Wa Samuwiil saʼalah le Yassa wa gaal : Dool bas iyaalak walla ? Wa Yassa radda leyah wa gaal : La.Faddal waahid wa laakin sakhayyar.Wa gaaʼid yasrah be l‑khanam. Wa Samuwiil gaal : Rassil leyah yaji !Aniina ma naakulu lahaddi hu yiwassil. 
Wa Yassa rassal leyah wa jaabah.Wa hu jamiil wa loonah sameh wa uyuunah kula samhiin.Wa Allah gaal : Da bas hu.Gumm amsahah wa darrijah ! 
Wa khalaas,Samuwiil chaal dihin min garnah wa masah Dawuud wa darrajah giddaam akhwaanah.Wa tawwaali,Ruuh Allah nazal fi Dawuud wa min al‑yoom da,hu gaaʼid foogah.Wa Samuwiil gabbal fi hillit al‑Raama.
Wa Ruuh Allah khalla Chaawuul.Wa ruuh fasle jaat min Allah wa gaaʼide tiʼazzibah.
Wa khaddaamiin Chaawuul gaalo leyah : Daahu fi ruuh fasle hana l‑ilaahaat gaaʼide tiʼazzibak.
Wa hassaʼ da,khalli inta siidna al‑malik tanti izin le khaddaamiinak wa aniina namchu nifattuchu naadum al‑yaʼarif yadrub jigindiiye.Achaan kan al‑ruuh al‑fasle hana l‑ilaahaat nazalat foogak,hu yadrub al‑jigindiiye.Wa da yabga leek chiyya akheer. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal le khaddaamiinah : Fattuchu leyi raajil al‑yaʼarif yadrub al‑jigindiiye wa jiibuuh leyi. 
Wa waahid min al‑khaddaamiin gaal leyah : Daahu ana naʼarif waahid min iyaal Yassa al‑min hillit Beet Laham.Hu yaʼarif daribiin al‑jigindiiye wa hu raajil faaris wa muhaarib wa yaʼarif yikallim wa hu jamiil.Wa Allah maʼaayah. 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul rassal naas le Yassa wa gaal : Rassil leyi wileedak Dawuud al‑gaaʼid yasrah be l‑khanam. 
Wa Yassa chaal humaar wa chadda foogah khubza wa girbe hana khamar wa sakhal wa antaah le Dawuud wileedah wa rassalah le Chaawuul.
Wa Dawuud macha le Chaawuul wa gaaʼid yakhdim leyah.Wa Chaawuul habbaah marra waahid wa sawwaah khaddaam al‑yichiil leyah silaahah.
Wa battaan Chaawuul rassal le Yassa wa gaal : Khalli Dawuud yagood maʼaayi achaan ana ridiit beyah marra waahid. 
Wa wakit ruuh al‑ilaahaat taji fi Chaawuul,Dawuud yichiil al‑jigindiiye wa yadrubha.Wa fi l‑bakaan da khalaas,Chaawuul haalah tabga leyah akheer wa yirtaah wa l‑ruuh al‑fasle kula tikiss minnah.
Wa yoom waahid,al‑Filistiyiin lammo deechhum le l‑harib fi hillit Suuku al‑gaaʼide fi balad Yahuuza wa gaʼado been Suuku wa hillit Aziikha,fi hillit Afas Dammiim.
Wa Chaawuul kamaan lamma Bani Israaʼiil wa gaʼado fi waadi al‑Butum wa jahhazo le muhaarabat al‑Filistiyiin.
Wa l‑Filistiyiin gaʼado fi l‑hajar al‑be hini wa Bani Israaʼiil fi l‑hajar al‑aakhar be hinaak.Wa l‑waadi ambeenaathum.
Wa fiyah raajil waahid faaris marag min ust al‑Filistiyiin.Wa usmah Jaaluut,min hillit Gaat.Wa tuulah ziyaada min 6 duraaʼ.
Wa fi raasah taagiiye min nahaas wa jildah kula mukhatta be direʼ hana nahaas madfuur al‑yawzin hawaale 60 kiilo.
Wa siigaanah kula khattaahum be safaayih hana nahaas.Wa muʼallag fi kitfah tabiig hana nahaas.
Wa uud haribtah misil uud murdaas al‑ligdaabe wa sinnaha kamaan tawzin hawaale 7 kiilo.Wa l‑khaddaam al‑yichiil leyah daragatah maachi giddaamah.
Wa Jaaluut wagaf wa naada Bani Israaʼiil wa gaal leehum : Maalku rasseetu le l‑harib ?Ana ma Filisti walla ?Wa intu abiid Chaawuul.Aʼazulu raajil minku wa khalli yanzil leyi.
Wa kan haarabaani wa gidir katalaani,aniina nabgo leeku abiid.Wa laakin kan ana bas annasart foogah wa kataltah kamaan,intu tabgo leena abiid wa takhdumu leena. 
Wa battaan al‑Filisti gaal : Wa daahu ana !Nichammit foogku intu,ya Bani Israaʼiil !Amurgu leyi raajil wa maʼaayah nilhaarabo ! 
Wa wakit Chaawuul wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil simʼo kalaam al‑Filisti da,khaafo khoof chadiid wa anbahato.
Wa Dawuud da,hu wileed raajil waahid min gabiilat Afraayim al‑usmah Yassa wa hu min hillit Beet Laham fi turaab Yahuuza.Wa Yassa da indah tamaane awlaad.Wa fi wakit hukum Chaawuul,hu chayyab wa bigi kabiir ziyaada.
Awlaad Yassa al‑talaata al‑kubaar,al‑bikir usmah Aliyaab wa l‑taani usmah Abinadaab wa l‑taalit usmah Chamma,wa kulluhum taabaʼo Chaawuul fi bakaan al‑harib.
Wa Dawuud hu al‑sakhayyar minhum.Wa l‑talaata al‑kubaar gaaʼidiin maʼa Chaawuul
wa laakin Dawuud gaaʼid yamchi le Chaawuul wa yigabbil bakaan abuuh le yasrah be l‑khanam fi Beet Laham.
Wa Jaaluut al‑Filisti gaaʼid yamrug wa yinaadi Bani Israaʼiil fajur wa achiiye lahaddi 40 yoom.
Wa yoom waahid,Yassa gaal le wileedah Dawuud : Chiil al‑achara kooro hana l‑gameh al‑fariik da wa l‑khubza al‑achara dool wa waddiihum ajala le akhwaanak fi l‑muʼaskar.
Wa haak al‑jibna al‑achara dool wa waddiihum le khaayid al‑alif.Wa alʼakkad min aafiyit akhwaanak wa jiib leyi minhum cheyy al‑yiwassif kadar humman aafe.
Talgaahum humman wa kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil maʼa Chaawuul fi waadi al‑Butum gaaʼidiin yihaarubu al‑Filistiyiin. 
Wa Dawuud gamma be fajur badri wa khalla al‑khanam maʼa l‑haras wa chaal khumaamah wa macha misil abuuh Yassa amarah beyah.Wa wisil fi l‑muʼaskar wakit al‑askar kulluhum marago wa rasso le l‑duwaas wa gaaʼidiin yichajjuʼu nufuushum be hiss aali.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil maʼa l‑Filistiyiin algaabalo le l‑duwaas.
Wa Dawuud khalla khumaamah le l‑haras hana l‑khumaam wa jara bakaan al‑harib wa sallam akhwaanah.
Wa wakit Dawuud gaaʼid yikallim maʼa akhwaanah,tawwaali al‑raajil al‑Filisti al‑faaris al‑usmah Jaaluut min hillit Gaat marag min ust al‑Filistiyiin wa gaal kalaamah al‑awwal gaaʼid yuguulah.Wa Dawuud simiʼ kalaamah da.
Wa wakit Bani Israaʼiil chaafo al‑raajil da,kaskaso minnah wa khaafo khoof chadiid.
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil gaalo : Chiifu al‑raajil al‑gaaʼid yamrug da !Hu yichchammat le Bani Israaʼiil !Al‑raajil al‑yamrug leyah wa yaktulah,al‑malik yisawwiih khani marra waahid.Wa yizawwijah bittah kula !Wa le ahalah kula,ma yichiil minhum al‑miiri. 
Wa Dawuud saʼal al‑rujaal al‑gaaʼidiin jambah wa gaal : Yantu chunu le l‑naadum al‑yaktul al‑Filisti da wa yarfaʼ al‑eeb min Bani Israaʼiil ?Al‑Filisti al‑ma mutahhar da,hu yaatu achaan yichchammat fi deech Allah al‑Hayy ? 
Wa humman hajjo leyah al‑kalaam battaan wa gaalo : Aywa !Al‑naadum al‑yaktulah yalga kulla l‑cheyy da ! 
Wa wakit Aliyaab akhuuh al‑kabiir simiʼ kalaam Dawuud al‑gaaʼid yikallim maʼa l‑rujaal dool,hu ziʼil zaʼal chadiid wa gaal leyah : Chunu jaabak hini ?Wa l‑khanam khalleethum maʼa yaatu fi l‑kadaade ?Ana naʼarfak !Inta mutakabbir wa galbak murr wa jiit le tichiif al‑harib bas ! 
Wa Dawuud gaal : Ana sawweet chunu ?Mamnuuʼ leyi ma nikallim walla ? 
Wa Dawuud anlafat min akhuuh wa saʼal naadum aakhar min al‑kalaam da.Wa hu radda leyah nafs al‑kalaam al‑gaalah al‑malik.
Wa naas waahidiin simʼo kalaam Dawuud wa kallamooh le Chaawuul.Wa tawwaali,hu rassal leyah wa naadaah.
Wa Dawuud gaal le Chaawuul : Khalli naadum waahid kula galbah ma yakhaaf min al‑Filisti da !Ana abdak namchi leyah wa nihaaribah. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal le Dawuud : La !Inta ma tagdar tihaarib al‑Filisti da achaan inta wileed sakhayyar wa hu raajil kabiir wa muhaarib min hu sakhayyar. 
Wa Dawuud radda le Chaawuul wa gaal : Ya siidi !Wakit ana gaaʼid nasrah be khanam abuuyi,kan duud aw dubb ja khataf waahide min khanami,
ana najri waraayah nadurbah wa naglaʼha minnah.Wa kan natta foogi,nakurbah min dignah wa nuduggah lahaddi naktulah.
Wa misil al‑duud wa l‑dubb al‑abdak katalaahum,al‑Filisti al‑ma mutahhar da,hu kula ma yufuuthum.Achaan hu achchammat fi deech Allah al‑Hayy ! 
Wa Dawuud gaal : Allah al‑najjaani min al‑duud wa l‑dubb,hu yagdar yinajjiini min al‑Filisti da. Wa Chaawuul gaal le Dawuud : Amchi !Allah maʼaak. 
Wa Chaawuul labbasah le Dawuud khulgaanah wa dassa leyah taagiiye hana nahaas fi raasah wa labbasah dirʼah.
Wa Dawuud rabat seefah fi sulbah min foog le khulgaanah wa dawwar yamchi.Wa laakin ma gidir yamchi achaan hu ma muwaalif beyah.Wa gaal le Chaawuul : Ana ma nagdar namchi be kulla l‑khumaam da achaan ana ma muwaalif beyah. Wa khalaas,hu salla kulla l‑khumaam da minnah.
Wa chaal asaatah fi iidah wa azzal khamsa hajar amlas min al‑waadi wa dassaahum fi mukhlaatah hint al‑raaʼi.Wa chaal miglaaʼah fi iidah wa macha le l‑Filisti.
Wa l‑Filisti zahaf lahaddi ja gariib le Dawuud wa l‑khaddaam al‑yichiil leyah daragatah maachi giddaamah.
Wa l‑Filisti chaafah le Dawuud wa hagarah achaan hu sakhayyar wa jamiil wa indah loon sameh.
Wa l‑Filisti gaal le Dawuud : Ana kalib walla,inta taji leyi be asa ? Wa laʼanah le Dawuud be ilaahaatah.
Wa gaal battaan : Taʼaal giddaam !Khalli nanti lahamak le tuyuur al‑sama wa le wuhuuch al‑kadaade. 
Wa Dawuud gaal le l‑Filisti : Inta jiit leyi be seef wa harba wa tabiig.Wa laakin ana jiit leek be usum Allah al‑Gaadir Ilaah askar Bani Israaʼiil al‑inta gaaʼid tichammit fooghum.
Al‑yoom Allah yarmiik fi iidi wa ana naktulak wa nagtaʼ raasak.Wa nanti jisas al‑Filistiyiin le tuyuur al‑sama wa haywaanaat al‑ard.Wa be da,kulla l‑dunya taʼarif kadar Bani Israaʼiil induhum Ilaah al‑yihaarib leehum.
Wa kulla l‑naas al‑gaaʼidiin hini yaʼarfu kadar Allah ma yansur be seef wa la be harba achaan Allah hu bas siid al‑harib wa l‑yoom yisallimku fi iideenna. 
Wa wakit al‑Filisti gamma macha le yilaagi Dawuud,Dawuud kula tawwaali jara macha leyah le yilaagiih.
Wa Dawuud dassa iidah fi mukhlaatah wa chaal hajar wa zaragah be l‑miglaaʼ wa darab al‑Filisti fi buguchtah.Wa l‑hajar da dakhal fi raasah.Wa l‑Filisti wagaʼ be wijhah fi l‑ard.
Wa be da,Dawuud annasar fi l‑Filisti be l‑miglaaʼ wa l‑hajar bas.Hu darabah le l‑Filisti wa katalah bala seef.
Wa Dawuud jara le l‑Filisti wa salla seefah minnah wa tammamah.Wa beyah gataʼ raasah.Wa wakit al‑Filistiyiin chaafo naadumhum al‑faaris maat,humman arrado.
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil wa gabiilat Yahuuza aato wa taarado al‑Filistiyiin lahaddi gariib le khachum al‑waadi wa lahaddi khachum baab madiinat Akhruun.Wa jisas al‑Filistiyiin muchattatiin fi derib hillit Chaʼaraayim lahaddi hillaal Gaat wa Akhruun.
Wa Bani Israaʼiil gabbalo min mutaaradat al‑Filistiyiin wa nahabo muʼaskarhum.
Wa Dawuud chaal raas Jaaluut wa waddaah fi madiinat Uruchaliim.Wa silaahah kamaan,khattaahum fi kheemtah.
Wa wakit Dawuud macha le yilaagi al‑Filisti,Chaawuul chaafah wa saʼal Abniir khaayid al‑deech wa gaal : Ya Abniir,al‑wileed da hana yaatu ? Wa Abniir gaal : Allah yansurak,ya l‑malik !Ana ma naʼarfah. 
Wa l‑malik gaal : Amchi asʼal !Al‑sabi da wileed yaatu ? 
Wa baʼad Dawuud katal al‑Filisti wa gabbal,Abniir chaalah wa waddaah giddaam Chaawuul.Wa raas Jaaluut fi iidah.
Wa Chaawuul saʼalah le Dawuud wa gaal : Inta wileed yaatu ? Wa Dawuud gaal : Ana wileed abdak Yassa al‑min hillit Beet Laham. 
Wa wakit Dawuud kammal kalaamah maʼa Chaawuul,Yuunataan galbah allag foog Dawuud wa hu habbaah misil nafsah.
Wa min al‑yoom da,Chaawuul khatta Dawuud maʼaayah wa ma khallaah yigabbil bakaan abuuh.
Wa Yuunataan sawwa alaakha maʼa Dawuud achaan hu habbaah misil nafsah.
Wa Yuunataan salla jallaabiiytah wa antaaha le Dawuud.Wa antaah khulgaanah hana l‑askar wa seefah wa nubbaalah wa hizaamah kula.
Wa fi ayyi muhimma al‑Chaawuul yirassilah foogha,Dawuud yanjah.Wa Chaawuul khattaah khaayid fi l‑rujaal al‑muhaaribiin.Wa kulla l‑chaʼab wa rujaal Chaawuul raadooh le Dawuud.
Wa baʼad Dawuud katal Jaaluut al‑Filisti,humman gabbalo min bakaan al‑harib wa l‑awiin al‑min kulla hillaal balad Israaʼiil maragan le yilaagan al‑malik Chaawuul be khine wa liʼib wa nagaagiir wa jigindiiye wa zakhraat.
Wa hinna kullihin ke gaaʼidaat yalʼaban wa yikhannan wa yuguulan : Chaawuul katal aalaaf wa Dawuud katal acharaat al‑aalaaf ! 
Wa l‑khine da harrag galib Chaawuul wa hu ziʼil zaʼal chadiid wa fakkar wa gaal : Kan hinna yuguulan Dawuud katal acharaat al‑aalaaf wa ana katalt aalaaf bas,faddal leyah illa l‑muluk ! 
Wa min al‑yoom da,Chaawuul kirihah le Dawuud.
Wa ambaakir,ruuh fasle min al‑ilaahaat jaat fi Chaawuul.Wa hu gaaʼid yitnabbaʼ fi beetah wa Dawuud kamaan gaaʼid yudugg fi jigindiiytah misil awwal.Wa Chaawuul indah harba fi iidah.
Wa tawwaali,zaragah le Dawuud wa gaal fi nafsah : Khalli nilassigah fi l‑durdur ! Laakin Dawuud khanas minnah marrateen.
Wa Chaawuul khaaf min Dawuud achaan Allah kaan maʼaayah wa khallaah leyah hu.
Wa fi chaan da,Chaawuul baʼadah minnah wa khattaah khaayid fi alif askar wa hu yamchi wa yaji fi raashum.
Wa Dawuud gaaʼid yanjah fi l‑harib achaan Allah maʼaayah.
Wa wakit Chaawuul chaaf Dawuud gaaʼid yanjah be ziyaada fi l‑harib,hu khaaf minnah bilheen.
Wa laakin kulla Bani Israaʼiil wa naas gabiilat Yahuuza yiriiduuh le Dawuud achaan hu bas khaayid al‑deech wa gaaʼid yamchi wa yaji fi raashum.
Wa yoom waahid,Chaawuul gaal le Dawuud : Di hi bineeyti al‑kabiire Miirab,nantiiha leek mara !Wa laakin be chart tabga raajil fahal wa tihaarib fi huruub Allah. Wa fi galbah,Chaawuul gaal : Khalli ana ma naktulah laakin narmiih fi iid al‑Filistiyiin. 
Wa Dawuud radda leyah wa gaal : Ana ke yaatu ?Wa khachum beet abuuyi fi Bani Israaʼiil ke chunu ?Wa kikkeef nabga nasiib al‑malik ? 
Wa fi wakit al‑Dawuud yichiil foogah martah Miirab bineeyit Chaawuul,tawwaali abuuha gamma antaaha le Adriyiil min hillit Mahuula.
Wa laakin Mikaal bineeyit Chaawuul al‑sakhayre habbatah le Dawuud.Wa wakit Chaawuul simʼah,hu firih
wa gaal fi galbah : Khalli nantiiha leyah achaan tabga leyah charak !Wa l‑Filistiyiin yaktuluuh ! Wa Chaawuul gaal le Dawuud : Hassaʼ da,di fursa aakhara al‑beeha inta tabga nasiibi ! 
Wa Chaawuul gaal le khaddaamiinah : Guulu le Dawuud be achiir :‹ Al‑malik farhaan beek wa kulla khaddaamiinah yihibbuuk.Ma taaba !Abga nasiib al‑malik !› 
Wa khaddaamiin Chaawuul gaalo al‑kalaam da le Dawuud wa Dawuud gaal : Intu tichiifu al‑cheyy da hayyiin,le nabga nasiib al‑malik ?Ana miskiin wa ma nisaawi cheyy ! 
Wa l‑khaddaamiin jaabo al‑radd hana Dawuud le l‑malik.
Wa Chaawuul gaal : Guulu le Dawuud :‹ Al‑malik ma bidoor minnak maal fi bineeytah.Laakin hu yidoor miya khulaf hana l‑Filistiyiin al‑taktulhum.Achaan Chaawuul yichiil al‑taar fi udwaanah.›  Wa be da,Chaawuul yahsib yarmi Dawuud fi iid al‑Filistiyiin.
Wa khaddaamiin Chaawuul hajjo be l‑kalaam da le Dawuud.Wa hu khassad le yabga nasiib al‑malik.Wa gubbaal al‑waʼad ma yitimm,
Dawuud chaal rujaalah wa macha katal miiteen rujaal min al‑Filistiyiin.Wa jaab adad al‑khulaf wa antaahum le l‑malik achaan yabga nasiibah.Wa khalaas,Chaawuul antaah bineeytah Mikaal.
Wa Chaawuul irif tamaam kadar Allah gaaʼid maʼa Dawuud wa bineeytah Mikaal kula habbatah.
Wa be da,Chaawuul khaaf min Dawuud be ziyaada.Wa min al‑yoom da,hu chaafah misil aduuh.
Wa fi ayyi wakit kan kubaaraat al‑Filistiyiin yahjumu,Dawuud yinnasir fooghum.Wa nasrah bigi ziyaada min nasur kulla l‑khuyyaad al‑aakhariin hana Chaawuul.Wa be da,usmah talaʼ.
Wa Chaawuul kallam le wileedah Yuunataan wa kulla khaddaamiinah kadar hu yidoor yaktul Dawuud.Wa laakin Yuunataan wileed Chaawuul indah mahabba chadiide le Dawuud.
Wa Yuunataan ja khabbarah le Dawuud wa gaal leyah : Abuuyi Chaawuul yidoor yaktulak !Abga hadiir ambaakir fajur.Fattich leek bakaan wa allabbadt foogah.
Wa ana namrug wa namchi maʼa abuuyi fi l‑zereʼ al‑inta mullabbid foogah.Wa ana nihajji leyah beek wa nasmaʼ hu yuguul chunu.Wa baʼadeen nikhabbirak. 
Wa Yuunataan hajja le Chaawuul abuuh be kulla l‑kheer al‑Dawuud sawwaah wa gaal : Ya l‑malik !Ma takhta fi khaddaamak Dawuud achaan hu ma khiti foogak.Wa hu sawwa leek daayman al‑kheer.
Wa dassa nafsah fi l‑khutuura wakit hu katal al‑Filisti.Wa be da,Allah nasar kulla Bani Israaʼiil nasur kabiir.Wa inta zaatak chiftah wa firiht beyah.Wa maala takhta wa tidaffig damm hana insaan bari misil Dawuud wa taktulah bala janiiye ? 
Wa Chaawuul simiʼ kalaam Yuunataan wileedah wa halaf wa gaal : Nahlif be Allah al‑Hayy,battaan le Dawuud ma naktulah ! 
Wa khalaas,Yuunataan naadaah le Dawuud wa khabbarah be kulla l‑kalaam da.Wa battaan jaab Dawuud le abuuh Chaawuul.Wa Dawuud gaaʼid yakhdim leyah misil awwal.
Wa l‑harib maʼa l‑Filistiyiin bada battaan wa Dawuud macha hajamaahum wa khassaraahum khasaara kabiire.Wa humman arrado minnah.
Wa ruuh fasle min Allah nazalat fi Chaawuul.Wa hu gaaʼid fi beetah wa haribtah fi iidah.Wa Dawuud kamaan gaaʼid yudugg fi jigindiiytah.
Wa Chaawuul dawwar yilassigah le Dawuud fi l‑durdur be haribtah.Wa laakin Dawuud khanas wa l‑harba lisgat fi l‑durdur.Wa be da,Dawuud jara faat fi l‑leele di.
Wa Chaawuul rassal naas fi beet Dawuud le yiraakhubuuh wa ambaakir fajur kamaan,yaktuluuh.Laakin Mikaal marit Dawuud khabbarat raajilha wa gaalat : Kan ma arradt fi l‑leele di,ambaakir fajur yaktuluuk ! 
Wa khalaas,Mikaal saaʼadat raajilha Dawuud wa maragatah min al‑chubbaak.Wa be misil da,Dawuud arrad wa niji.
Wa baʼad da,Mikaal chaalat sanam wa raggadatah fi l‑sariir wa khattat farwa hana khanam fi raasah wa khattatah be khalag.
Wa wakit Chaawuul rassal naas le yakurbu Dawuud,Mikaal gaalat leehum : Hu mardaan. 
Wa Chaawuul gabbalaahum le l‑naas dool wa gaal : Jiibuuh leyi fi lubb sariirah le nitammimah marra waahid ! 
Wa wakit al‑rujaal dakhalo fi beet Dawuud,ma ligooh.Laakin ligo al‑sanam fi l‑sariir wa farwit al‑khanam fi raasah.
Wa Chaawuul naadaaha le Mikaal wa gaal leeha : Maala khachcheetiini wa khalleeti aduuyi jara wa niji ? Wa Mikaal raddat le Chaawuul wa gaalat : Hu gaal leyi :‹ Khalliini namchi !Walla tidoori naktulki ?› 
Wa be misil da,Dawuud arrad wa niji.Wa macha le Samuwiil fi hillit al‑Raama wa hajja leyah be kulla cheyy al‑Chaawuul sawwaah leyah.Wa humman gammo macho sakano fi hillit Nayuut.
Wa naas jo khabbaro Chaawuul wa gaalo leyah : Daahu Dawuud macha Nayuut,gariib le hillit al‑Raama. 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul rassal naas le yakurbu Dawuud.Wa laakin wakit wassalo,chaafo majmuuʼa min al‑anbiya gaaʼidiin yitnabbaʼo wa fi raashum Samuwiil waagif be tuulah.Wa Ruuh Allah nazal fi l‑naas al‑rassaloohum wa humman kula bado yitnabbaʼo.
Wa jo khabbaro Chaawuul be l‑cheyy da wa hu gamma rassal naas aakhariin.Laakin humman kula bado yitnabbaʼo.Wa rassal naas aakhariin le taalit marra wa humman dool kula bado yitnabbaʼo.
Wa fi l‑akhiir,Chaawuul zaatah gamma macha le hillit al‑Raama.Wa wakit wisil fi l‑biir al‑kabiire al‑gaaʼide fi hillit Siiku,hu saʼal wa gaal : Ween Samuwiil wa Dawuud ? Wa raddo leyah wa gaalo : Humman gaaʼidiin fi Nayuut gariib le hillit al‑Raama. 
Wa wakit hu maachi le Nayuut gariib le hillit al‑Raama,Ruuh Allah nazal foogah hu kula wa maachi wa gaaʼid yitnabbaʼ lahaddi wisil fi Nayuut.
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul salla khalagah wa hu kula gaaʼid yitnabbaʼ giddaam Samuwiil.Wa wagaʼ aryaan wa gaaʼid waagiʼ tuul al‑yoom da wa tuul al‑leele di.Wa be sabab da bas,al‑naas yuguulu : Chaawuul kula bigi nabi maʼaahum walla ? 
Wa Dawuud arrad min hillit Nayuut al‑gariibe le hillit al‑Raama wa ja ligaah le Yuunataan wa gaal leyah : Chunu al‑ana sawweetah le abuuk ?Chunu al‑khata wa l‑zanib al‑ana sawweetah le abuuk achaan hu yidoor yaktulni ? 
Wa Yuunataan radda leyah wa gaal : Abadan ma yaktulak !Abuuyi ma yisawwi cheyy wa la kabiir wa la sakhayyar kan ma khabbaraani.Maala hu yilabbid leyi cheyy misil da ?Da ma sahiih ! 
Wa Dawuud halaf le Yuunataan wa gaal : Abuuk yaʼarif adiil kadar inta radyaan beyi.Wa gaal fi nafsah :‹ Khalli Yuunataan ma yasmaʼ be l‑cheyy da achaan da ma yabga leyah gaasi !› Wa laakin ana nahlif leek be Allah al‑Hayy wa be hayaatak inta,ma faddal beeni wa been al‑moot illa chibir bas ! 
Wa Yuunataan gaal le Dawuud : Ana nisawwi leek al‑cheyy al‑inta tidoorah. 
Wa Dawuud radda leyah wa gaal : Ambaakir da iid hana awwal yoom fi l‑chahar.Waajib ana nilʼachcha maʼa l‑malik.Laakin khalliini namchi nillabbad fi l‑kadaade lahaddi l‑achiiye.
Wa kan abuuk fagadaani,guul leyah :‹ Dawuud chaal minni izin le yamchi hillitah Beet Laham achaan yahdar fi gaddimiin al‑dahiiye al‑sanawiiye maʼa ahalah. ›
Wa kan abuuk gaal :‹ Sameh ›,khalaas ana abdak nagood be salaam.Laakin kan hu ziʼil kamaan,inta taʼarif kadar hu chaal niiye le yiwaddirni.
Wa inta,sawwi leyi al‑kheer achaan ana wa inta sawweena alaakha giddaam Allah.Wa kan ana khitiit fi ayyi cheyy,aktulni inta bas wa laakin ma tisallimni le abuuk ! 
Wa Yuunataan radda leyah wa gaal : Abadan da ma nisawwiih !Kan ana irift abuuyi yidoor yiwaddirak,akiid ana nikhabbirak tawwaali ! 
Wa Dawuud gaal le Yuunataan : Kikkeef tagdar tikhabbirni kan radd abuuk ma ajabaak ? 
Wa Yuunataan gaal le Dawuud : Taʼaal namchu fi l‑kadaade. Wa khalaas,humman al‑itneen macho fi l‑kadaade.
Wa Yuunataan gaal le Dawuud : Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil yachhad,ambaakir aw ambukra fi nafs al‑wakit,ana nasʼal abuuyi wa nichiif fikrah.Kan hu ma indah leek cheyy fi galbah,ana nirassil leek wa nufukk adaanak.
Wa laakin khalli Allah yiʼaakhibni ikhaab chadiid kan ana ma khabbartak kadar abuuyi yidoor yisawwi leek cheyy fasil wa ma khalleetak macheet be l‑salaama !Khalli Allah yukuun maʼaak misil hu kaan maʼa abuuyi awwal.
Wa fi wakit al‑ana lissaaʼ gaaʼid hayy,sawwi leyi al‑kheer hasab alaakhitna al‑sawweenaaha giddaam Allah.Wa kan ana mutt kula,
sawwi al‑kheer le zurriiyti hatta wakit Allah yuguchch kulla udwaanak min wijh al‑ard. 
Wa Yuunataan sawwa alaakha maʼa Dawuud wa zurriiytah wa gaal : Khalli Allah yiʼaakhib udwaan Dawuud ! 
Wa Yuunataan hallaf Dawuud battaan be mahabbitah leyah achaan hu yihibbah misil nafsah.
Wa Yuunataan gaal leyah : Ambaakir iid hana awwal yoom fi l‑chahar.Bakaanak fi l‑akil yukuun faadi wa nafguduuk.
Wa fi l‑yoom al‑taalit,inta anzil wa amchi allabbad fi l‑bakaan al‑inta allabbadt foogah yoom al‑muchkila.Wa agood jamb al‑hajar al‑usmah al‑Furga.
Wa ana nazrug talaata nuchchaab ale l‑jiihe al‑inta mullabbid foogha misil gaaʼid nusuub cheyy.
Wa ana nirassil wileed wa nuguul leyah :‹ Amchi jiib leyi al‑nuchchaab !› Wa kan gult leyah :‹ Taʼaal,al‑nuchchaab jaaye minnak ›,khalaas inta tagdar taji be salaam achaan cheyy ma fiih.Wa da,ana nahlif leek be Allah al‑Hayy.
Wa laakin kan ana gult le l‑wileed :‹ Daahu al‑nuchchaab khaadi minnak ›,khalaas amchi achaan Allah yidoor inta tufuut.
Wa Allah yachhad fi l‑alaakha al‑beeni wa beenak ila l‑abad. 
Wa Dawuud macha allabbad fi l‑kadaade.Wa awwal yoom hana l‑chahar ja wa l‑malik gaʼad le l‑akil.
Wa misil fi aadtah,al‑malik gaʼad fi bakaanah jamb al‑durdur wa Abniir gaʼad jambah.Wa Yuunataan kamaan gaabalah wa gaʼad.Wa laakin bakaan Dawuud gaaʼid faadi.
Wa Chaawuul ma gaal cheyy fi l‑yoom da achaan hu gaal fi nafsah : Akuun hasal leyah cheyy wa hu bigi ma taahir. 
Wa ambaakir fi l‑yoom al‑taani hana l‑chahar,Chaawuul fagadah le Dawuud.Wa hu saʼalah le wileedah Yuunataan wa gaal : Maala wileed Yassa ma ja wa la amis wa la l‑yoom ? 
Wa Yuunataan gaal le abuuh : Dawuud chahadaani dawwar yamchi fi hillit Beet Laham
wa gaal leyi :‹ Min iznak,khalliini namchi achaan ahali induhum dahiiye fi hillitna.Wa akhuuyi gaal leyi nahdar.Wa hassaʼ kan inta ridiit leyi,khalliini namchi nichiif akhwaani.› Wa be sabab da,hu ma gidir yahdar maʼa l‑malik fi l‑akil. 
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Chaawuul ziʼil zaʼal chadiid didd Yuunataan wa gaal leyah : Wald al‑azaba !Al‑mukhaalif !Inta tahsib ana ma naʼarfah kadar inta indak rafag maʼa wileed Yassa walla ?Wa be da,inta tijiib al‑eeb fi raasak inta wa fi raas ammak al‑charmuuta !
Asmaʼ,wileed Yassa kan gaaʼid hayy,inta ma indak amin wa mamlakatak kula ma tabga gawiiye.Hassaʼ da,amchi jiibah leyi !Hu da,waajib leyah al‑moot ! 
Wa Yuunataan gaal le abuuh Chaawuul : Maala yaktuluuh ?Hu sawwa chunu ? 
Wa Chaawuul chaal haribtah wa zarag beeha Yuunataan wa yidoor yatʼanah.Wa khalaas fi l‑bakaan da,Yuunataan irif kadar abuuh chaal niiye le yaktul Dawuud.
Wa Yuunataan ziʼil zaʼal chadiid wa gamma.Wa min al‑zaʼal fi l‑yoom al‑taani hana l‑chahar da,hu ma gidir akal achaan abuuh ayyar Dawuud.
Wa ambaakir be fajur,Yuunataan gamma macha fi l‑kadaade fi l‑waʼad al‑sawwaah maʼa Dawuud.Wa chaal maʼaayah wileed sakhayyar.
Wa Yuunataan gaal le l‑wileed : Ajri amchi jiib al‑nuchchaab al‑ana nazurgah. Wa l‑wileed jara giddaam wa Yuunataan zarag al‑nuchchaab baʼiid minnah.
Wa wakit al‑wileed wassal fi l‑bakaan al‑Yuunataan zarag foogah al‑nuchchaab,Yuunataan gaal leyah : Al‑nuchchaab lissaaʼ khaadi minnak ! 
Wa Yuunataan gaal leyah battaan : Ajala be surʼa !Ma tagiif ! Wa l‑wileed chaal al‑nuchchaab wa jaabah le sayyidah.
Wa l‑wileed ma irif cheyy wa laakin Yuunataan wa Dawuud bas yaʼarfuuh.
Wa Yuunataan anta kulla silaahah le l‑wileed wa gaal leyah : Waddiih al‑beet. 
Wa baʼad al‑wileed faat,Dawuud marag min al‑bakaan al‑mullabbid foogah fi nuss al‑wati hana l‑hajar wa wagaʼ fi l‑ard wa sajad giddaam Yuunataan talaata marraat.Wa l‑rufgaan al‑itneen alhaadano wa bako wa laakin Dawuud baka ziyaada.
Wa khalaas,Yuunataan gaal le Dawuud : Amchi be l‑salaama !Achaan aniina al‑itneen halafna be usum Allah wa gulna Allah yachhad beeni wa beenak wa been zurriiyti wa zurriiytak ila l‑abad. Wa khalaas,Dawuud gamma faat wa Yuunataan kamaan gabbal al‑madiina.
Wa Dawuud macha fi hillit Nuub al‑bakaan al‑gaaʼid foogah Akhiimalik raajil al‑diin.Wa wakit Akhiimalik chaaf Dawuud,gaaʼid yarjif.Wa gamma laagaah wa gaal : Maala naadum maʼaak ma fiih ? 
Wa Dawuud gaal le Akhiimalik raajil al‑diin : Al‑malik amaraani wa gaal leyi ma nuguul cheyy le naadum be l‑muhimma al‑rassalaani foogha.Achaan da bas,ana waaʼadt naasi yarjooni fi bakaan maʼruuf.
Wa hassaʼ da,indak chunu ?Antiini khamsa khubza walla kan cheyy aakhar kula. 
Wa Akhiimalik gaal le Dawuud : Ana ma indi khubza aadiiye illa l‑khubza al‑mukhaddasa.Wa nantiiha leek illa kan naasak ma limso awiin. 
Wa Dawuud gaal le Akhiimalik raajil al‑diin : Aywa,akiid al‑awiin mamnuuʼaat leena min amis wa min awwal kula.Wa da misil fi aadti wakit namrug le l‑harib.Hatta fi l‑muhimma al‑aadiiye kula,naasi jisimhum taahir.Maala jisimhum ma yukuun taahir fi muhimma mukhaddasa misil di ? 
Wa khalaas,raajil al‑diin anta al‑khubza al‑mukhaddasa le Dawuud.Achaan ma fi khubza aakhara illa l‑khubza al‑gaddamooha le Allah.Wa l‑khubza di,hi al‑khayyarooha be khubza jadiide wa haamiye.
Wa fi l‑yoom da,fiyah khaddaam hana Chaawuul gaaʼid fi bakaan ibaadat Allah.Wa hu naadum min balad Adoom usmah Duwaag kabiir al‑ruʼyaan hana Chaawuul.
Wa Dawuud gaal le Akhiimalik : Daahu be khafla al‑malik dawwaraani le l‑muhimma di wa ana ma jiit be seef wa la be silaah aakhar.Hal indak harba walla seef tantiini ? 
Wa raajil al‑diin gaal : Illa l‑seef hana Jaaluut al‑Filisti al‑inta kataltah fi waadi al‑Butum.Da gaaʼid mulawlaw be gitʼe wara l‑farmala.Chiilah kan tidoorah achaan ma fi seef aakhar hini. Wa Dawuud gaal : Seef misil hu da ma fiih.Jiibah leyi ! 
Wa fi l‑yoom da,Dawuud arrad baʼiid min Chaawuul wa macha bakaan Akiich malik hana hillit Gaat.
Wa khaddaamiin Akiich gaalo leyah : Da ma Dawuud malik balad Israaʼiil walla ?Da ma hu al‑bikhannu beyah wa buguulu :‹ Chaawuul katal aalaaf wa Dawuud katal acharaat al‑aalaaf ?› 
Wa l‑kalaam da barjalah le Dawuud wa hu khaaf ziyaada min Akiich malik Gaat.
Wa khalaas,hu sawwa nafsah misil muchootin fi usuthum wa gaaʼid yichakhkhit fi l‑biibaan wa riyaaltah tisiil fi dignah.
Wa Akiich gaal le khaddaamiinah : Al‑raajil da muchootin !Maala jibtuuh leyi ?
Ana mugassir leyi muchootiniin walla ?Maala tijiibu leyi muchootin yisawwi chawaatiinah giddaami hini ?Maala hu yadkhul fi beeti ? 
Wa min al‑bakaan da,Dawuud macha allabbad fi karkuur Adullaam.Wa wakit akhwaanah wa ahalah simʼo khabarah,gammo andammo leyah hinaak.
Wa kulla l‑naas al‑taʼbaaniin wa l‑naas al‑taradoohum al‑duyuun wa l‑naas al‑zaʼlaaniin min al‑hukum macho lammo maʼaayah wa hu bigi fooghum khaayid.Wa be da,adad al‑naas al‑maʼaayah bigi hawaale 400 raajil.
Wa baʼad da,Dawuud macha fi hillit Misfa fi balad Muwaab.Wa gaal le malik Muwaab : Min fadlak,anti izin le abuuyi wa ammi yaju yagoodu fi bakaanak lahaddi nichiif al‑cheyy al‑yisawwiih leyi al‑Rabb. 
Wa hu chaalaahum wa waddaahum giddaam al‑malik wa humman gaʼado maʼaayah kulla l‑mudda al‑Dawuud gaaʼid foogha fi l‑bakaan al‑gawi.
Wa yoom waahid,al‑nabi Gaad gaal le Dawuud : Ma tagood fi l‑bakaan al‑gawi hini,amchi fi balad Yahuuza. Wa Dawuud gamma wa macha fi l‑khaaba al‑usumha Haarit.
Wa Chaawuul simiʼ be l‑bakaan al‑gaaʼidiin foogah Dawuud wa l‑rujaal al‑maʼaayah.Wa da wakit Chaawuul gaaʼid fi hillit Gibeeʼa tihit al‑ardeebaay al‑gaaʼide foog fi l‑hajar wa haribtah fi iidah wa khaddaamiinah kulluhum gaaʼidiin maʼaayah.
Wa Chaawuul gaal le khaddaamiinah al‑gaaʼidiin jambah : Min fadulku asmaʼo,ya naas Banyaamiin !Hal wileed Yassa yantiiku kulluku ziraaʼa wa jineenaat inab walla ?Wa yidarrijku khuyyaad fi aalaaf wa fi miyaat walla ?
Wa kan ma fiih,maala kulluku wagaftu diddi ?Naadum waahid minku ma kallamaani kadar wileedi sawwa alaakha maʼa wileed Yassa.Wa naadum waahid minku ma hanna foogi walla ja kallamaani kadar wileedi gaaʼid yilizz abdi diddi wa yukujj leyi charak misil al‑yoom hu gaaʼid yisawwiih. 
Wa Duwaag al‑Adoomi gaaʼid maʼa khaddaamiin Chaawuul wa gaal : Yoom waahid,ana chift wileed Yassa macha fi hillit Nuub bakaan Akhiimalik wileed Akhituub.
Wa Akhiimalik saʼal Allah fi chaanah wa antaah akil wa antaah seef hana Jaaluut al‑Filisti kula. 
Wa baʼad da,Chaawuul rassal naadaah le raajil al‑diin Akhiimalik wileed Akhituub wa kulla ahalah al‑humman kula rujaal al‑diin al‑gaaʼidiin fi hillit Nuub.Wa kulluhum jo giddaam al‑malik.
Wa Chaawuul gaal le Akhiimalik : Asmaʼ,ya wileed Akhituub ! Wa hu gaal : Naʼam,ya siidi. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal : Maala inta wa wileed Yassa atmarradtu diddi ?Wa inta anteetah khubza wa seef.Wa battaan saʼalt al‑Rabb fi chaanah le yugumm diddi wa yukujj leyi charak misil al‑yoom hu gaaʼid yisawwiih. 
Wa Akhiimalik radda leyah wa gaal : Yaatu min kulla khaddaamiinak amiin misil Dawuud ?Wa hu nasiib al‑malik wa bigi harasak wa mukarram ziyaada fi beetak inta al‑malik !
Hal di awwal marra ana saʼalt al‑Rabb fi chaanah walla ?La,di ma awwal marra !Wa laakin khalli al‑malik ma yukhutt al‑tuhma di foogi ana wa la fi ahali achaan ana abdak ma naʼarif foogah cheyy. 
Wa l‑malik gaal : La,ya Akhiimalik,akiid inta tumuut !Inta wa ahalak kulluku tumuutu ! 
Wa l‑malik amar al‑hurraas al‑gaaʼidiin jambah wa gaal : Yalla !Aktulu kulla rujaal al‑diin hana Allah achaan humman saaʼado Dawuud.Humman irfo kadar hu muʼarrid wa ma jo kallamooni ! Wa laakin kulla rujaal al‑haras abo ma yaktulu rujaal al‑diin hana Allah.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,al‑malik gaal le Duwaag : Yalla !Inta bas aktul rujaal al‑diin dool ! Wa Duwaag al‑Adoomi gamma katalaahum.Wa fi l‑yoom da,katal 85 rujaal al‑diin kulluhum laabsiin khulgaan rujaal al‑diin.
Wa battaan hu katal be l‑seef kulla naas Nuub hillit rujaal al‑diin wa ma khalla wa la awiin wa la rujaal wa la iyaal wa la atfaal wa la bagar wa la hamiir wa la khanam.Kulluhum katalaahum be l‑seef.
Wa naadum waahid bas niji.Wa hu Abiyaatar wileed Akhiimalik wileed Akhituub.Wa hu arrad wa lihig Dawuud.
Wa Abiyaatar khabbarah le Dawuud kadar Chaawuul katal rujaal al‑diin hana Allah.
Wa Dawuud gaal le Abiyaatar : Al‑yoom daak,ana irift kadar Duwaag al‑Adoomi yikhabbirah le Chaawuul be kulla cheyy.Wa ana bas bigiit sabab fi moot ahalak.
Wa hassaʼ da,agood maʼaayi,ma takhaaf !Achaan al‑yaktulak inta,ma yikhalliini ana kula.Laakin fi jambi ana da,inta fi amaan. 
Wa yoom waahid,jo khabbaro Dawuud wa gaalo leyah : Daahu al‑Filistiyiin hajamo hillit Khaʼiila wa nahabo al‑makhaazin hana l‑gameh. 
Wa Dawuud saʼal Allah wa gaal : Ya Rabb,namchi nihaarib al‑Filistiyiin walla ? Wa Allah gaal leyah : Amchi haaribhum wa inta tinajji Khaʼiila. 
Laakin al‑rujaal al‑maʼa Dawuud gaalo leyah : Wakit aniina hini fi balad Yahuuza kula,aniina khaayfiin !Wa kan macheena fi Khaʼiila le nihaarubu deech al‑Filistiyiin,da ma yabga leena gaasi walla ? 
Wa battaan Dawuud saʼal Allah.Wa Allah radda leyah wa gaal : Gumm !Amchi wa anzil fi Khaʼiila wa ana nisallim al‑Filistiyiin leek fi iidak. 
Wa khalaas,Dawuud chaal naasah wa gamma macha Khaʼiila wa haarab al‑Filistiyiin.Wa annasar fooghum nasur kabiir wa chaal bahaayimhum wa najja sukkaan Khaʼiila.
Wa gabul da,wakit Abiyaatar wileed Akhiimalik arrad wa macha lihig Dawuud fi hillit Khaʼiila,chaal sideeriiyit al‑kharaar wa waddaaha maʼaayah.
Wa wakit Chaawuul simiʼ kadar Dawuud gaaʼid fi hillit Khaʼiila,hu gaal : Al‑yoom,al‑Rabb sallamah leyi fi iidi !Achaan hu ja dakhal fi hille al‑indaha biibaan yilgaffalo. 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul lamma kulla askarah le yamchu Khaʼiila yihaasuru Dawuud wa naasah.
Wa Dawuud simiʼ kadar Chaawuul khattat al‑fasaala diddah wa gaal le raajil al‑diin Abiyaatar : Jiib al‑sideeriiye achaan nasʼalo Allah. 
Wa Dawuud saʼal wa gaal : Ya Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,ana abdak simiʼt kadar Chaawuul indah niiye yaji fi Khaʼiila wa yidammir al‑hille di fi chaani ana.
Wa kubaaraat Khaʼiila yisallumuuni leyah walla ?Wa hu yaji misil ana abdak simiʼtah walla ?Ya Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,khabbirni ana abdak ! Wa Allah gaal : Aywa,Chaawuul yaji. 
Wa Dawuud gaal battaan : Wa kubaaraat Khaʼiila yisallumuuni le Chaawuul,ana wa naasi walla ? Wa Allah gaal : Aywa,humman yisallumuuku leyah kulluku. 
Wa tawwaali,Dawuud wa naasah al‑adadhum hawaale 600 marago min hillit Khaʼiila wa faato bakaan aakhar.Wa Chaawuul simiʼ khabar Dawuud arrad min hillit Khaʼiila wa khalaas,khalla mutaaradatah.
Wa Dawuud macha fi kadaadit Ziif wa sakan fi jibaalha fi l‑waʼar.Wa fi tuul al‑wakit,Chaawuul gaaʼid yifattichah wa laakin al‑Rabb ma sallamah leyah fi iidah.
Wa Dawuud gaaʼid fi l‑khaaba fi kadaadit Ziif wa simiʼ kadar Chaawuul gaaʼid yifattichah wa yidoor yaktulah.
Wa Yuunataan wileed Chaawuul macha le Dawuud fi l‑khaaba le yichajjiʼah fi iimaanah be l‑Rabb.
Wa gaal leyah : Ma takhaaf achaan abuuyi Chaawuul ma yalgaak le yaktulak.Wa inta tahkim fi Israaʼiil wa ana nabga naaybak.Wa da abuuyi zaatah yaʼarfah ! 
Wa khalaas,humman al‑itneen jaddado alaakhithum giddaam Allah.Wa baʼad da,Yuunataan gabbal beetah wa Dawuud gaʼad fi l‑khaaba.
Wa l‑naas al‑saakniin fi kadaadit Ziif macho le Chaawuul fi hillit Gibeeʼa wa gaalo leyah : Dawuud mullabbid fi baladna fi l‑khaaba fi raas hajar Hakiila,wati le Yachiimuun.
Hassaʼ da,ya l‑malik,kan tidoor taji leena,taʼaal !Wa aniina nisallumuuh leek fi iidak. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal leehum : Allah yibaarikku achaan intu hanneetu foogi !
Hassaʼ da,amchu akkudu adiil min al‑bakaan al‑hu gaaʼid foogah wa min al‑naadum al‑chaafah achaan ana simiʼt hu najiid bilheen.
Chiifu wa aʼarfu kulla l‑bakaan al‑yillabbad foogah.Akkudu minnah wa taʼaalu leyi wa ana namchi maʼaaku.Wa khalaas,kan hu gaaʼid fi lubb al‑balad di,ana nalgaah kan nifattichah fi lubb kulla khuchuum buyuut Yahuuza kula ! 
Wa l‑naas al‑saakniin fi kadaadit Ziif gaddamo le Chaawuul.Wa Dawuud wa naasah kamaan gaaʼidiin fi saharat Maaʼoon,wati le Yachiimuun.
Wa Chaawuul chaal askarah wa macha yifattich Dawuud wa jo khabbaro Dawuud.Wa hu dalla min raas al‑hajar wa gaʼad fi saharat Maaʼoon.Wa Chaawuul simiʼ wa bada yitaaridah le Dawuud fi saharat Maaʼoon.
Wa Chaawuul maachi be l‑nuss al‑waahid hana l‑hajar wa Dawuud wa naasah maachiin be l‑nuss al‑aakhar.Wa Dawuud maachi ajala le yiʼarrid min Chaawuul wa Chaawuul wa naasah kamaan yidooru yihawwuguuhum le Dawuud wa naasah le yikarrubuuhum.
Wa laakin mursaal waahid ja wa gaal le Chaawuul : Taʼaal ajala !Al‑Filistiyiin hajamo al‑balad ! 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul gabbal wa khalla mutaaradat Dawuud wa macha le yihaarib al‑Filistiyiin.Wa achaan da,sammo al‑bakaan da hajar al‑Mufaaraga.
Wa Dawuud marag min al‑mantaga di wa macha sakan fi l‑waʼar hana Een Jidi.
Wa wakit Chaawuul gabbal min muhaarabat al‑Filistiyiin,khabbarooh kadar Dawuud gaaʼid fi kadaadit Een Jidi.
Wa Chaawuul lamma 3 000 raajil min ahsan al‑muhaaribiin min kulla Bani Israaʼiil wa macha yifattich Dawuud wa naasah jamb al‑hajar al‑binaaduuh hajar al‑Khazaal.
Wa wakit wassalo fi zaraayib al‑khanam al‑gariib le l‑derib,Chaawuul chaaf karkuur wa dakhal foogah wa gangas le yistariih.Wa Dawuud wa naasah kamaan gaaʼidiin fi lubb al‑karkuur da.
Wa khalaas,naasah le Dawuud waswaso leyah wa gaalo : Daahu al‑yoom al‑Allah hajja leek foogah wa gaal :‹ Ana nisallim leek aduuk.Wa be da,sawwi leyah kulla cheyy al‑tidoorah.›  Wa Dawuud gamma addabba wa gataʼ khachum khalag Chaawuul min wara.
Wa baʼad da,Dawuud galbah ma bigi leyah halu achaan hu gataʼ khachum khalag Chaawuul.
Wa gaal le naasah : Allah yiʼaakhibni kan ana sawweet cheyy fasil le siidi Chaawuul al‑Allah masahah wa darrajah malik !Ana ma nukhutt iidi foogah achaan Allah bas azalah. 
Wa be misil da,Dawuud kallam le naasah wa daharaahum ma yahjumu Chaawuul.Wa Chaawuul marag min al‑karkuur wa faat.
Wa baʼad da,Dawuud kula marag waraayah min al‑karkuur wa naadaah wa gaal : Ya siidi al‑malik ! Wa Chaawuul chaglab wa chaaf waraayah.Wa Dawuud dangar fi l‑ard wa sajad.
Wa Dawuud gaal le Chaawuul : Maala tasmaʼ kalaam al‑naas al‑buguulu :‹ Dawuud yidoor yisawwi leek cheyy fasil ? ›
Daahu al‑yoom inta chift be eenak Allah sallamaak leyi fi iidi fi lubb al‑karkuur !Wa naasi gaalo leyi naktulak.Wa laakin ana hanneet foogak wa ma maddeet iidi aleek inta,ya siidi,achaan inta bas al‑Allah masahak wa darrajak malik !
Chiif,ya abuuyi !Al‑fi iidi,da ma khachum khalagak walla ?Kan ana gidirt gataʼat khachum khalagak wa ma kataltak da,aʼarif kadar ana ma muʼaarid wa la khaayin wa ma sawweet khata diddak inta.Laakin inta bas gaaʼid titaaridni wa tidoor taktulni !
Wa khalli Allah yahkim beeni wa beenak wa yikaffiini kulla l‑fasaala al‑inta gaaʼid tisawwiiha leyi.Laakin ana ke ma nukhutt iidi foogak !
Misil al‑masal al‑gadiim buguul :‹ Min naas al‑fasliin bas taji al‑fasaala.› Wa laakin ana ke,ma nukhutt iidi foogak ! 
Wa Dawuud gaal battaan : Didd yaatu marag malik Israaʼiil ?Inta maragt wara kalib mayyit walla wara gamulaay bas ?
Wa Allah hu al‑haakim wa yahkim beeni wa beenak wa yichiif muchkilti wa yidaafiʼ leyi wa yibarriini wa yinajjiini min iidak inta. 
Wa baʼad Dawuud kammal kalaamah le Chaawuul,Chaawuul gaal : Ya wileedi Dawuud,kalaamak sahiih ! Wa Chaawuul gamma baka baki chadiid
wa gaal battaan le Dawuud : Inta saalih ziyaada minni ana achaan inta sawweet leyi al‑kheer wa laakin ana sawweet leek al‑charr.
Wa l‑yoom,inta sawweet leyi al‑kheer wakit Allah sallamaani leek fi iidak wa inta ma kataltini.
Yaatu al‑ligi aduuh wa khallaah macha be l‑salaama ?Allah yiʼaajirak fi l‑kheer al‑inta sawweetah leyi al‑yoom !
Wa hassaʼ,ana akkadt inta tabga malik wa mamlakat Israaʼiil tagood saabte fi iideenak.
Wa hassaʼ da,ahlif leyi be Allah wa akkid leyi ma taktul zurriiyti baʼad mooti wa ma tuguchch usmi min lubb ahali. 
Wa khalaas,Dawuud halaf le Chaawuul.Wa baʼad da,Chaawuul gabbal beetah wa Dawuud maʼa naasah kamaan gabbalo fi bakaanhum al‑gawi.
Wa Samuwiil maat wa dafanooh fi beetah fi hillit al‑Raama.Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil lammo wa bako leyah.Wa baʼad da,Dawuud macha fi kadaadit Faaraan.
Wa fi hillit Maaʼoon,fiyah raajil waahid indah maal katiir wa maalah da gaaʼid fi hillit Karmal.Hu indah 3 000 khanam dawaayin wa 1 000 inze.Wa macha fi hillit Karmal le yagtaʼ suuf khanamah.
Wa l‑raajil da usmah Naabaal wa martah usumha Abigaayil.Hi mara aagle wa samha bilheen wa laakin raajilha iideenah gawi wa hawaan.Wa hu min khachum beet Kaalib.
Wa fi l‑kadaade,Dawuud simiʼ kadar Naabaal macha yagtaʼ suuf khanamah.
Wa Dawuud rassal achara subyaan wa gaal leehum : Amchu hillit Karmal wa talgo Naabaal.Wa waddu leyah salaami wa guulu leyah :
‹ Tiʼiich daayman !Wa l‑salaam aleek wa le ahalak wa le kulla maalak !
Wa hassaʼ da,ana simiʼt kadar inta jiit maʼa naasak le tagtaʼ suuf khanamak.Wa wakit ruʼyaanak gaʼado maʼaana,aniina ma sawweena leehum cheyy fasil.Wa cheyy waahid kula ma waddar leehum wakit humman gaʼado fi Karmal.
Asʼal naasak wa humman yiʼooruuk !Wa khalli naasi yalgo minnak rida achaan aniina jiina fi yoom al‑iid.Wa min fadlak,anti al‑cheyy al‑tagdar tantiih le abiidak wa le wileedak Dawuud.› 
Wa wakit subyaan Dawuud wassalo bakaan Naabaal,hajjo leyah be kulla l‑kalaam al‑Dawuud rassalaahum beyah.Wa gaʼado yarjo.
Wa Naabaal gaal le naas Dawuud : Dawuud da,hu yaatu ?Wileed Yassa da,hu yaatu ?Fi wakitna da,fiyah abiid katiiriin al‑yiʼarrudu min siyaadhum !
Wa ana kamaan,kikkeef nichiil khubziti wa almiiyi wa lahami al‑jahhaztah le naasi wa nantiih le naas al‑ma naʼarifhum jaayiin min ween kula ? 
Wa khalaas,subyaan Dawuud gammo gabbalo.Wa wakit wassalo,hajjo le Dawuud be kulla l‑kalaam da.
Wa Dawuud gaal le naasah : Khalli ayyi waahid minku yichiil seefah ! Wa khalaas,ayyi waahid chaal seefah wa rabatah fi sulbah.Wa Dawuud kula chaal hanaayah wa macho.Wa l‑macho,adadhum 400 raajil wa 200 kamaan gaʼado maʼa l‑khumaam.
Wa waahid min khaddaamiin Naabaal ja khabbar Abigaayil marit Naabaal be kulla cheyy al‑hasal wa gaal leeha : Daahu Dawuud rassal naasah jo min al‑kadaade le yisallumu siidna.Laakin hu ma rahhab beehum.
Wa l‑naas dool zeeniin leena marra waahid wakit aniina gaʼadna maʼaahum fi l‑kadaade wa ma sawwo leena cheyy fasil.Wa min maalna kula,cheyy ma waddar.
Leel wa nahaar,humman bigo leena misil al‑zariibe fi kulla l‑wakit al‑aniina gaʼadna maʼaahum wa saarhiin be l‑khanam.
Wa hassaʼ da,aʼarfi wa chiifi al‑cheyy al‑tagdare tisawwiih achaan masiibe kabiire jaaye le siidna wa ahalah.Achaan sayyidna ma naafiʼ wa naadum yahdiih kula ma fiih ! 
Wa tawwaali,Abigaayil chaalat 200 khubza wa 2 girbe hana khamar wa 5 khanam munajjadiin wa 15 kooro hana gameh fariiki wa 100 dukrume hana inab yaabis muʼabbak wa 200 dukrume hana tiin yaabis muʼabbak.Wa kulla l‑achya dool,hi chaddathum fi hamiir.
Wa gaalat le khaddaamiinha : Intu gaddumu wa ana namchi waraaku. Wa laakin hi ma gaalat cheyy le raajilha Naabaal.
Wa hi rikbat fi humaarha wa machat ale l‑hajar.Wa Dawuud kula be naasah jaayiin be nuss al‑hajar be hinaak.Wa jo wa be khafla,lammo.
Wa gubbaal ma yilimmu,Dawuud gaal : Ana sawweet khata.Al‑naadum da,ana hafadt kulla maalah fi l‑kadaade achaan cheyy ma yiwaddir leyah.Wa l‑kheer al‑sawweetah leyah da,hu gabbalah leyi be charr !
Kadar le ambaakir fajur,kan ana khalleet naadum waahid min rujaal Naabaal aach kula,khalli al‑Rabb yiʼaakhibni ikhaab chadiid ! 
Wa wakit Abigaayil chaafat Dawuud,dallat ajala min humaarha.Wa barakat wa sajadat giddaamah,
wa karabat rijileenah wa gaalat : Ya sayyidi,ajʼal al‑khata da minni ana !Wa daahu ana khaadmak nihajji leek wa asmaʼ kalaami.
Min fadlak,ya sayyidi,Naabaal hu siid charr,ma tajʼalah !Al‑usum bitaabiʼ siidah wa usmah Naabaal maʼanaatah matmuus.Wa ana khaadmak ma chift al‑naas al‑inta rassaltuhum,ya sayyidi.
Wa hassaʼ,ya sayyidi,nahlif leek be Allah al‑Hayy wa be hayaatak inta kadar Allah daharak min daffigiin al‑damm wa kaffiin al‑taar.Khalli udwaanak wa kulla l‑naas al‑yidooru leek al‑fasaala yabgo misil Naabaal,ya sayyidi !
Wa khalaas,ya sayyidi,akhbal al‑hadaaya al‑ana khaadmak jibtuhum leek wa gassimhum le l‑subyaan al‑maʼaak.
Wa saamih ana khaadmak fi l‑khata al‑sawweetah,ya sayyidi.Akiid Allah yisabbit zurriiytak fi l‑muluk achaan inta gaaʼid tihaarib fi chaan Allah.Wa abadan fi muddit hayaatak,ma yalgo foogak ayyi eeb.
Wa kan naadum gaaʼid yitaaridak wa yidoor yaktulak,ya sayyidi,Allah Ilaahak yinajjiik wa yahfadak misil naadum al‑gaaʼid yahfad maalah.Wa laakin udwaanak,Allah yiwaddiihum baʼiid minnak misil hajar al‑zaragooh be miglaaʼ.
Wa wakit Allah yitimm kulla cheyy al‑waaʼadak beyah inta sayyidi,hu yidarrijak malik fi Israaʼiil.
Ya sayyidi,kan inta kaffeet al‑taar,da yagood leek fi fikrak wa tandam le l‑cheyy al‑sawweetah achaan fi zaʼalak bas inta katalt naas.Wa wakit Allah yisawwi leek al‑kheer,ma tansaani. 
Wa Dawuud gaal le Abigaayil : Baarak Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil al‑jaabaaki al‑yoom le tilaagiini !
Allah yibaarik foogki wa fi fikirki achaan inti dahartiini ma naktul naas wa ma nilkaffa al‑taar.
Wa nahlif be Allah al‑Hayy Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,hu bas daharaani ma nisawwi leeki cheyy fasil.Wa kan inti ma jiiti ajala laageetiini,ambaakir fajur da,naadum waahid kula ma yifaddil fi beet Naabaal ! 
Wa Dawuud khibil al‑hadaaya al‑Abigaayil jaabathum wa gaal leeha : Amchi beetki be l‑salaama.Ana simiʼt kalaamki wa nisawwi kulla cheyy al‑talabtiih minni. 
Wa Abigaayil gabbalat bakaan Naabaal raajilha wa ligatah sawwa aazuuma kabiire fi beetah misil aazuuma hana malik.Wa hu sakraan marra waahid wa farhaan.Wa hi ma gaalat leyah cheyy lahaddi l‑fajur.
Wa be fajur,wakit sakarah chatta minnah,Abigaayil hajjat leyah be kulla cheyy al‑hasal.Wa wakit Naabaal simiʼ al‑kalaam da,taggaah wajaʼ galib wa jildah maat.
Wa gaʼad hawaale achara yoom wa baʼad da,Allah hakam leyah be l‑moot.
Wa wakit Dawuud simiʼ be moot Naabaal,gaal : Al‑hamdulillah.Allah daafaʼ leyi min muʼyaar Naabaal wa daharaani ma nisawwi cheyy fasil diddah.Wa hu gabbal leyah fasaaltah fi raasah. Wa Dawuud rassal naas le Abigaayil wa dawwar yaakhudha.
Wa wakit naas Dawuud wassalo fi hillit Karmal bakaan Abigaayil,gaalo leeha : Dawuud rassalaana leeki achaan yidoor yaakhudki. 
Wa tawwaali,Abigaayil wagaʼat fi l‑ard wa barakat giddaam Dawuud wa gaalat : Ana khaadmah jaahize le nabga khaadim le nijiib almi le nikhassil rijileen khaddaamiin sayyidi. 
Wa Abigaayil gammat ajala wa rikbat fi humaarha.Wa machan maʼaaha khamsa banaat wa taabaʼan khaddaamiin Dawuud.Wa khalaas,hi bigat marit Dawuud.
Wa gubbaal da kula,Dawuud indah mara usumha Akhinuuʼam.Hi min hillit Yazraʼiil.Wa be da,Akhinuuʼam wa Abigaayil kullihin ke awiinah le Dawuud.
Wa kan le Mikaal marit Dawuud al‑awwalaaniiye,Chaawuul abuuha chaalaaha wa antaaha le raajil aakhar usmah Falti wileed Layich min hillit Galliim.
Wa battaan al‑naas al‑saakniin fi kadaadit Ziif jo ligooh le Chaawuul fi hillit Gibeeʼa wa gaalo leyah : Inta ma taʼarfah kadar Dawuud mullabbid fi raas hajar Hakiila mugaabil nagaʼat Yachiimuun ? 
Wa Chaawuul chaal 3 000 raajil min ahsan al‑muhaaribiin hana Bani Israaʼiil wa gamma macha le kadaadit Ziif le yifattich Dawuud.
Wa Chaawuul khatta muʼaskarah fi raas hajar Hakiila mugaabil Yachiimuun gariib le l‑derib.Wa Dawuud kamaan gaaʼid fi l‑kadaade.Wa wakit hu irif kadar Chaawuul ja wa gaaʼid yifattich foogah fi l‑kadaade,
hu rassal naas le yiʼakkudu min jayyit Chaawuul.
Wa khalaas,Dawuud gamma macha chaaf al‑muʼaskar hana Chaawuul wa akkad min al‑bakaan al‑Chaawuul wa Abniir wileed Niir khaayid deechah naaymiin foogah.Wa Chaawuul ragad fi ust al‑muʼaskar wa askarah hawwagooh.
Wa Dawuud naadaah le Akhiimalik al‑Hitti wa le Abichaay akhu Yuwaab wileedha le Saruuya wa gaal : Yaatu yamchi maʼaayi fi muʼaskar Chaawuul ? Wa Abichaay gaal leyah : Ana namchi maʼaak. 
Wa khalaas,Dawuud wa Abichaay macho dakhalo be l‑leel fi l‑muʼaskar.Wa chaafo Chaawuul raagid wa naayim fi ust al‑muʼaskar wa haribtah ale raasah.Wa Abniir wa askarah hawwagooh wa raagdiin.
Wa Abichaay gaal le Dawuud : Al‑yoom,al‑Rabb sallam leek aduuk !Khalliini natʼanah be haribti marra waahide bas wa nilassigah fi l‑turaab !Wa ma nitanniih leyah ! 
Wa Dawuud gaal le Abichaay : La,ma taktulah !Achaan Allah ma yajʼal bari al‑naadum al‑yaktul al‑malik al‑hu masahah wa darrajah. 
Wa Dawuud gaal : Nahlif leek be Allah al‑Hayy.Allah bas yigassir ajalah wa yumuut moot aadi walla yaktuluuh fi l‑harib.
Allah yasturni ma nukhutt iidi foogah,hu al‑Allah masahah wa darrajah malik !Hassaʼ da,khalli nichiilu haribtah al‑gaaʼide ale raasah wa girbitah hint al‑almi wa namchu. 
Wa khalaas,Dawuud chaal al‑harba wa l‑girbe hint al‑almi al‑gaaʼidiin ale raas Chaawuul wa faato.Wa naadum waahid kula ma chaafaahum wa la hassa beehum wa la gamma.Kulluhum naaymiin achaan Allah nazzal fooghum noom chadiid.
Wa Dawuud dalla min muʼaskar Chaawuul wa talaʼ fi raas hajar aakhar al‑chiyya baʼiid minhum.
Wa gamma yinaadi ale l‑muʼaskar wa le Abniir wa gaal : Ya Abniir wileed Niir !Ya Abniir !Ma turudd leyi walla ? Wa Abniir gaal : Inta ke yaatu al‑tiʼiit le l‑malik ? 
Wa Dawuud gaal le Abniir : Inta ma raajil al‑mislak ma fiih fi Bani Israaʼiil walla ?Wa maala ma harast siidak al‑malik ?Achaan naadum waahid min al‑chaʼab ja wa yidoor yaktul siidak al‑malik !
Al‑cheyy al‑hassaʼ inta sawweetah,da ma adiil !Wa nahlif leek be Allah al‑Hayy,intu dool waajib leeku al‑katil achaan intu ma harastu siidku,hu al‑Allah masahah wa darrajah malik.Chiif !Ween al‑harba wa l‑girbe hana l‑malik al‑gaʼado ale raasah ? 
Wa Chaawuul irif hiss Dawuud.Wa gaal : Ya wileedi Dawuud,da hissak inta walla ? Wa Dawuud gaal : Aywa,da hissi ana,ya siidi al‑malik. 
Wa Dawuud gaal : Maala siidi yitaarid abdah ?Ana sawweet leek chunu ?Wa chunu al‑fasaala al‑ana sawweetha ?
Wa hassaʼ da,min fadlak ya siidi,asmaʼ kalaami ana abdak.Kan Allah bas lazzaak achaan titaaridni,waajib ana nigaddim leyah dahiiye.Laakin kan min naas bas,khalli Allah yalʼanhum !Achaan al‑yoom humman taradooni min al‑balad al‑antaaha Allah warasa le chaʼabah wa da misil humman gaalo leyi :‹ Amchi wa aʼabud ilaahaat aakhariin. ›
Wa hassaʼ da,khalli dammi ma yidaffig baʼiid min giddaam Allah.Achaan malik Israaʼiil gamma yitaaridni misil gaaʼid yitaarid gamulaay walla jidaadit khala fi raas al‑hajar. 
Wa Chaawuul gaal : Ana aznabt.Gabbil,ya wileedi Dawuud !Ana battaan ma nisawwi leek cheyy fasil.Achaan fi l‑yoom da,inta chift hayaati indaha khiima giddaamak.Wa ana khitiit ziyaada wakit gammeet diddak misil naadum ma indah fikir. 
Wa Dawuud radda wa gaal : Di hi harbit al‑malik !Khalli waahid min subyaanak yaji yichiilha.
Wa Allah yikaafi ayyi naadum saalih wa amiin.Achaan al‑yoom,Allah sallamaak leyi wa laakin ana ma dawwart nimidd iidi didd al‑raajil al‑Allah masahah wa darrajah malik.
Wa misil al‑yoom ana jaʼalt hayaatak muhimme,Allah kula yajʼal hayaati muhimme wa yinajjiini min ayyi masiibe. 
Wa khalaas,Chaawuul gaal le Dawuud : Allah yibaarikak,ya wileedi Dawuud !Akiid inta tisawwi achya katiiriin wa tanjah ! Wa baʼad da,Dawuud chaal derbah wa faat.Wa Chaawuul gabbal beetah.
Wa Dawuud gaal fi nafsah : Yoom min al‑ayyaam,Chaawuul yaji yaktulni.Wa cheyy aakhar nisawwiih ma fiih illa niʼarrid wa namchi balad al‑Filistiyiin.Wa be da,hu yikhalli mutaaradati fi kulla balad Israaʼiil.Wa ana nanja minnah. 
Wa Dawuud wa l‑rujaal al‑suttumiya al‑maʼaayah macho le Akiich wileed Maʼuuk malik hillit Gaat.
Wa Dawuud macha sakan bakaan Akiich malik Gaat,hu wa l‑naas al‑maʼaayah,ayyi waahid be aayiltah.Wa Dawuud kula chaal awiinah al‑itneen Akhinuuʼam al‑min hillit Yazraʼiil wa Abigaayil al‑awwal marit Naabaal al‑min hillit Karmal.
Wa wakit Chaawuul simiʼ kadar Dawuud arrad macha hillit Gaat,hu khalla mutaaradatah.
Wa Dawuud gaal le Akiich : Kan ridiit leyi,antiini hille waahide min al‑hillaal dool nagood foogha.Wa maala ana abdak nagood maʼaak fi hillit al‑malik ? 
Wa khalaas fi l‑yoom da,Akiich antaah le Dawuud hillit Sikhlaag.Wa achaan da bas,hillit Sikhlaag gaaʼide fi iideen muluuk Yahuuza lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa Dawuud gaʼad fi balad al‑Filistiyiin muddit sana wa arbaʼa chahar.
Wa Dawuud wa naasah gaaʼidiin yamchu yahjumu al‑Gachuuriyiin wa l‑Girziyiin wa l‑Amaalikh.Wa dool al‑naas al‑saakniin min zamaan fi l‑ard min Chuur lahaddi balad Masir.
Wa Dawuud yidammir al‑balad wa yaktul kulla l‑rujaal wa l‑awiin wa yichiil al‑khanam wa l‑bagar wa l‑hamiir wa l‑jumaal wa l‑khulgaan.Wa yigabbil yaji le l‑malik Akiich.
Wa l‑malik Akiich yuguul leyah : Al‑yoom hajamtu ween ? Wa Dawuud yakdib wa yuguul : Hajamna be nuss al‑wati hana balad Yahuuza wa ard al‑Yarhamiiliyiin wa ard al‑Khiiniyiin.
