Wa baʼad humman faato,Akhimaaʼas wa Yuunataan marago min al‑biir wa macho khabbarooh le Dawuud be wasiiyat Akhituufal.Wa humman gaalo leyah : Ajala agtaʼo al‑bahar. 
Wa tawwaali,Dawuud wa kulla l‑naas al‑maʼaayah gammo wa gataʼo bahar al‑Urdun.Wa be fajur badri,kulluhum gataʼo al‑bahar wa naadum waahid kula minhum ma faddal.
Wa wakit Akhituufal irif kadar Abchaluum ma tabbag wasiiytah,gamma chadda humaarah wa gabbal hillitah wa macha beetah.Wa wassa aayiltah wa chanag nafsah wa maat.Wa dafanooh fi khabur abuuh.
Wa Dawuud wassal hillit Mahanaayim wakit Abchaluum gaaʼid yagtaʼ bahar al‑Urdun maʼa kulla askar Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa Abchaluum khatta Amaasa khaayid al‑deech fi badal Yuwaab.Wa Amaasa da,abuuh Yatar al‑min Bani Israaʼiil wa ammah Abigaayil bineeyit Nahaach akhutha le Saruuya amm Yuwaab.
Wa Abchaluum wa askar Bani Israaʼiil khatto muʼaskarhum fi balad Gilʼaad.
Wa wakit Dawuud wassal Mahanaayim,laagooh Chuubi wileed Nahaach al‑min madiinat Rabba aasimat balad Bani Ammuun wa Makiir wileed Amiyiil al‑min hillit Luudabaar wa Barzillaay al‑min hillit Rugliim fi turaab Gilʼaad.
Wa l‑naas dool jaabo le Dawuud wa naasah furaach wa mawaaʼiin wa buraam hana tiine wa akil misil gameh ahmar wa gameh abyad wa dagiig wa fariiki wa lubya wa adas
wa asal wa zibde hana khanam wa jibna min laban al‑bagar.Wa humman jaabo kulla l‑achya dool le Dawuud achaan al‑naas al‑maʼaayah yaakulu.Wa gaalo : Al‑naas dool yukuunu maytiin min al‑aya wa l‑juuʼ wa l‑atach hana l‑sahara. 
Wa Dawuud hasab askarah al‑maʼaayah wa khatta leehum khuyyaad fi aalaaf wa khuyyaad fi miyaat.
Wa Dawuud anta amur le l‑askar yamchu.Wa l‑tilit min al‑askar da,hu kallaf beyah Yuwaab wa l‑tilit kallaf beyah Abichaay wileed Saruuya al‑hu akhu Yuwaab wa l‑tilit kallaf beyah Ittaay al‑min hillit Gaat.Wa l‑malik gaal le askarah : Ana zaati namchi maʼaaku. 
Wa laakin askarah gaalo leyah : La !Ya siidna al‑malik,inta ma tamchi maʼaana.Achaan kan aniina arradna kula,naadum yajʼalna ma fiih wa kan nussina maat kula,ma yijiibu khabarna.Wa inta wiheedak muhimm min 10 000 minnina wa da akheer leena kan tagood fi l‑madiina wa tijiib leena minha al‑fazaʼ. 
Wa l‑malik gaal leehum : Ana nisawwi al‑cheyy al‑tidooruuh. Wa khalaas,al‑malik wagaf fi khachum baab al‑hille wakit kulla askarah maargiin be miyaat wa aalaaf.
Wa hu amar Yuwaab wa Abichaay wa Ittaay wa gaal leehum : Assahhalo maʼa l‑sabi Abchaluum fi chaan reedti leyah. Wa kulla askarah simʼo be l‑amur al‑malik antaah le l‑khuyyaad fi sabab Abchaluum.
Wa khalaas,askar Dawuud marago fi l‑kadaade le yihaarubu Bani Israaʼiil.Wa l‑harib bada fi l‑khaaba hana balad Afraayim.
Wa askar Bani Israaʼiil anhazamo giddaam naas Dawuud.Wa fi l‑yoom da,al‑haziime bigat kabiire wa maato foogha 20 000 raajil.
Wa l‑harib alwassaʼ fi kulla l‑balad.Wa fi l‑yoom da,al‑naas al‑katalathum al‑khaaba katiiriin ziyaada min al‑naas al‑katalaahum al‑harib.
Wa Abchaluum be khafla anlaga wijih be wijih maʼa naas Dawuud.Wa hu raakib fi bakhal wa l‑bakhal da dakhal tihit firiʼ hana chadarat balluut.Wa raas Abchaluum dakhal fi mafaarig al‑firiʼ wa hu gaʼad muʼallag ambeen al‑sama wa l‑ard wa l‑bakhal faat khallaah.
Wa askari waahid chaafah wa macha khabbarah le Yuwaab wa gaal : Daahu ana chift Abchaluum muʼallag fi firiʼ hana chadara. 
Wa Yuwaab gaal le l‑raajil al‑jaab leyah al‑khabar : Sahiih ke,inta chiftah walla ?Wa maala ma darabtah wa kataltah fi bakaanah da ?Kan awwal inta kataltah,ana nantiik 10 hajar fudda wa hizaam. 
Wa l‑raajil gaal le Yuwaab : Kan inta tantiini 1 000 hajar fudda kula,ana ma narfaʼ iidi wa nadurbah le wileed al‑malik.Achaan aniina kullina simiʼna be amur al‑malik al‑antaah leek inta wa Abichaay wa Ittaay wa gaal :‹ Fakkuru fi l‑sabi Abchaluum. ›
Wa kan ana sawweet nafsi misil ma simiʼt kalaamah wa gammeet kataltah kula,al‑malik yaʼarif kulla cheyy wa yiʼaakhibni wa inta zaatak ma tahmiini. 
Wa Yuwaab gaal : Ana ma niʼakhkhir wakti maʼaak. Wa khalaas,Yuwaab chaal talaata kookaab wa khazzaahum fi galib Abchaluum wakit hu lissaaʼ hayy wa muʼallag fi l‑chadara.
Wa baʼad da,achara subyaan al‑chaayliin silaahah le Yuwaab jo hawwagooh wa tammamooh.
Wa khalaas,Yuwaab darab al‑buug wa askarah wagafo min mutaaradat Bani Israaʼiil achaan hu waggafaahum.
Wa chaalo janaazit Abchaluum wa zagalooha fi nugra fi l‑khaaba wa radamo foogah hujaar.Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil arrado wa ayyi waahid gabbal beetah.
Wa fi hayaatah,Abchaluum khazza hajar al‑yizzakkaro beyah fi waadi al‑Malik wa gaal : Ana ma indi wileed al‑yichiil usmi. Wa samma al‑hajar da be usmah.Wa lahaddi l‑yoom,binaaduuh hajar Abchaluum.
Wa Akhimaaʼas wileed Saduukh gaal : Min fadlak,khalliini najri nikhabbir al‑malik be l‑khabar al‑halu da achaan Allah najjaah min iid udwaanah. 
Wa Yuwaab gaal leyah : La !Al‑yoom inta ma tiwaddi khabar halu,tiwaddiih yoom aakhar.Wa l‑khabar hana l‑yoom da,khabar cheen achaan wileed al‑malik maat. 
Wa Yuwaab rassal waahid Habachi min khaddaamiinah wa gaal leyah : Amchi khabbir al‑malik be l‑cheyy al‑chiftah. Wa khalaas,al‑Habachi sajad giddaam Yuwaab wa gamma macha be jari.
Wa battaan Akhimaaʼas wileed Saduukh gaal le Yuwaab : Kan chunu yukuun leyi kula,khalliini namchi wara l‑Habachi da. Wa Yuwaab gaal leyah : Maala inta kula tamchi,ya wileedi ?Achaan da ma al‑khabar al‑inta talga foogah faayde. 
Wa Akhimaaʼas gaal : Kan chunu yukuun leyi kula,namchi. Wa Yuwaab gaal leyah : Amchi. Wa khalaas,Akhimaaʼas jara be l‑derib al‑saahil wa sabagah le l‑Habachi.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,Dawuud gaaʼid ambeenaat al‑biibaan al‑itneen hana l‑hille.Wa l‑haras kamaan gaaʼid fi bakaan waahid be foog le l‑baab wa da bakaan al‑yagood foogah al‑haras.Wa l‑haras chaaf raajil jaari jaayi wiheedah.
Wa l‑haras naada le yikhabbir al‑malik.Wa l‑malik gaal leyah : Kan hu jaayi wiheedah da,yiwassif kadar yijiib khabar halu. Wa l‑raajil gaaʼid yigarrib leehum.
Wa l‑haras chaaf naadum aakhar jaari jaayi wiheedah wa naada haaris al‑biibaan wa gaal : Daahu naadum aakhar jaari jaayi wiheedah. Wa l‑malik gaal : Hu da kula jaayib khabar halu. 
Wa l‑haras gaal battaan : Ana irift al‑raajil al‑awwal da min jariih wa hu Akhimaaʼas wileed Saduukh. Wa l‑malik gaal : Hu da raajil hana kheer jaayi yijiib khabar halu bilheen. 
Wa wakit Akhimaaʼas wassal bakaan al‑malik,hu gaal : Al‑salaam aleek ! Wa wagaʼ fi l‑ard wa sajad giddaam al‑malik wa gaal : Ya siidi al‑malik,nibaarik Allah Ilaahak al‑sallam leek al‑naas al‑atmarrado diddak. 
Wa l‑malik gaal : Wa kikkeef haalit al‑sabi Abchaluum ? Wa Akhimaaʼas gaal le l‑malik : Ana chift al‑naas barjalo be ziyaada wakit Yuwaab rassal ana abdak.Wa laakin ana ma naʼarfah chunu kaan. 
Wa l‑malik gaal leyah : Kiss wa agood hini. Wa Akhimaaʼas kassa wa gaʼad yarja.
Wa khalaas,al‑Habachi ja wa gaal le l‑malik : Ana jibt le siidi al‑malik khabar halu,al‑yoom Allah sallamaak min iid udwaanak al‑gammo diddak. 
Wa l‑malik gaal : Wa kikkeef haalit al‑sabi Abchaluum ? Wa l‑Habachi gaal : Ya siidi al‑malik,kulla udwaanak wa kulla l‑naas al‑gammo diddak le yisawwu leek al‑fasaala,khalli yabgo misil al‑sabi da. 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik barjal wa talaʼ fi l‑gasir al‑gaaʼid fi khachum baab al‑hille wa dakhal fi khurfa wa gamma yabki.Wa yuruukh wa yuguul : Ya wileedi Abchaluum !Haay wileedi !Ya wileedi Abchaluum,maala ana ma mutt fi badalak !Haay wileedi Abchaluum,ya wileedi ! 
Wa macho kallamooh le Yuwaab wa gaalo leyah : Daahu al‑malik gaaʼid yabki wa yunuuh le Abchaluum. 
Wa l‑nasur hana l‑yoom da albaddal be hizin le kulla l‑askar achaan fi l‑yoom da,simʼo kadar al‑malik haznaan be sabab moot wileedah.
Wa fi l‑yoom da min al‑khajla,al‑askar dakhalo fi l‑madiina be sirr misil al‑deech al‑anhazam fi l‑harib.
Wa l‑malik sadda wijhah wa gaaʼid yabki be tuul hissah wa yuguul : Haay wileedi Abchaluum !Abchaluum,ya wileedi !Ya wileedi ! 
Wa khalaas,Yuwaab ja le l‑malik fi l‑khurfa wa gaal leyah : Al‑yoom inta dasseet kulla naasak fi l‑eeb.Wa humman bas al‑yoom najjo hayaatak inta wa awlaadak wa banaatak wa hayaat awiinak wa sirriiyaatak.
Inta tihibb al‑yakrahook wa takrah al‑yihibbuuk !Wa l‑yoom wassaftina kadar wa la khaayid wa la khaddaam ma yisaawu cheyy giddaamak.Wa ana irift kadar al‑yoom kan Abchaluum gaaʼid hayy wa aniina dool kullina mutna kula,inta halu leek.
Wa hassaʼ da,gumm amchi raggid galib naasak.Achaan kan ma macheet,ana nahlif leek be Allah kadar le fajur da,naadum waahid kula ma yifaddil maʼaak.Wa di tabga akbar masiibe min kulla l‑masaayib al‑wagaʼo foogak min inta sabi lahaddi l‑yoom. 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik gamma macha gaʼad fi khachum baab al‑hille wa ooroohum le l‑askar wa gaalo leehum : Daahu al‑malik macha gaʼad fi khachum baab al‑hille. Wa kulla l‑askar jo giddaam al‑malik.Wa askar Abchaluum kamaan arrado wa ayyi waahid gabbal beetah.
Wa kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin yinaakhuchu wa yuguulu : Al‑malik najjaana min iid udwaanna wa min iid al‑Filistiyiin wa hassaʼ arrad min al‑balad le yanja min Abchaluum.
Wa Abchaluum al‑masahnaah wa darrajnaah malik maat fi l‑duwaas.Wa hassaʼ,gaaʼidiin narjo chunu le nigabbulu al‑malik Dawuud ? 
Wa kulla l‑kalaam al‑hajjooh Bani Israaʼiil wassalooh le l‑malik Dawuud.Wa khalaas,al‑malik rassal le Saduukh wa Abiyaatar rujaal al‑diin wa gaal leehum : Amchu hajju le kubaaraat Bani Yahuuza wa guulu leehum :‹ Maala tabgo aakhir naas al‑yigabbulu al‑malik fi beetah ?
Intu akhwaani min dammi wa lahami.Wa maala tabgo aakhir naas al‑yigabbulu al‑malik fi beetah ? ›
Wa guulu le Amaasa :‹ Inta ma min dammi wa lahami walla ?Khalli al‑Rabb yiʼaakhibni ikhaab chadiid kan ana ma darrajtak khaayid deechi fi badal Yuwaab.› 
Wa be kalaamah da,Dawuud radda guluub Bani Yahuuza.Wa misil raajil waahid,humman rassalo gaalo le l‑malik : Gabbil inta wa kulla naasak. 
Wa l‑malik gabbal lahaddi bahar al‑Urdun wa kulla Bani Yahuuza macho laagooh le l‑malik fi hillit Gilgaal achaan yigattuʼuuh al‑bahar.
Wa Chimʼi wileed Giira al‑min gabiilat Banyaamiin wa min hillit Bahuriim,hu macha ajala maʼa naas Bani Yahuuza le yilaagu al‑malik Dawuud.
Wa macho maʼa Chimʼi 1 000 raajil min gabiilat Banyaamiin.Wa Siiba khaddaam aayilat Chaawuul,hu kula macha maʼaahum wa maʼaayah awlaadah al‑khamistaachar wa khaddaamiinah al‑ichriin.Wa humman assaʼjalo wa lihgo bahar al‑Urdun gubbaal al‑malik.
Wa humman gataʼo al‑bahar le yigattuʼu al‑malik wa aayiltah wa le yisawwu kulla cheyy al‑hu yidoorah.Wa wakit al‑malik gataʼ al‑bahar,Chimʼi wileed Giira wagaʼ giddaamah
wa gaal : Ma tiʼaakhibni be khataayi wa la tifakkir fi l‑khata al‑ana abdak sawweetah wakit inta maarig min Uruchaliim.Wa ya siidi al‑malik,ma takrub leyi fi galbak.
Achaan ana abdak aʼtaraft be zanbi wa l‑yoom,ana bas awwal naadum min kulla gabaayil al‑munchaakh jiit le nigaabil siidi al‑malik. 
Wa Abichaay wileedha le Saruuya chaal al‑kalaam wa gaal : Hal da sabab al‑yikhalli Chimʼi ma yaktuluuh walla ?Achaan hu laʼan al‑raajil al‑Allah masahah wa darrajah malik ! 
Wa laakin Dawuud gaal : Chunu al‑beeni ana wa intu,ya awlaad Saruuya ?Maala al‑yoom gammeetu diddi misil adu ?Hal al‑yoom,da yoom al‑yaktulu foogah naadum fi balad Israaʼiil walla ?Hal ana ma naʼarif kadar al‑yoom,ana bas malik fi balad Israaʼiil walla ? 
Wa l‑malik halaf le Chimʼi wa gaal : Inta ma tumuut ! 
Wa Mafiibuchat wileed wileedah le Chaawuul,hu kula macha yigaabil al‑malik.Wa hu ma khassal rijileenah wa la khulgaanah wa la addal dignah min yoom al‑malik marag lahaddi yoom gabbal be l‑salaama fi Uruchaliim.
Wa wakit Mafiibuchat wassal bakaan al‑malik,al‑malik gaal leyah : Ya Mafiibuchat,maalak ma macheet maʼaayi ? 
Wa hu radda leyah wa gaal : Ya siidi al‑malik,khaddaami khaanni.Ana abdak aʼraj wa be da,gult nichidd humaari wa namchi maʼa l‑malik.
Wa khaddaami kadab foogi ana abdak giddaamak inta siidi al‑malik.Wa siidi al‑malik,hu misil malak Allah wa be da,sawwi kulla cheyy al‑tidoorah.
Achaan aayilat abuuyi ma tisaawi cheyy fi giddaamak inta siidi al‑malik,illa l‑moot.Wa be da kula,inta khibiltini ana abdak maʼa l‑naas al‑yaakulu fi beetak.Wa ana ma indi ayyi cheyy al‑natulbah battaan min al‑malik. 
Wa l‑malik gaal leyah : Maala nihajju battaan fi l‑kalaam da ?Ana kharrart,inta wa Siiba tigassumu ziraaʼat Chaawuul. 
Wa Mafiibuchat gaal le l‑malik : Khalli yichiilah kulla ke,al‑muhimm leyi da siidi al‑malik ja beetah be l‑salaama. 
Wa Barzillaay al‑min balad Gilʼaad,hu kula ja min Rugliim gataʼ maʼa l‑malik bahar al‑Urdun.Wa baʼad da,macha le yisallim al‑malik gubbaal ma yufuut.
Wa Barzillaay chaayib marra waahid,umrah 80 sana.Wa wakit al‑malik gaaʼid fi Mahanaayim,hu bas wagaf maʼaayah wa rayyasah achaan hu khani marra waahid.
Wa l‑malik gaal le Barzillaay : Taʼaal maʼaayi fi Uruchaliim wa ana nirayyisak. 
Wa Barzillaay gaal le l‑malik : Ma faddal leyi min umri cheyy achaan namchi nagood maʼaak fi Uruchaliim.
Hassaʼ indi 80 sana.Hal nagdar nafsul been al‑fasil wa l‑zeen walla ?Wa hal ana abdak nagdar nafsul taʼam al‑akil wa l‑charaab walla ?Wa nagdar battaan nasmaʼ hiss al‑hakkaamaat wa l‑dawaka walla ?Wa maala battaan siidi al‑malik yilkallaf beyi ana abdah ?
Wa ana abdak macheet maʼaak chiyya lahaddi gataʼna bahar al‑Urdun bas.Wa maala al‑malik yidoor yantiini mukaafa misil di ?
Min fadlak,ya l‑malik,khalliini nigabbil hilliti wa numuut jamb khabur abuuyi wa ammi.Wa laakin daahu abdak Kimhaam wileedi.Khalli hu yamchi maʼaak inta siidi al‑malik wa sawwi leyah kulla cheyy al‑tidoorah. 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik gaal : Tamaam,Kimhaam yamchi maʼaayi wa nisawwi leyah kulla cheyy al‑inta tidoorah.Wa kulla cheyy al‑tatulbah minni,ana nisawwi leek. 
Al‑malik Dawuud gataʼ al‑bahar gubbaal kulla l‑chaʼab.Wa baʼad da,hu habbaah wa baarakah le Barzillaay wa Barzillaay gabbal beetah.
Wa l‑malik taabaʼ derbah ale hillit Gilgaal wa Kimhaam kula macha maʼaayah.Wa kulla chaʼab Bani Yahuuza wa nuss chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil chaalo al‑malik wa gattaʼo bahar al‑Urdun.
Wa laakin wakit garrabo le l‑malik,kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil gaalo leyah : Maala akhwaanna Bani Yahuuza chaalook wa gattaʼook al‑bahar inta wa aayiltak wa kulla naasak al‑maʼaak ? 
Wa rujaal Bani Yahuuza raddo le rujaal Bani Israaʼiil wa gaalo leehum : Sahiih aniina ahal al‑malik wa maalku ziʼiltu ?Hal al‑malik gaaʼid yikallifna walla ?Wa hal aniina chilna miiri le nufuusna walla ? 
Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil gaalo le Bani Yahuuza : Wa laakin aniina indina hagg fi l‑muluk achara marra ziyaada minku wa foog Dawuud kula.Wa maala tahguruuna,ma aniina bas al‑awwalaaniyiin talabna gabbiliin al‑malik walla ? Wa laakin rujaal Bani Yahuuza hajjo kalaam murr ziyaada min kalaam rujaal Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa hinaak fi Gilgaal,fiyah raajil waahid ma naafiʼ usmah Chabaʼ wileed Bikri min gabiilat Banyaamiin.Wa hu darab al‑buug wa gaal : Chunu al‑yilimmina maʼa zurriiyit Dawuud ?Aniina ma indina warasa maʼa iyaal Yassa.Yalla,ya Bani Israaʼiil,khalli ayyi waahid yigabbil beetah ! 
Wa khalaas,kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil tarrafo min Dawuud wa taabaʼo Chabaʼ wileed Bikri.Wa laakin rujaal Bani Yahuuza anrabato fi malikhum wa macho maʼaayah min al‑Urdun lahaddi Uruchaliim.
Wa wakit Dawuud wassal beetah fi Uruchaliim,chaal sirriiyaatah al‑achara al‑khallaahin yahfadan al‑beet wa gamma habasaahin.Wa antaahin kilfithin wa laakin ma garrabaahin.Wa hinna gaʼadan mahbuusaat tuul muddit hayaathin lahaddi l‑moot.Wa hinna aachan misil awiin al‑raajilhin mayyit.
Wa l‑malik gaal le Amaasa : Fi talaata yoom da,limm leyi kulla rujaal Bani Yahuuza.Wa inta kula taʼaal maʼaahum. 
Wa khalaas,Amaasa macha yilimm rujaal Bani Yahuuza wa laakin hu fawwat al‑wakit al‑haddadah leyah al‑malik.
Wa l‑malik gaal le Abichaay : Chabaʼ wileed Bikri da yisawwi leena cheyy fasil ziyaada min al‑sawwaah Abchaluum.Hassaʼ da,chiil askari hanaayi ana siidak wa amchi waraayah gubbaal ma yalhag al‑mudun al‑gawiyiin wa yanja minnina. 
Wa maʼa Abichaay macho askar Yuwaab wa l‑Kiritiyiin wa l‑Filtiyiin hurraas al‑malik wa kulla l‑rujaal al‑fahaliin.Wa humman marago min Uruchaliim wa macho wara Chabaʼ wileed Bikri.
Wa wakit wassalo jamb al‑hajar al‑kabiir al‑fi hillit Gibʼuun,Amaasa laagaahum.Wa Yuwaab laabis khulgaanah hana l‑askar wa raabit seefah be beetah fi sulbah.Wa wakit maachi,al‑seef wagaʼ.
Wa Yuwaab gaal le Amaasa : Keef haalak,ya akhuuyi ? Wa be iidah al‑zeene,karabah le Amaasa min dignah le yihibbah.
Wa Amaasa ma fakkar fi l‑seef al‑fi iid Yuwaab al‑isra.Wa khalaas,Yuwaab taʼanah le Amaasa fi batnah wa daffag musraanah wa tawwaali,hu maat fi l‑bakaan da wa battaan Yuwaab ma tanna leyah kula.Wa Yuwaab wa akhuuh Abichaay faato wara Chabaʼ wileed Bikri.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,sabi askari waahid hana Yuwaab waagif jamb janaazit Amaasa wa yuguul : Al‑naas al‑maʼa Yuwaab wa Dawuud,khalli yitaabuʼu Yuwaab. 
Wa Amaasa waagiʼ fi lubb dammah fi ust al‑derib.Wa l‑sabi karra janaazit Amaasa wa tarrafha fi zereʼ wa khattaaha be khalag achaan hu chaaf kadar kulla l‑naas al‑wassalo jambah yagiifu.
Wa baʼad tarraf al‑janaaza min al‑derib,kulla l‑naas taabaʼo Yuwaab wa macho wara Chabaʼ wileed Bikri.
Wa Chabaʼ wa naasah al‑fahaliin chaggo ard kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil wa wajjaho ale hillit Abil Beet Maʼaaka.Wa kulla naas lammo wa macho maʼaayah.
Wa Yuwaab wa naasah macho hillit Abil Beet Maʼaaka wa hawwago al‑hille be radmiiye lahaddi gismit al‑durdur wa haasarooha.Wa kulla l‑naas al‑macho maʼa Yuwaab gammo yankutu gaʼar al‑durdur achaan yarmuuh.
Wa min al‑hille,mara waahide al‑indaha hikma sarakhat wa gaalat : Asmaʼo !Asmaʼo !Min fadulku,guulu le Yuwaab yigarrib leyi nidoor nihajji leyah. 
Wa hu garrab leeha.Wa l‑mara saʼalatah wa gaalat : Inta Yuwaab walla ? Wa hu gaal : Aywa,da ana. Wa hi gaalat leyah : Asmaʼ kalaam khaadmak. Wa hu gaal : Nasmaʼ. 
Wa l‑mara gaalat : Zamaan fi aaditna,yuguulu :‹ Chaawuru naas hillit Abil Beet Maʼaaka.› Wa be da khalaas,al‑kalaam yikammil.
Wa ana min al‑naas al‑haadiyiin wa amiiniin fi balad Israaʼiil.Wa inta gaaʼid tifattich derib al‑tahlik hillitna al‑muhimme fi Israaʼiil.Maala tidoor tidammir al‑warasa al‑antaaha leena Allah ? 
Wa Yuwaab gaal : Haraam,haraam leyi nahlik wa nidammir !
Al‑kalaam da ma ke.Laakin fiyah naadum waahid min jibaal Afraayim usmah Chabaʼ wileed Bikri wa hu atmarrad didd al‑malik Dawuud.Hassaʼ da,sallumuuh leyi hu wiheedah bas wa ana nibaʼʼid min al‑hille. Wa l‑mara gaalat le Yuwaab : Khalaas,nazgulu leek raasah min al‑durdur. 
Wa l‑mara machat khabbarat kulla naas al‑hille be fikirha al‑hakiim da.Wa khalaas,humman gataʼo raas Chabaʼ wileed Bikri wa zagalooh le Yuwaab.Wa Yuwaab darab al‑buug wa askarah tarrafo min al‑hille wa ayyi waahid gabbal beetah.Wa Yuwaab kula macha bakaan al‑malik fi Uruchaliim.
Wa Yuwaab,hu khaayid deech Bani Israaʼiil wa Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ,hu masʼuul fi l‑Kiritiyiin wa fi l‑Filtiyiin hurraas al‑malik.
Wa Aduraam,hu masʼuul fi l‑khidme al‑ijbaariiye wa Yahuuchafat wileed Akhiluud,hu kaatib al‑yizakkir al‑malik.
Wa Cheewa,hu al‑kaatib wa Saduukh wa Abiyaatar,humman rujaal diin.
Wa Iira al‑min hillit Yayiiri,hu kula raajil diin yakhdim le Dawuud.
Wa fi wakit hukum Dawuud,bigi juuʼ wa l‑juuʼ da gaʼad talaata sana mutataabiʼiin.Wa Dawuud saʼal Allah wa Allah radda leyah wa gaal : Al‑juuʼ da ja be sabab al‑dimam al‑Chaawuul wa aayiltah kataloohum.Humman katalo min sukkaan Gibʼuun. 
Wa l‑malik naadaahum le sukkaan Gibʼuun wa hajja leehum.Wa l‑Gibʼuuniyiin,humman ma min Bani Israaʼiil laakin min al‑Amuuriyiin al‑faddalo fi l‑balad.Wa zamaan,Bani Israaʼiil halafo le l‑Gibʼuuniyiin wa gaalo ma yaktuluuhum.Wa laakin min chiddit hamiistah le Bani Israaʼiil wa Bani Yahuuza,Chaawuul dawwar yidammirhum.
Wa Dawuud gaal le l‑Gibʼuuniyiin : Nisawwi leeku chunu ?Wa be chunu niraddiiku min al‑fasaala al‑sawwooha leeku achaan tibaaruku chaʼab Allah al‑misil warasatah ? 
Wa l‑Gibʼuuniyiin gaalo le l‑malik : Muchkilitna maʼa Chaawuul wa aayiltah ma tinhalla wa la be gurus wa la be dahab wa la be katil naadum fi Bani Israaʼiil. Wa l‑malik gaal leehum : Ayyi cheyy al‑tidooruuh,ana nisawwi leeku. 
Wa humman gaalo le l‑malik : Chaawuul dawwar yidammirna wa yiwaddirna marra waahid min balad Israaʼiil.
Wa be da,khalli yisallumu leena sabʼa rujaal min iyaalah wa aniina nachunguuhum giddaam Allah fi Gibeeʼa hillit Chaawuul hu al‑Allah azalah. Wa l‑malik gaal leehum : Nisallimhum leeku. 
Wa laakin al‑malik hanna fi Mafiibuchat wileed Yuunataan wileed Chaawuul achaan al‑haliife al‑sawwaaha Dawuud wa Yuunataangiddaam Allah.
Wa khalaas,al‑malik chaal Armuuni wa Mafiibuchat iyaal Risfa al‑wildathum le Chaawuul.Wa Risfa di hi bineeyit Ayya.Wa chaal battaan al‑iyaal al‑khamsa hana Miirabbineeyit Chaawuul al‑wildathum le Adriyiil wileed Barzillaay al‑min hillit Mahuula.
Wa l‑malik sallamaahum le l‑Gibʼuuniyiin.Wa khalaas,al‑Gibʼuuniyiin chanagoohum fi raas al‑hajar giddaam Allah.Wa humman al‑sabʼa dool,kulluhum maato sawa.Wa moothum da bigi fi bidaayit al‑gatiʼ hana l‑gameh al‑abyad.
Wa Risfa bineeyit Ayya chaalat chuwaal wa farachatah fi raas al‑hajar wa gaʼadat hinaak min bidaayit gatiʼ al‑gameh al‑abyad lahaddi almi al‑khariif sabba fi l‑janaazaat dool.Wa be nahaar,hi tadhar al‑suguura ma yanzulu fooghum wa be leel,tadhar minhum haywaanaat al‑kadaade.
Wa khabbarooh le Dawuud be l‑cheyy al‑sawwatah Risfa bineeyit Ayya sirriiyit Chaawuul.
Wa Dawuud gamma macha chaal udaam Chaawuul wa Yuunataan wileedah min sukkaan hillit Yaabiich fi turaab Gilʼaad.Achaan wakit al‑Filistiyiin hajamo Chaawuul wa askarah fi jabal Gilbuuʼa,humman kataloohum wa allago janaazaathum fi nagaʼat hillit Beet Chaan.Wa sukkaan Yaabiich chaaloohum.
Wa Dawuud wadda maʼaayah udaam Chaawuul wa Yuunataan.Wa naasah kula khammo udaam al‑rujaal al‑sabʼa al‑chanagoohum.
Wa dafano udaam Chaawuul wa Yuunataan wa l‑rujaal al‑sabʼa dool fi balad Banyaamiin fi hillit Siilaʼ fi khabur Khiich abu Chaawuul.Wa l‑naas sawwo kulla cheyy al‑malik amaraahum beyah.Wa baʼad da,al‑Rabb raham al‑balad di.
Wa kaan harib ambeen al‑Filistiyiin wa Bani Israaʼiil.Wa Dawuud wa naasah macho haaraboohum le l‑Filistiyiin wa Dawuud bigi ayyaan.
Wa Yichbi Binuub waahid min zurriiyit Raafa chaal niiye achaan yaktul al‑malik Dawuud.Wa haribtah hint nahaas tawzin talaata kiilo wa raabit fi sulbah seef jadiid.
Wa laakin Abichaay wileedha le Saruuya ja fazaʼ le Dawuud wa darab al‑Filisti wa katalah.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,askar Dawuud halafo wa gaalo leyah : Battaan inta ma tamrug maʼaana fi l‑harib.Achaan inta nuur Bani Israaʼiil ma tumuut. 
Wa baʼad da,gamma battaan harib maʼa l‑Filistiyiin fi Guub.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Sibbakaay min hillit Huucha katal Saaf min zurriiyit Raafa.
Wa battaan al‑harib bada maʼa l‑Filistiyiin fi Guub.Wa Alihanaan wileed Yaʼri min Beet Laham katal Jaaluut min hillit Gaat.Wa Jaaluut da,uud haribtah takhiin misil murdaas al‑ligdaabe.
Wa battaan kula al‑harib bada fi hillit Gaat.Wa fiyah raajil waahid tawiil wa asaabiʼ rijileenah wa iideenah sitte sitte wa kulluhum ke adadhum 24.Wa hu kula min zurriiyit Raafa.
Wa l‑raajil da ayyar Bani Israaʼiil.Wa khalaas,Yuunataan wileed Chimʼa akhu Dawuud katalah.
Wa kulla l‑rujaal al‑arbaʼa dool,humman min zurriiyit Raafa min hillit Gaat.Wa humman maato be iid Dawuud wa naasah.
Wa Dawuud gaddam khine al‑chukur le Allah wakit hu najjaah min iid kulla udwaanah wa min iid Chaawuul.
Wa hu gaal : Allah hu maljaʼiyahmiini wa yinajjiini.
Ilaahi hu maljaʼiwa l‑bakaan al‑nillabbad foogah.Hu daragati wa l‑gudra al‑tinajjiini.Hu maskani al‑gawi wa maljaʼiwa min siyaad al‑unuf,yinajjiini.
Ana sarakht wa gult :‹ Al‑hamdulillah !Allah najjaani min udwaani. ›
 Achaan mooj al‑moot khattaaniwa seel al‑halaak bahatni.
Guyuud al‑haawiye hawwagooniwa churukka al‑moot gaaʼidiin giddaami.
Fi l‑diige,naadeet Allahaywa,naadeet Ilaahiwa min beetah al‑mukhaddas hu simiʼni,hu simiʼ hiss siraakhi.
 Al‑ard anhazzat wa rajafatwa asaas al‑sama anhazza wa barjalachaan ma himlo khadab Allah al‑chadiid.
Wa min manaakhirah yatlaʼ dukhkhaanwa min khachmah tamrug naar al‑taakulal‑indaha jamur al‑yahrig.
 Allah falla al‑samaawaatwa dalla maʼa sahaabaay dalma tihit rijileenah.
Hu rikib fi makhluug samaawi wa taarwa be janaahe al‑riih,haam.
Wa allabbad fi dalaam al‑muhawwigmisil kheemtahwa da katarat almiwa l‑sahaab al‑azrag al‑chaayil.
Giddaamah nuur chadiidal‑yamrug minnah jamur al‑yahrig.
Wa Allah dagdag min al‑sama.Hu al‑Aali,wa hissah ansamaʼ.
Hu zarrag nachaachiible udwaani wa chattataahumbe barraaga al‑chadiidewa hazamaahum.
Wa min chiddit zaʼal Allahwa min hamu riih al‑jaayi minnah,gaʼar al‑bahar baanwa asaas al‑dunya ankachaf.
 Wa min foog,madda iidah rafaʼniwa min al‑almi al‑katiir,maragaani.
Wa najjaani min udwaani al‑chudaadwa min khusmaani al‑gawiyiin minni.
Wa yoom al‑masiibe wagaʼat foogi,humman hajamoonilaakin Allah fazaʼni.
Wa hu maragaani min al‑khutuura wa harraraani,hu najjaani achaan yiriidni.
Wa Allah yiʼaamilni hasab adaaltiwa yikaafiini hasab salaamat iideeni.
Achaan ana taabaʼt derib Allahwa ma isiit Ilaahi.
Aywa,ana tabbagt kulla churuutahwa abadan ma tarraft min gawaaniinah.
Wa bigiit naadum tamaam giddaamahwa hafadt nafsi min al‑khata.
Wa khalaas,Allah antaani ajurhasab adaaltiwa hasab salaamti al‑hu chaafha giddaamah.
 Ya Allah !Inta saadikh maʼa l‑saadikhiinwa ma tuluum al‑naas al‑tamaamiin.
Maʼa l‑taahiriin,tukuun taahirwa maʼa l‑uwuj,tukuun aʼwaj.
Wa tinajji al‑mazluumiinwa tidalli raas al‑mustakbiriin.
Ya Allah !Inta bas faanuusiwa Allah al‑yidawwi leyi fi l‑dalaam.
Ya Ilaahi !Beek inta,nahjim duyuuchwa beek inta,nunutt daraadir al‑hille.
 Al‑Rabb,derbah adiil,kalaam Allah daayman kaamil.Hu daraga le l‑naadumal‑yaljaʼ leyah.
Achaan la ilaah illa Allahwa la maljaʼ illa Ilaahna.
Ilaahi hu maljaʼi al‑gawiwa yuguudni fi l‑derib al‑adiil.
Wa antaani rijle khafiifiinnajri misil al‑khazaalwa rafaʼni fi l‑bakaan al‑aali.
Hu bas allamaani kikkeef nihaaribwa kikkeef iideeni yajbudu nubbaal al‑nahaas.
 Ya Allah !Anteetni daragat najaatakwa be musaaʼadatak,gawweetni.
Wa sahhalt leyi derbiwa sabbat rijileeni.
Nitaarid udwaani wa nidammirhumwa ma nigabbil lahaddi nikammilhum.
Nikammilhum wa nidammirhumwa yagaʼo fi l‑ard wa nifajjikhhum.
Wa gudra le l‑harib,inta anteetniwa dangart udwaani giddaami.
Wa fi iideeni,sallamtuhumwa le khusmaani,ana dammartuhum.
Yiʼiitu le l‑fazaʼ wa ma fi munajji,yasʼalo Allah wa ma yurudd leehum.
Ana rihiktuhum misil ajaaj al‑ard,misil tiinat al‑chawaariʼ daggeethum wa fajjakhtuhum.
 Wa inta najjeetnimin muʼaaradat chaʼabiwa sabbattini kabiir fi umamwa chaʼab al‑ma naʼarifhum yakhdumu leyi.
Al‑ajaanib yimaskunu nufuushum leyiwa yukhuttu udneehum le yasmaʼooni.
Al‑ajaanib kislowa marago min maljaʼhum be rajifiin.
 Al‑Hayy hu Allahwa baarak Allah maljaʼi !Al‑Aali hu Ilaah maljaʼi al‑yinajjiini.
Ilaahi hu al‑yichiil leyi al‑taarwa yisallim leyi al‑chuʼuub tihit sultiti.
Wa yamrugni min iid udwaaniwa yansurni fooghumwa yinajjiini min al‑naasal‑yisawwu al‑unuf.
Wa be sabab da,ya Allah,fi ust al‑umam,nachkurakwa be khine,namdah usmak.
Allah anta al‑nasurle l‑malik al‑hu darrajah.Aywa,wassaf kheerahle l‑naadum al‑hu masahah,le Dawuud wa zurriiytah ila l‑abad. 
Daahu aakhir kalaam Dawuud.Da kalaam Dawuud wileed Yassa,kalaam al‑raajil al‑aziim.Hu al‑Allah Ilaah Yaakhuub masahah wa darrajah malikwa hu chaaʼir al‑kulla Bani Israaʼiil yihibbuuh wa yikarrumuuh.
Wa hu gaal : Ruuh Allah hajja be waasitatiwa kallam be khachmi.
Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil hajja,aywa,maljaʼ Bani Israaʼiil gaal leyi :‹ Al‑malik al‑yahkim be l‑adaalawa yuguud al‑naas be khoof Allah,
hu bas misil deyy al‑sabaahfi taluuʼ al‑harraay bala sahaabwa misil nuur al‑yigawwim al‑khadaarbaʼad al‑matara. ›
 Wa daahu al‑cheyy al‑Rabb sawwaahmaʼaayi ana wa maʼa zurriiyti,hu sawwa maʼaayi muʼaahada daaymewa kaamile wa madmuuna.Wa fi ayyi cheyy,hu yinajjiiniwa yihaggig muna galbi.
Wa laakin kulla l‑naas al‑ma naafʼiin,humman misil firiʼ indah chook al‑yazguluuh baʼiidwa ma yinkarib be iid saakit.
Wa l‑naadum al‑yidoor yilammisah,waajib yichiil faas aw uud harbahatta yukurrah wa yazgulah fi l‑naarwa yutuchchah. 
Daahu asaame furraas Dawuud.Al‑awwalaani Yichbaal min hillit Hakmuun wa hu khaayid hana l‑furraas dool.Wa usmah al‑aakhar Adiinu min hillit Asnu.Wa hu bas al‑katal 800 raajil fi l‑duwaas fi yoom waahid.
Wa l‑taani Aliʼaazar wileed Duudu min hillit Akhuukh.Hu kula faaris min al‑furraas al‑talaata al‑macho maʼa Dawuud wa wagafo didd al‑Filistiyiin al‑lammo le l‑harib.Kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil ansahabo
wa laakin Aliʼaazar gaʼad saabit wa katal al‑Filistiyiin lahaddi iidah khidrat wa bigat gawiiye fi seefah.Wa fi l‑yoom da,Allah anta nasur kabiir le Bani Israaʼiil.Wa Bani Israaʼiil gabbalo le Aliʼaazar achaan yichiilu al‑kasiibe bas.
Wa l‑taalit Chamma wileed Aagi min hillit Haraar.Al‑Filistiyiin lammo askarhum fi hillit Laahi wa fi l‑bakaan da,fiyah zereʼ hana adas.Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil arrado min al‑Filistiyiin
wa laakin Chamma waagif fi lubb al‑zereʼ da wa min hinaak,marag wa haarabaahum le l‑Filistiyiin.Wa Allah anta nasur kabiir le Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa yoom waahid fi wakt al‑gatiʼ,talaata min al‑furraas al‑talaatiin hana Dawuud jo ligooh le Dawuud fi karkuur Adullaam.Wa fi l‑wakit da,al‑Filistiyiin lammo askarhum wa gaʼado fi waadi Rafaayiin.
Wa Dawuud macha lajaʼ fi bakaanah al‑gawi.Wa fi l‑wakit da,Filistiyiin waahidiin gaaʼidiin fi muʼaskarhum fi Beet Laham.
Wa tawwaali,Dawuud atmanna wa gaal : Yaatu yijiib leyi almi nachrab min al‑biir al‑gaaʼide fi madkhal Beet Laham ? 
Wa khalaas,al‑furraas al‑talaata macho dakhalo fi muʼaskar al‑Filistiyiin wa chaalo almi min al‑biir al‑gaaʼide fi madkhal Beet Laham wa jaabooh wa antooh le Dawuud.Wa hu aba ma yacharbah wa laakin gaddamah hadiiyat charaab le Allah.
Wa gaal : Istakhfar Allah !Abadan ma nisawwi cheyy misil da !Ma nachrab min al‑almi da achaan hu misil damm al‑rujaal al‑macho jaabooh be taman hayaathum. Wa Dawuud aba ma yachrab al‑almi da.Wa da l‑cheyy al‑sawwooh al‑furraas al‑talaata dool.
Wa Abichaay akhu Yuwaab wileedha le Saruuya,hu khaayid al‑talaata.Wa yoom waahid,hu bas be haribtah katal 300 raajil.Wa usmah bigi taaliʼ ambeen al‑furraas al‑talaata dool.
Wa hu ligi charaf ziyaada min al‑talaata wa bigi khaayidhum.Wa ma fi al‑yufuutah ambeen al‑furraas al‑talaata.
Wa Banaaya al‑min hillit Khabsiil,hu wileed Yahuuyadaʼ raajil waahid fahal.Wa Banaaya da,hu zaatah fahal wa chadiid.Da hu bas al‑katal rujaal itneen fahaliin hana balad Muwaab.Wa yoom waahid wakit al‑talaj nazal,hu dakhal fi nugra wa katal duud.
Wa battaan hu bas katal Masri al‑chooftah tikhawwif.Wa l‑Masri da gaaʼid be haribtah fi iidah wa Banaaya macha leyah hajamah be asa wa galaʼ minnah haribtah wa katalah beeha.
Wa dool al‑aʼmaal al‑sawwaahum Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ wa usmah bigi taaliʼ misil al‑furraas al‑talaata.
Wa hu ligi charaf ziyaada min al‑talaatiin wa laakin ma lihig al‑talaata.Wa Dawuud khattaah masʼuul harasah.
Wa l‑rujaal al‑talaatiin hana Dawuud hummanAsaahiil akhu Yuwaabwa Alihanaan wileed Duudu min Beet Laham
wa Chamma wa Aliikha,humman dool min hillit Haruud
wa Haalas min hillit Falitwa Iira wileed Ikheech min hillit Takhuuʼa
wa Abiʼaazar min hillit Anatuutwa Mabunnaay min hillit Huucha
wa Salmuun min hillit Akhuukhwa Mahraay min hillit Natuufa
wa Khaalib wileed Baʼana min hillit Natuufawa Ittaay wileed Riibaay min hillit Gibeeʼa fi ard gabiilat Banyaamiin
wa Banaaya min hillit Firʼatuunwa Hiddaay min waadi Gaʼach
wa Abiʼalbuun min hillit Arabawa Azmaawat min hillit Barhum
wa Aliyahba min hillit Chaʼalbuunwa waahid min awlaad Yaachinwa Yuunataan
wa Chamma min hillit Haraarwa Akhiyaam wileed Charaar min hillit Haraar
wa Alifaalat wileed Ahasbaay wileed raajil waahid min hillit Maʼaakawa Aliʼaam wileed Akhituufal min hillit Giilu
wa Hasraay min hillit Karmalwa Faʼaraay min hillit Arab
wa Yigaal wileed Naataan min hillit Suubawa Baani min gabiilat Gaad
wa Salakh min Bani Ammuunwa Nahraay min hillit Biiruut,hu al‑chaayil silaah Yuwaab wileedha le Saruuya
wa Iira wa Gaarib kulluhum min aayilat Yitri
wa Uriiya al‑Hitti.Dool kulluhum ke furraas Dawuud wa adadhum 37.
Wa yoom waahid,Allah khidib battaan le Bani Israaʼiil wa lazza Dawuud yisawwi cheyy al‑ma biwaafig wa gaal leyah : Gumm ahsib Bani Israaʼiil wa Bani Yahuuza. 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik Dawuud gaal le Yuwaab khaayid deechah : Amchi fi kulla gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil min Daan fi l‑munchaakh lahaddi Biir Sabʼa fi l‑wati wa ahsib kulla l‑chaʼab le naʼarif adadhum. 
Wa Yuwaab gaal le l‑malik : Khalli Allah Ilaahak yiziid adad al‑chaʼab miya marra wa khalli inta siidi al‑malik tichiifah be eenak.Wa laakin maala,ya siidi al‑malik,tidoor tisawwi al‑cheyy da ? 
Wa laakin amur al‑malik bigi chadiid bilheen fi Yuwaab wa l‑khuyyaad al‑aakhariin hana l‑deech.Wa khalaas,humman marago min bakaan al‑malik le yamchu yahsubu chaʼab Bani Israaʼiil.
Humman chaggo bahar al‑Urdun wa macho fi hillit Aruuʼir wa l‑hille di gaaʼide fi ust al‑waadi.Wa macho le gabiilat Gaad wa wajjaho ale hillit Yaʼziir.
Wa wassalo hillit Gilʼaad fi mantagat Tahtiim Khaadich wa macho lahaddi Daan Yaʼan wa ale hawaale Seeda.
Wa dakhalo fi Suur al‑madiina al‑gawiiye wa fi kulla mudun al‑Hiwwiyiin wa l‑Kanʼaaniyiin.Wa fi l‑aakhir,macho wati balad Yahuuza fi hillit Biir Sabʼa.
Wa baʼad raakho fi kulla l‑balad fi muddit 9 chahar wa 20 yoom,gabbalo fi Uruchaliim.
Wa khalaas,Yuwaab anta adad hisaab al‑chaʼab le l‑malik.Wa rujaal Bani Israaʼiil adadhum 800 000 askar al‑yaʼarfu harb al‑suyuuf wa min Bani Yahuuza kamaan 500 000.
Wa baʼad hasab al‑chaʼab,tawwaali Dawuud hassaʼ galbah gaaʼid yadrub.Wa gaal : Ana sawweet zanib kabiir achaan hasabt al‑chaʼab.Hassaʼ da,ya Allah,akhfir leyi khataayi ana abdak.Achaan ana sawweet al‑cheyy da misil naadum matmuus. 
Wa wakit Dawuud gamma be fajur,Allah hajja le l‑nabi Gaad al‑yichiif ruʼya le Dawuud wa gaal leyah :
 Amchi guul le Dawuud :‹ Daahu Allah gaal :“Ana ninazzil leek talaata nafar hana masaayib.Wa aʼazil minhum waahid wa ana ninazzilah.”› 
Wa khalaas,Gaad macha le Dawuud wa gaal leyah : Tidoor sabʼa sana hana juuʼ fi baladak ?Aw tidoor tajri giddaam udwaanak wa humman yaturduuk le muddit talaata chahar ?Aw tidoor waba yanzil le muddit talaata yoom fi baladak ?Hassaʼ da,fakkir wa ooriini al‑radd al‑nuguulah le Allah al‑rassalaani. 
Wa Dawuud gaal le Gaad : Ana addaayagt marra waahid !Khalli nagaʼ fi iid Allah achaan rahmatah wasiiʼe.Wa khalli ma nagaʼ fi iid insaan. 
Wa khalaas,Allah nazzal waba fi balad Israaʼiil.Wa min al‑fajur lahaddi l‑wakit al‑muhaddad,maato 70 000 naas min Daan fi l‑munchaakh lahaddi Biir Sabʼa fi l‑wati.
Wa l‑malak al‑mudammir madda iidah ale Uruchaliim le yidammirha.Laakin Allah ma dawwar al‑damaar da wa gaal le l‑malak : Khalaas,kafa !Arfaʼ iidak. Wa l‑malak da gaaʼid fi l‑madagg hana Arawna al‑Yabuusi.
Wa wakit Dawuud chaaf al‑malak al‑katal al‑chaʼab da,gaal le Allah : Ana bas aznabt wa sawweet al‑khata da.Laakin al‑chaʼab dool al‑misil al‑khanam sawwo chunu ?Aakhibni ana wa aayilti. 
Wa fi nafs al‑yoom da,al‑nabi Gaad macha le Dawuud wa gaal leyah : Amchi abni madbah le Allah fi l‑madagg hana Arawna al‑Yabuusi. 
Wa khalaas,Dawuud macha misil Allah amarah beyah be waasitat al‑nabi Gaad.
Wa wakit Arawna rafaʼ raasah wa chaaf al‑malik wa khaddaamiinah jaayiin aleyah,hu ja wa wagaʼ fi l‑ard wa sajad giddaam al‑malik.
Wa gaal : Maala siidi al‑malik jaayi bakaan abdah ? Wa Dawuud radda leyah wa gaal : Ana jiit le nachri minnak al‑madagg wa nabni foogah madbah le Allah achaan al‑waba da yagiif min al‑chaʼab. 
Wa Arawna gaal battaan le Dawuud : Khalli siidi al‑malik yichiil al‑madagg wa yisawwi beyah ayyi cheyy al‑yidoorah.Chiif !Daahu bagar le l‑dahiiye al‑muharraga.Wa l‑kaarro al‑yifajjukhu beyah al‑gameh wa aalaatah kamaan yabgo leek hatab.
Ya l‑malik,ana Arawna anteetak kulla l‑achya dool.Khalli Allah Ilaahak yakhbal dahiiytak. 
Wa laakin al‑malik gaal le Arawna : La !Ana nachriih minnak wa nikaffi tamanah.Achaan ma nidoor nigaddim dahiiye le Allah Ilaahi al‑ma tikallifni cheyy. Wa khalaas,Dawuud chara al‑madagg wa l‑bagar be 50 hajar fudda.
Wa fi l‑bakaan da,Dawuud bana madbah le Allah wa gaddam foogah dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya salaama.Wa be da,Allah raham al‑balad wa l‑waba wagaf min Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa l‑malik Dawuud bigi chaayib marra waahid wa kan yikhattuuh be khattaay kula hu ma yihiss be l‑dafu.
Wa khaddaamiinah gaalo leyah : Khalli nifattuchu le siidna al‑malik bineeye udriiye tirayyisah wa tabga leyah mara targud jambah.Wa be misil da,siidna al‑malik yiddaffa. 
Wa khalaas,gammo yifattuchu bitt jamiile fi kulla balad Israaʼiil.Wa ligo Abichaag al‑min hillit Chuunam wa jaabooha le l‑malik.
Wa l‑bitt di jamiile marra waahid.Wa gaaʼide tirayyis al‑malik wa takhdim leyah.Wa laakin al‑malik ma limisha.
Wa fi nafs al‑wakit da,Aduniiya wileed Dawuud wileedha le Haggiit gamma yuguul : Ana bas namluk. Wa hu ligi araba hint harib wa siyaad kheel wa 50 rujaal al‑yamchu giddaam arabatah.
Wa Aduniiya hu jamiil marra waahid wa wildooh baʼad Abchaluum.Wa abadan abuuh fi kulla hayaatah ma kachchar leyah wa gaal : Maala tisawwi cheyy misil da ? 
Wa Aduniiya hajja maʼa Yuwaab wileedha le Saruuya wa maʼa Abiyaatar raajil al‑diin.Wa humman andammo leyah.
Wa laakin wa la Saduukh raajil al‑diin wa la Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ wa la l‑nabi Naataan wa la Chimʼi wa la Riiʼi wa la furraas Dawuud humman dool ma andammo maʼa Aduniiya.
Wa yoom waahid,Aduniiya gaddam dahaaya hana khanam wa bagar wa tiiraan sumaan gariib le l‑hajar al‑amlas al‑fi hillit Een Ruugil.Wa hu azam kulla akhwaanah iyaal al‑malik wa kulla Bani Yahuuza masaaʼiil al‑malik.
Wa laakin ma azam al‑nabi Naataan wa la Banaaya wa la l‑furraas wa la Suleymaan akhuuh.
Wa khalaas,Naataan macha le Batchaabaʼ amm Suleymaan wa gaal leeha : Inti ma simiʼti kadar Aduniiya wileedha le Haggiit sawwa nafsah malik ?Wa siidna al‑malik Dawuud kula ma indah khabar.
Wa hassaʼ da,taʼaali nantiiki wasiiye wa beeha tagdare tinajji hayaatki wa hayaat wileedki Suleymaan.
Amchi tawwaali algeeh le l‑malik Dawuud.Wa guuli leyah :‹ Ya siidi al‑malik,ma inta bas halaft leyi ana khaadmak wa gult :“Wileedki Suleymaan yahkim baʼadi wa hu bas yagood fi kursi al‑muluk.”Wa hassaʼ,maala Aduniiya bigi malik ? ›
Wa wakit inti gaaʼide tihajji maʼa l‑malik,ana zaati nadkhul waraaki wa nitammim fi kalaamki. 
Khalaas,Batchaabaʼ machat le l‑malik fi khurfitah.Wa fi l‑wakit da,hu bigi chaayib marra waahid wa Abichaag al‑min hillit Chuunam gaaʼide tirayyisah.
Wa Batchaabaʼ barakat wa sajadat giddaam al‑malik.Wa l‑malik saʼalha wa gaal : Tidoori chunu ? 
Wa hi raddat leyah wa gaalat : Ya siidi,inta halaft leyi ana khaadmak be usum Allah Ilaahak wa gult :‹ Wileedki Suleymaan yahkim baʼadi wa hu bas yagood fi kursi al‑muluk. ›
Wa hassaʼ,ana simiʼt kadar Aduniiya bigi malik.Wa laakin,ya siidi,inta ma simiʼt cheyy.
Wa Aduniiya gaddam dahaaya hana tiiraan wa ajjaal sumaan wa khanam katiiriin.Wa azam kulla iyaalak inta al‑malik wa Abiyaatar raajil al‑diin wa Yuwaab khaayid al‑deech.Wa laakin ma azam abdak Suleymaan.
Wa kan leek inta,ya siidi al‑malik,kulla Bani Israaʼiil gaaʼidiin yarjook be sabur le yasmaʼo kharaarak wa yaʼarfu yaatu al‑yagood fi kursi al‑muluk baʼadak.
Wa wakit inta siidi al‑malik tumuut wa talhag abbahaatak,ana wa wileedi Suleymaan al‑naas yajʼaloona muznibiin. 
Wa wakit Batchaabaʼ lissaaʼha tihajji maʼa l‑malik ke bas,al‑nabi Naataan wassal.
Wa jo khabbaro al‑malik wa gaalo leyah : Daahu al‑nabi Naataan ja. Wa l‑nabi Naataan dakhal le l‑malik wa wagaʼ fi l‑ard wa sajad giddaamah.
Wa gaal le l‑malik : Ya siidi al‑malik,hal inta bas kharrart wa gult Aduniiya yahkim baʼadak wa hu bas yagood fi kursi al‑muluk walla ?
Achaan al‑yoom hu macha Een Ruugil wa gaddam dahaaya hana tiiraan wa ajjaal sumaan wa khanam katiiriin.Wa hu azam kulla iyaal al‑malik wa khuyyaad al‑askar wa Abiyaatar raajil al‑diin.Wa humman gaaʼidiin yaakulu wa yacharbo giddaamah wa yuguulu :‹ Yiʼiich al‑malik Aduniiya ! ›
Wa laakin hu ma azamaani ana abdak wa la Saduukh raajil al‑diin wa la Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ wa la abdak Suleymaan.
Ya siidi al‑malik,al‑amur da jaayi minnak inta walla ?Ya siidi al‑malik,ma khabbartini ana abdak be l‑naadum al‑yagood fi kursi al‑muluk min baʼadak. 
Wa be sabab kalaam Naataan,al‑malik Dawuud gaal : Naadu leyi Batchaabaʼ. Wa hi jaat dakhalat bakaan al‑malik wa wagafat giddaamah.
Wa l‑malik halaf wa gaal : Nahlif be Allah al‑Hayy al‑najjaani min kulla diige
misil awwal kula ana halaft leeki be Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,wileedki Suleymaan bas yahkim baʼadi wa yagood fi l‑kursi fi gaddi.Wa l‑yoom bas,nihaggig al‑kalaam da. 
Wa Batchaabaʼ wagaʼat fi l‑ard wa sajadat giddaam al‑malik wa gaalat : Allah yansur siidi al‑malik Dawuud ila l‑abad. 
Wa l‑malik Dawuud gaal : Naadu leyi Saduukh raajil al‑diin wa l‑nabi Naataan wa Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ. Wa humman jo wa dakhalo le l‑malik.
Wa l‑malik gaal battaan : Limmu kulla masaaʼiili wa rakkubu wileedi Suleymaan fi bakhali wa wadduuh fi rijil al‑almi hana Gihuun.
Wa fi l‑bakaan daak,Saduukh raajil al‑diin wa l‑nabi Naataan yamsahooh wa yidarrujuuh malik fi Israaʼiil.Wa khalaas,tadurbu al‑buug wa tuguulu :‹ Yiʼiich al‑malik Suleymaan. ›
Wa baʼad da,tusuuguuh giddaamku wa taju fi l‑hille.Wa hu yaji yagood fi kursiiyi wa hu bas yahkim fi gaddi.Wa hu bas al‑ana azaltah le yabga haakim fi Bani Israaʼiil wa Bani Yahuuza. 
Wa Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ gaal le l‑malik : Aamiin,khalli Allah Ilaah siidi al‑malik yihaggig kalaamah.
Wa misil Allah kaan maʼa siidi al‑malik,khalli yukuun maʼa Suleymaan kula.Wa yiʼalli darajat hukmah ziyaada min darajat siidi al‑malik Dawuud. 
Wa khalaas,Saduukh raajil al‑diin macha maʼa l‑nabi Naataan wa Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ wa l‑Kiritiyiin wa l‑Filtiyiin hurraas al‑malik wa kulluhum rakkabooh le Suleymaan fi bakhal hana l‑malik Dawuud wa waddooh Gihuun.
Wa Saduukh raajil al‑diin chaal al‑garin malaan dihin min lubb kheemat Allah wa masahah le Suleymaan wa darrajah malik.Wa darab al‑buug wa kulla l‑naas al‑haadiriin gaalo : Yiʼiich al‑malik Suleymaan. 
Wa khalaas,kulla l‑naas gabbalo al‑hille wara Suleymaan.Wa humman gaaʼidiin yalʼabo fi hiss al‑suffaara be farha chadiide lahaddi al‑ard rajafat min harakathum.
Wa Aduniiya wa naasah simʼo al‑haraka di fi wakit al‑dahaabhum kammalo akilhum.Wa Yuwaab irif hiss al‑buug wa gaal : Chunu al‑haraka al‑chadiide di al‑fi lubb al‑hille ? 
Wa lissaaʼ ma kammal kalaamah ke bas,ja Yuunataan wileed Abiyaatar raajil al‑diin.Wa Aduniiya gaal leyah : Taʼaal,inta naadum indah charaf wa akiid indak khabar halu le tiʼooriina. 
Wa Yuunataan radda le Aduniiya wa gaal : La abadan !Siidna al‑malik Dawuud darrajah le Suleymaan wa khattaah malik.
Wa l‑malik Dawuud rassal maʼa Suleymaan Saduukh raajil al‑diin wa l‑nabi Naataan wa Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ wa l‑Kiritiyiin wa l‑Filtiyiin hurraas al‑malik.Wa humman rakkabooh fi l‑bakhal hana l‑malik.
Wa Saduukh raajil al‑diin wa l‑nabi Naataan masahooh wa darrajooh malik fi Gihuun.Wa be da khalaas,humman gabbalo fi l‑hille farhaaniin wa kulla l‑naas gaaʼidiin yasrakho.Wa di bas al‑haraka al‑intu gaaʼidiin tasmaʼooha.
Wa Suleymaan zaatah gaʼad khalaas fi l‑kursi hana l‑muluk
wa ziyaada min da,masaaʼiil al‑malik jo baarako le siidna al‑malik Dawuud wa gaalo leyah :‹ Khalli al‑Rabb yisawwi usum Suleymaan yabga machhuur min usmak inta wa mulkah kula yabga ziyaada min mulkak inta.› Wa l‑malik sajad fi furaachah.
Wa gaal al‑kalaam da :‹ Baarak Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil hu al‑khatta fi kursi al‑muluk naadum fi badali.Wa ana gidirt chiftah be uyuuni.› 
Wa wakit simʼo al‑kalaam da,kulla maʼzuumiin Aduniiya gaaʼidiin yarjufu min al‑khoof wa ayyi waahid gamma wa macha.
Wa Aduniiya zaatah khaaf min Suleymaan wa gamma macha karab guruun al‑madbah.
Wa jo khabbaro Suleymaan wa gaalo leyah : Daahu Aduniiya khaaf minnak inta,ya l‑malik Suleymaan.Wa karab guruun al‑madbah wa gaal :‹ Khalli al‑yoom al‑malik Suleymaan yahlif leyi kadar ma yaktulni be l‑seef.› 
Wa Suleymaan radda wa gaal : Kan hu maachi adiil,suufaay waahide kula min raasah ma tagaʼ fi l‑turaab.Laakin kan yisawwi al‑fasaala kamaan,yumuut. 
Wa khalaas,Suleymaan rassal naas dallooh le Aduniiya min al‑madbah.Wa hu ja wa sajad giddaam al‑malik Suleymaan.Wa Suleymaan gaal leyah : Amchi beetak. 
Wa wakit Dawuud irif kadar hu gariib yumuut,anta wasiiye le wileedah Suleymaan.Wa gaal :
 Ana gariib nikhalli al‑dunya.Chidd heelak wa abga raajil !
Taabiʼ kalaam Allah Ilaahak wa amchi fi derbah.Ahfad gawaaniinah wa wasiiyaatah wa churuutah wa muʼaahadatah wa kulla cheyy al‑maktuub fi Tawraat Muusa.Wa be da,inta tanjah fi kulla cheyy al‑tisawwiih wa fi ayyi bakaan al‑tamchi.
Achaan Allah gaal yihaggig kalaamah al‑gaalah leyi.Hu gaal :‹ Kan naas zurriiytak yamchu adiil wa yisawwu al‑hagg be kulla guluubhum wa kulla fikirhum,khalaas daayman yukuun naadum min zurriiytak fi kursi al‑muluk hana Bani Israaʼiil.› 
Wa Dawuud gaal : Inta taʼarif tamaam al‑cheyy al‑sawwaah leyi Yuwaab wileedha le Saruuya.Hu bas al‑katalaahum le kubaaraat al‑askar al‑itneen hana Bani Israaʼiil yaʼni Abniir wileed Niir wa Amaasa wileed Yatar.Wa daffag dammuhum fi wakit al‑salaama wa chaal masʼuuliiyit katilhum.
Wa alʼaamal maʼaayah be hikma achaan ma tikhalli yabga chaayib wa la yumuut be salaam.
 Wa fakkir fi iyaal Barzillaay al‑min turaab Gilʼaad wa sawwi leehum al‑kheer.Wa khalliihum yabgo min al‑naas al‑yaakulu maʼaak inta al‑malik achaan humman fazaʼooniwakit ana muʼarrid min akhuuk Abchaluum.
 Wa fakkir fi Chimʼi wileed Giira min gabiilat Banyaamiin min hillit Bahuriim al‑gaaʼid jambak.Hu laʼanniziyaada wakit ana muʼarrid maachi Mahanaayim.Wa laakin wakit ana mugabbil,hu ligaani ale bahar al‑Urdun wa ana halaft leyah be Allah wa gult ma naktulah be l‑seef.
Wa hassaʼ,ma tajʼalah naadum bari.Achaan inta raajil hakiim wa taʼarif al‑cheyy al‑waajib tisawwiih leyah.Wa be suuf raasah al‑abyad da kula,aktulah. 
Wa Dawuud maat wa lihig abbahaatah wa dafanooh fi madiinat Dawuud fi Uruchaliim.
Wa muddit hukum Dawuud fi kulla balad Israaʼiil 40 sana.Hu hakam 7 sana fi Hibruun wa 33 sana fi Uruchaliim.
Wa Suleymaan chaal kursi al‑muluk hana abuuh Dawuud.Wa mulkah bigi saabit.
Wa Aduniiya wileedha le Haggiit ja le Batchaabaʼ amm Suleymaan.Wa hi gaalat leyah : Jaytak di aafe bas ? Wa hu gaal leeha : Aafe. 
Wa gaal battaan : Indi kilme nuguulha leeki. Wa hi gaalat : Guulha. 
Wa hu gaal : Inti taʼarfi kadar al‑muluk da hanaayi ana wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil yidooru ana nabga malik.Wa laakin al‑muluk marag minni wa wagaʼ le akhuuyi Suleymaan achaan Allah bas dawwar kadar hu yabga malik.
Wa hassaʼ da,indi talab waahid nigaddimah leeki.Ma taabe leyi. Wa hi gaalat leyah : Kallim ! 
Wa hu gaal : Min fadulki guuli le l‑malik Suleymaan yantiini Abichaag al‑min hillit Chuunam le tabga marti.Hu ma yaaba leeki. 
Wa Batchaabaʼ gaalat : Da adiil.Ana zaati namchi nikallim al‑malik be l‑cheyy al‑bukhussak. 
Wa khalaas,Batchaabaʼ machat bakaan al‑malik Suleymaan le tihajji leyah be l‑cheyy al‑bukhuss Aduniiya.Wa wakit dakhalat,al‑malik gamma laagaaha le ammah wa sajad leeha.Wa baʼad da,gamma gaʼad fi kursiih wa khatta kursi aakhar le ammah be nussah al‑zeenaay.
Wa Batchaabaʼ gaalat leyah : Indi talab sakhayyar ke nigaddimah leek wa laakin ma taaba leyi. Wa l‑malik gaal leeha : Gaddimi talabki,ya ammi.Ana ma naaba leeki. 
Wa hi gaalat leyah : Hal ma nagdaro nantu Abichaag al‑min hillit Chuunam le akhuuk Aduniiya le tabga martah walla ? 
Wa l‑malik Suleymaan radda le ammah wa gaal : Maala tatulbi Abichaag al‑min hillit Chuunam le Aduniiya ?Hu akhuuyi al‑kabiir.Wa misil da,atulbi al‑muluk leyah hu wa le Abiyaatar raajil al‑diin wa le Yuwaab wileedha le Saruuya kula ! 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik Suleymaan halaf be Allah wa gaal : Khalli al‑Rabb yiʼaakhibni ikhaab chadiid kan Aduniiya ma kaffa be hayaatah taman al‑talab al‑hu gaddamah da.
Wa Allah al‑Hayy bas sabbataani fi kursi al‑muluk hana abuuyi Dawuud wa anta al‑muluk da leyi ana wa le zurriiyti misil hu gaalah.Wa l‑yoom bas,Aduniiya yumuut. 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik Suleymaan rassalah le Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ.Wa hu macha darabah le Aduniiya wa katalah.
Wa kan le Abiyaatar raajil al‑diin kamaan,al‑malik gaal : Amchi le ziraaʼtak fi Anatuut achaan al‑moot waajib leek.Wa laakin ana ma naktulak al‑yoom achaan inta chilt sanduug Allah al‑Rabb giddaam abuuyi Dawuud wa inta tiʼibt maʼaayah fi kulla diigtah. 
Wa be misil da,Suleymaan tarad Abiyaatar min khidimtah hana rujaal al‑diin achaan yihaggig al‑kalaam al‑gaalah Allah fi zurriiyit Ali fi Chiilooh.
Wa wakit Yuwaab simiʼ be l‑khabar da,gamma arrad wa macha fi kheemat Allah wa karab guruun al‑madbah.Wa da achaan hu aba ma andamma maʼa Abchaluum wa laakin andamma maʼa Aduniiya.
Wa jo khabbaro al‑malik Suleymaan kadar Yuwaab arrad wa allabbad fi lubb kheemat Allah wa gaaʼid jamb al‑madbah.Wa khalaas,Suleymaan rassal Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ wa gaal leyah : Amchi aktulah. 
Wa Banaaya dakhal fi kheemat Allah wa gaal le Yuwaab : Al‑malik buguul :‹ Amrug min al‑bakaan da.›  Wa Yuwaab gaal : La !Ana numuut hini. Wa khalaas,Banaaya gabbal bakaan al‑malik wa ooraah be l‑kalaam al‑Yuwaab raddaah leyah.
Wa l‑malik gaal leyah : Sawwi misil hu gaalah !Aktulah wa adfinah fi bakaanah da bas.Wa be misil da,ana wa aayilat abuuyi nukuunu bariyiin min al‑dimam al‑katalaahum Yuwaab bala sabab.
Wa khalli Allah yigabbil leyah al‑dimam dool fi raasah achaan hu katal be l‑seef naaseen al‑adiiliin wa akheer minnah wa abuuyi Dawuud ma indah khabar.Hu katal Abniir wileed Niir khaayid deech Bani Israaʼiil wa Amaasa wileed Yatar khaayid deech Bani Yahuuza.
Khalli Allah yigabbil al‑dimam dool fi raas Yuwaab wa fi zurriiytah ila l‑abad.Wa laakin le Dawuud kamaan,khalli Allah yijiib al‑salaam al‑daayim fi zurriiytah wa fi beetah wa fi mulkah. 
Wa khalaas,Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ macha le Yuwaab dakhal leyah wa katalah.Wa dafanooh fi beetah fi l‑kadaade.
Wa l‑malik khattaah le Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ khaayid al‑deech fi badal Yuwaab.Wa le Saduukh,khattaah raajil al‑diin fi badal Abiyaatar.
Wa l‑malik naadaah le Chimʼi wa gaal leyah : Abni leek beet fi Uruchaliim wa askun fi lubb al‑madiina wa ma tamchi ayyi bakaan.
Wa aʼarif tamaam kan yoom inta maragt min al‑madiina di wa gataʼt waadi Khidruun da,tumuut.Wa inta bas tabga masʼuul min mootak. 
Wa Chimʼi radda le l‑malik wa gaal : Kalaamak adiil !Ana khaddaamak nisawwi kula cheyy al‑inta siidi al‑malik gultah. Wa Chimʼi sakan tawwal fi Uruchaliim.
Wa laakin baʼad talaata sana,abiid itneen hana Chimʼi arrado wa macho bakaan Akiich wileed Maʼaaka malik hillit Gaat.Wa jo khabbarooh le Chimʼi wa gaalo leyah : Daahu abiidak macho hillit Gaat. 
Wa tawwaali,Chimʼi gamma chadda humaara wa macha hillit Gaat bakaan Akiich le yichiil abiidah.Wa khalaas,Chimʼi chaal wa jaab abiidah min hillit Gaat.
Wa jo khabbarooh le Suleymaan kadar Chimʼi marag min Uruchaliim wa macha hillit Gaat wa gabbal.
Wa khalaas,al‑malik rassal naadaah le Chimʼi wa gaal leyah : Ana ma hallaftak be Allah wa hazzartak wa gult leek :‹ Aʼarif tamaam kan yoom maragt min al‑madiina di wa macheet fi ayyi bakaan,tumuut.› Wa inta gult :‹ Tamaam !Simiʼt kalaamak. ›
Wa maala ma khuft min al‑haliife al‑sawweetha giddaam Allah ?Wa maala ma tabbagt amri al‑amartak beyah ? 
Wa l‑malik gaal battaan le Chimʼi : Inta taʼarif kulla l‑fasaala al‑sawweetha be niiytak le abuuyi Dawuud.Allah yigabbil leek fasaaltak di fi raasak.
Wa laakin Allah yibaarikni ana al‑malik Suleymaan wa yisabbit kursi al‑muluk hana abuuyi Dawuud wa yagood ila l‑abad giddaam Allah. 
Wa baʼad da,al‑malik anta amur le Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ wa hu macha darabah le Chimʼi lahaddi maat.Wa be misil da,al‑muluk hana malik Suleymaan bigi saabit.
Wa Suleymaan naasab Firʼoon malik Masir.Hu akhad bineeyit Firʼoon wa khattaaha fi madiinat Dawuud lahaddi hu kammal buna beetah al‑halaalah wa beet Allah wa durdur al‑muhawwig Uruchaliim.
Wa fi l‑wakit da,al‑chaʼab gaaʼidiin yigaddumu dahaayaahum le Allah fi l‑bakaanaat al‑aaliyiin achaan lissaaʼ ma bano beet Allah.
Wa Suleymaan indah hubb le Allah wa gaaʼid yitabbig al‑churuut al‑antaahum leyah abuuh Dawuud.Wa laakin hu kula gaaʼid yigaddim dahaaya wa yiharrig bakhuur fi l‑bakaanaat al‑aaliyiin.
Wa yoom waahid,al‑malik macha hillit Gibʼuun le yigaddim dahaaya fi bakaan al‑ibaada hinaak.Wa da bakaan al‑ibaada al‑muhimm ziyaada.Wa Suleymaan gaddam 1 000 dahaaya muharragiin fi l‑madbah da.
Wa fi Gibʼuun,Allah baan le Suleymaan be l‑leel fi ruʼya wa gaal leyah : Atlub minni al‑cheyy al‑inta tidoorah wa ana nantiih leek. 
Wa Suleymaan radda wa gaal : Inta sawweet kheer katiir le abuuyi Dawuud abdak achaan hu taabaʼ derbak be amaan wa adaala wa galib abyad.Wa inta hafadt leyah al‑kheer al‑katiir da wa anteetah wileed al‑chaal mulkah al‑yoom.
Wa hassaʼ da,ya Allah Ilaahi,inta bas al‑darrajtini ana abdak malik fi gadd abuuyi Dawuud.Wa ana lissaaʼni sabi wa ma naʼarif kikkeef nahkim.
Wa ana abdak gaaʼid fi ust al‑chaʼab al‑inta azaltuhum.Wa l‑chaʼab dool min katarathum wa la yinhasbu wa la yinʼaddo.
Arzukhni ana abdak be galib al‑indah hikma le nahkim fi chaʼabak wa naʼarif al‑zeen wa l‑fasil.Achaan yaatu yagdar yahkim fi chaʼabak al‑katiiriin dool ? 
Wa l‑Rabb khibil talab Suleymaan al‑gaddamah leyah da.
Wa l‑Rabb radda leyah wa gaal : Inta talabt al‑hikma bas wa la talabt umur tawiil wa la talabt maal wa la talabt moot udwaanak laakin inta talabt al‑fihim le tahkim be l‑adaala.
Daahu ana nihaggig talabak wa nantiik hikma wa fihim al‑abadan ma anteetah le naadum min gablak wa la min baʼadak.
Wa ana nantiik al‑cheyy al‑inta ma talabtah kula.Nantiik al‑khuna wa l‑azama wa fi kulla muddit hayaatak ma fi malik min al‑muluuk al‑yabga mislak.
Wa kan titaabiʼ derbi wa tahfad churuuti wa wasiiyaati misil Dawuud abuuk,ana nitawwil umrak. 
Wa wakit Suleymaan wiʼi,hu irif kadar hu riʼi.Wa khalaas,gamma macha Uruchaliim wa wagaf giddaam sanduug muʼaahadat al‑Rabb.Wa hu gaddam dahaaya muharragiin wa dahaaya salaama.Wa baʼad da,hu sawwa aazuuma le masaaʼiilah.
Wa yoom waahid,awiin itneen charaamiit jin giddaam al‑malik.
Wa l‑waahide min al‑awiin deel gaalat : Ya siidi al‑malik !Ana wa l‑mara di saaknaat fi nafs al‑beet.Wa wakit ana wilidt,hi kula gaaʼide.
Wa baʼad talaata yoom,hi kula wildat.Wa aniina gaaʼidaat sawa,naadum aakhar maʼaana fi l‑beet ke ma fiih illa aniina al‑itneen.
Wa wald al‑mara di maat be l‑leel achaan hi ragadat foogah.
Wa hi gammat ust al‑leel wa chaalat wileedi al‑raagid jambi.Wa da wakit ana khaadmak naayme.Wa hi hadanatah giddaamha wa wileedha al‑mayyit kamaan raggadatah giddaami.
Wa be fajur wakit gammeet niraddiʼ wileedi,ligiitah mayyit.Wa wakit al‑sabaah asbah,ana akkadt al‑wileed da adiil wa irift kadar da ma wileedi al‑ana wilidtah. 
Wa l‑mara al‑aakhara gaalat : La,ma ke !Al‑wileed al‑hayy da bas hanaayi wa l‑mayyit da hanaaki. Wa l‑mara al‑awwalaaniiye gaalat : Abadan !Wileedki inti bas al‑mayyit wa wileedi ana bas al‑hayy. Wa be misil da,hinna gamman yilkhaalatan giddaam al‑malik.
Wa l‑malik gaal leehin : Al‑waahide minkan gaalat :‹ Al‑wileed al‑hayy hanaayi wa l‑mayyit hanaaki.› Wa l‑aakhara tuguul :‹ La !Wileedki inti bas al‑mayyit wa hanaayi ana bas al‑hayy.› 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik gaal : Jiibu leyi seef. Wa jaabo seef le l‑malik.
Wa l‑malik gaal : Agtaʼo al‑sakhiir al‑hayy da bakaanteen wa antu nuss le l‑waahide wa nuss le l‑aakhara. 
Wa khalaas fi l‑bakaan da,amm al‑sakhiir al‑hayy hannat le sakhiirha wa gaalat le l‑malik : Ya siidi al‑malik,antiiha al‑sakhiir da.Ma taktuluuh ! Wa laakin al‑mara al‑aakhara tuguul : Agtaʼo al‑sakhiir !Wa be misil da,wa la ana nalgaah wa la hi talgaah. 
Wa khalaas,al‑malik gaal : Antu al‑sakhiir al‑hayy da le l‑mara al‑awwalaaniiye.Ma taktuluuh achaan hi bas ammah. 
Wa kulla Bani Israaʼiil simʼo be l‑chariiʼa al‑sawwaaha Suleymaan.Wa humman khaafo minnah achaan irfo kadar al‑Rabb antaah hikma le yahkim be l‑adaala.
Wa Suleymaan bigi malik fi kulla Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa masaaʼiilah humman Azarya wileed Saduukh hu raajil al‑diin
wa Alihuuraf wa Akhiiya wileed Chiicha humman kuttaabah wa Yahuuchafat wileed Akhiluud hu kaatib al‑yizakkir al‑malik.
Wa Banaaya wileed Yahuuyadaʼ hu khaayid al‑deech wa Saduukh wa Abiyaatar humman rujaal diin
wa Azarya wileed Naataan hu masʼuul fi l‑hukkaam wa Zabuud wileed Naataan hu raajil diin wa mustachaar al‑khaass hana l‑malik.
Wa Akhichaar hu masʼuul fi gasir al‑malik wa Aduniraam wileed Abda hu masʼuul fi l‑khidme al‑ijbaariiye.
Suleymaan khatta 12 hukkaam fi kulla balad Israaʼiil.Wa humman bas masʼuuliin min iichit al‑malik wa aayiltah.Wa fi l‑sana,ayyi waahid minhum yijiib maʼaach hana chahar waahid.
Wa daahu asaame al‑hukkaam dool.Wileed Huur haakim fi mantagat jibaal Afraayim.
Wa wileed Dakhar haakim fi Maakhas wa fi Chaʼalbiim wa fi Beet Chams wa fi Iluun Beet Hanaan.
Wa wileed Hasad haakim fi Arubuut yaʼni mantagat Suuku wa kulla balad Hiifar.
Wa wileed Abinadaab haakim fi kulla mantagat jibaal Duur.Wa hu bas raajilha le Taafat bineeyit Suleymaan.
Wa Baʼana wileed Akhiluud haakim fi Taʼnak wa Magiddu wa kulla mantagat Beet Chaan al‑gariibe le Sartaan giddaam le Yazraʼiil yaʼni min Beet Chaan lahaddi Abil Mahuula wa lahaddi khaadi le Yakhmaʼaam.
Wa wileed Giibar haakim fi Raamuut al‑fi Gilʼaad.Wa hu masʼuul fi hillaal hana Yayiir wileed Manassa fi Gilʼaad.Wa battaan hu haakim fi Arguub fi turaab Baachaan wa 60 mudun kubaar wa muhawwagiin be daraadir gawiyiin wa mugaffaliin be hawaadir hana nahaas.
Wa Akhinadaab wileed Iddu haakim fi mantagat Mahanaayim.
Wa Akhimaaʼas haakim fi mantagat Naftaali.Wa hu kula akhad bitt waahide min banaat Suleymaan al‑usumha Baasmat.
Wa Baʼana wileed Huuchaay haakim fi mantagat Achiir wa Baʼaluut.
Wa Yahuuchafat wileed Faaruuh haakim fi mantagat Yassaakar.
Wa Chimʼi wileed Iila haakim fi mantagat Banyaamiin.
Wa Giibar wileed Uuri haakim fi turaab Gilʼaad.Wa l‑turaab di zamaan hi hint Siihuun malik al‑Amuuriyiin wa Oog malik Baachaan.Wa ziyaada min al‑hukkaam al‑atnaachar dool,fiyah haakim fi balad Yahuuza.
Wa Bani Yahuuza wa Bani Israaʼiil humman katiiriin misil ramla hana khachum al‑bahar.Wa humman induhum akil wa charaab wa aaychiin fi raaha.
Wa l‑malik Suleymaan hakam fi kulla l‑mamaalik min bahar al‑Furaat wa balad al‑Filistiyiin lahaddi huduud balad Masir.Wa humman dool yikaffu al‑miiri wa yakhdumu le l‑malik Suleymaan fi kulla muddit hayaatah.
Wa l‑maʼaach al‑yijiibuuh le Suleymaan wa naasah fi l‑yoom yisaawi 75 chuwaal hana ahsan dagiig wa 150 chuwaal hana dagiig gameh
wa 10 tiiraan sumaan murabbayiin wa 20 tiiraan hana sarha wa 100 khanam.Wa da bala l‑teetal wa l‑khuzlaan wa l‑wuhuuch wa l‑tuyuur al‑murabbayiin.
Al‑malik Suleymaan gaaʼid yahkim fi kulla l‑balad al‑gaaʼide kharib le bahar al‑Furaat wa da min hillit Tifsah lahaddi hillit Khazza.Wa hu aayich be l‑salaama maʼa kulla l‑buldaan al‑mujaawiriinah.
Wa min Daan fi l‑munchaakh lahaddi Biir Sabʼa fi l‑wati,Bani Yahuuza wa Bani Israaʼiil yagoodu be amaan ayyi waahid fi lubb jineentah hana l‑inab wa l‑tiin fi kulla muddit hayaat Suleymaan.
Wa Suleymaan indah 40 000 chaaye le l‑kheel al‑yukurru leyah arabaatah hana l‑harib wa 12 000 rujaal siyaad kheel.
Wa l‑malik kallaf atnaachar hukkaam,wa humman al‑masʼuuliin be maʼaach al‑malik wa l‑naas al‑yaakulu fi dabalaaytah.Wa ayyi waahid yijiib maʼaach hana chahar waahid wa ma yikhalli cheyy yigassir leyah.
Wa l‑hukkaam dool ayyi waahid hasab al‑talabooh minnah yijiib gameh abyad wa gechch le l‑kheel al‑yarkabo fooghum wa l‑kheel al‑yukurru beehum.Wa l‑khumaam da,kulla ke yijiibuuh fi l‑bakaan al‑gaaʼid foogah al‑malik.
Wa l‑Rabb antaah le Suleymaan hikma wa fihim ziyaada wa maʼrafa katiire misil ramla hana khachum al‑bahar.
Wa hikmat Suleymaan bigat ziyaada min hikmat kulla naas al‑sabaah wa hikmat naas Masir.
Wa Suleymaan bigi hakiim min kulla naas al‑dunya wa hakiim min Itaan al‑min khachum beet Azraahi wa Heemaan wa Kalkuul wa Dardaʼ iyaal Mahuul.Wa usmah bigi maʼruuf fi kulla l‑umam al‑mujaawiriinah.
Wa Suleymaan katab 3 000 masal wa 1 005 khine.
Wa hu hajja be l‑nabaat min chadar al‑arz al‑aziim hana Lubnaan lahaddi nabaat al‑zuufa al‑sakhayyar al‑yugumm fi l‑durdur.Wa hajja be l‑bahaayim wa l‑tuyuur wa l‑zawaahif wa l‑huut.
Wa kulla l‑chuʼuub wa muluuk al‑ard al‑simʼo be hikmat al‑malik Suleymaan rassalo naashum jo le yasmaʼo hikmatah.
Wa wakit Hiiraam malik balad Suur simiʼ kadar Suleymaan masahooh wa darrajooh malik fi gadd abuuh,rassal masaaʼiilah le Suleymaan achaan Hiiraam kaan rafiigah le Dawuud fi kulla muddit hayaatah.
Wa Suleymaan rassal le Hiiraam wa gaal :
 Inta taʼarif kadar abuuyi Dawuud ma gidir bana beet le Allah Ilaahah achaan udwaanah haarabooh min ayyi jiihe lahaddi Allah khattaahum tihit rijileenah.
Wa laakin hassaʼ,Allah Ilaahi jaab leyi al‑salaama min ayyi jiihe wa ma fi adu wa la diige.
Wa daahu ana indi niiye le nabni beet le Allah Ilaahi.Wa da misil Allah gaalah le abuuyi Dawuud,hu gaal :‹ Ana nidarrij wileedak malik fi gaddak wa hu bas al‑yabni beet le usmi. ›
Wa hassaʼ da,anti amur le naasak yagtaʼo leyi hatab al‑arz hana Lubnaan.Wa khaddaamiinak yakhdumu maʼa khaddaamiini wa ana nikaffiik ujrat khaddaamiinak hasab inta tuguulah.Achaan inta taʼarif tamaam kadar ma fi naadum minnina al‑yaʼarif yagtaʼ al‑chadar misil naasak min balad Seeda. 
Wa wakit Hiiraam simiʼ kalaam Suleymaan da,firih farha chadiide wa gaal : Baarak Allah al‑antaah al‑yoom le Dawuud wileed hakiim le yahkim fi l‑chaʼab al‑katiiriin dool. 
Wa Hiiraam rassal le Suleymaan wa gaal : Ana simiʼt kalaam mursaalak wa khalaas nantiik kulla l‑dawwartah min hatab al‑arz wa hatab al‑sarwi.
Wa khaddaamiini yangulu hatab al‑arz min Lubnaan lahaddi khachum al‑bahar al‑Abyad.Wa hinaak,yilimmu al‑hatab da wa yarbutuuh wa yiʼawwumuuh fi l‑bahar lahaddi fi l‑bakaan al‑inta tiwassifah leyi.Wa fi l‑bakaan da,naasi yifartugu al‑hubaal wa inta tichiilah.Wa inta kamaan sawwi leyi al‑cheyy al‑nidoorah wa anti akil le naas beeti. 
Wa be misil da,Hiiraam anta Suleymaan hatab al‑arz wa hatab al‑sarwi misil hu dawwarah.
Wa kulli sana,Suleymaan yanti akil le Hiiraam misil 50 000 chuwaal hana gameh wa itneen birmiil hana dihin zaytuun saafi.
Wa Allah antaah hikma le Suleymaan misil hu gaalah leyah.Wa l‑alaakha bigat samha been Hiiraam wa Suleymaan.Wa be da,humman sawwo muʼaahada ambeenaathum.
Wa l‑malik Suleymaan nazzam khidme ijbaariiye wa chaal foogha 30 000 raajil min kulla Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa l‑rujaal dool yakhdumu amkaaba.Wa fi ayyi chahar,yirassil 10 000 raajil yamchu Lubnaan le yakhdumu chahar.Wa baʼad da,yigabbulu yinjammo chahareen fi buyuuthum.Wa l‑muraakhib fi l‑khidme di,hu Aduniraam.
Wa Suleymaan indah battaan 70 000 naggaaliin wa 80 000 naas gaaʼidiin fi l‑jibaal achaan yagtaʼo hujaar hana buna.
Wa bala l‑masaaʼiil al‑Suleymaan kallafaahum fi l‑khidme,fiyah naas aakhariin kula muraakhibiin fi l‑khidme di.Wa adadhum 3 300 raajil.
Wa l‑malik anta amur le yagtaʼo hujaar kubaar wa samhiin le yabgo asaas le beet Allah.
Wa khalaas,kulla khaddaamiin Suleymaan wa khaddaamiin Hiiraam wa naas hillit Gibaal gammo yagtaʼo wa yijahhuzu al‑hatab wa l‑hujaar le buna al‑beet da.
Wa l‑malik Suleymaan bada buna beet Allah be 480 sana baʼad marigiin Bani Israaʼiil min balad Masir.Wa da fi l‑sana al‑raabʼe hana hukmah fi Bani Israaʼiil wa fi l‑chahar al‑usmah Ziyu wa hu al‑chahar al‑taani hana l‑sana.
Wa l‑beet al‑Suleymaan banaah le Allah da tuulah 60 duraaʼ wa urdah 20 duraaʼ wa tuulah foog kamaan 30 duraaʼ.
Wa giddaam beet Allah,fiyah khurfa hana madkhal al‑urdaha 20 duraaʼ maʼa urd al‑beet sawa wa tuulha 10 duraaʼ giddaam al‑beet.
Wa l‑beet da rakkabo leyah chabaabiik wa saddoohum be hadiid madfuur.
Wa bano buyuut barra fi tuul al‑durdur hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas wa l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.
Wa l‑gasir al‑tihtaani urdah 5 duraaʼ wa l‑ustaani urdah 6 duraaʼ wa l‑taalit urdah 7 duraaʼ achaan durdur hana beet Allah ma indah nafs al‑tukhun fi kulla tuulah foog.Wa tukhnah ma mutasaawi fi ayyi gasir.Wa be da,al‑maraadiis al‑yisabbutu al‑beet ma yadkhulu fi l‑durdur hana beet Allah.
Wa l‑buna hana beet Allah da sawwooh be hujaar mujahhaziin al‑gataʼoohum gubbaal.Wa be da,ma binsamiʼ daribiin hana mitraga wa la faas wa la aala aakhara hana hadiid fi lubb beet Allah wakit gaaʼidiin yabnuuh.
Wa l‑baab al‑yadkhulu beyah al‑gasir al‑ustaani gaaʼid be nuss al‑zeene hana beet Allah.Wa yarkabo fi l‑gasir al‑ustaani da be ataba wa min hinaak,yarkabo battaan fi l‑gasir al‑foogaani.
Wa baʼad Suleymaan kammal buna beet Allah,khatta leyah maraadiis hana arz wa sadda raasah be khachab.
Wa bana al‑buyuut barra fi tuul al‑durdur hana l‑beet al‑mukhaddas wa ayyi beet tuulah 5 duraaʼ wa lammaahum maʼa durdur al‑beet al‑mukhaddas be hatab al‑arz.
Wa Allah hajja le Suleymaan wa gaal :
 Daahu inta gaaʼid tabni leyi al‑beet da.Wa kan tamchi hasab gawaaniini wa titaabiʼ churuuti wa tahfad wasiiyaati wa titabbighum,khalaas ana nihaggig al‑kalaam al‑gultah fi chaanak wa da l‑kalaam al‑gultah le abuuk Dawuud.
Wa ana naskun fi lubb chaʼabi Bani Israaʼiil wa abadan ma nikhalliihum. 
Wa baʼad kammal buna beet Allah,Suleymaan
sadda kulla daakhal al‑beet min tihit lahaddi foog be khachab al‑arz.Wa turaabah kula saddaah be khachab al‑sarwi.
Wa fi lubb al‑beet daakhal,bana khurfa khaassa wa da l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.Tuulah yisaawi 20 duraaʼ wa saddaah be khachab al‑arz min tihit lahaddi foog.
Wa l‑bakaan al‑faddal min al‑khurfa al‑kabiire hana beet Allah gaaʼid giddaam al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid wa tuulah yisaawi 40 duraaʼ.
Wa khachab al‑arz al‑saddo beyah al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas min daakhal,nagacho foogah suwar hana bukhas wa zuhuur mufattahiin.Wa saddo kulla l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas da be khachab al‑arz.Wa be da,hajar waahid kula ma binchaaf.
Wa daakhal beet Allah,Suleymaan bana al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid da le yukhuttu foogah sanduug muʼaahadat Allah.
Wa l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid tuulah 20 duraaʼ wa urdah 20 duraaʼ wa tuulah foog kula 20 duraaʼ.Wa Suleymaan masah lubbah be dahab saafi.Wa sawwa mukhbar kula min hatab al‑arz wa masahah be dahab.
Wa Suleymaan masah lubb al‑beet da be dahab saafi wa allag salaasil hana dahab giddaam al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid al‑mamsuuh be dahab.
Wa khalaas be da,hu masah be dahab saafi kulla l‑beet wa l‑mukhbar al‑khattaah giddaam al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.
Wa fi lubb al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid,sanaʼ tamaasiil hana makhluugiin samaawiyiin itneen be hatab al‑zaytuun.Wa ayyi waahid tuulah foog 10 duraaʼ.
Wa ayyi makhluug samaawi indah janaahe itneen.Wa tuul al‑jinh al‑waahid 5 duraaʼ wa l‑jinh al‑aakhar kula tuulah 5 duraaʼ.Wa min taraf jinhah al‑waahid le jinhah al‑aakhar,tuulah 10 duraaʼ.
Wa tuul al‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin al‑itneen dool sawa sawa yaʼni 10 duraaʼ ayyi waahid.Wa chakilhum kula waahid.
Wa ayyi waahid min al‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin dool tuulah foog 10 duraaʼ.
Wa Suleymaan khatta al‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin dool daakhal fi lubb al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid.Wa l‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin dool mumattitiin janaaheehum wa jinh hana l‑makhluug al‑samaawi al‑waahid yilammis al‑durdur be hini wa jinh hana l‑makhluug al‑samaawi al‑aakhar yilammis al‑durdur be hinaak.Wa misil da,janaaheehum al‑aakhariin kamaan laammiin sawa fi ust al‑beet,jinh maʼa jinh.
Wa l‑tamaasiil hana l‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin al‑itneen dool,masahaahum be dahab.
Wa fi kulla l‑daraadir al‑daakhal hana l‑khuraf al‑itneen hana beet Allah,nagach suwar hana makhluugiin samaawiyiin wa chadar nakhal wa zuhuur mufattahiin.
Wa hu masah ard al‑khuraf al‑itneen dool be dahab.
Wa fi madkhal al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid,sawwa baab abdalfiteen be hatab al‑zaytuun.Wa l‑hatab al‑yirakkubu foogah al‑baab da,tuulah yisaawi al‑khumus hana l‑durdur.
Wa l‑biibaan al‑itneen hana l‑baab abdalfiteen dool,sawwaahum be hatab al‑zaytuun.Wa nagach fooghum suwar hana makhluugiin samaawiyiin wa chadar nakhal wa zuhuur mufattahiin wa masahaahum be dahab.Al‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin wa l‑nakhal kulluhum ke masahaahum be dahab.
Wa sawwa nafs al‑cheyy le l‑baab hana madkhal beet Allah.Wa l‑hatab al‑yirakkubu foogah al‑baab da sawwaah be hatab al‑zaytuun wa tuulah yisaawi al‑rubuʼ hana l‑durdur.
Wa sawwa biibaan itneen be hatab al‑sarwi al‑induhum rubaat ambeenaathum wa l‑waahid yintabig fi l‑aakhar.
Wa fi l‑biibaan dool,nagach suwar hana makhluugiin samaawiyiin wa chadar nakhal wa zuhuur mufattahiin wa masahaahum be dahab.
Wa l‑fadaay al‑dakhlaaniiye,hawwagha be talaata roog hana hajar manguuch.Wa fi raas al‑talaata roog hana hajar,khatta roog waahid hana hatab al‑arz.
Wa asaas beet Allah,khattooh fi l‑sana al‑raabʼe hana hukum Suleymaan fi l‑chahar al‑usmah Ziyu.
Wa fi sanit 11 hana hukmah fi l‑chahar al‑usmah Buul yaʼni fi l‑chahar al‑taamin,buna hana l‑beet da kammal marra waahid hasab al‑waajib leyah.Wa Suleymaan bana al‑beet da fi muddit sabʼa sana.
Wa Suleymaan bana gasrah wa kammalah fi muddit 13 sana.
Wa hu bana beet al‑sammooh Khaabat Lubnaan wa tuulah 100 duraaʼ wa urdah 50 duraaʼ wa tuulah foog kamaan 30 duraaʼ.Wa fi lubbah,hu sawwa arbaʼa roog hana amad min hatab al‑arz wa fi raashum,khatta maraadiis kula min hatab al‑arz.
Wa l‑maraadiis dool adadhum 45 wa gaaʼidiin fi talaata roog wa ayyi roog indah 15 maraadiis al‑gaaʼidiin fi raas al‑amad.Wa hu sadda al‑maraadiis dool be khachab al‑arz.
Wa fi ayyi jiihe hana l‑beet,sawwo talaata roog hana chabaabiik be hatabhum.Wa rakkabo al‑chabaabiik dool mulgaabiliin al‑waahid le l‑aakhar.
Wa kulla l‑biibaan wa l‑chabaabiik wa hatabhum al‑yirakkubuuhum foogah,chakilhum murabbaʼ.Wa l‑chabaabiik dool mulgaabiliin ambeenaathum ale talaata roog.
Wa Suleymaan sawwa baranda al‑tuulha 50 duraaʼ wa urdaha 30 duraaʼ wa banaaha be amad.Wa bana khurfit al‑madkhal wa sabbatha be amad wa sawwa baabha be giddaam.
Wa battaan bana baranda aakhara al‑yukhuttu foogha kursi al‑muluk wa da l‑bakaan al‑yisawwi foogah al‑chariiʼa.Wa l‑bakaan da,hu saddaah be khachab al‑arz min tihit lahaddi foog.
Wa l‑beet al‑yaskun foogah,banooh fi fadaay aakhara wa hu bichaabih beet Khaabat Lubnaan.Wa le martah bineeyit Firʼoon malik Masir,Suleymaan bana beet al‑hu kula bichaabih beet Khaabat Lubnaan.
Wa kulla l‑buyuut dool wa l‑daraadir wa l‑fadaay al‑kabiire min al‑asaas lahaddi l‑maraadiis,banoohum be hujaar samhiin wa magtuuʼiin.Wa humman gataʼoohum be munchaar be giddaam wa be wara.
Wa le l‑asaas,astaʼmalo hujaar kubaar wa samhiin al‑tuulhum ma sawa.Waahidiin 10 duraaʼ wa waahidiin 8 duraaʼ.
Wa fi raas al‑asaas da,khatto hujaar samhiin magtuuʼiin hasab al‑magaas al‑waajib wa hatab al‑arz.
Wa l‑fadaay al‑kabiire,hawwagooha be durdur al‑indah talaata roog hana hujaar magtuuʼiin wa fi raashum,indah roog waahid hana hatab al‑arz.Wa da misil al‑fadaay al‑dakhlaaniiye wa khurfit al‑madkhal hana beet Allah.
Wa l‑malik Suleymaan rassal jaabah le Huuraam min balad Suur.
Wa Huuraam da,hu wileed hana mara armala wa hi min gabiilat Naftaali wa abuuh min balad Suur.Wa hu indah khibra wa fihim wa maʼrafa fi khidmit al‑nahaas.Hu ja bakaan al‑malik Suleymaan wa sawwa leyah kulla khidimtah.
Wa Huuraam sanaʼ amad itneen hana nahaas wa tuul hana ayyi waahid 18 duraaʼ wa l‑daayira hana ayyi waahid indaha 12 duraaʼ.
Wa sanaʼ ruuse hana nahaas al‑yukhuttuuhum foog fi l‑amad dool wa ayyi waahid min al‑ruuse dool tuulah 5 duraaʼ.
Wa jammal al‑amad dool be salaasil hana nahaas madfuuriin wa khattaahum foog fi raas al‑amad dool.Wa ayyi amuud indah sabʼa salaasil.
Wa battaan sanaʼ be nahaas roogeen hana rummaan wa allaghum fi l‑salaasil wa sadda beehum raas al‑amuud al‑waahid.Wa sawwa nafs al‑cheyy be l‑amuud al‑taani.
Wa le l‑amad hana l‑madkhal dool,sanaʼ leehum ruuse aakhariin wa ayyi raas tuulah 4 duraaʼ.Wa l‑ruuse dool bichaabuhu nuwwaar al‑sitteeb.
Wa foog min ruuse al‑amad,fiyah bakaan takhiin ziyaada.Wa l‑bakaan da faayit al‑salaasil al‑muʼallagiin fooghum 200 rummaan al‑muhawwigiin ruuse al‑amad.
Wa Huuraam khatta al‑amad dool giddaam khurfit al‑madkhal hana beet Allah.Al‑amuud al‑waahid,khattaah be l‑zeene wa sammaah Yaakiin (maʼanaatah Allah yisabbit).Wa l‑amuud al‑taani,khattaah be l‑isra wa sammaah Buʼaaz (maʼanaatah al‑gudra min Allah).
Wa l‑ruuse hana l‑amad dool bichaabuhu nuwwaar al‑sitteeb.Wa be misil da,Huuraam kammal khidmit al‑amad.
Wa Huuraam sanaʼ hoot kabiir mudawwar hana nahaas.Wa khachmah yisaawi 10 duraaʼ min tarafah le tarafah.Wa tuulah foog yisaawi 5 duraaʼ wa daayirah kamaan 30 duraaʼ.
Wa jammal al‑hoot be bukhas al‑sanaʼaahum be nahaas.Fi ayyi duraaʼ,sawwa 10 bukhas wa da,fi kulla daayira al‑hoot.Wa l‑bukhas dool sanaʼaahum ale roogeen.Wa humman wa l‑hoot kulluhum ke sunʼa waahide bas.
Wa l‑hoot da khattooh fi 12 tiiraan hana nahaas.Wa l‑tiiraan dool muwajjihiin ale l‑arbaʼa jiihaat.Talaata muwajjihiin ale jiihat al‑munchaakh wa talaata ale jiihat al‑kharib wa talaata ale jiihat al‑wati wa talaata ale jiihat al‑sabaah.Wa duhuurhum daakhal tihit al‑hoot.
Wa khachum al‑hoot da tukhnah yisaawi arbaʼa usbaʼ wa khachmah misil nuwwaar al‑sitteeb.Wa l‑hoot da yichiil 200 birmiil hana almi.
Wa Huuraam sanaʼ achara hiitaan mutaharrikiin min nahaas wa ayyi waahid tuulah 4 duraaʼ wa urdah 4 duraaʼ wa tuulah foog kamaan 3 duraaʼ.
Wa daahu kikkeef sanaʼ al‑hiitaan al‑mutaharrikiin dool.Sanaʼaahum be safaayih hana nahaas al‑bigi misil asaas wa khatta leehum hawaadir.
Wa sanaʼ fi l‑safaayih ambeen al‑hawaadir dool suwar hana diidaan wa tiiraan wa makhluugiin samaawiyiin.Wa be foog wa be tihit le l‑diidaan wa l‑tiiraan,jammalaahum be zuhuur muddoodaliin.
Wa ayyi asaas indah arbaʼa ajalaat hana nahaas murakkabiin fi arbaʼa hawaadir hana nahaas al‑musabbatiin fi l‑arbaʼa arkaan hana l‑asaas.Wa l‑hawaadir maʼa l‑asaas,kulluhum ke sunʼa waahide bas wa l‑ajalaat ma lihgo al‑bakaan al‑mujammal be zuhuur.
Wa fi raas ayyi asaas,fiyah fatha mudawwara tuulha foog duraaʼ wa urdaha duraaʼ wa nuss wa da l‑bakaan al‑yukhuttu foogah al‑hoot.Wa khachum al‑fatha al‑mudawwara da,nagacho foogah suwar.Wa laakin safaayih al‑asaas da murabbaʼiin ma mudawwariin.
Wa l‑arbaʼa ajalaat dool gaaʼidiin be tihit marbuutiin fi safaayih al‑asaas wa l‑hawaadir al‑murabbatiin fooghum al‑ajalaat maargiin jaay wa jaay le l‑asaas wa tuul al‑ajalaat foog duraaʼ wa nuss.
Wa l‑ajalaat dool misil ajalaat hana arabaat al‑harib.Al‑hawaadir wa kulla cheyy al‑fooghum,sanaʼaahum min nahaas.
Wa fi arbaʼa amad masnuuʼiin fi l‑arbaʼa arkaan wa kulluhum ke sunʼa waahide maʼa l‑asaas.
Wa l‑bakaan al‑foog hana ayyi asaas mujammal be taaj mudawwar tuulah nuss duraaʼ.Wa l‑bakaan da,indah massaaka wa safaayih hana nahaas wa humman kulluhum ke sunʼa waahide maʼa l‑asaas.
Wa ayyi bakaan faadi fi l‑massaaka wa l‑safaayih,hu jammalaahum be suwar hana makhluugiin samaawiyiin wa diidaan wa chadar nakhal wa zuhuur fi kulla daayir al‑asaas.
Wa be misil da,hu sawwa al‑asaas dool be nahaas wa kulluhum induhum nafs al‑sunʼa wa nafs al‑tuul wa nafs al‑hajim.
Wa sawwa achara hiitaan hana nahaas.Wa ayyi hoot tuulah foog yisaawi 4 duraaʼ wa yichiil 4 birmiil almi.Wa ayyi hoot yukhuttuuh fi raas asaas waahid.
Wa l‑hiitaan al‑mutaharrikiin al‑khamsa khattaahum be nuss al‑zeene hana l‑beet al‑mukhaddas wa l‑hiitaan al‑khamsa al‑aakhariin kamaan khattaahum be nuss al‑isra.Wa laakin al‑hoot al‑kabiir kamaan khattaah be nuss al‑zeene hana l‑beet fi ruknah mugaabil wati sabaah.
Wa Huuraam sanaʼ hiitaan wa feelaat wa kiisaan.Wa hu kammal kulla l‑khidme hana beet Allah al‑kallafah beeha al‑malik Suleymaan.
Wa hu sanaʼal‑amad al‑itneenwa ruuseehum al‑khattaahum fi raas al‑amadwa l‑silsilateen hana nahaas al‑madfuuriin al‑khattaahum fi ruuse al‑amad dool
wa l‑urbuʼmiya rummaan al‑muʼallagiin roogeen fi l‑silsilateen hana nahaas al‑madfuuriin al‑khattaahum fi ruuse al‑amad dool
wa l‑achara asaaswa l‑achara hiitaan al‑khattaahum fooghum
wa l‑hoot al‑kabiir al‑wahiidwa l‑atnaachar tiiraan al‑tihtah
wa l‑hiitaan wa l‑feelaat wa l‑kiisaan.Kulla l‑muʼiddaat dool,Huuraam sanaʼaahum min nahaas nagi le beet Allah be amur al‑malik Suleymaan.
Wa l‑malik amar yasnaʼo kulla l‑muʼiddaat dool fi gawaalib hana tiine fi turaab bahar al‑Urdun ambeen Sukkuut wa Sartaan.
Wa Suleymaan sawwa muʼiddaat katiiriin marra waahid lahaddi naadum ma yagdar yaʼarif wazin al‑nahaas al‑sawwoohum beyah.
Wa battaan kula Suleymaan sawwa muʼiddaat aakhariin le beet Allah.Wa hummanmukhbar al‑bakhuur hana l‑dahabwa l‑tarabeeza hana l‑dahab al‑yigaddumu foogha al‑khubza le Allah
wa l‑achara faanuus min dahab saafi al‑khattaahum giddaam al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid,al‑khamsa be nuss al‑zeene wa l‑khamsa al‑aakhariin be nuss al‑israwa l‑zuhuur wa l‑tiyeesaat le l‑naar wa l‑kalaaliib kulluhum ke min dahab
wa l‑mawaaʼiin wa l‑sakaakiin wa l‑kiisaan wa l‑sufar wa khammaamaat al‑naar kulluhum ke min dahab saafiwa l‑hadiid al‑musabbit al‑biibaan hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid wa l‑hadiid al‑musabbit al‑biibaan hana beet Allah kulluhum ke min dahab.
Wa wakit kulla l‑khidme hana beet Allah kammalat khalaas,al‑malik Suleymaan jaab kulla cheyy al‑abuuh Dawuud khassasah misil al‑fudda wa l‑dahab wa l‑mawaaʼiin wa khattaahum fi l‑makhaazin hana beet Allah.
Wa baʼad da,al‑malik Suleymaan naada kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil wa kulla kubaaraat al‑gabaayil wa kubaaraat al‑aayilaat hana Bani Israaʼiil yilimmu fi Uruchaliim.Wa da achaan yichiilu sanduug muʼaahadat Allah min madiinat Dawuud al‑sammooha Sahyuun wa yiwadduuh beet Allah.
Wa kulla rujaal Bani Israaʼiil lammo wara l‑malik Suleymaan fi l‑chahar al‑saabiʼ al‑usmah Itaaniim wa da fi wakt al‑iid.
Wakit kulla chuyuukh Bani Israaʼiil jo,rujaal al‑diin chaalo al‑sanduug.
Wa rujaal al‑diin wa l‑Laawiyiin chaalo sanduug Allah wa kheemat al‑ijtimaaʼ wa kulla l‑muʼiddaat al‑mukhassasiin al‑fi lubb al‑kheema.
Wa l‑malik Suleymaan wa kulla jamaaʼat Bani Israaʼiil lammo wa wagafo giddaam al‑sanduug.Wa gaddamo dahaaya hana khanam wa bagar katiir marra waahid lahaddi naadum ma yagdar yahsibhum wa la yalga adadhum.
Wa baʼad da,rujaal al‑diin jaabo sanduug muʼaahadat Allah wa dakhkhalooh fi lubb beet Allah fi l‑bakaan al‑khassasooh leyah fi l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid tihit janaahe hana l‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin.
Wa l‑makhluugiin al‑samaawiyiin dool mumattitiin janaaheehum be foog le l‑bakaan al‑gaaʼid foogah al‑sanduug.Wa be misil da,yikhattu al‑sanduug wa l‑iidaan al‑yichiiluuh beehum.
Wa l‑iidaan al‑yichiiluuh beehum tuwaal.Wa khachum al‑iidaan dool yinchaaf le l‑naadum al‑gaaʼid ambeen al‑sanduug wa l‑madkhal hana l‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas marra waahid wa laakin naadum min barra ma yichiifah.Wa kulla l‑achya dool gaaʼidiin lahaddi l‑yoom.
Wa l‑sanduug da ma indah cheyy daakhal illa l‑liihaan al‑itneen hana l‑hajar al‑Muusa khattaahum fi lubbah wakit hu gaaʼid fi jabal Huuriib.Wa da,wakit Allah sawwa muʼaahada maʼa Bani Israaʼiil baʼad marigiinhum min balad Masir.
Wa wakit rujaal al‑diin marago min al‑bakaan al‑mukhaddas da,sahaabaay jaat saddat beet Allah.
Wa rujaal al‑diin ma gidro yisawwu khidmithum be sabab al‑sahaabaay di achaan majd Allah mala beet Allah.
Wa khalaas,Suleymaan gaal : Ya Allah !Inta gult taskun fi l‑dalaam.
Wa daahu ana baneet leek beet aziim al‑taskun foogah.Wa da l‑bakaan al‑inta taskun foogah ila l‑abad. 
Wa baʼad da,al‑malik wajjah le kulla jamaaʼat Bani Israaʼiil al‑waagfiin foog wa baarakaahum.
Wa gaal : Baarak Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil al‑hajja le abuuyi Dawuud.Aywa,be iidah hu haggag kulla l‑kalaam al‑gaalah leyah.Hu gaal :
‹ Min yoom al‑ana maragt chaʼabi Bani Israaʼiil min balad Masir,ana ma azalt hille waahide min kulla hillaal gabaayil Bani Israaʼiil le yabnu beet al‑nukhutt foogah usmi.Wa laakin ana azalt Dawuud le yahkim fi chaʼabi Bani Israaʼiil.› 
Wa Suleymaan gaal battaan : Dawuud abuuyi indah niiye le yabni beet le Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa laakin Allah gaal le abuuyi Dawuud :‹ Inta chilt niiye le tabni beet le usmi wa niiytak di adiile.
Wa da ma inta al‑tabni leyi al‑beet da laakin wileedak al‑marag min sulbak,hu bas yabni al‑beet da le usmi. ›
 Wa hassaʼ,Allah haggag kalaamah al‑gaalah.Ana baddalt abuuyi Dawuud wa gaʼadt fi kursi al‑muluk fi Bani Israaʼiil misil Allah gaalah.Wa daahu ana baneet beet le Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil.
Wa addalt bakaan le l‑sanduug al‑indah al‑liihaan al‑fooghum al‑muʼaahada al‑sawwaaha Allah maʼa juduudna wakit hu maragaahum min balad Masir. 
Wa Suleymaan wagaf giddaam madbah Allah wa gaabal kulla jamaaʼat Bani Israaʼiil.Wa rafaʼ iideenah ale l‑sama
wa gaal : Ya Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,ma fi Ilaah mislak inta wa la foog fi l‑sama wa la tihit fi l‑ard.Inta tahfad muʼaahadatak wa kheerak le khaddaamiinak al‑yitaabuʼuuk be kulla guluubhum.
Wa l‑yoom,inta hafadt le abdak Dawuud abuuyi muʼaahadatak wa be iidak,inta haggagt kulla kalaamak al‑gultah leyah.
 Wa hassaʼ,ya Allah Ilaah Bani Israaʼiil,ahfad muʼaahadatak al‑sawweetha maʼa abdak Dawuud abuuyi wakit gult leyah :‹ Daayman yukuun naadum min zurriiytak giddaami fi kursi al‑muluk hana Bani Israaʼiil.Wa da illa kan zurriiytak tukuunu maʼaayi wa titaabiʼ derbi misil inta zaatak taabaʼtah. ›
