Kan hasalat muchkila ambeenaatku inta wa jiiraanak, assaamaho le ti’iichu battaan sawa fi al-mufaahama wa l-salaam wa l-mahabba. Wa da misil al-lisaan wa l-sunuun bingardu wa laakin majbuuriin yi’iichu sawa.
Al-iicha bala maal malmaal.
Al-iicha fi l-fagur gaasiye laakin waajib al-sabur achaan al-sabur nasur.
Kan ma tagdar tihill al-muchkila walla tisawwi al-khidime al-bidooruuha minnak, ma tadkhul foogha.
Al-maafi bi’allimak al-rukhub.
Katarat al-wallaadaat taksir ragabat al-sakhiir.
Kan intu naas katiiriin fi khidime waahide, khallu naadum waahid bas yakhdimha wa l-aakhariin kamaan yisaa’uduuh fi l-khidime.
Al-sabur nasur.
Assallah be l-sabur achaan tinnasir fi su’uubaat al-haya.
Al-balad amcharr ma’anaatah al-bakaan al-foogah marad aw harba. Baariih ba’iid.
Al-khawwaaf yirabbi iyaalah.
Kan naadum ma yiwaddi nafsah fi l-halaak, da haafad le nafsah wa akuun indah hazz le umrah yabga tawiil wa yagdar yikabbir iyaalah.
Ma nagdaro abadan nibuu’u bagara al-indaha laban katiir wa ma nagdaro nitallugu mara al-indaha haal samha. Ma tikhalli chokhol al-adiil wa yanfa’ak.
Da al-humaar !
Jaayi min Zuuma taagiytah fi gadduumah...
Da al-buzaakh !
Di al-een !
Da al-sariir !
Toori toor fallaata bichiil ke ya gireenaatah...
Di al-tayyaara !
Di al-ibre wa al-kheet !
Tawiil bilhalwas wa ma billammas…

Tchaad
Fi beet al-marfa’iin
Al-kalib wa al-ba’achoom wa al-arnab wa al-tees gammo saafaro.
Wa wakit maachiin, almi ja
Khalaas, gammo wa dakhalo fi beet al-marfa’iin wa ga’ado
Wa al-marfa’iin kula chaaf almi chaayil,Hu kula gamma ja fi beetah.Wa yalla, ligaahum
Al-ba’achoom gaal : « La, la, la, Abba Kabiir. Aniina jiina leek le tichawwif le safarna
Wa hassa’ fi al-derib, jaayibiin leek kabich kabiir. »
Wa ga’ado chiya wa Al-ba’achoom gaal le rufgaanah : « Fikirku chunu ? Yaatu kulla buguul fikrah. »
Al-ba’achoom gaal leehum : « Ana da fikri waahid bas
Al-rassaltah wa ja da, hu siidah ya’arfah fi raasah. »
Hu gaal le al-kalib : « Al-kalib, amchi chiifhum ke. Akuun al-kabich da khalabhum ? »
Al-kalib macha wa ma ja.
Hu gaal le al-arnab : « Arnab, amchi chiifhum ! Al-kabich da samiin bilheen, bakhlibhum. »
Al-arnab kulla machat wa ma jaat.
Hu gaal le al-tees : « Al-tees inta kula, al-ma indak faayde da, amchi chiifhum. »
Al-tees kula macha wa ma ja.
Wa illa faddal al-ba’achoom wiheedah
Al-ba’achoom hu kula gamma jara wa khalla al-marfa’iin
Wakit macha ba’iid, gaal leyah : « Abba Kabiir. Agood aafe! »

Madiide le al-iyaal hana dagiig butuku wa fuul
Waajib tichiili :
dagiig butuku talaata jeenu sakhayyar
wa dagiig lubya jeenu sakhayyar waahid
wa marduud hana fuul chiya
wa warchaal yaabis hana hallum
wa mileh chiya
wa almi hana nuss leemuun
Kikkeef nisawwu al-madiide hana butuku ?
Khutti al-tahwa fi al-naar wa subbi foogah dagiig hana butuku wa agliih.
Wakit al-dagiig da bigi chiya ahmar wa binchamma halu, subbiih fi al-ma'uun.
Wa subbi almi fi al-burma wa khuttiiha fi al-naar.
Al-dagiig al-magli da, laayiih wa subbiih fi al-almi al-faayir wa khalli yufuur ma’aayah.
Al-marduud kula, ajjiniih be almi wa subbi fi al-burma.
Wa ziidi foogah al-dagiig hana lubya kula.
Ziidi al-warchaal yaabis wa al-mileh.
Wa ziidi sukkar kan tidooriih.
Kan khalaas nijid adiil, dalliih min al-naar wa khalli yabrud chiya.
Wa ziidi foogah nuss leemuun.
Anti al-madiide al-sawweetiiha di le sakhiirki yachrab be funjaal, arba'a walla khamsa marraat fi al-yoom.
Al-madiide di, antiiha le al-iyaal al-umurhum tamma arba'a chahar achaan yabgo kwaysiin.

Al-chadar muhimm le al-haya
Zamaan, al-kadaade malyaane be al-chadar wa al-naas yalgo faayde katiire minha.
Be al-chadar, al-naas yisawwu cheyy katiir.
Be hatab hana chadar, al-naas bisawwu beyah akil;Wa yabnu beyah kawaazi wa buyuut wa madaaris.
Wa yisawwu beyah zeriibe hana bagar.
Wa min al-chadar, al-naas yalgo dawa.
Al-markaba, al-fundug, al-amuud, al-ga’aada, iidaan al-kadanka wa al-jarraay, kulla al-khumaam dool al-naas gaa’idiin yisawwuuhum be al-hatab hana chadar.
Fi al-bakaan al-indah chadar katiir, almi yusubb be ziyaada wa al-khariif yabga tagiil.
Hassa’ al-chadar bigi ma fiih wa al-kadaade gaa’ide yaabse.
Kan al-awiin faza’o le al-hatab kula, ma yalgo cheyy wa yigabbulu iideenhum yaabsiin.
Wa siyaad al-bahaayim ma yalgo warchaal hana chadar al-yi’akkulu beyah bahaayimhum.
Al-bagar gaa’idiin yumuutu wa siyaadhum gaa’idiin haznaaniin.
Wa al-chadar bigi ma fiih wa al-sahara gaa’ide tazhaf.
Wa al-chadar al-yisawwu beyah dawa kula bigi ma fiih.
Kan mara tiwaddi sakhiirha le al-ajuuz achaan tidaawiih leeha be al-chadar, hi talga cheyy fi bakaan al-ajuuz.
Wa al-bahaayim gaa’idiin fi al-harraay bala dull achaan al-bakaan da bigi sahara wa ma indah chadar.
Wa naas al-hille lammo fi bakaan cheekhhum achaan yalgo halal le al-muchkila di...
« Fi al-dunya di, naadum kan ma maggan chadara fi muddit hayatah da, aach haya hana nadaama. »

Bi’iichu sawa
Wakit waahid, al-seed hana al-kadaade lammo sawa.
Wa Abba Kabiir al-duud, wa Abu Fattuuma al-marfa’iin, wa Ganda Ab-Haliime al-ba’achoom, humman gaalo : «Khalli nulummu nagoodu bakaan waahid, aniina al-talaata.»
Khalaas kulluhum khassado wa ga’ado bakaan waahid.
Yoom waahid, Abba Kabiir gaal : «Mag’adna da ma yabga, al-juu’ ma yikhalliina. Khalli namchu nifattuchu leena cheyy nakuluuh.»
Khalaas gammo ganaso, ligo khazaala katalooha. Al-duud gaal : «Hassa’ da, daahu katalna khazaala. Inta Marfa’iin gassim leena !»
Al-marfa’iin gamma khatta kiimaan talaata wa gaal : «Abba Kabiir, chiil waahid. Ab-Haliime, chiil waahid, Wa ana kula nichiil waahid.»
Al-duud gamma hammarah ke, daggaah wa katalah wa gaal leyah : «Hawaan, ajami, ma ta’arif tigassim ! Ba’achoom, gassim leena inta kamaan !»
Khalaas al-ba’achoom gamma lamma al-laham da kulla ke wa gassamah min jadiid bakaan talaata wa gaal : «Abba Kabiir, daahu al-laham da. Koom al-waahid da hana fatuurak wa al-taani da hana khadaak wa al-taalit da hana achaak. Wa leyi ana kamaan, Allah kariim.»
Al-duud gamma dihik wa gaal le al-ba’achoom : «Inta da naadum najiid, yaatu ooraak al-fikir da ?» Al-ba’achoom gaal : «Moot hana rafiigna marfa’iin da bas jaab leyi al-fikir da.»y
Khalaas Abba Kabiir chakarah bilheen wa Ganda gamma faat be al-aafe.

Maktuub
Rafiigti al-khaaliye leyi, al-salaam aleeki !
Ana farhaane achaan naktib leeki wa nantiiki khabari.
Gubbaal kulla cheyy, nas’al aafiyitki wa aafe hint ahal beetki !
Kan leyi ana, gaa’ide aafe ma’a naas beeti.
Kikkeef al-khariif fi hillitku ?
Hini fi Anjammeena,wakit al-khariif bada, almi ma gaa’id busubb adiil.Laakin hassa’ al-khariif adiil marra waahid.
Wa l-cheyy al-ma adiil, amba’uuda bigat katiire bilheen wa gaa’ide tisabbib al-wirde le l-naas.
Kikkeef al-giraay hana l-awiin ?
Kammaltu be adiil wa ? 
Allamtu taktubu wa tagru wa ?
Kan ayye,ana nukuun farhaane bilheen.
Al-wasiiye al-nagdar nantiiki, abadan ma tikhallu al-giraay.
Achaan kan allamtu al-giraay, taktubu wa tagru wa da sameh.
Khalaas ma indi khabar aakhar nantiiki wa fi l-aakhir nisallim ahal beetki wa kulla naas al-irfe wa jiiraanki.
Min rafiigitki Arafa.

Al-giyaaf
Al-giyaaf hi chadara sakhayre wa tuulha yabga misil talaata walla khamsa mitir wa warchaalha gawi.
Wa iyaalha bakaan waahid daraadim walla chiyya tuwaal wa lubbuhum ahmar walla abyad wa da baji min nafar hana l-chadara bas.
Dawa le l-sabiib
Chuulu malyit iid hana warchaal giyaaf rakhas, wa kan al-chadara ma indaha warchaal rakhas, chuulu talaata aw arba’a warag ballikh.
Subbuuh fi almi liitir waahid wa khuttu fi l-naar wa khallu yufuur muddat ichiriin dagaayig.
Saffuuh wa subbuuh fi l-gazaaza wa waffu khachum al-gazaaza be almi achaan yiwaffi khachumha al-nagas.
Wa gabbulu al-almi da fi raas al-naar.
Wa subbu foogah :
khamsa kiyeer kabiir hana sukkar
arba’a garse hana mileh
garse waahide mileh di cheele hana mileh al-naadum yagdar yichiilah be l-asaabe’ al-talaata
Wa khallu battaan yufuur dagiiga waahide wa ba’ad da dalluuh wa subbuuh fi l-gazaaza.
fi gadd al-sukkar, tagdaro tichuulu asal.
fi gadd al-mileh, tagdaro tichuulu curuuru.
fi gadd al-warchaal hana l-giyaaf, tagdaro tichuulu warchaal hana mongo al-rakhas walla warchaal amlibeene.
Wa kan ma induku abadan al-warchaal dool, jahhuzu al-almi hana mileh be sukkar.
Al-cheyy al-muhimm da waajib tacharbo almi be ziyaada achaan tiwaffu al-almi al-daffag fi wakit al-intu gaa’idiin tisabbubu.
Antu  le l-mardaan al-indah ziyaada min sitte sana :
funjaal kabiir waahid ba’ad ayyi sabiib wa da yabga misil arba’a liitir fi l-yoom.
Antu le sakhiir al-indah santeen le sitte sana :
funjaal sakhayyar waahid ba’ad ayyi sabiib wa da misil talaata liitir fi l-yoom.
Antu le sakhiir al-indah sitte chahar le santeen :
nuss funjaal sakhayyar waahid ba’ad ayyi sabiib wa da misil liitreen fi l-yoom.
le sakhiir al-angas min sitte chahar :
kiyeeraat bas ba’ad ayyi sabiib wa da yabga misil liitir waahid fi l-yoom.
Angaru' : kan al-sabiib ma wigif muddat talaata yoom, aaluju al-mardaan didd al-duud.

Ya akhuuyi ya Tachaadi
Ragadt aafe – gayyalt aafe
Fi Mongo wa Durbaali – fi daar Waddaay wa l-waadi
Fi Bongoor wa Ati – fi Mawo wa Dunamaji
Fi l-Batha wa l-Fitri – fi l-Logon wa l-Chaari
Inta akhuuyi ya Tachaadi.
Inta Sara aw Gur’aani – Arabi aw Taamaayi
Bornaay aw Waddaay – Baagirmaay aw Kaanumbaay
Tubaay aw Hajaraay – Zakhaawi aw Miimaay
Al-faki wa l-gooni – al-raa’i wa l-wanjaami
Siit al-wade’ wa l-ambaay – siid al-almi wa l-harraati
Al-chifeer wa l-attaali – al-basiir wa l-haddaadi
Kulluhum ahali – ya akhuuyi ya Tachaadi.
Wa Khamiis siid achiiri – al-jaayi min Melfi
Khadiija wa Amm Illi – wa Jimaaduum jaari
Wa Baana’aji rafiigi – wa Toogooy nasiibi
Iidi fi iidak – nabnu watanna al-khaali.
Faatime Zahra bitt al-faki
Wa Mahajiriiye akhut Tijjaani
Wa jaarithum Faatime al-tchaatchaatni Gaalat tiriidni wa ma raadatni
Kulluhum ahali – kulluhum ahalak

Al-naas katara be l-farha wakit al-malik Suleymaan hall muchkilathum.
Kan indahum su’aal, ma yidooru yimchu le naadum aakhar.
Al-sabur yij'al al-naadum yinnasir fi hayaatah.
Bawrud ma bikhassil wijhah, wa ma yuguul cheyy, wa da bas al-kalib.
Al-wileed al-sakhayyar farah bilheen wakit gabbal beet abuuh.
Al-abu gamma yigessim le awlaadah khumama be adiil.
Kan ta’aruf al-sabar, ma tikhassir fi ayyi cheyy.
Al-chadar muhim bilheen le hayyaat al-naas.
Al-khaddaam waajib yakul achaan yagdar yakhadim.
Amis aniina dabbahna al-ijil al-samiin.
Hi ma gaa’ide tidoor al-sakhiir da yimuut.
Al-malik Suleymaan anta leehin al-halal al-adiil.
Indi bineeye tinam balal wijee’e.
Fi l-bakaan al-ma fiih chadar, almi ma yeji.
Rufugaani katabo ley kitaab .
Al-malik Suleymaan kan indah hikma kabiire wa hu kaan yikaffif bain al-naas be l-adil.
Wa wakit jaabuu leehin muchkila, hu hallaha be hikimtah.
Kan ta’aruf al-sabar, talga al-nasur.
Al-wileed al-kabiir ma fahim farhat abuuh.
Al-abu gamma yifrah be ruju’ wileedah.
Bet da mabni adil, lakine bet hanam da chen.
Ana mabsoute alek be arrousak.
Tamchi mata le Nadoum daa?
Machgoug, machhour, wa machkoura.
Maadaamit inti ma djit, ana ma ninum.
Madbah da beyide min hine.
Al-gurus al-mouharram ma inda baraka.
Madfoun fi makhbara al-gadiima.
Madiide da halou bil-laban.
Madri wayn houwa al-maktab.
Mafthouh bab al-madrasa.
Magli wala murakap?
Mahabba kabira baynathom.
Mahkama da beyide, lakine hakhi fiha.
Majnoun walla chnu ?
Makana da kassarate.
Malaika katirina fi sama.
Malja le kulli zool.
Malyuun gouroush.
Mamnou ad-dukhul.
Mara mardane.

Markaba seme fi bahar.

gucha le al-maktab.

akil hagina kamal khalas.

Al-charii’a al-kabiire hana al-malik Suleymaan
Al-naas ya’arfu hikimtah min zamaan
Wa wakit induhum su’aal, yamchu leyah achaan yasma’o jawwab mina
Fiyah awiin itneen wa ayye waahide indaha sakhiir
Amm al-sakhiir di gammat baddalat sakhiirha al-mayyit
Be fajur, amm al-sakhiir al-hayy chaafat sakhiir mayyit raagid jambaha
Wa hi irfat kadar jaaritha sirgat sakhiirha
Al-duwaas bigate chadiid ambeenaatime
Macho bakaan al-malik Suleymaan achaan yigaddumu muchkilithim
Agta’o al-sakhiir al-hayy da bakane itneen
Wa be misil da ayye mara talga nuss waahid
Amm al-sakhiir al-hayy barjalat marra waahid
Ma taktul al-sakhiir da laakin antiih le l-mara di
Al-mara al-ma tidoor ke al-sakhiir da yagta’o bakane itneen da, hi bas ammah
Antuuwa sakhiirha
Kulla l-cha’ab firho be l-charii’a di
Wa ayyi waahid chakar Allah achaan anta le l-malik Suleymaan hikma kabiire
Kan gallooh ratan, wa kan zagalooh anbatan
yibarid wa ma bikhassil wijhah
Azrag mulaahah dihin
Kan taar tiyeere, kan nazal hicheere
Derbah derb jamal be tirkitah fi l-chadar
Al-fiil maat, udaamah wagfaat
Gi’editha, gi’edit naadum wa angar’itha angar’it khaadim
Dabbat tihit wa bayyadat foog
Amaamti raagde be naayitha, bamrug leeha suuf abiyad
Amaamti raagde fi sariirha wa tinaggi fi awaawiirha
Raasah wa ragabtah kulla khilibooh
Jidditi amsilee’e tabki bala wijee’e
Min foog dull wa min tihit dull wa tahajji hadiis al-durr
Al-hayy kabas al-mayyit, wa l-mayyit gamma bikoorik
Jidditi Amm Ache titallif wa tatwi bireechha maache
Fiyah raajil waahid indah awlaad itneen
Yoom waahid al-sakhayyar gaal le abuuh
Abuuh gamma gassam maalah le awlaadah al-itneen
Al-wileed al-sakhayyar tchakama kulla cheyy
Wa macha balad aakhara ba’iide
Wa fi l-balad di sawwa amal cheen wa waddar kulla gursah
Juu’ chadiid dakhal fi l-balad di
Wa l-wileed ma indah cheyy
Wa macha yakhadim le raajil waahid
Wa l-raajil da chaalah le yasrah leyah be l-khanaaziir
Wa l-wileed daayir yaakul akil hana l-khanaaziir
Laakin naadum ma antaah
Khalaas ga’ad yifakkir
Fi beet abuui kulla l-khaddaamiin chab’aaniin bilheen
Wa hini ana mayyit min al-juu’
Khalli nigabbil fi beet abuui
Ya abuui, ana sawweet khata leek inta wa giddaam Allah
Hassa da ma waajib battaan taj’alni misil wileedak
Al-madrasa ma bilene ba’iide min al-beit
Al-walad da yagdar yisse chokhol kwayyis
mara di chaafat al-aboungada fi l-fadaye
Al-mouddaris da yichaabih abouuy
Al-naas al-mardanine yamchu fi l-mustachfa
chadar al-kabiir da anta dull adil
Al-kalb yirfa’ al-chokhol bala ta’ab
Al-hile di khabire min al-dar
Al-rih haami al-yoom fi N'Djamena
Al-kitaab da inda gisas katira
Al-moya al-barida tita’ib al-gelib
Al-raajil da ma yikhaf min al-doute
Al-gouruss da katir chadiid leena
Al-banat yurudu yalabo be al-balle
Al-walad al-sakhayyar aba ma yemchi  l-madrasa
Al-malik yihkam be l-hakh
Al-mara di tabki ala chii’i
Al-koko al-sakhayyar ma yagdar yarfa’ al-houkum
Al-khani ma yichabbih al-miskiin
Al-harb ma fiha ayye maslaha le al-naas
Al-qaadir yigdar yigarri l-sakhayyar
Al-tayyara titir foog al-baahar
Al-narra kaanat kabiira fi l-kadade
Al-nas djo min al-chari’a al-ba’iide
Al-sabaah kwayyis achaan al-haraye marak
Al-chari alda yemchi fi l-souk
Al-kalaam al-hadii ma yikessir al-adane
Al-naas al-ma’zoumine djo katirin fi l-beit
Al-mileh da katir fi l-akil
Al-gourous ma yagdar yibiya al-sa’ada
Al-abou yihibb awlaadah biala hudoud
Al-khaddaam yirfa’ al-choghol be ta’ab
Al-almi gassarat min al-bir
Al-naas ketiriine fi l-ijtimaa’ al-yoom
Al-walad da ma yisma’ kalaam abouuh
Al-beit da mabni min mudda tawila
Al-mara chaafat al-walad al-mabrouk
Al-hawaa haami al-yoom
Al-kitaab fi maktabi
Al-naas jow min al-dar al-ba'iide
Al-kalib da yikhaf min al-nar
Al-gaadir da gayikassir al-chadar
Al-koko yimchi foog al-ard
Al-harb waddarat al-naas
Al-sabaah kwayyis le al-chakhil
Al-chari'a da inda naas
Al-kalaam al-hadii yirfa' al-ruh
Al-ma'zoumin djo katirin
Al-mileh da ma seme le l-walad
Al-gourouss ma yitimina
Wakit al-malik Suleymaan sim'a al-gissa, gamma fakkar zamaan tawil gubbal ma yigul kalaamah
Al-mara al-inda  al-sakhiir kanat tabki chadiid achaan ma tidoor yigta'ou wileedha
Raajil fi l-dar kan yemchi kulla yoom achaan yachrab moya min al-bir al-gediim
Al-awlaad djo min al-madrasa farhaaniin bilheen ba'ad ma khallaso imtihanatum
Chaafat al-narra tihaarig al-beit al-qadiim, wa ma giddirat takhali khumama
Zamaan al-khawf kan malyaan fi quloub al-naas achane al-harb al-mouharrama
Al-chadar da kabiir chadiid, yanti dull katir achaan al-naas yigodou gaara
Miridna chadiid, laakin al-doktor antaana dawa kwayyis khalana nolgo l-afe
Nass al-qarya ijtama'ou giddam al-chiekh achaan yinakhuchu fi mushkiltum al-kabiira
Ma yumkan ti’allim al-walad al-sakhayyar  kulla chey fi yoom waahid, laazim tukun sabur
Abuuy antaani gurs katir wa gal li
Machena souq al-kabiir hana N'Djamena, wa chifna naas katirine yitchakumu wa yibi'ou
Al-kalib  jara wara al-haywane al fi kadade, laakin ma gidir karaba
ga’ad fakkar zamaan tawil, ya’ani hal yemchi wala yakhalli khidimta al-gediim
Fi l-kharif, naas katirine yadukhulou biyoutum achaan ma yimballo
Al-zawaj al-ma mabni ala mahabba ma yidoum kaamil
Waajib ayyi waahid yihterim abouuh wa ammaah achaan Allah yibarikka
Al-taayara wagat fi sahara ba’iide, wa naas katirine gaalo ma fi naadum hayy
Al-qadiir da ga’ad yichra’ l-mushkila le naas al-dar be charii’a hna Suleymaan
naas katirine djo min al-balad al-ba’iide achaan yichoufou al-malik al-hakiim
Kulli yoom subh al-harati yemchi zere’ haga le yakhadim achaan yuluma’ al-khalla
Al-wiled al-khadam da ga yakhadim katir laakin ma ga yalga gourous kettir
Gulta lahu
Al-qaryat al-kabiira di awal indaa naas katirine min kulli qabiila
Al-khaddaam al-amin da kan yakhadim kulla yoom bala ta’ab, yidoor yifariha abuuh
Fi wakit al-kharif, al-naas yijma’ou al-mongo min al-chadar al-kabiir
Al-doktor gal le l-mara al-mardane
Ma indak chey adil ke yumkin tanfaha biha al-naas fi hayaatkum?
Al-awlaad morogo min al-bet be jeri fi al-chari wa yalabo be l-balle
Al-jiraan ma yidoorou yidawusu, laakin mushkila basita bes jat ambeenathum
Al-qadiir al-hakiim da kan yihkam ambeen al-naas be adl wa bala zulum
Khallina nonso al-mushkil al-gediim wa nobdo hayat jedida sawa
Fi yoom waahid, al-naas chifou ter kabiir yitir fi sama, wa galo "da min rahmat Allah"
Wakit al-matara nazilat chadiid, al-wadi ammalat be alme wa al-naas ma gidiro yimurgu
Al-eb da misil al-wasakh al-gahit foog al-dahar, bas al-naas yichoufouh
Kan tidoor tisse naadum farhaan, anti hadiya basita wa gul low "Marhab bik"
Al-walad al-sakhayyar yidoor yikbar ajala achaan yigdar yakhadim misil abuuh
Al-naas al-ma yirudu chokhol al-seme ma yagdaro yiwassulou ayye bakan
Raajil al-;chayib da kan yihajji qisas katira le al-awlaad be fileil
Al-naas al-mabsoutiin kanou yirfa’ou al-sawra achaan fazo
Al-rih haami fi al-sahaara, wa al-naas yidoorou dull min al-chadar
Zamaan da khawf maliyaan fi quloub al-naas kalam al-douas al-mouharrama
Al-hadis di ma yumkin yinsaa, laakin laazim na’alumu mina achaan ma nisso khalat taani
Al-khani ma yichabih al-miskiin, laakin Allah yid al-itneen bala faraga
Awine hana l-dar gayilumu al-hattab min al-kadade kulla yoom achaan yichakhulou al-nar
Al-malik gal le al-soltaan
Al-walad al-yisalli kulla yoom yisawi chii'i kwayyis fi hayatah
Ma tinssa kadar al-kalaam al-hadii, yifukah al-quloub al-mussada
Al-beit al-djiid da mabni be hujar kubaar, wa ma yiharrik be suhula
Naas al-balad ga yakhadumu kulla yoom achaan yijma’ou al-akil le awlaadum
Al-cha’ab astakhbal al-ra'iis fi al-babaat al-kabiira
Al-hadid yimkan yinsadda kan ma tahfazoh min al-alme
Al-chii'i al-waahid al-ma yinba’ be al-gourous da al-sa’ada al-hakhikhiya
Al-maaya al-barida fi al-sabah tagdar tisse fatigue
Al-doktor ora le l-mara chey muhimm achan al-dawa al-laazim
Al-naadum al-ma yihibb yi’allim awlaadah, ma yumkin yichif baraka fi hayaatah
Al-moya al-ma inda’ mileh ma inda’ ayyi feyde le al-zourou’a
Al-chari’a al-kabiira di awal inda souq yijma’ naas katirine min kulli jiiha
Al-juma’a al-fatat, al-naas djamm'ou achaan yisawou al-karama fi al-dar
Al-walad al-sakhayyar gal le abuuh
Al-ghani ga yanti gourous le al-miskin, wa Allah anta baraka fi maalah
Al-nar kanat bilene hamara, wa al-naas khaffo ke tiharig al-buyout
Al-walad al-ma yisma’ kalaam ammaah yimkan yalga’ muchkila katir fi hayaatah
Al-chadar al-yizid kulla yoom yenti thamaraat hilwa le al-naas
Al-kass kan awal malyaana be chokhol azarag misil al-dihin
Ma yimkan tikhalli naadum yejri bila chey yihfazoh min al-nugura
Al-hayya al-ma fiha mahabba ma inda ayyi sa’ada le al-naas
Al-naadum al-ma yihfaz asraarah, yimkan yafgud kulli chey indah
Al-harb yiharrig al-buyout wa yifaarig al-usar, wa yikhalli al-naas fi hizin
Al-jou al-kabiir jabat al-naas yamchu le al-raajil al-ghani
Al-madrasa al-djiid yihallim al-awlaad al-hadid al-takniya
Al-mara di miridate zamaan tawil, laakin hassa ligate al-afe wa gatisa’id khera
